Matthew: Kanan mʋ nɩɩ Yesu Krisito kakʋʋgɛ tɔ kɩnaana ki du ndee. Yesu Krisito lɩɩ Owura Dawidi kanaan tɔ, nɩɩ Dawidi mɔɔ lɩɩ Abraham kanaan tɔ.
Abraham mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Isaki,
nɩɩ Isaki mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Gyekobu,
nɩɩ Gyekobu mɔɔ mu‐bii ana ɩ gyɛ Gyuda maa mu‐supu ana.
Gyuda mu‐bii ana ɩ gyɛ Peresi maa Sera, nɩɩ bamʋ‐nyi ɩ gyɛ Tama.
Peresi mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Hesiron,
nɩɩ Hesiron mɔɔ mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Ram.
Nɩɩ Ram mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Aminada,
nɩɩ Aminada mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Naason,
nɩɩ Naason mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Salimon.
Nɩɩ Salimon mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Bowasi, nɩɩ mu‐nyi ɩ gyɛ Rahabu,
nɩɩ Bowasi mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Obedi, nɩɩ mu‐nyi ɩ gyɛ Rufu,
nɩɩ Obedi mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Gyeese.
Nɩɩ Gyeese mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Owura Dawidi.
Nɩɩ Owura Dawidi taa ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ daa ɔ gyɛ Yuriya mʋ‐ka kʋʋgɛ Solomon.
Solomon mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Rehobowam,
nɩɩ Rehobowam mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Abigya,
nɩɩ Abigya mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Asa.
Nɩɩ Asa mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Gyehosafati,
nɩɩ Gyehosafati mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Gyehoram,
nɩɩ Gyehoram mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Yusiya.
Nɩɩ Yusiya mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Gyotam,
nɩɩ Gyotam mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Ahasi,
nɩɩ Ahasi mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Hesekiya.
Nɩɩ Hesekiya mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Manase,
nɩɩ Manase mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Amon,
nɩɩ Amon mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Gyosiya.
Nɩɩ Gyosiya mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Gyekoniya maa mu‐supu ana.
Kanan saŋa maŋa nɩɩ Babilon abi ba kɔ kɩtaa Ɩsɩrayɩ abi waa bamʋ anyɛ mʋ.
Nɩɩ lɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba yɛgɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi mʋ nɩɩ ba kɩtaa kpee Babilon naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ Yesu mʋ, ɩmʋ kakʋʋgɛ tɔ nkyaga sʋ ndee.
Gyekoniya mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Selatiye,
nɩɩ Selatiye mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Serubabeli.
Nɩɩ Serubabeli mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Abiyudi,
nɩɩ Abiyudi, mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Eliyakim,
nɩɩ Eliyakim mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Aso.
Aso mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Sadoki,
nɩɩ Sadoki mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Akim,
nɩɩ Akim mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Eliyudi.
Nɩɩ Eliyudi mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Eleyasa,
nɩɩ Eleyasa mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Matan,
nɩɩ Matan mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Gyekobu.
Nɩɩ Gyekobu mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ Gyosefu, Mɛɛrɩ mu‐kuli mʋ. Nɩɩ Mɛɛrɩ maŋa ɩ kʋʋgɛ Yesu mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Krisito mʋ.

Ɩmʋ sʋ lɩɩ Abraham saŋa naa fʋʋ Owura Dawidi kanaana tɔ kakʋʋgɛ nkyaga sʋ mʋ ɩ gyɛ kudu ana. Nɩɩ lɩɩ Dawidi naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba kɩtaa bamʋ waa anyɛ mʋ kanaana tɔ kakʋʋgɛ nkyaga sʋ ɩ gyɛ kudu ana. Nɩɩ lɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba yɛgɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi lɩɩ Babilon naa fʋʋ Krisito kakʋʋgɛ saŋa mʋ gbaa gyɛ kanaana tɔ kakʋʋgɛ nkyaga sʋ kudu ana.
Yesu Krisito kakʋʋgɛ asɩn ndee. Ba taa mu‐nyi Mɛɛrɩ sa Gyosefu kekili, amaa pɔyɩ kɛ ba bɩɩ abaa mʋ, ɩ ba fɛɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ sʋ ɔtɔ, nɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɩ ba kanɩn.
Gyosefu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ mu‐kuli mʋ gyɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ mʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi, nɩɩ maa mee biti fɛɛ ɔ ŋaabaa Mɛɛrɩ asa nsana tɔ sʋ mʋ, ɔ waa mʋ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ ee biti ɔ baala kina mʋ.

Amaa Gyosefu, maa fɛ falɛ nfɛɛrɛ mʋ, nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ mʋ idee tɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Gyosefu, Dawidi kanaana‐bii, man waa kufuu fɛɛ fʋ mɛɛ yɛ fʋ taa Mɛɛrɩ kili, lɩɩ fɛɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ ɔtɔ.
Ee biti ɔ kʋʋgɛ obii‐nyɩnsa, kɛ fʋ yɩla mʋ kɩtɩɩ yɛ Yesu, kpalɩ fɛɛ mʋ ii biti ɔ ba mɔlɩgɛ mʋ asa lɩɩ bamʋ alibi tɔ.”
Ɩnɩmʋ kpini ɩ ba waa, kɛ ɩ ba tɔ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ bɔla mʋ ɔtɔwɛpʋ sʋ tɔwɛ yɛ,
“Kibite mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man nyi ɔnyɩn ii biti ɔ nyɛ ɔtɔ kʋʋgɛ obii‐nyɩnsa, kɛ ba tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Emanuweli,” kɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ bʋ anɛ asɛ.”
Ɩmʋ sʋ Gyosefu maa kyiŋi mʋ, o kili Mɛɛrɩ taa mʋ kpee mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ sa kɔnɔ yɛ ɔ waa mʋ.
Amaa Gyosefu man dɛ yɛ Mɛɛrɩ halɩɩ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kʋʋgɛ obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ. Nɩɩ Gyosefu yɩla mʋ kɩtɩɩ yɛ Yesu.
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ Yesu Krisito Betilehem kadɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Gyudeya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ, kanɩn saŋa maa mʋ Herodi ɩ gyɛ owura. Nɩɩ ɩ ba fɛɛ, anyaasɩnpʋ akʋ ba lɩɩ kyɔwɛ ɩlɩɩ ba Gyerusalem kadɛ tɔ,
nɩɩ ba taasɛ yɛ, “Nkɩɩ kebii mʋ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ mʋ yɛ o be gyii Gyiwu abi kuwura mʋ? An wu mu kikyikpebi
maa paatɛ lɩɩ kyɔwɛ kɩlɩɩ, nɩɩ an ba yɛ an be muŋa bʋnyaa mʋ.”
Owura Herodi maa nu falɛ asɩn mʋ ɩɩ tɔɔrɔɔ mʋ gaa yɛ Gyerusalem abi kpini.
Nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu abɩlɩsa yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ ba gyaŋɛ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fɩnɛ nɩɩ bee biti ba kʋʋgɛ Krisito abɛɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ?”
Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Bee biti ba kʋʋgɛ mʋ Betilehem kadɛ tɔ Gyudeya Ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.” Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ kʋ wʋla kyʋrɔɔ yɩla yɛ,
“Fʋ Betilehem mʋ nɩɩ fʋ bʋ Gyudeya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ,
halɩɩ fʋ maa gyɛ pɩɩ gbaa mʋ, fʋ gyɛ ɔkparɛ
lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ tɔ nɩɩ owura lala mʋ ii biti ɔ lɩɩ,
nɩɩ mʋ ee biti ɔ baa ɔ gyɛ fɛɛ nbʋlʋpʋ ɔkpapʋ sa mɛ asa Ɩsɩrayɩ abi.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Owura Herodi tɩɩ anyaasɩnpʋ mʋ lɩɩ ɩkaa sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ kɛ ɔ bɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba wu kikyikpebi maa lɩɩ mʋ.
Nɩɩ o sun bamʋ Betilehem tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan kpee naa kɩɩ danbɩrasa biti kebii mʋ. Nɩɩ fan kan wu mʋ mʋ fan ba tɔwɛ mɛ, kɛ ngbaa mɛ n kpee naa muŋa bʋnyaa mʋ.”

Ba maa nu Owura mʋ asɛ lʋwɛ nɩɩ ba maa sʋ bee kpee mʋ, opula tɔ nɩɩ ba bwii wu kikyikpebi mʋ nɩɩ ba daa wu kyɔwɛ kɩlɩɩ mʋ, nɩɩ kɩ gyankpaa bamʋ kpee naa yɩlɛ opula mʋ nɩɩ kebii mʋ bʋ mʋ sʋsʋ kyɛɛkyɛɛ.
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba wu kikyikpebi mʋ, bamʋ ansi i gyii naa kyʋn sʋ.

Ba maa loo kɩkpaara mʋ sʋ mʋ, ba wu kebii mʋ maa mu‐nyi Mɛɛrɩ, nɩɩ ba kyʋn muŋa sun mʋ. Nɩɩ ba saŋɛ bamʋ ɩsʋla nɩɩ ba lɛɛ suwa yɛ tulale mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ firanki‐ɩnsɛnsɩ yɛ tulale mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ mɩɩrɛ kɛɛ mʋ.
Kamaa tɔ mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ da bamʋ amu tɔ idee tɔ yɛ ba man bɩla bwii kpee Owura Herodi asɛ, ɩmʋ sʋ ba bɔla ɔkpa pʋpwɛ sʋ bwii kpee bamʋ ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.

Ba maa kyʋn kamaa mʋ, Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ ba lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ Gyosefu idee tɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Kʋsʋ taa kebii mʋ maa mu‐nyi sɩlɛ kpee Egyipiti naa kyɩna tʋtɔ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n biti n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ fan lɩɩ tʋtɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Herodi ɩɩ kɩɩ ee biti kebii mʋ ɔ mɔɔ.”
Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ kʋsʋ taa kebii mʋ maa mu‐nyi kagyanbwɛ nɩɩ ba sɩlɛ kpee Egyipiti.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba kyɩna naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Herodi wu. Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla mʋ ɔtɔwɛpʋ sʋ tɔwɛ mʋ ba tɔ. Ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, “Lɩɩ Egyipiti tɔ nɩɩ n tɩɩ Mi‐bii.”

Owura Herodi maa bɩɩ fɛɛ anyaasɩnpʋ mʋ ba pɩna mʋ mʋ, ɔ nyɛ agbʋ gaa. Nɩɩ ɔ sa kɔnɔ yɛ ba mɔɔ nbii‐nyɩnsa‐bii mʋ nɩɩ ba man pɩɩta kyʋn nsu nnyɔ sʋ, nɩɩ ba bʋ Betilehem yɛ ndɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ kyaabɔɔ kɩmʋ mʋ kpini. Ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba waa kanɩn nɩn lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ anyaasɩnpʋ mʋ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ ba wu kikyikpebi mʋ, ii biti ɩ waa fɛɛ nsu nnyɔ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla mʋ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Gyeremiya sʋ tɔwɛ mʋ ba tɔ. Ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ,
“Ba nu kusu ɩlʋn kʋ lɩɩ Rama kadɛ tɔ,
ɩɩ saawʋ yɛgɛ ɩ sʋ kʋwɛɛ,
Raheli ɛɛ sawʋ ee su mu‐bii ana sʋ.
Asa ba tɔwɛ yuula mʋ kɔkɔlɔ kpɩnɛ,
lɩɩ fɛɛ mu‐bii ana ba wu.”
Owura Herodi kelewu kamaa mʋ, Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ Gyosefu idee tɔ Egyipiti ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ,
nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Kʋsʋ taa kebii mʋ maa mu‐nyi bwii kpee Ɩsɩrayɩ ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba daa bee biti ba mɔɔ kebii mʋ ba wu.”
Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ kʋsʋ taa kebii mʋ maa mu‐nyi kpee Ɩsɩrayɩ ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.
Amaa maa nu yɛ Akelasi i yii mʋ‐sɛ Herodi ayaa tɔ ee gyii kuwura Gyudeya mʋ, kufuu kɩ kɩtaa mʋ yɛ tʋtɔ kikpe. Ɩbwaarɛ maa da mu kumu tɔ idee tɔ sʋ mʋ, o kpeli kpee Galile kɩbaafʋn.
Nɩɩ ɔ naa kyɩna Nasareti kadɛ mʋ tɔ. Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ tɔwɛ lɩɩ kebii mʋ sʋ mʋ ba tɔ. Asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, “Bee biti ba tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Kanasareti‐nyɩn.”
Kanɩn saŋa maa mʋ, Gyɔn mʋ nɩɩ ee gyee asa Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee mʋ, ba Gyudeya ofuli sʋ ɛɛ tɔwɛ abwaarɛsɩn ɛɛ sa asa
yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa, lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ ki tiri tɔ.”
Gyɔn nɩmʋ asɩn nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Isaya wʋla kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ mʋ yɛ,
“Ɔsa kʋ bʋ ofuli sʋ ee kuusi ɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ,
‘Fan lɔŋɔ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ ɔkpa mʋ,
kɛ fan waa ɔkpa mʋ ntintin sa mʋ.’ ”
Nyɔɔma ifuu nɩɩ ba taa waa Gyɔn atɔ bunsa, nɩɩ kʋtɔbwaaya ɔwʋlɛ kɩrɩsʋ i ŋmina mʋ kasɩyɛ tɔ. Mʋ agyitɔ‐gyisa mɔɔ ɩ gyɛ ntuntunbi yɛ ŋmasan.
Asa ba lɩɩ Gyerusalem kadɛ tɔ yɛ Gyudeya ɩsʋwʋlɛ sʋ yɛ Gyɔdan kabaafʋn kpini ba mʋ asɛ.
Ba lɛɛ bamʋ alibi tɔwɛ, nɩɩ o gyee bamʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee Gyɔdan ɔbʋn mʋ tɔ.

Gyɔn maa wu Farasii yɛ Sadusi abi gaalaagaa ba maa ba mʋ asɛ, kɛ o gyee bamʋ kekyugyee mʋ, ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ anansɛ banɩmʋ, anɩmʋ ɩ tɔwɛ waa fanɛ yɛ fan sɩlɛ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ agbʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ ba asa sʋ mʋ tɔ?
Fan waa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa kɛ ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ fan yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa.
Fan man da fanɛ nkɔlɔ sʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Anɛ naana ɩ gyɛ Abraham ɩmʋ sʋ an sʋ kamɔlɩgɛ.’ N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ taalɛ taa abuu nɩmʋ biliŋi anaana‐bii sa Abraham.
Nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla taa kpanfa yɩla iyu mʋ ilin tɔ o gyoo. Nɩɩ oyu kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ mɛɛ sɔyɩ abi mʋ, bee biti ba ŋɛ kɩmʋ tʋʋ kɛ ba taa waa fʋlɔn tɔ.

“Nkyu nɩɩ mɛɛ mɛ n sʋ n gyee fanɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee kɛ ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ fan yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa. Amaa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ mɛ kamaa ɛɛ ba mʋ kyɔ mɛ gaa, nɩɩ n man dagaa gbaa fɛɛ n sʋla mʋ asɩbɩta. Mɛɛ mʋ bɩrɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ yɛ fʋlɔn nɩɩ ee biti ɔ taa gyee fanɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee.
Ɔ sʋ mʋ kʋtɔ kyaalɛsa mʋ kɩbaa tɔ, kɛ ɔ kyaalɛ ayubi mʋ lɛɛ afʋnfʋntɛɛ mʋ tɔ waa kikyunkun tɔ. Ee biti ɔ taa afʋnfʋntɛɛ mʋ waa fʋlɔn mʋ nɩɩ i mee dun mʋ tɔ.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu lɩɩ Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ ba Gyɔdan ɔbʋn mʋ tɔ Gyɔn asɛ, kɛ o gyee mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee.
Amaa Gyɔn kpan mʋ n‐yɩɩ kɛ ɔ kyɛɛgɛ Yesu nfɛɛrɛ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fɛɛ fʋ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ fu gyee mɛ kekyugyee, nɩɩ fʋ ɩ ba mɛ asɛ yɛ n gyee fʋ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Yɛgɛ ɩ waa kanɩn nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkpa nɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa a maa waa ɩmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ biti mʋ kpini.” Nɩɩ Gyɔn kyula gyee Yesu Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee.
Gyɔn maa dan gyee Yesu Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee lʋwɛ mʋ, Yesu lɩɩ ɔbʋn mʋ tɔ. Opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ sʋsʋ bugi tɔ, nɩɩ o wu Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ maa kpɩlɩgɛ fɛɛ kuwura‐lɔpɔ ba gyɔŋɔ mʋ sʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔbʋlɛ kʋ lɩɩ sʋsʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ mɛ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ obii‐bitisa, nɩɩ mʋ ɩ bɔla mi ansi.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Kayaayu mʋ sʋla Yesu kpee ofuli sʋ, kɛ Sɩtaanɛ ɔ naa tʋʋ mʋ tɔ kɩɩ.
Maa waa noŋmina nkɛ adɩna kakyʋwapɛ yɛ kagyanbwɛ mʋ, akʋn ɩɩ mɔɔ mʋ.
Nɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ ba mʋ asɛ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fʋ kan fʋ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ, tɔwɛ abuu nɩmʋ kɛ i biliŋi agyitɔ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlɛsa mʋ tɔ yɛ, ‘Man gyɛ agyitɔ wʋlɛ nkʋn ɩɩ sa nyɩmɩsa nkpa, amɔɔ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kɔnɔ tɔ.’ ”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ taa mʋ kpee Gyerusalem, kadɛ kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ tɔ naa yɩlɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ ketin tɔ sʋsʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fʋ kan fʋ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ, fugi tɩyɛ kasɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ,
‘Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ sa mʋ nbɔɔ kɔnɔ lɩɩ fʋ sʋ,
nɩɩ bee biti ba taa bamʋ abaa sɔgɩta fʋ,
kɛ fʋ kɩyaa kɩ man nyɛ watɛ abuu.’ ”
Yesu bwii lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ba bɩla kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, ‘Man tʋʋ fʋ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔ kɩɩ.’ ”
Sɩtaanɛ bɩla taa mʋ kpee kɩbɩɩ lala kʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kaapʋ mu kuwura‐gyii kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ yɛ ɩmʋ bʋnyaa mʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fʋ kan muŋa sun mɛ mʋ, n biti n taa ɩnɩmʋ kpini sa fʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Sɩtaanɛ, natɛ lɩɩ mɛ asɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, ‘Muŋa sun fʋ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ mʋ nkʋn nɩɩ fu sun.’ ”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ yɛgɛ mʋ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ ba ba kyɛ Yesu tɔ.
Yesu maa nu yɛ ba kɩtaa Gyɔn tii obu mʋ, o bwii kpee Galile.
Nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Nasareti kpee Kapanum kadɛ tɔ naa kyɩna. Kadɛ maŋa bʋ Galile ɔbʋn lala ɔkaa, Sebulun maa Nafitali kabaafʋn mʋ.
Ɩ waa kanan nɩn kɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Isaya tɔwɛ lɩɩ ndɛ maŋa sʋ mʋ ɩ ba tɔ. Asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ,
“Sebulun ɔsʋwʋlɛ yɛ Nafitali ɔsʋwʋlɛ,
ndɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ kii kpee ɔpʋ asɛ,
ndɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ Gyɔdan benbe mʋ,
bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi nɩɩ ba bʋ Galile,
asa mʋ nɩɩ ba tɛ kitentenbiri tɔ mʋ,
ba wu kɩŋmaŋɛsa kparɛ mʋ.
Asa mʋ nɩɩ ba tɩyɛ lewu kitentenbiri ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ,
kɩŋmaŋɛsa kɩ lɩɩ bamʋ sʋ.”
Lɩɩ kanɩn saŋa maŋa nɩɩ Yesu piili ɛɛ tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa, lɩɩ fɛɛ sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ ki tiri tɔ.”
Yesu maa kyɩna ɔ naa Galile ɔpʋ sʋ mʋ, o wu ɩkɩn akɩtapʋ anyɔ, Simon mʋ nɩɩ ba bɩla bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Pita yɛ mu‐supu Andiruwu yɛgɛ bɛɛ tʋʋ kɩsawu ɔpʋ mʋ tɔ bɛɛ kɩtaa ɩkɩn.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan ba buu mɛ, kɛ n waa fanɛ asa akɩtapʋ.”
Nɩɩ opula maŋa tɔ ba yɛgɛ bamʋ asawu mʋ, nɩɩ ba buu mʋ.
Maa kyaga sʋ ee kpee mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ naa wu ɔkʋ maa mu‐supu, bamʋ ɩ gyɛ Gyemisi maa Gyɔn, Sebedi mu‐bii ana. Ba maa bamʋ‐sɛ Sebedi ba bʋ ɔkʋlɩ tɔ bɛɛ lɔŋɔ bamʋ asawu. Nɩɩ Yesu tɩɩ bamʋ.
Opula maŋa tɔ ba yɛgɛ ɔkʋlɩ mʋ yɛ bamʋ‐sɛ nɩɩ ba buu mʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu natɛ kyaabɔɔ Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ ɛɛ kaapʋ asa asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ sʋ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ yɛgɛ ɛɛ kyɛ alɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ.

Mʋ kɩtɩɩ ɩ yaasɛ loo Siriya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ kpini, nɩɩ asa ba taa alɔpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ alɔ yiri‐yiri bɩya mʋ. Akʋ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ tɔ ɩɩ kɔ bamʋ gaa, nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ nbwɩɩ libi bɛɛ tɔɔrɔɔ bamʋ, akʋ bɛɛ lɔ kigbingbin, nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba gyɛ amʋgʋlɛ‐mʋgʋlɛ, nɩɩ Yesu kyɛ bamʋ kpini.
Asa damantɛ ba lɩɩ Galile yɛ Dekapoli yɛ Gyerusalem yɛ Gyudeya yɛ Gyɔdan benbe kpini ba buu mʋ.
Yesu maa wu sakyɔ mʋ, o dii kpee kɩbɩɩ‐bi kʋ sʋ naa kyɩna kɩmʋ sʋ, nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba ba mʋ asɛ tʋtɔ.
Nɩɩ o piili ɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ ɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ,
“Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba taa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ tʋʋ Ɩbwaarɛ nkʋn sʋ,
lɩɩ fɛɛ sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ kɩ gyɛ bamʋ lɛɛ.
Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ bɔɔta tɔ,
lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti o yuula bamʋ nkɔlɔ.
Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ bɩya bamʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ,
lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ ii biti ba gyii kasɛ mʋ fɛɛ bamʋ kapatɩyɛ.
Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa bamʋ nɩɩ bamʋ ansi ɩɩ payɩ ɩkpa kikyiigi sʋ,
lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ yɛgɛ ba ŋmɛ lɩɩ bamʋ atɔ bitisa tɔ.
Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa bamʋ nɩɩ bee wu bamʋ bɩrɩsa ana kʋwɛɛ,
lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti o wu kʋwɛɛ.
Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa bamʋ nɩɩ ineesi kʋ man bʋ bamʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ,
lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ ii biti ba wu Ɩbwaarɛ.
Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ bɩya keyuula asa nsana,
lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ tɩɩ yɛ Mu‐bii ana.
Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba nyanla bamʋ fɛɛ bamʋ ɩkpa maa kyiigi Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ sʋ mʋ,
lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ kɩ gyɛ bamʋ lɛɛ.
“Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ asa bɛɛ saalɛ, nɩɩ bɛɛ nyanla fanɛ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩn antɩŋɛsa bɛɛ tɔwɛ asɩn libi bɛɛ gyaga fanɛ sʋ, fɛɛ fan maa gyɛ mɛ abɩɩlapʋ sʋ.
Fan yɛgɛ ɩ waa fanɛ ɔkɔn kɛ fanɛ ansi i gyii, lɩɩ fɛɛ fanɛ kʋkɔka lala kɩ dɛ ki gyoo fanɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ayɛ. Kpalɩ fɛɛ kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ ba daa nyanla Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba wʋla gyankpaa fanɛ ba mʋ.
“Fan du nɩn fɛɛ nfɔlɛ sa asa dulinyaa tɔ. Amaa nɩɩ nfɔlɛ kan pan ɩmʋ ɔkɔn mʋ, mɩnɛ nɩɩ fɩɩ bɩla taalɛ taa waa ɩmʋ kɛ ɩ waa ɔkɔn? Ɩ man bɩla ɩ sʋ kyaarɛ, amɔɔ ba taa kyɛɛgɛ fɔyɩ kɛ asa ba natɛ sʋ.
“Fan du nɩn fɛɛ ɩŋmaŋɛsa sa asa dulinyaa tɔ. Kadɛ lala mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyan kɩbɩɩ sʋ mʋ mɛɛ taalɛ baala.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋ mee tuwa fɩtɩla, kɛ ɔ taa waa kolobi tɔ. Amɔɔ ɔ taa gyaga fɩtɩla ɔgyagakpa kɛ kɩ baa kɩ kɩɩ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ kɩkpaara mʋ sʋ.
Ɔkpa kʋlʋn maŋa sʋ fan yɛgɛ fanɛ ɩŋmaŋɛsa ɩ baa ɩ kɩɩ tɔ sa asa, kɛ ba wu fanɛ asun danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ fɛn waa mʋ, kɛ ba yɩn fanɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ.
“Fan man fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ n ba nɩn kɛ n ba lɛɛ Mosesi nbara mʋ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ lɩɩ tɔ. N man ba nɩn kɛ n ba lɛɛ ɩmʋ lɩɩ tɔ, amaa n ba nɩn kɛ bamʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ ɩ ba tɔ.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ sʋsʋ yɛ kasɛ ii biti i muuri mʋ, halɩɩ nbara mʋ tɔ kʋkyʋrɔɔ‐bi pii gbaa, abɛɛ ɩmʋ kitobi mɛɛ yɛ ɩ kɔɔgɛ sʋ, amɔɔ kʋtɔ kʋmaa ii biti ɩ ba tɔ.

Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o kina kibuu nbara mʋ tɔ kipii, nɩɩ ɛɛ kaapʋ asansa yɛ ba waa kanɩn mʋ, ee biti ɔ baa ɔ gyɛ ɔsa pii Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ. Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o buu nbara mʋ, nɩɩ ɛɛ kaapʋ asansa gbaa yɛ ba buu ɩmʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ baa ɔ gyɛ nyɩmɩsa kparɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ n tɔwɛ fanɛ fɛɛ, nɩɩ fanɛ ɩkpa ɩ man kyiigi ɩ kyɔ nbara akaapʋpʋ yɛ Farasii abi mʋ, fan mɛɛ yɛ fan nyɛ loo Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ kakaakʋ.”
Yesu bɩla tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan nu Mosesi nbara mʋ maa tɔwɛ adɩdaapʋ mʋ yɛ, ‘Man kan mɔɔ nyɩmɩsa. Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɔɔ nyɩmɩsa mʋ, bee biti ba bun mʋ kʋpwɛ.’

Amaa n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ agbʋ waa mʋ tɔmaa mʋ, bee biti ba bun mʋ kʋpwɛ. Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ saalɛ mʋ tɔɔmaa yɛ ɔ man bʋ sɛhn tɔ mʋ, ee biti ɔ nyɛ asɩn Gyiwu kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ abɩlɩsa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Sanhediri mu ansi. Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ saalɛ mʋ tɔɔmaa yɛ, ‘Fʋ omelensipu nɩmʋ’ mʋ, ii biti o loo awʋrʋfɔ fʋlɔn yen‐yen tɔ.
“Ɩmʋ sʋ, nɩɩ fʋ kan bɩya fʋ saraga kɛ fʋ ba lɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kaswɩɩ sʋ, nɩɩ fu nyiŋi fɛɛ fʋ waa fʋ bɩrɩsa alibi kʋ mʋ,
yɛgɛ fʋ saraga yɩla tʋtɔ kɛ fu bwii kpee, kɛ faa fʋ bɩrɩsa mʋ fan lɔŋɔ abaa nsana, pɔyɩ kɛ fʋ bwii ba lɛɛ fʋ saraga mʋ sa Ɩbwaarɛ.

“Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan samaa fʋ asɩn ogyikpa mʋ, sun mata mʋ pɔyɩ asɩn kigyii kakɛ mʋ kɩ fʋʋ. Amaa nɩɩ ɩ man kan ba kanɩn mʋ, ee biti ɔ taa fʋ sa asɩn ogyipu mʋ, kɛ mɔɔ mʋ ɔ taa fʋ waa abu tiipu ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ abaa tɔ kɛ o tii fʋ obu.
N tɔwɛ fʋ kesintin fɛɛ, fii biti fʋ baa fʋ bʋ tʋtɔ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fii biti fʋ‐ka fʋ kʋkɔ mʋ lʋwɛ.
“Fan nu Mosesi nbara mʋ maa tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Man waa kanyɩn biti abɛɛ kɩkyɩɩ biti kɩgyagaa.’
Amaa mɛ ɩ tɔwɛ fanɛ nɩn fɛɛ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ waa mʋ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ ɔ dɩn nyɛ maa mʋ ba bʋga nɩn, ɔ tɩyɛ waa kɩkyɩɩ biti alibi mʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ fu gyisa kinsi kii biti kɩ yɛgɛ kɛ fʋ waa alibi mʋ, kyɔlɛ kɩmʋ fɔyɩ. Ɩ bʋrɔn sa fʋ fɛɛ fʋ maa pan fʋ katɩn kʋ, ɩ kyɔ fɛɛ ba maa taa fʋ n‐yɩɩ kpini naa tʋʋ awʋrʋfɔ fʋlɔn yen‐yen tɔ.
Nɩɩ fu gyisa kɩbaa kii biti kɩ yɛgɛ kɛ fʋ waa alibi mʋ, tɩn kɩmʋ fɔyɩ. Ɩ bʋrɔn sa fʋ fɛɛ fʋ maa pan fʋ katɩn kʋ, ɩ kyɔ fɛɛ ba maa taa fʋ n‐yɩɩ kpini naa tʋʋ awʋrʋfɔ fʋlɔn yen‐yen tɔ.
“Nɩɩ Mosesi nbara mʋ ba bɩla tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o kina mʋ‐ka mʋ, dagaa maa kyʋrɔɔ kekina ɔwʋlɛ sa mʋ.’

Amaa mɛ ɩ tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o kina mʋ‐ka nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ yɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ lɩɩ mʋ kamaa mʋ, ɔ yɛgɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ waa alibi kekili tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o kili ɔkyɩɩ maŋa gbaa mʋ waa alibi kekili tɔ.
“Fan bɩla nu Mosesi nbara mʋ maa tɔwɛ adɩdaapʋ mʋ yɛ, ‘Man bɔ ntan kɛ fʋ laaŋɛ, amaa ɩ dagaa fʋ maa waa kanan mʋ nɩɩ fʋ bɔ ntan sa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ.’
Amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ mɛ ɩ tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, fan man bɔ ntan kpini‐kpini. Fan man taa sʋsʋ bɔ ntan, lɩɩ fɛɛ tʋtɔ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gya.
Fan man taa kasɛ bɔ ntan, lɩɩ fɛɛ tʋtɔ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ayaa ɔgyagakpa. Fan man taa Gyerusalem kadɛ bɔ ntan, lɩɩ fɛɛ kɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Owura kparɛ mʋ kadɛ lala.
Man taa fu kumu bɔ ntan, lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ mɛɛ taalɛ waa kinyinibi kʋlʋn kifufuli abɛɛ kilenbiri.
Amaa fan yɛgɛ fanɛ katɔwɛ kɩ baa kɩ gyɛ Ɛɛhn abɛɛ ayee. Nɩɩ fʋ kan bɔ ntan kʋ tii sʋ mʋ, ɩ lɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ asɛ nɩn.
“Nɩɩ fan bɩla nu Mosesi nbara maa tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan boyi ɔkʋ kinsi mʋ, ɩ dagaa be boyi ngbaa mʋ lɛɛ. Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kyiigi ɔkʋ kinyi mʋ, ɩ dagaa be kyiigi ngbaa mʋ lɛɛ.’
Amaa mɛ ɩ tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan waa fʋ alibi mʋ, man taa alibi ka mʋ kʋkɔ. Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan kpa fʋ ɔtan gyisa sʋ mʋ, biliŋaa bɩna sʋ sa mʋ kɛ ɔ kpa tii sʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan taa fʋ kpee asɩn ogyikpa kɛ ɔ kɔɔlɛ fʋ kaalɛ mʋ, taa fʋ balɩmaasʋ tii mʋ sʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan nyan fʋ, fɛɛ fʋ sʋla mʋ ɩsʋla kpiya mʋ mayɩlɩ kʋlʋn mʋ, sʋla ɩmʋ kpiya mʋ ɩmayɩlɩ anyɔ.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ba kʋlɛ fʋ kʋtɔ kʋ mʋ, sa mʋ. Abɛɛ nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ba yɛ fʋ paala mʋ kʋtɔ kʋ mʋ, sa mʋ.
“Fan nu Mosesi nbara mʋ maa bɩla tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Fan nyɛ kebiti sa fanɛ tɔɔmaa ana, kɛ fan kisi fanɛ‐dʋn ana.’
Amaa mɛ ɩ tɔwɛ fan yɛ, fan nyɛ kebiti sa fanɛ‐dʋn ana, kɛ fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ sa fanɛ anyanlapʋ,

kɛ fan baa fan du fɛɛ fanɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ. Mʋ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ mʋ kyɔwɛ ɩɩ lɩɩ ɛɛ sa alibi awaapʋ yɛ adanbɩrasa awaapʋ, nɩɩ ɛɛ yɛgɛ bʋlayɩ ɩɩ da ɛɛ sa bamʋ nɩɩ bamʋ ɩkpa ii kyiigi, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bamʋ ɩkpa ɩ man kyiigi.
Nɩɩ fan kan fan sʋ kebiti sa bamʋ nɩɩ bee biti fanɛ nkʋn mʋ, mɩnɛ kʋkɔka nɩɩ fen biti fan nyɛ? Man gyɛ kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ alibi awaapʋ gbaa bɛɛ waa nɩn abɛɛ?
Nɩɩ fan kan fɛn fwaala fanɛ tɔmaa ana nkʋn mʋ, mɩnɛ kʋtɔ nɩɩ fan waa fan kyɔ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɩɩ waa? Man gyɛ kanɩn nɩɩ ɩdakpa asunpu gbaa bɛɛ waa nɩn?
Ɩmʋ sʋ ɩ dagaa fanɛ kɩbaabʋtɔ maa du kyɛɛkyɛɛ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ du kyɛɛkyɛɛ mʋ.
“Fan baa fan da sʋ kɛ fan man waa fanɛ adanbɩrasa asa ansi sʋ, kɛ ba nyɛ wu fanɛ. Nɩɩ fan kan waa kanɩn mʋ, fan mɛɛ yɛ fan nyɛ kʋkɔka lɩɩ fanɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ asɛ.

“Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ fʋ kan kɛɛ otiripu atɔ mʋ, man taa da kibonbon fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ nnɔ nnyɔ‐nnyɔ wuya ana mʋ bɛɛ waa kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɩgyaŋɛkpa yɛ agbenbi sʋ kɛ asa ba nyɛ yɩn bamʋ mʋ. N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ ba tɛɛ wʋla nyɛ bamʋ kʋkɔka lʋwɛ.
Amaa nɩɩ fʋ kan kɛɛ atiripu afulee mʋ, man yɛgɛ fʋ‐bɩna kɩbaa ɔ bɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fu gyisa kɩbaa mʋ waa mʋ,
kɛ fʋ kakɛɛ ɩ waa asiiri tɔ. Saamʋ fʋ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ ee wu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ waa asiiri tɔ mʋ, ii biti ɔ ka fʋ kʋkɔ.

“Nɩɩ fɛn kan fɛn kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ mʋ, fan man waa fɛɛ nnɔ nnyɔ‐nnyɔ wuya ana mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ bee biti kɩyɩlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɩgyaŋɛkpa yɛ agbenbi nkpankyɛɛrɛ bɛɛ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ, kɛ asa ba nyɛ wu bamʋ. N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ, ba wʋla nyɛ bamʋ kʋkɔka lʋwɛ.

Amaa nɩɩ fʋ kan fɩɩ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ mʋ, loo fu obu to kɛ fu tii, kɛ fʋ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ sa fʋ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ mee wu mʋ mʋ. Saamʋ fʋ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ ee wu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ waa asiiri tɔ mʋ, ii biti ɔ ka fʋ kʋkɔ.

Nɩɩ fan kan fen kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ mʋ, fan man tɔwɛ ntɔwɛ bʋnswɩɩsa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ kasɛ fɛɛ ɩdakpa asunpu lɛɛ mʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ bɛɛ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ nɩn fɛɛ bamʋ kʋkʋlɛ bʋnswɩɩsa mʋ, ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ kɛ ɩ ba tɔ sa bamʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ fan man waa fɛɛ bamʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fanɛ‐Sɛ nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kii tiri fanɛ pɔyɩ nɩɩ fɛn kʋlɛ mʋ mʋ.
“Nɩɩ fen biti fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ mʋ, falɛ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fan maa tɔwɛ.
‘Anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ fʋ bʋ sʋsʋ,
yɛgɛ asa ba bʋnyaa fʋ kɩtɩɩ.
Yɛgɛ fu kuwura‐gyii mʋ kɩ ba,
kɛ fʋ yɛgɛ fu kebiti kɩ waa kasɛ sʋ nfɩɩ,
fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ki du sʋsʋ mʋ.
Sa anɛ kakɛ kʋmaa agyitɔ.
Taa anɛ alibi kɛɛ anɛ,
fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ anɛ gbaa anɛ
an taa bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa anɛ alibi kɛɛ bamʋ mʋ.
Man yɛgɛ a loo kʋtʋʋ tɔ kɩɩ tɔ,
amaa lɛɛ anɛ lɩɩ olibilibi mʋ abaa tɔ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ kuwura‐gyii yɛ ɔlʋn,
yɛ bʋnyaa ɩ gyɛ fʋ lɛɛ kakpaa.’
Lɩɩ fɛɛ nɩɩ asa ba waa fanɛ alibi nɩɩ fan taa kɛɛ bamʋ mʋ, fanɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ gbaa ii biti ɔ taa kɛɛ fanɛ.
Amaa nɩɩ fan kan fan man taa asa alibi kɛɛ bamʋ bɩrɛ, fanɛ‐Sɛ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ taa fanɛ alibi kɛɛ fanɛ.

“Nɩɩ fan kan waa noŋmina mʋ, fan man waa fanɛ ansi tɔ kʋwɛɛ kuwu fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ nnɔ nnyɔ‐nnyɔ wuya ana bɛɛ waa mʋ. Bɛɛ nyaaŋɛ bamʋ ansi tɔ kɛ asa ba nyɛ wu yɛ ba ŋmina kɔnɔ. N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ ba wʋla nyɛ bamʋ kʋkɔka lʋwɛ.
Amaa nɩɩ fʋ kan ŋmina kɔnɔ mʋ, fwɩɩ fu ansi tɔ, sʋswa nfɔ kɛ fʋ sɛyɩ fu kumu tɔ.
Saamʋ, asa ba mɛɛ yɛ ba wu fɛɛ fu ŋmina kɔnɔ, amɔɔ fʋ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ mee wu mʋ mʋ nkʋn. Fʋ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ ee wu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ waa asiri tɔ, ii biti ɔ ka fʋ kʋkɔ.
“Fan man kʋʋla kapatɩyɛ yɩla kasɛ sʋ nfɩɩ sa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ, nfɩɩ nɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩtabɩrɩta yɛ nkandɩra ii nyita ɩmʋ, nɩɩ ayu bee loo bee yuuri ɩmʋ.
Amaa fan kʋʋla kapatɩyɛ yɩla sʋsʋ sa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ, katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩtabɩrɩta yɛ nkadʋrɔ ɩ mɛɛ taalɛ nyita ɩmʋ, nɩɩ ayu ba mɛɛ taalɛ loo naa yuuri ɩmʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ fʋ kapatɩyɛ bʋ mʋ, tʋtɔ nɩɩ fʋ nfɛɛrɛ gbaa ɩ bʋ.
“Nyɩmɩsa ansi ɩ gyɛ mʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ fɩtɩla. Nɩɩ fu ansi ɩ kan ɩ bʋrɔn bɩrɛ, fʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ kpini gyɛ ɩŋmaŋɛsa nɩn.
Amaa nɩɩ fu ansi ɩ kan ɩ man bʋrɔn bɩrɛ, fʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ kpini bʋ kitentenbiri tɔ nɩn. Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ fɩtɩla mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ fʋ tɔ mʋ gyɛ kitentenbiri mʋ, ii biti ɩ waa kitentenbiri tumm.
“Ɔkʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ sun anyɩrɩpɛ anyɔ. Ee biti o kisi ɔkʋ kɛ ɔ nyɛ kebiti sa ɔkʋ, abɛɛ ee biti ɔ nyɛ saŋa sa ɔkʋ kɛ ɔ yɛgɛ ɔkʋ. Fan mɛɛ taalɛ sun Ɩbwaarɛ maa afulee.

“Ɩmʋ sʋ n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, fan man yɛgɛ fanɛ nkpa yɛ agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan gyii, abɛɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ fen nuu, abɛɛ fanɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ yɛ atɔ bunsa asɩn ɩ tɔɔrɔɔ fanɛ. Nkpa ɩ man kyɔ agyitɔ abɛɛ? Nɩɩ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mɔɔ man kyɔ atɔ bunsa?

Fan kɩɩ nbwiibi mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ afuu tɔ mʋ, be mee duu nɩɩ ba mɛɛ tɩŋɛ, nɩɩ ba mɛɛ kʋʋla agyitɔ bɛɛ gyaga agyan sʋ, amaa fanɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ ɩɩ sa bamʋ agyitɔ. Fanɛ asɩn ɩ man tiri ɩ kyɔ bamʋ nɩn abɛɛ?
Fanɛ tɔ ɔmɔɔ nɩɩ asɩn ɩ maa tɔɔrɔɔ mʋ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ taa kerefi kʋlʋn tii mʋ nkpa sʋ?
“Nɩɩ mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ atɔ bunsa asɩn ɩ tɔɔrɔɔ fanɛ? Fan kɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ iyu ntʋtʋlɛ ɩ dan mʋ. I mee sun kusun nɩɩ ɩ mɛɛ lʋʋ atɔ bunsa ɩ sa ɩmʋ n‐yɩɩ.
Amaa n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, halɩɩ Owura Solomon maa mʋ atɔ bunsa danbɩrasa kpini mʋ, ɩ man bʋrɔn fʋʋ ntʋtʋlɛ mʋ.
Nɩɩ falɛ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩɩ lɔŋɔ afitiri mʋ nɩɩ ndaga ɩ bʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔkɛ bɛɛ taa ɩmʋ funti waa fʋlɔn tɔ mʋ, mɩnɛ waa nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ sa fanɛ atɔ bunsa kʋkyɔ? O, fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩ man kyɔ?
Ɩmʋ sʋ fan man tɔɔrɔɔ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ fɛn taasɛ yɛ, ‘Mɩnɛ nɩɩ an biti a gyii?’ abɛɛ ‘Mɩnɛ nɩɩ an biti a nuu?’ abɛɛ ‘Mɩnɛ nɩɩ an biti a bun?’
Bamʋ nɩɩ be mee nyi Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ falɛ atɔ kpini sʋ nɩɩ bamʋ ansi ɩ payɩ. Nɩɩ fanɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ nyi fɛɛ falɛ atɔ nɩmʋ maa tiri fanɛ.
“Amaa fan gyankpaa kɩɩ biti Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ ɩkpa yɛ mʋ ɩkpa kikyiigisa mʋ, kɛ ɔ taa atɔ nɩmʋ kpini tii sʋ sa fanɛ.
Kanɩn sʋ fan man tɔɔrɔɔ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ ba ɔkɛ. Fan yɛgɛ ɔkɛ atɔ ɩ kɩɩ ɩmʋ gbaa‐gbaa ɩmʋ asɩn tirisa sʋ.
“Fan man bun kʋpwɛ, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ man bun fanɛ gbaa kʋpwɛ.

Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ fɛn bɔla sʋ fen bun fanɛ bɩrɩsa ana kʋpwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa ii biti ɔ bɔla sʋ bun ngbaa fanɛ kʋpwɛ. Nɩɩ kʋtɔ kaalasa mʋ nɩɩ fan taa kaala sa fanɛ bɩrɩsa ana mʋ, kanɩn nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ kaala sa fanɛ.
“Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fii wu keyuubi mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ fʋ bɩrɩsa kinsi tɔ, nɩɩ fu mee wu kagyakpoti mʋ nɩɩ kɩ dɛ fu kinsi tɔ?
Nɛnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ taalɛ tɔwɛ fʋ bɩrɩsa yɛ yɛgɛ n lɛɛ keyuubi fu kinsi tɔ, yɛgɛ kagyakpoti dɛ ngbaa‐gbaa fu kinsi tɔ?
Fʋ nnɔ nnyɔ‐nnyɔ wuya, gyankpaa lɛɛ kagyakpoti mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ fu kinsi tɔ mʋ, pɔyɩ kɛ fʋ lan wu danbɩrasa, kɛ fʋ lɛɛ keyuubi mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ fʋ bɩrɩsa kinsi tɔ mʋ.

“Fan man taa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ki du kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ sa igyoonɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ bee biti ba biliŋi yɩlɛ fanɛ sʋ duŋi fanɛ waa kyabɩlɛ‐kyabɩlɛ. Nɩɩ fan man taa fanɛ atɔ kparɛ tʋʋ sa akuuri, kɛ be kyigya ɩmʋ sʋ nyita.
“Fan kʋlɛ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ, ee biti ɔ sa fanɛ. Fan kɩɩ biti Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ, fen biti fan wu. Fan da mʋ kebunɔ, ee biti o tigi sa fanɛ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kʋlɛ ɛɛ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ mʋ, ɛɛ nyɛ, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩɩ ee biti mʋ, ee wu, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ da kebunɔ mʋ, ee tigi ɛɛ sa mʋ.
“Fanɛ anɩmʋ nɩɩ mu‐bii ɩɩ kʋlɛ mʋ bodobodo kɛ ɔ taa kubuu sa mʋ?
Abɛɛ nɩɩ ɛɛ kʋlɛ mʋ ɔkɩn nɩɩ ɛɛ taa kɩnansɛ ɛɛ sa mʋ?

Nɩɩ fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan gyɛ alibi awaapʋ mʋ gbaa fen nyi atɔ danbɩrasa kɩtaa sa fanɛ‐bii ana mʋ, mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fanɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ mɛɛ yɛ o kyula sa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kʋlɛ mʋ atɔ danbɩrasa mʋ?
Ɩmʋ sʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fen biti asa ba waa sa fanɛ mʋ, fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fan baa fɛn waa kanɩn fɛn sa bamʋ. Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Mosesi nbara yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ.
“Fan bɔla kebunɔ pii mʋ tɔ loo. Lɩɩ fɛɛ kebunɔ yɛlɩgɛsa mʋ ɔkpa gbaa yɛlɩgɛ yɛ kɩnatɛ sʋ, nɩɩ kii kpee kinyita kakpaa tɔ nɩn, nɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ bɔla bee loo kɩmʋ tɔ mʋ ba kyɔ.
Amaa ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ kii kpee nkpa tɔ mʋ bɩrɛ kɩ bɔntɛ, nɩɩ kɩmʋ kebunɔ gbaa man yɛlɩgɛ, nɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ bee wu kɩmʋ bɛɛ bɔla mʋ ba man kyɔ.
“Fan baa fan da atɩŋɛsa atɔwɛpʋ sʋ. Ansi sʋ mʋ be du bɔhn fɛɛ nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ, amaa bamʋ nkɔlɔ tɔ mʋ, be du nɩn fɛɛ agboogboo mʋ nɩɩ ba nyɛ agbʋ.
Bamʋ atɔ waasa nɩɩ fen biti fan taa bɩɩ bamʋ. Kididobi oyu sʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩyɛ kimango abi abɛɛ? Abɛɛ kɩkpalɛ oyu sʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩyɛ akutu?
Kanɩn nɩɩ oyu danbɩrasa ɩɩ sɔyɩ abi danbɩrasa, nɩɩ oyu libi mɔɔ ɩɩ sɔyɩ abi libi.
Oyu danbɩrasa mɛɛ taalɛ sɔyɩ abi libi, nɩɩ oyu libi mɛɛ taalɛ sɔyɩ abi danbɩrasa.
Oyu kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ mɛɛ sɔyɩ abi danbɩrasa mʋ, bɛɛ ŋɛ kɩmʋ nɩn tʋʋ, kɛ ba taa waa fʋlɔn tɔ.
Kanɩn sʋ fen biti fan bɩɩ antɩŋɛsa atɔwɛpʋ mʋ lɩɩ bamʋ awaasa sʋ.
“Man gyɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɩɩ mɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ’ mʋ, ii biti o loo sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ, amɔɔ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ kebiti mʋ nkʋn.

Ɩbwaarɛ kakɛ talɛsa maŋa kan fʋʋ mʋ, asa gaalaagaa bee biti ba tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, an bɔla fʋ kɩtɩɩ sʋ tɔwɛ abwaarɛsɩn sa asa, nɩɩ lɩɩ fʋ kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ mʋ an gya nbwɩɩ libi, nɩɩ an waa asɩn kyinkyinsa gaalaagaa.’
Amaa n biti tɔwɛ tigi bamʋ yɛ, ‘Man nyi fanɛ. Fanɛ alibi awaapʋ banɩmʋ, fan lɩɩ mɛ sʋ natɛ.’
“Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee nu mɛ asɩn nɩmʋ, nɩɩ ee buu ɩmʋ mʋ, du nɩn fɛɛ ɔnyaasɩnpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ pɔyɩ mʋ kɩkpaara gyaga kɩfʋlɛ sʋ mʋ.
Bʋlayɩ da nɩɩ ɩbʋn ɩ bɔla, nɩɩ afuu lala ɩ da obu mʋ, amaa kɩ man tɩyɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba pɔyɩ kɩmʋ gyaga kɩfʋlɛ sʋ.
Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee nu mɛ asɩn nɩmʋ, nɩɩ o mee buu ɩmʋ mʋ, du nɩn fɛɛ omelensipu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ pɔyɩ mu obu gyaga kusipu sʋ.
Bʋlayɩ da nɩɩ ɩbʋn ɩ bɔla, nɩɩ afuu lala ɩ da nɩɩ obu mʋ lɩɩ tɩyɛ ɔlʋn tɔ birimm.”
Yesu maa tɔwɛ asɩn nɩmʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, mʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ i kyinkyin sakyɔ mʋ gaa.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ tɔ sʋ ɔlʋn, nɩɩ ɩ man du fɛɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ lɛɛ mʋ.
Yesu maa kpɩlɩgɛ lɩɩ kɩbɩɩ mʋ sʋ ba mʋ, asa damantɛ ba buu mʋ.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn kʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ lɔ kibootoo ba muŋa mu amulii sʋ mu ansi tɔ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ nɩɩ ɩ pɩrɛ fʋ mʋ, fɩɩ taalɛ yɛgɛ mɛ n‐yɩɩ ɩ lɔŋɔ sʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɛɛŋɛ mʋ kɩbaa mata ɔnyɩn mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɩ pɩrɛ mɛ, fʋ n‐yɩɩ ɩ lɔŋɔ sʋ.” Opula tɔ nɩɩ mʋ kibootoo mʋ kɩ lʋwɛ.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Man waa fʋ tɔwɛ ɔkʋ, amaa taa fʋ n‐yɩɩ naa kaapʋ Ɩbwaarɛ Oseepu, kɛ fʋ lɛɛ saraga fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Mosesi nbara ɩ kaapʋ mʋ, kɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ o wu fɛɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ ɩ lɔŋɔ sʋ.”
Yesu maa loo Kapanum kadɛ tɔ mʋ, Roma anaakɔpʋ ɔbɩlɩsa kʋ ba mʋ asɛ ba kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ ɔ kyɛ mʋ tɔ.
Ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, mɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ dɛ mɛ kɩkpaara sʋ ɛɛ lɔ mʋgʋlɛ‐mʋgʋlɛ, ɩɩ tɔɔrɔɔ mʋ gaa.”
Ɩmʋ sʋ, Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “N biti n naa kyɛ mʋ kʋlɔ.”
Nɩɩ anaakɔpʋ ɔbɩlɩsa mʋ lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ n man dagaa fɛɛ fʋ ba mɛ kɩkpaara sʋ. Amaa dan sa kɔnɔ, mɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ ii biti ɔ kpaarɛ.

Lɩɩ fɛɛ ngbaa mɛ n bʋ akʋ ɔlʋn kasɛ nɩn, yɛgɛ anaakɔpʋ ba bʋ mɛ kasɛ. N kan tɔwɛ ɔkʋ yɛ, ‘Kpe nfɩɩ,’ nɩɩ ee kpee. Nɩɩ n tɔwɛ ɔkʋ yɛ, ‘Ba nfɩɩ,’ nɩɩ ɛɛ ba. Nɩɩ n tɔwɛ mɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ yɛ, ‘Waa ɩnɩmʋ,’ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa ɩmʋ.”
Yesu maa nu kanɩn mʋ, i kyinkyin mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba buu mʋ mʋ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi kpini tɔ mʋ, n man pɩɩta wu ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ falɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii damantɛ nɩmʋ kedubi.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ asa gaalaagaa bee biti ba lɩɩ kyɔwɛ kɩlɩɩ yɛ kyɔwɛ kɩtɩyɛ, kɛ ba maa Abraham maa Isaki yɛ Gyekobu ba ba bʋga kyɩna bamʋ ɩkyɩnakpa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ kuwura‐gyii kensi‐gyii ngyaŋɛ mʋ tɔ.
Amaa fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ naafɔɔ fan gyɛ kuwura‐gyii abi mʋ, bee biti ba taa fanɛ funti kewu tɔ kitentenbiri tɔ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ kusu yɛ anobi keduŋi bʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ anaakɔpʋ ɔbɩlɩsa mʋ yɛ, “Kpewu! Ii biti ɩ waa sa fʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fʋ kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ.” Nɩɩ kanɩn saŋa maŋa tɔ kyɛɛkyɛɛ nɩɩ mʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ nyɛ alanfɩya.
Yesu maa ba Pita kɩkpaara sʋ mʋ, o wu fɛɛ Pita mʋ‐saa kyɩɩsa dɛ ɛɛ lɔ kibirima.
Ɔ kɩtaa mʋ kɩbaa tɔ nɩɩ kibirima mʋ kɩ yɛgɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kʋsʋ kɩtaa bamʋ kɩfɔ.
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ kyɔwɛ tɩyɛ mʋ, nɩɩ asa ba taa alɔpʋ kʋkyɔ mʋ nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi ba tɛ bamʋ sʋ mʋ bɩya Yesu. Nɩɩ ɔ sa nbwɩɩ libi mʋ kɔnɔ gya bamʋ kʋsaa alɔpʋ mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kyɛ alɔpʋ mʋ kpini.
Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Isaya tɔwɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ mʋ ɩ ba tɔ. Asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ,
“Ɔ kɔɔlɛ anɛ alɔ,
nɩɩ ɔ taa anɛ alobi sʋla.”
Yesu maa wu asa damantɛ ba maa kyaabɔɔ mʋ mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ mu asunpu mʋ yɛ ba faa kpee benbe.
Nɩɩ nbara ɔkaapʋpʋ kʋ ba mʋ asɛ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ n biti n buu fʋ kpee katɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fii kpee mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Agboogboo ba sʋ ɩbɔ bɛɛ dɛ tɔ, nɩɩ nbwiibi ba sʋ nsʋswaa, amaa mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ bɩrɛ, n man sʋ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n dɛ fʋʋtɛ.”
Mʋ ɔbɩɩlapʋ kʋ gbaa tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, yɛgɛ n naa pula mɛ‐sɛ pɔyɩ.”
Amaa Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Buu mɛ kɛ fʋ yɛgɛ bamʋ nɩɩ be du fɛɛ alewupu mʋ, be kpee naa pula bamʋ alewupu.”
Nɩɩ o loo ɔkʋlɩ tɔ nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba buu mʋ loo.
Ba maa gyan ɔbʋn lala mʋ sʋ bee kpee mʋ, opula tɔ nɩɩ afuu lala i tigi yɛgɛ ɩɩ da apaa ii loo ɔkʋlɩ mʋ tɔ. Amaa yɛgɛ Yesu dɛ nsɩɩrɛ.
Abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba naa kyiŋi mʋ, nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, mɔlɩgɛ anɛ! An biti a muuri!”
Ɔ lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩ man kyɔ, mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fan sʋ kufuu kanɩn?” Nɩɩ ɔ kʋsʋ pʋntɛ afuu yɛ apaa mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɩ waa diin.
Nɩɩ i kyinkyin asa mʋ, nɩɩ ba taasɛ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nyɩmɩsa ndee? Halɩɩ afuu yɛ apaa gbaa ii nu mʋ asɛ.”

Yesu maa fʋʋ ɔbʋn mʋ benbe mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ Gadara ɔsʋwʋlɛ mʋ, anyɩn anyɔ kʋ mʋ nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi ba tɛ bamʋ sʋ mʋ ba lɩɩ nkyan tɔ ba gyaŋa mʋ. Ba kyɩna ba libi gaa fɛɛ ndʋnbwɛ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ bɔla kanɩn ɔkpa maŋa sʋ.
Ba kuusi yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐Bii, mɩnɛ nɩɩ fii biti anɛ asɛ? Fʋ ba nɩn yɛ fʋ ba waa anɛ awʋrʋfɔ pɔyɩ kɛ ɩmʋ saŋa mʋ ɩ fʋʋ, abɛɛ?”
Akuuri damantɛ kʋ ba yɩlɛ tʋtɔ kɩbaafʋn bee gyii.
Nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi mʋ ba kʋlɛ Yesu yɛ, “Nɩɩ fʋ kan fii biti fʋ gya anɛ bɩrɛ, yɛgɛ a naa loo akuuri damantɛ nɩmʋ tɔ.”
Ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan natɛ!” Nɩɩ ba lɩɩ anyɩn mʋ tɔ naa loo akuuri mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ akuuri damantɛ mʋ kpini ba sɩlɛ kpɩlɩgɛ kidenbi mʋ naa tɩyɛ ɔbʋn lala mʋ tɔ nɩɩ ba wu.
Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kɩɩ akuuri mʋ sʋ mʋ, ba sɩlɛ kpee kadɛ tɔ, naa tɔwɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ waa kpini yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa anyɩn anyɔ mʋ nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi ba tɛ bamʋ sʋ mʋ.
Kanɩn sʋ kadɛ mʋ tɔ asa kpini ba lɩɩ ba naa gyaŋa Yesu. Ba maa wu mʋ mʋ, ba kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ ɔ lɩɩ bamʋ ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.
Yesu dii loo ɔkʋlɩ tɔ, faa ɔbʋn mʋ ba mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ kadɛ tɔ.

Nɩɩ asa akʋ ba taa ɔnyɩn mʋgʋlɛ‐mʋgʋlɛ wuya mʋ nɩɩ ɔ dɛ kɩkpaata sʋ bɩya mʋ. Yesu maa wu bamʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ mʋgʋlɛ‐mʋgʋlɛ wuya mʋ yɛ, “Mi‐bii, yɛgɛ fʋ kɔkɔlɔ kɩ dɛ fʋ. N taa fʋ alibi kɛɛ fʋ.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ akʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ abaa asɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ ɩ tɔwɛ nbusaa asɩn ee yii Ɩbwaarɛ!”
Yesu maa bɩɩ nfɛɛrɛ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ fɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nfɛɛrɛ libi nɩɩ fɛn fɛ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ kanɩn?
Ɩmʋ kɩmɔmɔ ɩ bʋlʋn kɩtɔwɛ? Fɛɛ n tɔwɛ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ yɛ, ‘N taa fʋ alibi kɛɛ fʋ’, abɛɛ n tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Kʋsʋ, kɛ fʋ natɛ?’
Amaa n biti fan bɩɩ fɛɛ, mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ n sʋ ɔlʋn kasɛ sʋ n taa alibi kɛɛ.” Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋgʋlɛ‐mʋgʋlɛ wuya mʋ yɛ, “Kʋsʋ, taa fʋ kalan kɛ fu kpewu.”
Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ kʋsʋ nɩɩ o kpewu.
Sakyɔ mʋ ba maa wu ɩnɩmʋ mʋ ɩ waa bamʋ kufuu, nɩɩ ba yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ fɛɛ maa taa kanɩn ɔlʋn sa nyɩmɩsa.
Yesu maa lɩɩ tʋtɔ ee kpee mʋ, o wu lenpoo ɔkɔɔlɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Matiwu maa tɛ lenpoo ɔkɔɔlɛkpa. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Buu mɛ,” nɩɩ Matiwu kʋsʋ buu mʋ.
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba kpee Matiwu kɩkpaara sʋ bee gyii mʋ, lenpoo akɔɔlɛpʋ gaalaagaa yɛ alibi awaapʋ ba ba, nɩɩ ba maa bamʋ kpini ba bʋga gyii.
Farasii abi ba maa wu kanɩn mʋ, ba taasɛ Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ fanɛ ɔkaapʋpʋ maa lenpoo akɔɔlɛpʋ yɛ alibi awaapʋ bɛɛ bʋga bee gyii?”
Yesu maa nu kanɩn mʋ, ɔ lɛɛ Farasii abi mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Man gyɛ alanfɩya wuya nɩɩ ɔkyɛpʋ tiri sa, amɔɔ ɔlɔpʋ nkʋn.

Fan naa kɩɩ biti Asɩnkyan yɩlasa kasɛ. Asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, ‘Abaa kʋwɛɛ kuwu nɩɩ mɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ n biti, man gyɛ atɔbwaaya kɩtaa lɛɛ saraga sa mɛ.’ ” Nɩɩ Yesu kyaga sʋ yɛ, “N man ba nɩn kɛ n ba tɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ, amɔɔ alibi awaapʋ.”
Kakaakʋ Gyɔn Okyugyeepu abɩɩlapʋ ba ba taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ anɛ yɛ Farasii abi mʋ a ŋmina kɔnɔ, nɩɩ fʋ abɩɩlapʋ bɩrɛ be mee ŋmina kɔnɔ?”

Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Nɛnɛ sʋ nɩɩ kɩkyɩɩfɔ tɔ afɔ bee biti ba bɔɔta tɔ, yɛgɛ ɔkyɩɩfɔ mu‐kuli mʋ bʋ bamʋ asɛ? Ɩ mɛɛ ba kanɩn. Amaa saŋa kʋ ii biti ɔ ba nɩɩ bee biti ba taa ɔkyɩɩfɔ mu‐kuli mʋ lɩɩ bamʋ asɛ. Kanɩn saŋa maŋa nɩɩ bee biti ba ŋmina kɔnɔ.”
Yesu bɩla tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔkʋ mɛɛ tɩn kikyibi pʋpwɛ taa baata tii kaalɛ dɩdaa ɔkyatɛkpa ɔbɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ kan waa kanɩn mʋ kikyibi pʋpwɛ mʋ kii biti kɩ kyatɛ lɩɩ, kɛ ɔkyatɛkpa mʋ kɩɩ yɛlɩgɛ tii sʋ.

Kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taa nta pʋpwɛ waa kʋtɔbwaaya ɔwʋlɛ taakpe dɩdaa tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ kan waa kanɩn, nɩɩ nta mʋ ɩɩ bɩlɛ mʋ, ii biti ɩ kyatɛ taakpe dɩdaa mʋ nyita, kɛ nta mʋ ɩ kyɛɛgɛ fɔyɩ. Amaa bɛɛ taa nta pʋpwɛ waa taakpe pʋpwɛ tɔ, kɛ ɩmʋ anyɔ mʋ ɩ man nyita.”

Yesu maa san ɔ maa sʋ ɛɛ tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ mʋ, nɩɩ Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa ɔbɩlɩsa kʋ ba Yesu asɛ, ba muŋa mu ansi tɔ kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mi‐bii‐kyɩɩsa dan wu nɩmʋ. Amaa dan waa aniya ba taa fʋ kɩbaa mata mʋ, ee biti o kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ ba nkpa tɔ.”
Ɩmʋ sʋ Yesu kʋsʋ buu mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ gbaa ba buu mʋ kpee.
Ba maa kpee mʋ, ɔkyɩɩ kʋ mʋ nɩɩ nkalan ɩɩ da mʋ nsu kudu anyɔ mʋ, ba bɔla Yesu kamaa nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ kɩbaa mata Yesu kaalɛ anobi.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ fɛ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ yɛ, “Nɩɩ n dan nyɛ mata mʋ kaalɛ gbaa, n biti n nyɛ alanfɩya.”
Nɩɩ Yesu biliŋi nɩɩ o wu ɔkyɩɩ mʋ, tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mi‐bii‐kyɩɩsa, yɛgɛ fʋ kɔkɔlɔ kɩ dɛ fʋ. Fʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fʋ nyɛ alanfɩya.” Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nyɛ alanfɩya opula maŋa tɔ.
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu naa loo ɔgyaŋɛkpa ɔbɩlɩsa mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ, nɩɩ o wu nleebi afʋlɛpʋ keli mʋ tɔ yɛ asa damantɛ mʋ nɩɩ bee su mʋ,
ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɔ lɩɩ nfɩɩ, kebii mʋ man wu nɩn, ɔ dɛ nsɩɩrɛ nɩn.” Amaa ba ŋmasɛ Yesu.
Ba maa gya asa damantɛ mʋ lɩɩ kamaa tɔ mʋ, Yesu loo kebii kyɩɩsa‐bi mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ɔ kɩtaa mʋ kɩbaa tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ kʋsʋ kyɩna.
Nɩɩ falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ yaasɛ kpee kanɩn ɔsʋwʋlɛ maŋa sʋ kpini.
Yesu maa lɩɩ tʋtɔ ee kpee mʋ, nɩɩ agyaatanapʋ anyɔ akʋ ba buu mʋ, bee kuusi bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Dawidi kanaana‐bii, wu anɛ kʋwɛɛ!”
Yesu maa naa loo katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ mʋ, nɩɩ agyaatanapʋ anyɔ mʋ ba kpee mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ n taalɛ kyɛ fanɛ?” Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɛɛhn, Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, an kɔɔlɛ gyii.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔ mata bamʋ ansi tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɩ waa sa fanɛ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii ki du mʋ.”
Nɩɩ bamʋ ansi i bugi. Nɩɩ Yesu da bamʋ amu tɔ kenken yɛ, “Fan man tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ sa ɔkʋ.”
Amaa ba lɩɩ tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba yaasɛ asɩn nɩmʋ lɩɩ Yesu sʋ kanɩn ɔsʋwʋlɛ maŋa sʋ kabaafʋn kpini.
Agyaatanapʋ anyɔ mʋ ba maa kpee mʋ, asa akʋ ba bɩya ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi ba tɛ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ taalɛ ɛɛ tɔwɛ.
Yesu maa dan gya nbwɩɩ libi lɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ piili ɛɛ tɔwɛ. Nɩɩ ɩ waa asa damantɛ mʋ kɩyan, nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “A man pɩɩ wu ɩnɩmʋ kudubi Ɩsɩrayɩ ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.”
Amaa Farasii abi mʋ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nbwɩɩ libi ɔbɩlɩsa ɔlʋn nɩɩ ɔ sʋ ɛɛ gya nbwɩɩ libi falɛ.”

Nɩɩ Yesu natɛ ndɛ lala yɛ ndɛ‐bii tɔ kpini kyaabɔɔ, yɛgɛ ɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɩgyaŋɛkpa mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ bamʋ asɩn danbɩrasa lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɛɛ kyɛ alɔ yiri‐yiri kʋmaa nɩmʋ.
Yesu maa wu sakyɔ mʋ, bamʋ asɩn ɩ waa mʋ kʋwɛɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ bɛɛ yɩyɛɛ nɩɩ ba man nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba waa. Be du nɩn fɛɛ nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba man sʋ ɔkpapʋ.
Kanɩn sʋ ɔ tɔwɛ sa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Kesintin tɔ mʋ, ayu kɩtɩŋɛ mʋ kyɔ, amaa kusun awaapʋ mʋ ba du gbɛrɛɛ falɛ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ fan kʋlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, kadɔɔ wuya mʋ kɛ o sun kusun awaapʋ kpee mʋ ayu kɩtɩŋɛ mʋ tɔ.”
Yesu tɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ ba gyaŋɛ, nɩɩ ɔ sa bamʋ ɔlʋn yɛ ba taa gya nbwɩɩ libi, kɛ ba kyɛ alɔ yiri‐yiri kʋmaa nɩmʋ.
Abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ atɩɩ ndee. Ɔgyankpaapʋ mʋ ɩ gyɛ Simon (mʋ nɩɩ ba bɩla bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Pita) maa mu‐supu Andiruwu, yɛ Gyemisi maa mu‐supu Gyɔn, Sebedi mu‐bii ana,
yɛ Filipu maa Batolome, yɛ Tomasi maa Matiwu, lenpoo ɔkɔɔlɛpʋ mʋ, yɛ Gyemisi Alifeyo mu‐bii, yɛ Tadiyosi,
yɛ Simon mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Seloti
mʋ, yɛ Gyudasi Isikariyoti, mʋ nɩɩ ɔ ba lɛɛ Yesu sa mʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu sun abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan man kpee bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ kɩbaafʋn abɛɛ Samariya abi kadɛ kʋ tɔ.
Amaa fan kpee Ɩsɩrayɩ abi mʋ nɩɩ ba du fɛɛ nbʋlʋpʋ fɔyɩsa mʋ asɛ.
Fan kpee naa tɔwɛ bamʋ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ yɛ, ‘Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ ki tiri tɔ.’
Fan kan kpee mʋ fan kyɛ alɔpʋ, kɛ fan kyiŋi alewupu, kɛ fan yɛgɛ abootipu n‐yɩɩ ɩ lɔŋɔ sʋ, kɛ fan gya nbwɩɩ libi lɩɩ asa sʋ. Ba taa ɔlʋn maŋa kɛɛ fanɛ nɩn, ɩmʋ sʋ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fan taa kɛɛ.
Fan man taa afulee kʋ waa fanɛ igyifa tɔ,
nɩɩ fan man taa taakpe abɛɛ kaalɛ nyɔsapʋ, abɛɛ asɩbɩta, abɛɛ kikpebi, kpee ɔkpa maŋa. Osunpu dagaa fɛɛ ba sa mʋ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ki tiri mʋ.
“Kadɛ lala abɛɛ kadɛ‐bi kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fan loo kɩmʋ tɔ mʋ, fan biti ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ mʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi, kɛ fan kyɩna mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan ba lɩɩ tʋtɔ.
Nɩɩ fan kan loo mʋ sʋ mʋ, fan kʋlɛ keyuula sa kɩkpaara mʋ.
Nɩɩ kɩkpaara mʋ sʋ abi ba kan kɔɔlɛ fanɛ mʋ, fan yɛgɛ fanɛ keyuula mʋ ki sii kɩkpaara mʋ sʋ. Amaa nɩɩ ba man kan kɔɔlɛ fanɛ bɩrɛ, fan yɛgɛ fanɛ keyuula ki bwii ba fanɛ asɛ.
Nɩɩ kadɛ kʋ abɛɛ kɩkpaara kʋ asa ba man kan kɔɔlɛ fanɛ abɛɛ ba man nu fanɛ asɛ mʋ, fan kpɩkpaa fanɛ ayaa tɔ ɩsɛ wʋrɩgɛ bamʋ sʋ, kɛ fan lɩɩ tʋtɔ.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ, kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti o be gyii asa asɩn mʋ, Sodom maa Gomora abi kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ gbaa ii biti ɩ baa ɩ bɔ bamʋ lɛɛ.
Fan kɩɩ! N sun fanɛ nɩn fɛɛ nbʋlʋpʋ n kpee akuntun tɔ. Fan baa fan sʋ kanyaasɩn fɛɛ anansɛ, yɛgɛ fan du bwahn fɛɛ awura‐lɔpɔ.
“Fan baa fan da sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ asa kʋ bee biti ba kɩtaa fanɛ kpee asɩn ogyikpa, kɛ ba tɩŋɛ fanɛ Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɩgyaŋɛkpa.
Lɩɩ mɛ sʋ, bee biti ba kpiya fanɛ awura yɛ alʋlʋnpʋ ansi tɔ, kɛ fan nyɛ ɔkpa tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ lɩɩ mɛ sʋ sa bamʋ, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ.
Nɩɩ ba kan kpiya fanɛ asɩn ogyikpa mʋ, fan man yɩyɛɛ lɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan tɔwɛ, abɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan tɔwɛ mʋ sʋ. Saŋa mʋ kan fʋʋ mʋ, fen biti fan nyɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fan tɔwɛ bamʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ man gyɛ fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa ii biti fan tɔwɛ, amaa fanɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ ii biti ɔ bɔla fanɛ sʋ tɔwɛ.
“Kanɩn nkɛ maa tɔ mʋ, nyɩmɩsa ii biti o gyii mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mu‐supu kadɛ‐boyi, kɛ ba mɔɔ mʋ, kɛ ɔsɛ gbaa ɔ waa obii kanɩn. Nbii bee biti ba kʋsʋ yɩlɛ akʋʋgɛpʋ ana sʋ, kɛ ba yɛgɛ kɛ ba mɔɔ bamʋ.
Asa kpini bee biti ba kisi fanɛ lɩɩ mɛ sʋ, amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taalɛ yɩlɛ tɔ kenken naa fʋʋ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ, ii biti ɔ nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ.

Nɩɩ ba kan nyanla fanɛ kadɛ kʋ tɔ mʋ, fan sɩlɛ lɩɩ tʋtɔ kpee kadɛ kʋ tɔ. N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ, fɛn mɛɛ yɛ fan sɩlɛ kanɩn kyaabɔɔ Ɩsɩrayɩ ndɛ mʋ kpini sʋ, pɔyɩ kɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ n ba.
“Ɔbɩɩlapʋ man kyɔ mʋ ɔkaapʋpʋ, nɩɩ kɩnyɛ man kyɔ mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ.
Ɩ dagaa ɩ maa kʋkwɛ ɔbɩɩlapʋ fɛɛ maa ba waa fɛɛ mʋ ɔkaapʋpʋ. Nɩɩ kɩyaafɔlɛ mɔɔ ɔ ba waa fɛɛ mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ. Nɩɩ ba kan bɛɛ tɩn asɩn bɛɛ gyaga mɛ, kɩkpaara sʋ ɔbɩlɩsa sʋ yɛ n gyɛ Beelisebu mʋ,
kanɩn bɩrɛ bee biti ba taa atɩɩ libi gyaga fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan gyɛ mɛ kɩkpaara sʋ abi mʋ ɩ kyɔ mɛ lɛɛ mʋ.
“Ɩmʋ sʋ fan man sɩlɛ asa. Kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ki bun sʋ mʋ, ii biti i bugi sʋ, nɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ baala mʋ, ii biti ɩ lɩɩ ifuli.
Asɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ kitentenbiri tɔ mʋ, fan tɔwɛ ɩmʋ kakyʋwapɛ, nɩɩ asɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ n kuli waa fanɛ asʋ tɔ mʋ, fan da ɩmʋ kibonbon.
Fan man sɩlɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ mɔɔ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ nkʋn, yɛgɛ ba mɛɛ taalɛ mɔɔ ɔkala. Amaa fan sɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ nyita ɔkala yɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ, Sɩtaanɛ fʋlɔn tɔ mʋ.
Man gyɛ kobo kʋlʋn nɩɩ bɛɛ sʋ bɛɛ sɔɔ alangba anyɔ, amaa bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋlʋn mɛɛ yɛ ɔ tɩyɛ kasɛ sʋ wu, yɛgɛ fanɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ man sa ɔkpa.
Halɩɩ fanɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kumu tɔ inyini gbaa, Ɩbwaarɛ nyi ɩmʋ kɔnɔ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ fan man waa kufuu, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan sʋ kyaarɛ fan kyɔ alangba damantɛ.
“Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ lɛɛ ɛɛ tɔwɛ asa tɔ yɛ n gyɛ mʋ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ mʋ, kanɩn nɩɩ ngbaa mɛ n biti n lɛɛ mʋ kaapʋ mɛ‐Sɛ ansi tɔ sʋsʋ.
Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o kina mɛ asa tɔ yɛ n man gyɛ mʋ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ mʋ, ngbaa mɛ n biti, n kina mʋ mɛ‐sɛ ansi tɔ sʋsʋ.
“Fan man fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ n ba nɩn kɛ ɩ bɩya keyuula dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ. Man gyɛ keyuula nɩɩ n bɩya, amaa keluu nɩɩ n bɩya.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ n ba nɩn,
‘kɛ nbii‐nyɩnsa ba kʋsʋ yɩlɛ bamʋ‐sɛ ana sʋ,
kɛ nbii‐kyɩɩsa gbaa ba kʋsʋ yɩlɛ bamʋ‐nyi ana sʋ,
kɛ asaa‐kyɩɩsa ba kʋsʋ yɩlɛ bamʋ‐saa ana sʋ,
Kɛ nyɩmɩsa mʋ dʋn ana ba baa ba gyɛ mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ asa.’
“Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti mʋ‐sɛ abɛɛ mu‐nyi ɔ kyɔ mɛ mʋ, ɔ man dagaa maa waa mɛ obuupu. Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti mu‐bii‐nyɩnsa abɛɛ ɔkyɩɩsa ɔ kyɔ mɛ mʋ, man dagaa maa waa mɛ obuupu.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man taa mu oyu laasa
sʋla buu mɛ mʋ, man dagaa maa waa mɛ obuupu.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti mʋ nkpa mʋ kɩbaa sʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ pan ɩmʋ, amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ pan mʋ nkpa lɩɩ mɛ sʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ nyɛ ɩmʋ.
“Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ fanɛ mʋ, kɔɔlɛ mɛ nɩmʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ mʋ, kɔɔlɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ nɩmʋ.

Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ lɩɩ maa gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ sʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ nyɛ kʋkɔka mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ ka mʋ ɔtɔwɛpʋ mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ mʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi lɩɩ maa gyɛ ɩkpa kyiigisa wuya sʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ nyɛ kʋkɔka mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ ka ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ mʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi mʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sa mɛ abɩɩlapʋ
nɩmʋ tɔ ɔkʋ nkyu yuulisa kawɛ tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ maa gyɛ mɛ ɔbɩɩlapʋ sʋ mʋ, n tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ, ɔ man yɛ ɔ pan mʋ kʋkɔka kpaa.”
Yesu maa kaapʋ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ asɛ lʋwɛ mʋ, ɔ lɩɩ tʋtɔ kpee ɔ naa kaapʋ kɛ ɔ tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ ndɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ san Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ.
Saŋa maa tɔ mʋ Gyɔn Okyugyeepu mʋ bʋ obu kitii tɔ. Maa nu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Krisito ɩɩ waa mʋ, o sun mʋ abɩɩlapʋ,
ba naa taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ anɛ yɛ ee biti ɔ ba mʋ, abɛɛ a kɩɩ ɔpʋpwɛ ɔkpa?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fen bwii naa tɔwɛ Gyɔn asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fan nu yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ fan wu,

fɛɛ agyaatanapʋ ansi i bugi, nɩɩ ayaa yɛ abaa wusa wuya ana ba kʋsʋ natɛ, nɩɩ abootipu n‐yɩɩ lɔŋɔ sʋ, nɩɩ atikpiri asʋ a tigi, nɩɩ alewupu ba kyiŋi ba nkpa tɔ, nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ Asɩn Danbɩrasa mʋ sa atiripu.
Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man yɛgɛ mɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii.”

Gyɔn Okyugyeepu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba maa bwii bee kpee mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu piili ɛɛ tɔwɛ Gyɔn n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn ɛɛ sa sakyɔ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nɩɩ fan kpee Gyɔn asɛ kiperi mʋ sʋ fanaa kɩɩ? Fan kpee naa kɩɩ kifitiri mʋ nɩɩ afuu ɩɩ da kɩmʋ ii biliŋi tɔ nɩn?
Nɩɩ man gyɛ kanɩn mʋ, mɩnɛ nɩɩ fen kpee naa kɩɩ? Nyɩmɩsa mʋ nɩɩ o bun ataa danbɩrasa mʋ, nɩɩ fan naa kɩɩ? Ayee, asa mʋ nɩɩ bee bun ataa danbɩrasa mʋ, ba tɛ iwurakpa nɩn.
Nɩɩ mɩnɛ gbaa nɩɩ fan kpee naa kɩɩ? Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ abɛɛ? Ɛɛhn, n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ ɔ kyɔ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ Gyɔn nɩmʋ asɩn nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ,
‘N biti n sun mɛ kabɔɔ kɛ ɔ gyankpaa fʋ,
mʋ ii biti ɔ ba lɔŋɔ fʋ ɔkpa yɩla fʋ.’ ”

Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, nyɩmɩsa kʋ man bʋ tɔ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ mʋ kasɛ sʋ nfɩɩ, nɩɩ ɔ kyɔ Gyɔn okyugyeepu mʋ. Ɩmʋ kpini gbaa mʋ, ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ pii sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ mʋ kyɔ mʋ.
Lɩɩ Gyɔn okyugyeepu saŋa ba lɩɩ ndaga mʋ, bamʋ nɩɩ bamʋ ansi ɩ payɩ yɛ bee biti ba loo sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ mʋ, ba sʋ ɔlʋn yɛ kensi payɩ bee loo kɩmʋ tɔ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ yɛ nbara mʋ, ɩ wʋla tɔwɛ lɩɩ kuwura‐gyii mʋ sʋ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Gyɔn ba.
Nɩɩ fan kan fen biti fan kɔɔlɛ kyula mʋ, Gyɔn ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Eligya mʋ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ yɩla yɛ ee biti ɔ ba mʋ.
Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ asʋ nɩɩ ee biti o nu mʋ, o nu.
“Mɩnɛ nɩɩ n taalɛ taa kaala ndaga asa? Ba du nɩn fɛɛ nbii ba maa tɛ agya tɔ bɛɛ tɩɩ abaa bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ,
‘An fʋlɛ nleebi sa fanɛ,
amaa fan man kyaa,
nɩɩ an bɩɩ alengyi ɩlʋn,
amaa fan man su.’
Lɩɩ fɛɛ Gyɔn maa ba mʋ, o mee gyii nɩɩ o mee nuu, nɩɩ ba yɛ, ‘Nbwɩɩ libi ba tɛ Gyɔn sʋ.’

Mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ n maa ba mʋ, n gyii nɩɩ n nuu, nɩɩ ba yɛ, ‘Ee gyii gaa nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ ɔtabʋʋpʋ yɛ lenpoo akɔɔlɛpʋ yɛ alibi awaapʋ bamʋ kyɛmɩnɛ.’ Amaa nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan o buu Ɩbwaarɛ kanyaasɩn ɩkpa sʋ mʋ, ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ mʋ kanyaasɩn mʋ gyɛ kesintin.”
Asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ ndɛ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu waa mʋ asɩn kyinkyinsa gaalaagaa mʋ, ba man yɛgɛ bamʋ alibi kɩwaa, kanɩn sʋ Yesu tɔwɛ yii bamʋ yɛ,

“Korasin abi, fanɛ laakʋ! Betisayida abi, fanɛ laakʋ! Asɩn kyinkyinsa mʋ nɩɩ n waa fanɛ ndɛ nɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɩ daa ɩ gyɛ Tayi maa Sidon nɩn, naafɔɔ ba wʋla dɩla ɩbɔɔta, kɛ ba taa ndaara bun bamʋ amu, kɛ ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ ba kyɛɛgɛ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ lɩɩ alibi tɔ.
Amaa n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, Tayi abi yɛ Sidon abi kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ ii biti ɩ baa ɩ bɔ fanɛ lɛɛ kakɛ talɛsa mʋ.

Nɩɩ fanɛ Kapanum abi, fen biti fɛɛ ba kʋsaa fanɛ kpee sʋsʋ Ɩbwaarɛ ayɛ nɩn abɛɛ? Ayee, bee biti ba tʋʋ fanɛ waa awʋrʋfɔ fʋlɔn yen‐yen tɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ asɩn kyinkyinsa mʋ nɩɩ n waa fanɛ kadɛ tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɩ daa ɩ gyɛ Sodom nɩɩ n daa waa ɩmʋ nɩn, naafɔɔ kadɛ mʋ san kɩ bʋ tɔ ba lɩɩ ndaga.
Amaa n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, Sodom abi kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ ii biti ɩ baa ɩ bɔ fanɛ lɛɛ kakɛ talɛsa mʋ tɔ.”
Saŋa maŋa nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Mɛ‐Sɛ, fʋ gyɛ sʋsʋ yɛ kasɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, n yɩn fʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ taa falɛ asɩn baala anyaasɩnpʋ yɛ anyipu sʋ, nɩɩ fʋ lɛɛ ɩmʋ kaapʋ nbii wuribi.
Ɩ gyɛ kanɩn nɩn, nɩɩ kanɩn ɩ gyɛ fʋ kɔkɔlɔ biti.
“Mɛ‐Sɛ taa kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ waa mɛ abaa tɔ. Ɔkʋ man nyi obii mʋ amɔɔ Ɔsɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ man nyi Ɔsɛ mʋ amɔɔ Obii mʋ, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ Obii mʋ ii biti ɔ lɛɛ mʋ kaapʋ bamʋ mʋ.
“Fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan sʋ nsʋla budusa nɩɩ fan kpɩnɛ mʋ, fan ba mɛ asɛ, kɛ n sa fanɛ ɔfʋʋtɛ.
Fan kyula kɛ fan buu mɛ, kɛ fan kasɛ mɛ tɔ, kɛ fan nyɛ ɔfʋʋtɛ sa fanɛ kala ana, lɩɩ fɛɛ n du bwahn nɩɩ n bɩya mɛ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ lɩɩ mɛ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ.
Nɩɩ fan kan fan buu mɛ mʋ, ɩ man bʋlʋn nɩɩ mɛ kasʋla gbaa man budu.”
Saŋa maŋa nɩɩ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba naa alʋn kadɔɔ tɔ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ kʋ. Nɩɩ akʋn a mɔɔ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ba piili bɛɛ gyayɩ alʋn mʋ ɩkʋ bɛɛ wɛ.
Farasii abi mʋ ba maa wu ɩnɩmʋ mʋ, ba tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Kɩɩ! Mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ fʋ abɩɩlapʋ bɛɛ waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man dɛ ɔkpa kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ.”
Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fan man pɩɩta kalɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Owura Dawidi maa mʋ kamaa tɔ abi ba waa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ akʋn a mɔɔ bamʋ mʋ nɩn?

O loo kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ naa taa bodobodo mʋ nɩɩ ba lɛɛ saraga sa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, nɩɩ maa mʋ asa mʋ ba wɛ. Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ nbara tɔ mʋ ɩ man dɛ ɔkpa fɛɛ Dawidi maa bamʋ ba waa kanɩn, amɔɔ Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu nkʋn.
Abɛɛ fan man pɩɩta kalɛ Mosesi nbara mʋ tɔ wu fɛɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu ba maa sun kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ, kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ mʋ, bee nyita nbara, amaa ɔkʋ man bun bamʋ kʋpwɛ?
N tɔwɛ fanɛ fɛɛ ɔkʋ bʋ nfɩɩ ɔ kyɔ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ.

Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, ‘Man gyɛ atɔbwaaya kɩtaa lɛɛ saraga sa mɛ nɩɩ n biti, amaa kuwu abaa kʋwɛɛ nɩɩ n biti.’ Nɩɩ fan kan nu asɩn nɩmʋ kasɛ nɩn, naafɔɔ fen mee bun asa mʋ nɩɩ ba man waa alibi mʋ kʋpwɛ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ, ɩ gyɛ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa mʋ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ.”
Yesu maa lɩɩ tʋtɔ ee kpee mʋ, ɔ naa loo bamʋ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa.
Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn kʋ bʋ tʋtɔ nɩɩ mʋ kɩbaa ki wu. Asa kʋ ba bʋ tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba maa biti ɔkpa ba nyɛ pwɩɩ Yesu sʋ mʋ, ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɩ dɛ ɔkpa fɛɛ ba kyɛ alɔpʋ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ abɛɛ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Nɩɩ ɩ kan ba fɛɛ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ sʋ kabʋlʋpʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩyɛ kɩkyabɔ tɔ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ mʋ, ɔ mɛɛ lɛɛ mʋ lɩɩ kɩmʋ tɔ abɛɛ?
Nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa kyɔ kabʋlʋpʋ naa ban sʋ falɛ mʋ, ɩmʋ sʋ ɩ dɛ ɔkpa nbara mʋ tɔ fɛɛ a waa adanbɩrasa kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ sa asa.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ yɛ, “Tɛɛŋɛ fʋ kɩbaa mʋ.” Nɩɩ ɔ tɛɛŋɛ kɩmʋ, opula tɔ nɩɩ kɩ nyɛ ɔlʋn fɛɛ kɩbanban mʋ.
Amaa Farasii abi mʋ ba lɩɩ kpee naa ŋmina kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba nyɛ ɔkpa mɔɔ Yesu.
Yesu maa bɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ mʋ ɔ lɩɩ kanɩn opula maŋa, nɩɩ asa gaalaagaa ba buu mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ lɔ mʋ alɔ kpini.
Amaa ɔ da bamʋ amu tɔ yɛ ba man tɔwɛ ɔkʋ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ.
Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ waa nɩn kɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla mʋ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Isaya sʋ tɔwɛ mʋ ɩ ba tɔ. Ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ,
“Kɩɩ! Mɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ nɩɩ n lɛɛ mʋ ndee,
mʋ, nɩɩ n sʋ kebiti sa nɩɩ ɔ bɔla mi ansi.
N biti n taa mɛ Kayaayu waa mʋ tɔ,
kɛ ɔ tɔwɛ asɩn kyiigisa sa ndɛndɛmandɛ kpini.
Ɔ mɛɛ yɛ o gyii ɩmɔɔrɛ abɛɛ ɔ pʋntɛ tɔ,
nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ natɛ waa ɔlanba agbenbi sʋ.
Ɔ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ gya oyu‐bi nyɔnsa tɔ tii sʋ lʋwɛ
nɩɩ o mee dun fɩtɩla mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man kɩɩ tɔ mʋ.
Ee biti ɔ yɩlɛ tɔ kɛ ɔ yɛgɛ asɩn kyiigisa mʋ i gyii sʋ.
Nɩɩ asa kpini bee biti ba taa bamʋ tamaa tʋʋ mʋ nkʋn sʋ.”
Kakaakʋ asa akʋ ba taa ɔnyɩn kʋ bɩya Yesu. Ɔ gyɛ gyaatanapʋ yɛ naamuu lɩɩ fɛɛ nbwɩɩ libi ba tɛ mʋ sʋ. Yesu kyɛ mʋ, nɩɩ mu ansi i bugi nɩɩ ɔ bɩla ɛɛ taalɛ ɛɛ tɔwɛ.
Nɩɩ ii kyinkyin asa mʋ kpini, nɩɩ ba taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Dawidi kanaana‐bii mʋ do?”
Amaa Farasii abi mʋ ba maa nu ɩnɩmʋ mʋ, ba tɔwɛ nɩn yɛ, “Nbwɩɩ libi kumu mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Beelisebu mʋ ɩɩ sa ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ ɔlʋn, nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ ɛɛ gya nbwɩɩ libi ɛɛ kʋsʋ asa sʋ kanɩn mʋ.”

Yesu bɩɩ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Nɩɩ Kuwura‐gyii kʋmaa tɔ asa ba kan barɩgɛ tɔ bɛɛ kɔ yɛ abaa mʋ, kɩ mɛɛ kyɛɛrɛɛ nɩɩ kɩ tɩyɛ. Nɩɩ kadɛ abɛɛ kɩkpaara sʋ abi ba kan barɩgɛ tɔ bɛɛ kɔ yɛ abaa mʋ, kadɛ abɛɛ kɩkpaara maŋa kii biti ki boyi.
Nɩɩ ɩ kan ɩ gyɛ kesintin fɛɛ Sɩtaanɛ ɩɩ gya Sɩtaanɛ mʋ, ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ ɔ barɩgɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ tɔ kɩnyɔ nɩn. Ɩmʋ sʋ nɛnɛ nɩɩ mu kuwura‐gyii mʋ kɩ bɩla taalɛ yɩlɛ?

Fan yɛ Beelisebu ɩɩ sa mɛ ɔlʋn nɩɩ n sʋ n gya nbwɩɩ libi n kʋsaa asa sʋ. To, kanɩn bɩrɛ anɩmʋ ɩɩ sa fanɛ abɩɩlapʋ ɔlʋn nɩɩ bɛɛ taalɛ bɛɛ gya nbwɩɩ libi bɛɛ kʋsaa asa sʋ? Fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ abɩɩlapʋ ii biti ba bun fanɛ kʋpwɛ fɛɛ fan man sʋ kesintin.
Amaa nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu nɩɩ n sʋ n gya nbwɩɩ libi n kʋsaa asa sʋ mʋ, kanɩn bɩrɛ fan bɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ kɩ wʋla kɩ bʋ fanɛ asɛ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla kyaga sʋ yɛ, “Ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ loo ɔlʋlʋnpʋ kʋ kɩkpaara sʋ naa swii mʋ kapatɩyɛ, amɔɔ ɔ gyankpaa ŋmina mʋ yɩla pɔyɩ kɛ ɔ lan taalɛ naa swii mʋ kapatɩyɛ lɩɩ kɩkpaara mʋ sʋ.
“Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man tii mɛ sʋ mʋ, ii kisi mɛ nɩn, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ kʋʋla ɛɛ kyɛ mɛ tɔ mʋ, ɛɛ yaasɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ n kʋʋla mʋ nɩn.
Ɩmʋ sʋ, n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa alibi abɛɛ ɔ tɔwɛ yii Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ taa kɛɛ mʋ. Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yii Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ taa kɛɛ mʋ.

Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ asɩn kʋ yii mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ taa kɛɛ mʋ, amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ asɩn yii Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ bɩrɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ taa kɛɛ mʋ nbɩɩnbɩɩ saŋa nɩmʋ tɔ abɛɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ ba mʋ.

“Nɩɩ fʋ kan kyula yɛ oyu kʋ abi ɩ gyɛ abi danbɩrasa mʋ, oyu maa gbaa gyɛ oyu danbɩrasa nɩn, amaa nɩɩ fʋ kan kina yɛ oyu kʋ abi man gyɛ abi danbɩrasa bɩrɛ, oyu maa gbaa man gyɛ oyu danbɩrasa. Lɩɩ fɛɛ oyu abi sɔyɩsa nɩɩ bɛɛ sʋ bɛɛ bɩɩ kɩmʋ.
Fanɛ asa libi fɛɛ anansɛ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ fɛn taalɛ tɔwɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋrɔn, yɛgɛ fanɛ atɔ waasa gyɛ alibi? Lɩɩ fɛɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ nyɩmɩsa kɔkɔlɔ tɔ mʋ, kɩmʋ ɩɩ lɩɩ mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ.
Nyɩmɩsa danbɩrasa bɩrɛ, atɔ danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ mʋ tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɛɛ lɛɛ ɛɛ tɔwɛ, nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa libi mɔɔ, atɔ libi mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ mʋ tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɛɛ lɛɛ ɛɛ tɔwɛ.
Amaa n tɔwɛ fanɛ fɛɛ, katɔwɛ gyaga kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔsa kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔwɛ mʋ, ee biti ɔ lɛɛ kɩmʋ kɔnɔ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ, kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ talɛ asa mʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ ntɔwɛ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ yɩlɛ sʋ talɛ fʋ fɛɛ fu gyii asʋ abɛɛ fu gyii kʋpwɛ.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ nbara akaapʋpʋ akʋ yɛ Farasii abi akʋ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ an biti fɛɛ fʋ waa asɩn kyinkyinsa kaapʋ anɛ.”

Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ndaga kakyɩna nɩmʋ tɔ alibi awaapʋ yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ be mee sun Ɩbwaarɛ ɩɩ kɩɩ bee biti asɩn kyinkyinsa. Amaa baa mɛɛ nyɛ ɩmʋ, amɔɔ sɩnkaala mʋ nɩɩ ɩ ba Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Gyona sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ n biti n waa kaapʋ bamʋ.
Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Gyona gyii nkɛ nsa ibiri ɔkɩn lala ɔtɔ tɔ mʋ, kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ gbaa n biti n gyii nkɛ nsa ibiri kasɛ tɔ.

Kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ talɛ asa kpini mʋ, Ninewe abi bee biti ba kʋsʋ, kɛ ba bun ndaga kakyɩna nɩmʋ tɔ asa kʋpwɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Gyona naa tɔwɛ bamʋ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ ba yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa. Amaa mɛ, mʋ nɩɩ n kyɔ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Gyona mʋ n bʋ nfɩɩ.

Nɩɩ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ talɛ asa kpini mʋ, Seeba Owura‐kyɩɩsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ kata‐kata mʋ, ii biti ɔ kʋsʋ yɩlɛ kɛ o bun ndaga kakyɩna nɩmʋ tɔ asa kʋpwɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ lɩɩ koo kata‐kata ba nu Owura Solomon kanyaasɩn kɩkaapʋ mʋ. Amaa mɛ mʋ nɩɩ n kyɔ Solomon mʋ n bʋ nfɩɩ.”
Yesu kyaga sʋ yɛ, “Nɩɩ kayaayu libi dan kʋsʋ nyɩmɩsa sʋ mʋ, kɩ naa kɩ naa ofuli sʋ nɩn kii biti ɔkyɩnakpa. Amaa nɩɩ kɩ man kan nyɛ mʋ,
kɩ tɔwɛ sa kɩmʋ n‐yɩɩ yɛ, ‘N biti n bwii kpee mɛ kɩkpaara mʋ nɩɩ n lɩɩ mʋ sʋ.’ Nɩɩ ɔ kan ba fʋʋ nɩɩ o wu fɛɛ sɛhn man bʋ kɩmʋ tɔ, yɛgɛ kɩ lɔŋɔ kɩ dɛ yɛ ɔdan mʋ,

Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɛɛ lɩɩ kpee kɛ ɔ naa taa mʋ tɔɔmaa ana n‐yaayu libi asunɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba libi ba kyɔ mʋ tii mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ, kɛ ba kpee naa kyɩna tʋtɔ. Saamʋ, kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ daa o du mʋ, ii biti ɩ baa ɩ kyɔ kanɩn. Kanɩn nɩɩ ii biti ɩ baa i du sa ndaga kakyɩna kanɩmʋ tɔ asa libi.”
Yesu maa san ɔ maa sʋ ɛɛ tɔwɛ ɛɛ sa sakyɔ mʋ, mu‐nyi yɛ mu‐supu ana ba ba yɩlɛ nbwama bee biti fɛɛ ba tɔwɛ mʋ asɛ.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋ tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Fu‐nyi yɛ fu‐supu ana ba yɩlɛ nbwama bee biti fɛɛ ba tɔwɛ fʋ asɛ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ mi‐nyi, nɩɩ anɩmʋ ana ɩ gyɛ mu‐supu ana?”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔ tɛɛŋɛ mʋ kɩbaa kaapʋ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ, tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan kɩɩ! Mi‐nyi yɛ mi‐supu ana ndee.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ kɔkɔlɔ biti mʋ, ɩ gyɛ mi‐supu yɛ mɛ‐pɩɩkyɩɩ yɛ mi‐nyi.”
Kanɩn kakɛ maŋa nɩɩ Yesu lɩɩ kɩkpaara sʋ kpee naa kyɩna ɔbʋn kaa ɛɛ kaapʋ.
Asa damantɛ ba maa kyaabɔɔ mʋ mʋ, o loo ɔkʋlɩ tɔ naa kyɩna yɛgɛ asa mʋ ba yɩlɛ ɔbʋn‐kaa.
Nɩɩ ɔ taa aŋasan tɔ kaapʋ bamʋ atɔ damantɛ. Ɔ bɔ bamʋ kɩŋasan kʋ yɛ, “Ɔdɔɔpʋ kʋ ɩ bʋ tɔ nɩɩ o kpee ɔ naa ŋmatɛ ayu.
Maa naa ŋmatɛ ɩmʋ mʋ, ɩkʋ ɩ tɩyɛ ɔkpakaa, nɩɩ nbwiibi ba ba tasɛ ɩmʋ gyii.
Nɩɩ ɩkʋ ɩ tɩyɛ afʋlɛ sʋ, katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩsɛ ɩ man kyɔ. Nɩɩ ɩ kɔyɩ bilen kpalɩ fɛɛ ɩsɛ mʋ maa man bʋnyɛ sʋ.
Amaa kyɔwɛ maa ba ɛɛ da mʋ, i fugya ɩmʋ, nɩɩ i wu lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩmʋ ilin ɩ man kyɔ.
Nɩɩ ɩkʋ mɔɔ ɩ tɩyɛ iwii tɔ, nɩɩ iwii mʋ ɩ dan nyan kɩtaa ɩmʋ.
Amaa ayu mʋ ɩkʋ ɩ tɩyɛ kasɛ danbɩrasa sʋ, nɩɩ ɩ sɔyɩ amu lala‐lala. Ɩkʋ ɩ gyɛ kɩlɩfa, nɩɩ ɩkʋ ɩ gyɛ adisiye, nɩɩ ɩkʋ mɔɔ adɩsa.
Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ asʋ nɩɩ ee biti o nu mʋ o nu.”
Nɩɩ Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba ba mʋ asɛ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ aŋasan tɔ nɩɩ fʋ sʋ fɩɩ kaapʋ asa?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fanɛɛ fanɛ bɩrɛ ɔkpa bugi sa fanɛ fɛɛ fan bɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ asiri asɩn mʋ, amaa bamɛɛ bamʋ bɩrɛ ɩ man bugi sa bamʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ, bee biti ba sa mʋ gaa tii sʋ, kɛ ɔ nyɛ kyʋn sʋ. Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man sʋ mʋ, halɩɩ pii kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ mʋ gbaa mʋ, bee biti ba kɔɔlɛ lɩɩ mʋ asɛ.
Kʋtɔ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ n sʋ aŋasan n kaapʋ bamʋ mʋ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ,
Bɛɛ kɩɩ amaa be mee wu,
bee nu, amaa be mee nu danbɩrasa abɛɛ be nu ɩmʋ kasɛ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla mʋ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Isaya sʋ tɔwɛ yɩla mʋ, ɩ ba tɔ asa nɩmʋ sʋ. Ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ,
‘Fen biti fan nu kɛ fan nu, amaa fɛn mɛɛ yɛ fan nu kasɛ.
Fen biti fan kɩɩ kɛ fan kɩɩ, amaa fɛn mɛɛ yɛ fan wu sɛhn.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ asa banɩmʋ bamʋ nkɔlɔ ɩ bʋlʋn,
nɩɩ ba tii bamʋ asʋ,
nɩɩ ba bun bamʋ ansi sʋ.
Naafɔɔ bamʋ ansi ii biti i wu,
kɛ bamʋ asʋ ii nu,
kɛ bamʋ nkɔlɔ tɔ ii nu asɩn kasɛ,
kɛ ba bwii ba mɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ kɛ n kyɛ bamʋ alɔ.’
Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ ansi ii wu nɩɩ fanɛ asʋ ii nu.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ gaalaagaa yɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ bamʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ mʋ, bee biti gaa fɛɛ ba wu atɔ mʋ nɩɩ fen wu yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ fen nu falɛ, amaa ba man nyɛ ɩmʋ.
“Nbɩɩnbɩɩ fan nu kɩŋasan lɩɩ ayu ɔŋmatɛpʋ mʋ kasɛ.
Ayubi mʋ nɩɩ ɩ tɩyɛ ɔkpakaa mʋ du nɩn fɛɛ, bamʋ nɩɩ bee nu Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ asɩn, nɩɩ ba man nu ɩmʋ kasɛ mʋ, nɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ ɛɛ ba bɛ lɛɛ abi mʋ nɩɩ ba ŋmatɛ mʋ lɩɩ bamʋ nkɔlɔ tɔ.
Ayubi mʋ nɩɩ ɩ tɩyɛ afʋlɛ sʋ mɔɔ mʋ, i du nɩn fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bee nu asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ, nɩɩ ba taa kɔkɔlɔ fuuli kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ opula tɔ mʋ.
Amaa ɩ maa man loo bamʋ nkɔlɔ tɔ kyɛɛkyɛɛ sʋ mʋ, asɩn mʋ mɛɛ kyɛɛrɛɛ bamʋ tɔ. Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ awʋrʋfɔ abɛɛ kanyanla dan ɩ ba bamʋ sʋ lɩɩ asɩn mʋ sʋ mʋ, opula tɔ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩyɛ lɩɩ bamʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ.
Ayubi mʋ nɩɩ ɩ tɩyɛ iwii tɔ mʋ ɩ gyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bee nu asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ, amaa dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ atɔ tɔɔrɔɔsa yɛ kafulee biti bansa mʋ, ɩɩ nyan kɩtaa asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ, nɩɩ ɩ mɛɛ sɔyɩ abi.

Amaa ayubi mʋ nɩɩ ɩ tɩyɛ kasɛ danbɩrasa tɔ mʋ, ɩ gyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bee nu asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ bee nu ɩmʋ kasɛ mʋ, ɩmʋ sʋ bɛɛ waa atɔ danbɩrasa gaa fɛɛ ayubi mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ sɔyɩ abi kɩlɩfa nɩɩ ɩkʋ adisiye nɩɩ ɩkʋ mɔɔ adɩsa mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla bɔ bamʋ kɩŋasan kʋ yɛ, “Sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ du nɩn fɛɛ ɔnyɩn kʋ maa naa ŋmatɛ ayubi danbɩrasa mʋ ndɔɔ tɔ.
Asa ba maa dɛ lʋwɛ kagyanbwɛ mʋ, ɔdɔɔpʋ maŋa mʋ‐dʋn naa taa afitiri libi ŋmatɛ waa ayu mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ natɛ kyʋn.
Ayu mʋ maa nyɛ ɩtɔ ɩɩ kʋʋgɛ mʋ, nɩɩ afitiri libi mʋ gbaa ɩɩ dan.
“Nɩɩ kadɔɔ wuya mʋ ayaafɔlɛ ba ba mʋ asɛ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, man gyɛ ayubi danbɩrasa nɩɩ fʋ ŋmatɛ fʋ ndɔɔ mʋ tɔ? Fɩnɛ nɩɩ afitiri libi nɩmʋ ɩ lɩɩ?’
“Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Mɛ‐dʋn kʋ ɩ waa kanɩn.’
“Nɩɩ mʋ ayaafɔlɛ mʋ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Fii biti fɛɛ a naa kyiigi ɩmʋ abɛɛ?’
“Nɩɩ bamʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ mʋ lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Ayee, fan yɛgɛ ɩmʋ kikyiigi, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan kan yɛ fen kyiigi afitiri libi mʋ, fen biti fan kyiigi bʋga yɛ ayu mʋ.

Fan yɛgɛ ɩmʋ kpini ɩ bʋga dan naa fʋʋ kɩtɩŋɛ saŋa. Kanɩn saŋa maa mʋ, n biti n tɔwɛ atɩŋɛpʋ mʋ yɛ, ba daa kɩkpantɛ afitiri libi mʋ ŋmina ntun‐ntun kɛ ba tuwa ɩmʋ. Kɛ ba laata ayu mʋ naa waa mɛ kɩkyagɩla tɔ.’ ”
Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla bɔ bamʋ kɩŋasan kʋ yɛ, “Sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ du nɩn fɛɛ ɔnyɩn kʋ maa taa masitadi oyu kibi pii naa duu mʋ ndɔɔ tɔ.
Halɩɩ oyu maŋa kibi kɩ maa du pii iyu abi kpini tɔ gbaa mʋ, kɩɩ dan kɩ kyɔ apʋnfa kpini, nɩɩ kɩɩ ba waa oyu nɩɩ nbwiibi bɛɛ ba waa bamʋ nsʋswaa kɩmʋ n‐yaabi sʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla bɔ bamʋ kɩŋasan yɛ, “Sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ ki du nɩn fɛɛ ɔkyɩɩ kʋ maa taa kɩfa‐tinsa kyagɩlɛ bodobodo inyifo ɩkyɛmɩsɛ ɩlala ɩsa tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ inyifo mʋ i tin nyɛ akyɔ.”
Aŋasan tɔ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ sa sakyɔ mʋ. Ɔ man tɔwɛ sɛhn sa bamʋ yɛgɛ ɩ man gyɛ aŋasan tɔ.
Yesu waa kanɩn nɩn kɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ tɔwɛ yɩla mʋ ɩ ba tɔ. Asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ,
“Aŋasan tɔ nɩɩ n biti n tɔwɛ bamʋ asɛ,
N biti n tɔwɛ bamʋ asɩn baalasa mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ man nyi ɩmʋ lɩɩ koo dulinyaa npiili asɛ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɩɩ sakyɔ mʋ asɛ nɩɩ ɔ kyʋn kɩkpaara sʋ, nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba ba mʋ asɛ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Kaapʋ anɛ kɩŋasan mʋ nɩɩ fʋ bɔ lɩɩ ayu yɛ afitiri libi mʋ kasɛ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔdɔɔpʋ mʋ nɩɩ o duu ayubi danbɩrasa mʋ ɩ gyɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ.
Ndɔɔ mʋ ɩ gyɛ dulinyaa, nɩɩ ayubi danbɩrasa mʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ asa. Afitiri libi mʋ mɔɔ ɩ gyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ Sɩtaanɛ asa mʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔdʋn mʋ nɩɩ o duu afitiri libi mʋ ɩ gyɛ Sɩtaanɛ. Ayu mʋ kɩtɩŋɛ saŋa mʋ ɩ gyɛ dulinyaa laalaalʋwɛ. Nɩɩ atɩŋɛpʋ mʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ mʋ.
“Ɩmʋ sʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba kpantɛ afitiri libi mʋ tuwa mʋ, kanɩn nɩɩ ii biti ɩ waa dulinyaa laalaalʋwɛ nɩn.
Mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ, n biti n sun mɛ sʋsʋ nbɔɔ, kɛ ba ba tasɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ pɩna asa nɩɩ bɛɛ waa alibi mʋ, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa alibi mʋ, lɩɩ mi kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ.
Kɛ ba taa bamʋ tʋʋ waa awʋrʋfɔ fʋlɔn yen‐yen mʋ tɔ, opula mʋ nɩɩ kusu yɛ anobi kiduŋi bʋ.
Amaa bamʋ nɩɩ bamʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ mʋ bee biti ba ŋalɩgɛ sʋ fɛɛ kyɔwɛ bamʋ‐Sɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ. Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ asʋ nɩɩ ee biti o nu mʋ o nu.”

Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla bɔ bamʋ kɩŋasan kʋ yɛ, “Sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ ki du nɩn fɛɛ atɔ kparɛ fɛɛ suwa mʋ nɩɩ ba taa baala nɩɩ ɔnyɩn kʋ naa benti kasɛ kʋ sʋ. Maa wu ɩmʋ mʋ, nɩɩ o bwii bun ɩmʋ sʋ. Ɩ maa waa mʋ ɔkɔn gaa sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ naa taa mʋ atɔ kpini fɛɛ nɩɩ ɔ naa sɔɔ kanɩn kasɛ maŋa.
“Sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ kɩ bɩla ki du nɩn fɛɛ, ɔyaawʋ‐gyipu maa naa ee biti kigyibi kparɛ mʋ.
Nɩɩ maa naa nyɛ kʋkʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ kɩkparɛ mʋ, ɔ naa fɛ mʋ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ mʋ kpini, nɩɩ ɔ naa sɔɔ kɩmʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla tɔwɛ yɛ, “Sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ bɩla ki du nɩn fɛɛ, ɩkɩn ɔkɩtapʋ maa tʋʋ mʋ kisewu kɩtaa ɩkɩn kʋkwɩɩ‐kʋkwɩɩ.
Ɩkɩn mʋ ba maa bɔla kisewu mʋ nɩɩ akɩtapʋ mʋ ba bɩɩtɛ kɩmʋ ba ɔlɩɩkaa nɩɩ ba kyɩna tasɛ adanbɩrasa mʋ waa alantan tɔ, nɩɩ ba taa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man bʋrɔn mʋ fɔyɩ.
Kanɩn nɩɩ ii biti ɩ ba waa dulinyaa laalaalʋwɛ mʋ. Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ mʋ bee biti ba ba tasɛ asa libi lɛɛ asa danbɩrasa tɔ,
kɛ ba taa bamʋ tʋʋ waa awʋrʋfɔ fʋlɔn yen‐yen mʋ tɔ, opula mʋ nɩɩ kusu yɛ anobi kiduŋi bʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan nu ɩmʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ kpini kasɛ?”
Nɩɩ ba yɛ, “Ɛɛhn, an nu ɩmʋ kasɛ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Kanɩn sʋ, nbara ɔkaapʋpʋ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ ba waa ɔbɩɩlapʋ lɩɩ sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii sʋ mʋ, du nɩn fɛɛ kɩkpaara wuya mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mʋ atɔ kparɛ pʋpwɛ yɛ adɩdaa lɩɩ mu obu to mʋ.”
Yesu maa bɔ bamʋ aŋasan anɩmʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, ɔ lɩɩ kadɛ mʋ tɔ.

Nɩɩ o kpee mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ kadɛ tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ naa piili ɛɛ kaapʋ asa bamʋ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa, nɩɩ i kyinkyin bamʋ. Nɩɩ ba taasɛ yɛ, “Fɩnɛ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ nyɛ falɛ kanyaasɩn yɛ asɩn kyinkyinsa nɩmʋ lɩɩ?
Man gyɛ kapinta mu‐bii mʋ ndee? Man gyɛ mu‐nyi ɩ gyɛ Mɛɛrɩ mʋ? Nɩɩ man gyɛ mu‐supu ana ɩ gyɛ Gyemisi yɛ Gyosefu yɛ Simon yɛ Gyudasi mʋ?
Man gyɛ mʋ pɩɩkyɩɩ ana kpini ɩ bʋ ana asɛ nfɩɩ? Nɩɩ fɩnɛ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ kpini lɩɩ?”
Ɩmʋ sʋ ba kina kɩkɔɔlɛ mʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ kʋmaa nɩmʋ sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ katɩn kʋmaa, amɔɔ mʋ kadɛ tɔ yɛ mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ abi nkʋn asɛ nɩɩ ɔ man sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ.”
Yesu man waa asɩn kyinkyinsa gaalaagaa tʋtɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ asa mʋ ba maa man sʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ.
Saŋa maa tɔ nɩɩ owura Herodi mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩɩ Galile sʋ mʋ nu asɩn lɩɩ Yesu sʋ,
nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ kamaa abi mʋ yɛ, “N kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ Gyɔn okyugyeepu mʋ i kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ ba, ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ falɛ ɔlʋn ɛɛ waa asɩn kyinkyinsa nɩmʋ.”
Herodi nɩmʋ wʋla yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba kɩtaa Gyɔn ŋmina taa mʋ tii obu, lɩɩ Herodiya mʋ nɩɩ naafɔɔ ɔ daa ɔ gyɛ Herodi maŋa mu‐supu Filipu mʋ‐ka mʋ sʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ Gyɔn daa kyɩna ɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɩ man dɛ ɔkpa fɛɛ fʋ kɔɔlɛ fu‐supu mʋ‐ka Herodiya kili.”
Naafɔɔ Herodi daa ee biti ɔ mɔɔ Gyɔn nɩn, amaa ɔ kyɩna ɔ sɩlɛ asa mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Gyiwu abi ba wu fɛɛ Gyɔn gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ nɩn.
Amaa kakaakʋ Herodi maa kyɩna ee gyii mʋ kakɛ kʋʋgɛsa akɛ kinsigyi mʋ, Herodiya mu‐bii kyɩɩsa kyaa sa bamʋ, nɩɩ ɩ waa Herodi ɔkɔn naa kyʋn sʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ bɔ ntan tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kan tɔwɛ yɛ ee biti mʋ, ee biti ɔ sa mʋ.
Nɩɩ mu‐nyi tɔwɛ waa mʋ yɛ ɔ naa tɔwɛ Herodi yɛ, “Sa mɛ Gyɔn Okyugyeepu kumu tangɩran tɔ nfɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ.”
Asɩn mʋ ɩ tɔɔrɔɔ Owura Herodi gaa, amaa lɩɩ mʋ ntan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɔ, yɛ mʋ kinsigyi tɔ afɔ mʋ sʋ mʋ, ɔ sa kɔnɔ yɛ ba waa kanɩn sa kebii kyɩɩsa‐bi mʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ ba naa tɩn Gyɔn kumu obu tiisa mʋ tɔ.
Ba bɩya Gyɔn kumu mʋ tangɩran tɔ ba sa kebii kyɩɩsa‐bi mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa kɩmʋ naa sa mu‐nyi.
Nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba ba taa mʋ kubuni naa pula. Nɩɩ ba naa tɔwɛ Yesu.
Yesu maa nu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ waa mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa ɔkʋlɩ lɩɩ tʋtɔ mʋ nkʋn kpee opula mʋ nɩɩ i du surum. Sakyɔ mʋ ba maa nu kanɩn mʋ ba taa ayaa tɔ lɩɩ ndɛ sʋ ba mʋ asɛ.
Yesu maa kpɩlɩgɛ lɩɩ ɔkʋlɩ mʋ tɔ nɩɩ o wu asa damantɛ mʋ, bamʋ asɩn ɩ waa mʋ kʋwɛɛ nɩɩ ɔ kyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ lɔ mʋ.
Ɩmʋ kalaatɩpwɛ asɛ mʋ, mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba ba mʋ asɛ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Opula nɩmʋ bʋ kata yɛ kadɛ, nɩɩ kyɔwɛ mɔɔ tɛɛ lʋwɛ. Yɛgɛ sakyɔ mʋ ba kpee ndɛ‐bi‐ndɛ‐bi tɔ kɛ ba nyɛ naa sɔɔ agyitɔ gyii.”
Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɩ man dagaa fɛɛ ba kpee. Fanɛ nɩn fan sa bamʋ agyitɔ kɛ ba gyii.”
Nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Bodobodo anuu yɛ ɩkɩn ɩnyɔ nkʋn nɩɩ an sʋ nfɩɩ.”
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan taa ɩmʋ bɩya mɛ nfɩɩ.”

Ɔ tɔwɛ asa mʋ yɛ ba kyɩna afitiri sʋ. Ɔ taa bodobodo anuu mʋ yɛ ɩkɩn ɩnyɔ mʋ, kɩɩ sʋsʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ. Nɩɩ ɔ kpɛɛ bodobodo mʋ tɔ taa sa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ, nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ mɔɔ ba taa sa asa mʋ.
Bamʋ kpini ba gyii ŋmɛ, nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba ba tasɛ awuribi mʋ nɩɩ ba gyii san mʋ bɔla alantan kudu anyɔ.
Asa mʋ nɩɩ ba gyii bodobodo mʋ kɔnɔ ɩ waa fɛɛ anyɩn ngbɩn nnuu, yɛgɛ ba man kalɛ akyɩɩ yɛ nbii gbaa tii su.
Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ opula tɔ nɩɩ Yesu yɛgɛ nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba loo ɔkʋlɩ tɔ gyankpaa mʋ faa kpee benbe, nɩɩ ɔ sa sakyɔ mʋ ɔkpa yɛ ba natɛ.
Maa yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba kyʋn mʋ, o dii kpee kɩbɩɩ sʋ mʋ nkʋn ɔ naa kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ. Kalaatɩpwɛ asɛ mʋ, mʋ nkʋn ɩ bʋ tʋtɔ,
amaa saŋa maa tɔ mʋ ɔkʋlɩ mʋ tɛɛ wʋla fʋʋ nkyu nsana, nɩɩ afuu a maa waa mʋ, nɩɩ apaa a daa a kyenkpen ɔkʋlɩ mʋ.
Ɩ ba fʋʋ kɩbwayɩkɛ sʋ kerefi asa naa fʋʋ kerefi asiye nsana mʋ, Yesu natɛ nkyu sʋ ee kpee mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ asɛ.
Ba maa wu maa naa nkyu sʋ ɛɛ ba mʋ, bamʋ nkɔlɔ ɩ ŋmaa bamʋ. Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Obuni nɩn.” Nɩɩ ba kuusi lɩɩ fɛɛ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa bamʋ.
Amaa Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ opula tɔ yɛ, “Fan nyɛ nkɔlɔ, mɛ nɩn. Fan man sɩlɛ kufuu.”
Nɩɩ Pita lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, nɩɩ ɩ kan ɩ gyɛ fʋ mʋ, yɛgɛ n natɛ nkyu mʋ sʋ ba fʋ asɛ.”
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ba!”
Nɩɩ Pita lɩɩ ɔkʋlɩ mʋ tɔ ɔ naa nkyu mʋ sʋ ee kpee Yesu asɛ.
Amaa maa wu apaa mʋ, kufuu kɩ kɩtaa mʋ, nɩɩ o piili ee munla, nɩɩ o kuusi yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, mɔlɩgɛ mɛ!”
Opula tɔ nɩɩ Yesu tɛɛŋɛ mʋ kɩbaa kɩtaa mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fu kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii man kyɔ. Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fʋ man kɔɔlɛ gyii?”
Ba maa dii loo ɔkʋlɩ mʋ tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ afuu mʋ ɩ yɛgɛ.
Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ ɔkʋlɩ mʋ tɔ mʋ, ba muŋa sun mʋ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Kesintin, fʋ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐Bii nɩn.”
Ba maa faa ɔbʋn mʋ, nɩɩ ba naa dan Kanesareti ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.
Nɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ ba maa bɩɩ Yesu mʋ, ba sun tɔwɛ ndɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ kyaabɔɔ bamʋ mʋ kpini. Nɩɩ asa ba taa bamʋ alɔpʋ kpini ba mʋ asɛ.
Nɩɩ ba kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ, ɔ dan yɛgɛ kɛ alɔpʋ mʋ ba dan taa bamʋ abaa mata mʋ kaalɛ kɔnɔ‐bi, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba mata maŋa kpini ba nyɛ alanfɩya.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Farasii abi mʋ akʋ yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ ba lɩɩ Gyerusalem ba Yesu asɛ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ,
“Mɩnɛ waa nɩɩ fʋ abɩɩlapʋ be mee buu anɛ anaana tɔ kɩkaapʋ mʋ? Lɩɩ fɛɛ ba mɛɛ fwɩɩ bamʋ abaa pɔyɩ nɩɩ bee gyii.”
Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ lɩɩ fanɛ anaana tɔ kɩkaapʋ sʋ, fen mee buu Ɩbwaarɛ kɔnɔsa mʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Bu fʋ‐sɛ yɛ fu‐nyi’ nɩɩ ɔ bɩla yɛ, ‘Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ‐sɛ abɛɛ mu‐nyi kɔnɔ mʋ, ba mɔɔ mʋ.’
Amaa fɛn kaapʋ yɛ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan tɔwɛ mʋ‐sɛ abɛɛ mu‐nyi yɛ, ‘Kakɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ fʋ nyɛ lɩɩ mɛ asɛ mʋ, n taa waa saraga sa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ,’
ɩ man bɩla i tiri fɛɛ o buu mʋ‐sɛ yɛ mu‐nyi kɛ ɔ kɩɩ bamʋ sʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ lɩɩ fanɛ anaana tɔ kɩkaapʋ sʋ mʋ, fen mee buu Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ.
Fanɛ kebunbun ansi wuya ana! Fanɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla mʋ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Isaya sʋ tɔwɛ mʋ gyɛ kesintin. Ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ,
‘Asa nɩmʋ ba sʋ bamʋ nnɔ nɩn bɛɛ bʋnyaa mɛ
amaa bamʋ nkɔlɔ ɩ man bʋ mɛ asɛ.
Bee sun mɛ kɩyan nɩn,
lɩɩ fɛɛ nyɩmɩsa nbara nɩɩ bɛ sʋ bɛɛ kaapʋ.’ ”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɩɩ sakyɔ mʋ ba mʋ asɛ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan nu mɛ asɛ kɛ fan nu ɩmʋ kasɛ.
Man gyɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kii loo nyɩmɩsa kɔnɔ tɔ mʋ ɩɩ waa mʋ ineesi, amɔɔ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ lɩɩ mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ mʋ ɩɩ waa mʋ ineesi.”
Nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba ba mʋ asɛ nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fu nyi yɛ Farasii abi mʋ ba maa nu falɛ asɩn mʋ ɩ tɔɔrɔɔ bamʋ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Oyu kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ sʋsʋ i du kɩmʋ mʋ, ee biti o kyiigi kɩmʋ tʋʋ.
Fan man tʋwɛ bamʋ, ba du nɩn fɛɛ agyaatanapʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ gyankpaa agyaatanapʋ nɩn. Nɩɩ gyaatanapʋ kan ɛɛ gyankpaa gyaatanapʋ mʋ, bamʋ kpini bee biti ba tɩyɛ ɔbɔ tɔ.”
Nɩɩ Pita tɔwɛ yɛ, “Lɛɛ kɩŋasan maŋa kasɛ kaapʋ anɛ.”
Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɩmʋ sʋ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ man pɩɩta bugi?
Fan man nyi yɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kii loo nyɩmɩsa kɔnɔ tɔ mʋ, ii kpee mʋ ɔtɔ tɔ nɩn nɩɩ ɩɩ lɩɩ mʋ ɔpɩɩ tɔ?
Amaa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ lɩɩ mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ mʋ lɩɩ mʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ nɩn, ɩnɩmʋ ɩɩ waa nyɩmɩsa ineesi.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ nɩɩ nfɛɛrɛ libi fɛɛ, nyɩmɩsa kɩmɔɔ, yɛ kɩlɩɩ okuli abɛɛ ɔkaa kamaa, yɛ kɩkyɩɩ yɛ kɩnyɩn biti kɩgyagaa, yɛ keyu, yɛ antɩŋɛsa kɩtɩn, yɛ kɩtɔwɛ asɩn libi gyaga asa sʋ.
Ɩnɩmʋ waa nyɩmɩsa ineesi, amaa nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa mɛɛ fwɩɩ mʋ abaa nɩɩ ee gyii mʋ mɛɛ waa mʋ ineesi.”
Yesu lɩɩ tʋtɔ, nɩɩ o kpee Tayi maa Sidon ɔsʋwʋlɛ kɩbaafʋn.
Nɩɩ Kakanaan‐kyɩɩ kʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ tʋtɔ ba mʋ asɛ ɛɛ saawʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, Dawidi kanaana‐bii, wu mɛ kʋwɛɛ! Nbwɩɩ libi ba tɛ mi kebii kyɩɩsa‐bi sʋ bɛɛ tɔɔrɔɔ mʋ gaa.”
Yesu man bugi kɔnɔ tɔwɛ mʋ sɛhn. Nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba ba mʋ asɛ ba kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ, “Tɔwɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ ɔ natɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɛɛ saawʋ ee tii anɛ asʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɩsɩrayɩ abi mʋ nɩɩ ba du fɛɛ nbʋlʋpʋ fɔyɩsa mʋ, nkʋn asɛ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sun mɛ.”
Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ ba muŋa mu ansi tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, kyɛ mɛ tɔ.”
Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɩ man dagaa ba maa taa nbii agyitɔ tʋʋ sa igyoonɔ.”
Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, ɩ bʋ tɔ kanɩn, amaa igyoonɔ mʋ gbaa bee gyii agyitɔ wuribi mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ lɩɩ bamʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ ana iteeburu sʋ ɩɩ tɩyɛ kasɛ mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔkyɩɩ, fʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩ kyɔ gaa! Kanan mʋ nɩɩ fii biti mʋ ɩ waa kanɩn sa fʋ.” Nɩɩ opula maa tɔ kebii kyɩɩsa‐bi mʋ nyɛ alanfɩya.
Yesu lɩɩ tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔ naa ɔ naa Galile ɔpʋ mʋ ɩkaa sʋ. Nɩɩ o dii kpee kɩbɩɩ sʋ naa kyɩna.
Asa damantɛ ba ba mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ba bɩya alɔpʋ fɛɛ, ayaa yɛ abaa wusa wuya ana, yɛ agyaatanapʋ, yɛ aboobi, yɛ atikpiri, yɛ alɔpʋ gaalaagaa, nɩɩ ba taa bamʋ naa yɩla mu ansi tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ kyɛ bamʋ.
Asa damantɛ mʋ ba maa wu anaamuu ba maa tɔwɛ, yɛ boobi yɛ ayaa yɛ abaa wusa wuya ana ba maa natɛ, yɛ agyaatanapʋ ansi ɩ maa bugi mʋ, i kyinkyin bamʋ, nɩɩ ba yɩn Ɩsɩrayɩ abi Ɩbwaarɛ.

Yesu tɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba mʋ asɛ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Asa nɩmʋ asɩn ɩ sʋ mɛ kʋwɛɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba maa bʋ mɛ asɛ ndaga nkɛ nsa ndee ba man sʋ agyitɔ ba gyii. N mee biti fɛɛ ba taa akʋn kpewu, man gyɛ kanɩn bee biti ba lɩɩ tɩyɛ ɔkpa tɔ.”
Mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fɩnɛ nɩɩ an biti a nyɛ agyitɔ kɩkyɔ afitiri nɩmʋ tɔ sa asa damantɛ banɩmʋ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Bodobodo afɩnɛ nɩɩ fan sʋ?”
Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “An sʋ asunɔ yɛ ɩkɩn‐bi gbɛrɛɛ kʋ.”
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ asa damantɛ mʋ yɛ ba kyɩna kasɛ.
Nɩɩ ɔ taa bodobodo asunɔ mʋ yɛ ɩkɩn‐bi gbɛrɛɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ ɔ gyayɩ‐gyayɩ ɩmʋ tɔ taa sa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ba mɔɔ bamʋ ba taa sa asa mʋ
Bamʋ kpini ba gyii nɩɩ ba ŋmɛ. Nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba taasɛ ɩmʋ agyisan wuribi mʋ bɔla alantan asunɔ.
Anyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba gyii agyitɔ mʋ ba gyɛ ngbɩn nna, yɛgɛ ba man karagɛ akyɩɩ yɛ nbii tii sʋ.
Yesu maa kala sakyɔ mʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ o loo ɔkʋlɩ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ faa kpee Magadan kɩbaafʋn.
Nɩɩ Farasii abi yɛ Sadusi abi ba ba Yesu asɛ ba ba tʋʋ mʋ tɔ kɩɩ, ɩmʋ sʋ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ ɔ waa asɩn kyinkyinsa kʋ lɩɩ sʋsʋ kaapʋ bamʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Kyɔwɛ maa kpee ɔ naa tɩyɛ mʋ, fɛn taalɛ fɛn bɩɩ fɛn tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔkɛ kyɔwɛ ii biti ɔ da, lɩɩ fɛɛ abwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ ɩ payɩ kɔɔ’.

Nɩɩ nyenyenfuu mɔɔ fɛn taalɛ fɛn tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ndaga bʋlayɩ ii biti ɔ da, lɩɩ fɛɛ abwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ ɩ payɩ nɩɩ i bii tɔ.’ Fɛn taalɛ fen wu abwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ mʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ i du, nɩɩ fɛɛ lɛɛ ɩmʋ kasɛ, amaa fɛn mɛɛ taalɛ fɛn bɩɩ nkɛ nɩmʋ tɔ asɩn, kɛ fɛn lɛɛ ɩmʋ kasɛ.

Fanɛ ndaga kakyɩna nɩmʋ tɔ alibi awaapʋ mʋ nɩɩ fan kina Ɩbwaarɛ. Fɛn taasɛ fen biti asɩn kyinkyinsa lɩɩ mɛ asɛ, amaa fan man yɛ fan wu asɩn kyinkyinsa kʋ, amɔɔ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Gyona mʋ.” Yesu maa tɔwɛ kanɩn mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyʋn.
Abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba maa faa kpee benbe mʋ, ba nyiŋi fɛɛ ba man taa bodobodo.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan kɩɩ danbɩrasa, kɛ fan baa fɛn da Farasii abi yɛ Sadusi abi kɩfɛ mʋ nɩɩ kii tin bodobodo mʋ sʋ.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba piili bɛɛ tɔwɛ abaa asɛ yɛ, “A maa man bɩya bodobodo mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ kanɩn mʋ.”
Yesu maa nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ sʋ mʋ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩ man kyɔ! Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fɛn tɔwɛ, fanɛ kɩ man sʋ bodobodo asɩn?
Fan san fan man pɩɩta nu asɩn nɩmʋ kasɛ? Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n daa gyayɩ bodobodo anuu tɔ sa anyɩn ngbɩn nnuu mʋ, fen mee nyiŋi? Agyisan alantan afɩnɛ nɩɩ fan daa tasɛ bɔla mʋ?
Abɛɛ n maa daa gyayɩ bodobodo asunɔ tɔ sa asa ngbɩn nna mʋ, agyisan alantan afɩnɛ nɩɩ fan daa taasɛ bɔla mʋ?
Mɩnɛ ɩɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ fɛn mɛɛ taalɛ bɩɩ fɛɛ man gyɛ bodobodo asɩn nɩɩ n tɔwɛ? Amaa fan baa fan da fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ lɩɩ Farasii yɛ Sadusi abi kɩfɛ tinsa mʋ sʋ.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba lan nu kasɛ fɛɛ man gyɛ kɩfɛ tin agyitɔ mʋ asɩn nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ ba baa ba da sʋ, amaa Farasii yɛ Sadusi abi asɩn kaapʋsa nɩɩ ɔ dɩyɛ.
Nɩɩ Yesu kpee kabaafʋn mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ tiri Kasariya Filipi kadɛ tɔ mʋ. Maa bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ nɩɩ asa ba yɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ n gyɛ?”
Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Akʋ ba yɛ fʋ ɩ gyɛ Gyɔn Okyugyeepu mʋ, nɩɩ akʋ ba yɛ fʋ ɩ gyɛ Eligya, nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba yɛ fʋ ɩ gyɛ Gyeremiya abɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fanɔɔ fan fa? Anɩmʋ nɩɩ fan yɛ n gyɛ?”
Nɩɩ Simon Pita lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ Krisito, Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ kakpaa mʋ Mu‐Bii.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ Simon, Gyona mu‐bii! Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa fʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ man gyɛ nyɩmɩsa ɩ lɛɛ falɛ kesintin asɩn nɩmʋ kaapʋ fʋ, amaa mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ ɩ lɛɛ falɛ asɩn mʋ kaapʋ fʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ n tɔwɛ fʋ yɛ, fʋ gyɛ Pita,
nɩɩ kanɩn kɩfʋlɛ maŋa sʋ nɩɩ n biti n pɔyɩ mɛ, Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ, nɩɩ lewu gbaa mɛɛ taalɛ gyii kɩmʋ sʋ.

N biti n taa sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii ɩsafwɩɩ kpini sa fʋ. Kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fu kyula kasɛ sʋ nfɩɩ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa kyula kɩmʋ sʋsʋ. Nɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fu kina kasɛ sʋ nfɩɩ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa kina kɩmʋ sʋsʋ.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu da mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ amu tɔ yɛ, ba man kan waa tɔwɛ ɔkʋ yɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ Krisito.

Lɩɩ kanɩn saŋa maŋa ɩɩ sʋ ii kpee mʋ, Yesu piili bugi tɔ ɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “I tiri fɛɛ n maa kpee Gyerusalem naa gyii awʋrʋfɔ gaa lɩɩ abɩlɩsa, yɛ aseepu‐bɩlɩsa yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ kpini abaa tɔ. Bee biti ba mɔɔ mɛ, kɛ kakɛ sasapʋ mʋ, n kyiŋi ba nkpa tɔ.”
Nɩɩ Pita taa Yesu kpee ɩkaa sʋ tɔwɛ yii mʋ yɛ, “Afuloo! Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ! Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ taa ɩmʋ kpee kata‐kata. Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ ba fʋ sʋ kakaakʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu biliŋi tɔwɛ Pita yɛ, “Sɩtaanɛ, taa lɩɩ mɛ sʋ! Fii kun mɛ ɔkpa nɩn, lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ man gyan Ɩbwaarɛ atɔ sʋ, amɔɔ ɩ gyan nyɩmɩsa lɛɛ sʋ nɩn.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ee biti o buu mɛ mʋ, ɩ dagaa maa kina mʋ n‐yɩɩ, kɛ ɔ sʋla mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ oyu‐laasa kɛ o buu mɛ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ mɔlɩgɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ nkpa mʋ, ii biti ɔ pan ɩmʋ, amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ pan mʋ nkpa lɩɩ mɛ sʋ mʋ, ii biti o bwii nyɛ mʋ nkpa mʋ.
Nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa kan nyɛ dulinyaa tɔ kʋtɔ kʋmaa, nɩɩ ɔ pan mʋ nkpa mʋ, mɩnɛ tɔnɔ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ? Abɛɛ mɩnɛ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa ɩ taalɛ taa kyɛrɛ mʋ nkpa?
Lɩɩ fɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ n biti n baa yɛ Ɔsɛ mʋ bʋnyaa, yɛ mɛ nbɔɔ, kɛ n ba ka ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kʋkɔ lɩɩ mu kusun mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa mʋ sʋ.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin nɩn fɛɛ asa kʋ ba yɩla nfɩɩ, nɩɩ ba mɛɛ yɛ ba wu, naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba wu mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa maa ba yɛ mu kuwura‐gyii mʋ.”
Nkɛ nsiye kamaa tɔ mʋ, Yesu taa Pita yɛ Gyemisi maa mu‐supu Gyɔn, nɩɩ ba dii kpee kɩbɩɩ lala kʋ sʋ bamʋ nkʋn.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu kyɛɛgɛ bamʋ ansi sʋ. Mu ansi sʋ ɩɩ ŋalɩgɛ fɛɛ kyɔwɛ, nɩɩ mʋ atɔ bunsa ɩ kyɛɛgɛ waa parɛparɛ ɩɩ ŋalɩgɛ sʋ.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba wu Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ anyɔ, Mosesi maa Eligya ba lɩɩ opula tɔ bɛɛ tɔwɛ Yesu asɛ.
Nɩɩ Pita tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, ɩ bʋrɔn fɛɛ a maa bʋ nfɩɩ. Nɩɩ fʋ kan fii biti mʋ, n biti n yii abu asa, fʋ lɛɛ kʋkʋ, Mosesi lɛɛ kʋkʋ nɩɩ Eligya lɛɛ kʋkʋ.”

Pita maa san ɔ maa sʋ ɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ kabwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ ŋalɩgɛsa ba bun bamʋ sʋ. Nɩɩ ɔbʋlɛ kʋ tɔwɛ kabwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Ɔnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Mi‐Bii‐nyɩnsa mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ kebiti sa, nɩɩ mʋ ɩ bɔla mi ansi. Fan nu mʋ asɛ!”
Abɩɩlapʋ asa mʋ ba maa nu falɛ mʋ, kufuu kɩ kɩtaa bamʋ gaa, nɩɩ ba kyʋn bun kasɛ.
Amaa Yesu ba bamʋ asɛ taa mʋ kɩbaa mata bamʋ, tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan kʋsʋ, fan man waa kufuu.”
Ba maa kʋsʋ kɩɩ mʋ, ba man wu ɔkʋ, amɔɔ Yesu nkʋn.
Ba maa kpɩlɩgɛ kɩbɩɩ mʋ sʋ bɛɛ ba mʋ, Yesu da bamʋ amu tɔ yɛ, “Fan man tɔwɛ ɔkʋ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fan wu mʋ, naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ n kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ.”
Nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ ɩ dagaa Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Eligya maa gyankpaa ba pɔyɩ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Kesintin nɩn, ɩ dagaa Eligya maa gyankpaa ba, kɛ ɔ lɔŋɔ kʋtɔ kʋmaa yɩla o gyoo.

Amaa n tɔwɛ fanɛ nɩmʋ, Eligya tɛɛ wʋla ba nɩɩ asa ba man bɩɩ mʋ, amaa ba waa mʋ kanan kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ bee biti. Nɩɩ kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ gbaa ii biti o gyii awʋrʋfɔ bamʋ abaa tɔ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba nu kasɛ nɩn fɛɛ, Gyɔn okyugyeepu asɩn nɩɩ Yesu ɩɩ tɔwɛ ɛɛ sa bamʋ kanɩn.
Ba maa bwii ba sakyɔ mʋ asɛ mʋ, ɔnyɩn kʋ ba Yesu asɛ ba muŋa mu ansi tɔ.
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, wu mi‐bii‐nyɩnsa kʋwɛɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ gyɛ kigbingbin wuya nɩɩ ee gyii awʋrʋfɔ gaa. Ɛɛ taalɛ ɛɛ tɩyɛ fʋlɔn tɔ abɛɛ nkyu tɔ.
N taa mʋ ba fʋʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ asɛ, amaa ba man taalɛ kyɛ mʋ.”

Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “O, fanɛ ndaga kakyɩna nɩmʋ tɔ asa mʋ nɩɩ fan man sʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii, nɩɩ fanɛ ɩkpa ɩ man kyiigi! Nkɛ nfɩnɛ nɩɩ n biti n gyii fanɛ asɛ? Nɛnɛ nɩɩ n biti n bɩla nyɛ kenyiita sa fanɛ? Fan taa kebii mʋ bɩya mɛ nfɩɩ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu pʋntɛ kabwɩɩ libi mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ kɩ kʋsʋ kebii‐nyɩnsa mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ opula maŋa tɔ ɔ nyɛ alanfɩya.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba ba Yesu asɛ bamʋ nkʋn ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ an man taalɛ gyan kabwɩɩ libi mʋ lɩɩ kebii‐nyɩnsa mʋ sʋ?”

Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Lɩɩ fɛɛ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩ maa man kyɔ mʋ sʋ. N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin tɔ fɛɛ, nɩɩ fan kan fan sʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii pii fɛɛ masitadi oyu kibi gbaa mʋ, fɛn taalɛ tɔwɛ kɩbɩɩ nɩmʋ yɛ, ‘Kʋsʋ lɩɩ nfɩɩ kpee falɛ’ kɛ kɩ kʋsʋ. Sɛhn man bʋ tɔ nɩɩ fɛn mɛɛ taalɛ waa.”
(Amaa amɔɔ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ yɛ noŋmina ɩɩ taalɛ waa falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ kedubi.)
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ kpini ba ba Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ, Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Bee biti ba lɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ waa asa abaa tɔ.
Bee biti ba mɔɔ mɛ, kɛ kakɛ sasapʋ mʋ, n kyiŋi ba nkpa tɔ.” Abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba maa nu kanɩn mʋ, bamʋ nkɔlɔ i nyita bamʋ gaa.
Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba maa ba Kapanum kadɛ tɔ mʋ, kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ tʋʋtʋʋ akɔɔlɛpʋ mʋ ba ba Pita asɛ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ ɔkaapʋpʋ ɩɩ ka kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ tʋʋtʋʋ mʋ?”
Nɩɩ Pita lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɛɛhn, ɛɛ ka.”

Pita maa ba kɩkpaara sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu daa kɩtaasɛ yɛ, “Simon fʋ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ gyɛ nɛnɛ? Bamɔɔ asɛ nɩɩ dulinyaa tɔ awura bɛɛ kɔɔlɛ bamʋ kagya kasɛ tʋʋtʋʋ? Bɛɛ kɔɔlɛ bɛɛ lɩɩ bamʋ gbaa‐gbaa bamʋ‐bii ana asɛ nɩn abɛɛ afɔ asɛ?”
Pita lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Bɛɛ kɔɔlɛ bɛɛ lɩɩ afɔ asɛ nɩn.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ Pita yɛ, “Kanɩn bɩrɛ ndɛ‐bii ba man tii sʋ.

Amaa a maa mee biti a maa waa bamʋ agbʋ sʋ mʋ, kpee ɔpʋ tɔ naa tʋʋ fʋ darʋwa. Ɔkɩn mʋ nɩɩ fii biti fʋ daa kɩkɩta mʋ, bugi mʋ kɔnɔ, fii biti fu wu kederebi mʋ nɩɩ kii biti kɩ fʋʋ maa fʋ tʋʋtʋʋ. Kɛ fʋ taa naa ka bamʋ.”
Kanɩn saŋa maŋa tɔ mʋ, abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba ba Yesu asɛ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Anɛ tɔ mʋ, anɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔkparɛ sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɩɩ kebii pii kʋ ba yɩlɛ bamʋ nsana‐nsana.
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin nɩn fɛɛ, fan dan fan man kyɛɛgɛ kɛ fan waa fɛɛ nbii pii‐pii mʋ, fɛn mɛɛ yɛ fan loo sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ kakaakʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɩya mʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ fɛɛ kebii pii nɩmʋ mʋ, ɩ gyɛ ɔkparɛ sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ.
“Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ kebii pii fɛɛ ɔnɩmʋ mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ mʋ, ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ nɩmʋ.
Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ kan bɔla mʋ sʋ, kɛ nbii mʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii falɛ tɔ ɔkʋ waa alibi mʋ, ɩ bɔ sa mʋ fɛɛ ba taa kubuu lala ŋmina mʋ ɔbʋlɛ tɔ naa tʋʋ ɔpʋ bunkyinsa tɔ.
“Dulinya nɩmʋ tɔ asa, bamʋ laakʋ! Lɩɩ fɛɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩyɛ bamʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ gyii tɔ mʋ, ɩ nyɛ akyɔ. Falɛ atɔ ii biti ɩ ba, amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ bɔla mʋ sʋ ba mʋ, mʋ laakʋ.

Nɩɩ fʋ kɩbaa abɛɛ fʋ kɩyaa ɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fɩɩ waa alibi mʋ, tɩn kɩmʋ tʋʋ. Ɩ bʋrɔn sa fʋ fɛɛ fʋ maa taa kɩbaa abɛɛ kɩyaa dɩyɛ loo nkpa kakpaa tɔ, ɩ kyɔ fʋ maa sʋ abaa anyɔ yɛ ayaa anyɔ kɛ ba taa fʋ tʋʋ fʋlɔn mʋ nɩɩ ki mee dun kakaakʋ mʋ tɔ.
Nɩɩ fu kinsi ɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fʋ waa alibi mʋ, kyɔlɛ kɩmʋ tʋʋ. Ɩ bʋrɔn sa fʋ fɛɛ fʋ maa taa kinsi kʋlʋn loo nkpa kakpaa tɔ, ɩ kyɔ fʋ maa sʋ ansi anyɔ kɛ ba taa fʋ tʋʋ awʋrʋfɔ fʋlɔn yen‐yen tɔ.”
