Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan baa fan da sʋ kɛ fan man kɩɩ apii‐pii mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ fɛɛ ɔ man gyɛ sɛhn. N tɔwɛ fanɛ fɛɛ bamʋ nbɔɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ, ii wu mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ sʋsʋ mu ansi tɔ saŋa kʋmaa.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ ba nɩn kɛ n ba mɔlɩgɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba fɔyɩ mʋ.”

Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn kʋ kan ɔ sʋ nbʋlʋpʋ kɩlɩfa, nɩɩ bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋlʋn fɔyɩ mʋ, mɩnɛ nɩɩ fii nyi maa biti ɔ waa? Ɔ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ yɛgɛ adɩkpanɔ yɛ akpanɔ mʋ kɩbɩɩ ɔbʋlɛ tɔ, kɛ ɔ naa biti ɔkʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ fɔyɩ mʋ abɛɛ?
N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin tɔ nɩɩ fɛɛ, nɩɩ ɔ kan wu mʋ mʋ, mu ansi ii biti i gyii mʋ sʋ, ɩ kyɔ adɩkpanɔ yɛ akpanɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba man fɔyɩ mʋ.
Kanɩn ɔkpa maŋa sʋ nɩɩ fanɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ gbaa mee biti fɛɛ apii‐pii nɩmʋ tɔ ɔkʋlʋn maa fɔyɩ.
“Nɩɩ fu‐supu abɛɛ fʋ‐daa kan waa fʋ alibi mʋ, kpee mʋ asɛ naa lɛɛ mu alibi mʋ kaapʋ mʋ fanɛ asa nyɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ kan nu kasɛ sa fʋ mʋ, fʋ bɩla bɩya mʋ ba ɔkpa danbɩrasa mʋ sʋ nɩmʋ.

Amaa nɩɩ ɔ man kan nu sa mʋ, biti nyɩmɩsa kʋlʋn abɛɛ asa anyɔ tii fʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kɛ fen kpee mʋ asɛ. Saamʋ, asɩn mʋ ɩ nyɛ yɩlɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɩ dagaa asɩn kʋmaa ɩ nyɛ asa anyɔ abɛɛ asa asá be gyii ɩmʋ adansɛ.’
Nɩɩ ɔ man kan bɩla nu sa bamʋ mʋ, taa asɩn mʋ naa tʋʋ Krisito kʋbʋ mu ansi tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla kina kunu sa bamʋ bɩrɛ, taa mʋ fɛɛ ɔdakpa osunpu abɛɛ apoo lenpoo ɔkɔɔlɛpʋ.
“N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ, kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fan ŋmina kasɛ sʋ nfɩɩ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti o ŋmina kɩmʋ sʋsʋ, nɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fan kina kasɛ sʋ nfɩɩ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti o kina kɩmʋ sʋsʋ.
“N bɩla n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, nɩɩ fanɛ tɔ anyɔ ba kan waa kɔnɔ kʋlʋn kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ bee biti kʋtɔ kʋ mʋ, Mɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ ii biti ɔ waa sa bamʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ katɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ asa anyɔ abɛɛ asa asá ba gyaŋɛ mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ mʋ, n bʋ bamʋ asɛ.”
Nɩɩ Pita ba Yesu asɛ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, ɩlɩɩ ɩfɩnɛ nɩɩ mɛ‐bɩrɩsa waa mɛ alibi nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ n taa kɛɛ mʋ? Ilii isunɔ abɛɛ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ayee, man gyɛ ɩlɩɩ isunɔ, amaa adusunɔ kanɩn ɩlɩɩ isunɔ.
“Lɩɩ fɛɛ sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ du nɩn fɛɛ owura kʋ maa biti mʋ ayaafɔlɛ ba ba kaapʋ mʋ akɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ mʋ.
Maa piili ɛɛ taasɛ mʋ akɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ba taa ɔnyɩn kʋ bɩya mʋ. Ɔnyɩn mʋ sʋ owura mʋ kʋkɔ afulee nderebi ngbɩn‐ngbɩn.
Maa man taalɛ ka mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ owura mʋ yɛ, ba taa maa mʋ‐ka yɛ mu‐bii ana yɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ mʋ naa fɛ kɛ ba ba ka kʋkɔ mʋ.
“Nɩɩ kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ kyʋn muŋa mu amulii sʋ kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Ɔbɩlɩsa, nyɛ kenyiita sa mɛ, n biti n ka fʋ kʋkɔ maŋa kpini.’
Nɩɩ kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ asɩn ɩ waa mʋ owura mʋ kʋwɛɛ, nɩɩ ɔ taa kʋkɔ mʋ kpini kɛɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɔ natɛ.
“Amaa kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ maa lɩɩ mʋ, ɔ naa wu mʋ bɩrɩsa kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ nɩɩ mɔɔ mʋ ɔ sʋ mu afulee nderebi kɩlɩfa. Nɩɩ ɔ naa kɩtaa mʋ ɔbʋlɛ tɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Ka mɛ kʋkɔ mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sʋ mɛ.’
“Nɩɩ mʋ bɩrɩsa kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ muŋa mu amulii sʋ kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Nyɛ kenyiita sa mɛ, n biti n ka kʋkɔ mʋ kpini.’
“Amaa o kina mʋ bɩrɩsa maŋa kɩkʋlɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ naa tii obu naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ nyɛ afulee ba ka mʋ kʋkɔ mʋ.
Mʋ bɩrɩsa ayaafɔlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba san mʋ ba maa wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa mʋ bɩrɩsa mʋ, ɩ tɔɔrɔɔ bamʋ gaa nɩɩ ba naa tɔwɛ asɩn mʋ kpini sa bamʋ owura mʋ.
“Tʋtɔ nɩɩ owura mʋ tɩɩ mʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ maŋa ba nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Fʋ gyɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ kumu tɔ ɔlʋn wuya. N taa fʋ kʋkɔ kpini nɩmʋ kɛɛ fʋ, kpalɩ fɛɛ fʋ maa kʋlɛ mɛ sʋ.
Ɩ man dagaa fʋ gbaa fʋ maa wu fʋ bɩrɩsa mʋ kʋwɛɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ngbaa mɛ n wu fʋ kʋwɛɛ mʋ?’
Tʋtɔ mʋ ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ nyɛ agbʋ gaa, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ naa tii obu yɛ ba nyanla mʋ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ ka kʋkɔ mʋ kpini.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Falɛ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ ii biti ɔ waa fanɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ, amɔɔ fʋ kan taa fʋ bɩrɩsa alibi kɛɛ mʋ lɩɩ fʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ mʋ.”
Yesu maa tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ lʋwɛ mʋ ɔ lɩɩ Galile kpee Gyudeya kɩbaafʋn, Gyɔdan ɔpʋ mʋ benbe.
Asa damantɛ ba buu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyɛ bamʋ alɔ tʋtɔ.
Nɩɩ Farasii abi akʋ ba ba mʋ asɛ ba ba tʋʋ mʋ tɔ kɩɩ. Ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɩ dɛ ɔkpa sa ɔnyɩn fɛɛ ɔ yɩlɛ asɩn kʋmaa nɩmʋ sʋ kina mʋ‐ka?”
Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fan man karagɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ wu fɛɛ, ‘Lɩɩ npiili asɛ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ waa bamʋ ɔnyɩn yɛ ɔkyɩɩ’ nɩn abɛɛ?
Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Lɩɩ falɛ sʋ, ɔnyɩn ii biti ɔ yɛgɛ mu‐nyi yɛ mʋ‐sɛ, kɛ maa mʋ‐ka ba bʋga kɛ bamʋ anyɔ ba waa kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kʋlʋn?’
Ɩmʋ sʋ ba man bɩla ba gyɛ anyɔ, amaa ba gyɛ nyɩmɩsa kʋlʋn. Kanɩn sʋ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa bʋga waa kʋkʋlʋn mʋ, ɔkʋ ɔ man barɩgɛ ɩmʋ tɔ.”
Nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ Mosesi sa kɔnɔ yɛ ɔnyɩn ɩ taalɛ sa mʋ‐ka kekili kikina ɔwʋlɛ kɛ o kina mʋ?”
Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mosesi sa fanɛ ɔkpa yɛ fan kina fanɛ‐ka ana, lɩɩ fɛɛ fanɛ nkɔlɔ ɩ bʋlʋn nɩn. Amaa man gyɛ falɛ nɩɩ ɩ kyɩna i du lɩɩ npiili asɛ mʋ.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ yɛ ɔkyɩɩ lɩɩ mu‐kuli kamaa, nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ kina mʋ naa kili ɔkyɩɩ pʋpwɛ mʋ, ɔnyɩn mʋ nyita kekili.”
Mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Nɩɩ ɩ kan ɩ gyɛ kanɩn nɩɩ i du okuli maa ɔkaa nsana mʋ bɩrɛ, nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa man kili gbaa ɩ bɔ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Man gyɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɩ taalɛ kɔɔlɛ falɛ asɩn kyula, amɔɔ bamʋ nɩɩ ba taa asɩn mʋ sa bamʋ nkʋn.

Anyɩn akʋ ba bʋ tɔ nɩɩ be mee taalɛ kili, lɩɩ fɛɛ kanɩn nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ bamʋ, nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ asa ɩ waa bamʋ kanɩn, nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba kina kekili lɩɩ sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ kusun sʋ. Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ kɔɔlɛ kɩkaapʋ nɩmʋ kyula mʋ, ɔ kɔɔlɛ.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ asa kʋ ba taa nbii wuribi ba Yesu asɛ yɛ ɔ taa mʋ abaa gyaga bamʋ sʋ, kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ sa bamʋ. Amaa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba gya asa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ bɩya bamʋ mʋ.
Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ nbii wuribi mʋ ba ba mɛ asɛ, fan man tii bamʋ ɔkpa, lɩɩ fɛɛ sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ kɩ gyɛ sa asa mʋ nɩɩ be du fɛɛ nbii‐wuribi mʋ lɛɛ nɩn.”
Maa taa mʋ abaa gyaga bamʋ sʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ tʋtɔ kyʋn.
Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn kʋ ba Yesu asɛ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, mɩnɛ kʋtɔ danbɩrasa nɩɩ ɩ dagaa n maa waa kɛ n nyɛ nkpa kakpaa?”
Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ taasɛ mɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋrɔn sʋ? Ɔkʋ man gyɛ ɔdanbɩrasa, amɔɔ Ɩbwaarɛ nkʋn. Nɩɩ fii biti fʋ nyɛ nkpa kakpaa mʋ, buu Mosesi nbara mʋ.”
Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ taasɛ yɛ, “Ɩmɔɔ?” Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “ ‘Man mɔɔ, man lɩɩ fʋ‐ka abɛɛ fu‐kuli kamaa, man yuuri, man yɩlɛ antɩŋɛsa kamaa,
buu fʋ‐sɛ yɛ fu‐nyi,’ kɛ ‘fu biti fʋ bɩrɩsa fɛɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ.’ ”
Nɩɩ kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “N buu ɩnɩmʋ kpini. Mɩnɛ kʋtɔ ɩ san mɛ?”
Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fʋ kan fii biti yɛ fʋ baa fu du kyɛɛkyɛɛ bɩrɛ, kpee naa fɛ fʋ atɔ kpini kɛ fʋ taa afulee mʋ sa atiripu, fii biti fʋ nyɛ kapatɩyɛ sʋsʋ, kɛ fʋ lan ba buu mɛ.”
Ɔnyɩn mʋ maa nu falɛ mʋ ɩ tɔɔrɔɔ mʋ gaa, nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ tʋtɔ kyʋn lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ sʋ atɔ gaa.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, ɩ bʋlʋn sa atɔ wuya fɛɛ o loo sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ.
N bɩla n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, ɩ bʋpɔɔ sa nyɔɔma fɛɛ o loo baasa ɔbɔ
tɔ ɩ kyɔ atɔ wuya o loo Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ.”
Abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba maa nu kanɩn mʋ, i kyinkyin bamʋ gaa nɩɩ ba taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Kanɩn bɩrɛ anɩmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ mɔlɩgɛ nɩmʋ?”
Yesu kɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nyɩmɩsa asɛ bɩrɛ ɩnɩmʋ ɩ mɛɛ taalɛ waa, amaa Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ bɩrɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ ɩ taalɛ waa.”
Pita lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Kɩɩ! A maa yɛgɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ an buu fʋ falɛ, mɩnɛ nɩɩ an biti a nyɛ?”

Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kan bun dulinyaa pʋpwɛ, nɩɩ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa kyɩna mɛ bʋnyaa kuwura‐gya mʋ sʋ, fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan buu mɛ mʋ gbaa, fen biti fan kyɩna nwuragya kudu anyɔ sʋ, kɛ fan gyii Ɩsɩrayɩ nbunɔ kudu anyɔ mʋ sʋ kuwura.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ akpaara, abɛɛ pɩɩkyɩɩ, abɛɛ mʋ‐sɛ, abɛɛ mu‐nyi, abɛɛ mu‐bii ana, abɛɛ adɔɔ lɩɩ mɛ sʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ nyɛ ɩmʋ ɩlɩɩ kɩlɩfa, kɛ ɔ bɩla nyɛ nkpa kakpaa.
Amaa asa gaalaagaa mʋ nɩɩ ba gyankpaa mʋ, bee biti be sii kamaa, nɩɩ asa gaalaagaa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ kamaa mʋ, bee biti ba ba gyankpaa.”
Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ ki du nɩn fɛɛ ɔnyɩn kʋ maa kʋsʋ kakaakʋ nyenyenfuu, ɔ naa biti asa kɛ ba sun kusun mʋ ndɔɔ tɔ.
Maa naa nyɛ bamʋ mʋ, nɩɩ maa bamʋ ba tɔwɛ kyula abaa yɛ ee biti ɔ ka bamʋ kederebi kʋlʋn kakɛ kʋlʋn ibiri mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa bamʋ kpee mʋ ndɔɔ tɔ.
“Kyɔwɛ maa waa fɛɛ kerefi akpanɔ mʋ, ɔ bɩla kpee kadɛ mʋ kɩgya asɛ naa wu akʋ ba maa yɩlɛ ba mɛɛ waa sɛhn.
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, ‘Fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fan kpee naa waa kusun mɛ ndɔɔ tɔ, kɛ n ka fanɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ dagaa.’
Nɩɩ ba kpee.
“Kyɔwɛ amu nsana yɛ kerefi asa tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ bɩla taa akʋ kpee kanɩn.
Kalaatɩpwɛ sʋ kyɔwɛ maa tɩyɛ ɛɛ mata afatɛɛ tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ bɩla kpee naa wu akʋ ba maa yɩlɛ ba mɛɛ waa sɛhn. Nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, ‘Mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ fan yɩlɛ nfɩɩ kakɛ ibiri nɩɩ fan man sʋ kusun.’
“Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Ɔkʋ man taa anɛ yɛ a naa sun sa mʋ.’
“Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, ‘Kanɩn bɩrɛ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fan ba kyʋn kpee naa waa kusun mɛ ndɔɔ tɔ.’
“Kalaatɩpwɛ maa fʋʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ndɔɔ wuya mʋ tɔwɛ asunpu mʋ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ yɛ, ‘Tɩɩ asunpu mʋ, kɛ fʋ ka bamʋ kʋkɔ. Piili lɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba sii kamaa ba mʋ sʋ naa fʋʋ bamʋ nɩɩ ba gyankpaa ba mʋ.’
“Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ asunpu mʋ nɩɩ ba kpee ndɔɔ mʋ tɔ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ kyɔwɛ mata afatɛɛ tɔ mʋ, ba ba kɔɔlɛ kederebi kʋlʋn‐kʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ kakɛ ibiri kʋkɔka.
Ɩ maa fʋʋ agyankpaapʋ mʋ sʋ mʋ, be nyi fɛɛ bee biti ba nyɛ ba kyɔ kamaa tɔ wuya ana mʋ, amaa ngbaa bamʋ kederebi kʋlʋn‐kʋlʋn maŋa nɩɩ ba nyɛ.
Ba maa kɔɔlɛ kederebi kʋlʋn‐kʋlʋn mʋ, nɩɩ be piili bɛɛ kɔlɩtɛ bɛɛ sa ndɔɔ wuya mʋ yɛ,
‘Bamʋ nɩɩ ba sii kamaa ba falɛ bɩrɛ, saŋa gbɛrɛɛ nɩɩ ba sun kusun, yɛgɛ anɛɛnɛ bɩrɛ an yɩlɛ kyɔwɛ kenken nɩmʋ sʋ waa kusun ibiri. Amaa ana bamʋ kpini nɩɩ fʋ ka kyɛɛkyɛɛ?’
“Nɩɩ kadɔɔ wuya mʋ lɛɛ bamʋ ɔkʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Kyɛmɩnɛ, n man sisii fʋ. Man gyɛ kederebi kʋlʋn kʋkɔka nɩɩ maa fʋ an tɔwɛ kyula kakɛ ibiri kusun?
Ɩmʋ sʋ taa fu kederebi natɛ. Kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ pɩrɛ mɛ yɛ n ka asii‐amaapʋ mʋ, kanɩn nɩɩ maŋa nɩɩ n biti n ka fʋ gbaa.
N man sʋ ɔkpa fɛɛ n waa mɛ kɔkɔlɔ biti lɩɩ mɛ afulee sʋ abɛɛ? Abɛɛ fʋ sʋ kayɩɩ basa lɩɩ mɛ kɩdanbɩrasa kɩwaa sʋ nɩn?’ ”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Asii‐amaapʋ bee biti ba biliŋi agyankpaapʋ kɛ agyankpaapʋ ba biliŋi asii‐amaapʋ.”
Yesu maa kpee Gyerusalem mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ lɩɩ ɩkaa sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ,
“Fan nu! An kpee Gyerusalem nɩmʋ, tʋtɔ nɩɩ bee biti ba naa lɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ sa aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ. Kɛ ba bun mɛ lewu kʋpwɛ,
kɛ ba taa mɛ waa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ abaa tɔ, kɛ ba waa mɛ ɩbasasɩn kɛ ba tɩŋɛ mɛ, kɛ ba da mɛ mata oyu laasa sʋ. Amaa nkɛ nsa akɛ mʋ, n biti n kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ.”
Nɩɩ Sebedi mʋ‐ka maa mu‐bii ana anyɩnsa anyɔ mʋ ba ba Yesu asɛ, nɩɩ bamʋ‐nyi ba muŋa Yesu ayaa tɔ kʋlɛ mʋ kʋtɔ kʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nɩɩ fii biti?” Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Kyula sa mɛ fɛɛ, mi nbii nnyɔ nɩmʋ, ɔkʋ ɔ kyɩna fu‐gyisa sʋ kɛ ɔkʋ mɔɔ ɔ kyɩna fʋ‐bɩna sʋ fu kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan man nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fɛn kʋlɛ falɛ. Fɛn taalɛ gyii awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ n biti n gyii mʋ?”
Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɛɛhn, an taalɛ.”

Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fɛn taalɛ gyii awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ n biti n gyii mʋ, amaa n man sʋ ɔkpa fɛɛ n lɛɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ kyɩna mi‐gyisa sʋ abɛɛ mɛ‐bɩna sʋ. Ɩkyɩnakpa ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ sa bamʋ nɩɩ mɛ‐Sɛ wʋla lɔŋɔ yɩla sa bamʋ mʋ.”
Abɩɩlapʋ kudu mʋ nɩɩ ba san mʋ, ba maa nu ɩnɩmʋ mʋ, ba nyɛ agbʋ waa Gyemisi maa mu‐supu Gyɔn.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɩɩ bamʋ ba bʋga nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fen nyi fɛɛ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ agyankpaapʋ mʋ bɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ ɔlʋn asa sʋ, nɩɩ alʋlʋnpʋ gbaa bɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ ɔlʋn asa sʋ.
Amaa fanɛɛ fanɛ tɔ bɩrɛ, ɩ man dagaa ɩ maa waa kanɩn. Nɩɩ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ kan ii biti kɩbɩlɩsa mʋ, ɩ dagaa maa waa fanɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ,
nɩɩ fanɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti fɛɛ ɔ waa ɔgyankpaapʋ mʋ, ɩ dagaa maa waa fanɛ kɩnyɛ,
fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa gbaa n man ba nɩn kɛ ba sun mɛ, amaa n ba nɩn kɛ n ba sun, kɛ n taa mɛ nkpa kɛɛ, kɛ ɩ ka asa gaalaagaa alibi kʋkɔ.”
Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba maa lɩɩ Gyeriko kadɛ tɔ mʋ, asa gaalaagaa ba buu bamʋ.
Tʋtɔ mʋ, agyaatanapʋ anyɔ kʋ ba tɛ ɔkpakaa, nɩɩ ba nu fɛɛ Yesu ɩɩ kyʋn mʋ, ba kuusi tɩɩ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, Dawidi kanaana‐bii, wu anɛ kʋwɛɛ?”
Nɩɩ asa mʋ ba pʋntɛ bamʋ sʋ yɛ ba bun bamʋ nnɔ sʋ, amaa ba kuusi kenken yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, Dawidi kanaana‐bii, wu anɛ kʋwɛɛ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu yɩlɛ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ bamʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nɩɩ fen biti fɛɛ n waa sa fanɛ?”
Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, an biti fɛɛ anɛ ansi i bugi nɩn.”
Nɩɩ Yesu wu bamʋ kʋwɛɛ nɩɩ ɔ mata bamʋ ansi. Opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ bamʋ ansi i bugi nɩɩ ba buu Yesu.
Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba maa tiri Gyerusalem tɔ, nɩɩ ba fʋʋ Betifage kadɛ tɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Olifu kɩbɩɩ‐bi mʋ asɛ mʋ, Yesu sun mʋ abɩɩlapʋ anyɔ,
nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fen kpee kadɛ‐bi mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ fanɛ ansi tɔ mʋ, fen biti fen wu kuruma kʋ maa kyaa tʋtɔ maa mu‐bii. Fan saŋɛ bamʋ bɩya mɛ.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan taasɛ fanɛ kʋtɔ kʋ mʋ, fan tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu ii biti bamʋ.’ Nɩɩ ee biti ɔ yɛgɛ fan taa bamʋ bɩya mɛ.”
Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ waa kanɩn nɩn kɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla mʋ ɔtɔwɛpʋ sʋ tɔwɛ yɩla mʋ ɩ ba tɔ. Asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ,
“Tɔwɛ Siyon abii mʋ yɛ,
‘Fan kɩɩ, fanɛ owura ɩɩ ba fanɛ asɛ,
O du bɔhn nɩɩ ɔ tɛ kuruma sʋ,
kesintin tɔ ɔ tɛ kuruma kadanba sʋ.’ ”
Mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba naa waa fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Yesu sa bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ ba waa mʋ.
Ba taa kuruma yɛ mu‐bii mʋ ba, nɩɩ ba taa bamʋ atɔ bunsa gyaga bamʋ sʋ, nɩɩ Yesu dii kyɩna kadanba mʋ sʋ.
Asa damantɛ ba taa bamʋ atɔ bunsa tʋʋ kigbenbi sʋ, nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba kyatɛ iyu n‐yaabi wʋrɩgɛ kigbenbi mʋ sʋ.
Asa damantɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ mu ansi tɔ mʋ, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba buu mʋ mʋ bee kuusi bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ,
“Hosana
ɩ gyɛ sa Owura Dawidi kanaana‐bii mʋ.”
“Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa ɔmʋnɩ ɛɛ ba Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kɩtɩɩ mʋ sʋ!”
“Hosana ɩ gyɛ sa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ sʋsʋ.”
Yesu maa loo Gyerusalem kadɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, kadɛ mʋ kpini kɔɔlɛ ɔlanba, nɩɩ asa bɛɛ taasɛ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ nɩn?”
Nɩɩ sakyɔ mʋ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Yesu, Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Nasareti kadɛ tɔ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Galile kɩbaafʋn mʋ.”
Yesu loo kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ opula, nɩɩ ɔ gya asa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ fɛ, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ sɔɔ mʋ kpini lɩɩ tʋtɔ. Ɔ bala afulee akyɛrɛpʋ mʋ iteeburu yɛ alɔpɔ afɛpʋ mʋ ibenkyii bun.
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ, ‘Bee biti ba tɩɩ mɛ kɩkpaara yɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛkpa’, amaa fan taa tʋtɔ biliŋi bamʋ nɩɩ bee yuuri ɔlʋn sʋ ɔbaalakpa.”
Agyaatanapʋ yɛ ayaa yɛ abaa wusa wuya ana ba ba mʋ asɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ kyɛ bamʋ alɔ.
Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu abɩlɩsa yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ ba maa wu atɔ kyinkyinsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa, yɛ nbii mʋ kikuusi kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Hosana ɩ gyɛ sa Dawidi mʋ kanaana‐bii mʋ”, nɩɩ ba nyɛ agbʋ.
Nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fu nu asɩn mʋ nɩɩ nbii mʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ “Ɛɛhn, fan man pɩɩta kalɛ lɩɩ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ,
‘Fʋ kaapʋ nbii yɛ nbii wuribi yɛ
ba yɩn fʋ.’ ”
Nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ tʋtɔ kpee Betani kadɛ tɔ nɩɩ ɔ dɛ tʋtɔ.
Lɩɩ kaakɛ nyenyenfuu Yesu maa bwii ee kpee Gyerusalem mʋ, akʋn ɩɩ mɔɔ mʋ.
Maa wu figi oyu maa yɩlɛ ɔkpa kaa mʋ o kpee kɩmʋ asɛ, amaa ɔ man wu sɛhn kɩmʋ sʋ amɔɔ afatɛɛ nkʋn. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ kɩmʋ yɛ, “Fʋ man bɩla yɛ fʋ sɔyɩ abi kpini‐kpini!” Opula tɔ nɩɩ oyu mʋ wʋlɛ.
Abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba maa wu kanɩn mʋ, i kyinkyin bamʋ. Nɩɩ ba taasɛ yɛ, “Nɛnɛ sʋ nɩɩ figi oyu mʋ wʋlɛ bilen kanɩn?”

Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, nɩɩ fan kan kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii, nɩɩ fan man gyii ɩmɔɔrɛ mʋ, man gyɛ yɛ fen biti fan taalɛ waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ waa figi oyu nɩmʋ nkʋn. Amaa fɛn taalɛ tɔwɛ kɩbɩɩ nɩmʋ yɛ, ‘Kʋsʋ lɩɩ nfɩɩ naa tɩyɛ ɔpʋ tɔ,’ kɛ ɩ waa kanɩn.
Nɩɩ fan kan kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii mʋ, fen biti fan nyɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ tɔ mʋ.”

Yesu loo kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ. Maa bʋ tʋtɔ ɛɛ kaapʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu abɩlɩsa yɛ kadɛ mʋ abɩlɩsa ba ba mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɔlʋn nɩɩ fʋ sʋ fɩɩ waa atɔ nɩmʋ? Nɩɩ anɩmʋ ɩ sa fʋ falɛ ɔlʋn.”
Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ngbaa mɛ n biti n taasɛ fanɛ asɩn kʋ, nɩɩ fan kan lɛɛ mɛ kɔnɔ mʋ, n biti n tɔwɛ fanɛ ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ n waa ɩnɩmʋ.

Gyɔn kekyugyee mʋ, fɩnɛ nɩɩ kɩ lɩɩ? Ɩ kyɩna lɩɩ sʋsʋ nɩn abɛɛ ɩ lɩɩ asa asɛ nɩn?” Ba tɔwɛ bamʋ wʋlɛ‐wʋlɛ tɔ yɛ, “Nɩɩ an kan tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Kɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ nɩn’, ee biti ɔ taasɛ anɛ yɛ, ‘Nɩɩ mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fan man kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii?’
Amaa an kan tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Kɩ lɩɩ asa asɛ mʋ’, an sɩlɛ asa mʋ kufuu, lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ kpini ba kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ Gyɔn kyɩna ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ nɩn.”
Ɩmʋ sʋ ba lɛɛ Yesu kɔnɔ yɛ, “A man nyi.”
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Kanɩn bɩrɛ ngbaa mɛ, n mɛɛ yɛ n tɔwɛ fanɛ ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ n waa ɩnɩmʋ.”

Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɩmʋ nɩɩ n biti n tɔwɛ falɛ, nɛnɛ ɩ gyɛ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ? Ɔnyɩn kʋ ɩ kyɩna ɔ bʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ nbii‐nyɩnsa anyɔ. O kpee ɔgyankpaapʋ mʋ asɛ naa tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Mi‐bii, ndaga kpee mɛ kadɔɔ mʋ tɔ naa sun kusun.’
“Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘N mɛɛ yɛ n kpee.’ Amaa kamaa tɔ mʋ ɔ kyɛɛgɛ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ nɩɩ o kpee.
“Nɩɩ ɔsɛ mʋ kpee mu‐bii banban mʋ asɛ naa tɔwɛ mʋ kanɩn asɩn kʋlʋn maŋa. Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Nsɛ, n biti n kpee.’ Amaa ɔ man kpee.
“Bamʋ anyɔ maŋa, anɩmʋ ɩ waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ mʋ‐sɛ ii biti?”
Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔgyankpaapʋ mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, apoo lenpoo akɔɔlɛpʋ yɛ agyamilo‐kyɩɩ bɛɛ gyankpaa fanɛ bee loo Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ.

Lɩɩ fɛɛ Gyɔn ba fanɛ asɛ nɩn yɛ ɔ ba kaapʋ fanɛ ɩkpa kyiigisa ɔkpa, nɩɩ fan man kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii, amaa lenpoo akɔɔlɛpʋ yɛ agyamilo‐kyɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii. Nɩɩ halɩɩ fan maa wu ɩnɩmʋ kamaa tɔ mʋ, fan man yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa kɛ fan kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii.”

Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan bɩla nu kɩŋasan kʋ. Ɔnyɩn kʋ kyɩna dɔɔ oyu sɔyɩ abisa. Nɩɩ o ŋmina iyu kyaabɔɔ kɩmʋ, nɩɩ o kuu wayɩn ɔnyɩyɛkpa ɔbɔ kʋdɔɔ mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ pɔyɩ opula mʋ nɩɩ akɩɩsʋpʋ bee dii bɛɛ kɩɩ kʋdɔɔ mʋ sʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ taa kʋdɔɔ mʋ waa paa agyipu kʋ abaa tɔ, nɩɩ o kpee ɔsʋwʋlɛ kʋ sʋ.
Kɩtɩŋɛ saŋa maa fʋʋ mʋ, nɩɩ o sun mʋ ayaafɔlɛ yɛ ba kpee paa agyipu mʋ asɛ naa kɔɔlɛ mu ogyikpa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ nyɛ mʋ bɩya mʋ.
“Nɩɩ paa agyipu mʋ ba kɩtaa mʋ ayaafɔlɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ba dayɩ ɔkʋ, nɩɩ ba mɔɔ ɔkʋ, nɩɩ ba twɩɩ ɔsasapʋ mʋ abuu.
Nɩɩ o bwii sun mʋ ayaafɔlɛ akʋ nɩɩ ba kyɔ bamʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyankpaa sun mʋ, nɩɩ paa agyipu mʋ ba waa bamʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba waa abanban mʋ.
Laalaalʋwɛ mʋ, o sun mu‐bii‐nyɩnsa bamʋ asɛ tɔwɛ yɛ ‘Bee biti ba taa bɛɛrɛɛ sa mi‐bii.’
“Amaa paa agyipu mʋ ba maa wu mu‐bii maa ba mʋ, ba tɔwɛ abaa yɛ, ‘Ɔnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ kapatɩyɛ ogyipu mʋ’. Fan ba kɛ a mɔɔ mʋ kɛ a taa mʋ kapatɩyɛ mʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ ba kɩtaa kebii mʋ, bɩɩtɛ mʋ lɩɩ kadɔɔ mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ba mɔɔ mʋ.
“Ɩmʋ sʋ, nɩɩ kadɔɔ wuya mʋ kan ba mʋ, mɩnɛ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ waa paa agyipu mʋ?”
Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɩ waa kanan kʋmaa ee biti ɔ mɔɔ kanɩn asa libi maŋa, kɛ ɔ taa kadɔɔ mʋ sa paa agyipu pʋpwɛ kʋ, mʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba baa bɛɛ sa mʋ mʋ ogyikpa lɩɩ adɔɔ‐gyitɔ mʋ tɔ kɩtɩŋɛ saŋa.”
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan man pɩɩta kalɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ,
‘Kubuu mʋ nɩɩ apɔyɩpʋ ba kina mʋ,
kɩmʋ ɩ ba biliŋi kɩbɔntɔnbʋlɔntɔ kubuu kparɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ sʋ obu mʋ tɔ.
Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ ɩ waa ɩnɩmʋ,
nɩɩ i kyinkyin anɛ.’
“Ɩmʋ sʋ n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ taa mu kuwura‐gyii mʋ lɩɩ fanɛ asɛ, kɛ ɔ taa sa asa mʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba waa mu kebiti mʋ.
Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩyɛ kubuu nɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, ii biti o boyi tɔ buriburi, amaa ɔmʋ nɩɩ kɩ lɩɩ tɩyɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ, ii biti ɔ patɩyɛ tɔ.”
Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu abɩlɩsa yɛ Farasii abi ba maa nu Yesu aŋasan mʋ, ba bɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ asɩn nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ.
Ba biti ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ba taa kɩtaa mʋ, amaa ba sɩlɛ sakyɔ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ asa mʋ be nyi maa gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ nɩn.
Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla taa aŋasan tɔ tɔwɛ sa asa mʋ yɛ,
“Sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ du nɩn fɛɛ, owura kʋ maa waa kɩkyɩɩfɔ kensi‐gyii lala sa mu‐bii‐nyɩnsa.
Nɩɩ o sun mʋ ayaafɔlɛ yɛ ba kpee naa tɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ɔ da kɩbaa tɩɩ bamʋ yɛ ba be kensi‐gyii mʋ tɔ, amaa ba kina kɩ ba.

“Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔ bɩla sun ayaafɔlɛ akʋ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, ‘Fan naa tɔwɛ bamʋ nɩɩ n da kɩbaa tɩɩ mʋ fɛɛ n kʋʋla lʋwɛ. N mɔɔ ɩnaatɛ gbelu yɛ akpensen‐kpesen mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ nfɔ, nɩɩ n kʋʋla kʋtɔ kʋmaa lʋwɛ. Fan ba kɩkyɩɩfɔ kensi‐gyii mʋ tɔ.’
“Amaa asa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ da kɩbaa tɩɩ mʋ, ba man tʋwɛ mʋ. Akʋ ba kyʋn bamʋ ndɔɔ ana tɔ, nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba kyʋn asun tɔ.
Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba san mʋ mɔɔ ba kɩtaa owura mʋ ayaafɔlɛ mʋ dayɩ nɩɩ ba mɔɔ bamʋ.
Owura mʋ nyɛ agbʋ gaa. Nɩɩ o sun mʋ anaakɔpʋ, nɩɩ ba naa mɔɔ kanɩn amɔɔpʋ maŋa nɩɩ ba tuwa bamʋ kadɛ.
“Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ ayaafɔlɛ yɛ, ‘N lʋwɛ kɩkyɩɩfɔ kensi‐gyii agyitɔ mʋ, amaa bamʋ nɩɩ n da kɩbaa tɩɩ mʋ, ba man tʋwɛ, ɩmʋ sʋ ba man dagaa agyitɔ mʋ kigyii.
Kanɩn sʋ fan loo kadɛ tɔ kpee agbenbi sʋ, naa tɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fen wu mʋ ba kɩkyɩɩfɔ kensi‐gyii mʋ tɔ.’
Ɩmʋ sʋ ayaafɔlɛ mʋ ba lɩɩ kpee agbenbi sʋ yɛ katɩn kʋmaa natɛ tɩɩ ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ba wu, asa adanbɩrasa yɛ alibi kpini bʋga tɔ, nɩɩ asa ba ba bɔla kɩkyɩɩfɔ lenbu mʋ.
“Amaa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ owura mʋ ba kɩɩ lenbu mʋ tɔ mʋ, o wu ɔnyɩn kʋ maa man bun kɩkyɩɩfɔ tɔ atɔ bunsa.
Nɩɩ owura mʋ taasɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ yɛ, ‘Kyɛmɩnɛ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ fʋ waa fʋʋ nfɩɩ yɛgɛ fʋ man bun kɩkyɩɩfɔ atɔ bunsa?’ Amaa ɔnyɩn mʋ man taalɛ bugi kɔnɔ.
“Ɩmʋ sʋ owura mʋ tɔwɛ mʋ ayaafɔlɛ yɛ, ‘Fan ŋmina mʋ abaa yɛ ayaa, kɛ fan lɛɛ mʋ tʋʋ nbwama kitentenbiri mʋ tɔ, tʋtɔ nɩɩ kusu yɛ anobi kiduŋi bʋ.’ ”
Nɩɩ Yesu lʋwɛ yɛ, “Ba tɩɩ asa gaalaagaa, amaa gbɛrɛɛ falɛ nɩɩ ba lɛɛ.”
Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ, Farasii abi ba naa gyaŋɛ ŋmina kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋʋ mʋ ɔdʋʋ lɩɩ mʋ asɩn tɔwɛsa tɔ.

Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba sun bamʋ abɩɩlapʋ yɛ owura Herodi kamaa tɔ abi kpee Yesu asɛ. Ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ an nyi fʋ maa gyɛ kesintin gyipu, nɩɩ fɩɩ kaapʋ asa Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn bɔla kesintin ɔkpa sʋ, yɛgɛ fʋ mɛɛ tʋwɛ lɩɩ nfɛɛrɛ mʋ nɩɩ asa bɛɛ fɛ, nɩɩ fʋ mɛɛ kɩɩ nyɩmɩsa kɩkparɛ sʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ an biti a nu lɩɩ fʋ asɛ yɛ, ɩ dɛ ɔkpa fɛɛ a ka lenpoo sa Roma abi Owura Kasaro, abɛɛ a man ka?”
Amaa Yesu maa wʋla o nyi bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ libi sʋ mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ kebunbun ansi wuya ana! Mɩnɛ waa sʋ nɩɩ fɛn sʋʋ mɛ ɔdʋʋ?
Fan taa kederebi mʋ nɩɩ fɛn sʋ fɛn ka lenpoo mʋ kaapʋ mɛ.” Nɩɩ ba taa kederebi mʋ ba sa mʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ foto yɛ kɩtɩɩ ɩ gyan kɩmʋ sʋ falɛ?”
Ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Owura lala Kasaro.” Ɩmʋ sʋ, Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ Kasaro lɛɛ mʋ, fan ka sa Kasaro, nɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mʋ, fan taa sa Ɩbwaarɛ.”
Ba maa nu falɛ sʋ mʋ, ɩ waa bamʋ kɩyan, nɩɩ ba yɛgɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ba natɛ kyʋn.
Kanɩn kakɛ kʋlʋn maŋa mʋ Sadusi abi akʋ ba ba Yesu asɛ. Sadusi abi ba gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kaapʋ yɛ kikyiŋi ba nkpa tɔ kʋ man bʋ tɔ.

Ba ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, anɛ naana Mosesi kɩkaapʋ mʋ tɔ mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, nɩɩ ɔnyɩn kan kili nɩɩ ɔ man kʋʋgɛ nɩɩ o wu mʋ, ɩ dagaa mu‐supu maa bwii kili okulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ, kɛ ba kʋʋgɛ nbii sa olewupu mʋ.
To! Ɔnyɩn kʋ maa mu‐supu ana asunɔ ba kyɩna ba bʋ anɛ asɛ nfɩɩ. Ɔbɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ kili nɩɩ o wu, yɛgɛ ba man kʋʋgɛ nbii, nɩɩ mu‐supu mʋ taa okulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ kili.
Kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ ɔnyɔsapʋ mʋ yɛ ɔsasapʋ gbaa ba kili mʋ, halɩɩ naa fʋʋ osunɔsapʋ mʋ.
Laalaalʋwɛ mʋ, ɔkyɩɩ mʋ gbaa ba wu.
Saamʋ, kakɛ lala mʋ nɩɩ asa bee biti ba kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ ba nkpa tɔ mʋ, anyɩn asunɔ banɩmʋ tɔ mʋ, anɩmʋ mʋ‐ka ɩ gyɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ? Lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ kpini ba kili mʋ.”
Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fan fɔyɩ ɔkpa! Lɩɩ fɛɛ fan maa man nu Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ kasɛ, nɩɩ fan man nyi Ɩbwaarɛ ɔlʋn mʋ sʋ.
Kpalɩ fɛɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ alewupu bee biti ba kyiŋi ba nkpa tɔ mʋ, asa ba mɛɛ yɛ ba kili, amaa bee biti ba baa ba du nɩn fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ.
Amaa lɩɩ alewupu kikyiŋi ba nkpa tɔ asɩn mʋ, fan man kalɛ wu asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ sa fanɛ mʋ nɩn?

Ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Mɛ ɩ gyɛ Abraham Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ Isaki Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ Gyekobu Ɩbwaarɛ.’ Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ kaapʋ nɩn fɛɛ, asa banɩmʋ ba maa wu gbaa mʋ ba san ba gyɛ asa kɩɩsa Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ, nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ bamʋ Ɩbwaarɛ, man gyɛ alewupu lɛɛ.”
Sakyɔ mʋ maa nu falɛ mʋ, mʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ ɩ waa bamʋ kɩyan.
Amaa Farasii abi mʋ ba maa nu fɛɛ, Yesu man yɛgɛ nɩɩ Sadusi abi mʋ ba nyɛ bugi kɔnɔ mʋ, ba tɩɩ abaa gyaŋɛ.
Nɩɩ bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ nbara onyipu mʋ taa asɩn taasɛsa sʋʋ Yesu ɔdʋʋ.
Ɔ taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ nbara mʋ tɔ mʋ, kɩmɔmɔ ɩ gyɛ kɩkparɛ?”
Yesu lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “ ‘Taa fʋ kɔkɔlɔ yɛ fʋ kala yɛ fʋ nfɛɛrɛ kpini nyɛ kebiti sa fʋ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ.’
Kɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ nbara mʋ tɔ kɩgyankpaasa yɛ kɩkparɛ.
Nɩɩ kɩnyɔsapʋ mʋ du nɩn fɛɛ kɩmʋ. Ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, ‘Nyɛ kebiti sa fʋ tɔmaa fɛɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ.’
Mosesi nbara mʋ kpini yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ asɩn kaapʋsa mʋ ɩ yɩlɛ nbara nnyɔ nɩmʋ sʋ nɩn.”
Farasii abi ba maa ba gyaŋɛ mʋ, Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ,
“Mɩnɛ nfɛɛrɛ nɩɩ fan sʋ lɩɩ Krisito mʋ sʋ? Anɩmʋ kanaana‐bii ɩ gyɛ mʋ?”
Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Owura Dawidi kanaana‐bii.”
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɩ waa nɛnɛ sʋ nɩɩ Kayaayu tɔ Dawidi tɩɩ mʋ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ?’ Lɩɩ fɛɛ Dawidi tɔwɛ yɛ,
‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ tɔwɛ mɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ yɛ,
“kyɩna mɛ kɩbaa gyisa sʋ,
naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n biti n taa fʋ dʋn ana
waa fʋ ayaa kasɛ.” ’
Nɩɩ Owura Dawidi maa tɩɩ Krisito yɛ, ‘Mɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ’ mʋ, nɛnɛ sʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ bɩla taalɛ waa mʋ kanaana‐bii?”
Bamʋ ɔkʋ man taalɛ bugi kɔnɔ tɔwɛ asɩn akʋ, nɩɩ lɩɩ kanɩn kakɛ maŋa taa kyʋn, ɔkʋ man bɩla taalɛ yɩlɛ tɔ taasɛ mʋ asɩn‐taasɛsa kʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ kʋbʋ damantɛ yɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ,
“Nbara akaapʋpʋ yɛ Farasii abi mʋ ii yii anɛ naana Mosesi ayaa tɔ bɛɛ lɛɛ nbara mʋ kasɛ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ fan waa mʋ, fan nu sa bamʋ kɛ fan waa. Amaa fan man waa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa mʋ, kpalɩ fɛɛ be mee buu atɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ fanɛ mʋ sʋ.
Bee ŋmina ɩsʋla budusa nɩn bɛɛ sa asa yɛ ba sʋla, amaa bamʋ gbaa‐gbaa bamʋ bɩrɛ, ba mɛɛ yɛ ba taa bamʋ kɩbaa‐bi kyɛ asa mʋ tɔ kɛ ba sʋla.
“Nɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa mʋ, bɛɛ waa kɛ asa ba nyɛ wu bamʋ. Nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ abwaarɛsɩn gyaga ɔwʋlɛ sʋ, nɩɩ ba taa ɩmʋ mata bamʋ asɩkpɩɩ yɛ abaa sʋ, nɩɩ ba waa bamʋ ɩkaalɛ nnɔ ayolobi bʋnswɩɩsa.
Nɩɩ ba kpee kigyii nsarɛ tɔ abɛɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ ɩgyaŋɛkpa tɔ mʋ, ɩkyɩnakpa kparɛ‐kparɛ nɩɩ bee biti ba kyɩna.
Nɩɩ bee biti fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyaŋa bamʋ kadɛ tɔ mʋ, ɔ gyɔŋɔ fwaala bamʋ, nɩɩ ba bɩla bee biti asa ba tɩɩ bamʋ yɛ ‘Akaapʋpʋ.’
“Amaa fanɛɛ fanɛ bɩrɛ, fan man yɛgɛ ba tɩɩ fanɛ yɛ, ‘Akaapʋpʋ,’ kpalɩ fɛɛ fan sʋ Ɔkaapʋpʋ kʋlʋn nɩn, fanɛ kpini fan gyɛ asupu yɛ adaa nɩn.
Fan man tɩɩ ɔkʋ yɛ ‘Ɔsɛ’ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɔsɛ kʋlʋn nɩɩ fan sʋ, nɩɩ mʋ ɩ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ.
Abɛɛ fan man yɛgɛ ba tɩɩ fanɛ ɔkʋ yɛ ‘Ɔkaapʋpʋ’, kpalɩ fɛɛ Ɔkaapʋpʋ kʋlʋn nɩɩ fan sʋ, nɩɩ mʋ ɩ gyɛ Krisito mʋ.
Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ ɔbɩlɩsa fanɛ tɔ mʋ, ɩ dagaa maa gyɛ fanɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kʋsaa mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋsʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ bɩya mʋ kasɛ, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɩya mʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ kʋsaa mʋ sʋsʋ.

“Fanɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ yɛ Farasii abi, fan gyɛ kebunbun ansi wuya ana, fanɛ laakʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ fen tii asa ɔkpa kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba man nyɛ loo sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ. Fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ fen mee loo to, nɩɩ fɛn mɛɛ yɛgɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba loo mʋ, ba nyɛ loo to.

Fanɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ yɛ Farasii abi, fan gyɛ kebunbun ansi wuya ana, fanɛ laakʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ fen puni akulapu‐kyɩɩ fɛn gyii bamʋ akpaara, yɛgɛ fɛn kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ bʋnswɩɩsa, kɛ asa ba nyɛ wu yɛ fen sun Ɩbwaarɛ kyɛɛkyɛɛ. Lɩɩ falɛ sʋ mʋ fanɛ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ ii biti ɩ baa ɩ kyɔ gaa.

“Fanɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ yɛ Farasii abi, fan gyɛ kebunbun ansi wuya ana, fanɛ laakʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ fɛn natɛ nkyu sʋ yɛ ndɛ‐ndɛ sʋ, kɛ fɛn nyɛ kyɛɛgɛ nyɩmɩsa kʋlʋn ɔ ba sun Ɩbwaarɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fen sun mʋ. Amaa nɩɩ fan kan nyɛ mʋ mʋ, fɛn waa ɔsa mʋ ɔ dagaa awʋrʋfɔ fʋlɔn yen‐yen tɔ ɩlɩɩ ɩnyɔ fɛɛ fanɛ.

“Fanɛ akaapʋpʋ mʋ nɩɩ fen du fɛɛ agyaatanapʋ nɩɩ fɛn gyankpaa asa mʋ, fanɛ laakʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ fɛn kaapʋ yɛ, ‘Nɩɩ ɔkʋ taa kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ bɔ ntan mʋ, ɩ man gyɛ sɛhn, amaa nɩɩ ɔ kan taa kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ suwa bɔ ntan mʋ, ɩ dagaa maa buu ntan mʋ sʋ.’
Fanɛ agyaatanapʋ melensipu! Suwa mʋ ɩ kyɔ abɛɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ? Nɩɩ man gyɛ suwa mʋ maa bʋ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ sʋ nɩɩ suwa mʋ biliŋi Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ abɛɛ?
Nɩɩ fan bɩla tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Nɩɩ ɔkʋ taa saraga kaswɩɩ bɔ ntan mʋ, ɩ man gyɛ sɛhn, amaa nɩɩ ɔ kan taa kakɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyan saraga kaswɩɩ mʋ sʋ bɔ ntan mʋ bɩrɛ, ɩ dagaa maa buu ntan mʋ sʋ.’
Fanɛ agyaatanapʋ banɩmʋ! Kakɛɛ mʋ ɩ kyɔ abɛɛ saraga kaswɩɩ mʋ? Nɩɩ man gyɛ kakɛɛ mʋ maa gyan saraga kaswɩɩ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ kɩ ba biliŋi Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ abɛɛ?
Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa saraga kaswɩɩ bɔ ntan mʋ, ɔ taa kaswɩɩ mʋ maa kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyan kɩmʋ sʋ mʋ bɔ ntan nɩmʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ bɔ ntan mʋ, ɔ taa kɩmʋ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ kɩmʋ tɔ mʋ bɔ ntan nɩmʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa sʋsʋ bɔ ntan mʋ, ɔ taa sʋsʋ kuwura‐gya yɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ kɩmʋ sʋ mʋ bɔ ntan nɩmʋ.

“Fanɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ yɛ Farasii abi, fan gyɛ kebunbun ansi wuya ana, fanɛ laakʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ fɛn barɩgɛ fanɛ ɩpʋ atɔ, fɛɛ akatɛ, yɛ gaabu, yɛ akolonku ntun kudu‐kudu, nɩɩ fɛn taa ɩmʋ ketun kʋlʋn‐kʋlʋn fɛn sa Ɩbwaarɛ, amaa fɛn mɛɛ tʋwɛ asɩn kaapʋsa kparɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ nbara mʋ tɔ, fɛɛ kigyii asɩn ɩmʋ ɔkpa sʋ, kʋwɛɛ kuwu, yɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii danbɩrasa. Falɛ atɔ nɩmʋ ɩ dagaa fan maa waa, yɛgɛ fɛn taa ntun kudu sʋ kutun kʋlʋn mʋ fɛn sa Ɩbwaarɛ.
Fanɛ agyaatanapʋ agyankpaapʋ! Fɛn taalɛ fen wu kisusonbi kɛ fen fura mʋ fɔyɩ, amaa fɛn mɩyɛ nyɔɔma.

“Fanɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ yɛ Farasii abi, fan gyɛ kebunbun ansi wuya ana, fanɛ laakʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ fɛn fwɩɩ fanɛ ɩlapɛ yɛ nwɛ‐bi nmaa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ, yɛgɛ ɩmʋ ɩtɔ tɔ ɩ gyɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ fan taa kensi payɩ libi yɛ kekisi bɔla ɩmʋ.
Fanɛ Farasii agyaatanapʋ! Fan gyankpaa fwɩɩ nwɛ‐bi yɛ ɩlapɛ mʋ ɩtɔ tɔ, kɛ ɩmʋ nmaa gbaa ɩ lɩɩ kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ.

“Fanɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ yɛ Farasii abi, fan gyɛ kebunbun ansi wuya ana, fanɛ laakʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ fan du nɩn fɛɛ nkyan mʋ nɩɩ ba pɔyɩ nɩɩ ba fuuli ɩmʋ sʋ parɛparɛ, nɩɩ ɩ bʋrɔn yɛgɛ ɩmʋ ɩtɔ tɔ bɩrɛ, abuni awuya yɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɔɔ ɩ bɔla ɩmʋ tɔ.
Kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ fan du. Asa ansi sʋ mʋ, fan gyɛ ɩkpa kyiigisa wuya ana, amaa fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ mʋ, fan gyɛ kebunbun ansi yɛ kumu tɔ ɔlʋn wuya ana nɩn.
“Fanɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ yɛ Farasii abi, fan gyɛ kebunbun ansi wuya ana, fanɛ laakʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ fɛn pɔyɩ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ nkyan, nɩɩ fan lɔŋɔ ɩkpa kyiigisa wuya ana nkyan sʋ yɛ ɔdan.
Nɩɩ fɛn tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Nɩɩ an daa an bʋ tɔ anɛ naana ana saŋa mʋ nɩn, naafɔɔ a mɛɛ yɛ a tii bamʋ sʋ kɛ a mɔɔ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ.’
Fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ ii gyii kesintin lɩɩ asɩn nɩmʋ sʋ yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba mɔɔ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ, bamʋ‐bii ana ɩ gyɛ fanɛ.
Kanɩn bɩrɛ fan tiisi lʋwɛ fanɛ naana ana alibi kusun mʋ.
“Fanɛ anansɛ yɛ anansɛ bamʋ‐bii ana! Nɛnɛ nɩɩ fɛn taalɛ sɩlɛ lɩɩ kɩpwɛ kibun yɛ awʋrʋfɔ fʋlɔn yen‐yen nɩmʋ tɔ?

Kanɩn sʋ, n biti n sun Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ yɛ anyaasɩnpʋ yɛ akaapʋpʋ fanɛ asɛ. Amaa fen biti fan mɔɔ bamʋ akʋ, kɛ fan da akʋ mata iyu laasa sʋ, kɛ fan dayɩ akʋ fanɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa, kɛ fan gya bamʋ lɩɩ ndɛ sʋ kpee ndɛ sʋ.

Ɩmʋ sʋ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ lɩɩ ɩkpa kyiigisa wuya ana mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ asa ba kyɩna mɔɔ mʋ kpini, ii biti ɩ ba fanɛ sʋ. Lɩɩ ɩkpa kyiigisa wuya Abeli naa fʋʋ Barakiya mu‐bii Sakariya mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ Gyiwu abi ba daa mɔɔ mʋ, kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ maa saraga kaswɩɩ nsana mʋ.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ, ɩnɩmʋ kpini kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ ii biti ɩ ba ndaga kakyɩna nɩmʋ tɔ asa sʋ.

“Oo! Gyerusalem asa! Fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fɛn mɔɔ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ, nɩɩ fɛn tʋʋ abuu fɛn mɔɔ bamʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sun fanɛ asɛ mʋ. N kpan mɛ n‐yɩɩ saŋa gaalaagaa fɛɛ n bʋga fanɛ‐bii ana, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ kakyaasɛ‐nyi ɩɩ bʋga mu‐bii ana ɛɛ waa mʋ atɛɛ tɔ mʋ, amaa fen mee kyula.
Fanɛ kɩɩ, Ɩbwaarɛ lɩɩ fanɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ki biliŋi kɩtakpan.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ nɩn yɛ fan man bɩla yɛ fan wu mɛ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ ba Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ mʋ.’ ”
Yesu maa lɩɩ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ ee kpee mʋ, mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba ba mʋ asɛ bɛɛ kaapʋ mʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ ibu mʋ i du.
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Yɛ fan wu atɔ nɩmʋ kpini? N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ halɩɩ kubuu kʋlʋn gbaa mɛɛ yɛ o sii kɩmʋ bɩrɩsa sʋ, kɛ ba man nin kɩmʋ tʋʋ.”
Yesu maa tɛ olifu kɩbɩɩ mʋ sʋ mʋ, mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ nkʋn ɩ ba mʋ asɛ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Tɔwɛ anɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ ii biti ɩ ba? Nɩɩ mɩnɛ ii biti ɩ baa ɩ gyɛ fʋ kɩba mʋ yɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ sɩnkaala?”
Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fan baa fan da sʋ, kɛ ɔkʋ ɔ man pɩna fanɛ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ asa gaalaagaa bee biti ba ba mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Mɛ, ɩ gyɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ’, kɛ ba pɩna asa gaalaagaa.
Fen biti fan nu ɩkɔ sʋ kusakusa, kɛ fan nu ɩkɔ asɩn kata‐kata, amaa fan man yɛgɛ fanɛ nkɔlɔ ɩ ŋmaa fanɛ. Kanɩn atɔ maŋa ɩ dagaa ɩ maa waa, amaa ɩ mɛɛ kaapʋ fɛɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ tɛɛ fʋʋ.
Ndɛndɛmandɛ bee biti ba kɔ yɛ ndɛndɛmandɛ, kɛ kuwura‐gyii kɩ kɔ yɛ kuwura‐gyii. Akʋn lala yɛ kasɛ kigyingyen ii biti ɩ baa ɩ bʋ katɩn kʋmaa.
Ɩnɩmʋ kpini i du nɩn fɛɛ keduŋidi gyankpaasa.
“Nɩɩ bee biti ba taa fanɛ sa kɛ ba nyanla fanɛ kɛ ba mɔɔ fanɛ. Nɩɩ ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ asa kpini bee biti ba kisi fanɛ lɩɩ mɛ sʋ.
Kanɩn saŋa maŋa asa gaalaagaa bee biti ba biliŋi lɩɩ kɩkɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii tɔ, kɛ ba lɛɛ abaa sa kɛ ba kisi abaa,
nɩɩ antɩŋɛsa atɔwɛpʋ gaalaagaa bee biti ba ba pɩna asa gaalaagaa.
Lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ alibi kɩwaa ɩ lɔŋɔ tii sʋ sʋ mʋ, kɩnyɛ kebiti sa abaa ii biti ɩ ba kasɛ,
amaa ɔmʋnɩ ɔ yɩlɛ tɔ kenken naa lʋwɛ mʋ, ii biti ɔ nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ.
Nɩɩ asa bee biti ba tɔwɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn danbɩrasa nɩmʋ lɩɩ mu kuwura‐gyii mʋ sʋ dulinyaa tɔ kpini, kɛ ndɛndɛmandɛ kpini ba nu ɩmʋ, pɔyɩ kɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ ɔ baa.

“Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ fan kan wu kʋtɔ kisisa mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ bɩya alibi kɩ maa yɩlɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Daneli wʋla tɔwɛ yɩla lɩɩ koo dɩdaa mʋ, (Ɩ dagaa ɔkalɛpʋ mʋ maa nu ɩnɩmʋ kasɛ)
saamʋ bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Gyudeya mʋ ba sɩlɛ kpee abɩɩ tɔ.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ɔ bʋ obu ketin tɔ mʋ, ɔ man kpɩlɩgɛ ba kasɛ naa taa kʋtɔ kʋ lɩɩ kɩkpaara sʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ɔ bʋ ndɔɔ tɔ mʋ, ɔ man bwii kpee naa taa mʋ kaalɛ.
Kanɩn nkɛ maŋa tɔ mʋ, ɩtɔ wuya ana yɛ atalapʋ, bamʋ laakʋ.
Fan kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ fɛɛ fanɛ kɩkʋsʋ sɩlɛ ɩnɩmʋ ɩ man ba waa awɔɔ saŋa, abɛɛ Kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ kanɩn saŋa maa awʋrʋfɔ ii biti ɩ baa ɩ bʋlʋn, nɩɩ awʋrʋfɔ kʋ man pɩɩ ba kanɩn lɩɩ koo dulinyaa npiili asɛ, nɩɩ ɩkʋ man bʋ tɔ ɩ bɩla ba kanɩn.
Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ man kan tɩn nkɛ mʋ sʋ bɩrɛ, naafɔɔ ɔkʋ man bʋ tɔ ɔ nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ, amaa lɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ tɩn nkɛ mʋ sʋ.
Kanɩn saŋa maŋa nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan tɔwɛ fʋ yɛ, ‘Kɩɩ, Krisito mʋ bʋ nfɩɩ’ abɛɛ ‘Mʋ ɩ bʋ falɛ’ mʋ, man kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ gyii.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ antɩŋɛsa Krisito yɛ antɩŋɛsa Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ bee biti ba ba, kɛ ba waa ɩsɩnkaala lala yɛ adangana kɛ ɩ nyɛ taalɛ pɩna bamʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mʋ gbaa.
Fan kɩɩ, n gyankpaa n tɔwɛ fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ nɩn pɔyɩ kɛ ɩ ba.
“Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, ‘Krisito mʋ ɩ lɩɩ ɔ bʋ keperi sʋ falɛ’ mʋ, fan man kpee tʋtɔ, abɛɛ ɔkʋ kan tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Krisito mʋ baala nfɩɩ’ mʋ, fan man kɔɔlɛ gyii.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ, kanan mʋ nɩɩ bʋlayɩ ɩ wɛɛ ɩsɛɛ lɩɩ kyɔwɛ kɩlɩɩ, nɩɩ bee wu kɩmʋ halɩɩ kyɔwɛ kɩtɩyɛ mʋ, kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ kɩba ii biti ɩ baa i du.
Katɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kʋtɔ belenbuni ɔsa bʋ mʋ, tʋtɔ maŋa nɩɩ agyinbwii bɛɛ lantɛ.
“Saŋa maŋa awʋrʋfɔ mʋ kamaa mʋ, opula tɔ
‘nɩɩ kyɔwɛ ii biti o bii tɔ,
nɩɩ ɔbwaayɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ baa ɔ kɩɩ tɔ,
nɩɩ akyikpebi ii biti ɩɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ tɩyɛ,
kɛ atɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ i gyingyen.’

“Kanɩn saŋa maŋa mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ sɩnkaala ii biti ɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ, nɩɩ ndɛndɛmandɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ kasɛ sʋ mʋ bee biti ba bɔɔta tɔ, fɛɛ ba maa wu mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ n maa lɩɩ abwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ tɔ sʋsʋ n ba yɛ ɔlʋn yɛ bʋnyaa lala mʋ.
Nɩɩ n biti n sun mɛ nbɔɔ, kɛ ba fʋlɛ nbɩlɛ kenken, kɛ ba bʋga bamʋ nɩɩ n lɛɛ mʋ lɩɩ dulinyaa abɔntɔnbʋlɔn kpini.
“Nbɩɩnbɩɩ, fan bɩɩla asɩn lɩɩ figi oyu mʋ asɛ. Nɩɩ ɩmʋ n‐yaabi ɩ kan ɩɩ pɔrɔgɛ nɩɩ ɩɩ lɛɛ afatɛɛ pʋpwɛ mʋ, fɛn bɩɩ fɛɛ kɩbɩlɛ saŋa tiri tɔ nɩmʋ.
Kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ fan wu ɩnɩmʋ kpini mʋ, fan bɩɩ fɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa kɩba mʋ ki tiri tɔ, fɛɛ n ba.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ ndaga kakyɩna nɩmʋ tɔ asa ba mɛɛ yɛ ba wu lʋwɛ, pɔyɩ kɛ falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ kpini ɩ waa.
Sʋsʋ yɛ kasɛ ii biti ɩ kyʋn, amaa mɛ asɩn ɩ man bʋ tɔ ɩ kyʋn.
“Amaa lɩɩ kakɛ mʋ abɛɛ kerefi mʋ nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ ii biti ɩ waa mʋ ɔkʋ man nyi. Sʋsʋ nbɔɔ ba man nyi, halɩɩ mɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐Bii mʋ gbaa man nyi, amɔɔ Ɔsɛ mʋ nkʋn.
Kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ kyɩna i du Nowa saŋa mʋ, kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ ii biti ɩ baa i du mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ kɩba saŋa.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ pɔyɩ kɛ nkyu i muuri dulinyaa mʋ, asa ba kyɩna ba maa sʋ bee gyii yɛgɛ bee nuu, anyɩn yɛ akyɩɩ bee kili, naa fʋʋ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ Nowa loo ɔkʋlɩ mʋ tɔ,
yɛgɛ ba man nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kii biti kɩ ba, halɩɩ nkyu ɩ ba taa bamʋ kpini kyʋn. Kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ ii biti ɩ waa mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa kɩba mʋ saŋa.
Anyɩn anyɔ bee biti ba baa ba bʋ ndɔɔ tɔ, n biti n taa ɔkʋ kɛ n yɛgɛ ɔkʋ.
Akyɩɩ anyɔ bee biti ba baa bɛɛ kɔyɩ kubuu sʋ, n biti n taa ɔkʋ yɛgɛ ɔkʋ.
“Kanɩn sʋ fan baa fan da sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan man nyi kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ mɛ, fanɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ mʋ ii biti ɔ ba.
Fan baa fen nyi ɩnɩmʋ fɛɛ, nɩɩ kɩkpaara wuya dɩn o nyi kagyanbwɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ oyu ii biti ɔ ba nɩn, naafɔɔ ɔ dɩn kyɩna kun, kɛ oyu mʋ ɔ man ba nyɛ boyi loo mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ yuuri.
Ɩmʋ sʋ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fan kʋʋla fan gyoo, lɩɩ fɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa n biti n ba saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fan man kɩɩ mɛ ɔkpa.
“Anɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ kesintin gyipu yɛ kanyaasɩn wuya? Mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ taa mʋ waa mʋ ayaafɔlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ kɩkpaara sʋ mʋ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ fɛɛ ɔ sa bamʋ agyitɔ saŋa kyɛɛkyɛɛ tɔ.
Ii biti ɩ baa ɩ bʋrɔn sa kanɩn kɩyaafɔlɛ maŋa fɛɛ mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ maa ba tu mʋ yɛgɛ ɛɛ waa kanɩn.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ mʋ ii biti ɔ taa mʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ waa mʋ abaa tɔ.
Amaa a taa fɛɛ kanɩn kɩyaafɔlɛ maŋa libi nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Mɛ‐nyɩrɩpɛ ii biti ɔ kyɩna tʋtɔ kyɛɛrɛɛ,’
kɛ o piili ɛɛ dayɩ mʋ bɩrɩsa ana ayaafɔlɛ mʋ, yɛgɛ ee gyii ee nuu maa atabʋʋpʋ.
Kanɩn kɩyaafɔlɛ maŋa mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ ii biti ɔ ba kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man kɩɩ mʋ ɔkpa, yɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man nyi sʋ.
Ee biti ɔ bɩɩtɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ kʋsʋ gaa, kɛ ɔ gya mʋ naa waa kebunbun ansi wuya opula, katɩn mʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba baa bɛɛ saawʋ yɛgɛ bee duŋi bamʋ anobi mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla bɔ kɩŋasan kʋ yɛ, “Kanɩn saŋa maŋa mʋ sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ ii biti ɩ baa i du nɩn fɛɛ, abite kudu mʋ nɩɩ ba taa bamʋ ɩfɩtɩla lɩɩ kyʋn ba naa gyaŋa ɔkyɩɩfɔ mu‐kuli.
Bamʋ tɔ anu ba gyɛ amelensipu nɩɩ anu mɔɔ ba gyɛ anyaasɩnpʋ.
Nɩɩ amelensipu anu mʋ ba maa dan taa bamʋ ɩfɩtɩla mʋ, ba man taa fɩtɩla nfɔ kɩtaa tii sʋ.
Amaa anyaasɩnpʋ anu mʋ bɩrɛ ba kɩtaa fɩtɩla nfɔ ɩpʋrʋntʋwa tɔ tii sʋ.
Ɔkyɩɩfɔ mu‐kuli mʋ maa man ba bilen sʋ mʋ, nsɩɩrɛ ɩ kɩtaa bamʋ, nɩɩ ba dɛ.
“Ɩ maa ba fʋʋ kiyiridi nsana mʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ kuusi tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔkyɩɩfɔ mu‐kuli mʋ ɩɩ ba! Fan lɩɩ ba gyaŋa mʋ!’
“Nɩɩ abite kudu mʋ kpini ba kʋsʋ diyaa bamʋ ɩfɩtɩla.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ amelensipu mʋ ba tɔwɛ anyaasɩnpʋ mʋ yɛ, ‘Fan sa anɛ fanɛ nfɔ mʋ ɩkʋ, kpalɩ fɛɛ anɛ ɩfɩtɩla tɔ nfɔ ɩ lʋwɛ.’
“Nɩɩ anyaasɩnpʋ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Ayee! Anɛ gbaa anɛ lɛɛ ɩ man kyɔ kɛ ɩ fʋʋ ana fanɛ. Amɔɔ, fen kpee bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ fɛɛ mʋ asɛ kɛ fan naa sɔɔ.’
“Amaa ba maa kpee ba naa sɔɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩfɔ mu‐kuli mʋ ba. Nɩɩ anyaasɩnpʋ anu mʋ nɩɩ ba kʋʋla ba gyoo mʋ mʋ, ba nyɛ buu mʋ loo kɩkyɩɩfɔ kensi‐gyii kɩkpaara mʋ sʋ. Nɩɩ ba kɩtaa ɔpʋnʋ mʋ tii.
“Kamaa tɔ abite amelensipu anu mʋ ba maa ba mʋ, ba tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔbɩlɩsa! Ɔbɩlɩsa! Tigi ɔpʋnʋ mʋ sa anɛ kɛ a loo.’
“Amaa ɔ lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ, n man nyi fanɛ!’ ”
Yesu lʋwɛ yɛ, “Ɩmʋ sʋ fɛn baa fan da sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan man nyi kakɛ abɛɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ n biti n ba.”
Yesu bwii bɔ kɩŋasan kʋ yɛ, “Sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ ii biti ɩ baa i du fɛɛ ɔnyɩn kʋ maa kpee ɔkpa, nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ mʋ ayaafɔlɛ taa mʋ kapatɩyɛ waa bamʋ abaa tɔ.
Ɔ sa bamʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɔlʋn du. Ɔ sa ɔkʋ afulee ngbɩn nnuu, nɩɩ ɔ sa ɔkʋ mɔɔ afulee ngbɩn nnyɔ, lan sa ɔkʋ mɔɔ afulee kagbɩn kʋlʋn, nɩɩ ɔ kyʋn mʋ ɔkpa.
Nɩɩ kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ afulee ngbɩn nnuu mʋ taa piili kusun opula tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ agyaga ngbɩn nnuu tii sʋ.
Kanɩn nɩn, nɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ ngbɩn nnyɔ mʋ gbaa taa waa kusun, nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ ngbɩn nnyɔ agyaga tii sʋ.
Amaa kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ kagbɩn kʋlʋn mʋ bɩrɛ, taa mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ afulee mʋ naa kuu pula.
“Ɩ maa kyɛɛrɛɛ kamaa tɔ mʋ, bamʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ mʋ naa bwii ba, nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ bamʋ yɛ ba ba kaapʋ tɔ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba nyɛ agyaga tii afulee mʋ sʋ.
Kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sa mu afulee ngbɩn nnuu mʋ loo ba, nɩɩ ɔ taa ngbɩn nnuu tii sʋ sa mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Mɛ‐nyɩrɩpɛ, fʋ taa ngbɩn nnuu nɩn sa mɛ. Kɩɩ, n nyɛ agyaga ngbɩn nnuu tii sʋ.’

“Mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ mʋ yɩn mʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Fʋ waa kusun, fʋ gyɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ danbɩrasa yɛ kesintin gyipu. Fʋ gyii kesintin lɩɩ atɔ pii anɩmʋ sʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ n biti n taa atɔ damantɛ waa fʋ abaa tɔ kɛ fʋ kɩɩ sʋ. Ba kɛ a bʋga gyii kensi‐gyii mʋ nɩɩ n gyii mʋ!’
“Nɩɩ kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sa mʋ ngbɩn nnyɔ mʋ gbaa ba, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Mɛ‐nyɩrɩpɛ, fʋ taa ngbɩn nnyɔ nɩɩ waa mɛ abaa tɔ, kɩɩ, n nyɛ agyaga ngbɩn nnyɔ tii sʋ.’

“Mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ mʋ yɩn mʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Fʋ waa kusun, fʋ gyɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ danbɩrasa yɛ kesintin gyipu. Fʋ gyii kesintin lɩɩ atɔ pii anɩmʋ sʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ n biti n taa atɔ damantɛ waa fʋ abaa tɔ kɛ fʋ kɩɩ sʋ. Ba kɛ a bʋga gyii kensi‐gyii mʋ nɩɩ n gyii mʋ!’
“Tʋtɔ nɩɩ kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ kagbɩn kʋlʋn mʋ ba, nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, ‘Mɛ‐nyɩrɩpɛ, n nyi fʋ asɩn ɩ maa bʋlʋn, nɩɩ fɩɩ tɩŋɛ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ fʋ man duu, nɩɩ fɩɩ kʋʋla fɩɩ waa ɩbɔɔta tɔ, ɩmʋ nɩɩ fʋ man kyaalɛ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ n sʋ kufuu nɩɩ n taa afulee mʋ nɩɩ fʋ taa waa mɛ abaa tɔ mʋ, naa kuu ɩmʋ pula. Kɩɩ, fu afulee ndee.’
“Nɩɩ mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Fʋ gyɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ libi yɛ ɔwʋlɛgyɔpʋ. Fu nyi n maa tɩŋɛ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n man duu, nɩɩ n kʋʋla n waa ɩbɔɔta tɔ, katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n man kyaalɛ.
Kanɩn bɩrɛ, naafɔɔ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ fʋ taa mɛ afulee mʋ naa yɩla afulee ɔyɩlɛkpa, kɛ n maa bwii ba falɛ mʋ, n nyɛ mɛ afulee kibi yɛ agyaga tii sʋ.’
“Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ tɔwɛ mʋ ayaafɔlɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Fan kɔɔlɛ afulee kagbɩn kʋlʋn mʋ lɩɩ mʋ asɛ, kɛ fɛn taa sa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ ngbɩn kudu mʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ mʋ, bee biti ba sa mʋ tii sʋ, kɛ ɔ nyɛ naa bansʋ, amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man sʋ, nɩɩ halɩɩ gbɛrɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ gbaa mʋ, bee biti ba kɔɔlɛ lɩɩ mʋ asɛ.
Fan taa kɩyaafɔlɛ gyaga mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man sʋ kyaarɛ falɛ, naa tʋʋ kitentenbiri tumm mʋ tɔ. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ sawʋ kɛ o duŋi mʋ anobi.’ ”
Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla tɔwɛ yɛ, “Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa n biti n ba yɛ mɛ bʋnyaa, maa sʋsʋ nbɔɔ kpini mʋ, n biti n kyɩna mɛ kuwura‐gya mʋ sʋ bʋnyaa tɔ.
N biti ɩ bɩya ndɛndɛmandɛ kpini ba gyaŋɛ mi ansi tɔ, nɩɩ n biti n barɩgɛ asa mʋ tɔ ntun nnyɔ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ atɔbwaaya ɔkpapʋ ɩɩ barɩgɛ nbʋlʋpʋ ɛɛ lɩɩ nbwɛ tɔ mʋ.
N biti n taa nbʋlʋpʋ yɩlɛ mɛ gyisa sʋ, kɛ n taa nbwɛ mɔɔ yɩlɛ mɛ bɩna sʋ.

“Tʋtɔ nɩɩ mɛ, mʋ nɩɩ n gyɛ Owura mʋ n biti n tɔwɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ mɛ gyisa sʋ mʋ yɛ, ‘Fanɛ ɩ gyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ mɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ waa kusee mʋ, fan ba kuwura‐gyii mʋ nɩɩ ɔ yɩla sa fanɛ lɩɩ koo saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tʋʋ dulinyaa mʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ akʋn ɩ maa sʋ mɛ mʋ, fanɛ ɩ sa mɛ agyitɔ nɩɩ n gyii, bʋlɩfɔ maa sʋ mɛ mʋ, fanɛ ɩ sa mɛ nkyu nɩɩ n nuu, n maa gyɛ ɔfɔ mʋ, fanɛ ɩ kɔɔlɛ mɛ fanɛ ayɛ.
N maa man sʋ atɔ bunsa mʋ, fanɛ ɩ sa mɛ nɩɩ n bun, n maa lɔ mʋ, fanɛ ɩ kɩɩ mɛ sʋ, n maa bʋ obu tiisa tɔ mʋ, fanɛ ɩ bɔɔ mɛ sʋ.’

“Tʋtɔ nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ bamʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi mʋ bee biti ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, saŋa mɔɔ nɩɩ an wu fʋ akʋn ɩ maa sʋ fʋ, nɩɩ an sa fʋ agyitɔ nɩɩ fu gyii, abɛɛ bʋlɩfɔ maa sʋ fʋ, nɩɩ an sa fʋ nkyu nɩɩ fʋ nuu?
Saŋa mɔɔ nɩɩ an wu fʋ maa gyɛ ɔfɔ, nɩɩ an kɔɔlɛ fʋ ba anɛ ayɛ, abɛɛ atɔ bunsa ɩ maa tiri, nɩɩ an sa fʋ nɩɩ fʋ bun?
Saŋa mɔɔ nɩɩ an wu fʋ maa lɔ, abɛɛ fʋ maa tii obu tiisa tɔ nɩɩ an naa bɔɔ fʋ sʋ?’
“Nɩɩ mɛ, mʋ nɩɩ n gyɛ Owura mʋ, n biti n lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fan waa sa mɛ asa, halɩɩ bamʋ tɔ opii gbaa mʋ, mɛ nɩɩ fan waa sa.’

“Tʋtɔ nɩɩ n biti n tɔwɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ mɛ bɩna sʋ mʋ yɛ, ‘Fan taa lɩɩ mɛ sʋ, fanɛ nɩɩ mɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ nnɔ waa mʋ. Fan natɛ loo awʋrʋfɔ fʋlɔn yen‐yen mʋ nɩɩ ii mee dun, nɩɩ mɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ dɛɛla yɩla Sɩtaanɛ maa mʋ nbɔɔ mʋ tɔ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ akʋn ɩ maa sʋ mɛ mʋ, fan man sa mɛ agyitɔ nɩɩ n gyii, bʋlɩfɔ maa sʋ mɛ mʋ, fan man sa mɛ nkyu nɩɩ n nuu.
N maa gyɛ ɔfɔ mʋ, fan man kɔɔlɛ mɛ fanɛ ayɛ, atɔ bunsa ɩ maa tiri mɛ mʋ, fan man sa mɛ nɩɩ n bun, n maa lɔ, abɛɛ n maa bʋ obu tii tɔ mʋ, fan man ba bɔɔ mɛ sʋ.’

“Ngbaa bamʋ bee biti ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, saŋa mɔɔ nɩɩ an wu akʋn ɩ maa sʋ fʋ, abɛɛ bʋlɩfɔ maa sʋ fʋ, abɛɛ fʋ maa gyɛ ɔfɔ, abɛɛ atɔ bunsa ɩ maa tiri fʋ, abɛɛ fʋ maa lɔ, abɛɛ fʋ maa bʋ obu tii tɔ, nɩɩ an man kyɛ fʋ tɔ?’
“Nɩɩ mɛ, mʋ nɩɩ n gyɛ Owura mʋ n biti n lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin nɩn fɛɛ, kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fan kina kɩwaa sa mɛ asa, halɩɩ bamʋ tɔ opii gbaa mʋ, mɛ nɩɩ fan kina kɩwaa sa.’
“Tʋtɔ mʋ, bee biti ba naa loo kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ kakpaa tɔ, amaa ɩkpa kyiigisa wuya ana bɩrɛ bee biti ba kyɩna nkpa kakpaa tɔ.”
Yesu maa tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ kpini lʋwɛ mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ,
“Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fen nyi mʋ, ɩ san nkɛ nnyɔ kɛ kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ kensi kigyii saŋa mʋ ɔ fʋʋ. Saŋa maa nɩɩ bee biti ba lɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ sa, kɛ ba da mɛ mata oyu laasa sʋ.”
Kanɩn saŋa maŋa nɩɩ aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ asa mʋ abɩlɩsa ba naa sarɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Kayifasi mʋ lenbu tɔ,
naa ŋmina kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba taa kanyaasɩn ɔkpa sʋ kɩtaa Yesu kɛ ba mɔɔ mʋ.
Amaa ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “A man waa kanɩn kensi‐gyii saŋa nɩmʋ tɔ, nɩɩ man gyɛ kanɩn mʋ, sʋgʋrɛ‐sʋgʋrɛ ii biti ɔ ba kadɛ mʋ tɔ.”
Yesu maa kyɩna ɔ bʋ Betani ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Simon, nɩɩ ɔ kyɩna ɔ gyɛ bootipu mʋ ayɛ mʋ,
nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ kʋ taa tulale mʋ nɩɩ kɩ sʋ ɔgyalɩn pʋrʋntʋwa bɔla, ba mʋ asɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ ee gyii mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ kyɛɛgɛ tulale mʋ wʋrɩgɛ Yesu kumu tɔ.
Yesu abɩɩlapʋ ba maa wu kanɩn mʋ, ɩ basa bamʋ nɩɩ ba taasɛ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ ii nyita tulale maa kanɩn?
Naafɔɔ bɛ taalɛ fɛ tulale nɩmʋ nyɛ afulee damantɛ kɛ ba taa ɩmʋ sa atiripu.”
Yesu maa bɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fɛn tɔɔrɔɔ ɔkyɩɩ maŋa? Kʋtɔ danbɩrasa nɩɩ ɔ waa sa mɛ falɛ.
Atiripu mʋ bɩrɛ ba bʋ fanɛ asɛ saŋa kʋmaa, amaa mɛɛmɛ bɩrɛ n mɛɛ yɛ n kyɩna fanɛ asɛ saŋa kʋmaa.
Maa kyɛɛgɛ tulale nɩmʋ wʋrɩgɛ mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ mʋ, ɛɛ lɔŋɔ mɛ n‐yɩɩ ɛɛ yɩla mi kepula.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin nɩn fɛɛ, dulinyaa tɔ katɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ, bee biti ba tɔwɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa falɛ taa nyiŋi mʋ.”
Nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ, mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Gyudasi Isikariyoti mʋ kpee aseepu abɩlɩsa mʋ asɛ,
naa taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N kan lɛɛ mʋ sa fanɛ mʋ, mɩnɛ nɩɩ fen biti fan sa mɛ?” Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba karagɛ afulee nderebi adɩsa sa mʋ.
Lɩɩ kanɩn saŋa maŋa taa kyʋn mʋ, Gyudasi piili ee biti ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɔla sʋ lɛɛ Yesu sa.
Bodobodo mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ kɩfɛ tinsa kigyii kakɛ gyankpaasa mʋ, Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba ba mʋ asɛ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fɩnɛ nɩɩ fii biti fɛɛ a naa lɔŋɔ yɩla, kɛ a naa gyii Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ kesu kensi‐gyii mʋ?”
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan kpee kadɛ mʋ tɔ ɔnyɩn kʋ asɛ naa tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Ɔkaapʋpʋ mʋ yɛ, Mɛ saŋa tiri tɔ. N biti fɛɛ n maa mɛ abɩɩlapʋ an biti a ba gyii Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ kensi‐gyii mʋ fʋ ayɛ.’ ”
Nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba kpee naa waa kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ba waa Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ kensi‐gyii mʋ agyitɔ mʋ yɩla.
Ɩ maa fʋʋ kalaatɩpwɛ sʋ mʋ, Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ, ba tɛ bee gyii.
Ba maa gyii mʋ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ, fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ ii biti ɔ lɛɛ mɛ sa.”
Nɩɩ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ ii nyita bamʋ gaa, nɩɩ ba piili bɛɛ taasɛ mʋ kʋkʋlʋn‐kʋkʋlʋn yɛ “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, kesintin tɔ, man gyɛ mɛ nɩɩ fʋ dɛɛ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔmʋ nɩɩ maa mʋ abaa ɩ bʋga ii loo lapɛ kʋlʋn tɔ mʋ, ii biti ɔ lɛɛ mɛ sa.

Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa n biti n wu mʋ, kanɩn nɩɩ ii biti ɩ waa. Amaa kanɩn nyɩmɩsa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ lɛɛ mɛ sa mʋ, laakʋ. Nɩɩ ba man da kʋʋgɛ mʋ gbaa nɩn, naafɔɔ ɩ bɔ.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Gyudasi mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ lɛɛ mʋ sa mʋ gbaa taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ mɛ nɩɩ fʋ dɛɛ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɛɛhn, kanɩn nɩɩ fʋ tɔwɛ maa?”
Ba maa gyii mʋ Yesu taa bodobodo, nɩɩ ɔ fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ nɩɩ ɔ gyayɩ kɩmʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ taa sa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan kɔɔlɛ kɛ fan gyii, kɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ mɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ.”
Nɩɩ ɔ taa kɔɔpʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ ɔ taa sa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fanɛ kpini fan kɔɔlɛ kɛ fan nuu lɩɩ kɩmʋ tɔ.
Kɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ mɛ nkalan mʋ nɩɩ ki ŋmina Ɩbwaarɛ katɔwɛ kyula pʋpwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɩ kyɛɛgɛ wʋrɩgɛ sa asa gaalaagaa alibi kɩtaa kɛɛ sʋ.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ nɩn yɛ, n man bɩla yɛ n nuu falɛ nta nɩmʋ naa fʋʋ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ n maa fanɛ an biti a nuu nta pʋpwɛ mɛ‐Sɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ mʋ.”
Nɩɩ ba maa bɩɩ ɔlʋn lʋwɛ mʋ, ba kʋsʋ kyʋn olifu kɩbɩɩ sʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Kagyanbwɛ nɩmʋ fanɛ kpini fen biti fan sɩlɛ yɛgɛ mɛ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ,
‘N biti n mɔɔ nbʋlʋpʋ ɔkpapʋ mʋ,
kɛ nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ ba yaasɛ tɔ.’
Amaa nɩɩ n kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ, n biti n gyankpaa fanɛ kpee Galile.”
Nɩɩ Pita tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Halɩɩ nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ sɩlɛ yɛgɛ fʋ gbaa, mɛɛ mɛ n mɛɛ yɛ n sɩlɛ yɛgɛ fʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fʋ kesintin yɛ, kagyanbwɛ nɩmʋ pɔyɩ kɛ kyaasɛ ɔ bʋn mʋ, fii biti fu kina mɛ ɩlɩɩ ɩsa.”
Nɩɩ Pita lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Halɩɩ bee biti ba mɔɔ n maa fʋ gbaa n mɛɛ yɛ n tɔwɛ kanɩn kpini‐kpini.” Nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ abanban mʋ gbaa ba tɔwɛ kanɩn.
Nɩɩ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba kpee katɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Gesemani, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan kyɩna nfɩɩ kɛ n kpee falɛ naa kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ.”
Nɩɩ ɔ taa Pita maa Sebedi mu‐bii ana anyɔ buu mʋ n‐yɩɩ kpee. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ mʋ kɔkɔlɔ nyita mʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɛ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ ɩɩ kɔ mɛ lewu‐lewu, halɩɩ ii biti ɩ mɔɔ mɛ. Ɩmʋ sʋ fan kyɩna nfɩɩ tii mɛ sʋ kɛ fan man dɛ.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ o nin kpee ansi tɔ gbɛrɛɛ naa kyʋn bun ɛɛ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ yɛ, “Mɛ‐Sɛ, nɩɩ ii biti ɩ waa mʋ, lɛɛ awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ ba mɛ sʋ falɛ lɩɩ mɛ sʋ. Amaa yɛgɛ ɩ waa fu kebiti, man gyɛ mi kebiti.”
Nɩɩ o bwii ba abɩɩlapʋ asa mʋ asɛ ba tu ba maa dɛ nsɩɩrɛ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ Pita yɛ, “Amɔɔ fɛn mɛɛ taalɛ kyɩna yɛ mɛ kerefi kʋlʋn yɛgɛ fan man dɛ?
Fan kyɩna fan man dɛ, yɛgɛ fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ, kɛ fan man tɩyɛ kʋtʋʋ tɔ kɩɩ tɔ. Fanɛ n‐yaayu ii biti ɩ waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋrɔn, amaa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ‐wʋlɛ pɔɔ.”

Yesu bɩla bwii kpee ɩlɩɩ nyɔsapʋ naa kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ yɛ, “Mɛ‐Sɛ, nɩɩ ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ waa fʋ fɛɛ fʋ lɛɛ falɛ awʋrʋfɔ kɔɔpʋ nɩmʋ lɩɩ mɛ sʋ, nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ n gyii awʋrʋfɔ maa mʋ, yɛgɛ fu kebiti kɩ waa kanɩn.”
Maa bɩla bwii ba abɩɩlapʋ asa mʋ asɛ mʋ, o be tu bamʋ ba maa dɛ nsɩɩrɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ba man taalɛ galɛ nsɩɩrɛ.
Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla yɛgɛ bamʋ nɩɩ o kpee naa kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ kɩsasapʋ ɛɛ tɔwɛ asɩn kʋlʋn maŋa.
Nɩɩ o bwii ba mʋ abɩɩlapʋ asɛ ba taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan san fan dɛ fɛn fʋʋtɛ nɩn? Fan kɩɩ, saŋa mʋ fʋʋ fɛɛ ba taa mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ waa alibi awaapʋ abaa tɔ.
Fan kʋsʋ kɛ a kpee. Fan kɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ lɛɛ mɛ sa mʋ tiri tɔ.”
Maa san ɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ tɔ, ɔmʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Gyudasi mʋ ba tʋtɔ. Asa damantɛ akʋ ba buu mʋ, yɛgɛ ba sʋ isakunde
yɛ agulungu. Aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ asa mʋ abɩlɩsa i sun bamʋ.
Gyudasi mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ lɛɛ Yesu sa mʋ, wʋla tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ n dan naa baari mʋ tɔ mʋ, mʋ nɩmʋ, fan kɩtaa mʋ.”
Ba maa fʋʋ tʋtɔ mʋ, nɩɩ opula tɔ Gyudasi kpee Yesu asɛ nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, n fwaala fʋ.” Nɩɩ o baari Yesu tɔ.
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Kyɛmɩnɛ, waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fʋ ba kɩmʋ sʋ mʋ.” Tʋtɔ nɩɩ asa mʋ ba kyʋn naa kɩtaa Yesu tɔ kinkin.
Tʋtɔ mʋ, asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Yesu asɛ mʋ ɔkʋ bɩɩtɛ mʋ sakunde lɛɛ, nɩɩ ɔ ŋɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ kʋsʋ tɩn.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Bwiiyaa fʋ sakunde mʋ waa kɩmʋ kikufe tɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩtaa sakunde ɛɛ kɔ mʋ, sakunde lewu nɩɩ ee biti o wu.
Fʋ man nyi fɛɛ n taalɛ tɩɩ mɛ‐Sɛ, kɛ ɔ yɛgɛ sʋsʋ nbɔɔ ngbɩn‐ngbɩn kudu anyɔ ba ba opula nɩmʋ tɔ ba kyɛ mɛ tɔ abɛɛ?
Amaa nɩɩ ɩ kan waa kanɩn mʋ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlɛsa mʋ tɔ yɛ ɩ dagaa ɩ maa waa mʋ, ɩ ba tɔ?”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ sakyɔ mʋ yɛ, “Fan taa isakunde yɛ agulungu fan ba kɩtaa mɛ fɛɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kʋsʋ yɩlɛ kɩbanɛ sʋ. Kakɛ kʋmaa n kyɩna kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ tɔ n kaapʋ, fan man kɩtaa mɛ.
Amaa ɩnɩmʋ kpini ɩ waa nɩn kɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ ba kyʋrɔɔ yɩla mʋ ɩ nyɛ ba ɩmʋ tɔ.” Tʋtɔ nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ kpini ba sɩlɛ yɛgɛ mʋ.
Bamʋ nɩɩ ba kɩtaa Yesu mʋ ba taa mʋ kpee Kefasi, oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ, katɩn mʋ nɩɩ nbara akaapʋpʋ yɛ asa mʋ abɩlɩsa ba gyaŋɛ mʋ.
Amaa Pita buu bamʋ kɩyaa‐kɩyaa, halɩɩ ba naa fʋʋ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ. Nɩɩ Pita sii kyɩna kɩkpaara mʋ akɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ asɛ, kɛ o wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ naa lʋwɛ.
Aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ Gyiwu abi abɩlɩsa amu‐amu ngyaŋɛ mʋ kpini ba tɔwɛ kɔnɔ waa Yesu bee biti antɩŋɛsa ba tɩn gyaga mʋ sʋ, kɛ ba nyɛ ɔkpa mɔɔ mʋ.
Antɩŋɛsa adansɛ agyipu gaalaagaa ba ba tɔwɛ, amaa ba man nyɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba taa gyaga mʋ sʋ.
Kamaa tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ anyɩn anyɔ akʋ ba lɩɩ ba yɩlɛ tɔwɛ yɛ,
“Ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘N taalɛ boyi kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ nɩmʋ, kɛ n taa nkɛ nsa bwii pɔyɩ kɩmʋ.’ ”
Nɩɩ Oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ kʋsʋ yɩlɛ nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Fʋ mɛɛ yɛ fʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ lɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ anyɩn nɩmʋ ba sʋ bɛɛ gyaga fʋ sʋ falɛ?”
Amaa Yesu man tɔwɛ sɛhn. Nɩɩ Oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ bwii tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “N bɔ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ kakpaa mʋ ntan yɛ tɔwɛ anɛ. Fʋ ɩ gyɛ Krisito, Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii mʋ?”

Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɩmʋ nɩɩ fʋ tɔwɛ mʋ. Amaa n tɔwɛ fanɛ nɩn yɛ, lɩɩ ndaga ɩ sʋ ii kpee mʋ, fen biti fan wu mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ n maa tɛ Ɔlʋnpʋ Owura lala mʋ gyisa sʋ, nɩɩ fen biti fan bɩla wu maa lɩɩ abwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ tɔ sʋsʋ n ba.”
Nɩɩ Oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ kɩtaa mʋ kaalɛ kyatɛ
nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Nbusaa asɩn! A man bɩla an biti adansɛ kʋ. Fan nu nbusaa asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ.
Nɛnɛ nɩɩ fɛn fɛ kɩmʋ nfɛɛrɛ?”
Nɩɩ asa mʋ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɩ dagaa maa wu?”
Nɩɩ ba tʋʋ nkyɔlɛ waa mu ansi tɔ nɩɩ ba dayɩ mʋ, nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba kpa mʋ ɩtan.
Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Krisito, nɩɩ fʋ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ mʋ, bɩɩ tɔwɛ anɛ, ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ da fʋ falɛ?”
Pita maa tɛ kɩkpaara mʋ, nɩɩ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ kibite kʋ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ngbaa fʋ, fu tii Yesu, Kagalile‐nyɩn nɩmʋ sʋ.”
Amaa Pita kyɛɛ bamʋ kpini ansi tɔ yɛ, “Asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ tɔwɛ falɛ, n man nyi ɩmʋ sʋ gbaa kpini‐kpini.”
Maa lɩɩ kpee kewusunɔ mʋ, nɩɩ kibite kʋ mɔɔ bɩla wu mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ tʋtɔ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ daa o tii Yesu Kanasareti‐nyɩn mʋ sʋ nɩn.”
Nɩɩ Pita bɔ ntan kyɛɛ yɛ, “N man nyi ɔnyɩn maŋa gbaa kpini‐kpini.”
Ɩ maa waa gbɛrɛɛ mʋ, nɩɩ anyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ tʋtɔ mʋ ba tɔwɛ Pita yɛ, “Kesintin tɔ mʋ, fʋ gyɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ katɔwɛ tɔ ɩɩ kaapʋ kanɩn.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Pita tɔwɛ nnɔ gyaga mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ bɔ ntan tɔwɛ yɛ, “N man nyi ɔnyɩn maa kpini‐kpini.”
Opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ kyaasɛ bʋn.
Nɩɩ Pita nyiŋi asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Yesu daa tɔwɛ mʋ mʋ, fɛɛ “Pɔyɩ kɛ kyaasɛ ɔ bʋn mʋ, fii biti fu kina mɛ ɩlɩɩ ɩsa.” Nɩɩ Pita lɩɩ ɩkaa sʋ naa su gaa.
Kayɩ maa kɛ nyenyenfuu mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu abɩlɩsa mʋ kpini yɛ asa mʋ abɩlɩsa mʋ ba bʋga ŋmina yɛ ba mɔɔ Yesu.
Ba ŋmina mʋ, nɩɩ ba taa mʋ kyʋn, nɩɩ ba taa mʋ waa ɔsʋwʋlɛ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ Paleti abaa tɔ.
Gyudasi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mʋ sa mʋ, maa wu fɛɛ ba bun Yesu lewu kʋpwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ o nu mʋ n‐yɩɩ, nɩɩ o bwiiyaa gbiti nderebi adɩsa mʋ naa sa Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu abɩlɩsa yɛ kadɛ abɩlɩsa mʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N waa alibi fɛɛ n maa lɛɛ ɔmʋnɩ ɔ man waa alibi akʋ mʋ sa fanɛ.” Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ man gyɛ anɛ asɩn. Fʋ nkʋn asɩn nɩn.”
Ɩmʋ sʋ Gyudasi funti afulee mʋ waa kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kyʋn. Nɩɩ ɔ naa kyaga mʋ n‐yɩɩ ɔfɛ.
Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu abɩlɩsa mʋ ba tasɛ nderebi mʋ, nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nbara mʋ ɩ mɛɛ sa ɔkpa fɛɛ a taa afulee nɩmʋ bʋga yɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ afulee mʋ tɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ gyɛ nkalan afulee nɩn.”
Ɩmʋ sʋ ba tɔwɛ kyula abaa nɩɩ ba taa afulee maŋa naa sɔɔ nlobi apɔyɩpʋ kʋ kasɛ, kɛ ba baa bee pula afɔ‐kyilim tʋtɔ.
Kanɩn sʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ tʋtɔ yɛ, Nkalan kasɛ ba lɩɩ halɩɩ ndaga.
Ɩmʋ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Gyeremiya tɔwɛ mʋ ba tɔ. Ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, “Ɩsɩrayɩ abi ba taa gbiti nderebi adɩsa mʋ, ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ afulee mʋ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ kyula yɛ ba taa sɔɔ mʋ mʋ, kɔnɔ.
Nɩɩ ba taa ɩmʋ sɔɔ nlobi apɔyɩpʋ kʋ kasɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ sa kɔnɔ mʋ.”
Saŋa maŋa yɛgɛ Yesu yɩlɛ ɔsʋwʋlɛ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ Paleti ansi tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ Gyiwu abi owura lala mʋ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɛɛhn, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fʋ tɔwɛ mʋ.”
Amaa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu abɩlɩsa yɛ kadɛ mʋ abɩlɩsa bɛɛ pwɩɩ mʋ mʋ, ɔ man lɛɛ kɔnɔ.
Nɩɩ Paleti taasɛ yɛ, “Fʋ man nu asɩn pwɩɩsa mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ bɛɛ pwɩɩ fʋ mʋ?”
Amaa Yesu man lɛɛ kɔnɔ lɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ sʋ bɛɛ pwɩɩ mʋ mʋ tɔ kʋkʋlʋn gbaa. Nɩɩ i kyinkyin Paleti gaa.
Nɩɩ ɩ wʋla ɩ dɛ fɛɛ, kesu kɔnɔ kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ kensi‐gyii kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ mʋ, Roma abi ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ, ɩɩ lɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba tii bamʋ obu mʋ tɔ ɔkʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ sakyɔ mʋ ii biti mʋ sa bamʋ.
Kanɩn saŋa maŋa mʋ, kumu tɔ ɔlʋn wuya kʋ kyɩna o tii obu nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Barabasi.
Ɩmʋ sʋ sakyɔ mʋ ba maa gyaŋɛ mʋ, Paleti taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ nɩɩ fen biti n lɛɛ sa fanɛ? Barabasi, abɛɛ Yesu mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ Krisito mʋ?”
Lɩɩ fɛɛ o nyi ɩ maa gyɛ kayɩɩ basa sʋ, nɩɩ ba taa Yesu waa mʋ abaa tɔ.
Paleti maa san ɔ tɛ asɩn kigyii kagya sʋ mʋ, mʋ‐ka sun ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Man waa ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ, mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man waa alibi akʋ kʋtɔ kʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ n wu awʋrʋfɔ mɛ idee tɔ ndaga gaa lɩɩ mʋ sʋ.”
Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ kadɛ abɩlɩsa mʋ ba tɔwɛ waa sakyɔ mʋ yɛ, ba kʋlɛ yɛ bee biti Barabasi, kɛ ɔ yɛgɛ ba mɔɔ Yesu.
Nɩɩ Ɔsʋwʋlɛ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Bamʋ anyɔ nɩmʋ tɔ mʋ, ɔmɔɔ nɩɩ fen biti fɛɛ n lɛɛ mʋ sa fanɛ?”
Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Barabasi.”
Nɩɩ Paleti taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nɩɩ n waa Yesu mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Krisito mʋ?”
Nɩɩ bamʋ kpini ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Da mʋ mata oyu laasa sʋ.”
Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ sʋ? Mɩnɛ alibi nɩɩ ɔ waa?”
Amaa ba lɔŋɔ kuusi kenken tii sʋ yɛ, “Da mʋ mata oyu laasa sʋ!”

Paleti maa wu fɛɛ ɔ mɛɛ bɩla taalɛ waa asɩn mʋ sɛhn mʋ, yɛgɛ ɩ sʋ sʋgʋrɛ‐sʋgʋrɛ ɩɩ ba mʋ, ɔ taa nkyu fwɩɩ mʋ abaa sakyɔ mu ansi tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Mɛ abaa ɩ man tii kanyɩn nɩmʋ lewu sʋ, ɩ gyɛ fanɛ asɩn nɩn!”
Asa mʋ kpini ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Yɛgɛ mu lewu kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ ɩ baa ɩ gyan anɛ yɛ anɛ‐bii ana sʋ!”
Nɩɩ ɔ taa Barabasi sa bamʋ. Amaa ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba tɩŋɛ Yesu awulibi, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ sa yɛ ba naa da mʋ mata oyu laasa sʋ.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ anaakɔpʋ ba taa Yesu loo bamʋ opula, nɩɩ ba tɩɩ anaakɔpʋ mʋ kpini ba kyaabɔɔ Yesu.
Ba bugi mʋ kaalɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ba taa kaalɛ pɩpɛɛ bʋnswɩɩsa kʋ ba bun mʋ,
nɩɩ ba taa iwii bɔɔ fɛɛ kuwura‐wʋrʋ gyaga mu kumu sʋ, nɩɩ ba taa owura kikpebi waa mʋ gyisa kɩbaa tɔ, nɩɩ ba muŋa mu ansi tɔ nɩɩ ba ŋmasɛ mʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Gyiwu abi Owura! An muŋa fʋ”
Ba tʋʋ nkyɔlɛ wʋrɩgɛ mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ owura kikpebi mʋ da mu kumu tɔ.
Ba maa ŋmasɛ mʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, ba bugi kaalɛ pɩpɛɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ba bwii taa mʋ atɔ bunsa mʋ bun mʋ. Nɩɩ ba taa mʋ bee kpee ba naa da mʋ mata oyu laasa sʋ.
Ba maa naa bee kpee mʋ, ba gyaŋa Simon Kesirene‐nyɩn, nɩɩ ba nyan mʋ yɛ ɔ sʋla Yesu oyu laasa mʋ.
Ba ba fʋʋ opula mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Goligota (kɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ kumu kawɛ opula).
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba sa Yesu nta mʋ nɩɩ ba taa kɩfɛ bʋlɩlɩsa kʋ kyagɩlɛ tɔ, maa daa kɩɩ mʋ, nɩɩ o kina kinuu.
Ba maa da mʋ mata oyu laasa sʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, ba tʋʋ nbii barɩgɛ mʋ atɔ bunsa tɔ.
Nɩɩ ba kyʋn kyɩna bee kun mʋ.
Ba kyʋrɔɔ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba taa bun mʋ kʋpwɛ mʋ gyaga mu amu sʋ yɛ, ƆNƖMƲ Ɩ GYƐ YESU, GYIWU ABI OWURA MƲ.
Ba da bamʋ nɩɩ bee yuuri ɔlʋn sʋ anyɔ akʋ iyu laasa sʋ tii mʋ sʋ. Ɔkʋ bʋ mʋ gyisa sʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɔɔ bʋ mʋ bɩna sʋ.
Asa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kyʋn mʋ, bɛɛ sʋ asebi bɛɛ wʋrɩgɛ mʋ sʋ yɛgɛ bee fi‐fi bamʋ amu,
yɛgɛ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fʋ mʋ nɩɩ fʋ tɔwɛ yɛ fii biti fʋ boyi kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ, kɛ fʋ pɔyɩ kɩmʋ nkɛ nsa mʋ, mɔlɩgɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ! Nɩɩ fʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐Bii‐nyɩnsa mʋ, kpɩlɩgɛ lɩɩ oyu laasa mʋ sʋ!”
Kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu abɩlɩsa yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ yɛ abɩlɩsa mʋ ba ŋmasɛ mʋ.
Ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔ mɔlɩgɛ akʋ, amaa ɔ mɛɛ taalɛ mɔlɩgɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ. Mʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ owura! Fan yɛgɛ ɔ kpɩlɩgɛ lɩɩ oyu laasa mʋ sʋ ba nbɩɩnbɩɩ, kɛ a kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii.
Ɔ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ tʋʋ Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐Bii mʋ. Fan yɛgɛ a kɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ mɔlɩgɛ mʋ nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ.”
Ɔkpa kʋlʋn maŋa sʋ nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ bee yuuri ɔlʋn sʋ, mʋ nɩɩ ba da bamʋ mata iyu laasa yɛ mʋ mʋ, gbaa ba taa asebi wʋrɩgɛ mʋ sʋ.
Lɩɩ kyɔwɛ amu nsana naa fʋʋ kalaatɩpwɛ kerefi asa tɔ mʋ, kitentenbiri bun ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ kpini.
Nɩɩ kerefi asa maŋa tɔ mʋ, Yesu kuusi kenken yɛ, “Eli, Eli lamaa sabatani?” Ɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, “Mɛ‐Sɛ, mɛ‐Sɛ, mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fu kina mɛ?”
Asa mʋ nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ tʋtɔ mʋ, ba maa nu asɩn mʋ, nɩɩ akʋ ba yɛ, “Ɛɛ tɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Eligya.”
Opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋ sɩlɛ naa taa ɔkyɛɛ dufudufu taa naa nyɔ nta nyaŋɛsa kʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ taa ŋmina oyu sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kʋsaa naa tii Yesu kɔnɔ yɛ o nuu.
Asansa mʋ ba yɛ, “Nbɩɩnbɩɩ fan yɛgɛ mʋ, kɛ a kɩɩ fɛɛ Eligya ee biti ɔ ba mɔlɩgɛ mʋ abɛɛ?”
Yesu maa bɩla kuusi kenken mʋ, ɔ tɩn ɔŋɛɛ.
Kanɩn saŋa maŋa kɩtaa kunsa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ barɩgɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, kyatɛ tɔ anyɔ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba yii kasɛ. Nɩɩ kasɛ gyingyen, nɩɩ afʋlɛ ɩ baaŋɛ tɔ.
Nkyan i bugi‐bugi tɔ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba wu mʋ, gaalaagaa ba kyiŋi ba nkpa tɔ.
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ, ba tii Yesu sʋ kpee kadɛ kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ asa gaalaagaa ba wu bamʋ.

Anaakɔpʋ kɩlɩfa ɔbɩlɩsa yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ mʋ asɛ bee kun Yesu mʋ, ba maa wu kasɛ maa gyingyen, yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa maŋa kpini mʋ, kufuu kɩ kɩtaa bamʋ gaa, nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Kesintin tɔ, ɔ kyɩna ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐Bii nɩn!”
Akyɩɩ gaalaagaa ba bʋ tʋtɔ ba yɩlɛ kata‐kata bɛɛ kɩɩ. Bamʋ ɩ kyɩna ba gyɛ akyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ba buu Yesu lɩɩ Galile nɩɩ ba kyɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ.
Bamʋ tɔ akʋ ɩ gyɛ Mɛɛrɩ Magidalen mʋ, yɛ Gyemisi maa Gyosefu bamʋ‐nyi Mɛɛrɩ, yɛ Sebedi mu‐bii ana bamʋ nyi.
Ɩ maa fʋʋ kalaatɩpwɛ sʋ mʋ, atɔ wuya kʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Arimatiya kadɛ tɔ, nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Gyosefu, nɩɩ mʋ gbaa mʋ gyɛ Yesu ɔbɩɩlapʋ mʋ ɔkʋ.
O kpee Paleti asɛ naa kʋlɛ Yesu kubuni, nɩɩ Paleti sa kɔnɔ yɛ ba taa sa mʋ.
Gyosefu taa kibuni mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa kɩkalala pʋpwɛ maalɛ mʋ,
nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ pula mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ kakyan pʋpwɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ ŋɛ kɩfʋlɛ waa ɔbɔ yɩla mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ o gbiliti kubuu lala kʋ tii kakyan mʋ kɔnɔ nɩɩ ɔ natɛ kyʋn.
Mɛɛrɩ Magidalen maa Mɛɛrɩ banban mʋ, be sii bɛ tɛ, yɛgɛ bamʋ ansi ɩ kaapʋ kakyan mʋ.
Ɩmʋ lɩɩkaakɛ maa gyɛ Kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ mʋ, aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ Farasii abi mʋ ba kpee Paleti asɛ naa tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ,
“Ɔbɩlɩsa! An nyiŋi fɛɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔpɩnapʋ mʋ tɛ nkpa tɔ mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Nkɛ nsa kamaa mʋ, n biti n kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ ba nkpa tɔ.’

Ɩmʋ sʋ wʋla sa kɔnɔ kɛ asa ba naa kyɩna kun mʋ kakyan mʋ naa fʋʋ kakɛ sasapʋ mʋ. Nɩɩ man gyɛ kanɩn mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ bee biti ba be yuuri mu kibuni mʋ, kɛ ba tɔwɛ asa yɛ o kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ. Nɩɩ ɩ kan ba kanɩn mʋ, mʋ npɩna mʋ ii biti ɩ ŋara ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla pɩna falɛ.”
Nɩɩ Paleti lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fan taa anaakɔpʋ, kɛ ba naa yɩlɛ kun kakyan mʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fen nyi fɛɛ fɛn taalɛ waa mʋ.”
Ɩmʋ sʋ ba kpee kakyan mʋ asɛ naa waa kʋtɔ kʋ tarɩ kubuu mʋ, nɩɩ ba lɛɛ akɩɩsʋpʋ yɩla yɛ ba kun kɩmʋ.
Kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ kamaa tɔ, ɩmʋ Kwasida akɛ nyenyenfuu mʋ, Mɛɛrɩ Magidalen maa Mɛɛrɩ banban mʋ, ba kpee naa kɩɩ kakyan mʋ.
Opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ kasɛ ki gyingyen gaa. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ kpɩlɩgɛ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba gbiliti kubuu mʋ nɩɩ ki tii kakyan mʋ kɔnɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kyʋn kyɩna kɩmʋ sʋ.
Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ ɩɩ ŋalɩgɛ sʋ fɛɛ bʋlayɩ maa wɛɛ ɩsɛɛ, nɩɩ mʋ atɔ bunsa mɔɔ ii fuuli parɛparɛ fɛɛ ateebi.
Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ bee kun kakyan mʋ, ba maa wu kabɔɔ mʋ, kufuu kɩ kɩtaa bamʋ, nɩɩ ba kyɩkyaa tɩyɛ fɛɛ asa wusa mʋ.
Nɩɩ kabɔɔ mʋ tɔwɛ akyɩɩ mʋ yɛ, “Fan man waa kufuu, lɩɩ fɛɛ n nyi fan maa kɩɩ fen biti Yesu mʋ nɩɩ ba da mʋ mata oyu laasa sʋ mʋ nɩn.
Ɔ man bʋ nfɩɩ, o kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla tɔwɛ mʋ. Fan ba kɩɩ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba daa taa mʋ yɩla mʋ.
Fan bwii bilen naa tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, ‘O kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ ba nkpa tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ gyankpaa fanɛ ee kpee Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ fen biti fan wu mʋ.’ Fan nu, n tɔwɛ fanɛ nɩmʋ.”
Ɩmʋ sʋ akyɩɩ mʋ, ba kpala lɩɩ kakyan mʋ asɛ, ba sʋ kufuu, yɛgɛ bamʋ ansi i gyii. Nɩɩ ba sɩlɛ ba naa tɔwɛ Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ.
Opula tɔ nɩɩ Yesu gyaŋa bamʋ ɔkpa tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, “N fwaala fanɛ.” Nɩɩ ba nin tiri mʋ tɔ, kɩtaa mʋ ayaa tɔ muŋa sun mʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan man waa kufuu! Fan kpee naa tɔwɛ mɛ bɩrɩsa ana yɛ ba kpee Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, tʋtɔ nɩɩ bee biti ba wu mɛ.”
Akyɩɩ mʋ ba maa san ba bʋ ɔkpa tɔ bee kpee mʋ, kakyan mʋ akunpu mʋ akʋ ba kpee Gyerusalem kadɛ tɔ naa buu sa aseepu abɩlɩsa kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ waa.
Aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ abɩlɩsa ba maa ba gyaŋɛ mʋ, ba ŋmina yɩla kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba waa. Ɩmʋ sʋ ba sa anaakɔpʋ akunpu mu afulee kʋkyɔ,
lan tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ɩ ba kagyanbwɛ ba yuuri Yesu kibuni mʋ taa kyʋn, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ an dɛ nsɩɩrɛ mʋ.’
Nɩɩ falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ kan naa fʋʋ Ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ Paleti asɛ mʋ, anɛ ii biti a tɔwɛ yɩlɛ fanɛ kamaa, kɛ ɔ man waa fanɛ sɛhn.”
Ɩmʋ sʋ anaakɔpʋ mʋ ba kɔɔlɛ afulee mʋ, nɩɩ ba waa fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ ba waa mʋ. Nɩɩ falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ ɩ yaasɛ loo Gyiwu abi mʋ tɔ ba lɩɩ halɩɩ ndaga.
Nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ kudu ɔkʋ mʋ ba kpee kɩbɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, katɩn mʋ nɩɩ Yesu wʋla tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ ba kpee mʋ.
Ba maa wu Yesu mʋ, ba muŋa sun mʋ, nɩɩ bamʋ akʋ ba gyii ɩmɔɔrɛ yɛ man gyɛ mʋ nɩn.
Nɩɩ Yesu nin tiri bamʋ, tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ taa sʋsʋ yɛ kasɛ sʋ ɔlʋn kpini sa mɛ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ fan kpee dulinyaa tɔ katɩn kʋmaa, naa waa asa kpini mɛ abɩɩlapʋ. Fan gyee bamʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee, lɩɩ Ɔsɛ yɛ Obii yɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ,
kɛ fan kaapʋ bamʋ kɛ ba buu kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ n sa fanɛ kɔnɔ yɛ fan waa mʋ. Fan nyiŋi fɛɛ n bʋ fanɛ asɛ saŋa kʋmaa naa fʋʋ dulinyaa laalaalʋwɛ.”
Mark: Asɩn danbɩrasa lɩɩ Yesu Krisito, Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ sʋ mʋ ndee.
Asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ i piili fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Isaya wʋla kyʋrɔɔ yɩla mʋ. Ɔ kyʋrɔɔ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla tɔwɛ Mu‐Bii Yesu Krisito mʋ yɛ,
“Kɩɩ, n biti n sun mɛ kabɔɔ kɛ ɔ gyankpaa fʋ,
mʋ ii biti ɔ ba lɔŋɔ fʋ ɔkpa mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Isaya bɩla kyʋrɔɔ lɩɩ Gyɔn sʋ yɛ,
“Ɔnyɩn kʋ bʋ ofuli sʋ ee kuusi ɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ,
‘Fan lɔŋɔ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ ɔkpa mʋ,
kɛ fan kyiigi mʋ ɩkpa‐bi mʋ.’ ”

Asɩn mʋ ɩ ba kanɩn. Ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ Gyɔn maa ba ɔ naa ofuli sʋ ee gyee asa Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee, yɛgɛ ɛɛ tɔwɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn ɛɛ sa asa yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa, kɛ n gyee fanɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ taa fanɛ alibi kɛɛ fanɛ.”

Kesintin mɔɔ, asa gaalaagaa ba lɩɩ Gyudeya ɩsʋwʋlɛ sʋ yɛ Gyerusalem kadɛ lala mʋ tɔ bee kpee Gyɔn asɛ ofuli maŋa sʋ, bɛɛ tɔwɛ alibi mʋ nɩɩ ba waa, yɛgɛ Gyɔn i gyee bamʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee Gyɔdan ɔbʋn mʋ tɔ.
Nyɔɔma ifuu nɩɩ ba taa lʋʋ Gyɔn kaalɛ bunsa, nɩɩ atɔbwaaya ɔwʋlɛ mɔɔ nɩɩ ɔ kyaŋɛ waa mʋ kɩrɩsʋ. Mʋ agyitɔ gyisa mɔɔ ɩ gyɛ ntuntunbi yɛ ŋmasan.
Gyɔn ɩɩ tɔwɛ asa mʋ yɛ, “Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ mɛ kamaa ɛɛ ba mʋ, kyɔ mɛ gaa, nɩɩ n man dagaa gbaa fɛɛ n muŋa lɛɛ mʋ asɩbɩta.
Mɛɛ mɛ, nkyu nɩɩ n sʋ n gyee fanɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee, amaa mɛɛ mʋ bɩrɛ, ee biti ɔ taa Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ ee gyee fanɛ.”
Tʋtɔ mʋ, Yesu lɩɩ Nasareti kadɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Galile kasɛ sʋ mʋ ba Gyɔn asɛ. Nɩɩ Gyɔn gyee mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee Gyɔdan ɔbʋn mʋ tɔ.
Yesu maa dan lɩɩ ɔbʋn mʋ tɔ yɩlɛ mʋ, o wu sʋsʋ maa bugi tɔ, nɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ kpɩlɩgɛ lɩɩ sʋsʋ fɛɛ kuwura‐lɔpɔ ba gyɔŋɔ Yesu sʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔbʋlɛ tɔwɛ lɩɩ sʋsʋ yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ mɛ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ obii bitisa. Nɩɩ fʋ ɩ bɔla mi ansi.”
Opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ yɛgɛ nɩɩ Yesu kpee ofuli sʋ.
Yesu kyɩna ofuli maŋa sʋ nkɛ adɩna. Maa bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ, Sɩtaanɛ naa tʋʋ mʋ tɔ kɩɩ. Maa nfatabwɛ nkʋn ɩ bʋ tʋtɔ. Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ ba ba kyɛ mʋ tɔ.
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba kɩtaa Gyɔn tii obu kamaa mʋ, Yesu kpee Galile kasɛ sʋ, ɔ naa ɛɛ tɔwɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ ɛɛ sa asa.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ ki tiri tɔ. Ɩmʋ sʋ fan yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa kɛ fan kɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ gyii.”
Yesu maa naa Galile ɔbʋn kaa mʋ, o wu ɩkɩn akɩtapʋ anyɔ akʋ, Simon maa mu‐supu Andiruwu, ba maa tʋʋ kisewu ɔbʋn mʋ tɔ.
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan ba buu mɛ, kɛ n waa fanɛ asa akɩtapʋ.”
Opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ ba yɛgɛ bamʋ asewu mʋ yɩla, nɩɩ ba buu Yesu.
Yesu maa bɩla kpee mu ansi tɔ gbɛrɛɛ mʋ, ɔ bɩla wu Gyemisi maa mu‐supu Gyɔn, Sebedi mu‐bii ana, ba bʋ bamʋ ɔkʋlɩ tɔ bɛɛ lɔŋɔ bamʋ asewu.
Yesu maa dan wu bamʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ bamʋ. Nɩɩ ba bwiiyaa bamʋ‐sɛ Sebedi maa mʋ ayaafɔlɛ yɛgɛ ɔkʋlɩ tɔ, nɩɩ ba natɛ buu Yesu.
Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba natɛ ba Kapanum kadɛ tɔ. Kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ maa fʋʋ mʋ, Yesu kpee kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa naa kaapʋ bamʋ abwaarɛsɩn.
Asa mʋ ba maa nu mʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ, ɩ waa bamʋ kɩyan, lɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ sʋ ɔlʋn, nɩɩ kɩ kwɩɩ yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ lɛɛ mʋ.
Bamʋ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa mʋ tɔ mʋ, ɔnyɩn kʋ mʋ nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi ba tɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ, kuusi kenken taasɛ Yesu yɛ,
“Yesu, Kanasareti‐nyɩn, mɩnɛ nɩɩ fii biti anɛ asɛ nfɩɩ? Fʋ ba kɛ fʋ ba nyita anɛ nɩn, abɛɛ nɛnɛ? N nyi ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ gyɛ. Fʋ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Nyɩmɩsa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu pʋntɛ kabwɩɩ libi mʋ sʋ yɛ, “Laatɔ, kɛ fʋ kʋsʋ ɔnyɩn mʋ sʋ.”
Nɩɩ kabwɩɩ libi mʋ ki gyingyen ɔnyɩn mʋ, nɩɩ o kuusi kenken kʋsʋ ɔnyɩn mʋ sʋ.
Kanɩn asɩn nɩmʋ ɩ waa asa mʋ kɩyan, nɩɩ bɛɛ taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Mɩnɛ asɩn ndee? Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ bɩla ɩ gyɛ kɩkaapʋ pʋpwɛ kʋ nɩn? Kɩɩ, ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ sʋ ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ pʋntɛ nbwɩɩ libi sʋ nɩɩ bee nu mʋ asɛ.”
Tʋtɔ mʋ, Yesu asɩn nɩmʋ a tɛɛ naa nu Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ mʋ kpini gyaŋɛ.
Nɩɩ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba lɩɩ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa mʋ tɔ kpee Simon maa Andiruwu kɩkpaara sʋ, nɩɩ Gyemisi maa Gyɔn gbaa ba tii sʋ.
Simon mʋ‐saa‐kyɩɩsa ɩɩ lɔ kibirima ɔ dɛ kalan sʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ Yesu maa loo kɩkpaara mʋ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ba buu sa mʋ yɛ ɔkyɩɩ maŋa ɩɩ lɔ.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu loo ɔkyɩɩ mʋ asɛ obu‐to, kɩtaa mʋ kɩbaa tɔ, kʋsaa mʋ kyɩna. Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nyɛ alanfɩya, nɩɩ ɔ waa agyitɔ kɩtaa bamʋ kɩfɔ.
Kalaatɩpwɛɛ maŋa kyɔwɛ maa dan ɛɛ tɩyɛ mʋ, nɩɩ asa ba taa alɔpʋ yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi ba tɛ bamʋ sʋ bɩya Yesu.
Kadɛ mʋ asa kpini ba ba gyaŋɛ kɩkpaara maŋa kebunɔ.
Yesu kyɛ asa gaalaagaa alobi, nɩɩ ɔ gya nbwɩɩ libi lɩɩ asa gaalaagaa sʋ. Nbwɩɩ libi mʋ maa nyi Yesu sʋ mʋ, ɔ man sa bamʋ ɔkpa yɛ ba tɔwɛ kʋtɔ kʋ.
Kyaasɛ gyankpaasa maa dan bʋn mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu kʋsʋ lɩɩ kɩkpaara kpee opula mʋ nɩɩ ki du surum, kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ.
Tʋtɔ mʋ, Simon maa mʋ bɩrɩsa ana ba naa bee biti Yesu.
Ba maa naa wu mʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ naa ee biti fʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu biliŋi tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ kɛ a kpee ndɛ‐bii mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ tiri nfɩɩ mʋ, kɛ n nyɛ naa tɔwɛ abwaarɛsɩn tʋtɔ. Ɩnɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ n lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba kasɛ sʋ nfɩɩ.”
Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ natɛ Galile ɩsʋwʋlɛ mʋ kpini gyaŋɛ ɛɛ tɔwɛ abwaarɛsɩn bamʋ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɩgyaŋɛkpa, yɛgɛ ɛɛ gya nbwɩɩ libi ɛɛ lɩɩ asa sʋ ɛɛ sa bamʋ.
Tʋtɔ mʋ, bootipu kʋ ba muŋa Yesu ayaa tɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ fʋ kɩpɩrɛ tɔ mʋ, fɩɩ taalɛ yɛgɛ mɛ n‐yɩɩ ɩ lɔŋɔ sʋ.”
Nɩɩ mʋ asɩn ɩ waa Yesu kʋwɛɛ, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ kɩbaa mata mʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɩ gyɛ mɛ kɩpɩrɛ tɔ, ɩmʋ sʋ fʋ n‐yɩɩ ɩ lɔŋɔ sʋ.”
Opula maŋa tɔ, nɩɩ kibootoo kɩ yɛgɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ alanfɩya.
Pɔyɩ kɛ Yesu ɔ yɛgɛ ɔ natɛ mʋ, ɔ da mu kumu tɔ yɛ,

“Man kan waa kɛ fʋ tɔwɛ falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ sa ɔkʋ. Amaa taa fʋ n‐yɩɩ naa kaapʋ Ɩbwaarɛ oseepu, kɛ ɔ taa fʋ atɔ waa saraga sa fʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Mosesi kaapʋ yɩla mʋ, kɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ o wu fɛɛ fʋ kʋlɔ mʋ kɩ lʋwɛ.”

Amaa ɔnyɩn mʋ dan lɩɩ kpee katɩn kʋmaa nɩmʋ ɛɛ da kibonbon ɛɛ sa asa yɛ Yesu ɩ kyɛ mʋ kibootoo. Ɩmʋ sʋ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ Yesu man bɩla ɛɛ nyɛ ee loo kadɛ kʋ tɔ tentengilen. O kpee katɩn mʋ nɩɩ i du diin, yɛgɛ asa bɛɛ lɩɩ katɩn kʋmaa nɩmʋ bɛɛ ba mʋ asɛ.
Ɩ man gyii nkɛ nkʋ nɩɩ Yesu bwii kpee Kapanum, nɩɩ asa ba nu fɛɛ ɔ baa ɔ bʋ kɩkpaara sʋ.
Nɩɩ asa kʋkyɔ ba ba bɔla tʋtɔ, nɩɩ ɔkpa man bɩla ɔ bʋ tɔ, halɩɩ kebunɔ gbaa, yɛgɛ Yesu ɩ tɔwɛ bamʋ abwaarɛsɩn.
Nɩɩ asa ana akʋ ba sʋla mʋgʋlɛ‐mʋgʋlɛ‐nyɩn boobi kʋ bɛɛ bɩya Yesu.

Amaa sakyɔ sʋ mʋ, ba man nyɛ ɔkpa, nɩɩ ba taa ɔnyɩn mʋ dii obu mʋ sʋsʋ, katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba taa ɩsɛ nyalɛ munla mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ba foti ɔbɔ opula mʋ nɩɩ Yesu bʋ mʋ kyɛɛkyɛɛ, nɩɩ ba kpɩlɩgaa ɔlɔpʋ mʋ, yɛgɛ ɔ dɛ mʋ kalan sʋ ba yɩla kasɛ.
Yesu maa wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ yɛ, “Mi‐bii, n taa fʋ alibi kɛɛ fʋ.”
Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ akʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba tɛ tʋtɔ mʋ bɛɛ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ bamʋ amu tɔ yɛ,
“Mɩnɛ kʋtɔ nbusaa asɩn nɩɩ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ ɩ tɔwɛ falɛ? Anɩmʋ ɩɩ taalɛ taa alibi ɛɛ kɛɛ tii Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ.”
Opula tɔ nɩɩ Yesu bɩɩ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ fɛ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fɛn fɛ kanɩn nfɛɛrɛ?
Ɩmʋ ɩmɔɔ ɩ bʋsɩn kɩtɔwɛ? Fɛɛ n tɔwɛ mʋgʋlɛ‐mʋgʋlɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘N taa fʋ alibi kɛɛ fʋ,’ abɛɛ n tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Kʋsʋ kɛ fʋ taa fʋ kalan natɛ?’
N biti n kaapʋ fanɛ yɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ n sʋ ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ n taalɛ taa alibi kɛɛ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ.” Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋgʋlɛ‐mʋgʋlɛ mʋ yɛ,
“Mɛ ɩ tɔwɛ fʋ fɛɛ, kʋsʋ taa fʋ kalan kɛ fu kpewu.”
Nɩɩ ɔ kʋsʋ taa mʋ kalan waa bilen kpewu, yɛgɛ asa ba kɩɩ mʋ, nɩɩ i kyinkyin bamʋ gaa, nɩɩ ba yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ fɛɛ, “An man pɩɩta wu falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ kakaakʋ.”
Yesu bwii kpee Galile ɔbʋn‐kaa, nɩɩ asa damantɛ ba ba mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ o piili ɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ.
Maa kyʋn ee kpee mʋ, o wu Alifeyo mu‐bii Lewi maa tɛ lenpoo ɔkɔɔlɛkpa. Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ba buu mɛ.” Nɩɩ Lewi kʋsʋ buu mʋ.
Ɩmʋ kamaa tɔ, Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba tɛ bee gyii Lewi kɩkpaara sʋ, nɩɩ lenpoo akɔɔlɛpʋ yɛ alibi awaapʋ damantɛ ba buu mʋ, nɩɩ bamʋ gaalaagaa ba be tii mʋ sʋ bee gyii agyitɔ.
Nɩɩ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ Farasii abi mʋ, ba maa wu fɛɛ Yesu maa alibi awaapʋ yɛ lenpoo akɔɔlɛpʋ ba maa gyii mʋ, ba taasɛ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ kʋtɔ sʋ nɩɩ maa falɛ asa ɩ tɛ bee gyii?”
Yesu nu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Bamʋ nɩɩ ba mɛɛ lɔ mʋ, be mee biti ɔkyɛpʋ, amɔɔ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ lɔ. N man ba nɩn kɛ n ba tɩɩ adanbɩrasa awaapʋ, amɔɔ alibi awaapʋ.”

Gyɔn Okyugyeepu abɩɩlapʋ yɛ Farasii abi bee ŋmina kɔnɔ. Nɩɩ asa akʋ ba kpee Yesu asɛ naa taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ Gyɔn Okyugyeepu abɩɩlapʋ yɛ Farasii abi abɩɩlapʋ bee ŋmina kɔnɔ, nɩɩ fʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ bɩrɛ be mee ŋmina?”
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Kɩkyɩɩfɔ tɔ asa bɛɛ taalɛ ŋmina kɔnɔ yɛgɛ ɔkyɩɩfɔ mu‐kuli san ɔ bʋ bamʋ asɛ? Ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ waa kanɩn. Fɛɛ ɔkyɩɩfɔ mu‐kuli san bʋ bamʋ asɛ falɛ.
Amaa saŋa kʋ ɩɩ ba nɩɩ bee biti ba taa ɔkyɩɩfɔ mu‐kuli mʋ lɩɩ bamʋ asɛ. Kanɩn saŋa maŋa tɔ nɩɩ bee biti ba ŋmina kɔnɔ.
“Ba mɛɛ taa kikyibi pʋpwɛ bɛɛ mata kaalɛ dɩdaa ɔbɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ kii biti kɩ kyatɛ kaalɛ mʋ tii sʋ.

Kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taa nta pʋpwɛ waa kʋtɔbwaaya ɔwʋlɛ taakpe dɩdaa tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ kan waa kanɩn, nɩɩ nta mʋ ɩɩ bɩlɛ mʋ, ii biti ɩ kyatɛ taakpe dɩdaa mʋ nyita, kɛ nta mʋ ɩ kyɛɛgɛ fɔyɩ. Amaa bɛɛ taa nta pʋpwɛ waa taakpe pʋpwɛ tɔ, kɛ ɩmʋ anyɔ mʋ ɩ man nyita.”
Kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa kʋ, nɩɩ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba naa alʋn kadɔɔ kʋ tɔ, nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba piili bɛɛ gyayɩ alʋn mʋ ɩkʋ.
Nɩɩ Farasii abi mʋ ba yɛ, “Kɩɩ, mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fʋ abɩɩlapʋ bɛɛ waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man dɛ ɔkpa kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fan man pɩɩta kalɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Owura Dawidi maa mʋ kamaa tɔ abi ba waa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ akʋn a mɔɔ bamʋ mʋ nɩn?

Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Abiyata kyɩna ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ, Owura Dawidi loo Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa obu mʋ tɔ naa taa bodobodo mʋ nɩɩ ba taa lɛɛ saraga sa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ wɛ, nɩɩ ɔ sa mʋ kamaa tɔ abi, yɛgɛ ɩ man dɛ ɔkpa fɛɛ ba wɛ ɩmʋ, amɔɔ aseepu mʋ nkʋn.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ fɛɛ, “Nyɩmɩsa kɩdanbɩrasa sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ waa kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa mʋ, man gyɛ nyɩmɩsa nɩɩ ba waa sa kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa mʋ sa.
Ɩmʋ sʋ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ n kyɔ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa mʋ gbaa.”
Yesu bwii kpee kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa. Ɔnyɩn kʋ mʋ nɩɩ mʋ kɩbaa ki wu mʋ bʋ tʋtɔ.
Asa akʋ mɔɔ ba bʋ tʋtɔ nɩɩ bee biti kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba nyɛ asɩn akʋ taa pwɩɩ Yesu. Ɩmʋ sʋ ba tɛ bee gyoo fɛɛ Yesu ii biti ɔ kyɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ, abɛɛ ɔ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ kyɛ mʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ yɛ, “Kʋsʋ yɩlɛ bamʋ ansi tɔ nfɩɩ.”
Nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ asa mʋ yɛ, “Kɩmɔmɔ nɩɩ anɛ nbara mʋ ɩɩ sa ɔkpa fɛɛ a waa kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ? Adanbɩrasa abɛɛ alibi? A mɔlɩgɛ asa abɛɛ a mɔɔ?” Asa mʋ ba man taalɛ tɔwɛ sɛhn.
Nɩɩ Yesu kɩɩ bamʋ kyaabɔɔ agbʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɩ kɔ mʋ gaa lɩɩ bamʋ kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn sʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ yɛ, “Tɛɛŋɛ fʋ kɩbaa.” Nɩɩ ɔ tɛɛŋɛ mʋ kɩbaa, nɩɩ ki kyiŋi.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Farasii abi mʋ ba lɩɩ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ba maa Herodi kamaa abi ba naa waa kɔnɔ kʋlʋn ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ba taa kɛ ba mɔɔ Yesu.
Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba lɩɩ ɩkaa sʋ kpee Galile ɔbʋn ɔkaa, nɩɩ asa damantɛ ba lɩɩ Galile yɛ Gyudeya ɩsʋwʋlɛ sʋ ba buu mʋ.
Akʋ ba lɩɩ Gyerusalem kadɛ lala yɛ ɩsʋwʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ Idumiya, yɛ Gyɔdan ɔbʋn kyɔwɛ kɩlɩɩ yɛ Taayi maa Sidon ndɛ lala mʋ abaafʋn. Asa damantɛ ba ba Yesu asɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba nu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa.
Sakyɔ mʋ sʋ mʋ, Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ ba lɔŋɔ ɔkʋlɩ yɩla mʋ, kɛ ba man nyɛ nin tiri mʋ tɔ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ kyɛ asa damantɛ, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ san bɛɛ lɔ mʋ kpini, bee nin bee tiri mʋ, kɛ ba nyɛ mata mʋ.
Nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi wuya ana ba kan wu mʋ mʋ, bɛɛ lɩɩ bɛɛ tɩyɛ mu ansi tɔ, kɛ ba kuusi tɔwɛ fɛɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu ɩ gya bamʋ fɛɛ ba man tɔwɛ ɔkʋ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ.
Nɩɩ Yesu kpee kɩbɩɩ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti, nɩɩ ba ba mʋ asɛ.
Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ bamʋ tɔ asa kudu anyɔ, nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ bamʋ fɛɛ asunpu. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N lɛɛ fanɛ fɛɛ fan baa fan bʋ mɛ asɛ, kɛ n sun fanɛ fan naa tɔwɛ abwaarɛsɩn.
N biti n sa fanɛ ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan taalɛ taa gya nbwɩɩ libi.”
Asa kudu anyɔ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ mʋ atɩɩ ndee. Simon (mʋ nɩɩ Yesu yɩla mʋ kɩtɩɩ yɛ Pita).
Sebedi mu‐bii ana Gyemisi yɛ Gyɔn, (mʋ nɩɩ Yesu yɩla bamʋ kɩtɩɩ yɛ Bwanegesi ɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, Bʋlayɩ kikpira nbii).
Bamʋ akʋ ɩ gyɛ Andiruwu yɛ Filipu yɛ Batolome yɛ Matiwu yɛ Tomasi yɛ Alifeyo mu‐bii Gyemisi yɛ Simon Seloti
yɛ Gyuda Isikariyoti, mʋ nɩɩ ɔ ba lɛɛ Yesu sa mʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu bwii kpee kewu tɔ. Nɩɩ sakyɔ bɩla ba mʋ asɛ, halɩɩ maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba man nyɛ saŋa kɛ ba gyii.
Mʋ kʋʋpʋ ana ba maa nu falɛ mʋ, ba sun ba naa kɩtaa mʋ ba, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba nu asa bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ i nyita.
Nɩɩ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba lɩɩ Gyerusalem mʋ akʋ ba yɛ, “Yesu sʋ Beelisebu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ nbwɩɩ libi kumu mʋ ɔlʋn. Mʋ ɩɩ sa mʋ ɔlʋn nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ ɛɛ gya nbwɩɩ libi falɛ.”
Ɩmʋ sʋ Yesu tɩɩ bamʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ kɩŋasan tɔ yɛ, “Ɔkpa mɔɔ sʋ nɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ ɩ taalɛ gya Sɩtaanɛ?
Nɩɩ ɔsʋwʋlɛ asa ba kan ba barɩgɛ tɔ bɛɛ kɔ yɛ abaa mʋ, ɔsʋwʋlɛ maŋa i boyi.
Nɩɩ kɩkpaara sʋ asa ba kan bɛɛ barɩgɛ tɔ bɛɛ kɔ yɛ abaa mʋ, kɩkpaara maŋa i boyi.
Ɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ kuwura‐gyii kɩ kan kɩ barɩgɛ tɔ kɩɩ kɔ yɛ abaa mʋ, kɩɩ tɩyɛ kakpaa.
Ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ loo ɔlʋnpʋ kɩkpaara sʋ naa swii mʋ atɔ natɛ. Amɔɔ ɩ dagaa maa gyankpaa ŋmina mʋ pɔyɩ, kɛ ɔ nyɛ ɔkpa loo mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ yuuri mʋ atɔ.
N gyii fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ ɩɩ taa nyɩmɩsa alibi kʋmaa yɛ mʋ kɩtɔwɛ yii mʋ kʋmaa ɛɛ kɛɛ.
Amaa nyɩmɩsa kɩtɔwɛ yii Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ bɩrɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ taa kɛɛ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ waa alibi mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dɛ kakpaa nɩn.”
Yesu tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ nɩn, lɩɩ fɛɛ akʋ bɛɛ yɛ ɔ sʋ nbwɩɩ libi.
Nɩɩ Yesu mu‐nyi yɛ mu‐supu ana ba ba yɩla nbwama, nɩɩ ba sun mʋ asɛ yɛ ba tɩɩ mʋ.
Saŋa maŋa mʋ, asa ba kyɩna kyaabɔɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Kɩɩ fu‐nyi yɛ fu‐supu ana ba bʋ nbwama bee biti fʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ mi‐nyi yɛ mu‐supu ana?”
Nɩɩ ɔ kɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba tɛ kyaabɔɔ mʋ gyaŋɛ, nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, “Fan kɩɩ! Banɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Mi‐nyi yɛ mi‐supu ana.
Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti mʋ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ mi‐supu, yɛ mɛ‐daa, yɛ mɛ‐pɩɩkyɩɩ yɛ mi‐nyi.”
Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla piili ɛɛ kaapʋ Galile ɔbʋn kaa, nɩɩ asa damantɛ ba ba kyaabɔɔ mʋ bɛɛ nu mʋ asɛ. Sakyɔ sʋ mʋ, o loo ɔkʋlɩ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyan nkyu sʋ ɔbʋn kaa, yɛgɛ asa ba yɩla kidenbi sʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔ taa aŋasan tɔ kaapʋ bamʋ atɔ damantɛ. Mʋ kɩkaapʋ tɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ,
“Fan nu, ɔdɔɔpʋ kʋ ɩ kyɩna kpee ɔ naa ŋmatɛ ayu.
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ ŋmatɛ ayu mʋ, ɩmʋ ɩkʋ ɩ tɩyɛ ɔkpa kaa, nɩɩ nbwiibi ba ba tasɛ gyii.
Nɩɩ ɩkʋ ɩ tɩyɛ fʋlɛ sʋ, katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩsɛ ɩ man bʋnyɛ, ɩmʋ sʋ ɩ kɔyɩ bilen.
Ɩmʋ sʋ kyɔwɛ maa da mʋ, ɩ bwɩɩ, nɩɩ i wu lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ man sʋ ilin.
Nɩɩ ɩkʋ ɩ tɩyɛ iwii tɔ, nɩɩ iwii mʋ ɩ dan nyan ɩmʋ, nɩɩ ɩ man talɛ sɔyɩ abi.
Nɩɩ ɩkʋ mɔɔ ɩ tɩyɛ kasɛ danbɩrasa tɔ. Nɩɩ ɩ kɔyɩ dan nɩɩ ɩ sɔyɩ abii. Ɩkʋ ɩ sɔyɩ abi adɩsa, ɩkʋ mɔɔ adisiye, nɩɩ ɩkʋ mɔɔ kɩlɩfa.”
Nɩɩ Yesu lʋwɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ asʋ nɩɩ ee biti o nu mʋ, o nu.”
Ɩ maa ba san Yesu nkʋn mʋ, mʋ abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ yɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba nu mʋ asɩn tɔwɛsa mʋ akʋ ba ba taasɛ mʋ kɩŋasan mʋ kasɛ.
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ bɩrɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ asiri asɩn kaapʋ fanɛ, amaa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man tii fanɛ sʋ bɩrɛ mʋ, aŋasan tɔ nɩɩ bɛɛ sʋ bɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ,
‘bee biti ba kɩɩ kɛ ba kɩɩ, ba mɛɛ yɛ ba wu,
bee biti ba nu, amaa ba mɛɛ yɛ ba nu kasɛ.
Nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ kanɩn sʋ, naafɔɔ ba tee bwii ba Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ,
kɛ ɔ taa bamʋ alibi kɛɛ bamʋ.’ ”
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan man nu kɩŋasan nɩmʋ kasɛ? Nɛnɛ nɩɩ fen biti fan nu kɩŋasan kʋ kasɛ?
Ɔdɔɔpʋ mʋ ɩ gyɛ abwaarɛsɩn ɔtɔwɛpʋ.
Asa akʋ ba du nɩn fɛɛ ayu mʋ nɩɩ ɩ tɩyɛ ɔkpa kaa mʋ. Ba dan bee nu abwaarɛsɩn mʋ, yɛgɛ Sɩtaanɛ ɩ ba lɛɛ abwaarɛsɩn mʋ lɩɩ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ.
Akʋ mɔɔ ba du nɩn fɛɛ abi mʋ nɩɩ ɩ tɩyɛ afʋlɛ sʋ mʋ. Ba dan nu abwaarɛsɩn mʋ, bɛɛ taa kensi‐gyii kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ.
Amaa ɩ maa mee loo bamʋ nkɔlɔ kasɛ tɔ sʋ mʋ, ɩ mɛɛ kyɛɛrɛɛ bamʋ tɔ. Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ awʋrʋfɔ abɛɛ kanyanla dan ba bamʋ sʋ lɩɩ abwaarɛsɩn sʋ mʋ, bɛɛ yɛgɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kesun.
Akʋ mɔɔ ba du nɩn fɛɛ abi mʋ nɩɩ ɩ tɩyɛ iwii tɔ mʋ. Kanɩn asa mʋ bee nu abwaarɛsɩn.
Amaa kakyɩna kanɩmʋ tɔ tɔɔrɔɔ yɛ kefulee biti kensi payɩ yɛ dulinyaa atɔ kebiti libi, ɩ ba nyan abwaarɛsɩn mʋ, nɩɩ ɩ man taalɛ sɔyɩ abi.
Nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba du nɩn fɛɛ abi mʋ nɩɩ ɩ tɩyɛ ɩsɛ danbɩrasa tɔ mʋ. Ba dan nu abwaarɛsɩn mʋ, bɛɛ kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ kɛ bɛɛ sɔyɩ abi. Akʋ bɛɛ sɔyɩ adɩsa, akʋ adisiye, nɩɩ akʋ gbaa kɩlɩfa.”
Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla bɔ kɩŋasan kʋ yɛ, “Be mee tuwa fɩtɩla kɛ ba taa waa kolobi tɔ, abɛɛ ba taa waa npaa kasɛ. Bee tuwa fɩtɩla ba sʋ bɛɛ gyaga kɩmʋ ɔgyagakpa nɩn.
Ɩmʋ sʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ baala mʋ, kii biti kɩ lɩɩ ifuli, kɛ kɩmʋ nɩɩ kii bun sʋ mʋ kii biti ki bugi tɔ.
Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ asʋ mʋ o nu.”
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ fɛɛ, “Fan fɛ nfɛɛrɛ danbɩrasa lɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fan nu mʋ sʋ. Kʋtɔ kaalasa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ taa kaala sa fʋ tɔɔmaa mʋ, kɩmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa ii biti ɔ kaala sa fʋ, kɛ ɩ ŋara fʋ lɛɛ mʋ.
Ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ nyɛ tii sʋ, nɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ man sʋ mʋ, halɩɩ pii mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ mʋ, bee biti ba kɔɔlɛ lɩɩ mʋ asɛ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ fɛɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii du nɩn fɛɛ ɔnyɩn kʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ ŋmatɛ ayu mʋ ndɔɔ tɔ.
Ɛɛ dɛ kɛ o kyiŋi kagyanbwɛ yɛ kakyʋwapɛ, yɛgɛ ɔ man nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ ayu mʋ ɩ waa nɩɩ ɩ kɔyɩ nɩɩ ɩ dan.
Kasɛ mʋ ɩ yɛgɛ ayu mʋ ɩɩ dan nɩɩ ɩɩ kɔyɩ. Oyu mʋ ɩ gyankpaa kɔyɩ kɛ ɩ nyɛ ɔtɔ kɛ ɩ kʋʋgɛ abi.
Ɩ dan mʋ, nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ ɩ taa deebi naa tɩŋɛ ɩmʋ lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩmʋ saŋa fʋʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ fɛɛ, “Mɩnɛ kʋtɔ nɩɩ an biti a taa Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ waa sɩnkaala? Mɩnɛ kɩŋasan nɩɩ an biti a taa kaapʋ tɔ?
Ki du nɩn fɛɛ sinapi oyu kibi atɔ duusa tɔ kpini kibi pii, nɩɩ bee duu kɩmʋ.
Nɩɩ ba kan duu kɩmʋ mʋ, kɩ kɔyɩ, nɩɩ kɩɩ dan kɩ gyɔɔ apʋnfa kpini, nɩɩ kɩɩ waa n‐yaabi lala halɩɩ nbwiibi ba ba waa nsʋswaa kɩmʋ onyin tɔ.”
Aŋasan tɔ falɛ nɩɩ Yesu taa tɔwɛ bamʋ abwaarɛsɩn. Ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ taalɛ nu kasɛ.
Asɩn akʋ ɩ man bʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ, nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ kɩŋasan. Amaa saŋa kʋmaa nɩɩ ɩ ba san maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ nkʋn mʋ, ɛɛ lɛɛ ɩmʋ kasɛ ɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ.
Kakɛ maŋa kalaatɩpwɛɛ asɛ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ fɛɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ a faa kpee benbe.”
