Nɩɩ ba loo ɔkʋlɩ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu tɛ kɩmʋ tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ba yɛgɛ sakyɔ mʋ ɔbʋn kaa, ɩkʋlɩ ɩkʋ gbaa i tii bamʋ sʋ.
Ba maa kpee mʋ, nɩɩ afuu i tigi kɔnɔ kʋlʋn, nɩɩ apaa ɩ waa nɩɩ ɩ da nkyu ɩ waa ɔkʋlɩ mʋ tɔ naa san gbɛrɛɛ kɛ ɔkʋlɩ mʋ ɔ bɔla.
Amaa Yesu taa mu kumu gyaga keputu sʋ dɛ nsɩɩrɛ ɔkʋlɩ kɔnɔ. Nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba kyiŋi mʋ, nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, a maa biti a wu mʋ, ɩ man tiri fʋ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu kʋsʋ yɩlɛ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ afuu mʋ fɛɛ, “Waa diin.” Nɩɩ katɩn kʋmaa waa diin.
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fan sʋ kufuu? Fan man sʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii nɩn?”
Nɩɩ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa bamʋ gaa nɩɩ ba taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Mɩnɛ Nyɩmɩsa ndee? Halɩɩ afuu yɛ apaa gbaa i nu mʋ asɛ.”
Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba faa kpee Galile ɔbʋn benbe, Gerasene kabaafʋn.
Yesu maa dan ɛɛ lɩɩ ɔkʋlɩ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔnyɩn kʋ mʋ nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi ba tɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ, lɩɩ nkyan tɔ ba gyaŋa mʋ.
Ɔnyɩn maŋa tɛ nkyan mʋ tɔ nɩn. Ɔkʋ man bɩla taalɛ da mʋ ɩgbɛɛ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa kʋmaa nɩɩ ba da mʋ ayaa yɛ abaa ɩgbɛɛ mʋ, ɛɛ tɩŋɛ ɩmʋ nɩn. Nɩɩ ɔkʋ man bʋ tɔ kɛ ɔ taalɛ gyii mʋ sʋ.
Ɔ naa ɔ naa nkyan yɛ abɩɩ tɔ kyʋwapɛ yɛ kagyanbwɛ, nɩɩ ɛɛ taa afʋlɛ ɛɛ kyaŋɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ yɛgɛ ee kuusi.
Maa wu Yesu kata mʋ, ɔ sɩlɛ naa gyaŋa mʋ, nɩɩ o muŋa mu ansi tɔ.
Nɩɩ o kuusi kenken tɔwɛ yɛ, “Yesu, fʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Owura lala Mu‐Bii. Maa fʋ an sʋ mɩnɛ? Bɔ Ɩbwaarɛ fɛɛ fʋ mɛɛ yɛ fʋ tɔɔrɔɔ mɛ.”
Ɔnyɩn mʋ tɔwɛ kanɩn nɩn lɩɩ fɛɛ Yesu wʋla tɔwɛ nbwɩɩ libi mʋ yɛ, “Nbwɩɩ libi, fan lɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ tɔ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ kɩtɩɩ?”
Nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, “Bɛɛ tɩɩ mɛ yɛ Kʋkyɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ an kyɔ.”
Nɩɩ ɔ mata sʋ ɛɛ kʋlɛ Yesu gaa fɛɛ ɔ man gya nbwɩɩ libi mʋ lɩɩ ɔsʋwʋlɛ maŋa tɔ.
Akuuri damantɛ akʋ ba bʋ tiri tʋtɔ kɩbɩɩ kʋ sʋ bee gyii.
Nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi mʋ ba kʋlɛ Yesu yɛ, “Yɛgɛ a naa loo akuuri mʋ tɔ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu sa bamʋ ɔkpa, nɩɩ ba lɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ tɔ naa loo akuuri mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ akuuri mʋ kpini bamʋ kɔnɔ ɩ waa fɛɛ ngbɩn nyɔ mʋ, ba sɩlɛ kpɩlɩgɛ kɩbɩɩ mʋ ogee tɔ naa loo nkyu tɔ muuri.
Nɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kɩɩ akuuri mʋ sʋ mʋ, ba sɩlɛ kpee kadɛ tɔ yɛ ndɔɔ ana tɔ naa tɔwɛ asa. Nɩɩ asa ba ba kɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ waa.
Ba maa ba Yesu asɛ mʋ, ba wu ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ daa ɔ sʋ nbwɩɩ libi mʋ, bun ɩkaalɛ danbɩrasa ɔ tɛ, nɩɩ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ ɩ dɛ. Nɩɩ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa bamʋ.
Bamʋ nɩɩ ba taa bamʋ ansi wu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu waa mʋ, ba tɔwɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi ba tɛ mʋ sʋ, yɛ akuuri mʋ asɩn sa asa.
Nɩɩ asa mʋ ba yɛ Yesu ɔ lɩɩ bamʋ ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.
Yesu maa loo ɔkʋlɩ tɔ mʋ, ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi ba daa ba tɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ, kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ ɔ yɛgɛ ɔ buu mʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu kina, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Bwii kpee kewu naa tɔwɛ fʋ asa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ waa sa fʋ, yɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ o wu fʋ kʋwɛɛ.”
Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ lɩɩ tʋtɔ naa natɛ kabaafʋn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Ndɛ Kudu mʋ sʋ kpini, ɛɛ tɔwɛ asa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu waa sa mʋ. Nɩɩ i kyinkyin bamʋ nɩɩ ba nu mʋ kpini.
Nɩɩ Yesu bwii loo ɔkʋlɩ tɔ faa kpee ɔbʋn mʋ benbe, nɩɩ asa kʋkyɔ ba ba sarɛ kyaabɔɔ mʋ.
Nɩɩ Gyarosi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa abɩlɩsa mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ ba tʋtɔ. Maa wu Yesu mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɩyɛ mʋ ayaa tɔ.
Nɩɩ ɔ kʋlɛ mʋ gaa yɛ, “N kʋlɛ fʋ nɩn, mi kebii kyɩɩsa‐bi ɛɛ lɔ ee biti o wu, ba taa fʋ abaa gyaga mʋ sʋ kɛ ɔ nyɛ alanfɩya.”
Nɩɩ maa Yesu ba yii sʋ bee kpee, yɛgɛ sakyɔ ba mili Yesu sʋ ba buu mʋ.
Ɔkyɩɩ kʋ nɩɩ nkalan ɩɩ da mʋ, nsu kudu anyɔ, bʋ sakyɔ mʋ tɔ.
Ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nyita mu afulee mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kpini akyɛpʋ asɛ kpɩnɛ, fɛɛ naafɔɔ kʋlɔ mʋ kɩ bɔɔsɛ mʋ, amaa kʋlɔ mʋ kɩ san kii tii sʋ.
O nu Yesu sʋ nɩɩ o loo sakyɔ mʋ tɔ ba Yesu kamaa.
Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ mu kumu tɔ yɛ, “Naafɔɔ n daa nyɛ mata mʋ kaalɛ gbaa nɩn, n biti n nyɛ alanfɩya.”
Nɩɩ ɔ mata Yesu kaalɛ, nɩɩ nkalan mʋ ɩ tɩn opula tɔ. Nɩɩ o wu mʋ n‐yɩɩ tɔ fɛɛ mʋ awʋrʋfɔ kpini ɩ kyʋn.
Opula tɔ nɩɩ Yesu bɩɩ fɛɛ ɔlʋn kʋ lɩɩ mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ o biliŋi kɩɩ sakyɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ ɩ mata mɛ kaalɛ?”
Nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba ba sa mʋ kɔnɔ fɛɛ, “Fu wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ sakyɔ mʋ mili fʋ sʋ, nɩɩ fʋ taasɛ yɛ, ‘Anɩmʋ ɩ mata mɛ kaalɛ?’ ”
Nɩɩ Yesu biliŋi ɔ dan san ɛɛ kɩɩ ee biti ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ mata mʋ kaalɛ mʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ maa wu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ waa mʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa kufuu kyɩkyaa natɛ ba Yesu ansi tɔ, ba muŋa mʋ ayaa tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ asɩn mʋ kesintin kpini tɔwɛ mʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ fɛɛ, “Mi‐bii, fʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fʋ nyɛ alanfɩya, kpewu kɔkɔlɔ yuuli sʋ, fʋ awʋrʋfɔ ɩ lʋwɛ.”
Yesu maa san ɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ nbɔɔ ba lɩɩ ɔbɩlɩsa Gyarosi kɩkpaara sʋ ba tɔwɛ Gyarosi yɛ, “Fu kebii kyɩɩsa‐bi mʋ wu, mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ san fɩɩ tɔɔrɔɔ ɔkaapʋpʋ mʋ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ mu ansi yɛgɛ bamʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ Gyarosi yɛ, “Man waa kufuu, dan kɔɔlɛ gyii kanɩn.”
Nɩɩ ɔ man bɩla yɛgɛ ɔkʋ buu mʋ tii Pita yɛ Gyemisi yɛ mu‐supu Gyɔn sʋ.
Ba maa fʋʋ Gyarosi kɩkpaara sʋ mʋ, ba wu asa ba maa waa ɩlawʋ bɛɛ sawʋ kenken.
Nɩɩ Yesu loo taasɛ bamʋ fɛɛ, “Mɩnɛ nɩɩ fɛn waa kanɩn? Mɩnɛ kusu nɩɩ fen su kanɩn? Kebii mʋ man wu, ɔ dɛ nsɩɩrɛ nɩn.”
Nɩɩ asa mʋ ba ŋmasɛ mʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔ gya bamʋ kpini lɩɩ kewu, nɩɩ maa kebii mʋ mʋ‐sɛ yɛ mu‐nyi yɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ asa mʋ ba loo obu mʋ nɩɩ kebii kyɩɩsa‐bi mʋ dɛ kɩmʋ tɔ mʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔ kɩtaa kebii kyɩɩsa‐bi mʋ kɩbaa tɔ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Talita kuum.” Kɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, “Kebii kyɩɩsa‐bi, n yɛ fʋ kʋsʋ.”
Opula tɔ nɩɩ kebii mʋ kʋsʋ, nɩɩ ɔ natɛ. Kebii mʋ gyii nsu kudu anyɔ. Nɩɩ asɩn mʋ i kyinkyin bamʋ gaa.
Nɩɩ Yesu sa bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ ba man kan tɔwɛ ɔkʋ kanɩn asɩn nɩmʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ fɛɛ ba sa kebii mʋ agyitɔ kɛ o gyii.
Nɩɩ Yesu lɩɩ tʋtɔ bwii kpee mʋ gbaa‐gbaa kadɛ tɔ, nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba buu mʋ kpee.

Kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ, o kpee kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa ɛɛ kaapʋ. Nɩɩ mʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ ki kyinkyin asa mʋ nɩɩ ba nu mʋ gaa, nɩɩ ba taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Fɩnɛ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ kɩkaapʋ nɩmʋ lɩɩ? Fɩnɛ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ kanyaasɩn nɩmʋ lɩɩ halɩɩ ɛɛ waa asɩn kyinkyinsa anɩmʋ?
Man gyɛ kapinta mʋ ndee? Man gyɛ Mɛɛrɩ mu‐bii mʋ nɩn? Man gyɛ mu‐supu ana ɩ gyɛ Gyemisi yɛ Gyosefu yɛ Gyuda yɛ Simon? Man gyɛ anaa mʋ‐pɩɩkyɩɩ ana ɩ bʋ nfɩɩ?” Nɩɩ ba kina kɩkɔɔlɛ mʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ kʋmaa nɩmʋ sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ katɩn kʋmaa, amɔɔ mʋ kadɛ tɔ yɛ mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ abi nkʋn asɛ nɩɩ ɔ man sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ.”
Kanɩn sʋ mʋ, ɔ man taalɛ waa adangana tʋtɔ kʋkyɔ, amɔɔ asa kalɩsa akʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ abaa gyaga bamʋ sʋ nɩɩ ba nyɛ alanfɩya.
Nɩɩ i kyinkyin mʋ gaa lɩɩ fɛɛ asa mʋ ba man kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii.
Nɩɩ Yesu kpee ndɛ‐bii mʋ nɩɩ ɩ maa mʋ kadɛ, ɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ abwaarɛsɩn.
Nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ, o sun bamʋ anyɔ‐anyɔ, nɩɩ ɔ sa bamʋ ɔlʋn yɛ ba taa gya nbwɩɩ libi.
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ fɛɛ, “Fan maa kpee falɛ, fan man taa sɛhn, amɔɔ fanɛ akpebi nkʋn. Fan man taa agyitɔ abɛɛ adiikun abɛɛ afulee waa fanɛ igyifa tɔ.
Fan waa asɩbɩta, amaa fan man taa ɩkaalɛ ɩkʋ kɩtaa tii sʋ.
Kɩkpaara kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ fanɛ mʋ, fan kyɩna tʋtɔ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan lɩɩ kadɛ mʋ tɔ.
Nɩɩ fan kan kpee kadɛ kʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ man kɔɔlɛ fanɛ abɛɛ nu fanɛ asɛ mʋ, nɩɩ fan kan fɛn lɩɩ kanɩn kadɛ maŋa tɔ mʋ, fan kpɩkpaa fanɛ ayaa tɔ ɩsɛ wʋrɩgɛ tʋtɔ, kɛ ɩmʋ ii biti i gyii bamʋ.”
Nɩɩ ba kpee naa tɔwɛ abwaarɛsɩn sa asa yɛ ba yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa.
Nɩɩ ba gya nbwɩɩ libi damantɛ kʋsʋ asa sʋ, nɩɩ ba sʋswa alɔpʋ damantɛ olifu nfɔ nɩɩ ba nyɛ alanfɩya.
Owura Herodi nu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kii kpee sʋ kpini, lɩɩ fɛɛ Yesu kɔɔlɛ kɩtɩɩ katɩn kʋmaa. Akʋ ba tɔwɛ yɛ Gyɔn okyugyeepu mʋ ɩ bɩla kyiŋi, ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ ɛɛ waa kanɩn asɩn kyinkyinsa.
Akʋ mɔɔ ba yɛ ɔ gyɛ Eligya nɩn, nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba yɛ ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ dɩdaa mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ nɩn.
Herodi maa nu Yesu asɩn mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, “Ɔ gyɛ Gyɔn okyugyeepu nɩn. Mɛ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba tɩn mu kumu, amaa o bwii ba nkpa tɔ.”

Herodi ɩ daa yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba kɩtaa Gyɔn okyugyeepu, nɩɩ ba taa agbeeleebi da mʋ, nɩɩ ba taa mʋ tii obu. Kʋtɔ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa kanɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, mʋ‐ka Herodiya mʋ nɩɩ o kili mʋ, ɔ kɔɔlɛ mʋ lɩɩ mu‐supu Filipu asɛ nɩn.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa kʋmaa Gyɔn okyugyeepu ɩɩ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ ɩ man dagaa maa kɔɔlɛ mu‐supu mʋ‐ka kili.
Kanɩn sʋ nɩɩ Gyɔn okyugyeepu nyɛ kilibi Herodiya asɛ, nɩɩ ee biti ɔ mɔɔ mʋ, amaa ɔ man taalɛ.

Herodi sɩlɛ Gyɔn okyugyeepu, lɩɩ fɛɛ o nyi maa gyɛ nyɩmɩsa danbɩrasa yɛ nyɩmɩsa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ, ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ o kun mʋ. Herodi ii biti Gyɔn abwaarɛsɩn kunu, amaa saŋa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o nu ɩmʋ mʋ ɩɩ tɔɔrɔɔ mʋ gaa.

Herodiya ba nyɛ mu kebiti saŋa mʋ nɩɩ mu‐kuli Herodi i gyii mʋ kakɛ kʋʋgɛsa akɛ. Owura Herodi dɩŋa agyitɔ, nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ kɩbanɛ abɩlɩsa yɛ anaakɔpʋ abɩlɩsa yɛ Galile abɩlɩsa kparɛ‐kparɛ yɛ ba be gyii bamʋ ansi.
Nɩɩ Herodiya mu‐bii kyɩɩsa lɩɩ ba kyaa, nɩɩ i gyii Herodi yɛ mʋ afɔ ansi gaa. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ kebii mʋ yɛ, “Taasɛ mɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fii biti kɛ n sa fʋ.”
Nɩɩ ɔ bɔ ntan yɛ, “Kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fii biti mʋ n biti n sa fʋ, halɩɩ mi kuwura‐gyii mʋ kɩbaafʋn gbaa.”
Nɩɩ kebii mʋ lɩɩ ɩkaa sʋ naa taasɛ mu‐nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ lɩɩ Owura Herodi asɛ.
Nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, “Tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ fii biti Gyɔn okyugyeepu mu kumu.”
Nɩɩ kebii mʋ waa bilen bwii kpee Owura Herodi asɛ naa tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “N biti Gyɔn okyugyeepu kumu tangɩran sʋ nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ.”
Nɩɩ Owura Herodi kɔkɔlɔ ki nyita mʋ gaa, amaa ɔ man taalɛ kina lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛɛ bɔ ntan mʋ afɔ ansi tɔ sʋ mʋ.
Nɩɩ o sun ɔnaakɔpʋ kʋlʋn yɛ ɔ naa bɩya Gyɔn kumu. Nɩɩ o kpee obu tiisa mʋ tɔ naa tɩn mʋ Gyɔn kumu.
Nɩɩ ɔ taa gyaga tangɩran sʋ taa ba sa kebii kyɩɩsa‐bi mʋ. Nɩɩ kebii mʋ taa naa sa mu‐nyi.
Gyɔn okyugyeepu abɩɩlapʋ ba maa nu kanɩn mʋ, nɩɩ ba ba taa mu kibuni sansa naa pula.
Yesu asunpu mʋ ba bwii ba Yesu asɛ ba tɔwɛ mʋ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba waa yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ba kaapʋ.
Lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ asa kʋkyɔ bɛɛ ba Yesu asɛ bee bwii sʋ mʋ, ba man nyɛ saŋa ba gyii. Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ fɛɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ a lɩɩ ɩkaa sʋ kpee opula mʋ nɩɩ asa ba man bʋ, kɛ fan nyɛ saŋa fʋʋtɛ gbɛrɛɛ.”
Nɩɩ ba loo ɔkʋlɩ tɔ bamʋ nkʋn bee kpee katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ man bʋ mʋ.
Amaa asa damantɛ ba wu bamʋ, nɩɩ ba bɩɩ bamʋ, nɩɩ ba waa bilen taa ayaa tɔ sɩlɛ lɩɩ ndɛ mʋ tɔ kpini gyankpaa naa gyoo bamʋ.
Yesu maa lɩɩ ɔkʋlɩ tɔ, nɩɩ o wu sakyɔ mʋ, bamʋ asɩn ɩ kɩtaa mʋ kʋwɛɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba du nɩn fɛɛ nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba man sʋ ɔkpapʋ. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ o piili ɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ atɔ damantɛ.
Ɩ maa sʋ ii kpee kalaatɩpwɛɛ asɛ mʋ, Yesu abɩɩlapʋ ba ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Kyɔwɛ tɛɛ ɛɛ lʋwɛ. Nɩɩ nfɩɩ mɔɔ waa opula mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa ɩkaa sʋ, nɩɩ sɛhn man bʋ tɔ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ yɛgɛ ba kpee ndɔɔ ana tɔ yɛ ndɛ‐bii mʋ nɩɩ ɩ maa anɛ mʋ naa sɔɔ kʋtɔ kʋ gyii.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fan sa bamʋ kʋtɔ kʋ kɛ ba gyii.”
Nɩɩ ba taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Fii biti fɛɛ a taa gbiti nderebi anyɔ
naa sɔɔ bodobodo sa bamʋ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Bodobodo afɩnɛ nɩɩ fan su? Fan naa kɩɩ.”
Ba maa naa kɩɩ mʋ, nɩɩ ba ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Bodobodo inuu yɛ ɩkɩn ɩnyɔ nɩɩ an sʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ ba yɛgɛ asa mʋ ba kyɩna kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ afitiri bunboli sʋ.
Nɩɩ asa mʋ ba kyɩna kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ buu abaa, akʋ kɩlɩfa akʋ mɔɔ adunuu.
Nɩɩ Yesu taa bodobodo inuu yɛ ɩkɩn ɩnyɔ mʋ, nɩɩ o diyaa mu ansi kɩɩ sʋsʋ, nɩɩ ɔ fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ. Nɩɩ ɔ taa sa abɩɩlapʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ba barɩgɛ sa asa mʋ kpini. Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla barɩgɛ ɩkɩn mʋ tɔ sa asa mʋ kpini.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ gyii naa fʋʋ mʋ ɔkaa.
Nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba tasɛ bodobodo yɛ ɩkɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ san mʋ waa alantan kudu anyɔ tɔ, nɩɩ ɩ bɔla.
Anyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba gyii agyitɔ mʋ ba gyɛ ngbɩn nnuu.
Opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ Yesu yɛgɛ nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba taa ɔkʋlɩ gyankpaa mʋ, bee kpee Betisayida mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ benbe. Nɩɩ mɔɔ mʋ lɛɛ asa mʋ ɔkpa.
Maa kala bamʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ o kpee kɩbɩɩ sʋ, ɛɛ kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ.
Ɩ maa ba fʋʋ kalaatɩpwɛɛ asɛ mʋ, abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba fʋʋ nkyu mʋ nsana, yɛgɛ Yesu nkʋn mɔɔ bʋ kidenbi sʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu wu fɛɛ kɩpalɛ mʋ ki nu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ apaa mʋ ɩ gyaŋa bamʋ. Kɩbwaayɩkɛ sʋ mʋ, Yesu natɛ nkyu sʋ naa fʋʋ bamʋ asɛ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ kyʋn bamʋ sʋ.
Amaa ba wu maa naa nkyu mʋ sʋ, be nyi fɛɛ obuni nɩn, nɩɩ ba waa ɩlawʋ.
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba wu Yesu mʋ, kufuu kɩ kɩtaa bamʋ kpini gaa. Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ asɛ opula tɔ yɛ, “Fan nyɛ nkɔlɔ, fan man waa kufuu, mɛ nɩn.”
Nɩɩ Yesu loo bamʋ asɛ ɔkʋlɩ mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ afuu mʋ a yɔɔ opula tɔ. Nɩɩ i kyinkyin abɩɩlapʋ mʋ gaa,
lɩɩ fɛɛ ba man taalɛ nu kanan mʋ nɩɩ Yesu sa anyɩn ngbɩn nnuu agyitɔ mʋ kasɛ. Nɩɩ ɩ kɩtaa bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ gaa.
Nɩɩ ba faa kpee benbe ɔsʋwʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba tɩɩ yɛ Kanesareti, nɩɩ ba taa bamʋ ɔkʋlɩ dan.
Ba maa dan bɛɛ lɩɩ ɔkʋlɩ tɔ mʋ, asa ba bɩɩ Yesu.
Nɩɩ asa ba sɩlɛ lɩɩ ɔsʋwʋlɛ maŋa sʋ kpini bɛɛ ba Yesu asɛ, nɩɩ ba taa alɔpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba dɛ ɩkalan sʋ bɩya mʋ.
Katɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu kpee ndɛ‐bii abɛɛ ndɛ lala tɔ yɛ ndɔɔ ana tɔ mʋ, asa bɛɛ kpiya alɔpʋ agya tɔ yɛgɛ bɛɛ kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ ɔ yɛgɛ ba mata mʋ kaalɛ. Bamʋ nɩɩ ba mata mʋ kaalɛ kpini mʋ, ba nyɛ alanfɩya.
Farasii abi yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ akʋ, mʋ nɩɩ ba lɩɩ Gyerusalem ba Yesu asɛ mʋ, ba sarɛ kyaabɔɔ mʋ.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba wu fɛɛ Yesu abɩɩlapʋ ba tɛ bee gyii agyitɔ yɛgɛ ba man fwɩɩ bamʋ abaa kanan mʋ nɩɩ bamʋ adɩdaasɩn ɩɩ kaapʋ mʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ Farasii abi mʋ yɛ Gyiwu abi kpini ba buu bamʋ naana ana kɩkaapʋ dɩdaa mʋ nɩn, ba mɛɛ yɛ ba gyii agyitɔ, amɔɔ ba fwɩɩ bamʋ abaa kanan mʋ nɩɩ bamʋ adɩdaasɩn mʋ ɩɩ kaapʋ.
Nɩɩ ba kan lɩɩ kɩgya tɔ ba mʋ, ba mɛɛ yɛ ba gyii, amɔɔ ba fwɩɩ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ pɔyɩ. Nɩɩ ba bɩla ba sʋ ikisii lɩɩ ɩkɔɔpʋ yɛ npulii yɛ ɩtasa atɔ kɩfwɩɩ sʋ.

Ɩmʋ sʋ, nɩɩ Farasii abi mʋ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ ba taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Mɩnɛ kʋtɔ sʋ nɩɩ fʋ abɩɩlapʋ bɩrɛ be mee buu anɛ naana ana kɩkaapʋ dɩdaa mʋ, nɩɩ ba mɛɛ bamʋ bɩrɛ ba sʋ abaa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man du kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ bee gyii agyitɔ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla mʋ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Isaya sʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyʋrɔɔ yɩla lɩɩ fanɛ sʋ mʋ, ɩ gyɛ kesintin. Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ yɛ,
‘Fan sʋ fanɛ nnɔ fɛn tɔwɛ yɛ fen sun mɛ,
yɛgɛ ɩ man lɩɩ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ.
Kɩyan nɩɩ fen sun mɛ,
lɩɩ fɛɛ nyɩmɩsa ɩkpa nɩɩ fɛn sʋ fɛn kaapʋ fɛɛ mɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ.’ ”
Nɩɩ Yesu kyaga sʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan kina Ɩbwaarɛ nbara mʋ, nɩɩ fan buu nyɩmɩsa lɛɛ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan sʋ kanyaasɩn ɩkpa libi mʋ nɩɩ fɛn sʋ fɛn taa Ɩbwaarɛ nbara yɩlɛ ɩkaa sʋ, kɛ fan nyɛ buu nyɩmɩsa kɩkaapʋ sʋ.
Mosesi kaapʋ yɛ, ‘Taa bɛɛrɛɛ sa fʋ‐sɛ yɛ fu‐nyi, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ nnɔ wʋrɩgɛ mʋ‐sɛ abɛɛ mu‐nyi sʋ mʋ, ba mɔɔ mʋ.’
Amaa fanɛɛ fanɛ, fɛn yɛ nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan tɔwɛ mʋ‐sɛ abɛɛ mu‐nyi yɛ, ‘Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ naafɔɔ fii biti fʋ nyɛ lɩɩ mɛ asɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ Koriban.’ (Kɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba taa kɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ).
Kanɩn sʋ mʋ, ɔ sʋ ɔkpa fɛɛ o kina kɩkyɛ mʋ‐sɛ yɛ mu‐nyi tɔ.
Kanɩn kɩkaapʋ mʋ nɩɩ fan sʋ fɛn kaapʋ asa falɛ ɩɩ yɛgɛ abwaarɛsɩn mʋ ii biliŋi kɩyan. Atɔ damantɛ fɛɛ ɩnɩmʋ nɩɩ fɛn waa.”
Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla tɩɩ asa ba sarɛ mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ o nu mɛ asɛ, kɛ ɔ bɩɩ asɩn nɩmʋ kasɛ.
Sɛhn man bʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɩɩ lɩɩ kewu ii loo nyɩmɩsa tɔ nɩɩ ɩɩ waa mʋ ineesi, amɔɔ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ lɩɩ mʋ tɔ mʋ ɩɩ waa mʋ ineesi.
Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ asʋ mʋ o nu.”
Yesu maa lɩɩ asa mʋ asɛ kpee kɩkpaara sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba taasɛ mʋ kɩŋasan mʋ kasɛ.
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ fɛɛ, “Ɩmʋ sʋ, fanɛ gbaa fen mee nu asɩn kasɛ bilen? Fan man nyi fɛɛ kʋtɔ kʋ man bʋ tɔ kɩɩ lɩɩ kewu nɩɩ kii loo nyɩmɩsa tɔ nɩɩ kɩɩ waa mʋ ineesi.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kii loo nyɩmɩsa tɔ mʋ, ki mee kpee mʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ, amɔɔ mʋ ɔtɔ tɔ, kɛ kɩ bɩla bɔla lɩɩ mʋ n‐yɩɩ tɔ.” (Yesu katɔwɛ mʋ kɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ agyitɔ gyisa kʋmaa i du kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ.)
Nɩɩ Yesu kyaga sʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ lɩɩ nyɩmɩsa tɔ mʋ, kɩmʋ ɩɩ waa mʋ ineesi.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ lɩɩ nyɩmɩsa tɔ, yɛ mʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ nɩɩ nfɛɛrɛ libi yɛ kɩbawʋlɛ kigyii, yɛ keyu, yɛ asa kɩmɔɔ yɛ kɩlɩɩ okuli abɛɛ ɔkaa kamaa,
yɛ kensi payɩ libi yɛ kumu tɔ ɔlʋn, yɛ kapɩna asa, yɛ kɩgyagaa, yɛ kayɩɩ basa yɛ nyɩmɩsa kinyita yɛ alala‐sɩn yɛ kimelensi.
Ɩnɩmʋ kpini ɩɩ lɩɩ nyɩmɩsa kɔkɔlɔ tɔ nɩn, nɩɩ ɩɩ waa mʋ ineesi.”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɩɩ Galile kpee Taayi katɩnɛ. Nɩɩ o loo kɩkpaara kʋ sʋ, ɔ man daa ee biti fɛɛ ɔkʋ o wu mʋ, amaa ɔ man taalɛ baala mʋ n‐yɩɩ.
Ɔkyɩɩ kʋ mʋ nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi ba tɛ mu‐bii sʋ mʋ nu Yesu sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ ba mʋ asɛ bilen ba muŋa mʋ ayaa tɔ.
Ɔkyɩɩ mʋ man gyɛ Gyiwu obii, ɔ lɩɩ Fonesiya mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Siriya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ nɩn. Nɩɩ ɔ kʋlɛ Yesu yɛ ɔ gya nbwɩɩ libi mʋ lɩɩ mu kebii kyɩɩsa‐bi mʋ sʋ sa mʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ yɛ, “Ɩ dagaa nbii mʋ ba maa gyii ŋmɛ pɔyɩ. Ɩ man bʋrɔn fɛɛ ba taa nbii agyitɔ sa igyoonɔ.”
Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ sa kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, ɩ gyɛ kesintin nɩn, amaa nbii ba kan bee gyii agyitɔ nɩɩ ɩkʋ ɩ lɩɩ tɩyɛ kasɛ mʋ, igyoonɔ bɛɛ tasɛ bee gyii.”
Nɩɩ Yesu sa ɔkyɩɩ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sa mɛ kɔnɔ sʋ mʋ, bwii kpewu, nbwɩɩ libi mʋ ba lɩɩ fu kebii kyɩɩsa‐bi mʋ tɔ.”
Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ bwii kpewu naa wu kebii mʋ maa dɛ npaa sʋ yɛgɛ nbwɩɩ libi mʋ ba tɛɛ wʋla lɩɩ mʋ tɔ.
Nɩɩ Yesu lɩɩ Taayi katɩnɛ, nɩɩ ɔ bɔla Sidon kpee Galile ɔbʋn‐kaa naa fʋʋ Dekapoli (Ndɛ kudu) ɩsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ asa akʋ ba taa kpawu kʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ taalɛ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ ɔ dan ba Yesu asɛ ba kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ ɔ taa mʋ abaa gyaga mʋ sʋ sa bamʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu taa kpawu mʋ lɩɩ asa tɔ kpee ɩkaa sʋ, taa mʋ abaa‐bi waa mʋ asʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ tʋʋ nkyɔlɛ nɩɩ ɔ mata mʋ kanandʋlʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu diyaa mu ansi kɩɩ sʋsʋ, nɩɩ o muusi. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ yɛ, “Ɩfata.” Kɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, “Bugi tɔ.”
Opula tɔ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ asʋ a tigi, nɩɩ ee nu katɔwɛ, nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ ɛɛ tɔwɛ danbɩrasa.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ asa mʋ yɛ ba man kan tɔwɛ sa ɔkʋ. Amaa kɩgya damantɛ nɩɩ ɔ gya bamʋ mʋ, saamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ lɔŋɔ bɛɛ tɔwɛ bee tii sʋ.
Nɩɩ i kyinkyin asa mʋ gaa nɩɩ ba yɛ, “Ɔ waa kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ danbɩrasa. Ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ akpawu bee nu, nɩɩ anaamuu bɛɛ tɔwɛ.”
Kanɩn nkɛ maŋa tɔ mʋ, sakyɔ damantɛ kʋ bɩla ba sarɛ Yesu asɛ. Nɩɩ ba maa man sʋ agyitɔ akʋ ba gyii mʋ, Yesu tɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba mʋ asɛ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ,
“Asa nɩmʋ asɩn ɩ sʋ mɛ kʋwɛɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ndaga nkɛ nsa ndee ba maa bʋ mɛ asɛ, nɩɩ ba man sʋ agyitɔ akʋ ba gyii.
Nɩɩ n kan tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ ba bwii kpewu mʋ, bee biti ba naa kirin‐kirin ɔkpa tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ akʋ ba lɩɩ kata‐kata.”
Nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Fɩnɛ nɩɩ an biti a nyɛ agyitɔ kiperi kɩnɩmʋ sʋ sa asa damantɛ nɩmʋ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Bodobodo afɩnɛ nɩɩ fan sʋ?”
Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Asunɔ nɩɩ an sʋ.”

Nɩɩ Yesu yɛgɛ nɩɩ asa mʋ ba kyʋn kyɩna kasɛ. Nɩɩ ɔ taa bodobodo asunɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ nɩɩ ɔ kpɛɛ‐kpɛɛ ɩmʋ tɔ taa sa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ ba barɩgɛ tɔ sa asa mʋ ba gyii, nɩɩ ba barɩgɛ tɔ sa bamʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla taa ɩkɩn gbɛrɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ mʋ, fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ bɩla sa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ yɛ ba barɩgɛ ɩmʋ tɔ sa asa mʋ.
Nɩɩ asa mʋ kpini ba gyii ŋmɛ. Nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba tasɛ‐tasɛ bamʋ agyisan mʋ bɔla alantan asunɔ.
Asa mʋ nɩɩ ba gyii kanɩn agyitɔ maŋa mʋ, ba gyɛ asa ngbɩn nna. Ɩmʋ kamaa tɔ, nɩɩ Yesu yɛgɛ bamʋ, nɩɩ ba kpewu.
Opula maŋa tɔ, nɩɩ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba loo ɔkʋlɩ tɔ faa kyʋn Dalimanuta ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.
Farasii abi akʋ ba ba Yesu asɛ ba gyii mʋ ɩmɔɔrɛ, kɛ ba nyɛ wu mʋ kilibi. Nɩɩ ba tʋʋ Yesu tɔ kɩɩ yɛ ɔ waa sʋsʋ adangana akʋ kaapʋ bamʋ.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ o muusi, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fanɛ nbɩɩnbɩɩ asa fen biti adangana fen wu? N biti n tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, n mɛɛ yɛ n waa kanɩn adangana maŋa kaapʋ fanɛ kpaa.”
Nɩɩ Yesu yɛgɛ bamʋ tʋtɔ naa loo mʋ ɔkʋlɩ tɔ faa kyʋn benbe.
Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba tan sʋ fɛɛ ba maa man taa bodobodo kʋkyɔ, amaa bodobodo kukuli kʋlʋn ɩ bʋ bamʋ asɛ ɔkʋlɩ mʋ tɔ.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan kɩɩ danbɩrasa kɛ fan baa fan da fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ, lɩɩ Farasii abi yɛ Herodi asa bamʋ kɩfɛ mʋ nɩɩ kii tin bodobodo mʋ.”
Nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba piili bɛɛ tɔwɛ abaa yɛ, “A maa man lɛɛ bodobodo kʋkyɔ sʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ kanɩn mʋ abɛɛ?”

Yesu maa bɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fɛn tɔwɛ fanɛ kɩman sʋ bodobodo kʋkyɔ mʋ asɩn? Ɩmʋ sʋ, fan man pɩɩta bɩɩ mɛ awaasa kasɛ? Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ mɛɛ taalɛ ɩ kɩtaa atɔ bilen kanɩn?
Fan sʋ ansi, fan man kɩɩ? Nɩɩ fan sʋ asʋ, fan mee nu? Fen mee nyiŋi asɩn nɩn abɛɛ?
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n taa bodobodo anuu barɩgɛ sa asa ngbɩn nnuu nɩɩ ba gyii mʋ, alantan afɩnɛ nɩɩ fan tasɛ agyisan mʋ bɔla?”
Nɩɩ ba yɛ, “Alantan kudu anyɔ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla taasɛ yɛ, “N maa taa bodobodo asunɔ barɩgɛ tɔ sa asa ngbɩn nna nɩɩ ba gyii mʋ, alantan afɩnɛ nɩɩ fan tasɛ agyisan mʋ bɔla?”
Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Alantan asunɔ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu yɛ, “Ɩnɩmʋ kpini kamaa mʋ, fan man taalɛ bɩɩ ɩmʋ kasɛ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba kpee Betisayida kadɛ tɔ, nɩɩ asa akʋ ba taa gyaatanapʋ kʋ ba kʋlɛ Yesu fɛɛ ɔ taa mʋ kɩbaa mata mʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu kɩtaa gyaatanapʋ mʋ kɩbaa tɔ, taa mʋ lɩɩ kadɛ mʋ nbwama. Nɩɩ Yesu tʋʋ nkyɔlɛ waa mu ansi tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ abaa gyaga mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fɩɩ wu atɔ?”
Nɩɩ gyaatanapʋ mʋ diyaa mu ansi sʋsʋ, nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, “N wu asa ba maa naa, nɩɩ ba du fɛɛ iyu ɩ maa naa mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla taa mʋ abaa gyaga ɔnyɩn mu ansi sʋ, nɩɩ mu ansi mʋ i bugi, nɩɩ mu ansi mʋ ɩ nyɛ alanfɩya, ɩɩ kɩɩ danbɩrasa.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ gyaatanapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Kpewu! Amaa man bɩla bwii kpee kadɛ mʋ tɔ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba kpee ndɛ‐bii mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ Kasariya Filipi kadɛ mʋ asɛ. Ba maa kpee mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ nɩɩ asa ba yɛ n gyɛ?”
Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Akʋ ba yɛ fʋ ɩ gyɛ Gyɔn okyugyeepu mʋ, akʋ mɔɔ ba yɛ fʋ ɩ gyɛ Eligya, nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba yɛ fʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fanɛ mɔɔ, fan yɛ anɩmʋ nɩɩ n gyɛ?” Nɩɩ Pita lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ Krisito, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu gya bamʋ yɛ ba man kan tɔwɛ ɔkʋ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ.

Nɩɩ Yesu piili ɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Ɩ dagaa fɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa maa wu awʋrʋfɔ gaa, kɛ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu abɩlɩsa yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ ba kina mɛ. Bee biti ba mɔɔ mɛ, kɛ nkɛ nsa kamaa mʋ, n biti n kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ ba.”
Amaa Yesu maa bugi mʋ asɩn mʋ tɔ pensen kaapʋ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ, nɩɩ Pita tɩɩ mʋ lɩɩ ɩkaa sʋ ɛɛ tɔwɛ yii mʋ.
Amaa Yesu, biliŋi kɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ Pita yɛ, “Lɩɩ mɛ sʋ, fʋ Sɩtaanɛ nɩmʋ. Fʋ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ man lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ, ɩ lɩɩ nyɩmɩsa asɛ nɩn.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɩɩ sakyɔ mʋ yɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba ba mʋ asɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti fɛɛ o buu mɛ mʋ, ɩ dagaa fɛɛ o kina mʋ n‐yɩɩ, kɛ ɔ sʋla mʋ oyu laasa kɛ o buu mɛ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti fɛɛ o kun mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ nkpa mʋ, ee biti ɔ pan nkpa mʋ. Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ pan mʋ nkpa lɩɩ mɛ yɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ nyɛ mʋ nkpa.
Nɩɩ fʋ kan nyɛ dulinyaa tɔ kʋtɔ kʋmaa, nɩɩ fʋ pan fʋ nkpa mʋ, mɩnɛ nɩɩ fʋ nyɛ?
Abɛɛ mɩnɛ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa ɩ taalɛ ɔ taa kyarɛ mʋ nkpa?

Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan waa ipeeli lɩɩ mɛ yɛ mɛ kɩkaapʋ sʋ, nbɩɩnbɩɩ kakyɩna nɩmʋ tɔ abi mʋ nɩɩ alibi yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩman‐sɩlɛ kɩ bʋ bamʋ tɔ falɛ mʋ, kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ kan ba yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ bʋnyaa yɛ mʋ sʋsʋ nbɔɔ mʋ, ngbaa mɛ ii biti ɩ baa ɩ sʋ mɛ ipeeli sa kanɩn ɔsa maŋa.”
Nɩɩ Yesu bwii kyaga sʋ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ fɛɛ akʋ ba bʋ fanɛ tɔ nfɩɩ nɩɩ ba mɛɛ yɛ ba wu lewu, amɔɔ ba wu Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ kɩ maa ba ɔlʋn sʋ.”
Nkɛ nsiye kamaa tɔ mʋ, Yesu taa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ asa, Pita yɛ Gyemisi yɛ Gyɔn tii mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ dii kɩbɩɩ lala kʋ kpee, nɩɩ ba bʋ tʋtɔ bamʋ nkʋn. Nɩɩ Yesu kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kyɛɛgɛ bamʋ ansi sʋ.
Nɩɩ mʋ ɩkaalɛ bunsa gbaa ɩ lɔŋɔ fuuli parɛparɛ ɩ ŋalɩgɛ sʋ. Ɔkʋ man bʋ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ fwɩɩ kaalɛ kɛ ki fuuli parɛparɛ kanɩn kudubi.
Opula maŋa tɔ mʋ, ba ba kɩɩ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ asa dɩdaa anyɔ, Eligya yɛ Mosesi, ba lɩɩ ba, nɩɩ ba maa Yesu bɛɛ tɔwɛ.
Nɩɩ Pita tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, ɩ bʋrɔn gaa fɛɛ a maa bʋ nfɩɩ. Ɩmʋ sʋ, yɛgɛ kɛ a yii abu asa, fʋ lɛɛ kʋkʋ, Eligya lɛɛ kʋkʋ, Mosesi lɛɛ kʋkʋ.”
Nɩɩ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa Pita maa abɩɩlapʋ banban mʋ gaa, nɩɩ ba man bɩla be nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ.
Nɩɩ kabwaarɛ wʋlɛ ba bun bamʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔbʋlɛ kʋ lɩɩ abwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ mʋ tɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ mi‐Bii‐nyɩnsa mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ kebiti sa. Fan nu mʋ asɛ.”
Opula maŋa tɔ, abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba maa kɩɩ kyaabɔɔ mʋ, ba man bɩla wu ɔkʋ bamʋ asɛ, amɔɔ Yesu nkʋn.
Ba maa kpɩlɩgɛ kɩbɩɩ mʋ sʋ bɛɛ ba mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu da bamʋ amu tɔ yɛ, “Fan man tɔwɛ ɔkʋ yɛ ɔkʋ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fan wu, naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ n bwii kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ.”
Nɩɩ ba nu sa mʋ, amaa bamʋ wʋlɛ‐wʋlɛ ɩɩ taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Kikyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ nɩmʋ kasɛ kaapʋ nɛnɛ?”
Nɩɩ ba taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ ɩ dagaa Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Eligya maa gyankpaa ba pɔyɩ?”

Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɩ gyɛ kesintin fɛɛ Eligya ii biti ɔ gyankpaa ba, kɛ ɔ ba lɔŋɔ kʋtɔ kʋmaa kɩnɩmʋ. Amaa mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ n biti n wu awʋrʋfɔ gaa kɛ asa ba kina mɛ?
N tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ Eligya tee bwii ba, nɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ asa bee biti mʋ, ba tɛɛ taa waa mʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba wʋla kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ lɩɩ mʋ sʋ mʋ.”
Ba maa kpɩlɩgɛ kɩbɩɩ mʋ sʋ bɛɛ ba abɩɩlapʋ asansa mʋ asɛ mʋ, ba wu sakyɔ damantɛ kʋ maa yɩlɛ kyaabɔɔ bamʋ, yɛgɛ ba maa nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ bee gyii ɩmɔɔrɛ.
Asa mʋ ba maa wu Yesu maa ba mʋ, i kyinkyin bamʋ, nɩɩ ba sɩlɛ kpee mʋ asɛ naa fwaala mʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩmɔɔrɛ nɩɩ fanaa bamʋ fen gyii mʋ?”
Nɩɩ ɔkʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ lɩɩ sakyɔ mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, kabwɩɩ libi kʋ tɛ mi‐bii sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ taalɛ ɛɛ tɔwɛ, nɩɩ n taa mʋ ba fʋ asɛ.

Ɩ dan kan kyɩna mʋ sʋ de, ɩ sʋ mʋ ɩ tʋʋ kasɛ, yɛgɛ mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ kii fuu afʋfʋʋ, yɛgɛ ɛɛ wɛ mʋ anyi tɔ, nɩɩ ee kirin. N ba kʋlɛ fʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ ba kʋsaa kanɩn nbwɩɩ libi maŋa lɩɩ mi‐bii mʋ sʋ, amaa ba man taalɛ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “O! Fanɛ ndaga kakyɩna nɩmʋ tɔ asa mʋ nɩɩ fan man sʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii. Nɛnɛ nɩɩ fen biti yɛ n nyɛ kenyiita sa fanɛ? Fan taa kebii mʋ bɩya mɛ nfɩɩ.”
Ba maa taa kebii mʋ bɩya mʋ, nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi mʋ maa wu Yesu mʋ, opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ ɩ taa kebii mʋ tʋʋ kasɛ fɛɛ kigbingbin. Ɔ dɛ ee gbiliti yɛgɛ mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ kii fuu afʋfʋʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ kebii mʋ mʋ‐sɛ yɛ, “Kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa mʋ falɛ mʋ, ɩ tɛɛ kyɛɛrɛɛ do?”
Nɩɩ mʋ‐sɛ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Lɩɩ koo mu kebii tɔ nɩɩ ɩ waa mʋ kanɩn.
Ɩ taalɛ ɩ taa mʋ ɩ tʋʋ fʋlɔn yɛ nkyu tɔ ii biti ɩ mɔɔ mʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ, nɩɩ fɩɩ taalɛ waa kʋtɔ kʋ mʋ, wu anɛ kʋwɛɛ kɛ fʋ mɔlɩgɛ anɛ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ mʋ‐sɛ yɛ, “Fʋ yɛ nɩɩ n biti n taalɛ mʋ? Nu kasɛ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gyii mʋ, kʋtɔ kʋmaa kii biti kɩ waa sa mʋ.”
Kebii mʋ mʋ‐sɛ taa kensi payɩ kʋlɛ Yesu yɛ, “N kɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gyii, amaa kyɛ mɛ tɔ kɛ n nyɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tii sʋ.”

Yesu maa wu sakyɔ mʋ maa nyɛ akyɔ ii tii sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ pʋntɛ nbwɩɩ libi mʋ sʋ tɔwɛ ɩmʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ naamuu yɛ akpawu nbwɩɩ libi, n yɛ fan kʋsʋ lɩɩ mʋ sʋ nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ, kɛ fan man bɩla bwii ba mʋ sʋ kakaakʋ.”
Nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi mʋ ba nyaŋɛ tɔ muusi tɔ taa kebii mʋ tʋʋ ɔlʋn fɛɛ kigbingbin, nɩɩ ba kʋsʋ mʋ sʋ. Kebii mʋ dɛ fɛɛ obuni, nɩɩ asa mʋ ba yɛ o wu.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu kɩtaa kebii mʋ kɩbaa tɔ kʋsaa mʋ yɩlɛ mʋ ayaa sʋ.
Ɩmʋ kamaa tɔ, nɩɩ Yesu loo kɩkpaara sʋ, nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ nkʋn ba naa taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ anɛɛnɛ a man taalɛ kʋsaa nbwɩɩ libi mʋ lɩɩ kebii mʋ sʋ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Sɛhn man bʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɩ taalɛ gya ɩnɩmʋ ana kudubi, amɔɔ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ nkʋn.”
Ɩmʋ kamaa nɩɩ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba lɩɩ tʋtɔ bɔla Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ. Nɩɩ Yesu mee biti fɛɛ ba bɩɩ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ kanɩn saŋa maŋa mʋ ɛɛ kaapʋ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ nɩn. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Bee biti ba lɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ sa asa, kɛ ba mɔɔ mɛ, amaa nkɛ nsa kamaa tɔ mʋ, n biti n kyiŋi ba nkpa tɔ.”
Maa tɔwɛ bamʋ kanɩn mʋ, ba man nu ɩmʋ kasɛ, nɩɩ ɩ sʋ bamʋ kufuu fɛɛ ba taasɛ mʋ ɩmʋ kasɛ.
Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba kpee Kapanum kadɛ lala tɔ. Ba maa bʋ kɩkpaara sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan maa naa ɔkpa tɔ fɛn ba mʋ, mɩnɛ ɩmɔɔrɛ nɩɩ fen gyii mʋ?”
Ba laatɔ nɩn ba man lɛɛ kɔnɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba naa ɔkpa tɔ bee kpee mʋ, bee gyii abaa ɩmɔɔrɛ yɛ ɔmɔmɔ ɩ gyɛ bamʋ tɔ ɔlala.
Yesu maa kyʋn kyɩna mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ ba mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ kan ee biti fɛɛ o biliŋi ɔlala mʋ, ɔ waa mʋ n‐yɩɩ kalʋwɛ yɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ sa mʋ tɔɔmaa ana.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu taa kebii kʋ ba yɩlɛ bamʋ ansi tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ taa kebii mʋ abaa tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ,
“Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kan kɔɔlɛ kebii kɩnɩmʋ dubi mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ mʋ, mɛ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kan kɔɔlɛ mɛ mɔɔ mʋ, man gyɛ mɛ nkʋn nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ, amaa ɔ kɔɔlɛ ɔmʋnɩ o sun mɛ mʋ gbaa.”
Nɩɩ Gyɔn tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, an wu ɔnyɩn kʋ maa sʋ fʋ kɩtɩɩ ɛɛ kʋsaa nbwɩɩ libi ɛɛ lɩɩ asa sʋ, yɛgɛ ɔ man tii anɛ sʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ an gya mʋ yɛ ɔ man bɩla waa kanɩn.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan man gya kanɩn ɔsa maŋa. Ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa asɩn kyinkyinsa lɩɩ mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ mʋ, ɩmʋ kamaa mʋ ɔ mɛɛ bɩla taalɛ tɔwɛ asɩn kʋ nyita mɛ kɩtɩɩ.
Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o mee nyita anɛ kusun mʋ, o tii anɛ sʋ nɩmʋ.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ ɔkʋ kan sa fanɛ nkyu nuusa lɩɩ fan maa gyɛ mɛ lɛɛ sʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ nyɛ ɩmʋ kʋkɔka.
“Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan yɛgɛ nɩɩ nbii mʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii falɛ tɔ ɔkʋ kan waa alibi mʋ, kanɩn odunwura maŋa, nɩɩ ba kan taa kɩfʋlɛ‐buu lala ŋmina kyaga mʋ ɔbʋlɛ tɔ taa mʋ tʋʋ ɔpʋ tɔ gbaa mʋ, ɩ bɔ.
Nɩɩ fʋ kɩbaa kɩ kan kɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fɩɩ waa libi mʋ, tɩn kɩmʋ fɔyɩ. Ɩ bɔ sa fʋ fɛɛ fʋ maa taa kɩbaa dɩyɛ loo Ɩbwaarɛ ayɛ, ɩ kyɔ fɛɛ fʋ maa taa abaa anyɔ naa loo awʋrʋfɔ fʋlɔn mʋ nɩɩ i mee dun kpaa tɔ.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ
asʋnswɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ be mee wu,
nɩɩ fʋlɔn mʋ gbaa mee dun kakaakʋ.
“Nɩɩ fʋ kɩyaa kɩ kan kɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fɩɩ waa alibi mʋ, tɩn kɩmʋ fɔyɩ. Ɩ bɔ sa fʋ fɛɛ fʋ maa gyɛ boobi nɩɩ fu loo Ɩbwaarɛ ayɛ, ɩ kyɔ fɛɛ fʋ maa taa ayaa anyɔ naa loo awʋrʋfɔ fʋlɔn tɔ.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ
asʋnswɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ be mee wu,
nɩɩ fʋlɔn mʋ gbaa mee dun kakaakʋ.
“Nɩɩ fu kinsi kɩ kan kɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fɩɩ waa alibi mʋ, kyɔlɛ kɩmʋ tʋʋ. Ɩ bɔ sa fʋ fɛɛ fʋ maa taa kinsi kʋlʋn kpee Ɩbwaarɛ ayɛ, ɩ kyɔ fɛɛ fʋ maa taa ansi anyɔ naa loo awʋrʋfɔ tɔ kakpaa.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ,
asʋnswɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ be mee wu,
nɩɩ fʋlɔn mʋ gbaa mee dun kakaakʋ.
Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ taa fʋlɔn bɔɔlɛ ɔkʋmaa kɛ ɔ waa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ nfɔlɛ bɛɛ bɔɔlɛ inun nɩɩ ɩ waa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ pɔyɩ nɩɩ ba sʋ bɛɛ waa saraga bɛɛ sa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ.
“Nfɔlɛ ɩ bʋrɔn, amaa nɩɩ nfɔlɛ kan fɔyɩ ɩmʋ ɔkɔn bɩrɛ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ fɛn bɩla taalɛ waa mʋ kɛ ɩ nyɛ ɩmʋ ɔkɔn? Ɩmʋ sʋ fan yɛgɛ fanɛ awaasa ɩ baa ɩ bʋkɔn fɛɛ nfɔlɛ, kɛ fan kyɩna yɛ abaa kayɩɩ yuuli tɔ.”
Yesu maa lɩɩ tʋtɔ mʋ, o kpee Gyudeya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ faa Gyɔdan ɔbʋn mʋ kpee benbe. Nɩɩ sakyɔ damantɛ kʋ kɩ ba kyaabɔɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kaapʋ bamʋ abwaarɛsɩn fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla ɛɛ waa mʋ.
Tʋtɔ mʋ Farasii abi akʋ ba ba sʋʋ Yesu ɔdʋʋ sɩntaasɛ tɔ yɛ, “Ɩ dɛ ɔkpa sa ɔnyɩn fɛ o kina mʋ‐ka?”
Nɩɩ Yesu bwii taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nbara nɩɩ Mosesi kaapʋ fanɛ?”
Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mosesi sa ɔkpa fɛɛ ɔnyɩn ɔ kyʋrɔɔ kekina ɔwʋlɛ sa mʋ‐ka kɛ o kina mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ nkɔlɔ ɩ maa bʋlʋn sʋ nɩɩ Mosesi kyʋrɔɔ kanɩn nbara mʋ sa fanɛ.
Naafɔɔ lɩɩ koo npiili asɛ, atɔ kʋtʋʋ tɔ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ waa bamʋ ɔnyɩn yɛ ɔkyɩɩ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn ii biti ɔ yɛgɛ mʋ‐sɛ yɛ mu‐nyi, kɛ ɔ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ mata mʋ‐ka,
kɛ bamʋ asa anyɔ ba biliŋi nyɩmɩsa kʋlʋn, yɛgɛ ba man bɩla ba gyɛ asa anyɔ, amaa ba gyɛ ɔkʋlʋn nɩn.
Ɩmʋ sʋ, ɩmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa waa kʋkʋlʋn mʋ, ɔkʋ man kan barɩgɛ ɩmʋ tɔ.”
Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba maa loo kɩkpaara sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba lɔŋɔ taasɛ mʋ asɩn lɩɩ kekili mʋ asɩn sʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kan kina mʋ‐ka nɩɩ ɔ naa kili ɔkyɩɩ pʋpwɛ mʋ, o nyita kekili, nɩɩ ɔ waa mʋ‐ka mu alibi.
Kanɩn ɔkpa kʋlʋn sʋ nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ kan kina mu‐kuli naa kili ɔnyɩn pʋpwɛ mʋ, o nyita kekili.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ asa akʋ ba taa bamʋ nbii wuribi bɛɛ ba Yesu asɛ yɛ ɔ taa mʋ kɩbaa gyaga bamʋ sʋ, yɛgɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ bɛɛ gya bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ bɩya nbii mʋ.

Yesu maa wu ɩmʋ kanɩn mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ agbʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ nbii wuribi mʋ ba ba mɛ asɛ, kɛ fan man tii bamʋ ɔkpa, lɩɩ fɛɛ sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ kɩ gyɛ sa asa mʋ nɩɩ ba du fɛɛ nbii wuribi mʋ nɩn.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man kɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ fɛɛ kebii mʋ, ɔ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ nyɛ loo kɩmʋ tɔ.”
Nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ bamʋ puga, taa mʋ abaa gyaga‐gyaga bamʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa bamʋ kusee.
Yesu maa dan yii ɔkpa mʋ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔnyɩn kʋ sɩlɛ ba muŋa mu ansi tɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ danbɩrasa, mɩnɛ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa n maa waa kɛ n nyɛ nkpa kakpaa?”
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fʋ tɩɩ mɛ ɔdanbɩrasa? Ɔkʋ man gyɛ ɔdanbɩrasa, amɔɔ Ɩbwaarɛ nkʋn.
Fu nyi Ɩbwaarɛ nbara mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Man mɔɔ nyɩmɩsa, man kan lɩɩ fʋ‐ka abɛɛ fu‐kuli kamaa, man yuuri, man tɩn antɩŋɛsa, man puni fʋ tɔɔmaa, taa bɛɛrɛɛ sa fʋ‐sɛ yɛ fu‐nyi.’ ”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, n wʋla n buu ɩnɩmʋ kpini lɩɩ koo mi kibii tɔ.”

Nɩɩ Yesu kɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ diin, mʋ asɩn ɩ pɩrɛ mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɩ san fʋ kʋtɔ kʋlʋn, kpee naa fɛ fʋ kapatɩyɛ kpini, kɛ fʋ taa afulee mʋ sa atiripu. Ɩmʋ ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ fʋ nyɛ ɩmʋ kʋkɔka, kɛ fʋ ba buu mɛ.”
Ɔnyɩn mʋ maa nu kanan mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ nyaŋɛ mu ansi tɔ taa kɔkɔlɔ nyita kpewu, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ gyɛ atɔ wuya gaa nɩn.
Nɩɩ Yesu kɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ tɔ kyaabɔɔ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɩ bʋlʋn gaa sa atɔ wuya ana fɛɛ ba loo Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ.”
Asɩn mʋ i kyinkyin abɩɩlapʋ mʋ. Amaa Yesu bɩla tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mi‐bii ana, yɛ fan wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ kiloo bʋlʋn.
Ɩ bʋpɔɔ sa nyɔɔma fɛɛ ɔ taalɛ loo baasa ɔbɔ tɔ bʋlɛ, ɩ kyɔ atɔ wuya o loo Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ.”
Asɩn nɩmʋ ɩ dɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ gaa, bɛɛ taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Anɩmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ mɔlɩgɛ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu kɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ surum, nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, “Nyɩmɩsa asɛ nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ ɩ mɛɛ taalɛ waa, man gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ. Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ bɩrɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ ɩɩ taalɛ waa.”
Nɩɩ Pita tɔwɛ yɛ, “An bwiiyaa kʋtɔ kʋmaa yɛgɛ nɩɩ an baa an buu fʋ?”

Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ ɔkʋ man pɩɩ yɛgɛ mʋ kɩkpaara yɛ mʋ‐daa ana yɛ mu‐supu ana yɛ mʋ‐pɩɩkyɩɩ ana mu‐nyi yɛ mʋ‐sɛ yɛ mu‐bii ana yɛ mʋ ndɔɔ ana, lɩɩ nmaa mɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sʋ,

nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ yɛ o bwii nyɛ kɩkpaara yɛ mʋ‐daa ana yɛ mu‐supu ana yɛ mʋ‐pɩɩkyɩɩ ana mu‐nyi yɛ mʋ‐sɛ yɛ mu‐bii ana yɛ mʋ ndɔɔ ana kpini kɩlɩfa sʋ. Ee biti ɔ nyɛ kekisi ndaga kakyɩna nɩmʋ tɔ bɩrɛ, amaa ee biti ɔ ba nyɛ nkpa kakpaa.”
Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Agyankpaapʋ gaalaagaa, bee biti ba be biliŋi asii‐amaapʋ, kɛ asii‐amaapʋ ba be biliŋi agyankpaapʋ.”

Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba naa bee kpee Gyerusalem nɩɩ Yesu ɩ gyankpaa bamʋ bee kpee. Asɩn mʋ i kyinkyin abɩɩlapʋ mʋ, nɩɩ kufuu kɩ sʋ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba buu bamʋ mʋ. Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla lɛɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ ɩkaa sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kii biti ki tu mʋ.

Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “An kpee Gyerusalem, nɩɩ bee biti ba lɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ sa Gyiwu aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ. Bee biti ba bun mɛ lewu kʋpwɛ, kɛ ba taa mɛ waa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi abaa tɔ.
Kanɩn asa maŋa bee biti ba waa mɛ yɛrɛyɛrɛ, kɛ ba tʋʋ nkyɔlɛ bun mɛ, kɛ tɩŋɛ mɛ awʋlɛ‐bi kɛ ba mɔɔ mɛ. Amaa nkɛ asá kamaa mʋ, n biti n kyiŋi ba nkpa tɔ.”
Nɩɩ Sebedi mu‐bii ana Gyemisi maa Gyɔn, ba ba Yesu asɛ ba kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, an kʋlɛ fʋ yɛ fʋ waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ an biti a kʋlɛ fʋ falɛ mʋ sa anɛ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nɩɩ fen biti fɛɛ n waa sa fanɛ?”
Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fʋ kan ba kyɩna fʋ kuwura‐gya, fʋ bʋnyaa kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ mʋ, fʋ yɛgɛ anɛ ɔkʋ ɔ kyɩna fu gyisa sʋ, kɛ ɔkʋ mɔɔ ɔ kyɩna fʋ‐bɩna sʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan man nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fɛn kʋlɛ falɛ. Fɛn taalɛ gyii awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ n biti n gyii falɛ, nɩɩ kekyugyee mʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba gyee mɛ mʋ, fɛn taalɛ gyee kanɩn kekyugyee maŋa?”
Nɩɩ ba kyula yɛ, “An taalɛ.” Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fen biti fan gyii awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ n biti n gyii falɛ, kɛ fan gyee mɛ kekyugyee mʋ nɩɩ n gyee mʋ.
Amaa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyɩna mɛ gyisa sʋ abɛɛ mɛ bɩna sʋ bɩrɛ, man gyɛ mɛ ii biti n sa. Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ taa sa bamʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɔŋɔ yɩla mʋ.”
Yesu abɩɩlapʋ kudu mʋ nɩɩ ba san mʋ, ba maa nu asɩn mʋ, ba nyɛ agbʋ waa Gyemisi maa Gyɔn.

Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu tɩɩ bamʋ kpini sarɛ mʋ asɛ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan nyi mʋ, bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi bamʋ agyankpaapʋ mʋ, bɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ ɔlʋn asa sʋ, nɩɩ bamʋ alʋlʋnpʋ gbaa bɛɛ kaapʋ ɔlʋn asa sʋ.
Amaa fanɛ bɩrɛ, fan man waa kanɩn. Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee biti fɛɛ ɔ waa nyɩmɩsa kparɛ mʋ, o biliŋi kɩyaafɔlɛ sa mʋ tɔɔmaa ana.
Nɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ waa ɔgyankpaapʋ mʋ, ɩ dagaa maa waa fɛɛ kɩnyɛ sa ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ.
Halɩɩ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa gbaa n man ba yɛ asa ba sun mɛ nɩn. N ba n ba sun asa nɩn, kɛ n taa mɛ nkpa kɛɛ, kɛ ɩ ka asa gaalaagaa alibi kʋkɔ.”

Nɩɩ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba kpee Gyeriko kadɛ tɔ. Maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ yɛ kʋbʋ damantɛ ba maa lɩɩ kadɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, ba wu gyaatanapʋ kʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Batimayu, (ɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ Timayu mu‐bii) maa tɛ ɔkpa kaa ɛɛ kʋlɛ.
Gyaatanapʋ mʋ maa nu fɛɛ Yesu Kanasareti‐nyɩn mʋ ɩ kyʋn mʋ, nɩɩ o kuusi tɩɩ mʋ yɛ, “Yesu, Dawidi kanaana‐bii, wu mɛ kʋwɛɛ.”
Maa kuusi kenken sʋ mʋ, asa ba pʋntɛ mʋ sʋ yɛ o bun mʋ kɔnɔ sʋ, yɛgɛ ɛɛ lɔŋɔ ee kuusi kenken ɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Dawidi kanaana‐bii, wu mɛ kʋwɛɛ!”
Nɩɩ Yesu yɩlɛ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan tɩɩ mʋ sa mɛ.” Nɩɩ ba tɩɩ mʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Yɛgɛ fʋ kɔkɔlɔ kɩ yuuli fʋ, Yesu yɛ fʋ ba.”
Nɩɩ ɔ kʋsʋ fugi yii mʋ ayaa sʋ ŋmanyan mʋ kɩtaa tʋʋ ɩkaa sʋ nɩɩ o kpee Yesu asɛ.
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nɩɩ fii biti yɛ n waa sa fʋ?” Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, n biti n baa n kɩɩ nɩn.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Natɛ! Fʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fʋ nyɛ alanfɩya.” Opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ mu ansi mʋ a bugi, nɩɩ o buu Yesu kpee ɔkpa tɔ.
Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba maa tiri Gyerusalem, nɩɩ ba ba fʋʋ Olifu kɩbɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ maa Betifage maa Betani mʋ, Yesu sun mʋ abɩɩlapʋ anyɔ,
nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan kpee kadɛ‐bi mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ fanɛ ansi tɔ, fan maa dan fɛn fʋʋ mʋ, fen biti fan wu kekuruma‐bi mʋ nɩɩ ba man pɩɩ dii mʋ maa kyaa, kɛ fan saŋɛ mʋ bɩya mɛ nfɩɩ.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan taasɛ fanɛ kʋtɔ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ fan saŋɛ mʋ mʋ, fan tɔwɛ odunwura maŋa yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ ii biti mʋ, amaa ee biti o bwiiyaa mʋ ba nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ.’ ”
Kesintin, nɩɩ ba naa wu kekuruma‐bi mʋ maa kyaa kigbenbi sʋ kɩkpaara kʋkʋ kebunɔ. Ba maa saŋɛ mʋ mʋ,
nɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ tʋtɔ mʋ ba taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fɛn saŋɛ kekuruma‐bi mʋ?”
Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Yesu dan tɔwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ asa mʋ ba yɛgɛ ba taa natɛ.
Ba taa kekuruma‐bi mʋ bɩya Yesu, taa bamʋ ataa gyaga kuruma mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ Yesu dii kyɩna sʋ.
Asa gaalaagaa ba taa bamʋ ataa tʋʋtʋʋ ɔkpa tɔ, nɩɩ asansa mɔɔ ba ŋɛlɛ afatɛɛ wʋrɩgɛ ɔkpa mʋ tɔ.
Asa mʋ nɩɩ ba gyankpaa yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba buu kamaa mʋ kpini bee kuusi yɛ,
“Hosana!
Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ naa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ ɛɛ ba mʋ!
Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa anɛ‐Sɛ Owura Dawidi kuwura‐gyii mʋ nɩɩ kɩ ba mʋ!
Hosana ɩ gyɛ sa anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ!”
Yesu maa fʋʋ Gyerusalem mʋ, ɔ naa loo kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ, nɩɩ ɔ kɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa kyaabɔɔ. Amaa kpalɩ fɛɛ kyɔwɛ maa tɛɛ lʋwɛ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ taa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ kpee Betani.
Lɩɩkaakɛ, ba maa lɩɩ Betani bɛɛ ba mʋ, akʋn a kɩtaa Yesu.
Maa kɩɩ kata‐kata mʋ, o wu figi oyu maa pɔrɔgɛ kɩ yɩlɛ, nɩɩ o kpee kɩmʋ asɛ naa kɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ sɔyɩ abii, amaa afatɛɛ nkʋn nɩn, kpalɩ fɛɛ ɩmʋ saŋa sɔyɩsa man pɩɩ fʋʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ figi oyu mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkʋ man bɩla yɛ o gyii fʋ abii mʋ kakaakʋ!” Mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba nu kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ oyu mʋ.
Ba maa fʋʋ Gyerusalem mʋ, Yesu kpee kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ obu mʋ tɔ naa, nɩɩ o piili ɛɛ gya atɔ afɛpʋ yɛ asɔɔpʋ. Nɩɩ o biliŋaa‐biliŋaa afulee akyarɩpʋ iteeburu yɛ awura‐lɔpɔ afɛpʋ ngya taŋa‐taŋa.
Nɩɩ o tii ɔkpa fɛɛ ɔkʋ ɔ man bɩla taa kʋtɔ kʋ bɔla kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ opula.
Nɩɩ ɔ lan kaapʋ bamʋ yɛ, “Ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ,
‘Bee biti ba tɩɩ mɛ kakpaara yɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛkpa sa dulinyaa tɔ asa kpini.’
Amaa fan taa kɩmʋ biliŋaa bamʋ nɩɩ bee yuuri ɔlʋn sʋ ɔbaalakpa.”
Aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ ba nu kanɩn asɩn mʋ, nɩɩ ba piili bee biti ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ba taa mɔɔ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ kɩkaapʋ ki kyinkyin asa damantɛ mʋ kpini, nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba sɩlɛ mʋ.
Kalaatɩpwɛɛ asɛ nɩɩ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba lɩɩ kadɛ lala mʋ tɔ.
Lɩɩkaakɛ nyenyenfuu ba maa naa ɔkpa tɔ mʋ, ba wu figi oyu mʋ kɩ maa wu naa fʋʋ kɩmʋ kasɛ.
Nɩɩ Pita nyiŋi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ waa, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, kɩɩ figi oyu mʋ nɩɩ fʋ tɔwɛ nnɔ mʋ, kɩ maa wu!”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Kɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gyii.

N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ kɩbɩɩ kɩnɩmʋ yɛ, ‘Taa fʋ n‐yɩɩ naa tʋʋ ɔpʋ tɔ,’ nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ waa sika‐sika mʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ falɛ kii biti kɩ waa mʋ, ii biti i waa kanɩn nɩn sa mʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, nɩɩ fan kan kʋlɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa fanɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ tɔ mʋ, fan kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ fan tɛɛ nyɛ kɩmʋ, nɩɩ fen biti fan nyɛ kɩmʋ.
Nɩɩ fʋ kan yɩlɛ fɩɩ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ mʋ, taa alibi kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan waa fʋ mʋ kɛɛ mʋ, kɛ fʋ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ gbaa ɔ taa fʋ lɛɛ kɛɛ fʋ.
Nɩɩ fan kan fan man taa fanɛ tɔɔmaa ana alibi kɛɛ bamʋ mʋ, fanɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ gbaa mɛɛ yɛ ɔ taa fanɛ lɛɛ kɛɛ fanɛ.”
Nɩɩ ba bɩla bwii naa fʋʋ Gyerusalem. Tʋtɔ mʋ, Yesu maa naa kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa, yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ, yɛ abɩlɩsa ba ba mʋ asɛ.
Nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɔlʋn nɩɩ fʋ sʋ fɩɩ waa ɩnɩmʋ kpini? Anɩmʋ ɩ sa fʋ kanɩn ɔlʋn maŋa?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N biti n taasɛ fanɛ asɩn, nɩɩ fan kan lɛɛ kɔnɔ kyɛɛkyɛɛ sa mɛ bɩrɛ, n biti n tɔwɛ fanɛ ɔlʋn kʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ n waa ɩnɩmʋ kpini.
Gyɔn kekyugyee mʋ, ɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ abɛɛ nyɩmɩsa asɛ?”
Nɩɩ ba yii kasɛ bee gyii abaa ɩmɔɔrɛ yɛ, “Nɩɩ an kan lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ mʋ’ ee biti ɔ taasɛ anɛ yɛ, ‘Mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ a man kɔɔlɛ Gyɔn gyii?’
Amaa nɩɩ an kan tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɩ lɩɩ nyɩmɩsa asɛ mɔɔ mʋ.’ ” (Ba sɩlɛ asa mʋ, kpalɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ Gyɔn kyɩna ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ nɩn.)
Ɩmʋ sʋ ba sii lɛɛ Yesu kɔnɔ nɩn yɛ, “A man nyi.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Kanɩn bɩrɛ, ngbaa mɛ, n mɛɛ yɛ n tɔwɛ fanɛ ɔlʋn kʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ n waa ɩnɩmʋ kpini.”

Yesu bɔ bamʋ kɩŋasan yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn kʋ kyɩna dɔɔ wayɩn kʋdɔɔ kʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ pɔyɩ kɩbandɩyɛ kyaabɔɔ kɩmʋ, nɩɩ o kuu wayɩn ɔnyɩyɛkpa ɔbɔ kʋdɔɔ mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ pɔyɩ opula bʋnswɩɩsa mʋ nɩɩ akɩɩsʋpʋ bee dii bɛɛ kɩɩ kʋdɔɔ mʋ sʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ kadɔɔ maŋa waa paa agyipu kʋ abaa tɔ, nɩɩ o kpee ɔkpa.
Kɩtɩŋɛ saŋa maa fʋʋ mʋ, nɩɩ o sun mʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ kʋ paa agyipu mʋ asɛ, kɛ ɔ naa kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ mʋ bɩya mʋ.
Amaa paa agyipu mʋ ba kɩtaa mʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ, dayɩ mʋ bwiiyaa mʋ abaakpan.
Nɩɩ kadɔɔ wuya mʋ bwii sun ɔkʋ, nɩɩ paa agyipu mʋ ba dayɩ mʋ paatɛ mu kumu gyila mʋ ipeeli.
Kadɔɔ wuya mʋ bɩla sun ɔkʋ, nɩɩ paa agyipu mʋ ba dayɩ mʋ mɔɔ. Ɔ bɩla sun gaalaagaa, nɩɩ ba dayɩ akʋ, nɩɩ ba mɔɔ akʋ mɔɔ.
“Ɔkʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ dan san kɛ o sun mʋ ɩ gyɛ mu‐bii mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kebiti sa. Laalaalʋwɛ mʋ o sun mʋ nɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔ maa gyɛ mi‐bii gbaa‐gbaa falɛ bɩrɛ, bee biti ba taa bɛɛrɛɛ sa mʋ.’
“Amaa paa agyipu mʋ ba tɔwɛ abaa nɩn yɛ, ‘Ɔnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ kapatɩyɛ ogyipu mʋ. Fan ba kɛ a mɔɔ mʋ, kɛ kapatɩyɛ mʋ ki biliŋi anɛ lɛɛ!’
Ɩmʋ sʋ ba kɩtaa mu‐bii mʋ, nɩɩ ba mɔɔ, lɛɛ mʋ lɩɩ kadɔɔ mʋ tɔ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɩnɩmʋ falɛ kudubi mʋ, mɩnɛ nɩɩ kadɔɔ wuya mʋ ii biti ɔ waa?” Nɩɩ ba yɛ, “Ee biti ɔ ba mɔɔ paa agyipu mʋ kpini, kɛ ɔ taa kadɔɔ mʋ waa paa agyipu pʋpwɛ abaa tɔ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu yɛ, “Fan man pɩɩta kalɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ? Asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ,
‘Kibuu mʋ nɩɩ apɔyɩpʋ ba kina mʋ,
kɩmʋ ɩ ba biliŋi kɩbɔntɔnbʋlɔntɔ
kubuu kparɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ sʋ obu mʋ tɔ.
Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ ɩ waa ɩnɩmʋ,
nɩɩ i kyinkyin anɛ.’ ”
Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ ba paa Yesu kɩkɩta, kpalɩ fɛɛ ba bɩɩ yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ Yesu bɔ kanɩn kɩŋasan maŋa. Amaa ba sɩlɛ sakyɔ mʋ, ɩmʋ sʋ ba yɛgɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kyʋn.
Farasii abi yɛ owura Herodi asa akʋ ba ba Yesu asɛ ba sʋʋ mʋ ɔdʋʋ lɩɩ mʋ asɩn tɔwɛsa sʋ.

Ba ba mʋ asɛ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, an nyi fʋ maa gyɛ kesintin ogyipu, nɩɩ fʋ mɛɛ tʋwɛ lɩɩ nfɛɛrɛ mʋ nɩɩ asa bɛɛ fɛ, nɩɩ fʋ mɛɛ kɩɩ nyɩmɩsa kɩkparɛ sʋ, amaa fɩɩ kaapʋ asa Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn bɔla kesintin ɔkpa sʋ. An biti a nu lɩɩ fʋ asɛ yɛ, ɩ dɛ ɔkpa fɛɛ a ka lenpoo sa Roma abi Owura lala Kasaro?
Ɩ dagaa fɛɛ a ka abɛɛ a man ka?” Amaa Yesu wʋla o nyi ba maa gyɛ kebunbun ansi wuya ana nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ fan sʋʋ mɛ ɔdʋʋ? Fan sa mɛ kefulee nderebi kɛ n kɩɩ.”
Ba maa sa mʋ kefulee nɩɩ ɔ kɩɩ mʋ, ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ foto yɛ kɩtɩɩ ɩ gyan kefulee mʋ sʋ falɛ?” Nɩɩ ba yɛ, “Owura lala Kasaro lɛɛ.”
Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ Yesu yɛ, “To! Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ Kasaro lɛɛ mʋ, fan ka sa mʋ, nɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mɔɔ lɛɛ mʋ, fan taa sa mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu asɩn a waa bamʋ kanankʋ.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Sadusi abi mʋ nɩɩ ba yɛ kelewu kyiŋi man bʋ tɔ mʋ, ba ba Yesu asɛ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ,
“Ɔkaapʋpʋ, Mosesi kyʋrɔɔ nbara ɩnɩmʋ sa anɛ yɛ, nɩɩ ɔnyɩn kan wu yɛgɛ mʋ‐ka, nɩɩ maa mʋ ba man kʋʋgɛ nbii mʋ, mu‐supu ɩ taalɛ taa okulapu‐kyɩɩ maŋa kili kɛ ba kʋʋgɛ nbii sa olewupu mʋ.
Ɔnyɩn kʋ maa mu‐supu ana asunɔ ɩ kyɩna ba bʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔdaa mʋ kili ɔkyɩɩ, nɩɩ o wu, yɛgɛ maa mʋ‐ka mʋ ba man kʋʋgɛ.
Osupu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyan sʋ taa okulapu‐kyɩɩ maŋa kili, nɩɩ ngbaa mʋ wu, yɛgɛ maa ɔkyɩɩ mʋ ba man kʋʋgɛ. Ɔsasapʋ maa bɩla taa mʋ, kʋkʋlʋn maŋa nɩn.
Bamʋ asunɔ maŋa kpini ba kili ɔkyɩɩ mʋ gyaŋɛ yɛgɛ bamʋ ɔkʋ maa ɔkyɩɩ mʋ ba man kʋʋgɛ. Laalaalʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ gbaa wu.
Nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ, bamʋ asunɔ kpini ba maa kili mʋ falɛ, nɩɩ kelewu kyiŋi kakɛ mʋ, bamʋ tɔ ɔmɔɔ mʋ‐ka ii biti ɩ baa ɩ gyɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Man gyɛ fan maa man nyi abwaarɛsɩn abɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔlʋn mʋ sʋ nɩɩ fan fɔyɩ falɛ?
Ɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ kelewu kyiŋi saŋa mʋ, asa ba man bɩla yɛ ba kili, bee biti ba biliŋi fɛɛ sʋsʋ nbɔɔ mʋ nɩn.

Nbɩɩnbɩɩ, lɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ, fan man pɩɩ kalɛ Mosesi ɔwʋlɛ tɔ lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ o wu fʋlɔn maa dɛɛ apʋnfa mʋ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Mɛ ɩ gyɛ Abraham Ɩbwaarɛ, Isaki maa Gyekobu Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ!’
Ɔ gyɛ asa kɩɩsa Ɩbwaarɛ nɩn, man gyɛ alewupu lɛɛ. Fan fɔyɩ kesintin sʋ!”
Nbara ɔkaapʋpʋ kʋ bʋ tʋtɔ nɩɩ o nu ɩmɔɔrɛ mʋ nɩɩ bee gyii. O wu fɛɛ Yesu lɛɛ Sadusi abi mʋ kɔnɔ danbɩrasa. Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ ba mʋ asɛ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Nbara mʋ kpini tɔ mʋ, kɩmɔɔ kɩ gyɛ kɩkparɛ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Nbara mʋ tɔ kɩkparɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ kɩnɩmʋ mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, Oo! Ɩsɩrayɩ nu! Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ anɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ ɩ gyɛ ɔkʋlʋn nɩn.
Taa fʋ kɔkɔlɔ yɛ fʋ kala yɛ fʋ nfɛɛrɛ yɛ fʋ ɔlʋn kpini nyɛ kebiti sa fʋ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ.
Kɩnyɔsapʋ mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, ‘Biti fʋ bɩrɩsa fɛɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ!’
Nbara kʋ n man bɩla ɔ bʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɩ kyɔ ɩnɩmʋ.”
Nɩɩ nbara ɔkaapʋpʋ mʋ tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Fʋ waa atɔ gaa, Ɔkaapʋpʋ! Ɩ gyɛ kesintin fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ nkʋn ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kʋ man bɩla ɔ bʋ tɔ.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ɔ taa mʋ kɔkɔlɔ yɛ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ yɛ mʋ ɔlʋn nyɛ kebiti sa Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ o biti mʋ‐bɩrɩsa fɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ mʋ, ɩ bʋrɔn ɩ kyɔ fɛɛ ɔ maa waa saraga yɛ kakɛɛ sa Ɩbwaarɛ.”
Yesu maa wu fɛɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ kanyaasɩn tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ man bʋ kata yɛ sʋsʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ.” Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ, ɔkʋ man bɩla nyɛ kɔkɔlɔ taasɛ Yesu asɩn kʋ.
Yesu maa kaapʋ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ yɛ, “Nɛnɛ sʋ nɩɩ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ Krisito mʋ ii biti ɔ lɩɩ Dawidi kanaana tɔ?
Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ yɛgɛ nɩɩ Dawidi tɔwɛ yɛ,
‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ mɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ yɛ,
Kyɩna mɛ gyisa sʋ
naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n biti n taa
fʋ dʋn ana kpini waa fʋ ayaa kasɛ!’
Dawidi gbaa‐gbaa ɩ tɩɩ mʋ ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ.’ Ɩmʋ sʋ, nɛnɛ sʋ nɩɩ Krisito mʋ ii biti ɔ lɩɩ Dawidi kanaana tɔ?”
Nɩɩ sakyɔ damantɛ mʋ kpini ba nu Yesu asɛ yɛ kinsigyi.
Yesu maa san ɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan baa fan da nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba bun bamʋ ɩbalɩmasʋ ba naa bee biti afwaala yɛ bɛɛrɛɛ agya tɔ mʋ sʋ,
yɛgɛ bɛɛ kɩɩ bɛɛ lɛɛ ɩkyɩnakpa kparɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa yɛ kensi‐gyii ipula mʋ.
Bɛɛ naa bee puni akulapu‐kyɩɩ bee gyii bamʋ atɔ, yɛgɛ bɛɛ yɩlɛ asa tɔ bɛɛ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ bʋnswɩɩsa. Bee biti ba nyɛ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ gaa ɩ kyɔ asa kpini!”
Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ, Yesu kyɩna yɛgɛ mu ansi ɩɩ kɩɩ afulee kɩdakaa katɩnɛ, nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩɩ asa ba maa sʋ afulee bɛɛ waa tɔ. Afulee wuya ana gaalaagaa ba waa afulee gaa.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ okulapu‐kyɩɩ tiripu kʋ taa nderebi anyɔ ba waa tɔ.
Nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba sarɛ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ, okulapu‐kyɩɩ tiripu nɩmʋ waa afulee kɩdakaa mʋ tɔ ɔ kyɔ asa mʋ kpini,
lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba waa gaa‐gaa mʋ, ba gyii san ɩkʋ yɩla bamʋ ibu to nɩn, amaa okulapu‐kyɩɩ tiripu nɩmʋ bɩrɛ, mu afulee kpini mʋ nɩɩ ɔ dan ɔ sʋ mu obu to mʋ kpini‐kpini nɩɩ ɔ taa ba waa tɔ falɛ.”
Yesu maa dan ɛɛ lɩɩ Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ ɔbɩɩlapʋ kʋ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ! Kɩɩ abuu danbɩrasa yɛ ibu bʋrɔnsa mʋ nɩɩ ba pɔyɩ falɛ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Yɛ fu wu ibu kparɛ‐kparɛ maŋa? Kibuu kʋlʋn gbaa kɩ mɛɛ yɛ ki sii kɩ gyan kʋkʋ sʋ yɛ be mee nin kɩmʋ tʋʋ.”
Yesu maa tɛ Olifu kɩbɩɩ‐bi mʋ sʋ yɛgɛ mu ansi ɩɩ kɩɩ Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ, Pita yɛ Gyemisi yɛ Gyɔn yɛ Andiruwu ba ba mʋ asɛ.
Nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Saŋa mɔɔ nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ ii biti ɩ ba? Mɩnɛ sɩnkaala ii biti ɩ waa kaapʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ ii biti ɩ ba?”
Nɩɩ Yesu piili ɛɛ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan baa fan da sʋ, kɛ fan man yɛgɛ ɔkʋ ɔ pɩna fanɛ.
Asa gaalaagaa bee biti ba ba mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Mɛ, ɩ gyɛ Krisito mʋ!’ kɛ ba pɩna asa gaalaagaa.
Nɩɩ fan kan nu anaa sʋ yɛ anaa asɩn mʋ, fan man yɛgɛ fanɛ nkɔlɔ ɩ ŋmaa fanɛ. Ɩ dagaa ɩnɩmʋ ɩ maa ba kanɩn, amaa ɩ mɛɛ kaapʋ fɛɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ tee tiri tɔ nɩn.
Ɔsʋwʋlɛ ii biti ɔ kɔ yɛ ɔsʋwʋlɛ, kɛ kuwura‐gyii ɔ kɔ yɛ kuwura‐gyii. Kasɛ kii biti ki gyingyen katɩn kʋmaa nɩmʋ, kɛ akʋn a tɩyɛ. Kanɩn asɩn nɩmʋ kpini i du nɩn fɛɛ ɔkyɩɩ keduŋidi gyankpaasa.

“Fan baa fan da sʋ. Bee biti ba kɩtaa fanɛ kpee asɩn ogyikpa, kɛ ba dayɩ fanɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa. Lɩɩ mɛ sʋ bee biti ba tɩɩ fanɛ alʋnpʋ yɛ awura ansi tɔ, kɛ fan nyɛ ɔkpa tɔwɛ bamʋ mɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ.
Amaa pɔyɩ kɛ laalaalʋwɛ ɔ ba mʋ, ɩ dagaa fɛɛ ba tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sa asa yiri kʋmaa nɩmʋ.

Nɩɩ ba kan kɩtaa fanɛ kpee asɩn ogyikpa mʋ, fan man yɛgɛ ɩ tɔɔrɔɔ fanɛ lɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan naa tɔwɛ mʋ sʋ. Saŋa mʋ kan fʋʋ mʋ, fan tɔwɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa waa fanɛ nnɔ tɔ mʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ man gyɛ fanɛ ɩɩ tɔwɛ, amaa Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ ɩɩ tɔwɛ.
“Osupu ii biti ɔ ba lɛɛ ɔdaa sa kɛ ba mɔɔ mʋ, kɛ ɔsɛ gbaa ɔ lɛɛ mu‐bii sa. Nɩɩ nbii bee biti ba kʋsʋ yɩlɛ bamʋ akʋʋgɛpʋ sʋ kɛ ba yɛgɛ ba mɔɔ bamʋ.
“Ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ii biti o kisi fanɛ lɩɩ mɛ sʋ. Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɩtaa tɔ kenken naa fʋʋ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ, ii biti ɔ nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ mʋ.

“Kanɩn saŋa maŋa mʋ, nɩɩ fan kan wu ɔdaatapʋ libi‐libi mʋ maa yɩlɛ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ ikisii yɛ kɩsɩkpa sa Ɩbwaarɛ fɛɛ maa yɩlɛ tʋtɔ mʋ, (ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kan kalɛ asɩn nɩmʋ mʋ, o nu kasɛ yɛ ɔdan) saŋa maŋa mʋ, bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Gyudeya mʋ, ba sɩlɛ kpee abɩɩ tɔ.
Ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ obu to mʋ, ɔ man bɩla bwii loo obu to ɔ naa taa mʋ atɔ kɛ ɔ sɩlɛ.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ ndɔɔ tɔ mʋ, ɔ man bɩla bwii mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ naa taa mʋ atɔ bunsa.
Kanɩn nkɛ maŋa tɔ mʋ, ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ baa ɩ bʋrɔn sa akyɩɩ ɩtɔ wuya ana, yɛ akyɩɩ atalapʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ nbii wuribi abaa tɔ mʋ!
Ɩmʋ sʋ fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ kɛ kanɩn asɩn nɩmʋ a man ba kɩkyɛ saŋa.
Kanɩn saŋa maŋa ii biti ɩ baa i libi ɩ kyɔ awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ dulinyaa wʋla wu lɩɩ koo saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tʋʋ dulinyaa ba fʋʋ ndaga saŋa nɩmʋ ii sʋ ii kpee.
Amaa nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ man dɩn kɔɔgɛ kanɩn awʋrʋfɔ nkɛ mʋ sʋ nɩn, naafɔɔ ɔkʋ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ. Amaa lɩɩ mʋ asa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔgɛ kanɩn nkɛ maŋa sʋ.
Kanɩn saŋa maa mʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, ‘Fan kɩɩ! Krisito mʋ ndee!’ abɛɛ ‘Fan kɩɩ! Mʋ ɩ bʋ falɛ mʋ!’ fan man kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ antɩŋɛsa Krisito ana yɛ antɩŋɛsa atɔwɛpʋ bee biti ba ba. Bee biti ba ba waa asɩn kyinkyinsa yɛ adangana pɩna asa. Naafɔɔ nɩɩ ɩ nyɛ waa nɩn, bɛɛ pɩna asa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ fan baa fan da sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ n wʋla tɔwɛ fanɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa pɔyɩ kanɩn nkɛ maŋa ɩ fʋʋ.
“Kanɩn awʋrʋfɔ nkɛ maŋa kamaa mʋ,
‘kyɔwɛ man bɩla yɛ ɔ lɩɩ,
ɔbwaayɩ gbaa man bɩla yɛ o fuuli.
Akyikpebi gbaa ii biti ɩ tɩyɛ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba kasɛ,
nɩɩ sʋsʋ ɔlʋn atɔ kpini ii biti i gyingyen.’
“Kɛ asa kpini ba wu mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ n maa lɩɩ abwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ tɔ n ba yɛ ɔlʋn yɛ bɛɛrɛɛ sʋ.
Kɛ n sun sʋsʋ nbɔɔ dulinyaa tɔ katɩn kʋmaa, kyɔwɛ kɩlɩɩ yɛ kyɔwɛ kɩtɩyɛ, adii yɛ akpɩlɩgɛ, kɛ ba natɛ kʋʋla Ɩbwaarɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ lɩɩ dulinyaa tɔ kpini.
“Fan yɛgɛ iyu afatɛɛ kɩpɔrɔgɛ ɩ waa asɩn baalasa sa fanɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ fan kan wu iyu ɩ maa pɔrɔgɛ mʋ, fan bɩɩ fɛɛ kɩkyɛ ki tee tiri tɔ.
Kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ fan kan wu fɛɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ falɛ kpini ɩ kan ɩ waa mʋ, fan baa fan nyi fɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa kibwii ba mʋ ki tiri tɔ, nɩɩ i du fɛɛ ɔ yɩlɛ kebunɔ.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ atɔ nɩmʋ kpini ii biti ɩ waa pɔyɩ, kɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba san ba tɛ nkpa tɔ falɛ kpini ba wu.
Sʋsʋ yɛ kasɛ kpini ii biti ɔ kyʋn, amaa mɛ atɔwɛsa bɩrɛ ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ kyʋn kakaakʋ.
“Ɔkʋ man bʋ tɔ o nyi kanɩn kakɛ abɛɛ saŋa. Sʋsʋ nbɔɔ yɛ mɛ, Obii mʋ gbaa a mee nyi, amɔɔ Ɔsɛ mʋ nkʋn i nyi.
Fan kɩɩ danbɩrasa yɛgɛ fan da sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fen mee nyi saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n biti n ba.
Ii biti ɩ waa nɩn fɛɛ nyɩmɩsa maa kpee ɔkpa kata, kɛ ɔ taa kʋtɔ kʋmaa waa mʋ ayaafɔlɛ abaa tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ sa ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ mu kusun sunsa. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ kebunɔ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ yɛ ɔ baa ɔ da sʋ.
“Ɩmʋ sʋ fan baa fan da sʋ, kpalɩ fɛɛ fen mee nyi saŋa mʋ nɩɩ mɛ, fanɛ kɩkpaara wuya mʋ n biti n ba. N taalɛ n ba fɛɛ kalaatɩpwɛ abɛɛ kiyiridi nsana abɛɛ kɩbwayɩkɛ abɛɛ nyenyenfuu.
Nɩɩ n kan ba purigi fanɛ mʋ, n man ba tu fanɛ fan maa dɛ nsɩɩrɛ.
Asɩn mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ falɛ, n tɔwɛ n sa ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ yɛ, ‘Ba fʋ da sʋ!’ ”

Ɩ maa san nkɛ nyɔ kɛ Gyiwu abi bee gyii bamʋ kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ yɛ bodobodo mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ kɩfɛ tinsa mʋ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ bee biti ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ba baala taa kɩtaa Yesu kɛ ba mɔɔ mʋ.
Nɩɩ bɛɛ yɛ, “Fan man yɛgɛ a waa kanɩn saŋa nɩmʋ tɔ, akʋtɔ akʋ bee biti bɛɛ waa ɩlawʋ.”

Yesu maa bʋ Betani mʋ, nɩɩ o kpee Simon mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ bootipu mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ. Maa tɛ tʋtɔ ee gyii mʋ, nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ kʋ naa taa tuulaale pʋrʋntʋwa tɔ ba mʋ asɛ. Kanɩn tuulaale maŋa sʋ ɔgyalɩn nɩn gaa, lɩɩ fɛɛ nadi nɩɩ ba taa waa ɩmʋ. Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ tigi pʋrʋntʋwa mʋ kyɛɛgɛ tuulaale mʋ kpini wʋrɩgɛ Yesu kumu tɔ.
Nɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ akʋ ba nyɛ agbʋ bɛɛ taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Saamʋ maa dan taa tuulaale nɩmʋ kyɛɛgɛ wʋrɩgɛ kɩyan falɛ, mɩnɛ kyaarɛ nɩɩ ɩ sʋ?
Naafɔɔ nɩɩ ba taa tuulaale nɩmʋ fɛ nɩn, ɩ waa fɛɛ nyɩmɩsa kesu laalaamuu kʋkɔka, kɛ baa taa afulee mʋ sa atiripu.” Nɩɩ ba nyɛ agbʋ bɛɛ pwɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ.
Amaa Yesu yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ! Mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ fɛn pwɩɩ mʋ? Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa mʋ gyɛ kʋtɔ danbɩrasa sa mɛ.
Atiripu mʋ bɩrɛ, ba bʋ fanɛ asɛ saŋa kʋmaa. Kanɩn sʋ, saŋa kʋmaa fɛn taalɛ waa bamʋ adanbɩrasa. Amaa mɛɛ mɛ bɩrɛ, n man yɛ n baa n bʋ fanɛ asɛ saŋa kʋmaa.
Ɔkyɩɩ nɩmʋ waa ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ nɩn. Ɔ kyɛɛgɛ tuulaale nɩmʋ wʋrɩgɛ mɛ sʋ, ɔ gyankpaa ɛɛ sʋswa mɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ sa mi kepula kakɛ nɩn.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ nɩmʋ, dulinyaa tɔ katɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ, bee biti ba tɔwɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa falɛ taa nyiŋi mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Gyudasi Isikariyoti kpee Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa mʋ asɛ, kɛ ɔ lɛɛ Yesu sa bamʋ.
Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ mʋ, waa bamʋ ɔkɔn gaa, nɩɩ ba yɛ bee biti ba sa mu afulee. Ɩmʋ sʋ Gyudasi piili ee biti ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɔla sʋ lɛɛ mʋ sa bamʋ.

Kakɛ gyankpaasa mʋ nɩɩ bee gyii kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ bodobodo mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ kɩfɛ tinsa, nɩɩ ba mɔɔ kɩmʋ saraga nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu abɩɩlapʋ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fɩnɛ nɩɩ fii biti a lɔŋɔ sa fʋ, kɛ fu gyii kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ agyitɔ mʋ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu sun mʋ abɩɩlapʋ anyɔ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan kpee kadɛ lala mʋ tɔ, fen biti fan gyaŋa kanyɩn kʋ maa sʋ kolobi yɛ nkyu, fan buu mʋ
naa loo kɩkpaara mʋ nɩɩ ee biti o loo mʋ sʋ, kɛ fan taasɛ kɩkpaara wuya mʋ yɛ, ‘Ɔkaapʋpʋ mʋ yɛ, obu mɔɔ tɔ nɩɩ n maa mɛ abɩɩlapʋ an biti a gyii kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ agyitɔ mʋ?’
Kɩkpaara wuya mʋ ii biti ɔ kaapʋ fanɛ obu lala kʋ abansʋrʋ sʋ, mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kʋʋla lɔŋɔ yɩla. Tʋtɔ nɩn fan lɔŋɔ kʋtɔ kʋmaa sa anɛ.”
Nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba kpee kadɛ lala mʋ tɔ naa wu kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ mʋ. Nɩɩ ba waa kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ agyitɔ mʋ.
Ɩ maa fʋʋ kalaatɩpwɛ asɛ mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ ba ba abansʋrʋ mʋ sʋ.
Ba maa gyii mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, n maa fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ an gyii falɛ, fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ ii biti ɔ lɛɛ mɛ sa.”
Asɩn mʋ a nyita bamʋ nkɔlɔ tɔ, nɩɩ ba piili bɛɛ taasɛ Yesu kʋkʋlʋn‐kʋkʋlʋn yɛ, “Ɩ gyɛ mɛ nɩn, abɛɛ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fanɛ kudu anyɔ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ, ɔmʋ nɩɩ n maa mʋ abaa ɩ bʋga ii loo lapɛ kʋlʋn tɔ mʋ, ii biti ɔ lɛɛ mɛ sa.
Mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa n biti n wu fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba wʋla kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ mʋ. Amaa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ lɛɛ mɛ sa mʋ, mʋ laakʋ. Naafɔɔ ba daa ba man kʋʋgɛ mʋ gbaa mʋ, ɩ bɔ.”

Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba maa san bee gyii mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu taa bodobodo, nɩɩ ɔ taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ ɔ kpɛɛ bodobodo mʋ tɔ, taa sa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan kɔɔlɛ bodobodo nɩmʋ gyii, ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ mɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu taa kɔɔpʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa afwaala sa mʋ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ. Nɩɩ ɔ taa sa bamʋ kpini yɛ ba nuu.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ mɛ nkalan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa yɩlɛ sa katɔwɛ kyula mʋ, kɛ ɩ kyɛɛgɛ wʋrɩgɛ sa asa gaalaagaa.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ n man bɩla yɛ n nuu wayɩn nta nɩmʋ kakaakʋ, naa fʋʋ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ n biti n bɩla nuu nta pʋpwɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ.”
Nɩɩ ba maa bɩɩ ɔlʋn yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, ba lɩɩ kyʋn Olifu kɩbɩɩ mʋ sʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ kpini fen biti fan sɩlɛ yɛgɛ mɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ,
‘N biti n mɔɔ nbʋlʋpʋ ɔkpapʋ mʋ,
kɛ nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ ba yaasɛ tɔ.’ ”
Yesu kyaga sʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Amaa mi kelewu kyiŋi kamaa mʋ, n biti n gyankpaa fanɛ kpee Galile.”
Nɩɩ Pita lɛɛ Yesu kɔnɔ ɛɛ, “Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ sɩlɛ yɛgɛ fʋ gbaa, mɛɛ mɛ n man yɛ n sɩlɛ yɛgɛ fʋ!”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ Pita yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fʋ kɛ fu nu yɛ, ndaga, pɔyɩ kɛ kyaasɛ ɔ bʋn ɩlɩɩ ɩnyɔ mʋ, fii biti fʋ kyɛɛ ɩlɩɩ ɩsa yɛ fu mee nyi mɛ.”
Amaa Pita payɩ ansi yɛ, “Halɩɩ ɩ gyɛ yɛ n maa fʋ an biti a wu gbaa mʋ, n mɛɛ yɛ n tɔwɛ yɛ n man nyi fʋ.” Kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ abanban mʋ kpini ba tɔwɛ.
Nɩɩ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba kpee katɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Gesemani, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan kyɩna nfɩɩ kɛ n kpee naa kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu taa Pita yɛ Gyemisi yɛ Gyɔn buu mʋ n‐yɩɩ. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu kɔkɔlɔ nyita mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ n‐yɩɩ gbaa ɩ yɔɔ mʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɛ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ ɩ dɩyɛ mɛ lewu‐lewu. Fan sii nfɩɩ yɛgɛ fan da sʋ!”
Maa kpee ansi tɔ gbɛrɛɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ naa kyʋn tɩyɛ kasɛ kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ, “Nɩɩ ɩ nyɛ waa bɩrɛ, falɛ awʋrʋfɔ ɩnɩmʋ ɩ man tu mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nsɛ, kʋtɔ kʋmaa kɩ man bʋlʋn fʋ asɛ. Kɔɔlɛ kanɩn awʋrʋfɔ nɩmʋ lɩɩ mɛ sʋ. Amaa man gyɛ mɛ kɔkɔlɔ biti, amaa fʋ yɛgɛ fʋ kɔkɔlɔ biti kɩ waa.”
Yesu maa bwii kpee mʋ abɩɩlapʋ asɛ mʋ, ɔ naa tu ba maa dɛ nsɩɩrɛ. Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ Pita yɛ, “Simon, fʋ dɛ nɩn? Amɔɔ fan mɛɛ bɩla taalɛ kyɩna kerefi kʋlʋn yɛgɛ fan man dɛ?
Fan baa fan da sʋ, fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ, kɛ fan man tɩyɛ kʋtʋʋ tɔ kɩɩ tɔ. Kpalɩ fɛɛ fanɛ n‐yaayu bɩrɛ ii biti ɩ waa kʋ tɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋrɔn, amaa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mɔɔ ɩ pɔɔ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla bwii kpee ɛɛ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ kʋkʋlʋn maŋa.
Maa bɩla bwii ba mʋ, o wu ba maa dɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ nsɩɩrɛ ɩɩ sʋ bamʋ. Nɩɩ ba man bɩla be nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ.
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu naa bwii ba kili sasapʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan san fan dɛ fɛn fʋʋtɛ nɩn? Fan kɩɩ! Saŋa mʋ fʋʋ fɛɛ ba taa mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ waa alibi awaapʋ abaa tɔ.
Fan kɩɩ, ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ lɛɛ mɛ ɛɛ sa mʋ ndee. Fan kʋsʋ kɛ a kpee.”

Yesu maa dan san ɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ, opula tɔ nɩɩ Gyudasi, abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ, ba fʋʋ tʋtɔ yɛ sakyɔ damantɛ kʋ. Ba sʋ isakunde yɛ agulungu. Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ yɛ kadɛ mʋ abɩlɩsa i sun bamʋ.
Nɩɩ Gyudasi mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ lɛɛ Yesu sa mʋ, wʋla kaapʋ asa sɩnkaala kʋ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɔmʋ nɩɩ n naa baari mʋ tɔ mʋ, mʋ nɩmʋ. Fan kɩtaa mʋ kɛ fan kun mʋ taa natɛ.”
Gyudasi maa dan fʋʋ Yesu asɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ!” Nɩɩ o baari mʋ tɔ.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba kɩtaa Yesu ba sʋ mʋ tɔ kinkin.
Amaa bamʋ nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ tʋtɔ mʋ, ɔkʋ lɛɛ mu sakunde ŋɛ Ɩbwaarɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ kɩnyɛ kʋsʋ tɩn.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Amɔɔ isakunde yɛ ngulungun nɩɩ fɛn taa ba kɛ fan ba kɩtaa mɛ, fɛɛ n maa gyɛ kumu tɔ ɔlʋn oyu?
Kakɛ kʋmaa, n maa fanɛ nɩn kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ yɛgɛ n kaapʋ, nkɛɛ fan man kɩtaa mɛ. Amaa ɩ dagaa ɩnɩmʋ ɩ waa kanɩn, kɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ mʋ, ɩ ba tɔ.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ kpini ba yɛgɛ mʋ sɩlɛ kyʋn.
Nɩɩ kɩyaafɔlɛ kʋ mʋ nɩɩ o bun kɩkalala nkʋn mʋ o buu Yesu, nɩɩ ba paa yɛ ba kɩtaa mʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔ sɩlɛ kibulunkpan yɛgɛ mʋ kɩkalala mʋ.
Nɩɩ ba taa Yesu kpee oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ kɩkpaara sʋ. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ kadɛ abɩlɩsa yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ kpini ba sarɛ.
Nɩɩ Pita buu Yesu kɩyaa‐kɩyaa naa loo oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ kɩkpaara sʋ asɩn ogyikpa tʋtɔ. Nɩɩ o sii kyɩna kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ akɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ asɛ ɛɛ wʋlɛ fʋlɔn.
Nɩɩ aseepu bɩlɩsa mʋ yɛ kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ abɩlɩsa mʋ kpini ba biti asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba tɩn gyaga Yesu sʋ, kɛ ba nyɛ mɔɔ mʋ. Amaa ba kpɩnɛ, ba man nyɛ.
Nɩɩ asa gaalaagaa ba tɩn antɩŋɛsa gyaga Yesu sʋ, amaa bamʋ nnɔ tɔwɛsa ɩ man gyɛ kʋlʋn.
Nɩɩ anyɩn akʋ ba kʋsʋ yɩlɛ tɩn antɩŋɛsa gyaga Yesu sʋ yɛ,
“An nu maa tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘N biti n boyi kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ nɩɩ asa ba pɔyɩ mʋ, kɛ nkɛ nsa kamaa mʋ, n biti n pɔyɩ kɩpʋpwɛ mʋ nɩɩ man gyɛ asa ba pɔyɩ kɩmʋ.’ ”
Nkɛɛ bamʋ gbaa‐gbaa bamʋ nnɔ ɩ kwɩɩ yɛ abaa.
Nɩɩ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ kʋsʋ yɩlɛ bamʋ kpini ansi tɔ, taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Amɔɔ fʋ man sʋ kɔnɔ fʋ lɛɛ lɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ bɛɛ pwɩɩ fʋ falɛ?”
Amaa Yesu laatɔ ɔ man bugi mʋ kɔnɔ.
Nɩɩ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ bɩla bwii taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ Krisito, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ? Fʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ anɛ ayenbi ɩ gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ mʋ Mu‐Bii?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mɛ ɩ gyɛ mʋ. Nɩɩ fen biti fan wu mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa n tɛ Ɔlʋnpʋ Ɩbwaarɛ gyisa sʋ abwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ tɔ ɛɛ ba.”
Nɩɩ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ kyatɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa ɩkaalɛ, nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, “Ɩnɩmʋ bɩrɛ, an man bɩla an biti ɔkʋ ɔ ba tɔwɛ anɛ asɩn pwɩɩsa kʋ lɩɩ mʋ sʋ.”
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan nu yɛ fanɛ asʋ. Ɔ tɔwɛ nbusaa asɩn yii Ɩbwaarɛ. Kanɩn sʋ fan yɛ a waa mʋ nɛnɛ?”
Bamʋ kpini ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “O gyii kʋpwɛ, nɩɩ ɩ dagaa maa wu.”
Nɩɩ asa mʋ akʋ ba tʋʋ nkyɔlɛ bee bun Yesu, nɩɩ ba bun mu ansi yɛgɛ akʋ mɔɔ bɛɛ da mʋ, nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ ɔ bɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ da mʋ? Nɩɩ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ akɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ ba taa mʋ lɩɩ bɛɛ kpa mʋ ɩtan.
Pita maa dan san ɔ bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ, nɩɩ aseepu ɔbɩlɩsa kɩnyɛ kyɩɩsa kʋ ba tʋtɔ.
Maa wu Pita maa san ɛɛ wʋlɛ fʋlɔn mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kɩɩ mʋ surum.
Nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ Pita yɛ, “Yɛ ngbaa fʋ fu buu Yesu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Kanasareti‐nyɩn mʋ nɩn?”
Amaa Pita kyɛɛ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “N man nyi mʋ, nɩɩ n man nyi asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ tɔwɛ falɛ kasɛ.” Nɩɩ Pita lɩɩ ba lenbu.
Nɩɩ kɩnyɛ kyɩɩsa mʋ bɩla wu Pita tʋtɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba yɩla tʋtɔ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnɩmʋ gbaa tii bamʋ sʋ.”
Nɩɩ Pita bɩla kyɛɛ. Kamaa tɔ mʋ, bamʋ nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ tʋtɔ mʋ ba tɔwɛ Pita yɛ, “Kesintin tɔ mʋ, fʋ gyɛ bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋ nɩn. Kpalɩ fɛɛ ngbaa fʋ, fʋ lɩɩ Galile nɩn!”
Nɩɩ Pita piili ɛɛ tɔwɛ nnɔ ɛɛ gyaga mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ bɔ ntan tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ fɛn tɔwɛ mʋ asɩn falɛ gbaa, n man nyi mʋ.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ kyaasɛ bʋn kɩnyɔsapʋ. Nɩɩ Pita nyiŋi asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Yesu wʋla tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Pɔyɩ kɛ kyaasɛ ɔ bʋn ɩlɩɩ ɩnyɔ mʋ, fii biti fʋ kyɛɛ ɩlɩɩ ɩsa yɛ fʋ man nyi mɛ” mʋ. Nɩɩ Pita tɩyɛ kusu sʋ ɛɛ sawʋ.

Lɩɩkaakɛ nyenyenfuu, nɩɩ aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ yɛ kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ abɩlɩsa mʋ kpini, ba gyaŋɛ nɩɩ ba taa nfɛɛrɛ kʋlʋn. Nɩɩ ba ŋmina Yesu nɩɩ ba taa mʋ kyʋn naa sa Paleti mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Roma obii, nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩɩ Ɩsɩrayɩ ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ.
Nɩɩ Paleti taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ Gyiwu abi owura mʋ?” Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Kanan mʋ nɩɩ fʋ tɔwɛ mʋ, kanɩn nɩn.”
Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ mɔɔ ba pwɩɩ Yesu lɩɩ asɩn gaalaagaa sʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔbɩlɩsa Paleti bɩla taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Fʋ mɛɛ yɛ fʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ? Nɩɩ asɩn damantɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba pwɩɩ fʋ lɩɩ ɩmʋ sʋ falɛ fa?”
Nɩɩ Yesu kina kɩlɛɛ kɔnɔ. Nɩɩ ɩ waa Paleti kanankʋ.
Kesu kʋmaa, ngyaŋɛ nbunɔ saŋa mʋ, ɔbɩlɩsa Paleti ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ bɛɛ lɛɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba tii obu mʋ tɔ ɔkʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ sakyɔ mʋ bee biti mʋ sa bamʋ.
Kanɩn saŋa maŋa tɔ mʋ, ba tii ɔnyɩn kʋ obu, bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Barabasi. O tii bamʋ nɩɩ ba man biti kɩbanɛ nɩɩ ba kɔ keluu mɔɔ nyɩmɩsa mʋ sʋ nɩn.
Nɩɩ asa mʋ ba ba Paleti asɛ, ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ɔ waa sa bamʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ wʋla ɛɛ waa mʋ.
Nɩɩ Paleti taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fen biti fɛɛ n yɛgɛ Gyiwu abi owura mʋ?”
Paleti dan o nyi kesintin fɛɛ aseepu abɩlɩsa ba taa Yesu ba sa mʋ lɩɩ kayɩɩ basa.
Amaa aseepu bɩlɩsa mʋ ba fun waa asa mʋ yɛ ba kʋlɛ Paleti kɛ ɔ yɛgɛ Barabasi sa bamʋ, man gyɛ Yesu.
Nɩɩ Paleti bɩla bwii taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Nɩɩ mɩnɛ nɩɩ fen biti fɛɛ n waa ɔmʋ nɩɩ fɛn tɩɩ yɛ Gyiwu abi owura mʋ?”
Nɩɩ ba kuusi yɛ, “Da mʋ oyu laasa sʋ mɔɔ mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Paleti taasɛ yɛ, “Nɩɩ mɩnɛ kilibi nɩɩ ɔ dan waa nɩn?” Nɩɩ ba kuusi kenken tii sʋ yɛ, ba da mʋ oyu laasa sʋ.
Paleti mɔɔ bwii ee biti ɔ waa asa mʋ kɔkɔlɔ biti sʋ, nɩɩ o tigi Barabasi sa bamʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba taa tɩŋɛ Yesu, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ waa bamʋ abaa tɔ yɛ ba naa da mʋ mata oyu laasa sʋ.
Nɩɩ anaakɔpʋ mʋ ba taa Yesu naa loo Ɔbɩlɩsa Paleti lenbu tɔ. Nɩɩ ba tɩɩ bamʋ tɔɔmaa ana asansa.
Nɩɩ ba bun Yesu kɩrɩman‐kyu kɩtaa fɛɛ awura lɛɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ba taa iwii waa kuwura‐wʋrʋ bun mʋ.
Nɩɩ ba piili bɛɛ fwaala mʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Gyiwu abi owura mʋ, nyɛ nkpa bʋnswɩɩsa.”
Nɩɩ ba taa oyu bɛɛ da mu kumu tɔ, nɩɩ bɛɛ tʋʋ nkyɔlɛ ba bun mʋ, nɩɩ ba gya muŋa bamʋ ayaa muli sʋ sa mʋ fɛɛ ba maa sun owura mʋ.
Ba maa tɛɛ waa Yesu ahin‐sɩn lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ba bugi bamʋ kɩrɩman‐kyu kɩtaa mʋ, nɩɩ ba taa Yesu gbaa‐gbaa lɛɛ bun mʋ. Nɩɩ ba taa mʋ kyʋn ba naa da mʋ oyu laasa mʋ sʋ.
Ba maa kpee mʋ, ba gyaŋa Simon mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Siren ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, ɛɛ ba kadɛ lala mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ anaakɔpʋ mʋ ba nyan mʋ yɛ ɔ sʋla Yesu oyu laasa mʋ. Simon nɩmʋ mu‐bii ana ɩ gyɛ Alekisanda maa Rufusi.
Nɩɩ ba taa Yesu kpee katɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Goligota mʋ. Goligota kasɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, “Kumu kawɛ opula.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba taa kɩfɛ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ mɩɩrɛ waa nta tɔ sa Yesu yɛ o nuu. Amaa Yesu kina ɔ man nuu.
Nɩɩ ba da Yesu oyu laasa sʋ. Ba maa biti ba barɩgɛ Yesu ɩkaalɛ tɔ mʋ, ba tʋʋ nbii barɩgɛ mʋ ɩkaalɛ mʋ tɔ sa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa gyii mʋ.
Nyenyenfuu, ɩ waa fɛɛ kerefi akpanɔ saŋa, nɩɩ ba da Yesu mata oyu laasa mʋ sʋ.
Nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba taa bun Yesu kʋpwɛ mʋ taa da mata mu amu sʋ yɛ, “ƆNƖMƲ Ɩ GYƐ GYIWU ABI OWURA MƲ.”
Kanɩn saŋa maŋa mʋ, ba da bamʋ nɩɩ bee yuuri ɔlʋn sʋ anyɔ akʋ iyu laasa sʋ Yesu asɛ. Ɔkʋ bʋ mʋ gyisa sʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɔɔ bʋ mʋ bɩna sʋ.
Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ mʋ ɩ ba tɔ.

Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ ba ɛɛ kyʋn tʋtɔ gbaa bɛɛ sʋ asebi bɛɛ wʋrɩgɛ Yesu sʋ, yɛgɛ bee fi‐fi bamʋ amu bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “To, yɛ fʋ yɛ fii biti fu boyi kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ kɛ fʋ bɩla bwii pɔyɩ kɩmʋ nkɛ nsa akɛ mʋ?
Kanɩn bɩrɛ kpɩlɩgɛ lɩɩ oyu laasa mʋ sʋ kɛ fʋ mɔlɩgɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ!”
Kanɩn nɩɩ aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ gbaa ba ŋmasɛ Yesu nɩn. Bɛɛ tɔwɛ abaa yɛ, “Ɛɛ mɔlɩgɛ asa amaa ɔ mɛɛ taalɛ mɔlɩgɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ.”

Nɩɩ ba yɛ, “Fʋ nyɛ nɩɩ fʋ gyɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ yɛ ɔ ba mɔlɩgɛ asa, nɩɩ fʋ bɩla fʋ gyɛ Gyiwu abi owura mʋ de, kpɩlɩgɛ lɩɩ oyu laasa mʋ sʋ, saamʋ an nyɛ kɔɔlɛ fu gyii.” Asa anyɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba da bamʋ iyu laasa mʋ sʋ gbaa bɛɛ saalɛ Yesu.
Kyɔwɛ maa fʋʋ amu nsana mʋ, nɩɩ kitentenbiri ki bun ɔsʋwʋlɛ mʋ kpini sʋ naa fʋʋ kalaatɩpwɛ asɛ.
Ɩ maa fʋʋ kerefi asa kalaatɩpwɛɛ asɛ mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu kuusi kenken yɛ, “Eli, Eli, lamaa sabatani?” Ɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, “Mɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, mɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fʋ yɛgɛ mɛ kanɩn?”
Asa mʋ nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ tʋtɔ mʋ i nu ɩnɩmʋ, nɩɩ ba yɛ, “Fan nu! Ɛɛ tɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Ɔtɔwɛpʋ Eligya.”

Nɩɩ bamʋ ɔkʋ sɩlɛ naa taa ɔkyɛɛ dufudufu nyɔ nta nyaŋɛsa tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ taa ŋmina oyu sʋ kʋsaa naa tii Yesu kɔnɔ yɛ o nuu. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ a kɩɩ fɛɛ Eligya ii biti ɔ ba kpɩlɩgɛ mʋ oyu laasa mʋ sʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu sawʋ kenken, nɩɩ o wu.
Nɩɩ kɩtaa kunsa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ barɩgɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ ɔtɔ tɔ mʋ kyatɛ tɔ kɩnyɔ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba yii kasɛ.
Nɩɩ anaakɔpʋ ɔbɩlɩsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ yɩlɛ tʋtɔ mʋ wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ Yesu sawʋ nɩɩ o wu mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Kesintin, ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii nɩn.”
Akyɩɩ akʋ ba yɩlɛ kata bɛɛ kɩɩ. Bamʋ tɔ akʋ ɩ gyɛ Mɛɛrɩ Magidalen yɛ Mɛɛrɩ, Gyemisi pii asɛ maa Gyosefu bamʋ‐nyi, yɛ Solome.
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu bʋ Galile mʋ, ba buu mʋ, nɩɩ ba kyɛ mʋ tɔ. Akyɩɩ gaalaagaa mʋ nɩɩ ba buu mʋ ba Gyerusalem mʋ gbaa ba yɩlɛ tʋtɔ.
Kanɩn kakɛ maŋa kɩ gyɛ kakɛ kʋlasa gyoo kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa mʋ. Kyɔwɛ maa kpee ɔ naa tɩyɛ mʋ,

nɩɩ Gyosefu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Arimatiya mʋ naa ba. Ɔ gyɛ nyɩmɩsa kparɛ nɩn, nɩɩ o tii kadɛ abɩlɩsa mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ asa asɛ. Nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ee gyoo Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ kɩba saŋa mʋ. Nɩɩ Gyosefu waa kɔkɔlɔ kpee Paleti asɛ naa kʋlɛ Yesu kibuni mʋ.
Paleti maa nu fɛɛ Yesu tɛɛ wʋla wu mʋ, nɩɩ i kyinkyin mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ anaakɔpʋ ɔbɩlɩsa mʋ taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Yesu tee wu?”
Paleti maa nu anaakɔpʋ bɩlɩsa asɛ yɛ ɩ gyɛ kanɩn mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ sa ɔkpa yɛ Gyosefu ɔ naa taa Yesu kebuni mʋ naa pula.
Nɩɩ Gyosefu naa sɔɔ taafuli, nɩɩ ɔ naa saatɛ Yesu, taa taafuli mʋ maalɛ mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ naa pula kakyan mʋ nɩɩ ba ŋɛ kɩfʋlɛ tɔ waa ɔbɔ mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ Gyosefu gbiliti kubuu lala tii kakyan mʋ kɔnɔ.
Nɩɩ Mɛɛrɩ Magidalen yɛ Gyose mu‐nyi Mɛɛrɩ ba yɩlɛ kɩɩ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba taa Yesu naa pula mʋ.
Kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ kamaa tɔ mʋ, Mɛɛrɩ Magidalen yɛ Mɛɛrɩ Gyemisi mu‐nyi yɛ Solome ba bɩya atɔ liifensa mʋ nɩɩ ba sɔɔ mʋ, kɛ ba taa naa sʋswa Yesu kebuni mʋ.
Lɩɩkaakɛ, nawɔkyɩ kakɛ gyankpaasa akɛ nyenyenfuu, kyɔwɛ maa dan lɩɩ mʋ, nɩɩ ba kʋsʋ bee kpee Yesu kakyan mʋ asɛ.
Ba maa naa bee kpee ɔkpa tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ba taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Anɩmʋ ii biti ɔ naa gbiliti kubuu mʋ lɩɩ kakyan mʋ kɔnɔ sa anɛ?” Kpalɩ fɛɛ kubuu mʋ kɩ kyɔ gaa.
Ba maa kɩɩ mʋ, ba wu fɛɛ kubuu mʋ kɩ tɛɛ wʋla gbiliti kɩ dɛ.
Nɩɩ ba loo kakyan mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ba wu kɩyaafɔlɛ kʋ maa bun atɔ fufuli ɔ tɛ kakyan mʋ tɔ gyisa sʋ, nɩɩ bamʋ nkɔlɔ ɩ ŋmaa bamʋ.

Nɩɩ kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fan man yɛgɛ fanɛ nkɔlɔ ɩ ŋmaa fanɛ. N nyi yɛ Yesu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Nasareti, mʋ nɩɩ ba da mʋ oyu laasa sʋ mʋ nɩɩ fen biti. Ɔ man bʋ nfɩɩ. O kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ. Fan kɩɩ, nfɩɩ nɩɩ ba daa taa mʋ yɩla.
Ɩmʋ sʋ fan natɛ naa tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ Pita yɛ, Yesu gyankpaa fanɛ ee kpee Galile. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ fen biti fan wu mʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla tɔwɛ fanɛ mʋ.”
Nɩɩ ba sɩlɛ lɩɩ kakyan mʋ tɔ lɩɩ fɛɛ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa bamʋ, nɩɩ bɛɛ kyɩkyaa. Ba man tɔwɛ ɔkʋ sɛhn kpalɩ fɛɛ kufuu kɩ maa sʋ bamʋ sʋ.
Yesu maa kʋsʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ lɩɩkaakɛ nyenyenfuu mʋ, ɔ daa kɩlɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ nɩn kaapʋ Mɛɛrɩ Magidalen mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gya nbwɩɩ libi asunɔ lɩɩ mʋ tɔ mʋ.
Nɩɩ o kpee naa tɔwɛ mʋ bɩrɩsa ana mʋ nɩɩ ba bɔɔta tɔ ba tɛ bɛɛ sawʋ mʋ.
Ba maa nu lɩɩ Magidalen asɛ yɛ Yesu tɛ nkpa tɔ nɩɩ o wu mʋ mʋ, ba man kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii.
Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ, Yesu taa ɔkpa pʋpwɛ kʋ sʋ lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ bamʋ tɔ asa anyɔ akʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba naa bee kpee bamʋ kadɛ tɔ.
Nɩɩ ba bwii ba tɔwɛ abanban mʋ, amaa ba man kɔɔlɛ bamʋ gyii.

Ɩnɩmʋ kpini kamaa mʋ, Yesu lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ kudu ɔkʋ mʋ, yɛgɛ ba tɛ bee gyii. Yesu pwɩɩ bamʋ lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ nkɔlɔ ɩ maa bʋlʋn gaa, nɩɩ ba man kɔɔlɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba wu mʋ maa tɛ nkpa tɔ mʋ gyii.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan kpee dulinyaa tɔ katɩn kʋmaa naa tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sa daadimaadi.
Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ gyii, nɩɩ ba gyee mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee mʋ, ee biti ɔ nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ. Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ, bee biti ba bun mʋ lewu kʋpwɛ.
Bamʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ falɛ ɩsɩnkaala ii biti i buu bamʋ. Lɩɩ mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ mʋ, bee biti ba gya nbwɩɩ libi, kɛ ba tɔwɛ ntɔwɛ pʋpwɛ.
Fɛɛ nɩɩ ba kan kɩtaa anansɛ tɔ abɛɛ ba kan nuu kʋbwɛ gbaa mʋ, ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ waa bamʋ sɛhn. Bee biti ba taa bamʋ abaa gyaga alɔpʋ sʋ kɛ ba nyɛ alanfɩya.”
Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu maa tɔwɛ bamʋ asɛ lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa mʋ kpee sʋsʋ naa kyɩna mʋ gyisa sʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu abɩɩlapʋ ba kpee katɩn kʋmaa naa tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ, yɛgɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu ɔlʋn tii bamʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ba waa adangana, nɩɩ ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ bamʋ asɩn danbɩrasa katɔwɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ kesintin.
Luke: Mɛ‐kyɛmɩnɛ Tiyofolisi, asa damantɛ ba taa tʋʋ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kyʋrɔɔ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa anɛ tɔ mʋ yɩla.
Ba kyʋrɔɔ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ asa ba wu yɛ ansi, lɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu asɩn mʋ i yii kasɛ, nɩɩ ba da ɩmʋ kibonbon tɔwɛ anɛ mʋ, yɩla.
Ɩmʋ sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ wuya Tiyofolisi, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ n loo asɩn mʋ tɔ kɩɩ lɩɩ ɩmʋ npiili mʋ, ɩ dagaa fɛɛ n kyʋrɔɔ ɩmʋ kɩgyasʋ‐kɩgyasʋ kyɛɛkyɛɛ sʋ sa fʋ.
Kɛ fʋ nyɛ bɩɩ asɩn mʋ kesintin fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba kaapʋ fʋ mʋ.

Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Herodi gyɛ owura Gyudeya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔnyɩn kʋ bʋ tɔ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Sakariya. Ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ kɩmʋ yɛ Abigya mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ. Nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ‐ka Elisabeti, nɩɩ ngbaa mʋ lɩɩ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ Aron kɩnaana tɔ.
Sakariya maa Elisabeti kakyɩna tɔ ɩkpa i kyiigi Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ, nɩɩ ba buu Ɩbwaarɛ nbara yɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ mʋ nnɔsa mʋ ɩ kaapʋ mʋ.
Ba bɩlɛ, amaa ba man kʋʋgɛ kebii, lɩɩ fɛɛ Elisabeti maa gyɛ ogbentipu sʋ.
Saŋa kʋ ɩ ba fʋʋ aseepu kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ Sakariya bʋ kɩmʋ tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ bee sun Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ.
Nɩɩ ba tʋʋ nbii lɛɛ mʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ aseepu ɩkpa ɩ kaapʋ mʋ, fɛɛ o loo kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ naa tuwa nlaa.
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ o loo ee tuwa nlaa mʋ, yɛgɛ asa damantɛ ba bʋ kewusunɔ bɛɛ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ.
Nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kabɔɔ ba mʋ asɛ, ba yɩlɛ nlaa kaswɩɩ mʋ gyisa sʋ, katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ee tuwa nlaa mʋ.
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Sakariya wu kabɔɔ mʋ, mʋ kɔkɔlɔ kɩ ŋmaa mʋ, nɩɩ ɩ kɩtaa mʋ kufuu.
Amaa nɩɩ kabɔɔ mʋ tɔwɛ Sakariya yɛ, “Man waa kufuu, Ɩbwaarɛ nu fʋ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ. Fʋ‐ka Elisabeti ii biti ɔ kʋʋgɛ Obii‐nyɩnsa kɛ fʋ yɩla mʋ kɩtɩɩ yɛ Gyɔn.
Lɩɩ mʋ sʋ mʋ, fanɛ ansi ii biti i gyii, kɛ asa damantɛ gbaa ansi i gyii lɩɩ mʋ kakʋʋgɛ sʋ.
Ee biti ɔ waa nyɩmɩsa kparɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ. Ɔ man kan waa nuu nta abɛɛ nta bʋlʋnsa. Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ biti o loo bɔla mʋ tɔ, lɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ mu‐nyi ɔtɔ tɔ mʋ.
Nɩɩ ee biti ɔ yɛgɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi gaalaagaa ba nyɛ nfɛɛrɛ kɩkyɛɛgɛ, kɛ ba bwii ba Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ bamʋ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ.

Fu kebii Gyɔn nɩmʋ ii biti ɔ taa Kayaayu tɔ ɔlʋn gyankpaa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Eligya. Ee biti ɔ lɔŋɔ asɛ yɛ nbii bʋga tɔ, kɛ ɔ taa bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn mʋ, ba ba nyɛ kanyaasɩn kɛ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ ba Ɩbwaarɛ ɩkpa kyiigisa mʋ sʋ. Ee biti ɔ waa ɩnɩmʋ lɔŋɔ asa mʋ gyoo Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ.”
Nɩɩ Sakariya taasɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ yɛ, “Nɛnɛ nɩɩ n biti n waa bɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ gyɛ kesintin? Lɩɩ fɛɛ n bɩlɛ, nɩɩ mɛ‐ka gbaa bɩlɛ yɛ kebii kɩnyɛ.”
Nɩɩ kabɔɔ mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mɛ ɩ gyɛ Gabireli mʋ nɩɩ n yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ sʋsʋ mʋ. Nɩɩ o sun mɛ yɛ n ba tɔwɛ fʋ asɩn danbɩrasa nɩmʋ.
Kpalɩ fɛɛ fʋ maa man kɔɔlɛ mɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ ba ɩmʋ saŋa tɔ kyɛɛkyɛɛ gyii sʋ mʋ, n tɔwɛ fʋ yɛ fʋ man bɩla yɛ fʋ taalɛ tɔwɛ sɛhn, naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ mɛ katɔwɛ yɩla mʋ kii biti kɩ ba tɔ.”
Saŋa kʋlʋn maa tɔ, yɛgɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ kewusunɔ mʋ, bɛɛ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ kʋtɔ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ Sakariya kyɛɛrɛɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ.
Nɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ obu mʋ tɔ mʋ, ɔ man bɩla ɛɛ taalɛ ɛɛ tɔwɛ bamʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ba bɩɩ fɛɛ, o wu ansi sʋ kɩlɛɛkaapʋ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ abaa nɩɩ o sii ɔ sʋ ɛɛ tɔwɛ bamʋ asɛ.
Sakariya maa sun mu kiseepu kusun lʋwɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, ɔ lɩɩ tʋtɔ kpewu mʋ ayɛ.
Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ‐ka Elisabeti nyɛ ɔtɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ baala kɩkpaara sʋ kanɩn ɩbwaayɩ inuu.
Nɩɩ Elisabeti yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ ɩ waa ɩnɩmʋ sa mɛ. O su mɛ kʋwɛɛ, nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ ipeeli lɩɩ mɛ sʋ lɩɩ mɛ tɔɔmaa ana tɔ.”
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Elisabeti sʋ mʋ ɔtɔ ɩbwaayɩ isiye mʋ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sun mʋ kabɔɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Gabireli kpee Nasareti kadɛ tɔ, mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ.
Ɩbwaarɛ sun mʋ kpee kibite mʋ nɩɩ o mee nyi ɔnyɩn nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Mɛɛrɩ mʋ asɛ. Ba taa mʋ sa ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Gyosefu kekili, nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Dawidi kɩnaana tɔ.
Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ kpee mʋ asɛ naa fwaala mʋ yɛ, “Faa kumu ɔkɔn! Ɩbwaarɛ bʋ fʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ɔ waa fʋ kusee gaa.”
Nɩɩ ɩ kɩtaa Mɛɛrɩ nfɛɛrɛ lɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ kabɔɔ mʋ tɔwɛ mʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɛɛ fɛ kanɩn afwaala mʋ nfɛɛrɛ.
Nɩɩ kabɔɔ mʋ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɛɛrɩ man waa kufuu, lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ nyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ kabwaala.
Fii biti fʋ nyɛ ɔtɔ kɛ fʋ kʋʋgɛ Obii‐nyɩnsa, kɛ fʋ yɩla mʋ kɩtɩɩ yɛ Yesu.
Ee biti ɔ waa nyɩmɩsa kparɛ kɛ ba tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Owura lala Mu‐Bii. Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ taa Yesu mʋ naana Dawidi kuwura‐gya mʋ sa mʋ.
Nɩɩ ee biti o gyii Ɩsɩrayɩ abi sʋ kuwura‐gyii naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ ɔkaa.”
Nɩɩ Mɛɛrɩ taasɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ yɛ, “Nɛnɛ nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ ii biti ɩ bɔla sʋ waa, yɛgɛ n gyɛ kibite mʋ nɩɩ n man nyi ɔnyɩn?”

Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ ii biti ɔ ba fʋ sʋ, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Owura lala mʋ ɔlʋn o bun fʋ sʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ bee biti ba tɩɩ obii kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ nɩɩ fii biti fʋ kʋʋgɛ mʋ mʋ, yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii.
Fʋ kʋʋpʋ Elisabeti mʋ nɩɩ asa bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ ogbentipu nɩɩ ɔ waa kakyɩɩ bɩlɩsa gbaa mʋ, sʋ obii‐nyɩnsa‐bii ɔtɔ ɩbwaayɩ isiye.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ kʋtɔ kʋ kɩ man bʋ tɔ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mɛɛ taalɛ waa.”
Nɩɩ Mɛɛrɩ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ nɩn, yɛgɛ ɩ waa kanɩn sa mɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fʋ tɔwɛ mʋ.” Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ lɩɩ tʋtɔ kyʋn.
Ɩmʋ nkɛ gbɛrɛɛ kamaa mʋ, Mɛɛrɩ kʋʋla mʋ n‐yɩɩ ɛɛ waa bilen o kpee kadɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ abɩɩ tɔ Gyudeya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔ naa loo Sakariya kɩkpaara sʋ naa fwaala mʋ‐ka Elisabeti.
Elisabeti maa nu Mɛɛrɩ afwaala mʋ, kebii mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ mʋ ɔtɔ tɔ mʋ fitii. Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ kɩ maa loo bɔla Elisabeti mʋ,
nɩɩ ɔ pʋntɛ kenken tɔwɛ yɛ, “Akyɩɩ kpini tɔ mʋ, fʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ waa kusee kʋkyɔ, nɩɩ kusee bun fu kebii mʋ nɩɩ fii biti fʋ kʋʋgɛ mʋ sʋ.
Mɩnɛ kusee lala nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa bwaala mɛ yɛ mɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ mu‐nyi ɔ ba bɔɔ mɛ sʋ?
N maa dan nu fʋ afwaala mʋ, kebii mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ mɛ ɔtɔ tɔ mʋ taa kensi‐gyii fitii.
Kusee ɩ gyɛ fʋ lɛɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ maa kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ fʋ mʋ, ii biti ɩ ba tɔ kesintin.”
Nɩɩ Mɛɛrɩ tɔwɛ yɛ,
“N yɩn Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lɩɩ mɛ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ.
Ɩbwaarɛ mɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ sʋ mʋ, mi ansi i gyii lɩɩ mɛ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ.
Kpalɩ fɛɛ mɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ kibite mʋ nɩɩ n man bʋ sɛhn tɔ mʋ,
mɛ asɩn i tiri Ɩbwaarɛ.
Nɩɩ lɩɩ ndaga sʋ i kpee mʋ, ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ii biti ɔ tɩɩ mɛ yɛ kumu ɔkɔn wuya.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɔlʋnpʋ lala Ɩbwaarɛ waa atɔ kparɛ sa mɛ.
Mʋ kɩtɩɩ ɩ gyɛ Kɩkyɩrɛkyɩrɛ.
Nɩɩ asa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ba sɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, ee wu bamʋ kʋwɛɛ,
san sa abii san yɛ anaana.
Ɔ taa mʋ kɩbaa bʋlʋnsa mʋ waa asɩn kyinkyinsa,
nɩɩ ɔ yaasɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kʋsaa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ.
Ɔ kʋsaa awura‐gyipu bamʋ ngya sʋ,
amaa nɩɩ o diyaa abʋlʋpʋ mʋ sʋsʋ.
Ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ atiripu ba nyɛ atɔ danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ i tiri bamʋ.
Amaa atɔ wuya ana bɩrɛ, o bwiiyaa bamʋ yɛ abaa kpan.
Ɩbwaarɛ nyiŋi mʋ asa Ɩsɩrayɩ abi sʋ,
nɩɩ o wu bamʋ kʋwɛɛ kyɛ bamʋ tɔ,
fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɩla anɛ naana ana agyankpaapʋ mʋ.
Ɔ tɔwɛ Abraham yɛ ee biti o wu maa mʋ kanaana tɔ abi kpini kʋwɛɛ.”
Nɩɩ Mɛɛrɩ kyɩna Elisabeti asɛ ɩ waa fɛɛ ɩbwaayɩ ɩsa pɔyɩ nɩɩ o bwii kpewu.
Elisabeti kakɛ kʋʋgɛsa maa fʋʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kʋʋgɛ kebii‐nyɩnsa‐bii.
Nɩɩ Elisabeti mʋ tɔɔmaa ana yɛ mʋ kʋʋpʋ ana ba maa nu kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ wu mʋ kʋwɛɛ mʋ, nɩɩ bamʋ kpini ba bʋga gyii bamʋ ansi.
Ɩmʋ kakɛ buruwasapu mʋ ba gyaŋɛ, kɛ ba tɩn kebii mʋ oduu. Naafɔɔ bee biti ba taa mʋ‐sɛ kɩtɩɩ Sakariya mʋ yɩla mʋ.
Amaa nɩɩ mu‐nyi kina kɩtɩɩ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, “Ba tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Gyɔn.”
Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ Elisabeti yɛ, “Fan man sʋ ɔkʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kanɩn kɩtɩɩ fanɛ kanan tɔ.”
Nɩɩ ba waa abaa tɔwɛ mʋ‐sɛ Sakariya asɛ, kɛ ba bɩɩ kɩtɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ba taa yɩla kebii mʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba taa kɩgyantan‐bi sa mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ kyʋrɔɔ sʋ yɛ, “Mʋ kɩtɩɩ ɩ gyɛ Gyɔn.” Nɩɩ i kyinkyin bamʋ gaa.
Opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ Sakariya kɔnɔ bugi, nɩɩ mʋ kanandʋlʋ gbaa saŋɛ, nɩɩ o piili ɛɛ tɔwɛ ɛɛ yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ.
Nɩɩ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa mʋ tɔɔmaa ana mʋ kpini, nɩɩ asɩn nɩmʋ ɩ yalagɛ ndɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ abɩɩ tɔ Gyudeya Ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o nu kanɩn asɩn mʋ ɩɩ fɛ kɩmʋ nfɛɛrɛ, nɩɩ ɛɛ taasɛ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nɩɩ kanɩn kebii nɩmʋ ba ɔ ba waa?” Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩbaa kɩ gyan mʋ sʋ.
Nɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ bɔla kebii mʋ mʋ‐sɛ Sakariya tɔ, nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ abwaarɛsɩn yɛ,
“Fan yɛgɛ a yɩn anɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ,
lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ ba nɩn ɔ ba kyɛ mʋ asa tɔ kɛ ɔ mɔlɩgɛ bamʋ.
Lɩɩ mʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ Dawidi kanan tɔ mʋ,
ɔ lɛɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ Lʋnpʋ sa anɛ.
Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ ba wʋla tɔwɛ yɩla fɛɛ,
ee biti ɔ ba mɔlɩgɛ anɛ lɩɩ anɛ dʋn ana
yɛ anɛ akisipu kpini abaa tɔ.
Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ yɛ ee biti o wu anɛ naana ana kʋwɛɛ
kɛ o nyiŋi mʋ katɔwɛ kyula kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ.
Katɔwɛ kyula nɩmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔ ntan sa anɛ naana Abraham yɛ,
ee biti ɔ kɔɔlɛ anɛ lɩɩ anɛ akisipu abaa tɔ,
kɛ ɔ yɛgɛ a nyɛ ɔlʋn sun mʋ yɛgɛ a man sʋ kufuu.
Kɛ a ba an gyɛ asa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ kɛ anɛ ɩkpa i kyiigi, mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ lɩɩ anɛ kakyɩna kpini.”
Nɩɩ Sakariya tɔwɛ mu‐bii Gyɔn yɛ, “Mi‐bii, bee biti ba tɩɩ fʋ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Ɔlʋnpʋ mʋ ɔtɔwɛpʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ fii biti fʋ gyankpaa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ naa lɔŋɔ mʋ ɔkpa.
Fii biti fʋ ba yɛgɛ mʋ asa ba bɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ lɩɩ alibi kɩtaakɛɛ sʋ
nɩɩ bee biti ba nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ maa wu anɛ kʋwɛɛ sʋ mʋ,
nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ mʋ ba anɛ asɛ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ kyɔwɛ ɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba ɛɛ da kasɛ mʋ.
Kɛ ɩ ŋmaŋɛ sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ kitentenbiri
mʋ nɩɩ kɩ sʋ bamʋ kii kpee lewu tɔ,
kɛ ɩ ŋmaŋɛ tɔ kaapʋ anɛ ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ sʋ i kpee keyuula tɔ.”
Nɩɩ kebii mʋ dan nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu tɔ ɔlʋn, nɩɩ ɔ kyɩna ofuli sʋ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi.
Kanɩn nkɛ maŋa tɔ mʋ, Owura Kasaro Agusitu sa kɔnɔ yii sʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ Roma kuwura‐gyii kasɛ mʋ kpini ɔ naa kyʋrɔɔ mʋ kɩtɩɩ kɛ ba kalɛ mʋ.
Kɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ asa kɩkalɛ gyankpaasa mʋ nɩɩ ba waa Roma kuwura‐gyii tɔ, saŋa maŋa tɔ nɩɩ Kwirinisi gyɛ Siriya ɔsʋwʋlɛ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ.
Kanɩn sʋ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kpee mʋ kadɛ tɔ kɛ ɔ naa kyʋrɔɔ mʋ kɩtɩɩ.

Nɩɩ Gyosefu gbaa kʋsʋ Nasareti kadɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, kpee kadɛ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ kɩmʋ yɛ Betilehem mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Gyudeya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ. Betilehem ɩ gyɛ kadɛ mʋ nɩɩ owura Dawidi lɩɩ. Gyosefu kpee Betilehem kpalɩ fɛɛ ɔ lɩɩ Dawidi kebunɔ nɩn.
Gyosefu taa Mɛɛrɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɛ ee biti o kili mʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ba kpee Betilehem ba naa kyʋrɔɔ bamʋ atɩɩ. Kanɩn saŋa maŋa mʋ Mɛɛrɩ sʋ ɔtɔ.
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Betilehem mʋ, nɩɩ Mɛɛrɩ saŋa kʋʋgɛsa kɛ fʋʋ.

Nɩɩ Mɛɛrɩ kʋʋgɛ mu‐bii‐nyɩnsa gyankpaasa. Nɩɩ ɔ taa akyibi mili kebii mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ dɩɩla kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ atɔbwaaya bee gyii mʋ tɔ. Kpalɩ fɛɛ afɔ ba maa ba kɩkyɔ sʋ mʋ Mɛɛrɩ maa Gyosefu ba man nyɛ opula afɔ obu mʋ tɔ.
Saŋa maŋa tɔ, nbʋlʋpʋ akpapʋ akʋ ba bʋ kadɛ mʋ afitiri tɔ bɛɛ kɩɩ bamʋ nbʋlʋpʋ sʋ kagyanbwɛ.
Nɩɩ opula maa tɔ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ kʋ kɩ ba bamʋ asɛ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bʋnyaa mʋ ŋmaŋɛ tɔ kyaabɔɔ bamʋ. Nɩɩ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa bamʋ.
Amaa nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan man waa kufuu. N bɩya fanɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ ii biti a waa asa kpini ɔkɔn.
Ndaga kakɛ nɩmʋ ba kʋʋgɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ mʋ Dawidi kadɛ tɔ. Mʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ.
Falɛ nɩɩ fen biti fan wu kesintin mʋ. Fen biti fan wu fɛɛ ba maa taa akyibi mili kebii pʋpwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ dɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ atɔbwaaya bee gyii mʋ tɔ.”
Opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ kʋbʋ lala kʋ ba lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba tii kabɔɔ mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ba yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ,
“Bʋnyaa bʋ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ asɛ.
Kɛ keyuula ki bun bamʋ nɩɩ ba bɔla mu ansi mʋ kasɛ sʋ.”
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ ba lɩɩ bamʋ asɛ kpee sʋsʋ mʋ, nbʋlʋpʋ akpapʋ mʋ ba tɔwɛ abaa yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ a kpee Betilehem naa kɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ waa nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ anɛ mʋ.”
