Kɩɩ, fanɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ kii biti ki sii kɩ dɛ kɩkpan sa fanɛ. N tɔwɛ fanɛ, fanɛ man bɩla yɛ fan wu mɛ kakɛ akʋ, naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan tɔwɛ yɛ, “Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa ɔmʋnɩ ɔ ba Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ.”
Ɩ baa fɛɛ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa kʋ nɩɩ Yesu kpee Farasii abi ɔbɩlɩsa kʋ ayɛ ɔ naa gyii, yɛgɛ bɛɛ pɛɛtɛ mʋ fɛɛ ee biti o nyita Gyiwu abi nbara mʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn kʋ bʋ mu ansi tɔ tʋtɔ, ɛɛ lɔɔ kyankpan.
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ anyipu mʋ ba maa Farasii abi mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkpa dɛ fɛɛ a kyɛ ɔkʋ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ abɛɛ a man kyɛ?”
Amaa ba man tɔwɛ sɛhn nɩɩ Yesu kɩtaa ɔnyɩn mʋ, kyɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ natɛ.
Nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fɛɛ nɩɩ fanɛ ɔkʋ sʋ kebii abɛɛ naatɛ‐nyɩnsa nɩɩ ɔ tɩyɛ kitiribo tɔ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ mʋ, fʋ mɛɛ yɛ fʋ lɛɛ mʋ?”
Amaa ba man taalɛ lɛɛ ɩmʋ kɔnɔ.
Yesu maa wu fɛɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba tɩɩ bamʋ ogyikpa mʋ bɛɛ ŋmaarɛ ɩkyɩnakpa kparɛ‐kparɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ bɔ bamʋ kɩŋasan nɩmʋ yɛ,
“Fɛɛ nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan tɩɩ fʋ mʋ kɩkyɩɩfɔ tɔ mʋ, man naa kyɩna ɔkyɩnakpa kparɛ, akʋtɔ fɛɛ ɔ tɩɩ ɔsa kparɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɩla ɔ kyɔ fʋ.
Kɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ faa mʋ mʋ, ɔ ba tɔwɛ fʋ yɛ, ‘Taa fʋ kagya sa ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ.’ Tʋtɔ nɩɩ fii biti fʋ taa ipeeli naa kyɩna katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ.

Amaa nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan tɩɩ fʋ mʋ, naa kyɩna katɩn mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ, kɛ ɔ ba tɔwɛ fʋ yɛ, ‘Kyɛmɩnɛ, ba kyɩna kagya kparɛ sʋ nfɩɩ.’ Saŋa mʋ, fɩɩ nyɛ bɛɛrɛɛ lɩɩ fʋ tɔɔmaa ana mʋ nɩɩ ɔ da kɩbaa tɩɩ mʋ asɛ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kʋsaa mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋsʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ bɩya mʋ kasɛ, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɩya mʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ kʋsaa mʋ sʋsʋ.”

Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ mʋ mʋ, mɔɔ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fʋ kan tɩɩ asa yɛ ba be gyii kakyʋwapɛ abɛɛ kalaatɩpwɛ agyitɔ mʋ, man kan waa fʋ tɩɩ fʋ kyɛmɩnɛ ana abɛɛ fʋ‐daa abɛɛ fʋ kʋʋpʋ ana abɛɛ afulee wuya ana mʋ nɩɩ ba tɛ tiri fʋ mʋ. Nɩɩ fʋ kan waa kanɩn mʋ, akʋtɔ fɛɛ bee biti ba tɩɩ fʋ gbaa fʋ ba bamʋ lɛɛ tɔ kɛ ɩ ka fʋ kʋkɔ.
Amaa nɩɩ fʋ kan dɩŋa kensi‐gyii agyitɔ mʋ, tɩɩ atiripu yɛ aboobi yɛ amʋgʋlɛ‐mʋgʋlɛ yɛ agyaatanapʋ,
kɛ fʋ nyɛ kusee, lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ ɩ mɛɛ taalɛ ka fʋ kʋkɔ. Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ ka fʋ kʋkɔ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ akyɩrɛkyɩrɛpʋ bee biti ba kʋsʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ.”
Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ maa bamʋ ba tɛ bee gyii mʋ ɔkʋ maa nu asɩn mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Kusee ɩ gyɛ nyɩmɩsa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti o gyii Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn kʋ ɩ dɩŋa kensi‐gyii agyitɔ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ asa damantɛ yɛ ba be gyii.
Saŋa mʋ maa fʋʋ fɛɛ ba be gyii mʋ, nɩɩ o sun mʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ yɛ ɔ naa tɔwɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ bamʋ mʋ yɛ, ba waa kʋtɔ kʋmaa lʋwɛ, ɩmʋ sʋ ba ba.
“Nɩɩ bamʋ kpini ba piili bɛɛ tɔwɛ asɩn bɛɛ lɛɛ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ. Ɔgyankpaapʋ mʋ yɛ, ‘N dan sɔɔ kasɛ nɩn, nɩɩ ɩ daaga fɛɛ n naa kɩɩ kɩmʋ, ɩmʋ sʋ n kʋlɛ fʋ nɩn n mɛɛ yɛ n taalɛ ba.’
“Nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɔɔ yɛ, ‘N dan sɔɔ ɩnaatɛ‐nyɩnsa kudu nɩn, nɩɩ n dan kpee n naa taa bamʋ dɔɔ kɩɩ, ɩmʋ sʋ n mɛɛ yɛ n taalɛ ba.’
“Nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɔɔ bɩla yɛ, ‘N dan kili ɔkyɩɩ nɩn, n mɛɛ yɛ n taalɛ ba.’

“Nɩɩ kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ taa asɩn mʋ ba tɔwɛ mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ. Nɩɩ kɩkpaara wuya mʋ nyɛ agbʋ, nɩɩ ɔ sa mʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Bilen, kpee kadɛ mʋ tɔ agbenbi sʋ yɛ ɩkpa‐bi naa bɩya atiripu yɛ aboobi yɛ agyaatanapʋ yɛ amʋgʋlɛ‐mʋgʋlɛ wuya ana.’
“Ɩ man kyɛɛrɛɛ nɩɩ kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ n waa fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sa kɔnɔ mʋ, amaa ɩkyɩnakpa san ɩ bʋ tɔ.’
“Nɩɩ ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ bwii tɔwɛ mʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ yɛ, ‘Kpe ɩkpa mʋ nɩɩ ii kpee ndɛ sʋ, yɛ ndɔɔ ana tɔ, kɛ fʋ yɛgɛ ba ba kɛ mɛ kɩkpaara kɩ bɔla.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ fɛɛ, asa mʋ nɩɩ n tɩɩ bamʋ Sososi mʋ ɔkʋ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ daa mɛ kensi‐gyii agyitɔ mʋ kɩɩ.’ ”
Yesu maa kʋbʋ damantɛ kʋkʋ ba maa naa mʋ, nɩɩ o biliŋi tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ,
“Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ɛɛ ba mɛ asɛ, nɩɩ o mee biti mɛ ɔ kyɔ mʋ‐sɛ yɛ mu‐nyi, mʋ‐ka yɛ mu‐bii ana, mʋ‐daa ana yɛ mu‐supu ana, apɩɩkyɩɩ yɛ apɩɩnyɩn, halɩɩ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ nkpa dee, ɔ mɛɛ taalɛ waa mɛ obuupu.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ sʋla mu oyu laasa,
kɛ o buu mɛ mʋ, ɔ mɛɛ taalɛ waa mɛ obuupu.

“Fɛɛ nɩɩ fanɛ ɔkʋ ii biti ɔ pɔyɩ kɩkpaara lala mʋ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa? Pɔyɩ kɛ o piili mʋ ɔ mɛɛ gyankpaa kɩɩ mu afulee mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ taa pɔyɩ, kɛ o wu fɛɛ mu afulee mʋ ii biti ɩ fʋʋ kɩpɔyɩ mʋ abɛɛ ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ fʋʋ?
Nɩɩ akʋtɔ ee piili ɔpɔrɛ gyankpaasa, nɩɩ ɔ man taalɛ lʋwɛ mʋ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o wu kɩmʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ ŋmasɛ mʋ yɛ,
‘Odunwura nɩmʋ piili kɩkpaara kɩpɔyɩ amaa ɔ man taalɛ pɔyɩ lʋwɛ.’
“Abɛɛ owura mɔɔ, nɩɩ maa owura kʋ bee biti ba ba kɔ, nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ kyɩna kɩɩ tɔ yɛ ɛ taalɛ taa mʋ anaakɔpʋ ngbɩn kudu naa gyaŋa owura banban mʋ maa mʋ anaakɔpʋ ngbɩn adʋnyɔ?
Nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ taalɛ kɔ yɛ mʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ lɛɛ asa sun ɔbanban mʋ asɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ san ɔ bʋ kata‐kata, kɛ ɔ taasɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba waa kɛ keyuula kɩ ba bamʋ nsana.
Kanɩn ɔkpa kʋlʋn maŋa sʋ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man yɛgɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ mʋ, ɔ mɛɛ taalɛ waa mɛ obuupu.
“Nfɔlɛ ɩ bʋrɔn, amaa nɩɩ nfɔlɛ ɔkɔn kan lʋwɛ mʋ, mɩnɛ kʋtɔ nɩɩ bee biti ba taalɛ taa waa kɛ ɩ bɩla ɩ waa ɔkɔn?
Ɩ man sʋ kyaarɛ sa kʋtɔ kʋ kɩlɔŋɔ, amɔɔ bɛɛ taa kyɛɛgɛ fɔyɩ. Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ asʋ mʋ, o nu.”
Kakaakʋ nɩɩ lenpoo akɔɔlɛpʋ yɛ alibi awaapʋ ba ba sarɛ bee nu Yesu asɛ.
Nɩɩ Farasii abi yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ bɛɛ kɔlɩtɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ ɩɩ kɔɔlɛ alibi awaapʋ halɩɩ maa bamʋ bee bʋga bee gyii.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu bɔ bamʋ kɩŋasan kɩnɩmʋ yɛ,
“A taa fɛɛ nɩɩ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ kan ɔ sʋ nbʋlʋpʋ kɩlɩfa kɛ bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋlʋn ɔ fɔyɩ. Nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ yɛgɛ adɩkpanɔ yɛ akpanɔ mʋ afitiri tɔ, kɛ ɔ natɛ biti ɔmʋnɩ ɔ fɔyɩ mʋ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti o wu mʋ?
Nɩɩ ɔ kan wu mʋ mʋ, ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ mu ansi i gyii, kɛ ɔ taa mʋ gyaga mʋ abaakpan sʋ,
kɛ ɔ taa mʋ ba kewu. Kɛ ɔ tɩɩ mʋ kyɛmɩnɛ ana yɛ mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ abi sarɛ, kɛ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, ‘Fan ba tii mɛ sʋ kɛ i gyii ansi, lɩɩ fɛɛ n wu mɛ kabʋlʋpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ fɔyɩ mʋ.’

N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin, ɔkpa kʋlʋn maŋa sʋ kensi‐gyii kii biti kɩ baa kɩ bʋ sʋsʋ, fɛɛ alibi ɔwaapʋ kʋlʋn maa kyɛɛgɛ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ kyɔ gaa fɛɛ asa adɩkpanɔ yɛ akpanɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kɩɩ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi nɩɩ ɩ man tiri fɛɛ ba kyɛɛgɛ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ.
“Abɛɛ a taa fɛɛ ɔkyɩɩ kʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ gbiti nderebi kudu nɩɩ ɩmʋ kʋkʋlʋn fɔyɩ. Nɩɩ o mee tuwa fɩtɩla kɛ ɔ fɔgɛ kɩkpaara kɩɩ biti kɩmʋ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti o wu kɩmʋ?
Nɩɩ ɔ kan wu kɩmʋ mʋ, ɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ kyɛmɩnɛ ana yɛ mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ abi ba sarɛ tɔ, kɛ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, ‘Fan ba tii mɛ sʋ kɛ i gyii ansi, lɩɩ fɛɛ n wu mɛ kederebi mʋ nɩɩ kɩ fɔyɩ mʋ.’
N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ, ɔkpa kʋlʋn maŋa sʋ kensi‐gyii ii biti ɩ baa ɩ bʋ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ asɛ fɛɛ alibi ɔwaapʋ kʋlʋn maa kyɛɛgɛ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu kyaga sʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn kʋ kyɩna ɔ bʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ nbii‐nyɩnsa‐bii anyɔ.
Nɩɩ kebii asɛ mʋ tɔwɛ mʋ‐sɛ yɛ, ‘Mɛ‐Sɛ, barɩgɛ fʋ kapatɩyɛ mʋ kpini tɔ kɛ fʋ taa mɛ lɛɛ sa mɛ.’ Ɩmʋ sʋ, mʋ‐sɛ barɩgɛ kapatɩyɛ mʋ tɔ ntun nyɔ sa bamʋ.
“Nkɛ gbɛrɛɛ kamaa tɔ mʋ, kebii asɛ fɛ mʋ kapatɩyɛ mʋ kpini, kʋʋla kʋsʋ loo to kpee ɔsʋwʋlɛ kʋ sʋ kata‐kata. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔ naa gyii mu afulee mʋ kpini kʋsʋbɔ tɔ lʋwɛ.
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ o gyii mu afulee mʋ kpini lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ akʋn damantɛ a tɩyɛ ɔsʋwʋlɛ maŋa sʋ kpini, nɩɩ kitiri fufuli kɩ kɩtaa mʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ o kpee naa waa kusun sa kasɛ maŋa sʋ ɔdɛ‐bi kʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ fɛɛ ɔ kɩɩ mu akuuri sʋ.
Ee biti agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ akuuri bee gyii mʋ kigyii, amaa ɔ man nyɛ.
“Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ ba mʋ tɔ mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ sa mʋ n‐yɩɩ yɛ, ‘Mɛ‐Sɛ adɔɔpʋ mʋ kpini agyitɔ a gbigi bamʋ, yɛgɛ n bʋ nfɩɩ n biti n wu akʋn lewu.
N biti n kʋsʋ bwii kpee nsɛ asɛ kɛ n naa tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, Nsɛ, n waa Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ fʋ alibi.
Ɩmʋ sʋ n man bɩla dagaa gbaa fɛɛ fʋ tɩɩ mɛ yɛ fu‐bii, taa mɛ waa fɛɛ fʋ adɔɔpʋ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ.’
Kanɩn sʋ ɔ kʋsʋ yii sʋ bwii ɛɛ ba mʋ‐sɛ asɛ.
“Amaa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ dan san ɔ bʋ kata yɛ kewu mʋ, mʋ‐sɛ wu mʋ, nɩɩ o wu mʋ kʋwɛɛ. Nɩɩ ɔ sɩlɛ naa gyaŋa mu‐bii mʋ, nɩɩ o baari mʋ tɔ.
“Nɩɩ kebii mʋ tɔwɛ mʋ‐sɛ yɛ, ‘Nsɛ n waa Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ fu alibi. Nɩɩ n man bɩla dagaa gbaa fɛɛ fʋ tɩɩ mɛ yɛ fu‐bii.’
“Amaa nɩɩ mʋ‐sɛ tɔwɛ mʋ ayaafɔlɛ yɛ, ‘Fan waa bilen! Fan taa kɩtaa kparɛ ba bun mʋ, fan lɛɛ kepini ba waa mʋ kɩbaa‐bi tɔ, kɛ fan waa mʋ asɩbɩta.
Kɛ fan naa kɩtaa naatɛ bonbi‐nyɩnsa mʋ ba mɔɔ kɛ a gyii, kɛ a kyaa gyii anɛ ansi.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ mi kebii‐nyɩnsa‐bii nɩmʋ daa wu nɩn, nɩɩ o bwii kyiŋi, ɔ fɔyɩ nɩn, nɩɩ n bwii benti mʋ.’ Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba piili bee gyii bamʋ ansi.
“Saŋa maa tɔ mʋ yɛgɛ obii bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ bʋ ndɔɔ tɔ. Maa lɩɩ ndɔɔ ɛɛ ba nɩɩ o be tiri kewu tɔ mʋ, o nu ɩlʋn yɛ kakyaa ɩ maa kpira mʋ‐sɛ kɩkpaara sʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ tɩɩ mʋ‐sɛ ayaafɔlɛ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ mʋ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ waa.
Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Fu‐supu i bwii ba, nɩɩ fʋ‐sɛ mɔɔ mʋ naatɛ bonbi‐nyɩnsa mʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ fu‐supu bwii ba kewu yɛ kumu nkpa yɛ alanfɩya.’
“Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔdaa mʋ nyɛ agbʋ yɛ ɔ man bɩla yɛ o loo kɩkpaara sʋ. Kanɩn sʋ mʋ‐sɛ lɩɩ kpee naa tɔwɛ waa mʋ yɛ o loo ba.

Amaa ɔ lɛɛ mʋ‐sɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Kɩɩ! Nsu ɩnɩmʋ kpini n maa sun fʋ fɛɛ kɩnyɛ. Nɩɩ n man kina fʋ kɔnɔ kunu. Mɩnɛ kʋtɔ nɩɩ fʋ pɩɩta sa mɛ? Fʋ man sa mɛ halɩɩ kabwɩɩ gbaa kɛ maa mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ ana a mɔɔ gyii anɛ ansi.
Amaa fu kebii‐nyɩnsa nɩmʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ naa nyita fʋ kapatɩyɛ lɩɩ akyɩɩ gyaga sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ naa bwii ba kewu mʋ, fʋ mɔɔ naatɛ bonbi‐nyɩnsa sa mʋ.’
“Nɩɩ ɔsɛ mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Mi‐bii, fʋ bʋ mɛ asɛ nfɩɩ saŋa kʋmaa, nɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ mʋ gyɛ fʋ lɛɛ nɩn.
Ɩmʋ sʋ yɛgɛ ɩ waa anɛ ɔkɔn kɛ a kyaa gyii anɛ ansi, lɩɩ fɛɛ fu‐supu nɩmʋ daa wu nɩn, nɩɩ o bwii kyiŋi, ɔ fɔyɩ nɩn, nɩɩ n bwii benti mʋ.’ ”
Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ yɛ, “Atɔ wuya kʋ ɩ kyɩna ɔ bʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩɩ mʋ kapatɩyɛ sʋ. Nɩɩ atɔ wuya mʋ nu fɛɛ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ ii nyita mʋ kapatɩyɛ.

Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ tɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Mɩnɛ asɩn nɩɩ n nu n lɩɩ fʋ sʋ falɛ? Taa mɛ kapatɩyɛ mʋ nɩɩ n taa waa fʋ kɩbaa tɔ mʋ kpini bɩya mɛ, kɛ fʋ karagɛ ɩmʋ kɔnɔ sa mɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ man bɩla yɛ fʋ kɩɩ mɛ kapatɩyɛ sʋ.’
“Nɩɩ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ yɛ, ‘Nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɛnɛ nɩɩ n biti n waa? Mɛ‐nyɩrɩpɛ ɩɩ kɔɔlɛ mi kusun ɛɛ lɩɩ mɛ asɛ, nɩɩ n man bʋlʋn kɛ n waa kasɛ kukuu kusun, nɩɩ ɩ sʋ mɛ ipeeli yɛ n naa kʋlɛ.
N nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ n biti n waa nɩɩ kusun mʋ kɩ kan lɩɩ mɛ kɩbaa tɔ mʋ, asa bee biti ba kɔɔlɛ mɛ bamʋ akpaara sʋ.’
“Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ tɩɩ mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ akɔ wuya ana nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ ɔgyankpaapʋ mʋ yɛ, ‘Mɛ‐nyɩrɩpɛ kʋkɔ afɩnɛ nɩɩ fʋ sʋ?’
“Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘N sʋ kʋkɔ olifu nfɔ galɔn alɩfa aburuwa.’
“Nɩɩ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Kɔɔlɛ fʋ ɔwʋlɛ, kɛ fʋ kyɩna bilen kɛ fʋ kyʋrɔɔ ana.’
“Nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ ɔnyɔsapʋ mʋ yɛ, ‘Afɩnɛ kʋkɔ nɩɩ fʋ sʋ?’ Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Akyembee ɩbɔɔta kagbɩn kʋlʋn.’
“Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Kɔɔlɛ fʋ ɔwʋlɛ kɛ fʋ kyʋrɔɔ aduburuwa.’
“Atɔ wuya mʋ ba yɩn ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ nɩɩ mu ansi ɩ tɩn fɛɛ maa sʋ kanyaasɩn. Lɩɩ fɛɛ kanɩn nɩɩ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ asa ba sʋ kensi tɩn kɩkyɔ bɛɛ waa asa ɩ kyɔ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asa ba sʋ bɛɛ waa asa mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu kyaga sʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan taa fanɛ dulinyaa tɔ atɔ kyɛ asa tɔ biti akyɛmɩnɛ sa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ, nɩɩ ɩ kan ba fɛɛ atɔ mʋ saŋa ɩ kyʋn mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ kɔɔlɛ fanɛ ba nkpa kakpaa tɔ.
“Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee gyii kesintin atɔ gbɛrɛɛ sʋ mʋ, ɔ bɩla ee gyii kesintin atɔ kɩkyɔ sʋ. Nɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ o mee gyii kesintin atɔ gbɛrɛɛ sʋ mʋ, kanɩn maa nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ yɛ o gyii kesintin atɔ kɩkyɔ sʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ fu mee gyii kesintin dulinyaa atɔ sʋ mʋ, anɩmʋ ii biti ɔ taa Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ ɔkaa mʋ waa fʋ abaa tɔ?
Nɩɩ fʋ mee gyii kesintin ɔkʋ kapatɩyɛ sʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ mɛɛ yɛ sa fʋ mʋ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ da yɛ ɔ sa fʋ mʋ.
“Kɩyaafɔlɛ kʋlʋn mɛɛ taalɛ sun anyɩrɩpɛ anyɔ. Nɩɩ ɩ kan ba kanɩn mʋ, ee biti o kisi ɔkʋ kɛ ɔ ba ee biti ɔkʋ, abɛɛ ee biti ɔ baa ee sun ɔkʋ kɛ o kina ɔkʋ. Fɛn mɛɛ taalɛ sun Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ afulee.”
Farasii abi mʋ nɩɩ bee biti afulee gaa ba maa nu ɩnɩmʋ kpini mʋ, ba gbɛɛlɛɛ Yesu.

Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ banɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ fɛn waa fɛɛ fanɛ ɩkpa i kyiigi asa ansi tɔ, amaa Ɩbwaarɛ nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ i du. Lɩɩ fɛɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ kʋtɔ kparɛ asa ansi tɔ mʋ, kɩ gyɛ kʋtɔ kisisa sa Ɩbwaarɛ.

“Ba tɔwɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ Mosesi nbara yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ kɩkaapʋ naa fʋʋ Gyɔn saŋa. Lɩɩ kanɩn saŋa maŋa ɩ sʋ ii kpee mʋ, ba tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kpan mʋ n‐yɩɩ ee loo to.
Ii biti ɩ baa ɩ bʋpɔɔ sa sʋsʋ yɛ kasɛ ɩ maa nyaa, ɩ kyɔ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbara mʋ pii ɩ maa lɩɩ tɔ.
“Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o kina mʋ‐ka nɩɩ ɔ naa kili ɔkyɩɩ kʋ mʋ, o nyita kekili, nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ o kili ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ mu‐kuli kina mʋ mʋ gbaa ɔ kɔɔlɛ ɔkʋ mʋ‐ka.”
Nɩɩ Yesu kyaga sʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Afulee wuya kʋ ɩ kyɩna ɔ bʋ tɔ. Kakɛ kʋmaa ee bun atɔ bunsa danbɩrasa fɛɛ agoo maa kente, yɛgɛ ee gyii mʋ n‐yɩɩ kakɛ kʋmaa.
Odibapu kʋ gbaa kyɩna ɔ bʋ tɔ, nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Lasarusi mʋ nɩɩ mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kpini, ɩ sʋ ɩlɔ. Nɩɩ kakɛ kʋmaa bɛɛ sʋla mʋ ba bɛɛ yɩla atɔ wuya nɩmʋ kebunɔ.
Nɩɩ ee biti fɛɛ ɔ daa nyɛ agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ atɔ wuya mʋ teeburi sʋ ɩ tɩyɛ kasɛ mʋ gbaa gyii. Halɩɩ igyoonɔ gbaa bɛɛ ba bee nyita mʋ ɩlɔ mʋ tɔ.
“Saŋa kʋ tɔ mʋ odibapu mʋ be wu, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ ba taa mʋ kpee Ɩbwaarɛ nyɩmɩsa Abraham asɛ sʋsʋ. Atɔ wuya mʋ gbaa be wu nɩɩ ba pula mʋ.
Ɔ naa loo Sɩtaanɛ fʋlɔn tɔ yɛgɛ ɔ bʋ awʋrʋfɔ tɔ. O diyaa mu ansi mʋ, o wu Lasarusi maa tɛ Abraham asɛ kata‐kata.
Ɩmʋ sʋ, ɔ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ, ‘Ɔsɛ Abraham, wu mɛ kʋwɛɛ kɛ fʋ sun Lasarusi kɛ ɔ taa mʋ kɩbaa‐bi nyɔ nkyu tɔ, kɛ ɔ taa ba yuula mɛ kanandʋlʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ n gyii awʋrʋfɔ fʋlɔn nɩmʋ tɔ.’

“Amaa Abraham lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ. ‘Mi‐bii, nyiŋi fɛɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ kyɩna fʋ tɛ nkpa tɔ kasɛ sʋ mʋ fʋ nyɛ atɔ danbɩrasa nɩɩ Lasarusi mɔɔ nyɛ atɔ libi, amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ mʋ ee gyii ɔkɔn yɛgɛ fɛɛ fii gyii awʋrʋfɔ.
Ɩnɩmʋ kpini kamaa mʋ, kɩkyɔbɔɔ lala kʋ kɩ dɛ ana fanɛ nsana, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ lɩɩ nfɩɩ kpee fanɛ asɛ mʋ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ taalɛ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ lɩɩ fanɛ asɛ ba anɛ asɛ nfɩɩ.’
“Nɩɩ atɔ wuya mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Kanɩn bɩrɛ mɛ‐sɛ n kʋlɛ fʋ nɩn, sun Lasarusi o bwii kpee mɛ‐sɛ kɩkpaara sʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ, n sʋ mi‐supu ana anuu. Yɛgɛ ɔ naa da bamʋ amu tɔ kɛ ba man ba katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n bʋ n gyii awʋrʋfɔ falɛ.’
“Abraham lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Mosesi nbara yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ ɩ bʋ bamʋ asɛ, bɛ taalɛ nu lɩɩ ɩmʋ tɔ.’
“Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ayee, mɛ‐sɛ Abraham, nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan lɩɩ lewu tɔ naa tɔwɛ bamʋ mʋ, bee biti ba yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa.’
“Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Ba kan ba man nu Mosesi nbara yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ, halɩɩ nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ gbaa kpee bamʋ asɛ mʋ, ba mɛɛ yɛ ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii.’ ”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ yɛ, “Ɩ waa nɛnɛ, atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa ɩ waa alibi mʋ ii biti ɩ ba. Amaa ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ bɔla mʋ sʋ kɛ ɩ ba mʋ, mʋ laakʋ.
Fɛɛ nɩɩ mʋ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, ba taa kubuu lala ŋmina mʋ ɔbʋlɛ tɔ naa tʋʋ ɔpʋ tɔ gbaa mʋ, ɩ bɔ sa mʋ fɛɛ ɩ maa bɔla mʋ sʋ nɩɩ nbii wuribi nɩmʋ ɔkʋ naa waa alibi.
Ɩmʋ sʋ fan baa fan da fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ. Nɩɩ fu‐supu kan waa fʋ alibi mʋ taasɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kan nu mʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ mʋ, kɛ fʋ taa mu alibi kɛɛ mʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔ kan waa fʋ alibi ɩlɩɩ isunɔ kakɛ kʋlʋn, nɩɩ ɔ kan nu mʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ ba tɔwɛ fʋ ɩlɩɩ isunɔ yɛ, ‘N man waa danbɩrasa mʋ,’ taa mu alibi kɛɛ mʋ.”
Nɩɩ asunpu mʋ ba tɔwɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ yɛ, “Tii anɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ kɛ kɩ nyɛ akyɔ.”
Nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fan kan fan sʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii pii fɛɛ gowa abi gbaa mʋ, fɛn taalɛ tɔwɛ oyu lala nɩmʋ yɛ, ‘Faa fu ilin kpini fii kyiigi naa yii ɔpʋ tɔ,’ kɛ i nu fanɛ asɛ.
“Nɩɩ fɛɛ fanɛ ɔkʋ sʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ nɩɩ ɛɛ dɔɔ abɛɛ ɛɛ kɩɩ nbʋlʋpʋ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kan lɩɩ ndɔɔ tɔ ba mʋ, fɩɩ dan taalɛ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Waa bilen kɛ fʋ ba kyɩna gyii?’
Ayee! Fii biti fʋ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Dɩŋa mɛ kalaatɩpwɛ agyitɔ ba yii mɛ kɛ n gyii kɛ n nuu. N kan lʋwɛ mʋ, kɛ ngbaa fʋ, fʋ naa gyii kɛ fu nuu.’
Ɩmʋ sʋ i tiri fɛɛ ɔ fwaala kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ ɔ waa sa mʋ abɛɛ?

Kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ, nɩɩ fan kan waa kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ fan waa mʋ, fan tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘An gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ayaafɔlɛ mʋ nɩɩ a man sʋ kyaarɛ, an dan waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa a maa waa mʋ nɩn.’ ”
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu ii kpee Gyerusalem mʋ, ɔ bɔla Samariya yɛ Galile ɩsʋwʋlɛ ngyaŋɛ nɩn.
Maa kpee kadɛ‐bi kʋ sʋ mʋ, ɔ gyaŋa anyɩn kudu nɩɩ bɛɛ lɔ kibootoo. Nɩɩ anyɩn mʋ ba yɩlɛ kata,
nɩɩ ba kuusi kenken yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu, wu anɛ kʋwɛɛ.”
Yesu maa wu bamʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ “Fan taa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ naa kaapʋ aseepu.” Ba maa kpee mʋ nɩɩ ba nyɛ alanfɩya.
Bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋ, maa wu fɛɛ ɔ nyɛ alanfɩya mʋ, o bwii ba ee kuusi kenken ɛɛ yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ.
Nɩɩ o be muŋa Yesu ayaa tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ fwaala mʋ lɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa sa mʋ mʋ sʋ. Nɩɩ kanɩn kanyɩn maŋa gyɛ Kasamariya‐nyɩn nɩn.
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ yɛ, “Man gyɛ asa kudu ɩ nyɛ alanfɩya. Fɩnɛ nɩɩ asansa akpanɔ mʋ ba bʋ?
Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ kadɛndɛmandɛ nɩmʋ nkʋn ɩ taalɛ bwii ba fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ?”
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Kʋsʋ natɛ, fʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fʋ nyɛ alanfɩya.”
Saŋa kʋ nɩɩ Farasii abi ba taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Kakɛ mɔɔ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ kii biti kɩ ba?” Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ fɛn mɛɛ yɛ fan taa fanɛ ansi wu kɩ maa ba.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ taalɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Kɩɩ kɩmʋ ndee’ abɛɛ ‘kɩ bʋ falɛ’. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura mʋ kɩ bʋ fanɛ tɔ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Saŋa kʋ ii biti ɔ ba, nɩɩ fen biti fɛɛ fan wu mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ mɛ nkɛ mʋ kʋkʋ, amaa fan mɛɛ yɛ fen wu.
Nɩɩ asa bee biti ba tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, ‘Mʋ ɩ bʋ falɛ mʋ’ abɛɛ ‘Mʋ ndee’. Amaa fan man waa fan buu bamʋ.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ lɩɩ fɛɛ, mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa kibwii ba mʋ, ii biti ɩ baa i du nɩn fɛɛ bʋlayɩ maa gyii ɩsɛɛ ŋmaŋɛ sʋsʋ lɩɩ kɩbaafʋn nɩmʋ naa lɩɩ kɩbanban nɩmʋ.
Amaa ɩ dagaa fɛɛ n gyankpaa wu awʋrʋfɔ gaa, kɛ kɩnaana nɩmʋ tɔ abi ba kina mɛ.
“Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa anɛ naana Nowa saŋa mʋ, kanɩn nɩɩ ii biti ɩ waa mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa kibwii ba saŋa mʋ gbaa.
Anɛ naana Nowa saŋa mʋ, asa ba kyɩna bee gyii yɛgɛ bee nuu, bee kili naa fʋʋ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ anɛ naana Nowa loo ɔkʋlɩ mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ nkyu ɩ ba muuri bamʋ kpini.
“Kanɩn nɩɩ ɩ waa Loti saŋa mʋ, asa ba kyɩna bee gyii yɛgɛ bee nuu, bɛɛ fɛ yɛgɛ bɛɛ sɔɔ, bee duu yɛgɛ bɛɛ pɔyɩ.
Amaa kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ Loti lɩɩ Sodom kadɛ tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ fʋlɔn yɛ kuduri lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba dɩyɛ bamʋ kpini.
“Kanɩn nɩɩ ii biti ɩ waa kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ n biti n lɛɛ mɛ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ mʋ.

Kanɩn kakɛ maa nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ɔ bʋ kewusunɔ mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ atɔ a bʋ kɩkpaara mʋ sʋ mʋ, ɔ man bɩla kpee kɩkpaara sʋ naa taa atɔ. Kanɩn ɩ gyɛ sa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ ndɔɔ tɔ mʋ, ɔ man bɩla bwii kpee kewu kɛ ɔ naa taa kʋtɔ kʋ.
Fan nyiŋi Loti mʋ‐ka.
Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti fɛɛ ɔ mɔlɩgɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ nkpa mʋ, ii biti ɩ lɩɩ mʋ abaa tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ nkpa sa lɩɩ mɛ sʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ nyɛ kɩmʋ.
Kanɩn kagyanbwɛ maŋa mʋ, asa anyɔ bee biti ba baa ba dɛ kalan kʋlʋn sʋ, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ taa ɔkʋ yɛgɛ ɔkʋ.
Akyɩɩ anyɔ bee biti ba baa bɛɛ kɔyɩ atɔ, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ taa ɔkʋ yɛgɛ ɔkʋ.
Anyɩn anyɔ bee biti ba baa bee sun kusun ndɔɔ tɔ, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ ba taa ɔkʋ yɛgɛ ɔkʋ.”
Nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba taasɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu yɛ, “Fɩnɛ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ waa.” Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Katɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ belenbuni bʋ mʋ, tʋtɔ nɩɩ agyinbwii gbaa ba ba gyaŋɛ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu bɔ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ kɩŋasan mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ kaapʋ bamʋ fɛɛ, ba ba bɛɛ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ saŋa kʋmaa, kɛ ba man yɛgɛ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ nnyɔ bamʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Asɩn ogyipu kʋ ɩ bʋ kadɛ kʋkʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ man sɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nɩɩ ɔ man taa nyɩmɩsa tɩɩ sɛhn.
Nɩɩ okulapu‐kyɩɩ kʋ gbaa bʋ kadɛ maŋa tɔ, ɔ maa sʋ ɛɛ ba asɩn ogyipu mʋ asɛ ɛɛ kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Kyɛ mɛ tɔ kɛ n gyii biri mɛ dʋn ana.’
Ɩ kyɛɛrɛɛ gaa nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ waa sɛhn ɛɛ sa mʋ. Amaa kamaa tɔ mʋ, asɩn ogyipu mʋ tɔwɛ waa mʋ n‐yɩɩ yɛ, ‘Ɩ gyɛ kesintin fɛɛ man sɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nɩɩ man taa nyɩmɩsa tɩɩ sɛhn.
Amaa lɩɩ kitintin mʋ nɩɩ okulapu‐kyɩɩ nɩmʋ i tintin mɛ falɛ sʋ mʋ, n biti n kɩɩ kɛ n taa mu kesintin sa mʋ. Man gyɛ kanɩn mʋ kɩba mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ ba nfɩɩ falɛ, ii biti ɩ kan sa mɛ kʋlɔ.’ ”
Nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan nu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ asɩn ogyipu mʋ nɩɩ o mee gyii kesintin mʋ gbaa tɔwɛ?
Nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ kanɩn bɩrɛ mʋ, mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ mɛɛ yɛ o gyii kesintin sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ mʋ, nɩɩ bee su bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ kakyʋwapɛ yɛ kagyanbwɛ? Abɛɛ ee biti ɔ kyaga sʋ ee kina?

N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ kɩɩ sʋ bilen‐bilen fɛɛ ɔ taa bamʋ kesintin sa bamʋ. Amaa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa n kan ba mʋ, n biti n nyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii kasɛ sʋ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla bɔ kɩŋasan nɩmʋ sa asa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi, yɛgɛ bɛɛ kɩɩ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kɩyan. Ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ,
“Asa anyɔ akʋ ba kpee kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ ba naa kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ. Bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋ gyɛ Kafarasii nɩn, nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɔɔ gyɛ lenpoo ɔkɔɔlɛpʋ.

Nɩɩ Kafarasii‐nyɩn mʋ yɩlɛ mʋ kʋkwɩɩ kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɛɛ yɩn mʋ n‐yɩɩ yɛ, ‘Ɩbwaarɛ, n fwaala fʋ gaa fɛɛ maa n man du fɛɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba san mʋ, n mee yuuri, abɛɛ n mee puni asa abɛɛ n man gyɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ n nyita kekili abɛɛ n man du fɛɛ lenpoo ɔkɔɔlɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ yɩlɛ nfɩɩ falɛ.
N ŋmina kɔnɔ nkɛ nnyɔ, nkɛ nsunɔ kʋmaa tɔ, nɩɩ n barɩgɛ mɛ atɔ tɔ ntun kudu, nɩɩ n taa ketun kʋlʋn n sa fʋ.’
“Amaa lenpoo ɔkɔɔlɛpʋ mʋ bɩrɛ yɩlɛ kata yɛ mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ man diyaa mu ansi kɩɩ sʋsʋ, amaa ɔ taa mʋ kɩbaa gyaga mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɩbwaarɛ, alibi ɔwaapʋ ɩ gyɛ mɛ, wu mɛ kʋwɛɛ.’

Ba bwii kpewu. Amaa n tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ, lenpoo ɔkɔɔlɛpʋ mʋ i gyii asʋ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ, man gyɛ Kafarasii‐nyɩn mʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ fanɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kʋsaa mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋsʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ bɩya mʋ kasɛ, nɩɩ fanɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɩya mʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ kʋsaa mʋ sʋsʋ.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ asa akʋ gbaa ba sʋ bamʋ nbii wuribi bɛɛ ba Yesu asɛ, kɛ ɔ taa mʋ abaa gyaga bamʋ sʋ. Mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba maa wu kanɩn mʋ, ba gya bamʋ.
Amaa Yesu tɩɩ nbii mʋ ba mʋ asɛ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ nbii mʋ ba ba mɛ asɛ, kɛ fan man tii bamʋ ɔkpa. Lɩɩ fɛɛ banɩmʋ falɛ daa kudubi nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ gyɛ bamʋ lɛɛ.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ kɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii fɛɛ kebii mʋ, ɔ mɛɛ yɛ o loo kɩmʋ tɔ.”
Nɩɩ Gyiwu abi ɔgyankpaapʋ kʋ taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ danbɩrasa, mɩnɛ nɩɩ n biti n waa kɛ n nyɛ nkpa kakpaa?”
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ tɩɩ mɛ yɛ ɔdanbɩrasa? Ɔkʋ man gyɛ ɔdanbɩrasa, amɔɔ Ɩbwaarɛ nkʋn.
Fu nyi Ɩbwaarɛ nbara asɩn mʋ nɩɩ kaapʋ yɛ, ‘Man nyita kekili, man mɔɔ nyɩmɩsa, man kan yuuri, man waa nyama yɩlɛpʋ antɩŋɛsa wuya, kɛ fʋ taa bɛɛrɛɛ sa fʋ‐sɛ yɛ fu‐nyi?’ ”
Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N buu nbara ɩnɩmʋ kpini lɩɩ mi kibii tɔ.”
Yesu maa nu kanɩn mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɩ san fʋ kʋtɔ kʋlʋn. Naa fɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sʋ kɛ fʋ taa afulee mʋ sa atiripu, ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ fu biliŋi atɔ wuya sʋsʋ. Kɛ fʋ ba buu mɛ.”
Amaa maa nu falɛ mʋ, ɩ kɔ mʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ gyɛ atɔ wuya gaa.
Nɩɩ Yesu kɩɩ mʋ kyiim, tɔwɛ yɛ, “I biti ɩ baa ɩ bʋlʋn sa atɔ wuya ana fɛɛ ba yɛgɛ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ kɛ ba buu Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ kɩkaapʋ.
Kesintin ii biti ɩ baa ɩ bʋpɔɔ sa nyɔɔma fɛɛ ɔ taalɛ loo baasa ɔbɔ tɔ bʋlɛ, ɩ kyɔ fɛɛ atɔ wuya maa yɛgɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kɛ o buu Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ kɩkaapʋ.”
Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba nu mʋ ba taasɛ yɛ, “Kanɩn bɩrɛ anɩmʋ ɩɩ taalɛ nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa mɛɛ taalɛ waa mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ bɩrɛ ɛɛ taalɛ waa.”
Nɩɩ Pita tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Kɩɩ! An yɛgɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩɩ an baa an buu fʋ falɛ!”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kʋsʋ yɛgɛ kewu abɛɛ mʋ‐ka abɛɛ mʋ‐daa ana yɛ asupu abɛɛ akʋʋgɛpʋ abɛɛ mu‐bii ana lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii kɩkaapʋ mʋ sʋ mʋ,
ee biti ɔ nyɛ falɛ atɔ gaa, nbɩɩnbɩɩ kakyɩna nɩmʋ tɔ yɛ nkpa kakpaa mʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ ba kamaa tɔ mʋ?”
Saŋa kʋ Yesu taa abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ lɩɩ ɩkaa sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “An kpee Gyerusalem kɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ ba kyʋrɔɔ yɩla lɩɩ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa sʋ mʋ ɩ ba tɔ.
Bee biti ba lɛɛ mɛ sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ kɛ ba waa mɛ yɛrɛyɛrɛ, kɛ ba saalɛ mɛ, kɛ ba tʋʋ nkyɔlɛ wʋrɩgɛ mɛ sʋ, kɛ ba taa awulibi tɩŋɛ mɛ kɛ ba mɔɔ mɛ.
Kɛ ɩmʋ kakɛ sasapʋ mʋ kɛ n bwii kyiŋi ba nkpa tɔ.”
Amaa abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba man nu ɩnɩmʋ kasɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ asɩn mʋ kasɛ baala bamʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ba man nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ.
Yesu maa tiri Gyeriko tɔ mʋ, yɛgɛ gyaatanapʋ kʋ tɛ ɔkpa asɛ ɛɛ kʋlɛ atɔ.
Maa nu asa damantɛ ba maa kyʋn mʋ, ɔ taasɛ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩɩ waa?”
Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Yesu Kanasareti‐nyɩn mʋ ɩ kyʋn kanɩn maŋa.”
Nɩɩ o kuusi tɩɩ yɛ, “Yesu, Owura Dawidi kanaana‐bii, wu mɛ kʋwɛɛ!”
Nɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Yesu ansi tɔ mʋ, ba gya mʋ yɛ o bun mʋ kɔnɔ sʋ, amaa ɔ dan san ɔ maa sʋ ee kuusi kenken yɛ, “Owura Dawidi kanaana‐bii, wu mɛ kʋwɛɛ!”
Nɩɩ Yesu yɩlɛ nɩɩ ɔ sa kɔnɔ yɛ ba taa mʋ bɩya mʋ. Maa tiri mʋ tɔ mʋ, Yesu taasɛ mʋ yɛ,
“Mɩnɛ nɩɩ fii biti fɛɛ n waa sa fʋ?”
Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, n biti fɛɛ mi ansi ɩ bɩla bugi.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fu ansi i bugi! Fʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fʋ nyɛ alanfɩya.”
Opula maŋa tɔ mu ansi ɩ bɩla bugi nɩɩ o buu Yesu, yɛgɛ ɛɛ yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ. Nɩɩ asa mʋ kpini ba maa wu kanɩn mʋ, ngbaa bamʋ ba yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ.
Yesu loo Gyeriko kadɛ tɔ bɔla ɛɛ kyʋn.
Ɔnyɩn kʋ kyɩna ɔ bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ kɩtɩɩ ɩ gyɛ Sakiyosi. Ɔ kyɩna ɔ gyɛ lenpoo akɔɔlɛpʋ ɔbɩlɩsa nɩn, nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ atɔ wuya.
Ɔ kyɩna ee biti o wu Yesu yɛ mu ansi, amaa maa gyɛ nyɩmɩsa dɛɛ sʋ mʋ, ɔ man taalɛ, lɩɩ sakyɔ mʋ sʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ sɩlɛ kpee ansi tɔ naa dii oyu kʋ kɛ ɔ nyɛ wu Yesu, lɩɩ fɛɛ tʋtɔ sʋ nɩɩ Yesu ii biti ɔ bɔla.
Yesu maa fʋʋ opula maŋa mʋ ɔ kɩɩ sʋsʋ wu mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Sakiyosi, kpɩlɩgɛ ba bilen. N biti n sʋgɛ fʋ ayɛ ndaga.”
Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ kpɩlɩgɛ bilen taa kinsi gyii waa mʋ nsa‐nsa.
Asa ba wu ɩnɩmʋ nɩɩ ba piili bɛɛ kɔlɩtɛ yɛ, “O kpee naa sʋgɛ alibi ɔwaapʋ sʋ.”

Amaa Sakiyosi kʋsʋ yɩlɛ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu yɛ, “Kɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, n biti n barɩgɛ mɛ kapatɩyɛ tɔ kɩnyɔ, kɛ n taa kɩbaafʋn sa atiripu. Nɩɩ n kan kɔɔlɛ afulee lɩɩ ɔkʋ asɛ ɩ kyɔ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ n kɔɔlɛ mʋ, n biti n ka mʋ kanɩn kʋkɔ maŋa kɩlɩɩ kɩnaa.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Kamɔlɩgɛ kɩ ba fʋ ayɛ ndaga, lɩɩ fɛɛ ngbaa fʋ, fʋ gyɛ Abraham kanaana‐bii nɩn.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ n ba nɩn yɛ n ba biti kɛ n mɔlɩgɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba fɔyɩ.”
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ san bee nu falɛ asɩn mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ maa tiri Gyerusalem tɔ mʋ, asa mʋ ba fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ kii biti ki piili opula tɔ, ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ bɔ bamʋ kɩŋasan
yɛ, “Ɔsa kparɛ kʋ i kpee kata‐kata kadɛ kʋ, ɔ naa gyii kuwura kɛ o bwii ba.
Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ tɩɩ mʋ ayaafɔlɛ kudu nɩɩ ɔ sa bamʋ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ afulee mʋ nɩɩ i budu, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, ‘Fan taa kanɩn afulee maŋa sun kusun naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n biti n bwii ba.’
“Amaa ɔsʋwʋlɛ mʋ sʋ asa ba kisi mʋ, nɩɩ ba sun gya mʋ sʋ naa tɔwɛ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ee kpee mʋ owura lala mʋ yɛ, ‘A mɛɛ biti ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ o be gyii anɛ sʋ kuwura.’
“Tʋtɔ abɩlɩsa mʋ ba bun mʋ kuwura bɩrɛ, nɩɩ o bwii ba kewu. Nɩɩ o sun tɩɩ mʋ ayaafɔlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa afulee mʋ sa bamʋ mʋ, kɛ o wu tɔnɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba nyɛ lɩɩ kanɩn afulee maŋa sʋ.
“Ɔgyankpaasa mʋ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, fu afulee mʋ, ɩ kʋʋgɛ kanɩn ɩlɩɩ kudu tii sʋ’.
“Nɩɩ mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ mʋ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Nsa yɛ kusun, mɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ danbɩrasa. Lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fʋ taalɛ gyii atɔ pii nɩmʋ sʋ yɛ kesintin mʋ, n taa ndɛ kudu waa fʋ kɩbaa tɔ yɛ fʋ kɩɩ sʋ.’
“Ɔnyɔsapʋ mʋ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ fu afulee mʋ i bwii kʋʋgɛ ɩlɩɩ kunuu tii sʋ.’
“Nɩɩ mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘N taa ndɛ nnuu waa fʋ kɩbaa tɔ yɛ fʋ kɩɩ sʋ.’
“Nɩɩ mʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ kʋ gbaa ba tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, fu afulee ndee. N taa kɩmʋ ŋmina kikyibi tɔ taa yɩla katɩnkʋ.
N sɩlɛ fʋ nɩn, lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ asɩn ɩ bʋlʋn gaa. Nɩɩ fɩɩ taa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man gyɛ fʋ lɛɛ, nɩɩ fɩɩ kpa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ man gyɛ fu i duu.’

“Mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Fʋ gyɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ kumu tɔ ɔlʋn wuya. Fʋ gbaa‐gbaa fʋ kɔnɔ tɔ asɩn nɩɩ n biti n taa talɛ fʋ. Fu nyi fɛɛ mɛ asɩn ɩ bʋlʋn, nɩɩ n taa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ mɛ lɛɛ, nɩɩ n kpa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ man gyɛ mɛ i duu.
Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fʋ man taa mɛ afulee maŋa naa yɩla afulee ɔyɩlɛkpa kɛ ɩ kʋʋgɛ agyaga sa mɛ? Naafɔɔ n maa ba falɛ kɛ n ba kɔɔlɛ ɩmaa ɩmʋ agyaga.’
“Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ tʋtɔ mʋ yɛ, ‘Fan kɔɔlɛ afulee mʋ lɩɩ mʋ asɛ, kɛ fan taa sa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ ɩlɩɩ kudu tii sʋ mʋ.’
“Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, ɔ wʋla nyɛ afulee mʋ nɩɩ i budu.’

“Nɩɩ ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘N tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩɩ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ba taa waa mʋ abaa tɔ sʋ danbɩrasa mʋ, bee biti ba taa gaa tii mʋ sʋ. Amaa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ba man taa ɩkʋ waa mʋ abaa tɔ kpini‐kpini mʋ, gbɛrɛɛ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ mʋ bee biti ba kɔɔlɛ lɩɩ mʋ asɛ.’
Amaa ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ taa agbʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Bamʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ mɛ dʋn ana, nɩɩ be mee biti n maa gyii bamʋ sʋ kuwura mʋ, fan taa bamʋ ba mɔɔ mi ansi tɔ nfɩɩ.’ ”
Nɩɩ Yesu maa tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, ɔ gyankpaa kʋbʋ mʋ ee kpee Gyerusalem.
Maa tiri Betifage maa Betani ndɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ Olifu kɩbɩɩ ɔbʋlɛ tɔ mʋ, o sun mʋ abɩɩlapʋ anyɔ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ,
“Fan kpee kadɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ fanɛ ansi tɔ mʋ. Nɩɩ fan maa dan fen loo kɩmʋ tɔ mʋ, fen biti fan wu kekuruma‐bon kʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ man pɩɩta dii mʋ maa kyaa oyu. Fan Saaŋɛ mʋ bɩya mɛ nfɩɩ.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan taasɛ fanɛ yɛ, ‘Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fen saaŋɛ mʋ mʋ?’ fan tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ ii biti mʋ.’ ”
Bamʋ nɩɩ Yesu sun mʋ, ba naa wu mʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ mʋ.
Ba maa saaŋɛ kuruma mʋ, mʋ wuya ana ba taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fen saaŋɛ kuruma mʋ?”
Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ ii biti mʋ.”
Ba taa mʋ ba sa Yesu, nɩɩ ba taa bamʋ ataa gyaga mʋ sʋ. Nɩɩ ba kyɛ Yesu tɔ nɩɩ o dii kyɩna mʋ sʋ.
Maa kpee mʋ, asa ba taa bamʋ ataa tʋʋ ɔkpa tɔ.

Yesu maa tiri Gyerusalem opula mʋ nɩɩ ɔkpa ɩɩ kpɩlɩgɛ tɔ ii kpee Olifu kɩbɩɩ mʋ sʋ mʋ, abɩɩlapʋ yɛ kʋbʋ damantɛ ba piili bee kuusi bɛɛ yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ kinsigyi tɔ lɩɩ adangana mʋ nɩɩ ba wu Yesu maa wʋla waa mʋ sʋ.
Bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ waa Owura mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ ba mʋ kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ mʋ kusee.
Keyuula kɩ bʋ sʋsʋ. Nɩɩ bʋnyaa ɩ dagaa Ɩbwaarɛ.”
Farasii abi akʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ sakyɔ mʋ tɔ mʋ ba tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, tɔwɛ fu abuupu yɛ ba bun bamʋ nnɔ sʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kɛ fan nu fɛɛ, nɩɩ ba kan bun bamʋ nnɔ sʋ gbaa, halɩɩ abuu gbaa ii biti i kuusi.”
Ba maa tiri Gyerusalem tɔ nɩɩ o wu kadɛ mʋ, o su sa kɩmʋ asa.
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fan daa fan nyi ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ kii biti kɩ bɩya fanɛ keyuula ndaga kakɛ nɩmʋ mʋ, naafɔɔ ɩ bʋrɔn. Amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ fen mee yɛ fen wu ɔkpa mʋ.
Kakaakʋ ii biti ɩ ba, kɛ fanɛ akisipu ba kʋsʋ yɩlɛ fanɛ sʋ, kyaabɔɔ fanɛ kɛ ba nyan fanɛ lɩɩ fanɛ abaafʋn kpini.

Bee biti ba da fanɛ kasɛ, fanɛ yɛ nbii mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ fanɛ asɛ kpini. Bɛ mɛɛ yɛ ba yɛgɛ fanɛ ɔpɔrɛ kubuu kʋlʋn kɩ gyaga kɩmʋ bɩrɩsa sʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ba fanɛ asɛ mʋ, fan man taalɛ pɛɛsɛ bɩɩ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu loo kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ opula tɔ, nɩɩ o piili ɛɛ gya bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ fɛ atɔ mʋ.
Ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ba tɔwɛ yɩla Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, ‘Mɛ kɩkpaara kii biti kɩ baa kɩ gyɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ kɩkpaara nɩn, amaa fan taa kɩmʋ biliŋi bamʋ nɩɩ bee yuuri ɔlʋn sʋ mʋ ɔbaalakpa.’ ”
Kakɛ kʋmaa nɩmʋ ɛɛ kaapʋ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ, amaa Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ yɛ asa mʋ tɔ agyankpaapʋ bee biti fɛɛ ba mɔɔ mʋ.
Amaa ba man taalɛ nyɛ ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ba bɔla sʋ kɛ ba waa kanɩn, lɩɩ fɛɛ asa mʋ kpini ba taa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ mata mʋ bee nu mʋ asɛ.
Nɩɩ ɩ ba fɛɛ kakaakʋ Yesu bʋ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa kasɔrɔga tɔ ɛɛ kaapʋ asa yɛgɛ ɛɛ tɔwɛ bamʋ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ. Nɩɩ Aseepu abɩlɩsa yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ yɛ kadɛ tɔ abɩlɩsa gbaa ba tii sʋ, nɩɩ ba ba mʋ asɛ.
Nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Tɔwɛ anɛ, anɩmʋ ɔlʋn sʋ nɩɩ fʋ sʋ fɩɩ waa atɔ nɩmʋ? Anɩmʋ ɩ sa fʋ ɔlʋn maŋa?”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ngbaa mɛ n biti n taasɛ fanɛ asɩn kʋ kɛ fan lɛɛ mɛ kɔnɔ.
Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee mʋ nɩɩ Gyɔn gyee asa mʋ, kɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ nɩn abɛɛ kɩ lɩɩ asa asɛ?”
Nɩɩ bamʋ gbaa‐gbaa bamʋ ba taa kɩmʋ sʋ nfɛɛrɛ nɩɩ ba yɛ, “Nɩɩ an kan tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Kɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ mʋ’, ee biti ɔ taasɛ yɛ, ‘Mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ fan man kɔɔlɛ gyii?’
Amaa nɩɩ an kan tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɩ lɩɩ asa asɛ mʋ’, asa mʋ kpini bee biti ba twɩɩ anɛ abuu, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ Gyɔn gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ nɩn.”
Ɩmʋ sʋ, ba lɛɛ Yesu kɔnɔ yɛ, “An man nyi ntɩn mʋ nɩɩ Gyɔn kekyugyee mʋ lɩɩ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Kanɩn bɩrɛ, ngbaa mɛ n mɛɛ yɛ n tɔwɛ fanɛ ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ n waa ɩnɩmʋ kpini.”
Nɩɩ Yesu bɔ bamʋ kɩŋasan nɩmʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn kʋ dɔɔ wayɩn kʋdɔɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ taa hayɩɩ sa adɔɔpʋ kʋ, nɩɩ o kpee ɔkpa naa kyɛɛrɛɛ.

Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ oyu mʋ abi kɩtɩyɛ fʋʋ mʋ, nɩɩ kʋdɔɔ wuya mʋ sun mʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ, kpee ahayɩɩpʋ mʋ asɛ yɛ ba sa mʋ wayɩn oyu abi mʋ ɩkʋ lɩɩ mʋ kʋdɔɔ mʋ tɔ. Amaa ahayɩɩpʋ mʋ ba dayɩ kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ bwiiyaa mʋ abaa kpan.
Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla bwii sun kɩyaafɔlɛ pʋpwɛ, nɩɩ ba bɩla bwii dayɩ mʋ, waa mʋ ipeeli tɔ, bwiiyaa mʋ abaa kpan.
Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla bwii sun ɔsasapʋ, nɩɩ ba bɩla dayɩ larɩgɛ mʋ, lɛɛ mʋ lɩɩ kʋdɔɔ mʋ tɔ.
“Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ, kʋdɔɔ wuya mʋ yɛ, ‘Nɛnɛ nɩɩ n biti n waa? N biti n sun mɛ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ obii, akʋtɔ bee biti ba taa bɛɛrɛɛ sa mʋ.’
“Amaa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ kʋdɔɔ mʋ ahayɩɩpʋ ba wu obii mʋ, ba taa nfɛɛrɛ mʋ sʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ kapatɩyɛ ogyipu mʋ, fan yɛgɛ a mɔɔ mʋ, kɛ atɔ mʋ a biliŋi anɛ lɛɛ.’
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba lɛɛ mʋ lɩɩ wayɩn kʋdɔɔ mʋ tɔ nɩɩ ba mɔɔ mʋ.
“Nbɩɩnbɩɩ, mɩnɛ gbaa nɩɩ oyu kʋdɔɔ wuya mʋ ii biti ɔ waa ahayɩɩpʋ mʋ?
Kʋdɔɔ wuya mʋ ii biti ɔ ba mɔɔ ahayɩɩpʋ mʋ, kɛ ɔ taa oyu kʋdɔɔ mʋ sa akʋ.”
Nɩɩ asa mʋ ba maa nu falɛ mʋ ba tɔwɛ yɛ “Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ taa kanɩn kpee kata.”
Nɩɩ Yesu kɩɩ bamʋ ansi tɔ, taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Asɩnkyan yɩlasa maa tɔwɛ yɛ,
‘Kubuu mʋ nɩɩ apɔyɩpʋ ba kina mʋ,
kɩmʋ ɩ ba biliŋi kɩbɔntɔnbʋlɔntɔ kubuu kparɛ mʋ’ mʋ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ ɩɩ kaapʋ?
Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩyɛ kubuu maŋa sʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ gyayɩ tɔ buriburi. Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kubuu mʋ kɩ tɩyɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ patɩyɛ tɔ.”
Nɩɩ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ yɛ aseepu abɩlɩsa mʋ ba bɩɩ fɛɛ kɩŋasan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɔɔ mʋ i yii bamʋ nɩn. Nɩɩ bee biti ɔkpa ba kɩtaa mʋ opula maŋa tɔ. Amaa ba sɩlɛ asa mʋ.

Yɛgɛ abɩlɩsa mʋ ba taa bamʋ ansi yii Yesu sʋ, nɩɩ ba lɛɛ apɛɛtɩpʋ akʋ yɛ ba waa mu ansi sʋ kɩdanbɩrasa. Bɛɛ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ bee biti ba nyɛ Yesu kɩtaa lɩɩ mʋ asɩn tɔwɛsa sʋ, kɛ ba taa mʋ sa ɔsʋwʋlɛ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ alʋlʋnpʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ apɛɛtɩpʋ mʋ ba tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, an nyi fɛɛ fʋ ɩ tɔwɛ nɩɩ fɩɩ kaapʋ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋrɔn, nɩɩ fʋ mɛɛ mɛɛgɛ tɔ, amaa nɩɩ fɩɩ kaapʋ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔkpa mʋ kyɛɛkyɛɛ sʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ ɩ daaga fɛɛ a ka tʋʋtʋʋ sa Roma Ɩsʋwʋlɛ Owura lala Kayisa, abɛɛ a man ka?”
Nɩɩ Yesu bɩɩ fɛɛ apɛɛtɩpʋ mʋ bɛɛ da mʋ ɔtɔ tɔ nɩn, kɛ ba nyɛ nu mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ asɩn. Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ,
“Fan taa nderebi mʋ ba kɛ n kɩɩ.” Maa wu kɩmʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ foto yɛ kɩtɩɩ ɩ gyan kɩmʋ sʋ?”

Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Owura lala Kayisa lɛɛ nɩn.” Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Kanɩn bɩrɛ fan taa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ Owura lala Kayisa lɛɛ mʋ sa mʋ, kɛ fan taa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mʋ sa Ɩbwaarɛ.”
Lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ sʋ mʋ, i kyinkyin apɛɛtɩpʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ba laatɔ. Ɩmʋ sʋ ba man taalɛ ba nyɛ mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ asɩn kʋ ba taa kɩtaa mʋ sakyɔ mʋ tɔ.
Gyiwu abi kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Sadusi mʋ nɩɩ ba yɛ kelewu kyiŋi man bʋ tɔ mʋ, akʋ ba ba Yesu asɛ yɛ asɩn taasɛsa. Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ,
“Ɔkaapʋpʋ, anɛ naana Mosesi kyʋrɔɔ sa anɛ yɛ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan wu san okulapu‐kyɩɩ, nɩɩ ba man kʋʋgɛ mʋ, i tiri fɛɛ mu‐supu ɔ taa mʋ kili, kʋʋgɛ nbii sa mʋ‐daa mʋ.
To! Anyibii asunɔ akʋ ba kyɩna ba bʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔgyankpaapʋ mʋ kili ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man kʋʋgɛ nɩɩ o wu.
Nɩɩ ɔnyɔsapʋ mʋ kili okulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ gbaa mʋ wu.
Nɩɩ ɔsasapʋ mʋ gbaa kili mʋ, nɩɩ o wu. Nɩɩ ɩ waa kanan halɩɩ asa asunɔ mʋ kpini ba kili mʋ, yɛgɛ bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋ maa ɔkyɩɩ mʋ ba man kʋʋgɛ.
Ɩmʋ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ okulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ gbaa ba wu.
Ɩmʋ sʋ an biti a taasɛ yɛ fɛɛ nɩɩ kakɛ lala mʋ nɩɩ asa kpini ba kan kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ, bamʋ tɔ ɔmɔɔ ii biti ɔ baa ɔ gyɛ mu‐kuli? Lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ asunɔ maŋa kpini ba wʋla kyɩna kili mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Dulinya nɩmʋ tɔ bɩrɛ asa bee kili.
Amaa bamʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wu yɛ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ ba nyɛ kelewu kyiŋi, kɛ ba kyɩna dulinyaa pʋpwɛ tɔ mʋ, ba man bɩla yɛ ba kili.
Ba man bɩla yɛ ba wu kakaakʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ bee biti ba baa be du nɩn fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ. Ba gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbii lɩɩ fɛɛ ba maa kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ sʋ.
Nɩɩ lɩɩ kelewu kyiŋi asɩn bɩrɛ, Mosesi gbaa kɔɔlɛ gyii. Kanɩn sʋ, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ o wu kɩpʋnfa maa dɩyɛ mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ yɛ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ Abraham maa Isaki yɛ Gyekobu Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ.
Ɔ man gyɛ alewupu Ɩbwaarɛ nɩn, amaa ɔ gyɛ asa kɩɩsa lɛɛ nɩn. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ mʋ alewupu banɩmʋ ba san ba tɛ nkpa tɔ.”
Nɩɩ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ akʋ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, fʋ tɔwɛ kɩmʋ kyɛɛkyɛɛ.”
Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ ɔkʋ man bɩla taalɛ nyɛ kɔkɔlɔ ɔsɩɩ taasɛ mʋ sɛhn.
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ taalɛ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ gyɛ Owura Dawidi kanaana‐bii?
Lɩɩ fɛɛ Dawidi gbaa‐gbaa tɔwɛ mʋ Ɩlʋn ɔwʋlɛ mʋ tɔ yɛ,
‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ mɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ yɛ,
“Kyɩna mɛ gyisa sʋ nfɩɩ,
naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n biti n taa fʋ dʋn ana
ba waa fʋ ayaa ɔgyagakpa.” ’
Nɩɩ Dawidi gbaa‐gbaa ɩɩ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ’ bɩrɛ, nɛnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ mʋ kanaana‐bii?”
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ asa mʋ ba san bee nu mʋ, Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ,

“Fan kɩɩ fan n‐yɩɩ sʋ danbɩrasa lɩɩ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ sʋ. Ba gyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bee biti ɩkaalɛ lala kubun bɛɛ kyaabɔɔ tɔ, nɩɩ bee biti fɛɛ ba taa bɛɛrɛɛ fwaala bamʋ agya tɔ, bee biti ba kyɩna ngya kparɛ sʋ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa yɛ ɔgyaŋɛ gyiikpa.
Bee pɩna akulapu‐kyɩɩ bɛɛ kɔɔlɛ bamʋ akpaara, nɩɩ bɛɛ yɩlɛ ipula bɛɛ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ bʋnswɩɩsa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ nyɛ pɩna asa fɛɛ ba gyɛ asa danbɩrasa. Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ bɩɩtɛ kanɩn asa maŋa asʋ gaa.”
Yesu maa bʋ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ o diyaa mu ansi wu atɔ wuya ana ba maa sʋ afulee bɛɛ waa kakɛɛ kɩdakaa tɔ mʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla wu okulapu‐kyɩɩ otiripu kʋ gbaa maa taa nderebi anyɔ ba waa tɔ.
Nɩɩ Yesu yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ, okulapu‐kyɩɩ otiripu nɩmʋ waa tɔ afulee ɔ kyɔ bamʋ kpini.
Asa banɩmʋ kpini, ba lɛɛ lɩɩ bamʋ afulee gaa mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ mʋ tɔ nɩn. Amaa ɔkyɩɩ nɩmʋ bɩrɛ halɩɩ maa mʋ kitiri kɩnɩmʋ mʋ, ɔ taa mu afulee mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ mʋ kpini ba waa tɔ.”

Nɩɩ Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ akʋ bee biri kiligyima bɛɛ lɩɩ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ, kanan mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋrɔn, yɛ abuu danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ ba taa pɔyɩ, yɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ asa ba kɛɛ nɩɩ ba taa lɔŋɔ obu mʋ sa Ɩbwaarɛ. Amaa Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ,
“Ɩmʋ nɩɩ fan wu falɛ kpini, saŋa kʋ ii biti ɔ ba yɛgɛ fɛn mɛɛ bɩla yɛ fen wu kubuu kʋlʋn gbaa kɩ maa gyan kʋkʋ sʋ, bee biti ba nɩn kubuu kʋmaa nɩmʋ tʋʋ kasɛ.”
Nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, saŋa mɔmɔ nɩɩ falɛ atɔ nɩmʋ a biti a waa? Nɩɩ mɩnɛ sɩnkaala ii biti ɩ waa kaapʋ fɛɛ saŋa mʋ fʋʋ fɛɛ kanɩn atɔ nɩmʋ ii biti ɩ waa?”

Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fan baa fan da sʋ, kɛ ɔkʋ ɔ man pɩna fanɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ asa gaalaagaa bee biti ba ba mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Mɛ ɩ gyɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ’. Nɩɩ bee biti ba bɩla tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Laalaalʋwɛ saŋa mʋ tee tiri tɔ’. Amaa fan man buu bamʋ.
Fan kan nu kɩnaa yɛ ɩkɔ sʋ mʋ, fan man waa kufuu. Ɩ dagaa fɛɛ falɛ atɔ nɩmʋ ɩ maa gyankpaa ba kanɩn pɔyɩ. Amaa ɩ mɛɛ kaapʋ fɛɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ tee tiri tɔ nɩn.”
Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla kyaga sʋ yɛ, “Ɔsʋwʋlɛ ii biti ɔ kɔ yɛ ɔsʋwʋlɛ, kɛ awuragyi yɛ awuragyi ba kɔ yɛ abaa.
Kɛ kasɛ ki gyingyen ipula kʋkwɩɩ‐kʋkwɩɩ, kɛ akʋn yɛ alɔ kyaŋɛsa a tɩyɛ katɩn kʋmaa nɩmʋ, kɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ a sʋ kufuu yɛ ɩsɩnkaala lala‐lala a lɩɩ sʋsʋ.

“Amaa pɔyɩ kɛ ɩnɩmʋ kpini ɩ ba mʋ, bee biti ba kɩtaa fanɛ kɛ ba nyanla fanɛ. Bee biti ba taa fanɛ kpee kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɩgyaŋɛkpa naa gyii fanɛ asɩn, kɛ ba naa tii fanɛ ibu. Bee biti ba taa fanɛ kpee awura yɛ alʋnpʋ ansi tɔ, lɩɩ mɛ sʋ.
Ɩnɩmʋ ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ kɛ fan nyɛ ɔkpa tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sa bamʋ.
Amaa fan yɛgɛ ɩ baa ɩ bʋ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ fɛɛ, ɩ man dagaa fan yɩyɛɛ lɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan naa tɔwɛ kɔɔlɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ mʋ sʋ.
Kpalɩ fɛɛ n biti n sa fanɛ kanyaasɩn, kɛ n kaapʋ fanɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan naa tɔwɛ, yɛgɛ fanɛ akisipu ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ kina abɛɛ o gyii ɩmɔɔrɛ lɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fan tɔwɛ mʋ sʋ.
Fanɛ akʋʋgɛpʋ abɛɛ adaa yɛ asupu abɛɛ fanɛ kʋʋpʋ ana abɛɛ akyɛmɩnɛ bee biti ba lɛɛ fanɛ sa, kɛ ba mɔɔ fanɛ tɔ akʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ii biti o kisi fanɛ, lɩɩ mɛ sʋ.
Amaa halɩɩ fanɛ ɔkʋ kinyinibi kʋlʋn gbaa mɛɛ yɛ ɔ fɔyɩ.
Fan kan nyɛ nɩɩ fan yɩlɛ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ kenken mʋ, ii biti ɩ mɔlɩgɛ fanɛ.
“Nɩɩ fan kan wu fɛɛ anaakɔpʋ ba kyaabɔɔ Gyerusalem kadɛ mʋ, fen biti fan bɩɩ fɛɛ kɩmʋ kinyita ki tiri tɔ.
Kanɩn sʋ bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Gyudeya kasɛ sʋ mʋ, ba lɩɩ sɩlɛ kpee abɩɩ tɔ, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Gyerusalem kadɛ tɔ mɔɔ ba lɩɩ, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man bʋ kadɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, ba man loo Gyerusalem kadɛ mʋ tɔ.
Kpalɩ fɛɛ ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ nkɛ mʋ, ɩmʋ ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ kpini ɩ ba tɔ.
Nɩɩ akyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ ɩtɔ yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ nbii‐nyɛpʋsa mʋ laakʋ! Lɩɩ fɛɛ awʋrʋfɔ lala a biti a ba tɩyɛ kasɛ maŋa sʋ, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ agbʋ lala mʋ ɩ ba Gyiwu abi sʋ.

Isakunde nɩɩ bee biti ba taa mɔɔ Gyiwu abi mʋ akʋ, kɛ ba kɩtaa bamʋ akʋ naa biliŋi anyɛ ndɛndɛmandɛ ɩsʋwʋlɛ sʋ. Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ bee biti ba taa Gyerusalem waa bamʋ kebiti naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ŋmina sa bamʋ mʋ.
“Nɩɩ ɩsɩnkaala ii biti ɩ waa kyɔwɛ yɛ ɔbwaayɩ yɛ akyikpebi tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔpʋ ɩlawʋ yɛ apaa a maa da sʋ mʋ, ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ kasɛ sʋ kpini, kɛ ba waa yɛrɛyɛrɛ.
Nɩɩ ba maa kɩɩ ba gyoo kanɩn atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ waa falɛ mʋ, kufuu ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ asa ba kirin‐kirin, kpalɩ fɛɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ kpini ii biti i gyingyen lɩɩ ɩmʋ ipula.
Kanɩn saŋa maŋa mʋ bee biti ba wu mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa maa sʋ ɔlʋn yɛ bʋnyaa lala n lɩɩ abwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ tɔ n ba.
Nɩɩ fan kan wu saŋa mʋ nɩɩ falɛ atɔ nɩmʋ ii biti i piili mʋ, fan kʋsʋ yɩlɛ kɛ fan diyaa fanɛ ansi sʋsʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fanɛ kamɔlɩgɛ mʋ ki tiri tɔ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu bɔɔ bamʋ kɩŋasan nɩmʋ yɛ, “Fan kɩɩ kɩdɩnpɔ oyu yɛ iyu mʋ nɩɩ ɩ san mʋ kpini.
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fan wu ɩ maa pɔrɔgɛ mʋ, fen nyi fɛɛ kɩkyɛ ki tiri tɔ.
Kanɩn ɔkpa maŋa sʋ, nɩɩ fan kan wu atɔ nɩmʋ a maa waa mʋ, fan bɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ ki tiri tɔ.
“N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ, ndaga kakyɩna nɩmʋ tɔ asa ba mɛɛ yɛ ba wu lʋwɛ, pɔyɩ kɛ atɔ nɩmʋ kpini ɩ waa.
Sʋsʋ yɛ kasɛ kpini ii biti ɩ kyʋn, amaa mɛ kɔnɔ tɔ asɩn mʋ bɩrɛ, ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ kyʋn kpaa.
“Fan baa fan da fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ, kɛ fan man taa fan n‐yɩɩ sa kensi‐gyii gaa, yɛ kata‐bʋʋ yɛ kakyɩna tɔ atɔ bitisa kʋkyɔ, kɛ kanɩn kakɛ maŋa kɩ man ba purigi fanɛ fɛɛ ɔdʋʋ maa da kunun mʋ.
Kpalɩ fɛɛ ii biti i purigi asa mʋ nɩɩ ba tɛ kasɛ sʋ mʋ kpini.
Ɩmʋ sʋ saŋa kʋmaa fan baa fan da sʋ, kɛ fɛn kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ kɛ ɩ lɛɛ fanɛ lɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ ba falɛ, kɛ fan taalɛ yɩlɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mu ansi tɔ.”
Kakɛ kʋmaa nɩmʋ Yesu ɩɩ kaapʋ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ kalaatɩpwɛ kʋmaa nɩmʋ mɔɔ ee kpee ɛɛ dɛ Olifu kɩbɩɩ mʋ sʋ.
Nɩɩ nyenyenfuu kʋmaa nɩmʋ mɔɔ asa mʋ bee kpee kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ bee nu mʋ asɛ.
Nkɛ mʋ nɩɩ Gyiwu abi bee gyii Kesu kɔnɔ kɔlɔŋɔ bodobodo mʋ nɩɩ ba man taa kɩfɛ tinsa waa tɔ mʋ tiri tɔ. Kanɩn saŋa maŋa nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ mʋ.
Nɩɩ aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ bee biti ɩkpa mʋ nɩɩ ba taa kɩtaa Yesu mɔɔ kɛ ɔkʋ ɔ man wu, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba sɩlɛ sakyɔ mʋ.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ taa nfɛɛrɛ libi waa Gyudasi mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ Isikariyoti mʋ tɔ. Ɔ gyɛ asunpu kudu anyɔ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ.
Nɩɩ Gyudasi kpee aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa kɩkpaara akunpu bɩlɩsa mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ maa bamʋ ba naa taa nfɛɛrɛ ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ lɛɛ Yesu sa.
Nɩɩ ɩ waa bamʋ ɔkɔn, nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ kyula yɛ bee biti ba sa mu afulee.
Nɩɩ o kyula nɩɩ ee biti ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa lɛɛ Yesu sa bamʋ, kanan mʋ nɩɩ sakyɔ mʋ ba man nyɛ wu.
Kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ Gyiwu abi bee gyii bamʋ Bodobodo mʋ nɩɩ ba man taa kɩfɛ tinsa waa tɔ, yɛ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ kabʋlʋpʋ mʋ kɩmɔɔ fʋʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu sun Pita maa Gyɔn nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan naa lɔŋɔ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ an biti a taa gyii Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ agyitɔ mʋ.”
Nɩɩ ba taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Fɩnɛ nɩɩ fii biti fɛɛ a naa lɔŋɔ ɩmʋ yɩla?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fan maa dan fen loo kadɛ lala mʋ tɔ mʋ, fen biti fan gyaŋa ɔnyɩn kʋ maa sʋ kolobi yɛ nkyu. Fan buu mʋ loo kɩkpaara mʋ nɩɩ ee loo mʋ sʋ.
Kɛ fan tɔwɛ kɩkpaara wuya mʋ yɛ, ɔkaapʋpʋ mʋ yɛ, ‘Nkɩɩ afɔ obu mʋ nɩɩ maa mɛ abɩɩlapʋ an biti a kyɩna tɔ gyii Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ mʋ?’
Ee biti ɔ kaapʋ fanɛ obu lala kʋ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ abansʋrʋ mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ lɔŋɔ kɩmʋ tɔ waa kɩmʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa. Fan lɔŋɔ agyitɔ mʋ yɩla tʋtɔ.”
Ba lɩɩ naa wu atɔ mʋ kpini fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ mʋ. Nɩɩ ba kʋʋla Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ mʋ.
Saŋa mʋ maa fʋʋ mʋ, Yesu maa mu asunpu ba naa kyɩna tʋtɔ bee gyii.
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, naafɔɔ n biti gaa fɛɛ maa fanɛ an gyii Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ agyitɔ anɩmʋ pɔyɩ kɛ n gyii mɛ awʋrʋfɔ mʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, n man bɩla yɛ n gyii falɛ agyitɔ anɩmʋ, naa fʋʋ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ agyitɔ nɩmʋ kigyii kasɛ ɩɩ kaapʋ ɩ waa Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu taa kɔɔpʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan kɔɔlɛ kɩnɩmʋ barɩgɛ tɔ sa abaa.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ n wʋla tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, n man bɩla yɛ n nuu falɛ nta nɩmʋ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ kɩ ba mʋ tɔ.”
Nɩɩ ɔ taa bodobodo, nɩɩ ɔ fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ ɔ kpɛɛ kɩmʋ tɔ sa bamʋ, tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Kɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ mɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ sʋ, n taa lɛɛ saraga. Fan gyii kɩmʋ taa nyiŋi mɛ.”
Ɔkpa kʋlʋn maŋa sʋ ba maa gyii kalaatɩpwɛ agyitɔ lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa kɔɔpʋ sa bamʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nta nɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ katɔwɛ kyula pʋpwɛ mʋ nɩɩ n taa mɛ nkalan tii ɩmʋ kɔnɔ, nɩɩ n kyɛɛgɛ wʋrɩgɛ sa fanɛ.
Amaa n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ lɛɛ mɛ sa mʋ, maa mʋ abaa ɩ bʋ agyitɔ nɩmʋ tɔ.
Mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ n biti n kpee Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla tɔwɛ yɩla mʋ. Amaa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ lɛɛ mɛ sa mʋ, mʋ laakʋ.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba piili bɛɛ taasɛ abaa bamʋ tɔ ɔmɔɔ ii biti ɔ waa kanɩn asɩn nɩmʋ?
Nɩɩ kamɔɔrɛ‐gyii kɩ tɩyɛ Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ sʋ lɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ bamʋ tɔ ɔbɩlɩsa.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Dulinya nɩmʋ tɔ awura bɛɛ nyan bamʋ asa nɩn, amaa bamʋ asa mʋ bɛɛ tɩɩ bamʋ yɛ, ‘Anɛ akyɛtɔpʋ.’
Amaa fan man yɛgɛ fanɛ lɛɛ ɔ baa o du kanɩn. Fanɛ tɔ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ ɔbɩlɩsa mʋ, o biliŋi fɛɛ kebii, kɛ fanɛ ɔgyankpaapʋ mɔɔ o biliŋi fɛɛ fanɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ.
Ɔmɔmɔ ɩ gyɛ ɔbɩlɩsa? Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ ba kyɩna nɩɩ ee gyii mʋ, abɛɛ ɔmɔɔ nɩɩ ɛɛ bɩya agyitɔ mʋ? Man gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ ba kyɩna ee gyii mʋ? Amaa mɛɛ mɛ n bʋ fanɛ asɛ n sun fɛɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ.
Mɛ awʋrʋfɔ tɔ mʋ fan yɩlɛ mɛ kamaa.
Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ mɛ‐Sɛ sa mɛ ɔkpa fɛɛ n gyii kuwura mʋ, kanɩn ɔkpa maŋa sʋ nɩɩ ngbaa mɛ n sa fanɛ yɛ fan gyii kuwura.
Nɩɩ n kan be gyii kuwura mʋ, n biti n yɛgɛ maa fanɛ an gyii, kɛ a nuu teeburi kʋlʋn sʋ, kɛ fan kyɩna nwuragya sʋ kɛ fan talɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi nbunɔ kudu anyɔ mʋ.”
Yesu tɔwɛ Pita yɛ, “Simon, Simon! Nu nfɩɩ! Sɩtaanɛ kʋlɛ ɔkpa Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ, kɛ ɔ bɔla kʋtʋʋ tɔ kɩɩ sʋ kyaalɛ fanɛ fɔyɩ fɛɛ ayu waatɛ mʋ.
Amaa Simon, n kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ sa fʋ kɛ fʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩ man tɩyɛ. Nɩɩ fʋ kan kyɛɛgɛ fʋ nfɛɛrɛ ba mɛ asɛ mʋ, waa fʋ tɔɔmaa ana abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ɔlʋn tɔ.”
Amaa Pita lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, n kʋʋla mɛ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ obu kitii tɔ gbaa n biti n buu fʋ kpee, nɩɩ halɩɩ lewu gbaa maa fʋ an biti a wu.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Pita! Pɔyɩ kɛ kyaasɛ ɔ bʋn kagyanbwɛ nɩmʋ mʋ, fii biti fu kina ɩlɩɩ ɩsa yɛ fʋ man nyi mɛ.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n kyɩna sun fanɛ yɛgɛ fan man sʋ afulee ɔwaakpa yɛ itaakpe yɛ asɩbɩta mʋ, fan pan kʋtɔ kʋ?”
Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “A man pan sɛhn.”
Nɩɩ Yesu yɛ, “Amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ afulee ɔwaakpa yɛ taakpe mʋ ɔ taa. Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man sʋ sakunde mʋ, ɔ fɛ mʋ balɩmaasʋ kɛ ɔ taa sɔɔ kʋkʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ ba kyʋrɔɔ mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn yɩla yɛ, ‘Ba taa mʋ bʋga alibi awaapʋ tɔ.’ Ɩmʋ sʋ n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ kanɩn Asɩnkyan yɩlasa nɩmʋ ɩ ba tɔ kesintin nbɩɩnbɩɩ lɩɩ mɛ sʋ.”
Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, kɩɩ isakunde anyɔ ndee.” Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɩ kʋkwɛ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɩɩ tʋtɔ, nɩɩ maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba kpee olifu kɩbɩɩ mʋ sʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba wʋla bɛɛ waa mʋ.
Ba maa fʋʋ opula maŋa mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ kɛ fan man lɩɩ tɩyɛ kʋtʋʋ tɔ kɩɩ tɔ.”
Maa tɔwɛ kanɩn mʋ, nɩɩ o nin lɩɩ bamʋ asɛ gbɛrɛɛ naa yɔɔ muŋa mu amulii sʋ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ yɛ,
“Nsɛ, nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ fu kebiti mʋ, yɛgɛ awʋrʋfɔ anɩmʋ ɩ kɩlɩgɛ mɛ. Amaa man gyɛ mi kebiti, waa ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ fu kebiti.”
Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba mʋ asɛ, ba waa mʋ ɔlʋn tɔ.
Lɩɩ kayɩyɛɛ yɛ kensi payɩ sʋ mʋ, ɔ taa ɔlʋn kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ, nɩɩ kududuu mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ lɩɩ mʋ sʋ ɩɩ kyɔlɛ ɩ tɩyɛ kasɛ mʋ i du nɩn fɛɛ nkalan.
Maa kʋsʋ mʋ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ tɔ mʋ, o bwii naa tu mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba maa dɛ nsɩɩrɛ lɩɩ bamʋ kɩkpɩnɛ yɛ kɔkɔlɔ nyita sʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fan dɛ nsɩɩrɛ? Fan kʋsʋ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ kɛ fan man lɩɩ tɩyɛ kʋtʋʋ tɔ kɩɩ tɔ.”
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu san ɛɛ maa sʋ ɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ sakyɔ kʋ ba ba lɩɩ tʋtɔ. Nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Gyudasi mʋ, gyankpaa sakyɔ mʋ. Nɩɩ o nin tiri Yesu, nɩɩ ɔ baari mʋ tɔ.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ Gyudasi yɛ, “Kibiri tɔ nɩɩ fʋ sʋ fɩɩ lɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa fɩɩ sa?”
Tʋtɔ mʋ, Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ mʋ asɛ mʋ, ba maa wu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kii biti kɩ waa mʋ, nɩɩ ba taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ a lɛɛ anɛ isakunde mʋ kɔ?”
Opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ ŋɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ gyisa kʋsʋ tɩn.
Amaa nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ kanɩn kɩwaa.” Nɩɩ Yesu taa mʋ kɩbaa mata ɔnyɩn mʋ kʋsʋ nɩɩ kɩ kyaga sʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ yɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa akunpu abɩlɩsa yɛ kadɛ tɔ abɩlɩsa mʋ nɩɩ ba ba kɩtaa mʋ mʋ yɛ, “N gyɛ kumu tɔ ɔlʋn oyu nɩn nɩɩ fan sʋ isakunde yɛ agulungu kɛ fɛn ba kɔ yɛ mɛ?
Kakɛ kʋmaa nɩmʋ maa fanɛ nɩn kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ tɔ, nɩɩ fan man kɩtaa mɛ. Amaa ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ fanɛ saŋa fɛɛ Sɩtaanɛ kitentenbiri tɔ owura maa sun kusun.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba kɩtaa Yesu, nɩɩ ba taa mʋ kpee Ɩbwaarɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ. Nɩɩ Pita sii kamaa tɔ o buu bamʋ kɩyaa‐kɩyaa.
Ba maa naa fʋʋ mʋ, ba dɛɛla fʋlɔn kɩkpaara mʋ nsana bɛɛ wʋlɛ, nɩɩ Pita naa sii kyɩna bamʋ asɛ.
Nɩɩ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ kibite wu Pita maa tɛ fʋlɔn mʋ asɛ. Ɔ kɩɩ mʋ diin nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ gbaa tii Yesu sʋ.”
Nɩɩ Pita kyɛɛ yɛ, “Ɔkyɩɩ, n man nyi mʋ kpini‐kpini.”
Ɩ maa waa kesin mʋ, ɔkʋ mɔɔ bɩla wu Pita nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, “Ngbaa fʋ, fʋ gyɛ bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋ.” Nɩɩ Pita lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn n man tii su.”
Saŋa gbɛrɛɛ kamaa mʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ kyaga sʋ ɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Kesintin, ɩ man sʋ ɩmɔɔrɛ yɛ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ man tii Yesu sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ gyɛ Galile obii nɩn.”
Nɩɩ Pita tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn, n man nyi asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ tɔwɛ falɛ sʋ.” Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ kanɩn mʋ, nɩɩ kyaasɛ bʋn.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu biliŋi kɩɩ Pita surum. Nɩɩ Pita nyiŋi asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ wʋla tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Pɔyɩ kɛ kyaasɛ ɔ bʋn kɩbwayɩkɛ kɩnɩmʋ mʋ, fii biti fʋ kyɛɛ ɩlɩɩ ɩsa yɛ fʋ man nyi mɛ.”
Nɩɩ Pita lɩɩ naa su gaa.
Asa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu bʋ bamʋ abaa tɔ mʋ, bee yooli mʋ yɛgɛ bɛɛ dayɩ mʋ.
Ba waa Yesu kebunbun ansi, nɩɩ ba da‐da mʋ ɩtan nɩɩ ba yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ, kaapʋ anɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ da fʋ.”
Nɩɩ ba saalɛ mʋ asebi gaalaagaa.
Kayɩ maa kɛ mʋ, ɔsʋwʋlɛ abɩlɩsa yɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ ba ba gyaŋɛ nɩɩ ba taa Yesu ba bamʋ asɩn ogyikpa mʋ.
Nɩɩ ba yɛ, “Tɔwɛ anɛ, fʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N kan tɔwɛ fanɛ gbaa fan mɛɛ yɛ fan kɔɔlɛ gyii.
Nɩɩ n kan taasɛ fanɛ asɩn gbaa, fan mɛɛ yɛ fan lɛɛ mɛ asɩn maŋa kɔnɔ.
Amaa lɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ ɩɩ sʋ ii kpee mʋ, mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa n biti n baa n tɛ Owura lala Ɔlʋnpʋ Ɩbwaarɛ gyisa sʋ.”
Nɩɩ bamʋ kpini ba taasɛ yɛ, “Kanɩn sʋ fʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɩmʋ nɩɩ fan tɔwɛ maŋa.”
Nɩɩ ba yɛ, “Mɩnɛ asɩn nɩɩ an bɩla an biti a nu tii sʋ? Lɩɩ fɛɛ an nu asɩn mʋ lɩɩ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ.”
Nɩɩ kʋbʋ mʋ kpini ba kʋsʋ taa Yesu naa sa ɔsʋwʋlɛ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ Paleti.
Nɩɩ ba piili bɛɛ pwɩɩ mʋ asɩn nɩmʋ sʋ yɛ, “An wu kanyɩn nɩmʋ maa nyita anɛ asa yɛ ba man ka tʋʋtʋʋ sa Owura lala Kayisa. Nɩɩ ɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ n‐yɩɩ yɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ Owura yɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Paleti taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ Gyiwu abi owura mʋ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɛɛhn, ɩmʋ nɩɩ fʋ tɔwɛ maŋa.”
Nɩɩ Paleti tɔwɛ Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa mʋ yɛ kʋbʋ damantɛ mʋ yɛ, “N man wu ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn pwɩɩsa akʋ.”
Amaa ba mata sʋ yɛ, “Ɔ taa mʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ tɔwɛ kʋsaa Gyiwu abi kpini nkɔlɔ. O piili lɩɩ Galile nɩn halɩɩ ba lɩɩ nfɩɩ.”
Paleti maa nu Galile kɩtɩɩ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ yɛ, “Kanyɩn maa gyɛ Kagalile‐nyɩn nɩn?”
Maa bɩɩ fɛɛ Yesu lɩɩ owura Herodi ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ, ɔ taa mʋ kpiya Herodi. Saŋa maa tɔ yɛgɛ ngbaa mʋ ɔ bʋ Gyerusalem.
Owura Herodi maa wu Yesu mʋ, mu ansi i gyii gaa, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ wʋla ee biti mʋ kyɛɛrɛɛ yɛ o wu mʋ lɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ o nu lɩɩ mʋ sʋ mʋ. Ɔ sʋ tamaa fɛɛ o wu mʋ kɛ ɔ waa adangana kɛ o wu.
Owura mʋ taasɛ mʋ asɩn taasɛsa kɩkyɔ amaa Yesu man lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ.
Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ ba maa sʋ ba yɩlɛ bɛɛ pwɩɩ mʋ.
Nɩɩ Herodi maa mʋ anaakɔpʋ bee yooli mʋ, nɩɩ ba ŋmasɛ mʋ. Nɩɩ ba taa kaalɛ bʋnswɩɩsa danbɩrasa kʋ bun mʋ, nɩɩ ba bwiiyaa mʋ kpee Paleti asɛ,
Kanɩn kakɛ maŋa nɩɩ ɔsʋwʋlɛ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ Paleti maa owura Herodi ba biliŋi akyɛmɩnɛpʋ. Naafɔɔ ba kyɩna ba gyɛ adʋn nɩn.
Nɩɩ ɔsʋwʋlɛ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ Paleti tɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa mʋ yɛ kadɛ abɩlɩsa yɛ asa mʋ kpini ba gyaŋɛ.
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ ɩ bɩya ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ yɛ, mʋ ɩ bɩya kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn ɔsʋwʋlɛ nɩmʋ sʋ. Amaa n maa mɛɛgɛ mʋ asɩn mʋ tɔ fanɛ ansi tɔ nfɩɩ mʋ, n man wu fanɛ asɩn pwɩɩsa mʋ akʋ mʋ sʋ.
Owura Herodi gbaa ɔ man wu alibi akʋ lɩɩ mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ o bwiiyaa mʋ bɩya anɛ. Kesintin tɔ mʋ, ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ man waa alibi mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa lewu.
Kanɩn sʋ n biti n yɛgɛ ba tɩŋɛ mʋ awʋlɛ‐bi kɛ n yɛgɛ mʋ ɔ natɛ.
(Lɩɩ fɛɛ Kesu kɔnɔ kɔlɔŋɔ ngyaŋɛ kʋmaa mʋ, ɩ gyɛ dankaarɩ nɩn fɛɛ Paleti ɔ lɛɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ nɩɩ ba tii obu mʋ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ sa bamʋ.)”
Nɩɩ kʋbʋ damantɛ mʋ ba kuusi kɔnɔ kʋlʋn sʋ yɛ, “Fan taa ɔnyɩn maŋa naa mɔɔ, kɛ fan lɛɛ Barabasi sa anɛ.”
Barabasi nɩmʋ tɔwɛ kʋsaa asa nkɔlɔ nɩɩ ba kɔ yɛ Roma kɩbanɛ, nɩɩ ɔ bɩla mɔɔ ɔsa kʋ ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ba tii mʋ obu.
Paleti maa biti yɛ ɔ lɛɛ Yesu sʋ mʋ, o bwii tɔwɛ sa bamʋ.
Amaa ba maa sʋ bee kuusi yɛ, “Fan da mʋ oyu laasa sʋ, fan da mʋ oyu laasa sʋ!”
Paleti bwii tɔwɛ bamʋ asɛ kɩsasapʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nɩn? Mɩnɛ alibi nɩɩ ɔnyɩn maŋa waa? N man wu alibi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa nɩɩ ɔ dagaa lewu. Kanɩn sʋ n biti n yɛgɛ ba tɩŋɛ mʋ awʋlɛ‐bi kɛ n yɛgɛ mʋ ɔ natɛ.”
Amaa ba lɔŋɔ kuusi tɔ kenken fɛɛ ɔkpa kʋmaa sʋ mʋ ba da mʋ oyu laasa sʋ. Nɩɩ bamʋ kekuusi mʋ i gyii sʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ Paleti waa mʋ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ ɔ waa bamʋ kebiti.

Kanɩn sʋ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ yɛ ɔ lɛɛ sa bamʋ mʋ, ɔ lɛɛ mʋ sa bamʋ. Mʋ ɩ gyɛ Barabasi mʋ nɩɩ ba tii mʋ obu lɩɩ mʋ kɩtɔwɛ kʋsaa asa nkɔlɔ nɩɩ ba kɔ yɛ kɩbanɛ, yɛ mʋ ɔsa kɩmɔɔ sʋ mʋ. Amaa nɩɩ ɔ taa Yesu sa bamʋ ba naa waa bamʋ kɔkɔlɔ biti.
Ba maa sʋ bee kpee mʋ, ba gyaŋa Simon Kakereni‐nyɩn mʋ ɔ lɩɩ kukura ee loo Gyerusalem. Nɩɩ ba nyan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋla oyu laasa mʋ o buu Yesu.
Nɩɩ asa damantɛ kʋ ba buu mʋ, akyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ bee su bɛɛ yɩyɛɛ bɛɛ sa mʋ mʋ gbaa ba tii sʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu biliŋi tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Gyerusalem akyɩɩsa, fan man sʋ sa mɛ, fan su sa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ yɛ fanɛ‐bii ana.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa kʋ ii biti ɔ ba, kɛ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa agbentipu yɛ ɩtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man kʋʋgɛ kɩɩ abɛɛ anyɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ nbii ba man nyɛpʋ.’
Nɩɩ saŋa maŋa tɔ mʋ,
‘bee biti ba tɔwɛ abɩɩ yɛ, “Fan tɩyɛ anɛ sʋ!”
Kɛ ba tɔwɛ adenbi mɔɔ yɛ, “Fan bun anɛ sʋ!” ’
Nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ kanɩn nɩɩ ba sʋ bɛɛ waa oyu bunboli
mʋ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ bee biti ba waa iyu wʋlɛsa mʋ?”
Nɩɩ ba taa asun libi wuya ana anyɔ tii Yesu sʋ ba naa mɔɔ.
Ba maa naa fʋʋ opula mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ “Kumu Kɩwɛɛ mʋ”, nɩɩ ba da Yesu maa asun libi wuya ana mata iyu laasa sʋ. Ɔkʋ bʋ mʋ gyisa sʋ yɛgɛ ɔbanban mʋ mɔɔ bʋ mʋ bɩna sʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nsɛ, taa bamʋ alibi kɛɛ bamʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba man nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa.” Nɩɩ ba tʋʋ nbii barɩgɛ Yesu atɔ bunsa tɔ.
Asa mʋ ba yɩlɛ tʋtɔ ba kɩɩ mʋ halɩɩ Gyiwu abi abɩlɩsa mʋ bɛɛ waa mʋ yɛrɛyɛrɛ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔ mɔlɩgɛ akʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kan ɔ gyɛ Krisito, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ, ɔ mɔlɩgɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ.”
Nɩɩ anaakɔpʋ mʋ gbaa ba ba ŋmasɛ mʋ. Nɩɩ ba sa mʋ nta nyaŋɛsa.
Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fʋ gyɛ Gyiwu abi owura kesintin mʋ, mɔlɩgɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ.”
Nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ asɩn kʋ mu amu sʋ yɛ, ƆNƖMƲ Ɩ GYƐ GYUDA ABI OWURA.
Asun libi wuya ana mʋ nɩɩ ba saa iyu laasa mʋ sʋ mʋ ɔkʋ piili ɛɛ saalɛ Yesu yɛ, “Man gyɛ fʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ? Mɔlɩgɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ kɛ fʋ mɔlɩgɛ anɛ?”
Amaa ɔbanban mʋ pʋntɛ mʋ sʋ yɛ, “Fʋ man sɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ anɛ kpini an bʋ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ kʋlʋn tɔ falɛ?
Anɛ bɩrɛ ba bɩɩtɛ anɛ kʋsʋ kɩmʋ ɔkpa sʋ, fɛɛ asun libi mʋ nɩɩ an waa mʋ sʋ. Amaa ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ bɩrɛ ɔ man waa alibi akʋ.”
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Yesu, fʋ kan ba gyii fu kuwura mʋ, fu nyiŋi mɛ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fʋ kesintin tɔ yɛ, ndaga kakɛ nɩmʋ fu biti fʋ kyɩna maa mɛ‐Sɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ Paradise tɔ.”
Ɩ kyɩna ɩ gyɛ kyɔwɛ amu nsana tɔ nɩn, nɩɩ kitentenbiri kɩ tɩyɛ ɔsʋwʋlɛ mʋ kpini sʋ naa fʋʋ kakyʋwapɛ kerefi asá saŋa,
lɩɩ fɛɛ kyɔwɛ yɛgɛ kɩda. Nɩɩ kɩtaa kunsa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ barɩgɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa opula kyɩrɛkyɩrɛkpa Kɩkyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, kɩ kyatɛ tɔ kɩnyɔ.
Nɩɩ Yesu taa ɔbʋlɛ lala kuusi yɛ, “Nsɛ, n taa mɛ kala waa fʋ abaa tɔ.” Maa tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ ɔfʋʋtɛ tɩn.
Anaakɔpʋ kɩlɩfa ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ maa wu atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa mʋ, ɔ yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Kesintin, ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi.”
Asa mʋ nɩɩ ba ba gyaŋɛ tʋtɔ bɛɛ kɩɩ mʋ, ba maa wu atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa mʋ, bamʋ kpini ba taa nkɔlɔ nyita sawʋ kpewu.
Amaa bamʋ nɩɩ be nyi Yesu mʋ, yɛ akyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ba buu mʋ lɩɩ Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ ba mʋ, ba yɩlɛ kata gbɛrɛɛ bɛɛ kɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa maŋa kpini.

Ɔnyɩn kʋ ɩ kyɩna ɔ bʋ tɔ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Gyosefu. Nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Gyuda kadɛ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Arimatiya mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ nyɩmɩsa mʋ nɩɩ mʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi nɩɩ ɔ sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ. Nɩɩ o tii Gyiwu abi kpini abɩlɩsa kʋbʋ mʋ sʋ.
Amaa o man kyula bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ yɛ awaasa mʋ. Ɔ kyɩna ee gyoo Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ nɩn.
Nɩɩ o kpee Paleti asɛ naa kʋlɛ Yesu kibuni mʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔ saatɛ Yesu kibuni mʋ lɩɩ oyu laasa mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa kɩtaa fufuli maalɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ naa pula kakyan mʋ nɩɩ ba baaŋɛ kɩfʋlɛ tɔ nɩɩ ba man pɩɩta pula ɔkʋ kɩmʋ tɔ mʋ.
Ɩ kyɩna ɩ gyɛ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kʋʋla bamʋ n‐yɩɩ ba gyoo kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ mʋ.
Akyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ba buu Yesu lɩɩ Galile mʋ, ba buu Gyosefu nɩɩ ba naa wu kakyan mʋ, yɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa Yesu kibuni mʋ pula mʋ.
Nɩɩ ba kpewu naa kʋʋla atɔ liifensa yɛ ituulale mʋ nɩɩ ba taa ba sʋswa Yesu kibuni mʋ. Amaa ba taa bɛɛrɛɛ sa Mosesi nbara mʋ, nɩɩ ba fʋʋtɛ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa kakɛ maŋa.
Gyiwu abi kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ lɩɩkaakɛ kɩbwayɩkɛ mʋ, nɩɩ akyɩɩ mʋ ba taa atɔ liifensa mʋ nɩɩ ba kʋʋla yɩla mʋ kpee Yesu kakyan asɛ.
Ba naa wu fɛɛ kubuu mʋ nɩɩ ba taa tii kakyan mʋ, kɩ maa gbiliti lɩɩ kɩmʋ kɔnɔ sʋ.
Amaa ba maa loo kakyan mʋ tɔ mʋ, ba man wu Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu kubuni mʋ.
Ɩ maa waa bamʋ kanankʋ nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ bɛɛ fɛ ɩmʋ nfɛɛrɛ mʋ, opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ anyɩn anyɔ akʋ ba ba yɩlɛ bamʋ asɛ. Ba bun kɩkalala mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ ŋalɩgɛ sʋ fɛɛ bʋlayɩ maa wɛɛ ɩsɛɛ mʋ.
Nɩɩ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa akyɩɩ mʋ gaa, nɩɩ ba nyɔn bamʋ amu yii tɔ. Nɩɩ anyɩn anyɔ mʋ ba taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fan baa fen biti nyɩmɩsa kɩɩsa lɩɩ alewupu tɔ.”
Ɔ man bʋ nfɩɩ, o kyiŋi lɩɩ alewupu tɔ. Fan nyiŋi asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ fanɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ fanɛ asɛ Galile mʋ yɛ,
“Ɩ dagaa fɛɛ ba lɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ waa asa libi abaa tɔ, kɛ ba da mɛ oyu laasa sʋ mɔɔ, kɛ nkɛ nsa kamaa mʋ, n kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ akyɩɩ mʋ ba nyiŋi mʋ asɩn mʋ.
Ba maa lɩɩ kakyan mʋ asɛ ba mʋ, ba tɔwɛ asɩn nɩmʋ kpini sa Yesu abɩɩlapʋ kudu akʋ mʋ yɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba san mʋ kpini.
Akyɩɩ maŋa ɩ gyɛ Mɛɛrɩ Magidalen, Gyowana, Gyemisi mu‐nyi Mɛɛrɩ yɛ akyɩɩ akʋ, ɩ tɔwɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ sa abɩɩlapʋ mʋ.
Amaa abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba man kɔɔlɛ akyɩɩ mʋ asɩn mʋ gyii, lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ asɩn mʋ a du nɩn fɛɛ amelensi‐sɩn mʋ.
Amaa Pita kʋsʋ sɩlɛ kpee kakyan mʋ asɛ. Maa suŋa kɩɩ kakyan mʋ tɔ mʋ, o wu kɩtaa fufuli mʋ nɩɩ ba taa maalɛ mʋ mʋ nkʋn. Nɩɩ ɔ fɛ ɩmʋ nfɛɛrɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ waa nɩɩ o bwii kpewu.
Kanɩn kakɛ maŋa mʋ, mʋ abɩɩlapʋ anyɔ ba kyɩna bee kpee Emawusi kadɛ tɔ. Lɩɩ Gyerusalem kpee tʋtɔ gyɛ ɩmaalɩ asunɔ.
Ba maa kyɩna ba naa bee kpee mʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ abaa asɛ lɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa mʋ kpini sʋ.
Ba maa tɔwɛ abaa asɛ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa kiligyima lɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa mʋ sʋ mʋ, Yesu gbaa‐gbaa ba bamʋ asɛ yɛgɛ maa bamʋ ba naa.
Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ man yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba bɩɩ mʋ.
Ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ kiligyima nɩɩ fan naa fen biri kanɩn?”
Nɩɩ ba sii yɩlɛ nyaŋɛ bamʋ ansi tɔ.
Bamʋ tɔ ɔmʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Kelopasi mʋ taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ nkʋn ɩ gyɛ ɔfɔ mʋ nɩɩ fʋ bʋ Gyerusalem nfɩɩ nɩɩ fʋ man nyi asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa tʋtɔ nkɛ nnyɔ nɩmʋ tɔ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ asɩn?”
Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Lɩɩ Yesu Kanasareti‐nyɩn mʋ sʋ. Ɔ kyɩna ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ nɩn, nɩɩ ɔlʋn bʋ mʋ atɔwɛsa yɛ mʋ awaasa kpini tɔ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ asa kpini ansi tɔ.
Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ ɔsʋwʋlɛ akɩɩsʋpʋ ba taa mʋ sa yɛ ba mɔɔ nɩɩ ba da mʋ mata oyu laasa sʋ mɔɔ.
Amaa naafɔɔ an kyɩna an sʋ tamaa fɛɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ ba ɔ ba kɔɔlɛ anɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi yɛgɛ. Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bɩlaa ki tii sʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, ndaga ɩ gyɛ kakɛ sasapʋ nɩɩ asɩn nɩmʋ a maa waa.
Ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ bɩla i tii sʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, anɛ akyɩɩ mʋ akʋ ba yɛgɛ nɩɩ i kyinkyin anɛ. Ba kpee kakyan mʋ asɛ naa loo to nyenyenfuu nɩmʋ,
amaa ba man wu mu kibuni mʋ. Ba ba tɔwɛ anɛ yɛ ba nyɛ ansi sʋ kɩlɛɛkaapʋ nɩɩ ba wu Ɩbwaarɛ n bɔɔ ba maa tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ Yesu bʋ nkpa tɔ.
Nɩɩ anɛ tɔ akʋ ba kpee kakyan mʋ tɔ nɩɩ ba naa wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ akyɩɩ mʋ ba ba tɔwɛ mʋ, amaa ba man wu mʋ.”
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ kimelensi ndee? Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ i du swɩɩ‐swɩɩ kanɩn, nɩɩ fan mɛɛ kɔɔlɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ ba wʋla tɔwɛ yɩla mʋ gyii bilen?
Yɛ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ o gyii falɛ awʋrʋfɔ pɔyɩ kɛ o loo mʋ bʋnyaa tɔ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu maa piili lɩɩ Mosesi nbara yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ sʋ mʋ, ɔ lɛɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ kpini ɩ tɔwɛ lɩɩ mʋ sʋ mʋ kaapʋ bamʋ.
Ba maa tiri kadɛ‐bi mʋ nɩɩ bee kpee mʋ tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu waa fɛɛ maa biti ɔ kyʋn kadɛ mʋ sʋ.
Amaa ba kʋlɛ mʋ gaa tɔwɛ yɛ, “Dɛ anɛ asɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa kyʋn, kyɔwɛ lʋwɛ.” Ɩmʋ sʋ o loo naa kyɩna bamʋ asɛ.
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ maa bamʋ ba kyɩna kɛ ba gyii mʋ, ɔ taa bodobodo nɩɩ ɔ fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ ɔ kpɛɛ kɩmʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɔ taa sa bamʋ.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ bamʋ ansi i bugi nɩɩ ba bɩɩ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ nyaa bamʋ ansi sʋ.
Nɩɩ ba taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ anaa mʋ an naa ɔkpa tɔ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ ɛɛ sa anɛ nɩɩ ɛɛ lɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɛɛ kaapʋ anɛ mʋ, anɛ n‐yɩɩ ɩ man dii anɛ?”
Nɩɩ ba kʋsʋ bwii kpee Gyerusalem bilen. Tʋtɔ maŋa nɩɩ ba naa wu kudu ɔkʋ mʋ yɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ bamʋ asɛ mʋ ba maa gyaŋɛ,
nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɩ gyɛ kesintin nɩn yɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ kyiŋi nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ Simon.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ asa anyɔ mʋ gbaa ba tɔwɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ waa ɔkpa tɔ yɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba bɩɩ Yesu saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kpɛɛ bodobodo mʋ tɔ mʋ.
Ba maa san ba yɩlɛ bɛɛ tɔwɛ falɛ asɩn mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu gbaa‐gbaa ba yɩlɛ bamʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Keyuula kɩ ba fanɛ sʋ.”
Bamʋ nkɔlɔ n ŋmaa bamʋ nɩɩ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa bamʋ, nɩɩ ba fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ ba wu obuni nɩn.
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ ɩ tɔɔrɔɔ fanɛ, nɩɩ mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fan san fen gyii ɩmɔɔrɛ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ?
Fan kɩɩ mɛ abaa yɛ mɛ ayaa. Man gyɛ mɛ nɩn abɛɛ? Fan mata mɛ kɛ fan kɩɩ, obuni man sʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ yɛ awuya, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ falɛ?”
Maa tɔwɛ falɛ lʋwɛ mʋ, ɔ taa mʋ abaa yɛ mʋ ayaa kaapʋ bamʋ.
Ba maa man pɩɩta kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii lɩɩ kensi‐gyii yɛ adangana nɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ “Fan sʋ agyitɔ kʋ nfɩɩ fan gyii?”
Nɩɩ ba taa ɔkɩn ŋasɩsa kɩdɩyɛ sa mʋ,
nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ kɩmʋ wɛ bamʋ ansi tɔ tʋtɔ.

Ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n kyɩna n bʋ fanɛ asɛ mʋ, n tɔwɛ fanɛ asɩn nɩmʋ yɛ, asɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ yɩla lɩɩ mɛ sʋ, Mosesi nbara tɔ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ kɩkaapʋ yɛ Ɩlʋn mʋ tɔ mʋ, ɩ dagaa fɛɛ ɩ maa ba tɔ.”
Nɩɩ o bugi bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ kɛ ba nyɛ nu Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ kasɛ.
Ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Asɩn mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ ii biti o gyii awʋrʋfɔ kɛ o wu, kɛ o kyiŋi lɩɩ alewupu tɔ kakɛ sasapʋ.

Nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ ba tɔwɛ Asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sa asa kpini mʋ kɩtɩɩ tɔ, kɛ asa ba kyɛɛgɛ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ lɩɩ alibi tɔ ba Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ kɛ ɔ taa bamʋ alibi kɛɛ bamʋ. Nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ ba piili asɩn nɩmʋ kɩtɔwɛ lɩɩ Gyerusalem kadɛ tɔ.
Fanɛ ɩ gyɛ kesintin agyipu lɩɩ atɔ nɩmʋ kpini sʋ.

N biti n bɩya fanɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ nɩɩ mɛ‐Sɛ kyɩna da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɛ ee biti ɔ sa fanɛ mʋ. Amaa fan kyɩna kadɛ lala nɩmʋ tɔ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Kayaayu mʋ ɔlʋn mʋ ii biti ɔ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba fanɛ sʋ.”
Yesu maa taa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ lɩɩ Gyerusalem kadɛ tɔ bee kpee naa tiri Betani kadɛ tɔ. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔ kʋsaa mʋ abaa sʋsʋ nɩɩ, ɔ waa bamʋ kusee.
Maa dan san ɛɛ waa bamʋ kusee maŋa nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa mʋ lɩɩ bamʋ asɛ kpee sʋsʋ.
Nɩɩ ba muŋa sun mʋ nɩɩ ba taa kensi‐gyii lala bwii kpee Gyerusalem kadɛ tɔ.
Nɩɩ ba kyaga sʋ kyɩna kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ bɛɛ yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ.
John: Lɩɩ npiili asɛ, pɔyɩ kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ tʋʋ dulinyaa mʋ, ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɔnɔ tɔ Asɩn mʋ bʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Kɔnɔ tɔ Asɩn mʋ maa Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ bʋ tɔ, nɩɩ Kɔnɔ tɔ Asɩn maŋa ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ.
Lɩɩ koo npiili asɛ mʋ, Kɔnɔ tɔ Asɩn mʋ maa Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ bʋ tɔ.
Kɔnɔ tɔ Asɩn mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɔla tʋʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa. Sɛhn man bʋ tɔ nɩɩ man gyɛ mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ Asɩn mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɔla sʋ tʋʋ kɩmʋ.
Ɩbwaarɛ Kɔnɔ tɔ Asɩn mʋ tɔ nɩɩ nkpa ɩ bʋ, nɩɩ nkpa maŋa ɩɩ ŋmaŋɛ tɔ ɩɩ sa asa kpini.
Kaŋmaŋɛ mʋ ɩɩ ŋmaŋɛ kitentenbiri tɔ, nɩɩ kitentenbiri mʋ man taalɛ dunla kaŋmaŋɛ mʋ kakaakʋ.
Ɔnyɩn kʋ kyɩna ɔ bʋ tɔ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sun mʋ, bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Gyɔn.
Gyɔn ba nɩn ɔ ba tɔwɛ kesintin asɩn lɩɩ kaŋmaŋɛ mʋ sʋ sa asa, kɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɔ nyɛ nu kɛ ɔ kɔɔlɛ gyii.
Man gyɛ Gyɔn gbaa‐gbaa ɩ gyɛ kaŋmaŋɛ mʋ, mɛɛ mʋ ba nɩn kɛ ɔ ba tɔwɛ asɩn lɩɩ kaŋmaŋɛ mʋ sʋ.
Kesintin kaŋmaŋɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ ŋmaŋɛ sa asa kpini mʋ, kɩɩ ba dulinyaa tɔ.
Dulinya nɩmʋ tɔ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kɔnɔ tɔ Asɩn mʋ wʋla ɔ bʋ. Nɩɩ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla tʋʋ dulinyaa mʋ, nkɛɛ dulinyaa asa ba man bɩɩ mʋ.
Ɔ ba mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, amaa mʋ gbaa‐gbaa asa ba man kɔɔlɛ mʋ.
Amaa asa mʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii mʋ kpini mʋ, ɔ sa bamʋ ɔkpa yɛ ba be biliŋi Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii ana.
Ba man biliŋi mu‐bii ana bɔla nyɩmɩsa kakʋʋgɛ sʋ, abɛɛ nyɩmɩsa kɔkɔlɔ biti sʋ, abɛɛ ɔnyɩn kebiti sʋ. Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa‐gbaa ɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba be biliŋi mu‐bii ana.

Nɩɩ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Kɔnɔ tɔ Asɩn mʋ ba biliŋi nyɩmɩsa, nɩɩ ɔ ba kyɩna anɛ asɛ kasɛ sʋ. An wu mʋ bʋnyaa kparɛ, mʋ nɩɩ ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii kʋlʋn kpen mʋ. Nɩɩ kabwaala yɛ kesintin kɩ bɔla mʋ.

Mʋ asɩn nɩɩ Gyɔn daa ɛɛ tɔwɛ ɛɛ kaapʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ kenken yɛ, “Ɔnɩmʋ asɩn nɩɩ n wʋla tɔwɛ fanɛ, nɩɩ n tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ mɛ kamaa tɔ ɛɛ ba mʋ kyɔ mɛ, nɩɩ ɔ wʋla ɔ bʋ tɔ pɔyɩ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ mɛ mʋ.’ ”
Lɩɩ mʋ kabwaala mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bɔla mʋ tɔ gaa sʋ mʋ, anɛ kpini an nyɛ kusee kʋkyɔ‐kʋkyɔ.
Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla Mosesi sʋ taa nbara mʋ sa. Amaa kabwaala yɛ kesintin bɩrɛ bɔla Yesu Krisito sʋ nɩn ba.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋ man pɩɩta wu Ɩbwaarɛ kakaakʋ, amɔɔ mu‐bii kʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ ngbaa mʋ ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ ɔ bʋ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ mʋ, ɩ lɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kedubi kaapʋ.
Nɩɩ Gyiwu abi alʋnpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Gyerusalem mʋ ba sun Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu yɛ Lewi abi
Gyɔn asɛ ba naa taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ anɩmʋ?”
Nɩɩ Gyɔn man kina kɩtɔwɛ, amaa ɔ tɔwɛ bugi tɔ yɛ, “Man gyɛ mɛ ɩ gyɛ Krisito, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ.”
Nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Kanɩn bɩrɛ, anɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ fʋ? Fʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Eligya mʋ?”
Nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, “Ayee! Man gyɛ mɛ ɩ gyɛ Eligya.”
Nɩɩ ba bɩla taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ an kɩɩ mʋ ɔkpa mʋ?”
Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ayee.”
Ɩmʋ kamaa mʋ ba bɩla taasɛ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ bɩrɛ ɩ gyɛ fʋ? Lɛɛ kɔnɔ sa anɛ, kɛ a nyɛ asɩn kʋ naa tɔwɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba sun anɛ mʋ. Ɔsa mɔɔ bɩrɛ gbaa ɩ gyɛ fʋ?”
Nɩɩ Gyɔn lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mɛ ɩ gyɛ ɔbʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ kii kuusi ofuli sʋ yɛ, ‘Fan kyiigi ɔkpa mʋ sa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ.’ Falɛ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Isaya kyʋrɔɔ yɩla Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ tɔ mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Farasii abi akʋ ba sun nbɔɔ Gyɔn asɛ,
ba naa taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ maa man gyɛ Krisito mʋ, abɛɛ Eligya, abɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ mʋ, mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ fii gyee asa Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee?”
Gyɔn lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N sʋ nkyu nɩn n gyee asa Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee. Amaa ɔkʋ yɩlɛ fanɛ tɔ nɩɩ fan man nyi mʋ.
Mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ mɛ kamaa tɔ ɛɛ ba mʋ. Amaa n man dagaa gbaa n saŋɛ mʋ asɩbɩta ɩfɛ.”
Asɩn nɩmʋ kpini ɩ waa Betani kadɛ tɔ nɩn. Betani bʋ Gyɔdan ɔbʋn benbe kyɔwɛ ɔlɩɩkpa, katɩn mʋ nɩɩ Gyɔn ii gyee asa Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee mʋ.
Ɩmʋ lɩɩkaakɛ Gyɔn maa wu Yesu maa naa ɛɛ ba mʋ asɛ mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan kɩɩ, ɔnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabʋlʋpʋ, mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ lɛɛ saraga kɛ asa kpini ba nyɛ alibi kɩtaakɛɛ mʋ.
Ɔnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ n wʋla n tɔwɛ mʋ asɩn yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩn kʋ bʋ mɛ kamaa ɛɛ ba, nɩɩ ɔ kyɔ mɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ wʋla ɔ bʋ tɔ pɔyɩ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ mɛ.’
Mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ bɩrɛ n man n daa n nyi mʋ, amaa kʋtɔ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sun mɛ yɛ n ba gyee asa Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee mʋ, kɛ n ba nyɛ lɛɛ mʋ ifuli kaapʋ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Gyɔn gyii ɩmʋ kesintin tɔwɛ yɛ, “N wu Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ kɩ maa kpɩlɩgɛ lɩɩ sʋsʋ fɛɛ kuwura‐lɔpɔ nɩɩ kɩ ba kyɩna sii mʋ sʋ.

Naafɔɔ ngbaa mɛ n man n wʋla n nyi mʋ, amaa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ yɛ n ba gyee asa Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee mʋ, ɩ tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔmʋ nɩɩ fʋ kan wu mɛ Kayaayu kɩ maa kpɩlɩgɛ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba kyɩna sii mʋ sʋ mʋ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ taa mɛ Kayaayu mʋ gyee asa.’
N wu ɩnɩmʋ kpini nɩɩ n gyii ɩmʋ kesintin yɛ ɔnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ.”
Lɩɩkaakɛ mʋ, Gyɔn maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ anyɔ ba bɩla ba yɩlɛ tʋtɔ.
Maa wu Yesu maa naa ɛɛ kyʋn mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan kɩɩ, Ɩbwaarɛ Kabʋlʋpʋ mʋ ndee!”
Gyɔn abɩɩlapʋ anyɔ mʋ ba maa nu maa tɔwɛ kanɩn mʋ, nɩɩ ba buu Yesu.
Yesu maa biliŋi kɩɩ mʋ, o wu ba maa buu mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nɩɩ fen biti?”
Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Rabi, fɩnɛ nɩɩ fʋ tɛ?” (Rabi kasɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ Ɔkaapʋpʋ).
Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan ba kɩɩ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n tɛ.”
Ɩmʋ sʋ ba buu mʋ naa wu katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ. Saŋa maŋa tɔ gyɛ kalaatɩpwɛ sʋ kerefi ana tɔ. Nɩɩ ba kyɩna mʋ asɛ kakɛ maŋa.
Asa anyɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba nu asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Gyɔn tɔwɛ, nɩɩ ba buu Yesu mʋ, bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋ ɩ gyɛ Simon Pita mu‐supu Andiruwu.
Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Andiruwu gyankpaa waa ɩ gyɛ yɛ, o biti mʋ‐daa Simon nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “An wu Mesaya
mʋ.” Mesaya mʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ yɛ ɔ ba mɔlɩgɛ asa.
Nɩɩ Andiruwu taa mʋ‐daa Simon kpee Yesu asɛ.
Yesu kɩɩ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “N nyi fɛɛ fʋ ɩ gyɛ Simon, Gyɔn mu‐bii‐nyɩnsa mʋ. Amaa bee biti ba tɩɩ fʋ yɛ Kefasi” (Giriki katɔwɛ tɔ ɩ gyɛ yɛ Pita, nɩɩ kɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ kɩfʋlɛ.)
Ɩmʋ lɩɩkaakɛ mʋ, Yesu waa nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ ee biti o kpee Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ. O wu Filipu, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ba buu mɛ!”
Filipi lɩɩ Betisayida kadɛ tɔ nɩn tʋtɔ nɩɩ Andiruwu maa Pita gbaa ba lɩɩ.

Nɩɩ Filipu wu Nataneli nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “An wu ɔmʋ nɩɩ Mosesi wʋla kyʋrɔɔ mʋ asɩn waa Nbara ɩwʋlɛ tɔ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ gbaa ba kyʋrɔɔ mʋ asɩn yɩla mʋ. Mʋ ɩ gyɛ Yesu, Gyosefu nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Nasareti kadɛ tɔ mʋ mu‐bii.”
Nɩɩ Nataneli taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Amɔɔ, kʋtɔ danbɩrasa kʋ ɩ taalɛ lɩɩ Nasareti kadɛ tɔ?”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Filipu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ba kɩɩ.”
Yesu maa wu Nataneli maa naa ɛɛ ba mʋ asɛ mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Kesintin tɔ, Ɩsɩrayɩ ɔnyɩn gbaa‐gbaa ndee, nɩɩ antɩŋɛsa kʋ man bʋ mʋ tɔ.”
Nɩɩ Nataneli taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Nɛnɛ nɩɩ fʋ waa fii nyi mɛ?” Yesu lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N wu fʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ bʋ figi onyin tɔ, pɔyɩ nɩɩ Filipu tɩɩ fʋ mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Nataneli tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, fʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ! Nɩɩ fʋ ɩ bɩla fʋ gyɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi Owura mʋ.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “N maa tɔwɛ fʋ yɛ, n wu fʋ fʋ maa bʋ figi onyin tɔ sʋ nɩɩ fʋ kɔɔlɛ gyii? Fii biti fʋ ba wu atɔ damantɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ kyɔ ɩnɩmʋ gbaa.”
Nɩɩ Yesu bwii kyaga sʋ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, fanɛ kpini fen biti fan wu sʋsʋ maa bugi tɔ, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ ba ba bee dii bɛɛ kpɩlɩgɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa sʋ.”
Nkɛ nsa kamaa mʋ, ba kpɩɩ ɔkyɩɩfɔ Kena kadɛ tɔ Galile Ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ. Yesu mu‐nyi bʋ tʋtɔ.
Nɩɩ ba da kɩbaa tɔ tɩɩ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ gbaa kɩkyɩɩfɔ mʋ tɔ.
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ nta ɩ pwagɛ bamʋ mʋ, Yesu mu‐nyi tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Bamʋ nta ɩ lʋwɛ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔkyɩɩ, man tɔwɛ mɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n waa. Mɛ saŋa
man pɩɩ fʋʋ.”
Nɩɩ mu‐nyi tɔwɛ nta ayɛpʋ mʋ yɛ, “Kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ fan waa mʋ, fan waa.”
Nɩɩ nkyu afʋlɛ alan asiye ɩ yɩlɛ tʋtɔ, ɩmʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ bɛɛ waa Gyiwu abi anaana‐tɔ ineesi kɩfwɩɩ. Nɩɩ kʋfʋlɛ kɩlan kʋmaa kɩ taalɛ gyii ɩgalɔn adʋnyɔ abɛɛ adɩsa.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ nta ayɛpʋ mʋ yɛ, “Fan saa nkyu bɔla alan mʋ kpini.” Ɩmʋ sʋ ba saa nkyu bɔla alan mʋ kpini bɩlɩbɩlɩ.
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ ba mʋ yɛ, “Fan nyɛ ɩmʋ ɩkʋ naa sa nta ayɛpʋ ɔbɩlɩsa mʋ.”
Nɩɩ ba waa kanɩn.

Nta ayɛpʋ ɔbɩlɩsa mʋ maa daa nuu nkyu mʋ nɩɩ i biliŋi nta mʋ kɩɩ mʋ, o wu fɛɛ ɩ bʋrɔn. Ɔ man nyi katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ, amaa ayɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba saa nkyu mʋ bɩrɛ be nyi. Nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ ɔkyɩɩfɔ mu‐kuli mʋ lɩɩ ɩkaa sʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɩ daa kɩlɛɛ nta danbɩrasa pɔyɩ. Nɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ nuu bʋʋ mʋ, kɛ ɔ lan bɩya nta mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man bʋrɔn mʋ. Amaa fʋ taa ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋrɔn yɩla ba fʋʋ saŋa nɩmʋ.”
Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ asɩn kyinkyinsa gyankpaasa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu waa. Ɔ waa ɩmʋ Kena kadɛ tɔ Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mʋ bʋnyaa mʋ kaapʋ. Nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii.
Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ maa mu‐nyi yɛ mu‐supu ana yɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba lɩɩ tʋtɔ kpee Kapanum kadɛ tɔ. Nɩɩ ba kyɩna tʋtɔ nkɛ nkʋ.
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Gyiwu abi Kesu kɔnɔ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ kɩ san gbɛrɛɛ kɩ fʋʋ mʋ, Yesu kpee Gyerusalem kadɛ tɔ.
Maa fʋʋ tʋtɔ mʋ, nɩɩ o kpee kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa opula mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ o wu anyɩn akʋ ba maa fɛ ɩnaatɛ, yɛ nbʋlʋpʋ yɛ awura‐lɔpɔ yɛgɛ akʋ mɔɔ ba tɛ iteeburu asɛ bɛɛ kyɛrɛ afulee.
Nɩɩ ɔ taa ɔfɛ waa kʋkyʋkyʋʋ gyan bamaa bamʋ ɩnaatɛ yɛ nbʋlʋpʋ lɩɩ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa opula. Nɩɩ ɔ yasɛ bamʋ afulee abi tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ bala bamʋ iteeburu bun.
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ fɛ awura‐lɔpɔ mʋ yɛ, “Fan lɛɛ bamʋ lɩɩ nfɩɩ. Fan man taa Mɛ‐Sɛ ayɛ biliŋi kɩgya ogyikpa.”
Nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba nyiŋi Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Kebiti mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ sa kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ kii gyii mi kumu.”
Nɩɩ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ asɩn kyinkyinsa nɩɩ fɩɩ taalɛ waa kaapʋ anɛ, kɛ ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ fʋ sʋ ɔkpa fʋ waa ɩnɩmʋ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ kɩŋasan tɔ yɛ “Fan boyi kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ nɩmʋ, kɛ n taa nkɛ nsa kʋsaa kɩmʋ yii.”
Nɩɩ Gyiwu abi mʋ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Nsu adɩna yɛ asiye nɩɩ ba taa pɔyɩ Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ nɩmʋ, nɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ fʋ yɛ fɩɩ taalɛ taa nkɛ nsa kʋsaa kɩmʋ yii?”
Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ kɩmʋ asɩn falɛ, ɩ gyɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ nɩn, man gyɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa.
Ɩmʋ sʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kyiŋi mʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ, mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba nyiŋi yɛ ɔ wʋla tɔwɛ bamʋ ɩnɩmʋ. Nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ yɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ mʋ gyii.
Asɩn kyinkyinsa kʋkyɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa Gyerusalem kadɛ tɔ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Gyiwu abi bee gyii bamʋ Kesu kɔnɔ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ mʋ, asa gaalaagaa ba wu nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii.
Amaa Yesu bɩrɛ, ɔ man taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ tʋʋ bamʋ sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ o nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ asa kpini ba du.
Nɩɩ ɩ man tiri mʋ fɛɛ ɔkʋ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ asa ba du, lɩɩ fɛɛ o nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ asa nkɔlɔ tɔ.
Ɔnyɩn kʋ lɩɩ Farasii
kʋbʋ mʋ tɔ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Nikodemusi, ɔ gyɛ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ nɩn.
Mʋ ɩ ba Yesu asɛ kagyanbwɛ kʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, an nyi yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ i sun fʋ yɛ fʋ ba kaapʋ anɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ waa asɩn kyinkyinsa mʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ waa falɛ, amɔɔ Ɩbwaarɛ tii mʋ sʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɩɩ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ wu kɛ ɔ bɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ, amɔɔ ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba bwii kʋʋgɛ mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Nikodemusi taasɛ yɛ, “Nɛnɛ nɩɩ ba bɩla yɛ ba kʋʋgɛ nyɩmɩsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛɛ dan? Ɛ taalɛ bɩla bwii loo mu‐nyi ɔtɔ tɔ kɛ ba kʋʋgɛ mʋ?”

Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fʋ kesintin yɛ ɔkʋ man bʋ tɔ ɔ taalɛ loo Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ, amɔɔ ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba gyee mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee maa Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ kigyee, kɛ ɔ nyɛ kakʋʋgɛ pʋpwɛ.
Nyɩmɩsa kʋʋgɛ nyɩmɩsa fɛɛ mu keduli nɩn, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ ɩ kʋʋgɛ nyɩmɩsa fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ keduli nɩn.
Man yɛgɛ i kyinkyin fʋ fɛɛ, n maa tɔwɛ fʋ yɛ ɩ dagaa ba bwii kʋʋgɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ.
Afuu ɩɩ da ii kpee katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ii biti. Fii nu ɩmʋ sʋ, amaa fʋ man nyi katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ lɩɩ yɛ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ii kpee. Kanɩn nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ tɔ mʋ du.”
Nɩɩ Nikodemusi taasɛ yɛ, “Nɛnɛ nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ ɩ taalɛ waa?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N nyi fʋ maa gyɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ ɔkaapʋpʋ kparɛ, nɩɩ fʋ man nu ɩnɩmʋ kasɛ?
N tɔwɛ fʋ kesintin yɛ, ɩmʋ nɩɩ an nyi mʋ nɩɩ an tɔwɛ, nɩɩ ɩmʋ nɩɩ an wu mʋ, nɩɩ an lɛɛ an tɔwɛ. Amaa fan mɛɛ kɔɔlɛ anɛ asɩn tɔwɛsa fen gyii.
N maa tɔwɛ fanɛ kasɛ sʋ asɩn nɩɩ fan maa kɔɔlɛ gyii falɛ mʋ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ fan taalɛ kɔɔlɛ sʋsʋ asɩn gyii?
Ɔkʋ man pɩɩta lɩɩ kasɛ sʋ kpee sʋsʋ, amɔɔ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ nɩɩ n lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba kasɛ sʋ mʋ.
Saŋa mʋ dɩdaa mʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛgɛ nɩɩ Mosesi taa ɔpɔlɛ ŋalɩgɛ waa kɩnansɛ
nɩɩ ɔ maalɛ oyu, kʋsaa kɩmʋ ifuli mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ asa ba kɩɩ nɩɩ ba nyɛ nkpa mʋ, kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ ii tiri fɛɛ ba kʋsaa mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ sʋsʋ,
kɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii mʋ ɔ nyɛ nkpa kakpaa.
“Lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ kebiti sa dulinyaa tɔ asa gaa sʋ mʋ, ɔ lɛɛ mɛ, Mu‐Bii kʋlʋn kpen mʋ sa, fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii mʋ, mɛɛ yɛ ɔ fɔyɩ, amaa ee biti ɔ nyɛ nkpa kakpaa.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ man sun mɛ, Mu‐Bii mʋ ba dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ, yɛ n ba bun kɩmʋ tɔ asa kʋpwɛ, amaa o sun mɛ nɩn yɛ n ba waa bamʋ ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ.
Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ mɛɛ yɛ o bun mʋ kʋpwɛ, amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla bun mʋ kʋpwɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ man kɔɔlɛ mɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii kʋlʋn kpen mʋ gyii.
Kanan mʋ nɩɩ kʋpwɛ kubun mʋ kɩ ba mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ ɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ nɩn ba dulinyaa tɔ, amaa asa bee biti kitentenbiri mʋ ba kyɔ ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ asunsunsa ɩ gyɛ alibi nɩn.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa alibi mʋ ii kisi ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ ba ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ tɔ, kɛ mu alibi ɩ ba lɩɩ ifuli.
Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dɛ ɔkpa mʋ bɩrɛ, ɛɛ ba ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ tɔ, kɛ asa ba nyɛ wu fɛɛ mʋ atɔ waasa mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti.”
Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba lɩɩ Gyerusalem kpee Gyudeya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ. Ɔ kyɩna tʋtɔ nkɛ nyɔ kʋ maa bamʋ, nɩɩ o gyee asa Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee.
Kanɩn saŋa maŋa nɩɩ Gyɔn Okyugyeepu mʋ gbaa bʋ Anon kadɛ mʋ nɩɩ ki tiri Salim mʋ tɔ. Ee gyee asa Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee, lɩɩ fɛɛ nkyu ɩ kyɩna ɩ kyɔ tʋtɔ gaa, nɩɩ asa bee kpee mʋ asɛ yɛgɛ ee gyee bamʋ.
Saŋa maŋa, ba man pɩɩta tii Gyɔn obu.
Nɩɩ ɩmɔɔrɛ ɩ tɩyɛ Gyɔn abuupu yɛ Gyiwu nyɩmɩsa kʋ nsana lɩɩ anaana tɔ ineesi kɩfwɩɩ sʋ.

Nɩɩ Gyɔn abɩɩlapʋ ba ba mʋ asɛ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ an wu mʋ Gyɔdan ɔbʋn benbe mʋ, ɔmʋ nɩɩ fu gyii mʋ asɩn kesintin mʋ gbaa ii gyee asa Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee, yɛgɛ asa kpini bee kpee mʋ asɛ.”
Nɩɩ Gyɔn lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ man kan taa kʋtɔ kʋ sa ɔkʋ mʋ, ɔ mɛɛ taalɛ nyɛ kɩmʋ.
Fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ fen biti fan gyii mɛ kesintin fɛɛ, n wʋla tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, ‘Man gyɛ mɛ ɩ gyɛ Krisito, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ.’ Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ sun mɛ nɩn yɛ n gyankpaa ba lɔŋɔ ɔkpa yɩla mʋ.”

Nɩɩ ɔ bɔ kɩŋasan yɛ, “Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ ɔkyɩɩfɔ mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔkyɩɩfɔ mu‐kuli. Ɔkyɩɩfɔ mu‐kuli mʋ kyɛmɩnɛ bɩrɛ ɛɛ yɩlɛ ee gyoo nɩn. Nɩɩ ɔ kan nu mʋ ɔbʋlɛ mʋ, mu ansi i gyii. Kanɩn maŋa sʋ nɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ mi ansi i gyii gaa.
Ɩ dagaa fɛɛ Yesu kɩtɩɩ kɩ ba ki dii ki tii sʋ, kɛ mɛ Gyɔn kɩtɩɩ mɔɔ kɩ ba kasɛ.
“Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba mʋ kyɔ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ. Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ kasɛ sʋ mʋ gyɛ kasɛ nɩmʋ sʋ nyɩmɩsa nɩn, nɩɩ kasɛ nɩmʋ sʋ asɩn nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ. Nɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ sʋsʋ mʋ kyɔ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ.
Ɩmʋ nɩɩ o wu yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ o nu mʋ, ɩmʋ kesintin nɩɩ ee gyii mʋ, nkɛɛ ɔkʋ mɛɛ kɔɔlɛ mʋ kesintin kigyii mʋ ee gyii.
Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɔɔlɛ mʋ asɩn mʋ gyii mʋ, ɩmʋ ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gyɛ kesintin wuya.
Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sun mʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ sa mʋ Kayaayu mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ ɔkaa.
Mɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ ii biti Mu‐Bii kʋlʋn mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa kʋtɔ kʋmaa waa mʋ kɩbaa tɔ.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ gyii mʋ sʋ nkpa kakpaa. Amaa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ man nu sa Mu‐Bii mʋ, ɔ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ nyɛ nkpa kakpaa, amaa Ɩbwaarɛ agbʋ mʋ ɩ dɛ mʋ sʋ.”
Ɩ maa ba fɛɛ Yesu bɩɩ fɛɛ Farasii abi mʋ ba nu yɛ ɛɛ nyɛ abɩɩlapʋ nɩɩ ee gyee bamʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee ɔ kyɔ Gyɔn.
Kesintin tɔ bɩrɛ, Yesu gbaa‐gbaa man gyee asa Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee, amɔɔ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ nkʋn ii gyee asa.
Yesu maa bɩɩ kanɩn mʋ, ɔ kʋsʋ lɩɩ Gyudeya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ bwii kpee Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.
Maa kpee mʋ ɩ dagaa maa bɔla lɩɩ Samariya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔ ba fʋʋ Samariya kadɛ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ kɩmʋ yɛ Sikaa mʋ. Kanɩn kadɛ maŋa kɩ bʋ tiri kasɛ mʋ nɩɩ saŋa mʋ dɩdaa mʋ, Gyekobu taa sa mu‐bii Gyosefu mʋ.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Gyekobu kitiribo mʋ kɩ bʋ. Yesu maa natɛ nɩɩ i nu mʋ mʋ, ɔ naa kyɩna kitiribo mʋ asɛ. Saŋa maŋa gyɛ kyɔwɛ amu nsana.
Yesu maa tɛ tʋtɔ mʋ, nɩɩ Kasamariya‐kyɩɩ kʋ ba ɔ ba saa nkyu, nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Sa mɛ nkyu kɛ n nuu.”
Kanɩn saŋa maa mʋ Yesu abɩɩlapʋ ba kyʋn kadɛ tɔ ba naa sɔɔ agyitɔ.

Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ lɛɛ Yesu kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fʋ gyɛ Gyiwu obii nɩn, nɩɩ mɛɛ mɛ n gyɛ Samariya obii nɩn. Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fʋ kʋlɛ mɛ nkyu kɛ fu nuu?” Ɔkyɩɩ mʋ tɔwɛ kanɩn lɩɩ fɛɛ Gyiwu abi yɛ Samariya abi ba mɛɛ bʋga lapɛ kʋlʋn.
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fʋ daa fu nyi kakɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩɩ sa, yɛ mɛ mʋ nɩɩ n kʋlɛ fʋ nkyu falɛ nɩn, naafɔɔ fʋ dɩn kʋlɛ mɛ kɛ n sa fʋ nkyu mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ sa nkpa.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ taasɛ yɛ, “Ɔbɩlɩsa, fʋ man sʋ kuuka, nɩɩ kitiribo mʋ mɔɔ bʋ nyɛ. Fɩnɛ nɩɩ fii biti fʋ nyɛ falɛ nkyu mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ sa nkpa mʋ sa mɛ?
Anɛ naana Gyekobu ɩ sa anɛ kitiribo maŋa. Mʋ gbaa‐gbaa maa mu‐bii ana yɛ mʋ atɔbwaaya kpini kɩmʋ tɔ nɩɩ ba nuu. Fɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ fʋ kyɔ anɛ naana Gyekobu nɩn abɛɛ?”
Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o nuu nkyu nɩmʋ mʋ, bʋlɩfɔ ii biti o bwii kɩtaa mʋ.
Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o nuu nkyu mʋ nɩɩ n biti n sa mʋ mʋ, bʋlɩfɔ man bɩla yɛ ɔ kɩtaa mʋ. Kanɩn nkyu maŋa ii biti i biliŋi fɛɛ nkyu mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ kyʋn mʋ tɔ, kɛ kɩɩ sa mʋ nkpa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ ɔkaa.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔbɩlɩsa, n kʋlɛ fʋ nɩn, sa mɛ kanɩn nkyu maŋa kɛ bʋlɩfɔ ɔ man bɩla kɩtaa mɛ, kɛ n man bɩla n baa n sa nkyu nfɩɩ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ yɛ, “Bwii kpee naa tɩɩ fu‐kuli kɛ fan ba.”
Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “N man sʋ okuli.”
Nɩɩ Yesu yɛ, “Fʋ tɔwɛ kesintin fɛɛ fʋ man sʋ okuli.
Fʋ wʋla kili anyɩn anu nɩɩ fʋ yɛgɛ, nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ faa mʋ fan tɛ nbɩɩnbɩɩ falɛ gbaa, man gyɛ fu‐kuli. Ɩmʋ sʋ ɩmʋ nɩɩ fʋ tɔwɛ falɛ gyɛ kesintin nɩn.”
Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔbɩlɩsa n wu fɛɛ fʋ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ nɩn.
Anɛ naana ana Samariya abi bɩrɛ kɩbɩɩ nɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ba daa bɛɛ sun Ɩbwaarɛ, amaa fanɛ Gyiwu abi ɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ Gyerusalem ɩ gyɛ opula mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ a sun Ɩbwaarɛ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkyɩɩ, kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii fɛɛ saŋa kʋ ii biti ɔ ba, nɩɩ man gyɛ kɩbɩɩ kɩnɩmʋ sʋ abɛɛ Gyerusalem nɩɩ asa bee biti ba sun Mɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ.
Fanɛ Samariya abi ɩ man nyi Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ fen sun danbɩrasa, amaa anɛ Gyiwu abi bɩrɛ an nyi Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ an sun. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kamɔlɩgɛ mʋ kɩ bɔla Gyiwu abi sʋ nɩn ba.
Saŋa kʋ ii biti ɔ ba, nɩɩ kɩ tɛɛ fʋʋ lʋwɛ, nɩɩ kesintin asunpu bee biti ba sun Mɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ yɛ kesintin tɔ. Kanɩn asunpu banɩmʋ falɛ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ ii biti.
Ɩbwaarɛ gyɛ kayaayu nɩn, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ bee sun mʋ mʋ, ɩ dagaa fɛɛ ba sun mʋ Kayaayu yɛ kesintin tɔ.”
Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “N nyi fɛɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ, nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Krisito mʋ, ee biti ba. Nɩɩ ɔ kan ba mʋ, ee biti ɔ lɛɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ tɔ kaapʋ anɛ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Mɛ, mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fʋ asɛ falɛ, mɛ ɩ gyɛ mʋ.”
