Kanɩn saŋa maŋa nɩɩ Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba bwii lɩɩ kadɛ tɔ ba. Nɩɩ ba maa wu Yesu maa ɔkyɩɩ mʋ ba maa tɛɛ bɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ, i kyinkyin bamʋ. Amaa bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋ man taalɛ taasɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nɩɩ fii biti?” Abɛɛ ba taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ tɔwɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ asɛ?”
Tʋtɔ mʋ, ɔkyɩɩ mʋ yɛgɛ mʋ kɔlɔ‐bi yɩla sɩlɛ kpee kadɛ tɔ naa tɔwɛ asa yɛ,
“Fan ba kɩɩ ɔnyɩn kʋ maa tɔwɛ mɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ n waa mʋ kpini. Abɛɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ Krisito, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ?”
Ɩmʋ sʋ asa mʋ ba lɩɩ kadɛ mʋ tɔ bee kpee ba naa kɩɩ Yesu.
Saŋa maa tɔ nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, waa aniya kɛ fu gyii agyitɔ.”
Amaa nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “N sʋ agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ n gyii, yɛgɛ fan man nyi ɩmʋ sʋ.”
Nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Abɛɛ ɔsa kʋ wʋla bɩya mʋ agyitɔ nɩn nɩɩ o gyii?”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɛ agyitɔ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ n maa waa Mɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ kebiti, kɛ n waa kusun mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sa mɛ mʋ lʋwɛ.
Man gyɛ fanɛ kɩŋasan ɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɩ san ɩbwaayɩ ɩna kɛ a tɩŋɛ ayu mʋ?’ Amaa n tɔwɛ fanɛ fɛɛ fan bugi fanɛ ansi kɩɩ adɔɔ mʋ, fen biti fan wu fɛɛ ɩ payɩ fʋʋ kɩtɩŋɛ.

Ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɩŋɛ mʋ ɩɩ nyɛ mʋ kʋkɔka danbɩrasa, nɩɩ ayu mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kʋʋla ɛɛ yɩlɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa ba nkpa kakpaa tɔ. Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee duu yɛ ɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɩŋɛ mʋ kpini bee biti ba bʋga gyii bamʋ ansi.
Ɩmʋ sʋ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔkʋ ii duu nɩɩ ɔkʋ ɩɩ kpa,’ ɩ gyɛ kesintin.
N sun fanɛ ndɔɔ tɔ yɛ fan naa tɩŋɛ ayu mʋ nɩɩ fan man duu. Akʋ ɩ waa ɩmʋ kusun nɩɩ fan ba nyɛ ɩmʋ kʋkɔka.”
Samariya abi gaalaagaa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ kadɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ ba kɔɔlɛ Yesu gyii, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ maa tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔ tɔwɛ mɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ n wʋla waa” mʋ sʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Samariya abi mʋ ba ba mʋ asɛ mʋ, ba kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ ɔ kyɩna bamʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ɔ kyɩna bamʋ asɛ nkɛ nnyɔ.
Asa gaalaagaa ba ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii tii sʋ lɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ sʋ.

Nɩɩ asa mʋ ba tɔwɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ yɛ, “Nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ, an kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii, yɛgɛ man gyɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fʋ tɔwɛ anɛ mʋ sʋ, amaa kpalɩ fɛɛ anɛ gbaa‐gbaa anɛ an nu yɛ anɛ asʋ, nɩɩ an bɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ dulinyaa tɔ asa ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ mʋ.”
Yesu maa gyii nkɛ nnyɔ kamaa tɔ mʋ, ɔ lɩɩ tʋtɔ kpee Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.
Yesu gbaa‐gbaa ɩ wʋla kyɩna tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ kʋmaa man sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ ayɛ.”
Yesu maa naa fʋʋ Galile mʋ, Galile abi ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ abaa anyɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ngbaa bamʋ, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba kpee Gyerusalem naa gyii Kesu kɔnɔ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ mʋ, ba wu kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa tʋtɔ mʋ.
Yesu maa bʋ Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ, o bwii kpee Kena kadɛ tɔ. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔ kyɩna taa nkyu biliŋi nta mʋ. Maa bʋ tʋtɔ kanɩn mʋ, kɩbanɛ ɔbɩlɩsa kʋ mu‐bii‐nyɩnsa dɛ Kapanum kadɛ tɔ ɛɛ lɔ.
Ɔnyɩn mʋ maa nu fɛɛ Yesu lɩɩ Gyudeya ba Galile mʋ, ɔ ba mʋ asɛ ba kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ ɔ ba Kapanum ba kyɛ mu‐bii mʋ nɩɩ ɔ dɛ ee biti o wu mʋ sa mʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ ɔkʋ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii, amɔɔ fen wu asɩn kyinkyinsa yɛ adangana.”
Nɩɩ kɩbanɛ bɩlɩsa mʋ kʋlɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔbɩlɩsa, yɛgɛ a kpee mi kebii mʋ asɛ pɔyɩ kɛ o wu.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ ɔbɩlɩsa mʋ yɛ, “Natɛ, fu kebii mʋ mɛɛ yɛ o wu.”
Ɔnyɩn mʋ kɔɔlɛ Yesu asɩn mʋ gyii, nɩɩ ɔ kɩtaa ɔkpa kyʋn.
Maa kpewu mʋ, mʋ ayaafɔlɛ ba ba gyaŋa mʋ ɔkpa tɔ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, mu‐bii mʋ nyɛ alanfɩya.
Nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ kebii mʋ nyɛ alanfɩya. Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ndee kyʋwapɛ kerefi kʋlʋn saŋa mʋ, nɩɩ kibirima mʋ yɛgɛ mʋ.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ bɩɩ yɛ kanɩn saŋa maa kyɛɛkyɛɛ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fu‐kebii mʋ mɛɛ yɛ o wu” mʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔnyɩn mʋ maa mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ abi kpini ba kɔɔlɛ Yesu gyii.
Yesu maa lɩɩ Gyudeya ba Galile mʋ, ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ asɩn kyinkyinsa nyɔsapʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa.
Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ, Yesu kpee Gyerusalem naa gyii Gyiwu abi Kesu kɔnɔ ngyaŋɛ kʋ.
Kɩpatɛ kʋ kɩ bʋ Gyerusalem kadɛ tɔ, nɩɩ kɩ bʋ tiri kebunɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ nbʋlʋpʋ kebunɔ mʋ. Bɛɛ tɩɩ kapatɩyɛ maa Hibriwu kadɛ tɔ yɛ Betesada. Nɩɩ agyan anu ɩ dɛ kyaabɔɔ kɩmʋ.
Agyan nɩmʋ tɔ nɩɩ alɔpʋ damantɛ fɛɛ agyaatanapʋ, yɛ ayaa yɛ abaa wusa wuya ana, amʋgʋlɛ‐mʋgʋlɛ kpini ba ba tʋtɔ bee gyoo.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kabɔɔ ɩ taalɛ ɛɛ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ɛ ba ee lupu nkyu mʋ tɔ, kɛ, alɔpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba dɛ‐dɛ mʋ, bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyankpaa loo kapatɩyɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, mʋ kʋlɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ mʋ tɔ mʋ ɩɩ lʋwɛ.
Ɔnyɩn kʋ bʋ tʋtɔ ɛɛ lɔ nsu adɩsa yɛ aburuwa.
Yesu maa wu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ dɛ tʋtɔ lɔ kyɛɛrɛɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fii biti fɛɛ fʋ nyɛ alanfɩya?”
Nɩɩ ɔlɔpʋ mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔbɩlɩsa, nɩɩ kabɔɔ mʋ kan lupu nkyu mʋ tɔ mʋ, n man sʋ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa mɛ loo kapatɩyɛ mʋ tɔ. Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n kpan mɛ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ n loo to mʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ ɩ daa gyankpaa mɛ loo to.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Kʋsʋ taa fʋ kalan kɛ fʋ natɛ.”
Opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ alanfɩya, nɩɩ o kukuri mʋ kalan natɛ. Kanɩn kakɛ maŋa gyɛ Gyiwu abi kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ nɩn.
Nɩɩ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ ba tɔwɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ alanfɩya mʋ yɛ, “Ndaga gyɛ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ. Anɛ nbara mʋ ɩ mɛɛ sa ɔkpa yɛ fʋ sʋla fʋ kalan.”
Amaa ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyɛ mɛ mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ, ‘Taa fʋ kalan kɛ fʋ natɛ.’ ”
Kanɩn sʋ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ kanɩn ɔnyɩn maŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ fʋ yɛ fʋ taa fʋ kalan kɛ fʋ natɛ?”
Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ man nyi kanɩn ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyɛ mʋ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ asa ba kyɔ nɩɩ Yesu loo asa damantɛ mʋ tɔ kyʋn.

Kamaa tɔ mʋ Yesu wu mʋ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Kɩɩ, nbɩɩnbɩɩ fʋ nyɛ alanfɩya, ɩmʋ sʋ yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa. Nɩɩ man gyɛ kanɩn, ɩmʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ ba fʋ sʋ mʋ ii biti ɩ baa ɩ kyɔ ɩnɩmʋ.”
Nɩɩ Ɔnyɩn mʋ lɩɩ tʋtɔ naa tɔwɛ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ yɛ Yesu ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyɛ mʋ mʋ.
Lɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu waa kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ sʋ mʋ, Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ ba piili bɛɛ tɔɔrɔɔ mʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɛ‐Sɛ ii sun kusun saŋa kʋmaa, ɩmʋ sʋ ngbaa mɛ n sun kusun.”
Lɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ sʋ Gyiwu abi ba payɩ ansi bee biti ɩkpa ba mɔɔ mʋ. Man gyɛ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ nbara kinyita mʋ wʋlɛ nkʋn sʋ, amaa ɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ mʋ‐Sɛ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ maa Ɩbwaarɛ kyɛɛkyɛɛ.
Nɩɩ Yesu kyaga sʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, mɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ n mɛɛ taalɛ waa sɛhn mɛ kɩba sʋ. Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n wu Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ waa mʋ, kɩmʋ nɩɩ ngbaa mɛ n waa.
Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ sʋ kebiti sa mɛ, nɩɩ ɛɛ kaapʋ mɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa mʋ. Mɛ‐Sɛ ii biti ɔ kaapʋ mɛ atɔ kparɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ kyɔ ɩnɩmʋ, kɛ n waa kɛ i kyinkyin fanɛ.
Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ ii kyiŋi alewupu nɩɩ ɛɛ sa bamʋ nkpa mʋ, kanɩn maŋa sʋ nɩɩ mɛ, Obii mʋ gbaa n sa nkpa mi kebiti tɔ.
Mɛ‐Sɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛɛ talɛ ɔkʋ, amaa ɔ taa ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ katalɛ waa mɛ kɩbaa tɔ.

Mɛ‐Sɛ ii biti asa kpini ba taa bʋnyaa sa mɛ, Obii mʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ taa bʋnyaa bɛɛ sa Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ. Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ taa bʋnyaa sa mɛ, Obii mʋ, ɩɩ kaapʋ nɩn fɛɛ ɔ mɛɛ taa bʋnyaa ɛɛ sa Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ.
“N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o nu mɛ asɩn, nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ gyii mʋ, sʋ nkpa kakpaa, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ mɛɛ yɛ o bun mʋ kʋpwɛ. Ɔ tɛɛ faa lɩɩ lewu tɔ ba nkpa tɔ.

N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ saŋa kʋ ɩɩ ba, nɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ gbaa ɩɩ tɛɛ ba. Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba du fɛɛ alewupu lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba man nyi Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ, bee biti ba nu mɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ ɔbʋlɛ, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba nu mɛ asɛ mʋ, bee biti ba nyɛ nkpa.
Fɛɛ Kanan mʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ gyɛ nkpa kumu mʋ, kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ ɔ sa mɛ, Mu‐Bii mʋ ɔkpa fɛɛ n baa n gyɛ nkpa kumu.
Nɩɩ ɔ sa mɛ ɔlʋn yɛ n talɛ daadimaadi kʋmaa, lɩɩ fɛɛ mɛ ɩ gyɛ Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa.
“Fan man yɛgɛ ɩnɩmʋ i kyinkyin fanɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa kʋ ii biti ɔ ba nɩɩ alewupu mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ nkyan tɔ kpini bee biti ba nu mɛ ɔbʋlɛ,
kɛ ba lɩɩ bamʋ nkyan tɔ ba. Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba waa adanbɩrasa mʋ, bee biti ba kyiŋi nyɛ nkpa, kɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba waa alibi mʋ, bee biti ba kyiŋi kɛ ba gyii kʋpwɛ.

Nɩɩ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ mɛɛ taalɛ waa sɛhn mɛ kɩbaa sʋ. N talɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n nu lɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ asɛ, nɩɩ n gyii asɩn ɩmʋ ɔkpa sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ n mee biti n waa mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ kɔkɔlɔ biti, amɔɔ ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ lɛɛ.”
Yesu kyaga sʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nɩɩ n gyii mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn kesintin mʋ, ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ baa i budu.
Amaa ɔkʋ bʋ tɔ nɩɩ ee gyii mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn, mʋ ɩ gyɛ mɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ n nyi fɛɛ mɛ n‐yɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ee gyii mʋ ɩ gyɛ kesintin.
“Nɩɩ fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fan sun kpee Gyɔn asɛ, nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kesintin mʋ tɔwɛ fanɛ lɩɩ mɛ sʋ.
Man gyɛ fɛɛ n biti nyɩmɩsa daadimaadi o gyii mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kesintin nɩn, amaa n tɔwɛ asɩn nɩmʋ lɩɩ Gyɔn sʋ nɩn, kɛ fan nu kasɛ kɛ fan nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ.
Gyɔn kyɩna o du nɩn fɛɛ ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ kyaŋɛ nɩɩ kɩ kɩɩ tɔ, nɩɩ fan gyii fanɛ ansi gbɛrɛɛ ɩmʋ tɔ.
“Amaa n sʋ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ii gyii mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kesintin, nɩɩ i budu ɩ kyɔ Gyɔn lɛɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ kusun mʋ nɩɩ mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ taa sa mɛ nɩɩ n sun falɛ mʋ, ɩɩ lɛɛ kaapʋ kesintin fɛɛ mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ i sun mɛ.
Nɩɩ mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ gbaa gyii mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kesintin. Nɩɩ fan man pɩɩta nu mʋ ɔbʋlɛ abɛɛ fan wu mʋ yɛ ansi,
nɩɩ mʋ asɩn mʋ a man bʋ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan man kɔɔlɛ mɛ, ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mʋ gyii.
Fan payɩ ansi bɩɩla Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fɛn fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ kanan ɔkpa maŋa sʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan nyɛ nkpa kakpaa, yɛgɛ kanɩn Asɩnkyan yɩlasa maŋa ii gyii mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kesintin.
Amaa fan kina mɛ asɛ kɩba, kɛ fan ba nyɛ nkpa.
“Ayɩn‐bi lɩɩ daadimaadi kʋ asɛ man tiri mɛ.
Amaa n nyi fanɛ. N nyi fan maa man sʋ kebiti sa Ɩbwaarɛ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ.
N ba mɛ‐Sɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ, nɩɩ fan man kɔɔlɛ mɛ, amaa nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ba mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ kɩtɩɩ tɔ mʋ, fan biti fan kɔɔlɛ mʋ.
Fan maa biti ayɩn‐bi lɩɩ abaa asɛ falɛ, yɛgɛ fɛn mɛɛ kpan fanɛ n‐yɩɩ fan nyɛ ayɩn‐bi lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ nkʋn asɛ mʋ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ fen biti fan waa kɔɔlɛ gyii?
“Fan man fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ n biti n pwɩɩ fanɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ mu ansi tɔ. Fanɛ naana Mosesi mʋ nɩɩ fan taa fanɛ tamaa tʋʋ mʋ sʋ mʋ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ pwɩɩ fanɛ.
Nɩɩ fan kan kɔɔlɛ Mosesi gyii mʋ, naafɔɔ fen biti fan kɔɔlɛ ngbaa mɛ gyii, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ kyʋrɔɔ mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn.
Amaa nɩɩ fan man kan kɔɔlɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyʋrɔɔ lɩɩ mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ mʋ gyii mʋ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ fen biti fan waa kɔɔlɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ falɛ gyii?”
Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ, Yesu faa Galile ɔbʋn lala mʋ nɩɩ ba bɩla bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Tiberiya mʋ kpee kɩmʋ benben.
Nɩɩ asa damantɛ ba buu mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba wu mʋ asɩn kyinkyinsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa ɛɛ kyɛ alɔpʋ mʋ.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba dii kpee kɩbɩɩ‐bi kʋkʋ sʋ naa kyɩna.
Kanɩn saŋa maŋa mʋ, Gyiwu abi Kesu kɔnɔ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ kensi‐gyii mʋ ki tiri tɔ.
Yesu maa diyaa mʋ ansi kɩɩ mʋ, o wu sakyɔ damantɛ maa ba mʋ asɛ. Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ taasɛ Filipu yɛ, “Fɩnɛ nɩɩ an biti an nyɛ agyitɔ sɔɔ sa asa banɩmʋ kpini kɛ bee gyii?”
Yesu tʋʋ Filipu tɔ nɩn kɩɩ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ tɛɛ wʋla o nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ waa.
Nɩɩ Filipu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Pɔyɩ kɛ a taalɛ nyɛ agyitɔ gbɛrɛɛ‐gbɛrɛɛ sa ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ o gyii mʋ, amɔɔ an biti a nyita ɩbwaayɩ iburuwa kʋkɔka.”
Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ tɔ ɔmʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Andiruwu, Simon Pita mu‐supu mʋ tɔwɛ yɛ,
“Kebii‐nyɩnsa‐bii kʋ bʋ nfɩɩ, nɩɩ ɔ sʋ bodobodo pii‐pii anuu yɛ ɩkɩn‐bi anyɔ. Kanɩn agyitɔ pii nɩmʋ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ waa kɛ ɩ fʋʋ asa damantɛ banɩmʋ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ asa mʋ ba kyɩna‐kyɩna.” Yɛgɛ afitiri pɔrɔgɛsa a bʋ tʋtɔ kʋkyɔ, ɩmʋ sʋ asa mʋ kpini ba kyʋn kyɩna. Nɩɩ anyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ kɔnɔ ɩ waa fɛɛ ngbɩn nnuu.
Ba maa kyɩna kanɩn mʋ, Yesu taa bodobodo mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ ɔ taa sa yɛ ba barɩgɛ tɔ sa bamʋ. Kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ ɔ waa ɩkɩn mʋ gbaa. Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ nyɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ee biti.
Ba maa gyii ŋmɛ mʋ, Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Fan tasɛ‐tasɛ agyisan mʋ, kɛ fan man yɛgɛ ɩmʋ ɩkʋ i sii.”
Ɩmʋ sʋ ba maa gyii bodobodo pii‐pii anu mʋ, ba tasɛ‐tasɛ ɩmʋ agyisan mʋ kpini bɔla alantan kudu anyɔ.
Asa mʋ ba maa wu asɩn kyinkyinsa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu waa mʋ, ba piili bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Kesintin, ɔnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ ba dulinyaa tɔ mʋ.”
Yesu maa bɩɩ fɛɛ, bee biti ba ba taa mʋ ɔlʋn sʋ, kɛ ba naa bun mʋ kuwura mʋ, ɔ bɩla lɩɩ bamʋ tɔ kpee kɩbɩɩ‐bi sʋ mʋ nkʋn.
Kalaatɩpwɛ asɛ maa fʋʋ mʋ, Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba kpɩlɩgɛ kpee ɔbʋn lala kɔnɔ.
Nɩɩ ɩ maa sʋla naa fʋʋ kagyanbwɛ yɛgɛ Yesu man pɩɩta bwii ba bamʋ asɛ mʋ, ba naa loo ɔkʋlɩ tɔ bɛɛ faa bee kpee Kapanum.
Nɩɩ afuu lala a tigi a daa yɛgɛ nkyu mʋ ii wuli tɔ.
Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba maa palɛ kpee ansi tɔ fɛɛ mayɩlɩ asa abɛɛ ana mʋ, ba wu Yesu maa naa nkyu mʋ sʋ ɛɛ ba bamʋ ɔkʋlɩ mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa bamʋ.
Amaa Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɛ nɩn, fan man waa kufuu.”
Nɩɩ ba maa biti fɛɛ ba taa Yesu waa ɔkʋlɩ mʋ tɔ mʋ, opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ ɔkʋlɩ mʋ dan katɩn mʋ nɩɩ bee biti fɛɛ ba fʋʋ mʋ.
Ɩmʋ lɩɩkaakɛ mʋ, asa damantɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba sii ɔbʋn lala mʋ benben mʋ, ba wu fɛɛ ɔkʋlɩ kʋlʋn ki sii kɩ dan tʋtɔ ndee nɩɩ kɩmʋ nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba taa. Amaa Yesu mɔɔ man loo mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ asɛ ɔkʋlɩ mʋ tɔ.
Nɩɩ ɩkʋlɩ ɩkʋ mɔɔ ɩ lɩɩ Tiberiya ba dan tʋtɔ tiri katɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ daa taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ nɩɩ asa ba gyii agyitɔ mʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ asa damantɛ mʋ ba maa bɩɩ fɛɛ Yesu abɛɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba man bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ, ba loo ɩkʋlɩ mʋ tɔ kpee Kapanum ba naa bee biti Yesu.
Ba maa naa wu mʋ ɔbʋn mʋ benben mʋ, ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, saŋa mɔɔ nɩɩ fʋ fʋʋ nfɩɩ?”
Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin, man gyɛ asɩn kyinkyinsa mʋ nɩɩ fan wu sʋ nɩɩ fan naa fen biti mɛ, amaa lɩɩ fan maa nyɛ agyitɔ gyii ŋmɛ kanan sʋ nɩɩ fen biti mɛ.

Fan man waa kusun biti agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ii biti i nyita, amaa fan waa kusun biti agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ sa nkpa kakpaa. Mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa n biti n sa fanɛ kanɩn agyitɔ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ lɛɛ kaapʋ fɛɛ mʋ kɩbaa kɩ gyan mɛ sʋ.”
Ɩmʋ sʋ ba taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ii tiri fɛɛ a waa kɛ a taalɛ waa kusun mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Kusun mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti fɛn waa mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, fan kɔɔlɛ mɛ, ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mʋ gyii.”
Nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ asɩn kyinkyinsa nɩɩ fii biti fʋ waa kɛ an wu kɛ a kɔɔlɛ fu gyii? Mɩnɛ nɩɩ fii biti fʋ waa?
Saŋa kʋ tɔ, anɛ naana ana ba gyii agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ ɩmʋ yɛ Mana
mʋ ofuli sʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔ sa bamʋ agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ nɩɩ ba gyii.’ ”

Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin, man gyɛ Mosesi ɩ sa fanɛ naana ana agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ mʋ. Amaa Mɛ‐Sɛ ɩ sa fanɛ naana kesintin agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ mʋ. Nɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ gbaa ɩɩ sa fanɛ kesintin agyitɔ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ mʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ sa asa mʋ, ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ kpɩlɩgɛ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba kasɛ sʋ, nɩɩ ɛɛ sa dulinyaa tɔ asa nkpa mʋ.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, lɩɩ ndaga ɩ sʋ ii kpee sa anɛ kanɩn agyitɔ maŋa saŋa kʋmaa.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ “Mɛ ɩ gyɛ agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ sa nkpa mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ ba mɛ asɛ mʋ, akʋn ɩ mɛɛ yɛ a mɔɔ mʋ kakaakʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii mʋ, bʋlɩfɔ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ kɩtaa mʋ.
Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n wʋla tɔwɛ fanɛ mʋ, fan wu mɛ, amaa fɛn mɛɛ kɔɔlɛ mɛ fen gyii.
Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ taa sa mɛ mʋ, ii biti ɔ ba mɛ asɛ. Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ ba mɛ asɛ mʋ, mɛɛ yɛ n gya mʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ n lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba kasɛ sʋ, kɛ n ba waa ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ kebiti, amaa man gyɛ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mi kebiti.
Ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ kebiti ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, bamʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa bamʋ sa mɛ mʋ kpini, bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋlʋn gbaa ɔ man fɔyɩ. Amaa n biti n kyiŋi bamʋ ba nkpa tɔ kakɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ kebiti ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o wu mɛ, Mu‐Bii mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii mʋ ɩɩ nyɛ nkpa kakpaa. Nɩɩ n biti n kyiŋi mʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ ba nkpa tɔ kakɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Gyiwu abi mʋ ba piili bɛɛ kɔlɩtɛ bee yii Yesu, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Mɛ ɩ gyɛ agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba kasɛ sʋ mʋ.”
Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Man gyɛ Gyosefu mu‐bii mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Yesu mʋ nɩn? An nyi mʋ‐sɛ yɛ mu‐nyi a! Nɩɩ mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ, ɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘N lɩɩ sʋsʋ nɩn ba?’ ”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ fanɛ kɩkɔlɩtɛ mʋ.
Ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ ba mɛ asɛ, amɔɔ Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ, ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɔ ba, nɩɩ n biti n kyiŋi mʋ ba nkpa tɔ kakɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ.
Ɩbwaarɛ Atɔwɛpʋ ba kyʋrɔɔ yɩla yɛ, ‘Ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ii biti ɔ nyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩkaapʋ.’ Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o nu Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ɔ bɩɩla lɩɩ mʋ asɛ mʋ, ii biti ɔ ba mɛ asɛ.
Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ mɛɛ kaapʋ fɛɛ ɔkʋ tee wu Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ, amɔɔ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ mʋ nkʋn i wu mʋ.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii mʋ, sʋ nkpa kakpaa.
Mɛ ɩ gyɛ agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ sa nkpa mʋ.
Fanɛ naana ana ba gyii agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Mana mʋ ofuli sʋ, amaa ba wu.
Amaa agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba kasɛ sʋ mʋ ndee, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o gyii kanɩn agyitɔ maŋa mʋ, mɛɛ yɛ o wu.

Mɛ ɩ gyɛ agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ sa nkpa nɩɩ n kpɩlɩgɛ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba kasɛ sʋ mʋ. Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o gyii kanɩn agyitɔ nɩmʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ kyɩna kakpaa. Nɩɩ agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ n biti n sa dulinyaa tɔ asa kɛ ba nyɛ nkpa mʋ ɩ gyɛ mɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ.”
Gyiwu abi mʋ ba maa nu Yesu asɩn tɔwɛsa kanɩn mʋ, ɩ waa bamʋ agbʋ. Nɩɩ ba piili bee gyii abaa ɩmɔɔrɛ, bɛɛ taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Nɛnɛ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ ii biti ɔ waa taa mʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ sa anɛ kɛ a wɛ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ, fan kan fan man wɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ, kɛ fen nuu mɛ nkalan de, fɛn mɛɛ yɛ fan nyɛ nkpa.
Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wɛ mɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ, nɩɩ o nuu mɛ nkalan mʋ, ɔ sʋ nkpa kakpaa, nɩɩ n biti n kyiŋi mʋ ba nkpa tɔ kakɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ tɔ.
Kpalɩ fɛɛ mɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ ɩ gyɛ agyitɔ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ, nɩɩ mɛ nkalan ɩ gyɛ atɔ nuusa gbaa‐gbaa mʋ.
Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wɛ mɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ, nɩɩ o nuu mɛ nkalan mʋ, ɔ bʋ mɛ tɔ nɩɩ ngbaa mɛ n bʋ mʋ tɔ.
Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ nkpa kumu sun mɛ, nɩɩ lɩɩ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ n sʋ nkpa mʋ, ɔkpa kʋlʋn maŋa sʋ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wɛ mɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ, ii biti ɔ nyɛ nkpa lɩɩ mɛ sʋ.

Mɛ ɩ gyɛ agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba kasɛ sʋ mʋ. N man du fɛɛ mana agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ naana ana ba gyii, nɩɩ ɩ man sa bamʋ nkpa nɩɩ ba wu mʋ. Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o gyii agyitɔ nɩmʋ bɩrɛ, ee biti ɔ nyɛ nkpa kakpaa.”
Yesu maa bʋ Kapaniyum, Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa ɛɛ kaapʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ.
Yesu abɩɩlapʋ gaalaagaa ba maa nu ɩnɩmʋ mʋ, ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Falɛ kɩkaapʋ kɩnɩmʋ kɩ bʋlʋn. Anɩmʋ ɩ taalɛ kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ kyula?”
Yesu maa bɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ bɛɛ kɔlɩtɛ lɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ, ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɩmʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ falɛ ɩ kɩtaa fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ nɩn?
Kanɩn bɩrɛ nɩɩ fan kan wu mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa n maa bwii n kpee sʋsʋ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n lɩɩ ba kasɛ sʋ mʋ mɔɔ de?
Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ sa nkpa, amaa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ asa ba sʋ bamʋ ɔlʋn bɛɛ waa mʋ man sʋ tɔnɔ. Asɩn mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ sa fanɛ mʋ, ɩ lɩɩ Kayaayu tɔ nɩn nɩɩ ɩɩ sa nkpa.
Amaa yɛgɛ fanɛ tɔ akʋ ba mɛɛ kɔɔlɛ bee gyii.” Yesu tɔwɛ kanɩn lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ wʋla o nyi lɩɩ npiili asɛ, bamʋ nɩɩ ba man kɔɔlɛ gyii yɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ ba lɛɛ mʋ ɛ sa mʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu kyaga sʋ yɛ, “Kpalɩ ɩnɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ n wʋla tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ ba mɛ asɛ mʋ kɩbaa sʋ, amɔɔ Mɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ sa mʋ ɔkpa.”
Lɩɩ kanɩn saŋa maŋa mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ gaalaagaa ba bwii kamaa, nɩɩ ba man bɩla buu mʋ.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fen biti fan bwii do?”
Nɩɩ Simon Pita lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, anɩmʋ asɛ nɩɩ an sʋ an kpee? Fʋ nkʋn ɩ sʋ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ sa nyɩmɩsa nkpa kakpaa.
An kɔɔlɛ gyii nɩɩ an bɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ nkʋn ɩ gyɛ Ɔkyɩrɛkyɩrɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mʋ.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Man gyɛ fanɛ kudu anyɔ mʋ, nɩɩ n lɛɛ? Amaa fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ gyɛ Sɩtaanɛ.”
Gyudasi mʋ nɩɩ mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Simon Isikariyoti mʋ asɩn nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ. Halɩɩ Gyudasi maa gyɛ abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ gbaa mʋ, kamaa tɔ mʋ, mʋ ii biti ɔ ba lɛɛ Yesu sa.
Ɩnɩmʋ kpini kamaa mʋ, Yesu naa ɔ naa Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ. Ee mee biti maa loo Gyudeya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Gyiwu abi abɩlɩsa bee biti ba mɔɔ mʋ.
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Gyiwu abi Kesu kɔnɔ abuu kiyii kensi‐gyii
a maa tiri tɔ mʋ,
Yesu mu‐supu ana ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɩ dagaa fʋ maa lɩɩ nfɩɩ kpee Gyudeya, kɛ fu abuupu ba naa wu fʋ asɩn kyinkyinsa mʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ waa mʋ.
Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti yɛ mʋ kɩtɩɩ ki dii mʋ, ɔ mɛɛ waa mʋ asɩn ɛɛ baala. Lɩɩ asɩn kyinkyinsa mʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ waa falɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ, ɩ dagaa fʋ maa lɛɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ ifuli kaapʋ dulinyaa tɔ asa.”
Halɩɩ mu‐supu ana gbaa ba man kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa mʋ, man pɩɩ fʋʋ, fanɛɛ fanɛ saŋa kʋmaa bʋrɔn sa fanɛ.
Dulinya asa mɛɛ taalɛ kisi fanɛ. Amaa mɛ nɩɩ bee kisi, lɩɩ fɛɛ n gyii bamʋ kesintin fɛɛ bamʋ asunsunsa ɩ gyɛ alibi.
Fanɛ fanɛ fan kpee kensi‐gyii ngyaŋɛ mʋ tɔ. N mɛɛ yɛ n kpee ngyaŋɛ mʋ tɔ nbɩɩnbɩɩ, lɩɩ fɛɛ mɛ saŋa man pɩɩta fʋʋ.”
Maa tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ maŋa lʋwɛ mʋ o sii kyɩna Galile.
Amaa Yesu mu‐supu ana ba maa lɩɩ kyʋn kensi‐gyii ngyaŋɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, mʋ gbaa mʋ kpee nɩɩ ɔ man lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ ifuli.
Kensi‐gyii ngyaŋɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ bɛɛ kɩɩ bee biti mʋ, yɛgɛ bɛɛ taasɛ asa yɛ, “Fɩnɛ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn maŋa bʋ?”
Sakyɔ mʋ tɔ asa damantɛ bee muni abaa asɛ lɩɩ mʋ sʋ. Akʋ ba yɛ, “Ɔ gyɛ nyɩmɩsa danbɩrasa.” Nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba yɛ, “Ɛɛ pɩna asa nɩn.”
Amaa ɔkʋ man taalɛ lɩɩ ifuli tɔwɛ Yesu n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba maa sɩlɛ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ sʋ.
Ba maa waa kensi‐gyii ngyaŋɛ mʋ naa fʋʋ nsana mʋ, Yesu kpee Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ nɩɩ o piili ɛɛ kaapʋ asɩn.
Mʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ i kyinkyin Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ, nɩɩ ba taasɛ yɛ, “Nɛnɛ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ man bɩɩla nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ falɛ kinyi?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mɛ kɩkaapʋ mʋ man gyɛ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ lɛɛ. Ɩ lɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ asɛ nɩn.
Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ waa Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti mʋ, ee biti ɔ bu fɛɛ mɛ kɩkaapʋ mʋ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ, abɛɛ n tɔwɛ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ ɔlʋn sʋ nɩn.
Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ ɔlʋn sʋ mʋ, ɩɩ waa kanɩn nɩn ee biti bʋnyaa ɛɛ sa mʋ n‐yɩɩ. Amaa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee biti bʋnyaa ɛɛ sa ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mʋ mʋ, ɩ gyɛ kesintin wuya, nɩɩ antɩŋɛsa kʋ ɩ man bʋ mʋ tɔ.
Mosesi man sa fanɛ nbara mʋ? Amaa fanɛ ɔkʋ man buu nbara mʋ. Mɩnɛ waa nɩɩ fen biti fan mɔɔ mɛ?”
Nɩɩ sakyɔ mʋ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Nbwɩɩ libi ba bʋ fʋ tɔ. Anɩmʋ ana ii biti fʋ kɩmɔɔ?”
Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N maa waa adangana kʋlʋn kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɩmʋ i kyinkyin fanɛ falɛ.
Mosesi sa fanɛ oduu kɩtɩn
nbara, yɛgɛ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ fɛn tɩn kebii oduu. Kesintin tɔ mʋ nbara mʋ man lɩɩ Mosesi asɛ, amaa ɩ lɩɩ anɛ naana ana asɛ.
Nɩɩ fan maa tɩn kebii oduu kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ, kɛ i mee nyita Mosesi nbara mʋ, mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ n kyɛ nyɩmɩsa laalaamuu kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ nɩɩ fɛn nyɛ agbʋ waa mɛ?
Fan man kɩɩ nyɩmɩsa awaasa kɛ fan bun mʋ kʋpwɛ, amaa fan kɩɩ asɩn mʋ tɔ danbɩrasa pɔyɩ kɛ fan bun kʋpwɛ.”
Nɩɩ Gyerusalem asa akʋ ba piili bɛɛ taasɛ yɛ, “Man gyɛ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ nɩɩ bee biti mʋ yɛ ba mɔɔ mʋ?
Fan kɩɩ, mʋ ɩ yɩlɛ asa tɔ ɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ sɛhn. Abɛɛ abɩlɩsa mʋ ba bɩɩ nɩn fɛɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ Krisito, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ?
Ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ bɩrɛ an nyi katɩn mʋ nu ɔ lɩɩ. Amaa Krisito, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ kan ba mʋ, ɔkʋ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ bɩɩ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ.”

Yesu maa san ɔ bʋ Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa obu lala tɔ ɛɛ kaapʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ kenken yɛ, “Kesintin, fan nyi mɛ, nɩɩ fan nyi katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n lɩɩ. Man gyɛ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ ɔlʋn sʋ nɩɩ n ba nfɩɩ, amaa ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ gyɛ kesintin wuya nɩɩ fanɛɛ fanɛ fan man nyi mʋ.
Amaa mɛɛ mɛ n nyi mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ n lɩɩ mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ mʋ i sun mɛ.”
Kanɩn sʋ ba biti yɛ ba kɩtaa mʋ, amaa ɔkʋ man taa mʋ kɩbaa mata mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ saŋa man pɩɩta fʋʋ.

Ɩmʋ kpini gbaa mʋ asa gaalaagaa ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii sakyɔ mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ bɛɛ taasɛ yɛ, “Nɩɩ Krisito, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ kan ba mʋ, ee biti ɔ taalɛ waa asɩn kyinkyinsa ɔ kyɔ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ waa falɛ?”
Farasii abi mʋ ba nu sakyɔ mʋ ba maa muni falɛ asɩn lɩɩ mʋ sʋ. Nɩɩ ba maa Oseepu bɩlɩsa mʋ ba sun Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa obu lala akɩɩsʋpʋ yɛ ba naa kɩtaa mʋ ba.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N mɛɛ yɛ n bɩla n kyɩna fanɛ asɛ kyɛɛrɛɛ, kɛ n bwii kpee ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ asɛ.
Fen biti fan kɩɩ biti mɛ amaa fan mɛɛ yɛ fan wu mɛ, nɩɩ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n bʋ mʋ, fan mɛɛ taalɛ ba tʋtɔ.”

Nɩɩ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ bɛɛ taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Fɩnɛ nɩɩ kanyɩn nɩmʋ ii biti o kpee nɩɩ a man bɩla yɛ a wu mʋ? Ee biti o kpee Giriki abi tɔ, katɩn mʋ nɩɩ anɛ asa ba yaasɛ loo, kɛ ɔ naa kaapʋ Giriki abi mʋ abɛɛ?
Maa tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Fen biti fan biti mɛ amaa fan mɛɛ yɛ fan wu mɛ, nɩɩ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n bʋ mʋ fan mɛɛ taalɛ ba tʋtɔ mʋ’ mɩnɛ nɩɩ ɛɛ kaapʋ?”
Nɩɩ kakɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ kakɛ kparɛ kensi‐gyii mʋ tɔ mʋ, Yesu kʋsʋ yɩlɛ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ kenken yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ bʋlɩfɔ kan ɔ sʋ mʋ mʋ, ɔ ba mɛ asɛ ba nuu nkyu.
Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii mʋ, nkyu mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ sa nkpa mʋ ii biti ɩ baa ɩ lɩɩ mʋ tɔ ɩɩ kyʋn fɛɛ ɔbʋn, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ mʋ.”

Nkyu mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ sa nkpa asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ nfɩɩ mʋ, yɩlɛ sa Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii mʋ, bee biti ba ba nyɛ. Saŋa maŋa tɔ mʋ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ man pɩɩ ba, lɩɩ fɛɛ Yesu bʋnyaa man pɩɩta lɩɩ ifuli.
Sakyɔ mʋ ba maa nu maa tɔwɛ falɛ asɩn mʋ, bamʋ akʋ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Kesintin tɔ, ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ mʋ.”
Akʋ ba yɛ, “Mʋ ɩ gyɛ Krisito mʋ.” Nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba taasɛ yɛ, “Nɛnɛ nɩɩ Krisito ii biti ɔ lɩɩ Galile?
Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ Krisito ii biti ɔ lɩɩ Owura Dawidi kanan tɔ, kɛ ba kʋʋgɛ mʋ Betilehem kadɛ tɔ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ Owura Dawidi daa kyɩna mʋ”
Lɩɩ kanɩn sʋ nbarɩgɛ tɔ ɩ ba sakyɔ mʋ tɔ lɩɩ Yesu sʋ.
Nɩɩ bamʋ akʋ bee biti ba kɩtaa mʋ, amaa ɔkʋ man taa kɩbaa mata mʋ.
Nɩɩ Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa akɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ ba bwii kpee Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu abɩlɩsa yɛ Farasii abi mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ba taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ waa nɩɩ fan man kɩtaa mʋ ba?”
Nɩɩ akɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Nyɩmɩsa kʋ man pɩɩta tɔwɛ asɩn fɛɛ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ.”
Nɩɩ Farasii abi mʋ ba taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ bɩla pɩna fanɛ gbaa fanɛ?
Fan wu kadɛ nɩmʋ tɔ abɩlɩsa abɛɛ Farasii abi mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ maa kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii? Ayee!
Amaa sakyɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii mʋ bɩrɛ ba man nyi Mosesi nbara mʋ, ɩmʋ sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ nnɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɩla ii biti ɩ ba bamʋ sʋ.”
Nikodemusi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla ba Yesu asɛ kakaakʋ, nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ bamʋ abɩlɩsa mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ mʋ, taasɛ bamʋ yɛ,
“Anɛ nbara ɩɩ sa ɔkpa fɛɛ a taalɛ bun nyɩmɩsa kʋpwɛ yɛgɛ a man nu mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ asɩn wu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa?”
Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ngbaa fʋ, fʋ lɩɩ Galile nɩn? Kɩɩ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ danbɩrasa, fii biti fu wu fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ kʋ man lɩɩ Galile.”
[Nɩɩ ba kʋsʋ ngyaŋɛ mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kpee mʋ ayɛ.]
Ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ maa kyʋn mʋ ayɛ mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu lɩɩ tʋtɔ kpee Olifu kɩbɩɩ mʋ sʋ.
Ɩmʋ lɩɩkaakɛ nyenyenfuu mʋ, Yesu bwii ba Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa obu lala mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ asa ba ba yɩlɛ kyaabɔɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kyʋn kyɩna nɩɩ o piili ɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ.
Maa bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ, nɩɩ nbara akaapʋpʋ yɛ Farasii abi ba bɩya ɔkyɩɩ kilipu kʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba kɩtaa mʋ maa ɔnyɩn. Nɩɩ ba taa mʋ ba yɩlɛ bamʋ nsana.
Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, ba kɩtaa ɔkyɩɩ nɩmʋ maa ɔnyɩn.
Mosesi nbara mʋ ɩɩ kaapʋ anɛ yɛ a tʋʋ abuu mɔɔ kanɩn akyɩɩ maŋa. Nbɩɩnbɩɩ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ fʋ sʋ fɩɩ tɔwɛ.”
Ba taasɛ mʋ asɩn nɩmʋ kɛ ba nu mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ alibi, kɛ ba nyɛ yɩlɛ ɩmʋ sʋ pwɩɩ mʋ.
Amaa Yesu nyɔn mu kumu yii tɔ, taa mʋ kɩbaa‐bi ɛɛ kyʋrɔɔ kasɛ.
Ba maa maa sʋ bɛɛ taasɛ mʋ mʋ, ɔ kʋsaa mu kumu nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man pɩɩta waa alibi mʋ, ɔ gyankpaa tʋʋ kubuu da ɔkyɩɩ mʋ.”
Nɩɩ o bwii nyɔn mu kumu yii tɔ ɛɛ kyʋrɔɔ kasɛ.
Nɩɩ ba maa nu kanɩn mʋ, ba piili bɛɛ lɩɩ kʋkʋlʋn‐kʋkʋlʋn. Abɩlɩsa mʋ ba gyankpaa lɩɩ pɔyɩ. Nɩɩ ɩ san Yesu maa ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nkʋn yɛgɛ ɔ yɩlɛ tʋtɔ.
Nɩɩ Yesu kusaa mu kumu nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkyɩɩ, ba bʋ fɩnɛ? Ɔkʋ man bʋ tɔ kɛ o bun fʋ kʋpwɛ fʋ?”
Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, ayee, ɔkʋ man bʋ tɔ.” Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ngbaa mɛ mɛɛ yɛ n bun fʋ kʋpwɛ. Natɛ, lɩɩ ndaga ɩɩ sʋ ii kpee man bɩla naa waa alibi.”

Nɩɩ Yesu bwii tɔwɛ Farasii abi mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ yɛ, “Mɛ ɩ gyɛ dulinyaa tɔ ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ. Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o buu mɛ mʋ, mɛɛ yɛ ɔ natɛ kitentenbiri tɔ, amaa ee biti ɔ nyɛ ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ sa nkpa mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Farasii abi mʋ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Nbɩɩnbɩɩ, fii gyii fʋ gbaa‐gbaa fʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kesintin nɩn, ɩmʋ sʋ a mɛɛ yɛ a taalɛ kɔɔlɛ fu gyii.”

Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Halɩɩ nɩɩ n gyii mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kesintin gbaa mʋ, mɛ asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ kesintin. Lɩɩ fɛɛ n nyi katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n lɩɩ nɩɩ n nyi katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n kpee. Amaa fanɛɛ fanɛ bɩrɛ, fan man nyi katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n lɩɩ, nɩɩ fan man nyi katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n kpee.
Fanɛ bɩrɛ, nyɩmɩsa ɩkpa sʋ nɩɩ fɛn yɩlɛ sʋ fen gyii asɩn. Mɛɛ mɛ bɩrɛ n mee gyii ɔkʋ asɩn.
Amaa nɩɩ n kan gyii asɩn mʋ, mɛ asɩn kigyii kɩ dɛ ɔkpa, lɩɩ fɛɛ man gyɛ mɛ nkʋn ii gyii asɩn mʋ. Amaa maa Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ.
Ba kyʋrɔɔ fanɛ Nbara tɔ yɛ, nɩɩ asa anyɔ bee gyii kesintin lɩɩ asɩn kʋ sʋ, nɩɩ bamʋ nnɔ ɩ man kpakyarɛ mʋ, bamʋ asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ kesintin.
Mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ ii gyii mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kesintin, nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ gbaa ii gyii mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kesintin.”
Nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ‐sɛ bʋ fɩnɛ?” Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fan man nyi mɛ, nɩɩ fan man nyi Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ gbaa. Nɩɩ fan daa fan nyi mɛ nɩn, naafɔɔ fan bɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ gbaa.”
Yesu tɔwɛ asɩn nɩmʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kaapʋ asɩn Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ, katɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ afulee ɔyɩlɛkpa mʋ. Amaa ɔkʋ man kɩtaa mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ saŋa man pɩɩta fʋʋ.
Nɩɩ Yesu bwii tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N kpee nɩmʋ. Nɩɩ fen biti fan kɩɩ biti mɛ, kɛ fan wu fanɛ alibi tɔ. Nɩɩ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n kpee mʋ fɛn mɛɛ taalɛ ba tʋtɔ.”
Nɩɩ Gyiwu abi mʋ bɛɛ taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Maa tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n kpee mʋ fɛn mɛɛ taalɛ ba tʋtɔ’ mʋ, ee biti ɔ mɔɔ mʋ n‐yɩɩ nɩn abɛɛ?”
Nɩɩ ɔ kyaga sʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan lɩɩ kasɛ sʋ nfɩɩ nɩn, mɛɛ mɛ n lɩɩ sʋsʋ. Nɩɩ fan gyɛ dulinyaa nɩmʋ lɛɛ nɩn, mɛɛ mɛ bɩrɛ n man gyɛ dulinyaa nɩmʋ lɛɛ.
Kanɩn sʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, fen biti fan wu fanɛ alibi tɔ mʋ. Nɩɩ fan man kan kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii yɛ, mɛ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ yɛ n gyɛ mʋ, fen biti fan wu fanɛ alibi tɔ kesintin.”
Nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ anɩmʋ?” Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mɛ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ n dan wʋla n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ n gyɛ mʋ.
N sʋ asɩn gaa n tɔwɛ lɩɩ fanɛ sʋ, kɛ n taa gyii fanɛ asɩn. Amaa ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ gyɛ kesintin wuya, nɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ n nu lɩɩ mʋ asɛ mʋ nkʋn nɩɩ n tɔwɛ n sa dulinyaa abi.”
Ɩmʋ kpini gbaa mʋ ba man pɩɩta bɩɩ fɛɛ Mʋ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ bamʋ.

Ɩmʋ sʋ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fan kan ba kʋsaa mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ sʋsʋ mʋ, tʋtɔ nɩɩ fen biti fan bɩɩ fɛɛ n gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ n wʋla tɔwɛ yɛ n gyɛ mʋ, nɩɩ n mɛɛ waa kʋtɔ kʋ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ ɔlʋn sʋ, amaa asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ kaapʋ mɛ mʋ, ɩmʋ nɩɩ n sʋ n tɔwɛ.
Ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ bʋ mɛ asɛ, ɔ man yɛgɛ mɛ nkʋn, lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa kʋmaa n waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ pɩrɛ mʋ.”
Nɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba nu Yesu maa tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ kpini mʋ gaalaagaa ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii mʋ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fan kan fan buu mɛ asɩn kaapʋsa mʋ, fan gyɛ mɛ abɩɩlapʋ kesintin tɔ.
Nɩɩ fen biti fan bɩɩ kesintin mʋ, kɛ kesintin mʋ ɔ yɛgɛ fan nyɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ.”
Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “An gyɛ Abraham kɩnaana tɔ asa nɩn. Nɩɩ anɛɛnɛ bɩrɛ, kakaakʋ a man pɩɩta waa ɔkʋ kɩnyɛ. Nɩɩ mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ an biti a nyɛ anɛ n‐yɩɩ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa alibi mʋ gyɛ kɩnyɛ sa alibi nɩn.
Nɩɩ kɩnyɛ man gyɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ o tii kɩkpaara abi sʋ, amaa obii bɩrɛ gyɛ kɩkpaara mʋ sʋ obii kakpaa.
Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɔkʋ nyɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ mʋ, kesintin tɔ ɔ nyɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kakpaa.
N nyi fan maa gyɛ Abraham anaana‐bii. Amaa ɩnɩmʋ kpini gbaa mʋ, fen biti fɛɛ fan mɔɔ mɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fɛn mɛɛ kɔɔlɛ mɛ asɩn mʋ fɛn waa fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ.
Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ kaapʋ mɛ mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ falɛ. Nɩɩ fanɛɛ fanɛ fɛn waa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ fan nu lɩɩ fanɛ‐sɛ asɛ.”
Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Anɛ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Abraham.” Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan daa fan gyɛ Abraham mu‐bii ana kesintin tɔ nɩn, naafɔɔ fen biti fan waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa mʋ.
Amaa n maa tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin mʋ nɩɩ n nu lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ gbaa mʋ, fen biti fan mɔɔ mɛ. Abraham man waa falɛ atɔ.
Atɔ mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ‐sɛ waa mʋ, nɩɩ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fɛn waa.” Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “A man gyɛ akuyurubi, ɔsɛ kʋlʋn nɩɩ an sʋ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ daa ɔ gyɛ fanɛ‐Sɛ nɩn, naafɔɔ fen biti fan nyɛ kebiti sa mɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ n lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ nɩn, nɩɩ n ba nfɩɩ. Man gyɛ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ ɔlʋn sʋ nɩɩ n ba, amaa mʋ i sun mɛ.
Nɩɩ mɩnɛ waa sʋ nɩɩ fen mee nu mɛ asɩn tɔwɛsa mʋ kasɛ? Lɩɩ fɛɛ fɛn mɛɛ taalɛ fen nu mɛ asɩn mʋ.

Fan gyɛ fanɛ‐sɛ Sɩtaanɛ mu‐bii ana nɩn, ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan waa fanɛ‐sɛ mʋ kɔkɔlɔ biti. Lɩɩ npiili asɛ mʋ kpini nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ ɔmɔɔpʋ, nɩɩ ɔ man buu kesintin, lɩɩ fɛɛ kesintin man bʋ mʋ tɔ. Mʋ lɛɛ kpini ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ ɔ tɔwɛ antɩŋɛsa, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ gyɛ antɩŋɛsa wuya, yɛ antɩŋɛsa wuya ana bamʋ‐sɛ.
Amaa mɛɛ mɛ bɩrɛ n gyii fanɛ kesintin nɩn, ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ fɛɛ mɛɛ kɔɔlɛ mɛ fen gyii.
Fanɛ tɔ anɩmʋ ɩ taalɛ kaapʋ fɛɛ n gyii alibi kʋpwɛ? Nɩɩ n maa tɔwɛ kesintin mʋ, mɩnɛ waa nɩɩ fɛn mɛɛ kɔɔlɛ fen gyii?
Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mʋ, ii nu asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ. Kʋtɔ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ fen mee nu Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ fan man gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ.”
Nɩɩ Gyiwu abi mʋ mɔɔ ba tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Nɩɩ a maa tɔwɛ yɛ fʋ gyɛ Kasamariya‐nyɩn nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi ba tɛ fʋ tɔ mʋ, ɩ man gyɛ kesintin?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ “Nbwɩɩ libi akʋ ba man tɛ mɛ tɔ, amaa n bʋnyaa mɛ‐Sɛ, yɛgɛ fanɛɛ fanɛ fɛn mɛɛ bʋnyaa mɛ.
N mee biti bʋnyaa n sa mɛ n‐yɩɩ. Amaa ɔkʋ bʋ tɔ ee biti kɩmʋ ɛɛ sa mɛ. Mʋ ɩ gyɛ asɩn ogyipu mʋ.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o buu mɛ kɩkaapʋ mʋ, ɔ mɛɛ yɛ o wu kakaakʋ.”

Nɩɩ Gyiwu abi mʋ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nbɩɩnbɩɩ an wu kesintin tɔ fɛɛ nbwɩɩ libi ba bʋ fʋ tɔ. Abraham wu, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ gbaa ba wu. Amaa fʋ, fʋ tɔwɛ yɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o buu fʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ ɔ mɛɛ yɛ o wu.
Ɩmʋ sʋ fii biti fʋ kaapʋ fɛɛ fʋ kyɔ anɛ‐sɛ Abraham abɛɛ? O wu, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ gbaa ba wu. Anɩmʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ fʋ gyɛ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Nɩɩ n kan sa mɛ n‐yɩɩ bʋnyaa mʋ, mɛ bʋnyaa mʋ gyɛ kɩyan. Amaa mɛ‐Sɛ, mʋ nɩɩ fɛn tɔwɛ yɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ fanɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ bʋnyaa mɛ.
Fan man nyi mʋ, mɛɛ mɛ bɩrɛ n nyi mʋ. Nɩɩ n kan n tɔwɛ yɛ n man n nyi mʋ mʋ, n gyɛ antɩŋɛsa wuya fɛɛ fanɛ, amaa n nyi mʋ, nɩɩ n nu mʋ asɛ.
Fanɛ‐sɛ Abraham mu ansi i gyii fɛɛ ee biti o wu mɛ kɩba. Nɩɩ o wu mɛ kɩba mʋ, nɩɩ mu ansi i gyii.”
Nɩɩ Gyiwu abi mʋ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ man pɩɩta gyii nsu adunuu nɩɩ fʋ yɛ fu wu Abraham?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, pɔyɩ kɛ ba kʋʋgɛ Abraham mʋ, yɛgɛ n bʋ tɔ.”
Ba maa nu falɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ba kukuri abuu yɛ ba tʋʋ mʋ. Amaa Yesu loo asa mʋ tɔ bʋlɛ, nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ kyʋn.
Yesu maa naa ɛɛ kyʋn mʋ, o wu ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ gyaatanapʋ lɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ mʋ.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu abɩɩlapʋ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ gyaatanapʋ? Mʋ gbaa‐gbaa alibi sʋ abɛɛ mʋ akʋʋgɛpʋ alibi sʋ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mʋ kɩgyatana mʋ, ɩ man lɩɩ mu alibi sʋ abɛɛ mʋ akʋʋgɛpʋ alibi sʋ. Amaa ɩ waa kanɩn nɩn kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ yɛgɛ asa ba wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ waa asɩn kyinkyinsa sa mʋ.
Kyɔwɛ maa dan san ɔ bʋ tɔ falɛ bɩrɛ, ɩ dagaa a maa waa ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mu kusun. Kyɔwɛ ii biti ɔ lʋwɛ yɛgɛ ɔkʋ mɛɛ bɩla taalɛ sun kusun.
N maa dan san n bʋ dulinyaa tɔ falɛ bɩrɛ, mɛ ɩ gyɛ dulinyaa tɔ ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ.”
Yesu maa tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tʋʋ nkyɔlɛ tʋʋ kasɛ nɩɩ ɔ palɛ ɩsɛ, taa tayɩ ɔnyɩn mu ansi sʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ yɛ, “Kpe Silom kapatɩyɛ mʋ tɔ naa fwɩɩ fu ansi.” (Silom kasɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ ba sun mʋ). Ɔnyɩn mʋ maa naa fwɩɩ mu ansi bwii ba mʋ, mu ansi mʋ a bugi.
Mʋ bɩrɩsa ana yɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba wʋla be nyi mʋ maa kyɩna ɔkpa asɛ ɛɛ kʋlɛ mʋ, bɛɛ taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Man gyɛ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ ɩɩ kyɩna ɔkpa asɛ ɛɛ kʋlɛ mʋ?”
Nɩɩ bamʋ akʋ ba yɛ, “Mʋ nɩn.”
Nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba yɛ, “Man gyɛ mʋ nɩn, o duli mʋ nɩn.”
Amaa ɔnyɩn mʋ gbaa‐gbaa tɔwɛ yɛ, “Mɛ nɩn.”
Nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɩ waa nɛnɛ nɩɩ fu ansi i bugi?”

Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Yesu mʋ, ɩ palɛ ɩsɛ tayɩ mi ansi sʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ n kpee Silom kapatɩyɛ mʋ tɔ naa fwɩɩ mi ansi. Ɩmʋ sʋ n kpee tʋtɔ naa fwɩɩ mi ansi, nɩɩ opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ mi ansi i bugi.”
Nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn mʋ bʋ fɩnɛ?” Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N man nyi.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba taa ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ mu ansi i bugi mʋ kpee Farasii abi mu ansi tɔ.
Kanɩn kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu palɛ ɩsɛ tayɩ kanɩn ɔnyɩn ansi sʋ mʋ, gyɛ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa nɩn.
Nɩɩ Farasii abi mʋ mɔɔ ba taasɛ mʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa nɩɩ mu ansi i bugi. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɔ palɛ ɩsɛ nɩn tayɩ mi ansi sʋ, nɩɩ n naa fwɩɩ, nɩɩ mi ansi i bugi.”

Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Farasii abi mʋ akʋ ba yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa kanɩn asɩn maŋa mʋ, man lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ o mee buu kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa nbara mʋ.” Amaa akʋ mɔɔ ba yɛ, “Nɛnɛ nɩɩ alibi ɔwaapʋ ɩ taalɛ waa asɩn kyinkyinsa falɛ kudubi?” Nɩɩ nbarɩgɛ ɩ ba bamʋ nsana.
Ɩnɩmʋ kpini kamaa mʋ, Farasii abi mʋ ba bwii taasɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ o bugi fu ansi mʋ, mɩnɛ asɩn nɩɩ fʋ sʋ fʋ tɔwɛ lɩɩ mʋ sʋ?”
Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ nɩn.”
Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ be mee biti ba kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ ɔ wʋla ɔ gyɛ gyaatanapʋ, nɩɩ mu ansi i bugi, ɩmʋ sʋ ba sun tɩɩ mʋ akʋʋgɛpʋ.
Ba maa ba mʋ, ba taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ‐bii‐nyɩnsa ndee? Fan yɛ fan kʋʋgɛ mʋ gyaatanapʋ nɩn, nɛnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ?”
Nɩɩ mʋ akʋʋgɛpʋ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “An nyi maa gyɛ anɛ‐bii‐nyɩnsa nɩn, nɩɩ an kʋʋgɛ mʋ gyaatanapʋ nɩn.
Amaa a man nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa nɩɩ mu ansi ɩ kɩɩ, abɛɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ o bugi mu ansi. Ɔ man bɩla ɔ gyɛ kebii, ɩmʋ sʋ fan taasɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa, ɛɛ taalɛ lɛɛ kɔnɔ.”

Kʋtɔ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ kanɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ ba sɩlɛ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ. Kpalɩ fɛɛ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ ba wʋla tɔwɛ yɩla yɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ lɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ Yesu ɩ gyɛ Krisito, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ mʋ, bɛɛ gya mʋ ba lɛɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa obu mʋ tɔ.
Kanɩn sʋ nɩɩ mʋ akʋʋgɛpʋ mʋ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔ man bɩla ɔ gyɛ kebii, fan taasɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mu.”

Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ ba bwii tɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ naafɔɔ ɔ gyɛ gyaatanapʋ mʋ kɩnyɔsapʋ, nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Bɔ Ɩbwaarɛ fɛɛ kesintin nɩɩ fɩɩ tɔwɛ. An nyi fɛɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ o bugi fu ansi mʋ gyɛ alibi ɔwaapʋ nɩn.”
Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mɛɛ mɛ man nyi yɛ ɔ gyɛ alibi ɔwaapʋ abɛɛ ɔ man gyɛ. Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n nyi mʋ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, n kyɩna n gyɛ gyaatanapʋ, amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ n kɩɩ.”
Nɩɩ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ ba bɩla taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nɩɩ ɔ waa fʋ? Nɛnɛ nɩɩ ɔ waa kyɛ fu ansi?”
Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N wʋla tɔwɛ fanɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ ba, nɩɩ fan kina kunu. Mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan bwii nu kɩnyɔsapʋ? Abɛɛ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fen biti fɛɛ fan biliŋi mʋ abɩɩlapʋ nɩn?”
Nɩɩ ba saalɛ mʋ, tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ mu obuupu, amaa anɛɛnɛ bɩrɛ an gyɛ Mosesi abuupu nɩn.
An nyi ɩmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ maa kyɩna tɔwɛ Mosesi asɛ, amaa kanɩn Yesu maŋa bɩrɛ, a man nyi mʋ ɔlɩɩkpa!”
Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ alɩmankarɛ nɩɩ fɛn tɔwɛ kanɩn! Fan yɛ fan man nyi katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ, amaa mʋ i bugi mi ansi falɛ.
An nyi yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mee nu alibi awaapʋ asɛ. Amaa asa mʋ nɩɩ bee sun Ɩbwaarɛ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa mʋ kɔkɔlɔ biti mʋ, bamʋ asɛ nɩɩ ee nu.
Lɩɩ koo saŋa mʋ nɩɩ dulinyaa piili mʋ, a man pɩɩta nu fɛɛ ɔsa kʋ bugi nyɩmɩsa mʋ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ mʋ gyaatanapʋ ansi.
Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ man dɩn lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ mʋ, naafɔɔ ɔ man dɩn taalɛ waa ɩnɩmʋ.”
Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Kɩɩ, fʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ fʋ alibi tɔ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ fʋ ii biti fʋ ba kaapʋ anɛ asɩn?” Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba gya mʋ lɛɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa obu mʋ tɔ.
Yesu maa nu yɛ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ ba gya ɔnyɩn mʋ lɛɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa obu mʋ tɔ kanɩn mʋ, ɔ naa wu mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fɩɩ kɔɔlɛ Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ fii gyii.”
Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ anɩmʋ? Tɔwɛ mɛ kɛ n kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ tɛɛ wʋla wu mʋ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ fʋ asɛ nbɩɩnbɩɩ falɛ.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Mɛ‐nyɩrɩpɛ, n kɔɔlɛ fu gyii.” Nɩɩ ɔ kyʋn muŋa Yesu ayaa tɔ.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “N ba dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ kɛ n ba gyii asa asɩn, kɛ agyaatanapʋ ansi i bugi, kɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kɩɩ mʋ, mɔɔ ba biliŋi agyaatanapʋ.”
Farasii abi mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ tʋtɔ, nɩɩ ba nu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ, ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ anɛ gbaa anɛ an gyɛ agyaatanapʋ nɩn abɛɛ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fan kan fan gyɛ agyaatanapʋ bɩrɛ, naafɔɔ fan mɛɛ yɛ fan gyii alibi kʋpwɛ. Amaa fan maa tɔwɛ yɛ fan kɩɩ falɛ bɩrɛ, fan gyii alibi kʋpwɛ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ, ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ bɔla nbʋlʋpʋ kubunlun kebunɔ mʋ tɔ ee loo, nɩɩ ɔ naa bɔla opula pʋpwɛ loo to mʋ, gyɛ oyu yɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee yuuri ɔlʋn sʋ.
Amaa ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ bɔla kebunɔ ee loo mʋ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ ɔkpapʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔkpapʋ mʋ kan ba mʋ, kebunɔ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ ii tigi sa mʋ, nɩɩ ee loo to. Ɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ maa mʋ kɩtɩɩ, nɩɩ nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ be nyi mʋ ɔbʋlɛ, nɩɩ ɛɛ lɩɩ gyankpaa bamʋ.
Ɔkpapʋ mʋ maa tɛɛ lɛɛ bamʋ kpini lɩɩ kubunlun mʋ tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɛɛ kyʋn gyankpaa bamʋ yɛgɛ bee buu mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ be nyi mʋ ɔbʋlɛ.
Amaa ba mɛɛ yɛ ba buu ɔfɔ, bee biti ba sɩlɛ yɛgɛ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba man nyi mʋ ɔbʋlɛ.”
Yesu bɔ bamʋ kɩŋasan kɩnɩmʋ nɩn, amaa ba man nu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ bamʋ mʋ kasɛ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ Yesu bwii tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ mɛ ɩ gyɛ nbʋlʋpʋ kubunlun kebunɔ mʋ.
Bamʋ nɩɩ ba gyankpaa mɛ ba mʋ kpini, nɩɩ ba waa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ nbʋlʋpʋ akpapʋ mʋ, ba gyɛ ayu yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bee yuuri ɔlʋn sʋ, kanɩn sʋ nɩɩ nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ ba man nu bamʋ asɛ mʋ.
Mɛ ɩ gyɛ kebunɔ mʋ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɔla mɛ sʋ loo mʋ, ii biti ɔ nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ. Mʋ kɩlɩɩ kpee yɛ mʋ kibwii ba mʋ ɛɛ nyɛ agyitɔ o gyii.
Oyu bɩrɛ, mʋ lɛɛ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ o be yuuri, kɛ ɔ mɔɔ, kɛ o nyita. Amaa mɛɛ mɛ n ba nɩn kɛ asa ba nyɛ nkpa, kɛ ba nyɛ ɩmʋ kʋkyɔ‐kʋkyɔ.
“Mɛ ɩ gyɛ nbʋlʋpʋ ɔkpapʋ danbɩrasa mʋ. Mɛ, nbʋlʋpʋ ɔkpapʋ danbɩrasa mʋ n taa mɛ nkpa sa nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ halɩɩ lewu tɔ.

Paa ogyipu bɩrɛ, ɔ man du fɛɛ nbʋlʋpʋ ɔkpapʋ danbɩrasa mʋ. Nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ ba maa man gyɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ lɛɛ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kan wu fɛɛ kuntun ɩɩ ba mʋ, ɛɛ sɩlɛ yɛgɛ nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ nɩn, kɛ kuntun mʋ ɔ ba kɩtaa bamʋ ɔkʋ kɛ ɔ yaasɛ asansa.
Kʋtɔ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ sɩlɛ ɛɛ yɛgɛ nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, ɔ gyɛ paa ogyipu nɩn, bamʋ asɩn ɩ man tiri mʋ.
“Mɛ ɩ gyɛ nbʋlʋpʋ ɔkpapʋ danbɩrasa mʋ. N nyi mɛ nbʋlʋpʋ, nɩɩ mɛ nbʋlʋpʋ gbaa be nyi mɛ.
Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ mu nyi mɛ, nɩɩ ngbaa mɛ n nyi Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ, ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ n biti n taa mɛ nkpa sa mɛ nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ halɩɩ lewu tɔ.
N san n sʋ nbʋlʋpʋ akʋ nɩɩ mʋ ba man bʋ nbʋlʋpʋ anɩmʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ ii tiri fɛɛ n naa taa bamʋ gbaa ba. Bee biti ba be nu mɛ ɔbʋlɛ, kɛ bamʋ kpini ba ba waa kʋbʋ kʋlʋn yɛ ɔkpapʋ kʋlʋn.
Kʋtɔ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ ii biti mɛ asɩn ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, n kyula yɛ n taa mɛ nkpa sa halɩɩ lewu tɔ, kɛ n bɩla bwii nyɛ kɩmʋ.

Ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ kɔɔlɛ mɛ nkpa lɩɩ mɛ abaa tɔ. Amaa mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mi kebiti tɔ nɩɩ n kyula yɛ n wu. N sʋ ɔkpa fɛɛ n taa mɛ nkpa sa halɩɩ lewu tɔ, kɛ n bɩla bwii nyɛ kɩmʋ. Falɛ kɔnɔsa kanɩmʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ sa mɛ yɛ n waa.”
Asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ falɛ sʋ mʋ, nbarɩgɛ ɩ bɩla bwii ba Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ tɔ.
Asa mʋ tɔ gaalaagaa bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nbwɩɩ libi ba bʋ mʋ tɔ, ɛɛ lɔ ɩbʋn. Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fen nu mʋ asɛ?”
Amaa bamʋ akʋ mɔɔ ba yɛ, “Ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi ba bʋ mʋ tɔ mʋ, mɛɛ tɔwɛ falɛ ntɔwɛ nɩmʋ. Nɛnɛ nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi ɩ taalɛ bugi gyaatanapʋ ansi?”
Nɩɩ saŋa fʋʋ fɛɛ Gyiwu abi ba gyii Kesu kɔnɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ nyiŋi saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba bugi Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ Gyerusalem kadɛ tɔ mʋ. Saŋa maŋa ɩ gyɛ awɔɔ tɔ nɩn,
nɩɩ Yesu bʋ Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ, yɛgɛ ɔ naa katɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Owura Solomon kasɔrɔga mʋ tɔ.

Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ ba yɩlɛ kyaabɔɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Saŋa mɔɔ nɩɩ fii biti fɛɛ a gyoo naa fʋʋ, pɔyɩ kɛ a wu asɩn mʋ tɔ kyɛɛkyɛɛ? Nɩɩ fʋ ɩ kan fʋ gyɛ Krisito, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ, dan tiisi tɔwɛ anɛ kesintin.”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N wʋla tɔwɛ fanɛ, amaa fan man kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii. Asɩn kyinkyinsa mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ n waa Mɛ‐Sɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ mʋ, ɩmʋ ii gyii mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kesintin.
Amaa fan man kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan maa man gyɛ mɛ nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ sʋ.
Mɛ nbʋlʋpʋ bee nyi mɛ ɔbʋlɛ, nɩɩ n nyi bamʋ, nɩɩ bee buu mɛ.
N sa bamʋ nkpa kakpaa, nɩɩ ba mɛɛ yɛ ba fɔyɩ. Nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ bɩɩtɛ bamʋ kɔɔlɛ lɩɩ mɛ abaa tɔ.
Mɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa bamʋ sa mɛ mʋ, kyɔ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ, ɩmʋ sʋ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ bɩɩtɛ bamʋ kɔɔlɛ lɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ abaa tɔ.
N maa Mɛ‐Sɛ an gyɛ kʋkʋlʋn nɩn.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Gyiwu abi ba bɩla naa taa abuu kɛ ba tʋʋ mʋ.
Amaa nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N waa asɩn kyinkyinsa damantɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ asɛ kaapʋ fanɛ. Ɩmʋ ɩmɔɔ sʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan tʋʋ mɛ abuu?”

Nɩɩ Gyiwu abi mʋ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Man gyɛ asɩn kyinkyinsa damantɛ mʋ nɩɩ fʋ waa sʋ nɩɩ an biti a tʋʋ fʋ abuu. Amaa fʋ tɔwɛ nbusaa asɩn yii Ɩbwaarɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ gyɛ nyɩmɩsa nɩn, nɩɩ fɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ fʋ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan man nyi ba maa kyʋrɔɔ waa fanɛ Nbara mʋ tɔ yɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ, ‘Fan gyɛ mɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ mɛ kedubi’?
An nyi fɛɛ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ kyɛɛgɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ. Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla tɔwɛ bamʋ nɩɩ mʋ asɩn ɩ ba bamʋ asɛ mʋ yɛ ba gyɛ mu keduli mʋ, mɛɛ mɛ bɩrɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ lɛɛ mɛ nɩɩ o sun mɛ ba dulinyaa tɔ.
Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fɛn yɛ n tɔwɛ nbusaa asɩn yii Ɩbwaarɛ, fɛɛ maa tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘N gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ’?
Nɩɩ n mɛɛ kan n waa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ ii biti fɛɛ n waa mʋ, kanɩn bɩrɛ fan man kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii.
Amaa nɩɩ n kan waa ɩmʋ bɩrɛ, nɩɩ halɩɩ fan man kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii gbaa mʋ, fan kɔɔlɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ n waa mʋ kpini gyii, kɛ fan nyɛ bɩɩ fɛɛ n maa Mɛ‐Sɛ an gyɛ kʋkʋlʋn.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ asa mʋ ba biti fɛɛ ba kɩtaa mʋ, amaa ɔ bʋlɛ bamʋ tɔ lɩɩ kyʋn.
Nɩɩ Yesu bwii naa faa Gyɔdan ɔbʋn kpee kɩmʋ benben, opula mʋ nɩɩ Gyɔn kyɩna gyee asa Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee mʋ. Ɔ maa bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ,
nɩɩ asa damantɛ ba ba mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Halɩɩ Gyɔn maa man waa asɩn kyinkyinsa ɩkʋ gbaa mʋ, kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ lɩɩ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, kpini gyɛ kesintin.”
Nɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ gaalaagaa ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii.
Ɔnyɩn kʋ ɩ kyɩna ɔ bʋ tɔ, nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Lasarusi, nɩɩ ɔ dɛ ɛɛ lɔɔ. Mʋ pɩɩkyɩɩ ana ɩ gyɛ Mɛɛrɩ yɛ Mata, nɩɩ bamʋ kpini ba lɩɩ Betani kadɛ tɔ.
Mɛɛrɩ nɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔkyɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyɩna ɔ ba kyɛɛgɛ tulale wʋrɩgɛ Yesu ayaa sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ inyini bʋnswɩɩsa mʋ kpayɩ‐kpayɩ ɩmʋ mʋ. Mʋ pɩɩnyɩn ɩ gyɛ Lasarusi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ dɛ ɛɛ lɔ mʋ.
Nɩɩ mʋ pɩɩkyɩɩ ana ba sun Yesu asɛ naa tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, fʋ kyɛmɩnɛ danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sʋ kebiti sa mʋ mʋ, dɛ ɛɛ lɔ.”
Yesu maa nu ɩnɩmʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Kʋlɔ kɩnɩmʋ man gyɛ lewu kʋlɔ. Ii biti ɩ bɩya Ɩbwaarɛ bʋnyaa nɩn, kɛ mɛ, Mu‐Bii mʋ n nyɛ bʋnyaa lɩɩ ɩmʋ sʋ.”
Yesu sʋ kebiti sa Mata maa Mɛɛrɩ yɛ bamʋ pɩɩnyɩn Lasarusi.
Amaa maa nu fɛɛ Lasarusi ɩɩ lɔ mʋ, o bwii kyɩna katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ mʋ nkɛ nnyɔ tii sʋ.
Ɩmʋ kamaa mʋ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ a bwii kpee Gyudeya ɔsʋwʋlɛ.”
Nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ. “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, nkɛ nnyɔ nɩmʋ tɔ nɩɩ Gyiwu abi bee biti ba tʋʋ fʋ abuu mɔɔ, mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ bɩla fii kpee tʋtɔ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Man gyɛ kerefi kudu anyɔ ɩ bʋ kayɩkɛ tɔ? Nyɩmɩsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ naa kayɩkɛ tɔ mʋ mee siti, lɩɩ fɛɛ kyɔwɛ kɩɩ tɔ ɛɛ sa mʋ katɩn kʋmaa.
Amaa nɩɩ ɔ natɛ kagyanbwɛ bɩrɛ ee siti, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ man sʋ ɩŋmaŋɛsa.”
Maa tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Anɛ kyɛmɩnɛ Lasarusi dɛ nsɩɩrɛ nɩn, amaa n biti n kpee tʋtɔ n naa kyiŋi mʋ.”
Nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, nɩɩ ɔ kan dɛ nsɩɩrɛ bɩrɛ, ee biti ɔ nyɛ alanfɩya.”
Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu ɩɩ kaapʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ Lasarusi wu, amaa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ bɩrɛ be nyi nɩn fɛɛ nsɩɩrɛ gbaa‐gbaa asɩn nɩɩ ɔ dɩyɛ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ tɔwɛ tigi bamʋ yɛ, “Lasarusi wu.
Amaa lɩɩ fanɛ sʋ mʋ, mi ansi i gyii fɛɛ n maa man bʋ tʋtɔ nɩɩ o wu. Ɩnɩmʋ ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ kɛ fan nyɛ kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii. Kanɩn sʋ fan yɛgɛ a kpee mʋ asɛ.”
Nɩɩ Tomasi mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ Kabwaara‐bii mʋ, tɔwɛ abɩɩlapʋ asansa mʋ yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ anɛ gbaa anɛ a kpee kɛ anaa mʋ a naa wu.”
Yesu maa fʋʋ Betani kadɛ tɔ mʋ, o nu yɛ ba tee pula Lasarusi ɩmʋ nkɛ nna.
Lɩɩ Betani kpee Gyerusalem man bʋ kata, ɩ waa fɛɛ ɩmaalɩ ɩnyɔ,
nɩɩ Gyiwu abi mʋ gaalaagaa ba ba Mata maa Mɛɛrɩ asɛ, ba ba tɔwɛ yuula bamʋ nkɔlɔ lɩɩ bamʋ pɩɩnyɩn kelewu sʋ.
Mata maa nu fɛɛ Yesu ɩɩ ba mʋ, ɔ lɩɩ naa gyaŋa mʋ ɔkpa tɔ, amaa Mɛɛrɩ bɩrɛ o sii kɩkpaara sʋ.
Mata maa gyaŋa mʋ mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, fʋ daa fʋ bʋ nfɩɩ nɩn, naafɔɔ mɛ pɩɩnyɩn man dɩn wu.
Amaa halɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ gbaa n nyi yɛ, kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ taasɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, ee biti ɔ waa sa fʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ pɩɩnyɩn ii biti o bwii kyiŋi ba nkpa tɔ.”
Mata lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N nyi yɛ ee biti o kyiŋi ba nkpa tɔ kakɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti o kyiŋi asa ba nkpa tɔ mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɛ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ n kyiŋi asa n lɩɩ lewu tɔ, nɩɩ ɛɛ sa bamʋ nkpa mʋ. Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii mʋ, halɩɩ o wu gbaa ee biti ɔ nyɛ nkpa.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ nkpa tɔ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii mʋ, ɔ mɛɛ yɛ o wu kakɛ akʋ. Fʋ kɔɔlɛ ɩnɩmʋ gyii?”
Nɩɩ Mata kyula yɛ, “Ɛɛhn! Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ n kɔɔlɛ gyii yɛ fʋ ɩ gyɛ Krisito, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ ee biti o sun mʋ ba dulinyaa tɔ mʋ.”
Maa tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, o bwii kpee kɩkpaara sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ naa tɩɩ mu‐supu Mɛɛrɩ lɩɩ ɩkaa sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ mʋ bʋ nfɩɩ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ fʋ sʋ.”
Mɛɛrɩ maa nu kanɩn mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kʋsʋ bilen ee kpee mʋ asɛ.
Yesu man pɩɩta loo kadɛ mʋ tɔ, amaa ɔ san ɔ bʋ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ Mata naa gyaŋa mʋ mʋ.
Gyiwu abi mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Mɛɛrɩ asɛ kɩkpaara sʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ bee yuula mʋ kɔkɔlɔ mʋ, ba maa wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kʋsʋ bilen lɩɩ kewu mʋ, ba lɩɩ buu mʋ, be nyi fɛɛ ee kpee kakyan mʋ asɛ ɔ naa kyɩna saawʋ.
Mɛɛrɩ maa fʋʋ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ Yesu bʋ, nɩɩ o wu mʋ mʋ, o muŋa mʋ ayaa tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ fʋ daa fʋ bʋ nfɩɩ nɩn, naafɔɔ mɛ pɩɩnyɩn man dɩn wu.”
Yesu maa wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ Mɛɛrɩ yɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ nɩɩ ba buu mʋ mʋ bee su mʋ, ɩ kɔ mʋ nɩɩ i duŋi mʋ ɔbʋlɛ tɔ.
Nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fɩnɛ nɩɩ fan pula mʋ?”
Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, ba kɩɩ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu su.
Nɩɩ Gyiwu abi mʋ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan kɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kebiti sa mʋ.”
Amaa bamʋ tɔ akʋ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Man gyɛ Yesu nɩmʋ i bugi agyaatanapʋ ansi mʋ? Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ ɔ man taalɛ kɔɔlɛ Lasarusi kɛ ɔ man wu?”
Yesu ɔbʋlɛ tɔ bwii duŋi mʋ, nɩɩ o kpee kakyan mʋ asɛ. Kɩ gyɛ kɩfʋlɛbɔ nɩn, nɩɩ ba taa kubuu tii kɩmʋ kɔnɔ.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan tigi kubuu mʋ lɩɩ tʋtɔ.”
Nɩɩ Mata, olewupu mʋ pɩɩkyɩɩ mʋ tɔwɛ yɛ “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, ee biti ɔ ba ɛɛ lɩɩsɔn, ndaga nkɛ nna nɩmʋ a maa pula mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ Mata yɛ, “N man tɔwɛ fʋ yɛ nɩɩ fʋ kan kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ, fii biti fu wu Ɩbwaarɛ bʋnyaa?”
Ɩmʋ sʋ ba tigi kubuu mʋ. Nɩɩ Yesu kɩɩ sʋsʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nsɛ, n fwaala fʋ fɛɛ fʋ maa nu mɛ kɩkʋlɛ.
N nyi saŋa kʋmaa fii nu mɛ kɩkʋlɛ, amaa asa mʋ nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ nfɩɩ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ kanɩn, kɛ ba nyɛ kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ fu i sun mɛ.”
Maa tɔwɛ kanɩn lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ o kuusi kenken yɛ, “Lasarusi, lɩɩ ba!”
Nɩɩ olewupu mʋ lɩɩ ba, yɛgɛ taafuli mili mʋ abaa yɛ ayaa sʋ, yɛgɛ kikyibi fufuli ŋmina mu ansi sʋ.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan saŋɛ mʋ kɛ ɔ natɛ.”
Gyiwu abi adamantɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba ba Mɛɛrɩ afwaala, nɩɩ ba wu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu waa mʋ, ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii.
Amaa bamʋ akʋ ba kpee Farasii abi asɛ naa tɔwɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu waa.
Ɩmʋ sʋ aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ Farasii abi ba tɩɩ kadɛ mʋ tɔ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa amu‐amu ngyaŋɛ.
Nɩɩ ba taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nɩɩ an biti a waa. Fan kɩɩ asɩnkaala yɛ asɩn kyinkyinsa damantɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ ɩɩ waa falɛ.”
An kan yɛgɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kyaga sʋ ɛɛ waa kanɩn mʋ, ɔsa kʋmaa nɩmʋ ii biti ɔ kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii, kɛ ɩ yɛgɛ Roma abi
ba ba nyita anɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ nɩmʋ kɛ ba mɔɔ anɛ asa.
Nɩɩ bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Kayifasi nɩɩ ɔ kyɩna ɔ gyɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ kesu maŋa tɔ mʋ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan man nyi sɛhn!
Fan man nyi yɛ, ɩ bɔ sa fanɛ fɛɛ nyɩmɩsa kʋlʋn o wu sa asa kpini, ɩ kyɔ fɛɛ anɛ asa kpini ba maa muuri?”

Kesintin tɔ man gyɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mu kebiti tɔ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ. Amaa maa gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ kanɩn kesu maŋa tɔ sʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɩla yɛ Yesu ii biti o wu sa Gyiwu abi kpini.
Nɩɩ man gyɛ Gyiwu abi nkʋn, amaa yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii ana mʋ nɩɩ ba yaasɛ tɔ ba bʋ dulinyaa tɔ katɩn kʋmaa nɩmʋ mʋ, kɛ ba ba bʋga waa kʋkʋlʋn.
Ɩmʋ sʋ lɩɩ kanɩn kakɛ maŋa Gyiwu abɩlɩsa ba ŋmina yɛ ba mɔɔ Yesu.

Lɩɩ kanɩn sʋ Yesu man bɩla lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ ifuli ɛɛ natɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ tɔ. Amaa ɔ lɩɩ Gyerusalem kpee bɛɛ tɩɩ kɩmʋ yɛ Efarim kadɛ mʋ, nɩɩ kɩ bʋ tiri kiperi sʋ mʋ. Nɩɩ maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba naa kyɩna tʋtɔ.

Gyiwu abi Kesu kɔnɔ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ kensi‐gyii saŋa maa tiri tɔ mʋ, asa gaalaagaa ba lɩɩ bamʋ ndɛ sʋ kpee Gyerusalem. Ba gyankpaa nɩn ba naa fwɩɩ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ ineesi fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba wʋla bɛɛ waa, pɔyɩ kɛ bamʋ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ kakɛ mʋ kɩ fʋʋ.
Asa mʋ bɛɛ kɩɩ bee biti Yesu. Nɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ asɛ mʋ, bɛɛ taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩ gyɛ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ? Fen nyi fɛɛ ee biti ɔ ba Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ ngyaŋɛ nɩmʋ tɔ?”
Ɩmʋ gbaa mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu yɛ Farasii abi mʋ ba wʋla sa kɔnɔ yɛ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o wu katɩn mʋ nɩɩ Yesu bʋ mʋ, ɔ ba tɔwɛ bamʋ kɛ ba nyɛ kɩtaa mʋ.
Ɩ maa san fɛɛ nkɛ nsiye kɛ ba gyii Kesu kɔnɔ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ lala mʋ, Yesu kpee Betani kadɛ tɔ. Tʋtɔ ɩ gyɛ Lasarusi mʋ nɩɩ Yesu daa kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ ayɛ.
Nɩɩ ba waa agyitɔ kɩtaa Yesu kɩfɔ. Mata ɩ waa agyitɔ maŋa, Lasarusi gbaa tii asa mʋ nɩɩ ba maa Yesu bee gyii mʋ sʋ.

Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Mɛɛrɩ taa tuulaale liifensa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ sʋ ɔgyalɩn pʋrʋntʋwa bɔla ba, nɩɩ nadi nɩɩ ba taa waa ɩmʋ. Mɛɛrɩ taa ba kyɛɛgɛ wʋrɩgɛ Yesu ayaa sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ inyini bʋnswɩɩsa kpayɩ‐kpayɩ ɩmʋ. Nɩɩ tuulaale maŋa ofen kɔɔlɛ kɩkpaara mʋ sʋ kpini femm.
Amaa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Gyudasi Isikariyoti bʋ tʋtɔ. Mʋ ɩɩ ba ɔ ba lɛɛ Yesu sa mʋ. Maa wu Mɛɛrɩ maa waa kanɩn mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ,
“Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ ba man taa tuulaale nɩmʋ fɛ, kɛ ba nyɛ afulee fɛɛ dinari
asa, abɛɛ ɩbwaayɩ kudu kusun osunpu kʋkɔka, kɛ ba taa afulee mʋ kɛɛ atiripu?”
Man gyɛ atiripu mʋ asɩn i tiri mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ kanɩn, amaa ɔ gyɛ oyu nɩn. Nɩɩ mʋ ɩɩ kɩtaa bamʋ afulee ɔwaakpa mʋ, yɛgɛ ee yuuri afulee mʋ ɩkʋ ee gyii.
Amaa Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ! Ɔ waa ɩmʋ yɩla mi kepula akɛ nɩn.
Saŋa kʋmaa fanaa atiripu anɩmʋ ii biti fan baa fan bʋ tɔ, amaa mɛɛ yɛ n baa n bʋ fanɛ asɛ saŋa kʋmaa.”
Nɩɩ Gyiwu abi adamantɛ ba maa nu fɛɛ Yesu bʋ Betani kadɛ tɔ mʋ, ba kpee mʋ asɛ tʋtɔ. Man gyɛ Yesu nkʋn sʋ nɩɩ ba kpee tʋtɔ, amaa ba kpee ba naa kɩɩ Lasarusi mʋ nɩɩ Yesu kyiŋi mʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ gbaa.
Ɩmʋ sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa ba ŋmina ba mɔɔ Lasarusi gbaa,
lɩɩ fɛɛ taa lɩɩ Lasarusi kelewu kyiŋi mʋ sʋ mʋ, Gyiwu abi mʋ gaalaagaa bee kina bamʋ abɩlɩsa mʋ, nɩɩ bee kpee bɛɛ kɔɔlɛ Yesu bee gyii.
Ɩmʋ lɩɩkaakɛ mʋ, kʋbʋ damantɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba ba bamʋ Kesu kɔnɔ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ kensi‐gyii mʋ tɔ mʋ, ba nu fɛɛ Yesu kɩtaa ɔkpa ɛɛ ba Gyerusalem.
Ɩmʋ sʋ ba taa abɩlafɛ lɩɩ kyʋn, kɛ ba naa gyaŋa mʋ, yɛgɛ bɛɛ yɩn mʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ,
“Hosana!
Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ naa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ ɛɛ ba!
Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa Ɩsɩrayɩ Owura!”
Nɩɩ Yesu wu kuruma kadanba kʋ nɩɩ o dii mʋ. Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ ba tɔ kesintin. Ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ,
“O Siyon
abi, fan man waa kufuu,
fan kɩɩ, fanɛ owura ɩɩ ba,
ɔ tɛ kuruma kadanba sʋ ɛɛ ba.”

Kanɩn saŋa maŋa mʋ, mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba man nu ɩnɩmʋ kpini kasɛ. Amɔɔ kamaa tɔ, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sa mʋ bʋnyaa mʋ, pɔyɩ nɩɩ ba lan nyiŋi fɛɛ ba kyʋrɔɔ asɩn nɩmʋ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɩ ba tɔ kesintin.
Nɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Yesu asɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ Lasarusi lɩɩ kakyan tɔ, nɩɩ o kyiŋi mʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ, ɩɩ kyaga sʋ tɔwɛ asɩn nɩmʋ katɩn kʋmaa.
Kanɩn sʋ nɩɩ asa damantɛ ba lɩɩ ba naa gyaŋa Yesu, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba maa nu asɩn kyinkyinsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa mʋ sʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ Farasii abi ba tɔwɛ abaa yɛ, “Fan man wu, a mɛɛ bɩla taalɛ waa sɛhn. Fan kɩɩ, dulinyaa tɔ asa kpini ba biliŋi kpee ba buu mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Giriki abi mʋ akʋ gbaa ba tii bamʋ nɩɩ ba kpee Gyerusalem mʋ sʋ. Ba naa sun Ɩbwaarɛ Kesu kɔnɔ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ kensi‐gyii mʋ tɔ.
Kanɩn asa maŋa ba ba Filipu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Betisayida kadɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ asɛ, ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔbɩlɩsa, an biti fɛɛ a wu Yesu.”
Nɩɩ Filipu naa tɔwɛ Andiruwu, nɩɩ bamʋ anyɔ ba kpee naa tɔwɛ Yesu.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Nbɩɩnbɩɩ, saŋa mʋ fʋʋ fɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa bʋnyaa lala mʋ ɩ lɛɛ ifuli.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin, kuyu kibi, nɩɩ kɩ man kan tɩyɛ ɩsɛ tɔ gyɔɔ mʋ, kɩ san kɩ gyɛ kuyubi kʋlʋn. Amaa nɩɩ kɩ kan tɩyɛ ɩsɛ tɔ gyɔɔ, nɩɩ kɩ kɔyɩ bɩrɛ, kɩɩ sɔyɩ abi damantɛ.
Ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kebiti sa mʋ nkpa gaa mʋ, ee biti ɔ pan kɩmʋ. Amaa ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ taa mʋ nkpa ɛɛ tɩɩ sɛhn dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ mʋ, ee biti ɔ lɔŋɔ mʋ n‐yɩɩ yɩla sa nkpa kakpaa.
Ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee sun mɛ mʋ, dagaa maa buu mɛ. Nɩɩ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n bʋ mʋ, tʋtɔ nɩɩ mi osunpu mʋ gbaa ii biti ɔ baa ɔ bʋ. Nɩɩ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ee sun mɛ mʋ, Mɛ‐Sɛ ii biti ɔ sa mʋ bɛɛrɛɛ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nbɩɩnbɩɩ, mɛ kɔkɔlɔ man dɛ mɛ. N bɩɩ kʋlɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ kɛ n tɔwɛ yɛ, Nsɛ, mɔlɩgɛ mɛ lɩɩ awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩɩ ba mɛ sʋ falɛ abɛɛ? Ayee, falɛ awʋrʋfɔ anɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ n ba.
Nsɛ, bʋnyaa fʋ kɩtɩɩ!”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔbʋlɛ kʋ lɩɩ sʋsʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “N wʋla bʋnyaa kɩmʋ nɩɩ n biti n bwii bʋnyaa kɩmʋ.”
Sakyɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ ba maa nu ɔbʋlɛ mʋ, ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Bʋlayɩ pʋntɛ!” Nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ ɩ tɔwɛ mʋ asɛ!”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɩ man gyɛ mɛ sʋ nɩɩ ɔbʋlɛ nɩmʋ tɔwɛ, amaa lɩɩ fanɛ sʋ.
Nbɩɩnbɩɩ ɩ gyɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti o gyii dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ asa asɩn. Nbɩɩnbɩɩ ɩ gyɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ kʋsaa dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ owura lɩɩ mʋ kagya sʋ. Mʋ ɩ gyɛ Sɩtaanɛ mʋ.
Amaa nɩɩ ba kan kʋsaa mɛ sʋsʋ lɩɩ kasɛ sʋ bɩrɛ, n biti n bɩɩtɛ asa kpini ba mɛ asɛ.”
Ɔ tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ nɩn kaapʋ tɔ lɩɩ kelewu mʋ nɩɩ ee biti o wu.

Nɩɩ sakyɔ mʋ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “An nu lɩɩ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ fɛɛ, Krisito, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ, ii biti ɔ kyɩna nkpa tɔ kakpaa. Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, Ɩ dagaa ba maa kʋsaa Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ sʋsʋ? Anɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ?”

Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ lɩɩ mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ yɛ, “Ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ ɩ man bɩla yɛ ɩ kyɛɛrɛɛ fanɛ asɛ. Ɩmʋ sʋ fan kyaga sʋ natɛ ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ tɔ, kɛ kitentenbiri kɩ man nyɛ loo fanɛ tɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ naa kitentenbiri tɔ mʋ man nyi katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ee kpee.
Fan maa san fan sʋ ɩŋmaŋɛsa fanɛ asɛ falɛ bɩrɛ, fan kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ gyii, kɛ fan baa fan gyɛ ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ asa.” Yesu maa tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ kamaa tɔ mʋ, ɔ lɩɩ tʋtɔ naa baala bamʋ sʋ mʋ nkʋn.
Halɩɩ asɩn kyinkyinsa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu waa asa ansi tɔ kpini falɛ gbaa mʋ, ba san ba mɛɛ kɔɔlɛ mʋ bee gyii.
Asɩn nɩmʋ a waa nɩn, kɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Isaya wʋla tɔwɛ mʋ, ɩ ba tɔ kesintin. Falɛ nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ,
“Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, anɩmʋ ɩ kɔɔlɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ an tɔwɛ mʋ gyii?
Nɩɩ asa mɔɔ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ lɛɛ mʋ ɔlʋn mʋ kaapʋ?”
Kpalɩ ɩnɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, ba man taalɛ kɔɔlɛ Yesu gyii, lɩɩ fɛɛ Isaya bɩla tɔwɛ mʋ ɔwʋlɛ tɔ katɩn kʋ yɛ,
“Ɩbwaarɛ waa bamʋ agyaatanapʋ,
kɛ bamʋ ansi ɩ man wu.
Ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba waa kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn,
kɛ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ ii mee nu asɩn kasɛ,
kɛ ba biliŋi ba mɛ asɛ, kɛ n kyɛ bamʋ.”
Isaya gyankpaa wu Yesu bʋnyaa mʋ, ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ lɩɩ mʋ sʋ mʋ.

Halɩɩ ɩ maa ɩmʋ gbaa mʋ, Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ adamantɛ ba kɔɔlɛ Yesu gyii. Amaa lɩɩ Farasii abi mʋ sʋ mʋ, ba man taalɛ lɛɛ bamʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ ifuli, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba sʋ kufuu fɛɛ bee biti ba gya bamʋ lɩɩ ɔgyaŋɛkpa mʋ tɔ.
Kpalɩ fɛɛ abɩlɩsa mʋ bee biti kɩyɩn lɩɩ nyɩmɩsa asɛ ba kyɔ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ, ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa kanɩn.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ kenken yɛ, “Ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii mʋ, man gyɛ mɛ nkʋn nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ gyii, amaa ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ gyii.
Ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o wu mɛ mʋ, o wu ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ.
Mɛ ɩ gyɛ ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ ba dulinyaa nɩmʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii mʋ, ɔ man sii kitentenbiri tɔ.
“Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o nu mɛ asɩn tɔwɛsa, nɩɩ ɔ man buu ɩmʋ mʋ, man gyɛ mɛ ii biti n bun mʋ kʋpwɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ n man ba nɩn yɛ n ba bun dulinyaa tɔ asa kʋpwɛ, amaa n ba nɩn kɛ n ba mɔlɩgɛ kɩmʋ asa.
Ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o kina mɛ, nɩɩ ɔ man kɔɔlɛ mɛ asɩn mʋ, wʋla nyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee biti o bun mʋ kʋpwɛ. Nɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ mʋ ii biti i bun mʋ kʋpwɛ kakɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ.
Kpalɩ fɛɛ ɩ man gyɛ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ ɔlʋn tɔ nɩɩ n sʋ n tɔwɛ, amaa mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ, sa mɛ kɔnɔsa lɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ sʋ, nɩɩ ɩmʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ.
Nɩɩ n nyi fɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔsa mʋ ɩɩ sa nkpa kakpaa. Ɩmʋ sʋ asɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ mʋ, ɩ gyɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ n tɔwɛ.”

Ɩ maa san gbɛrɛɛ kɛ ba piili Kesu kɔnɔ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ kensi‐gyii mʋ, Yesu bɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa fʋʋ fɛɛ ɔ lɩɩ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ bwii kpee Mʋ‐sɛ asɛ. Maa sʋ kebiti sa mʋ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ sʋ mʋ, ɔ nyɛ kebiti sa bamʋ naa fʋʋ ɔkaa.
Pɔyɩ kɛ ba piili kalaatɩpwɛ sʋ agyitɔ kigyii mʋ, Sɩtaanɛ wʋla loo Simon mu‐bii, Gyudasi Isikariyoti mʋ tɔ yɛ, ɔ lɛɛ Yesu sa.
Yesu nyi Mʋ‐sɛ maa taa kʋtɔ kʋmaa waa mʋ kɩbaa tɔ, nɩɩ o nyi maa lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ nɩn, nɩɩ mʋ asɛ nɩɩ ee biti o bwii kpee.
Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ kʋsʋ lɩɩ agyitɔ mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ o bugi mʋ balɩmaasʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa bɔrɩdɩba dɩla mʋ kasɩyɛ.
Nɩɩ ɔ kyɛɛgɛ nkyu waa lapɛ gyeesa tɔ, nɩɩ o piili ɛɛ fwɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ayaa sʋ, yɛgɛ ɔ sʋ bɔrɩdɩba mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa maalɛ mʋ kasɩyɛ mʋ ɛɛ kpayɩ bamʋ ayaa sʋ.
Maa waa kanɩn naa fʋʋ Simon Pita sʋ mʋ, ɔ taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, fii biti fʋ fwɩɩ mɛ ayaa sʋ nɩn?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Nbɩɩnbɩɩ ɩmʋ nɩɩ n waa falɛ fɩɩ mɛɛ yɛ fʋ nu kasɛ, amaa kamaa tɔ fii biti fʋ ba nu ɩmʋ kasɛ.”
Nɩɩ Pita tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ayee, n mɛɛ yɛgɛ fʋ fwɩɩ mɛ ayaa sʋ kakaakʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fʋ man yɛgɛ nɩɩ n fwɩɩ fʋ ayaa sʋ bɩrɛ, fʋ man bɩla fii tii mɛ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ sʋ.”
Nɩɩ Simon Pita tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Kanɩn bɩrɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, man fwɩɩ mɛ ayaa sʋ nkʋn, fwɩɩ mɛ abaa yɛ mi kumu tɔ gbaa tii sʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tee gyee mʋ, mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ ɩ man bɩla ɩ sʋ ineesi, ɩmʋ sʋ mʋ ayaa sʋ nkʋn nɩɩ ɛɛ fwɩɩ. Fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ ɩ man sʋ ineesi kʋ, amɔɔ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋlʋn.”
Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ tɛɛ wʋla o nyi ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ lɛɛ mʋ sa, ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “amɔɔ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋlʋn” ɩ sʋ ineesi.
Maa fwɩɩ bamʋ ayaa sʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ o bwii taa mʋ balɩmaasʋ bun, nɩɩ o bwii naa kyɩna mʋ ɔkyɩnakpa. Nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan nu ɩmʋ nɩɩ n waa sa fanɛ falɛ kasɛ?”
Fɛn tɩɩ mɛ yɛ “Ɔkaapʋpʋ” yɛ “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ” nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ kesintin, lɩɩ fɛɛ kanɩn nɩɩ n gyɛ.
Nɩɩ mɛ, fanɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ yɛ fanɛ Ɔkaapʋpʋ n fwɩɩ fanɛ ayaa sʋ falɛ, ɩ dagaa fɛɛ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fan fwɩɩ abaa ayaa sʋ.
N waa sɩnkaala sa fanɛ, yɛ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fan waa fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n waa sa fanɛ falɛ.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin, kɩyaafɔlɛ mɛɛ taalɛ ɔ kyɔ mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ, nɩɩ kabɔɔ mɛɛ taalɛ ɔ kyɔ ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mʋ mʋ.
Nbɩɩnbɩɩ fan maa bɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ falɛ, nɩɩ fan kan waa ɩmʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ waa fanɛ kusee.

Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Man gyɛ fanɛ kpini asɩn nɩɩ n tɔwɛ falɛ. N nyi bamʋ nɩɩ n lɛɛ mʋ. Amaa asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ mʋ, ɩ dagaa ɩ maa ba tɔ. Asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ n maa mʋ an bʋga lapɛ kʋlʋn tɔ an gyii mʋ, biliŋi ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ kʋsʋ yɩlɛ mɛ sʋ.’
“N tɔwɛ fanɛ nɩn pɔyɩ kɛ ɩ ba waa. Nɩɩ ɩ ba mʋ, fen biti fan bɩɩ fɛɛ mɛ ɩ gyɛ ‘Ɔmʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ yɛ n gyɛ mʋ’.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ n sun mʋ mʋ, kɔɔlɛ mɛ gbaa mɛ nɩmʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ mʋ, kɔɔlɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ gbaa nɩmʋ.”
Yesu maa tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ kpini lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ nyita mʋ. Nɩɩ o bugi tɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ ii biti ɔ lɛɛ mɛ sa.”
Nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba piili bɛɛ kɩɩ abaa ansi tɔ, fɛ nfɛɛrɛ bamʋ tɔ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ dɛɛ.
Mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋlʋn, ɔmʋ nɩɩ Yesu sʋ kebiti sa mʋ mʋ, tɛ ɔ maa Yesu.
Nɩɩ Simon Pita ŋabɛɛ mu ansi yɛ, “Taasɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ yɛ, anɩmʋ asɩn nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ falɛ?”
Maa kpɛɛ Yesu mʋ, ɔ taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, anɩmʋ nɩɩ fʋ dɛɛ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N kan taa agyitɔ waa lapɛ tɔ mʋ, ɔmʋ nɩɩ n biti n taa sa mʋ mʋ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ kanɩn nyɩmɩsa maŋa.” Maa kpɛɛ agyitɔ mʋ waa lapɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, ɔ taa sa Gyudasi Isikariyoti.
Gyudasi maa dan kɔɔlɛ agyitɔ maŋa mʋ, nɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ loo mʋ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fii biti yɛ fʋ waa mʋ, waa bilen‐bilen.”
Bamʋ nɩɩ ba tɛ ogyikpa maŋa kpini, ɔkʋ man nu asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ kasɛ.

Amaa Gyudasi maa gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩtaa bamʋ afulee sʋ mʋ, akʋ ba fɛ nfɛɛrɛ yɛ, Yesu sun mʋ yɛ ɔ naa sɔɔ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ii tiri sa Kesu kɔnɔ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ agyitɔ mʋ. Nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ o sun mʋ nɩn yɛ ɔ taa afulee naa sa atiripu.
Gyudasi maa dan kɔɔlɛ agyitɔ mʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ kewu kyʋn. Saŋa maŋa gyɛ kagyanbwɛ nɩn.
Gyudasi maa lɩɩ kyʋn mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Saŋa fʋʋ fɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa bʋnyaa ɩ lɩɩ ifuli, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa ɔ bɔla mɛ sʋ lɛɛ mʋ bʋnyaa mʋ.
Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kan bɔla mɛ sʋ lɛɛ mʋ bʋnyaa mʋ ifuli mʋ, ee biti ɔ bʋnyaa mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ. Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ waa ɩmʋ nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ.

“Mi‐bii ana, saŋa gbɛrɛɛ ɩ san kɛ n kyɩna fanɛ asɛ. Fen biti fan kɩɩ biti mɛ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ Gyiwu abi abɩlɩsa mʋ, kanɩn nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ nbɩɩnbɩɩ falɛ yɛ, katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n biti n kpee mʋ, fan mɛɛ yɛ fan taalɛ ba tʋtɔ.
“Nbɩɩnbɩɩ n sa fanɛ kɔnɔsa pʋpwɛ yɛ, fan nyɛ kebiti sa abaa. Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n nyɛ kebiti sa fanɛ mʋ, kanɩn maŋa sʋ nɩɩ fan nyɛ kebiti sa abaa.
Nɩɩ fan kan nyɛ kebiti sa abaa mʋ, ɩmʋ ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ asa kpini ba bɩɩ yɛ fan gyɛ mɛ abɩɩlapʋ.”
Nɩɩ Simon Pita taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ fɩnɛ nɩɩ fii kpee?” Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n kpee mʋ fʋ mɛɛ yɛ fʋ taalɛ buu mɛ kpee nbɩɩnbɩɩ, amaa fii biti fu buu mɛ ba kamaa tɔ.”
Nɩɩ Pita taasɛ mʋ yɛ “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, mɩnɛ waa nɩɩ n mɛɛ taalɛ buu fʋ nbɩɩnbɩɩ. N biti n taa mɛ nkpa taga apʋ sa fʋ.”
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fii biti fu taa fʋ nkpa taga apʋ sa mɛ kesintin? N tɔwɛ fʋ kesintin yɛ, pɔyɩ kɛ kyaasɛ ɔ bʋn mʋ, fii biti fʋ kyɛɛ ɩlɩɩ ɩsa yɛ fʋ man nyi mɛ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Fan man yɛgɛ fanɛ nkɔlɔ ɩ ŋmaa fanɛ. Fan kɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gyii kɛ fan kɔɔlɛ ngbaa mɛ gyii.
Ibu damantɛ ɩ bʋ Mɛ‐Sɛ kɩkpaara sʋ. Nɩɩ ɩ daa ɩ man gyɛ kanɩn nɩn, naafɔɔ n tɔwɛ fanɛ. N kpee n naa lɔŋɔ ɔkyɩnakpa sa fanɛ.
Nɩɩ n kan kpee naa lɔŋɔ ɔkyɩnakpa sa fanɛ mʋ, n biti n bwii ba taa fanɛ kpee mɛ asɛ, kɛ fan naa kyɩna katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n tɛ mʋ.
Fen nyi ɔkpa mʋ, nɩɩ fen nyi katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n kpee mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Tomasi tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, a man nyi katɩn mʋ nɩɩ fii kpee. Nɩɩ nɛnɛ nɩɩ an biti a waa bɩɩ ɔkpa mʋ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mɛ ɩ gyɛ ɔkpa mʋ yɛ kesintin mʋ yɛ nkpa mʋ. Ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ kpee Mɛ‐Sɛ asɛ, amɔɔ ɔ bɔla mɛ sʋ.
Nɩɩ fan kan fan nyi mɛ kesintin tɔ mʋ, naafɔɔ fan nyi Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ gbaa. Lɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ ɩɩ sʋ ii kpee mʋ, fen nyi mʋ, nɩɩ fen wu mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Filipu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, kaapʋ anɛ Fʋ‐sɛ mʋ, kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ki tiri anɛ nɩn.”

Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Filipu, amɔɔ fʋ man nyi mɛ, halɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n kyɩna fanɛ asɛ kyɛɛrɛɛ falɛ? Ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o wu mɛ mʋ, o wu Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ. Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fʋ bɩla fɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Kaapʋ anɛ Fʋ‐sɛ mʋ?’
Abɛɛ fʋ man kɔɔlɛ gyii yɛ n maa Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ an gyɛ kʋkʋlʋn? Asɩn mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ mʋ man gyɛ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ lɛɛ. Amaa Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ mɛ tɔ mʋ ii sun mu kusun.
Kanɩn sʋ fan kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii fɛɛ n maa tɔwɛ yɛ, n maa Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ an gyɛ kʋkʋlʋn. Nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ kanɩn gbaa mʋ, fan kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii lɩɩ asɩn kyinkyinsa mʋ nɩɩ fan wu n maa waa falɛ sʋ.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin, ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɔɔlɛ mɛ ee gyii mʋ, ee biti ɔ waa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ n waa mʋ. Ee biti ɔ waa ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ kyɔ falɛ gbaa, lɩɩ fɛɛ n kpee Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ asɛ nɩn.
Nɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fan kʋlɛ mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ mʋ, n biti n waa sa fanɛ, kɛ mɛ, Obii mʋ n bɩya bʋnyaa sa Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ.
Kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fɛn kʋlɛ mɛ lɩɩ mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ mʋ, n biti n waa sa fanɛ.” Yesu da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ kii biti kɩ ba.
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fan kan fan sʋ kebiti sa mɛ mʋ, fen biti fan buu mɛ kɔnɔsa.
N biti n kʋlɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ kɛ ɔ sa fanɛ Ɔkyɛtɔpʋ pʋpwɛ mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ baa ɔ bʋ fanɛ asɛ kakpaa.

Mʋ ɩ gyɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ lɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kesintin mʋ ɛɛ kaapʋ. Dulinya abi ba mɛɛ yɛ ba taalɛ kɔɔlɛ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba man nyi mʋ, nɩɩ be mee wu mʋ. Amaa fanɛɛ fanɛ fan nyi mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ bʋ fanɛ asɛ, nɩɩ ee biti ɔ baa ɔ bʋ fanɛ tɔ.
N mɛɛ yɛ n yɛgɛ fanɛ fɛɛ aŋmengyi, n biti n bwii ba fanɛ asɛ.
Ɩ san gbɛrɛɛ, dulinyaa abi ba man bɩla yɛ ba wu mɛ. Amaa fanɛɛ fanɛ bɩrɛ fen biti fan wu mɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ n maa tɛ nkpa tɔ falɛ, fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fen biti fan baa fan tɛ nkpa tɔ.
Kanɩn kakɛ maŋa fen biti fan bɩɩ fɛɛ n maa Mɛ‐Sɛ an gyɛ kʋkʋlʋn, nɩɩ n maa fanɛ gbaa an gyɛ kʋkʋlʋn.

“Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ kɔnɔsa, nɩɩ o buu ɩmʋ mʋ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kebiti sa mɛ. Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kebiti sa mɛ mʋ, Mɛ‐Sɛ gbaa ii biti ɔ nyɛ kebiti sa mʋ. Ngbaa mɛ n biti n nyɛ kebiti sa mʋ, kɛ n lɛɛ mɛ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Gyudasi (man gyɛ Gyudasi Isikariyoti mʋ) tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, mɩnɛ waa nɩɩ fii biti fʋ lɛɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ anɛ nkʋn, nɩɩ man gyɛ dulinyaa abi mʋ?”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kebiti sa mɛ mʋ, ii biti o buu mɛ kɩkaapʋ mʋ. Mɛ‐Sɛ ii biti ɔ nyɛ kebiti sa mʋ, nɩɩ maa Mɛ‐Sɛ an biti a ba mʋ asɛ, kɛ a taa mʋ biliŋi anɛ ayɛ.
Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man sʋ kebiti sa mɛ mʋ, mɛɛ yɛ o buu mɛ kɩkaapʋ mʋ. Kɩkaapʋ mʋ nɩɩ fen nu falɛ man gyɛ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ kɩkaapʋ, ɩɩ lɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ asɛ nɩn.
“N maa san n bʋ fanɛ asɛ falɛ sʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ falɛ asɩn.
Amaa Ɔkyɛtɔpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ, mʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ ii biti o sun mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ mʋ, ii biti ɔ kaapʋ fanɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa kɛ o nyiŋi fanɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ falɛ.
Kayɩɩ‐yuuli kɩ baa kɩ bʋ fanɛ asɛ, mɛ gbaa‐gbaa kayɩɩ‐yuuli nɩɩ n sʋ n sa fanɛ. Amaa ɩ man du fɛɛ dulinyaa kayɩɩ‐yuuli mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ sa mʋ. Fan man yɛgɛ fanɛ nkɔlɔ i nyita, fan man waa kufuu.
“Fan nu n maa tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, ‘N kpee kɛ n bɩla bwii ba fanɛ asɛ.’ Nɩɩ fɛn kan fen biti mɛ asɩn mʋ, naafɔɔ fanɛ ansi ii biti i gyii fɛɛ n maa kpee Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ asɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔkparɛ ɔ kyɔ mɛ.
N wʋla n tɔwɛ fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ kpini nbɩɩnbɩɩ pɔyɩ kɛ ɩ ba waa, nɩɩ ɩ kan ba waa mʋ kɛ fan kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii.
N mɛɛ bɩla yɛ n tɔwɛ fanɛ asɛ kyɛɛrɛɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ dulinyaa tɔ owura ɩɩ ba. Ɔ man sʋ ɔlʋn mɛ sʋ,
amaa i tiri fɛɛ n maa waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ sa mɛ kɔnɔ yɛ n waa mʋ, kɛ dulinyaa abi ba bɩɩ fɛɛ n sʋ kebiti sa Mɛ‐Sɛ. Fan ba kɛ a lɩɩ nfɩɩ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Mɛ ɩ gyɛ wayɩn oyu gbaa‐gbaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ sɔyɩ abi, nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ ɩ gyɛ oyu mʋ ɔdɔɔpʋ.
Kayaa‐bi kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ kyaa mɛ sʋ nɩɩ kɩ mɛɛ sɔyɩ abi mʋ, ɛɛ ŋɛ kɩmʋ nɩn ɛɛ fɔyɩ, nɩɩ kayaa‐bi kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ sɔyɩ abi mʋ, ɛɛ kpaalɛ kayaa‐bi mʋ kɛ kɩ nyɛ sɔyɩ abi tii sʋ.
Lɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ sa fanɛ sʋ mʋ, fan tɛɛ waa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ.
Fan baa fan bʋ mɛ asɛ, kɛ ngbaa mɛ n baa n bʋ fanɛ asɛ. Kɩyaa‐bi nkʋn mɛɛ taalɛ sɔyɩ abi, amɔɔ kɩ kyaa oyu mʋ sʋ. Kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fɛn mɛɛ taalɛ sɔyɩ abi, amɔɔ fan bʋ mɛ asɛ.

“Mɛ ɩ gyɛ oyu mʋ, nɩɩ fanɛ ɩ gyɛ kɩmʋ n‐yaabi mʋ. Ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kan ɔ bʋ mɛ asɛ, nɩɩ ngbaa n bʋ mʋ asɛ sʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ sɔyɩ abi gaa, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ kayaa‐bi kyaa oyu sʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ sɔyɩ abi mʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ fan man tii mɛ sʋ bɩrɛ, fɛn mɛɛ taalɛ waa sɛhn.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man kan ɔ bʋ mɛ asɛ bɩrɛ, o du nɩn fɛɛ kayaa‐bi mʋ nɩɩ ba ŋɛ tʋʋ nɩɩ kɩ wʋlɛ. Kanɩn n‐yaabi nɩɩ bɛɛ tasɛ bɛɛ tʋʋ fʋlɔn tɔ, kɛ ɩ dɩyɛ mʋ.
Nɩɩ fan kan fan bʋ mɛ asɛ, nɩɩ mɛ asɩn mʋ bʋ fanɛ tɔ mʋ, kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fen biti, nɩɩ fan kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, ee biti ɔ waa sa fanɛ.
Nɩɩ fan kan sɔyɩ abi gaa, mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ fan gyɛ mɛ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ, ɩmʋ ɩ nyɛ lɛɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ bʋnyaa mʋ ifuli kaapʋ.
“Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ sʋ kebiti sa mɛ mʋ, kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ ngbaa mɛ n sʋ kebiti sa fanɛ. Ɩmʋ sʋ fan kyaga sʋ kyɩna mi kebiti mʋ tɔ.
Nɩɩ fan kan buu mɛ kɔnɔsa mʋ, n biti n kyaga sʋ nyɛ kebiti sa fanɛ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n buu Mɛ‐Sɛ kɔnɔsa nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kebiti sa mɛ mʋ.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ nɩn kɛ mi kensi‐gyii ɔ kyɩna fanɛ tɔ, kɛ fanɛ kensi‐gyii mʋ ɔ naa lʋwɛ kyɛɛkyɛɛ.
Mɛ kɔnɔsa ɩ gyɛ yɛ, Fan nyɛ kebiti sa abaa, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n nyɛ kebiti sa fanɛ mʋ.
Kebiti kɩ man bʋ tɔ kɩ kyɔ kɩnɩmʋ fɛɛ ɔkʋ maa wu sa mʋ kyɛmɩnɛ ana.
Nɩɩ fan kan buu mɛ kɔnɔsa mʋ bɩrɛ, fan gyɛ mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ ana nɩn.

N mɛɛ bɩla yɛ n tɩɩ fanɛ mɛ ayaafɔlɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ man nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ ɩɩ waa. Amaa n tɩɩ fanɛ mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ ana nɩn, lɩɩ fɛɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ n bɩɩla lɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ asɛ mʋ, n lɛɛ kaapʋ fanɛ.

Man gyɛ fanɛ ɩ lɛɛ mɛ. Amaa mɛ ɩ lɛɛ fanɛ, nɩɩ n sun fanɛ yɛ fan naa sɔyɩ abi mʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ kyɛɛrɛɛ. Nɩɩ fan kan waa kanɩn mʋ, kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fan kʋlɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ mʋ, ee biti ɔ waa sa fanɛ.
Mɛ kɔnɔsa ɩ gyɛ yɛ, fan nyɛ kebiti sa abaa.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nɩɩ dulinyaa abi ba kan bɛɛ kisi fanɛ mʋ, fan baa fan nyiŋi fɛɛ mɛ nɩɩ ba daa kikisi.

Nɩɩ fan kan fan du fɛɛ dulinyaa tɔ abi bɩrɛ, naafɔɔ dulinyaa abi bee biti ba nyɛ kebiti sa fanɛ fɛɛ kɩmʋ asa. Amaa fan man gyɛ dulinyaa abi. Mɛ ɩ lɛɛ fanɛ lɩɩ dulinyaa abi tɔ. Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ dulinyaa abi bee kisi fanɛ mʋ.

Fan nyiŋi asɩn mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Kɩyaafɔlɛ mɛɛ taalɛ ɔ kyɔ mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ.’ Ɩmʋ sʋ n maa wu awʋrʋfɔ bamʋ abaa tɔ falɛ, kanɩn nɩɩ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fen biti fan wu awʋrʋfɔ bamʋ abaa tɔ. Nɩɩ ba kan buu mɛ kɩkaapʋ mʋ, bee biti ba buu fanɛ kɩkaapʋ mʋ gbaa.
Lɩɩ mɛ kɩtɩɩ sʋ, nɩɩ bee biti ba waa fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ kpini, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba man nyi Ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ.
Nɩɩ n daa man ba tɔwɛ asɩn mʋ sa bamʋ nɩn, naafɔɔ ba mɛɛ yɛ ba wu alibi kʋpwɛ. Amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ ba man sʋ kɔnɔ kɩlɛɛ lɩɩ bamʋ alibi sʋ.
Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee kisi mɛ mʋ, ee kisi Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ gbaa.

N ba waa asɩn kyinkyinsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ man pɩɩ taalɛ waa bamʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ ba daa ba man wu ɩmʋ bɩrɛ nɩn, naafɔɔ ba mɛɛ yɛ ba wu alibi kʋpwɛ. Amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ ba wu asɩn kyinkyinsa nɩmʋ kpini. Halɩɩ ɩmʋ kpini gbaa mʋ ba kisi maa Mɛ‐Sɛ.
Amaa ɩnɩmʋ ɩ yɛgɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ ba tɔ. Asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, ‘Ba kisi mɛ yɛgɛ ɩ man sʋ kasɛ.’
“Amaa n biti n sun Ɔkyɛtɔpʋ mʋ lɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ asɛ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ lɛɛ kesintin lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ ɛɛ kaapʋ.
Nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fan gyii mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kesintin, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan bʋ mɛ asɛ lɩɩ npiili asɛ.
“N tɔwɛ fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ kpini nɩn, kɛ fan man nyɛ yɛgɛ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ tɔ.
Bee biti ba gya fanɛ lɩɩ Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa. Saŋa kʋ ii biti ɔ ba, nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ba mɔɔ fanɛ gbaa mʋ, ee biti ɔ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ ee sun kusun ɛɛ kyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔ nɩn.
Bee biti ba waa falɛ atɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba man nyi Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ba man nyi mɛ.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ nɩn, nɩɩ saŋa mʋ kan fʋʋ mʋ, fen biti fan nyiŋi fɛɛ n wʋla da fanɛ amu tɔ. N man tɔwɛ fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ bilen, lɩɩ fɛɛ n san n bʋ fanɛ asɛ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nbɩɩnbɩɩ n kpee ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ asɛ nɩn, amaa fanɛ ɔkʋ man taasɛ mɛ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n kpee.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ n maa tɔwɛ fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ kpini sʋ mʋ, fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ i nyita.
Amaa n tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin, mi kikpe mʋ kɩ gyɛ tɔnɔ sa fanɛ nɩn. Nɩɩ n man kan kpee mʋ, Ɔkyɛtɔpʋ mʋ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ ba fanɛ asɛ. Amaa nɩɩ n kan kpee mʋ, n biti n sun mʋ fanɛ asɛ.
Nɩɩ ɔ kan ba mʋ, ee biti ɔ ba yɛgɛ dulinyaa tɔ asa ba bɩɩ fɛɛ ba fɔyɩ ɔkpa lɩɩ bamʋ alibi sʋ, yɛ ɩkpa kikyiigi mʋ sʋ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn kigyii sʋ.
Ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ba fɔyɩ lɩɩ bamʋ alibi sʋ mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ ba mɛɛ kɔɔlɛ mɛ bee gyii.
Ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ba fɔyɩ lɩɩ ɩkpa kikyiigi sʋ mʋ, ɩ gyɛ yɛ n kpee Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ asɛ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ fan man bɩla yɛ fan wu mɛ.
Ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ba fɔyɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn kigyii sʋ mʋ, ɩ gyɛ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tɛɛ wʋla bun dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ Owura mʋ kʋpwɛ.
“N sʋ asɩn kʋkyɔ n tɔwɛ fanɛ, amaa fan mɛɛ taalɛ kɩtaa ɩmʋ kpini nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ.

Amaa nɩɩ Kayaayu mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ lɛɛ kesintin ɛɛ kaapʋ kan ba mʋ, ee biti ɔ kaapʋ fanɛ kɛ fan bɩɩ kesintin mʋ kpini. Man gyɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa ɔlʋn sʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ. Amaa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ee nu mʋ nkʋn nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ, nɩɩ ee biti ɔ tɔwɛ fanɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kii biti kɩ ba.
Lɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ o nu lɩɩ mɛ asɛ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ lɛɛ kaapʋ fanɛ, kɛ ee biti ɔ bɩya mɛ bʋnyaa.
Kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ lɛɛ mʋ, gyɛ mɛ lɛɛ nɩn. Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ Kayaayu mʋ ii biti ɔ taa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ mɛ lɛɛ mʋ ba kaapʋ fanɛ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu kyaga sʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɩ san gbɛrɛɛ fan man bɩla yɛ fen wu mɛ, nɩɩ ɩ bɩla waa gbɛrɛɛ fen biti fen wu mɛ.”

Tʋtɔ maŋa nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ akʋ bɛɛ taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nɩɩ mʋ katɔwɛ mʋ ɩɩ kaapʋ? Maa tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɩ san gbɛrɛɛ fan man bɩla yɛ fan wu mɛ, nɩɩ ɩ bɩla waa gbɛrɛɛ, fen biti fan wu mɛ’ nɩɩ ɔ bɩla bwii tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘N kpee Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ asɛ’ mʋ, mɩnɛ nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ ɩɩ kaapʋ?”
Nɩɩ ba maa sʋ bɛɛ taasɛ yɛ, “ ‘Ɩ san gbɛrɛɛ’ mʋ, ɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ nɛnɛ? A mee nu asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ kasɛ.”

Nɩɩ Yesu bɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ bee biti ba taasɛ mʋ asɩn mʋ kasɛ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N maa tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɩ san gbɛrɛɛ fan man bɩla yɛ fen wu mɛ, nɩɩ ɩ bɩla waa gbɛrɛɛ fen biti fan wu mɛ’ mʋ, ɩmʋ asɩn nɩɩ fɛn taasɛ abaa?
N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, fen biti fan su kɛ fan bɔta tɔ, yɛgɛ dulinyaa abi mɔɔ bee gyii bamʋ ansi. Fanɛ nkɔlɔ ii biti ii nyita fanɛ, amaa fanɛ nkɔlɔ kinyita ii biti ɩ ba biliŋi nkɔlɔ fuuli.
I du nɩn fɛɛ keduŋidi maa kɩtaa ɔkyɩɩ mʋ, ɩ kɔ mʋ lɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ awʋrʋfɔ saŋa fʋʋ. Amaa nɩɩ ɔ kʋʋgɛ kebii mʋ, ɛɛ tan mʋ awʋrʋfɔ mʋ sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ kʋʋgɛ kebii waa dulinyaa tɔ.
Kanɩn nɩɩ i du sa fanɛ gbaa fanɛ. Nbɩɩnbɩɩ fan bʋ awʋrʋfɔ tɔ. Amaa n biti n bɩla wu fanɛ, kɛ fanɛ ansi i gyii. Nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ lɛɛ kanɩn kensi‐gyii maŋa lɩɩ fanɛ tɔ.
Nɩɩ kakɛ maŋa kan fʋʋ mʋ, fan man bɩla yɛ fan taasɛ mɛ sɛhn. N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ ii biti ɔ sa fanɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fan kʋlɛ lɩɩ mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ.
Halɩɩ ba lɩɩ ndaga fan man pɩɩta kʋlɛ kʋtɔ kʋ lɩɩ mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ. Fan kʋlɛ, fen biti fan nyɛ, kɛ fanɛ kensi‐gyii ɔ nyɛ akyɔ.
“Ɩ gyɛ kesintin fɛɛ aŋasan tɔ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ asɩn nɩmʋ. Amaa saŋa kʋ ɩɩ ba nɩɩ n man bɩla yɛ n tɔwɛ fanɛ aŋasan tɔ. N biti n lɛɛ ifuli tɔwɛ fanɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ lɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ sʋ.
Kanɩn kakɛ maŋa fen biti fan kʋlɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ lɩɩ mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ. N mɛɛ tɔwɛ nɩn yɛ n biti n yɩlɛ fanɛ ayaa tɔ kʋlɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ sa fanɛ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa sʋ kebiti sa fanɛ, kpalɩ fɛɛ fan sʋ kebiti sa mɛ nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ n lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ.
N lɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ asɛ ba dulinyaa tɔ. Nɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ n lɩɩ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ n bwii n kpee Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ asɛ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ, fʋ man bɩla fɩɩ tɔwɛ aŋasan tɔ, fii sii fii bugi tɔ nɩn fɩɩ tɔwɛ.
Nbɩɩnbɩɩ an wu fɛɛ fu nyi kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ, nɩɩ ɩ man bɩla i tiri fɛɛ ɔkʋ a taasɛ fʋ kʋtɔ kʋ. Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ an kɔɔlɛ fu gyii yɛ fʋ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ fan kɔɔlɛ gyii?
Amaa saŋa kʋ ɩɩ ba, nɩɩ kɩ tɛɛ ba gbaa, nɩɩ fanɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ii biti ɔ yaasɛ tɔ kpee mʋ ayɛ. Fen biti fan yɛgɛ mɛ nkʋn. Amaa ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ san mɛ nkʋn lɩɩ fɛɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ bʋ mɛ asɛ.
“N tɔwɛ fanɛ falɛ asɩn nɩn, kɛ lɩɩ mɛ sʋ mʋ, kɛ fan nyɛ kayɩɩ‐yuuli. Fen biti fan gyii awʋrʋfɔ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ. Amaa fan nyɛ nkɔlɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ n kɔ gyii dulinyaa mʋ sʋ.”
Yesu maa tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, ɔ kʋsaa mu kumu kɩɩ sʋsʋ nɩɩ ɔ kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ,
“Nsɛ saŋa mʋ fʋʋ. Sa mɛ, Fu‐bii mʋ bʋnyaa, kɛ mɛ, Fu‐bii mʋ gbaa n sa fʋ bʋnyaa.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ sa mɛ ɔlʋn lɩɩ asa kpini sʋ, fɛɛ n sa asa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ taa bɔɔta mɛ mʋ kpini nkpa kakpaa.
Nkpa kakpaa mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ asa ba bɩɩ fʋ, kesintin Ɩbwaarɛ kʋlʋn mʋ, kɛ ba bɩɩ mɛ, Yesu Krisito mʋ nɩɩ fu sun mʋ.
N bɩya fʋ bʋnyaa kasɛ sʋ nfɩɩ, lɩɩ n maa lʋwɛ fu kusun mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sa mɛ yɛ n ba waa mʋ sʋ.
Mɛ‐Sɛ, sa mɛ bʋnyaa fu ansi tɔ nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ, bʋnyaa mʋ nɩɩ n wʋla n sʋ fʋ asɛ pɔyɩ nɩɩ fʋ tʋʋ dulinyaa mʋ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu kyaga sʋ yɛ, “N lɛɛ fu kedubi kaapʋ bamʋ nɩɩ fʋ lɛɛ bamʋ lɩɩ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ sa mɛ mʋ. Ba daa ba gyɛ fʋ lɛɛ nɩn, nɩɩ fʋ taa bamʋ sa mɛ. Nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ fʋ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba buu ɩmʋ.
Nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ, ba bɩɩ fɛɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ mʋ lɩɩ fʋ asɛ nɩn.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ n tɔwɛ bamʋ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sa mɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ. Ba bɩɩ kesintin tɔ fɛɛ n lɩɩ fʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ fu i sun mɛ.
N kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ n sa bamʋ. N mɛɛ kʋlɛ n sa dulinyaa abi, amaa bamʋ nɩɩ fʋ taa sa mɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba gyɛ fʋ lɛɛ mʋ.
Asa mʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ mɛ lɛɛ mʋ kpini, ba gyɛ fʋ lɛɛ, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ fʋ lɛɛ mʋ ba gyɛ mɛ lɛɛ. Lɩɩ bamʋ sʋ nɩɩ mɛ bʋnyaa mʋ lɩɩ ifuli.

N man bɩla yɛ n kyɩna dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ, n ba fʋ asɛ nɩn. Amaa bɛɛ bamʋ bɩrɛ ba san ba bʋ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ. Nsɛ Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ taa fʋ kɩtɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sa mɛ ɔlʋn mʋ kun bamʋ, kɛ ba nyɛ waa kʋkʋlʋn fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ maa fʋ an gyɛ kʋkʋlʋn mʋ.

Maa kyɩna n bʋ bamʋ asɛ mʋ, kɩtɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sa mɛ mʋ, kɩmʋ ɔlʋn tɔ nɩɩ n taa kɩɩ bamʋ sʋ, nɩɩ n kun bamʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋ man fɔyɩ, amɔɔ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ dagaa fɛɛ ɔ fɔyɩ mʋ, kɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ ba tɔ.
“Nbɩɩnbɩɩ n ba fʋ asɛ nɩmʋ. Amaa maa san n bʋ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ, kɛ ba nyɛ mɛ kensi‐gyii bamʋ tɔ danbɩrasa naa lʋwɛ.
N taa fʋ asɩn mʋ sa bamʋ, nɩɩ dulinyaa abi ba kisi bamʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba man bɩla ba gyɛ dulinyaa tɔ abi, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n man gyɛ dulinyaa tɔ obii mʋ.
N mɛɛ kʋlɛ fʋ nɩn yɛ fʋ lɛɛ bamʋ lɩɩ dulinyaa tɔ, amaa n kʋlɛ nɩn yɛ fu kun bamʋ lɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ sʋ.
Ba man gyɛ dulinyaa nɩmʋ lɛɛ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n man gyɛ kɩmʋ lɛɛ mʋ.
Taa fʋ asɩn kesintin lɔŋɔ bamʋ yɩla, lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ kesintin.
Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fu sun mɛ dulinyaa tɔ mʋ, kanɩn nɩɩ ngbaa mɛ n sun bamʋ dulinyaa tɔ.
Lɩɩ bamʋ sʋ nɩɩ n taa mɛ n‐yɩɩ sa fʋ, kɛ ngbaa bamʋ ba nyɛ taa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ sa fʋ kesintin tɔ.”
Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ, “Man gyɛ mɛ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ nkʋn nɩɩ n kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ n sa. N kʋlɛ n sa bamʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba be nu mɛ asɩn lɩɩ bamʋ asɛ kɛ ba kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii mʋ gbaa.
Nsɛ, mɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ bamʋ kpini ba waa kʋkʋlʋn, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fʋ bʋ mɛ tɔ nɩɩ ngbaa n bʋ fʋ tɔ mʋ. N kʋlɛ fʋ yɛ, ba baa ba bʋ anɛ tɔ, kɛ dulinyaa abi ba kɔɔlɛ gyii yɛ fu i sun mɛ.
N sa bamʋ bʋnyaa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sa mɛ mʋ, kɛ ba nyɛ waa kʋkʋlʋn fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ an gyɛ kʋkʋlʋn mʋ.
N ba n bʋ bamʋ tɔ yɛgɛ fʋ bʋ mɛ tɔ, kɛ ba bʋga waa kɔnɔ kʋlʋn naa lʋwɛ. Ɩnɩmʋ ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ dulinyaa abi ba bɩɩ fɛɛ fu i sun mɛ, nɩɩ fʋ sʋ kebiti sa bamʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sʋ kebiti sa mɛ mʋ.
“Nsɛ n biti fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ fʋ taa sa mɛ mʋ, ba baa ba bʋ mɛ asɛ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n bʋ mʋ. Kɛ ba wu mɛ bʋnyaa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ taa sa mɛ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ sʋ kebiti sa mɛ pɔyɩ nɩɩ fʋ tʋʋ dulinyaa mʋ.
“Nsɛ, ɩkpa kyiigisa wuya, dulinyaa abi ba maa man nyi fʋ, amaa mɛɛ mɛ n nyi fʋ, nɩɩ mi abuupu mʋ be nyi fɛɛ fu i sun mɛ.
N lɛɛ fu kedubi kaapʋ bamʋ, nɩɩ n biti n kyaga sʋ lɛɛ fʋ kaapʋ bamʋ, kɛ fu kebiti mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sʋ sa mɛ mʋ kɩ baa kɩ bʋ bamʋ tɔ, kɛ ngbaa mɛ n baa n bʋ bamʋ tɔ.”
Yesu maa kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ lʋwɛ mʋ, maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba faa kɩpantan mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ kɩmʋ yɛ Kidiron kpee kɩmʋ benbe. Kadɔɔ‐bi kʋ kʋbʋ tʋtɔ, nɩɩ ba loo kɩmʋ tɔ.
Nɩɩ Gyudasi mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ lɛɛ Yesu ɛɛ sa mʋ, nyi tʋtɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ, Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ bɛɛ taalɛ bɛɛ gyaŋɛ tʋtɔ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ Farasii abi ba yɛgɛ nɩɩ Gyudasi gyankpaa Roma anaakɔpʋ yɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ akɩɩsʋpʋ, yɛgɛ ba sʋ ɩgyaa yɛ ɩfɩtɩla yɛ adʋntɔ ba kadɔɔ‐bi mʋ tɔ.
Yesu maa nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kii biti kɩ ba mʋ sʋ mʋ, ɔ lɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ nɩɩ fen biti?”
Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “An biti Yesu Kanasareti‐nyɩn mʋ nɩn.”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mɛ gyɛ mʋ.” Yɛgɛ Gyudasi mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ lɛɛ mʋ sa mʋ yɩlɛ bamʋ asɛ tʋtɔ.
Yesu maa tɔwɛ yɛ, “Mɛ ɩ gyɛ mʋ” mʋ, nɩɩ ba bwii kamaa tɩyɛ kasɛ.
Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ nɩɩ fen biti?”
Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “An biti Yesu Kanasareti‐nyɩn mʋ nɩn.”
Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ mɛ ɩ gyɛ mʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ mɛ nɩɩ fen biti bɩrɛ, fan yɛgɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba tii mɛ sʋ falɛ ba natɛ.”
Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ waa nɩn, kɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla tɔwɛ mʋ ɩ ba tɔ. Asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, “N man yɛgɛ bamʋ nɩɩ fʋ taa bamʋ sa mɛ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ fɔyɩ” mʋ.
Simon Pita sʋ sakunde, nɩɩ ɔ bɩɩtɛ kɩmʋ lɔɔrɛ nɩɩ ɔ ŋɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ gyisa kʋsʋ tɩn. Kɩyaafɔlɛ maŋa kɩtɩɩ ɩ gyɛ Malikusi.
Yesu tɔwɛ Pita yɛ, “Bwiiyaa fʋ sakunde mʋ waa kɩmʋ kukufee tɔ. Fʋ man nyi fɛɛ i tiri fɛɛ n gyii awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ Nsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ŋmina yɩla mɛ mʋ?”
Nɩɩ anaakɔpʋ mʋ yɛ bamʋ ɔbɩlɩsa yɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ akɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ ba kɩtaa Yesu, nɩɩ ba ŋmina mʋ.
Nɩɩ ba gyankpaa taa mʋ kpee Anasi asɛ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ Kayifasi mʋ‐saa, mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ kanɩn kesu maŋa.
