Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ dan ɩ dɛ nɩn yɛ, anɛ kpini an biti an naa yɩlɛ Krisito kuwura‐gyii asɩn ogyikpa, kɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɔ nyɛ katalɛ lɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ tɔ mʋ. Alibi nɩn‐oo, adanbɩrasa nɩn‐oo, ee biti ɔ nyɛ kʋkɔka mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa mʋ.

Fɛɛ a maa nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kasɩlɛ mʋ, an kpan anɛ n‐yɩɩ an tɔwɛ an pʋpɔlɛ asa kɛ baa kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii. Ɩbwaarɛ i nyi anɛ danbɩrasa, asa mʋ nɩɩ an gyɛ, nɩɩ n tamaa fɛɛ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fen nyi anɛ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ.

Man gyɛ yɛ an bɩla an biti a kaapʋ fanɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ an du, amaa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ an waa mʋ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ an sa fanɛ ɔkpa, kɛ fan nyɛ kaapʋ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ anɛ sʋ, kɛ fan taalɛ lɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ mʋ kɔnɔ, lɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ bee wu yɛ ansi mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ asa nkɔlɔ tɔ.
Nɩɩ anɛ katɔwɛ nɩmʋ ɩ kan ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ anɛ amu ii nyita mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ nɩɩ an du kanɩn. Amaa nɩɩ anɛ amu tɔ ɩ kan i du kyɛɛkyɛɛ bɩrɛ, fanɛ sʋ nɩɩ i du kanɩn.
Krisito kebiti mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ sa anɛ mʋ, gyii anɛ amu. Lɩɩ fɛɛ an kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ ɔsa kʋlʋn wu sa ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ, ɩmʋ sʋ i du nɩn fɛɛ anɛ gbaa anɛ an maa wu tii mʋ sʋ mʋ.
O wu sa asa kpini, saamʋ bamʋ nɩɩ ba tɛ nkpa tɔ mʋ ba man bɩla ba tɛ sa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ, amaa ba tɛ sa ɔmʋ nɩɩ o wu, nɩɩ o bwii kyiŋi ba nkpa tɔ sa bamʋ mʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ nbɩɩnbɩɩ man gyɛ nyɩmɩsa ɩkpa sʋ nɩɩ an sʋ an kaala kanan mʋ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa du. Saŋa kʋ tɔ mʋ kanɩn nɩɩ an daa kaala Krisito nɩn, amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ a man bɩla an kaala mʋ kanɩn.
Kanɩn sʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ba ɔ gyɛ Krisito lɛɛ mʋ, o biliŋi nyɩmɩsa pʋpwɛ. Kakyɩna dɩdaa mʋ kɩ kyʋn, nɩɩ kakyɩna pʋpwɛ kɩ ba.
Ɩnɩmʋ kpini ɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ nɩn, mʋ ɩ bɔla Krisito sʋ lɔŋɔ ana mʋ nsana, nɩɩ ɔ taa maa asa nsana kɔlɔŋɔ kusun mʋ waa anɛ abaa tɔ.
Ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla Krisito sʋ ɛɛ lɔŋɔ maa dulinyaa asa nsana, yɛgɛ ɔ mɛɛ kɩɩ asa alibi mʋ nɩɩ ba waa sʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ taa maa asa nsana kɔlɔŋɔ asɩn mʋ waa anɛ abaa tɔ yɛ an tɔwɛ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ an gyɛ Krisito ayaa tɔ ayɩlɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba sun fanɛ asɛ, nɩɩ i du fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩɩ bɔla anɛ sʋ nɩn ɛɛ kʋlɛ fanɛ. Ɩmʋ sʋ an yɩlɛ Krisito ayaa tɔ an kʋlɛ fanɛ yɛ fanaa Ɩbwaarɛ nsana ɩ lɔŋɔ.
Ɩbwaarɛ yɛgɛ Krisito mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man waa alibi kɩɩ mʋ, ba waa anɛ alibi ɔsʋlapʋ, nɩɩ lɩɩ mʋ sʋ mʋ kɛ anɛ ɩkpa i kyiigi Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ.
Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ maa anɛ an sun mu kusun mʋ, an kʋlɛ fanɛ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala mʋ nɩɩ fan nyɛ mʋ, fan man yɛgɛ ɩ waa kɩyan.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ yɛ,
“Mɛ saŋa mʋ kyɛɛkyɛɛ tɔ maa fʋʋ mʋ, n nu fanɛ asɛ,
nɩɩ mɛ kakɛ mɔlɩgɛsa maa fʋʋ mʋ, n kyɛ fanɛ tɔ.”
Nɩɩ mɛ, Pɔɔlɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, nbɩɩnbɩɩ saŋa nɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ saŋa kyɛɛkyɛɛ tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ndaga kakɛ kanɩmʋ kɩ gyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ kakɛ mʋ.
A maa mee biti ɔkʋ o wu asɩn libi ɩkʋ anɛ kusun mʋ tɔ sʋ mʋ, a mee biti a maa waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kii biti ki tii ɔkʋ ɔkpa.
Amaa kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ an waa mʋ, an waa nɩn an kaapʋ fɛɛ an gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ayaafɔlɛ. An nyɛ kenyiita yɩlɛ awʋrʋfɔ tɔ, yɛ kayɩɩ kɩtaa tɔ, yɛ tɔɔrɔɔ tɔ.
Asa ba dayɩ anɛ, nɩɩ ba taa anɛ tii ibu, nɩɩ ba bɩɩtɛ nin anɛ sakyɔ tɔ. Nɩɩ an waa kusun ɔlʋn sʋ, nɩɩ a mɛɛ nyɛ an dɛ nsɩɩrɛ, nɩɩ an naa yɛ akʋn,
yɛgɛ anɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ ɩ maa man sʋ ineesi ɩkʋ, nɩɩ an sʋ kanyaasɩn, yɛ kenyiita, yɛ kɩdanbɩrasa kɩwaa, yɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ ɔlʋn yɛ kebiti abaa gaa.
An tɔwɛ kesintin asɩn mʋ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔlʋn mʋ waa kusun anɛ tɔ. An sʋ ɩkpa kyiigisa fɛɛ adʋntɔ, kɛ a taa kun kɛ a taa kɔ.
Asa akʋ ba sa anɛ bɛɛrɛɛ, nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba ŋaabaa anɛ, akʋ ba saalɛ anɛ, nɩɩ akʋ ba yɩn anɛ. Ba kɩɩ anɛ fɛɛ asa apɩnapʋ, yɛgɛ anɛɛnɛ an gyɛ kesintin wuya ana.
Ba waa fɛɛ ba man bɩɩ anɛ, yɛgɛ katɩn kʋmaa asa be nyi anɛ, ba kɩɩ anɛ fɛɛ a maa yɛ a wu, amaa yɛgɛ an san an tɛ nkpa tɔ, ba bɩɩtɛ anɛ asʋ, yɛgɛ a man wu.
Ba kɩɩ anɛ fɛɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ bamʋ asɩn ɩ sʋ kʋwɛɛ, yɛgɛ saŋa kʋmaa anɛ ansi i gyii, ba kɩɩ anɛ atiripu, amaa yɛgɛ an waa asa gaalaagaa atɔ wuya ana, ba kɩɩ fɛɛ a man sʋ sɛhn yɛgɛ anɛ ɩ sʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa.
Oo Korinto abi, an tɔwɛ tigi fanɛ, nɩɩ an bugi anɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ sa fanɛ.
Anɛɛnɛ bɩrɛ, an man kɩtaa anɛ n‐yɩɩ yɛ fanɛ, amaa fanɛ ɩ kɩtaa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ yɛ anɛ.
Mɛ Pɔɔlɩ, n tɔwɛ n sa fanɛ fɛɛ mi‐bii ana. Fen bugi fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ sa anɛ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ an bugi anɛ lɛɛ sa fanɛ mʋ.
Fan man waa kʋkʋlʋn yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ. Kpalɩ fɛɛ, mɩnɛ ɩ bʋ ɩkpa kikyiigi yɛ nbara kikina nsana? Abɛɛ nɛnɛ nɩɩ kitentenbiri maa ɩŋmaŋɛsa ɩ nyɛ waa kʋlʋn?
Nɛnɛ sʋ nɩɩ Krisito maa Sɩtaanɛ
ba taalɛ waa kɔnɔ kʋlʋn? Mɩnɛ ɩ bʋ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ gyii yɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ man kɔɔlɛ gyii nsana?

Mɩnɛ kɩtɔwɛ kyula ɩ bʋ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ yɛ ɩdakpa nsana? Lɩɩ fɛɛ anɛ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ nkpa tɔ mʋ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ. Mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, “N biti n kyɩna bamʋ tɔ, kɛ n natɛ bamʋ tɔ, n biti n baa n gyɛ bamʋ Ɩbwaarɛ, kɛ ba baa ba gyɛ mɛ asa.”
Ɩnɩmʋ sʋ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ bɩla tɔwɛ yɛ,
“Fan tɩn fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ bamʋ asɛ,
kɛ fan barɩgɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ bamʋ tɔ.
Fan man taa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ mata ineesi kʋtɔ kʋ,
saamʋ kɛ n kɔɔlɛ fanɛ.
N biti n baa n gyɛ fanɛ‐Sɛ,
nɩɩ fanɛ ii biti fan baa fan gyɛ mi‐bii ana anyɩnsa yɛ akyɩɩsa,
mɛ, Ɔlʋnpʋ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, ɩ tɔwɛ kanɩn.”

Mɛ‐bɩrɩsa ana, Ɩbwaarɛ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ lɩɩ falɛ atɔ nɩmʋ kpini sʋ sa anɛ. Kanɩn sʋ fan yɛgɛ a fwɩɩ anɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ yɛ kayaayu ineesi mʋ fɔyɩ. Fan yɛgɛ a sɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɛ a payɩ ansi waa anɛ n‐yɩɩ kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ yɩla sa mʋ.
Fan bugi fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ sa anɛ. Nɩɩ an man waa ɔkʋ kilibi, nɩɩ an man nyita ɔkʋ, a man sisii ɔkʋ.
N mɛɛ tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ n bun fanɛ kʋpwɛ, n wʋla tɔwɛ fanɛ dɩdaa yɛ fan bʋ anɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ, ɩmʋ sʋ an tɛ nkpa tɔ nɩn oo, an wu nɩn oo, anaa fanɛ nɩn.
N sʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii fanɛ tɔ, nɩɩ fanɛ sʋ mʋ n kaapʋ mɛ n‐yɩɩ, nɩɩ ɩ waa mɛ aniya anɛ tɔɔrɔɔ kpini tɔ, nɩɩ mi ansi i gyii naa kyʋn sʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ a maa ba Masedoniya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ, anɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kɩ man nyɛ ɔfʋʋtɛ. Asa ba tɔɔrɔɔ anɛ, nɩɩ ba gyii anɛ ɩmɔɔrɛ katɩn kʋmaa nɩmʋ, nɩɩ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa anɛ.
Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ee yuula asa mʋ nɩɩ bamʋ abaa ɩɩ yɔɔ nkɔlɔ mʋ, mʋ maŋa bɔla Titusi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ fanɛ asɛ ba mʋ sʋ yuula anɛ nkɔlɔ.

Nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ mʋ kɩba mʋ nkʋn sʋ, amaa kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan yɛgɛ nɩɩ mʋ kɔkɔlɔ ki yuuli mʋ mʋ. Ɔ tɔwɛ anɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fɛn gyʋgyʋʋ fɛɛ fen nyɛ wu mɛ mʋ, yɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan nu fanɛ n‐yɩɩ, yɛ fanɛ kebiti kparɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan sʋ sa mɛ mʋ. Lɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ kpini sʋ mʋ, ɩ waa mɛ ɔkɔn naa kyʋn sʋ.
Halɩɩ mɛ ɔwʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ n kyʋrɔɔ sa fanɛ mʋ nyita fanɛ nkɔlɔ gbaa mʋ, n man nu mɛ n‐yɩɩ. Nɩɩ n daa bɩɩ fɛɛ ii biti ɩ kɔ fanɛ halɩɩ ɩ maa man kyɛɛrɛɛ gbaa mʋ, naafɔɔ n dɛ nu mɛ n‐yɩɩ.

Amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ ɩ waa mɛ ɔkɔn, nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ yɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ i nyita fanɛ nkɔlɔ sʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa mɛ ɔkɔn, amaa fanɛ nkɔlɔ kinyita mʋ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fan nyɛ nfɛɛrɛ kɩkyɛɛgɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ fanɛ nkɔlɔ kinyita mʋ gyɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ yɩla kɩmʋ kanɩn. Ɩmʋ sʋ an nyi fɛɛ a man waa fanɛ alibi akʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ kɔkɔlɔ nyita mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ yɩla kɩmʋ mʋ, ɩɩ bɩya nfɛɛrɛ kɩkyɛɛgɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ mɔlɩgɛ asa, nɩɩ kunu n‐yɩɩ man bʋ ɩmʋ tɔ, amaa dulinyaa tɔ kɔkɔlɔ nyita bɩrɛ ɩɩ bɩya lewu nɩn.

Fan kɩɩ kɔkɔlɔ nyita mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ yɩla mʋ, kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bɩya fanɛ. Ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fan yɩlɛ tɔ lɛɛ alibi mʋ lɩɩ fanɛ tɔ, nɩɩ fan waa bilen lɛɛ fanɛ kɔnɔ, nɩɩ fan nyɛ agbʋ lala lɩɩ alibi ɔwaapʋ mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ fanɛ nkɔlɔ ɩ ŋmaa fanɛ, nɩɩ fen biti fɛɛ fan wu mɛ bilen, nɩɩ fanɛ ansi ɩ payɩ fɛɛ fan lɔŋɔ fanɛ nsana, nɩɩ fen biti fɛɛ fan bɩɩtɛ alibi ɔwaapʋ mʋ kʋsʋ. Ɔkpa kʋmaa nɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, fan lɛɛ kaapʋ fɛɛ alibi akʋ ɩ man maa fanɛ lɩɩ asɩn nɩmʋ tɔ.

Ɩmʋ sʋ halɩɩ n maa kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ mʋ sa fanɛ gbaa mʋ, man gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa alibi mʋ sʋ, abɛɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ba waa mʋ alibi mʋ sʋ, amaa n kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ maa nɩn, kɛ ɩ yɛgɛ kɛ fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fen wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ nkɔlɔ ɩ gyan anɛ sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ.
Lɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ sʋ mʋ ɩ waa anɛ aniya tɔ.
Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bɩla ki tii sʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, fan yɛgɛ nɩɩ anɛ ansi i gyii, lɩɩ Titusi kensi‐gyii mʋ sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fanɛ kpini fan yɛgɛ nɩɩ mʋ kɔkɔlɔ ki yuuli mʋ.

Pɔyɩ kɛ ɔ ba fanɛ asɛ mʋ, n kaapʋ mɛ n‐yɩɩ fanɛ sʋ sa mʋ, nɩɩ fan man gyila mɛ ipeeli mʋ asɛ. Fɛɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ an tɔwɛ sa fanɛ maa gyɛ kesintin mʋ, kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ an kaapʋ anɛ n‐yɩɩ fanɛ sʋ sa Titusi mʋ, ɩ waa kesintin.
Mu kebiti mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ sa fanɛ mʋ lɔŋɔ tii sʋ, fɛɛ maa nyiŋi kanan mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ kpini fan nu mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ fan taa kufuu yɛ kɩkyɩkya kɔɔlɛ mʋ mʋ.
Mɛɛmɛ bɩrɛ, ɩ waa mɛ ɔkɔn fɛɛ n maa taalɛ taa mɛ n‐yɩɩ tʋʋ fanɛ sʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa tɔ.
Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, an biti fɛɛ fan bɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala mʋ waa Krisito kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ Masedoniya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ tɔ.
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ bee gyii awʋrʋfɔ, nɩɩ asɩn wuribi ii tu bamʋ, nɩɩ halɩɩ ba maa bamʋ kitiri gbaa mʋ, lɩɩ kensi‐gyii lala mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ bamʋ tɔ sʋ mʋ, bee bugi bamʋ nkɔlɔ tɔ bɛɛ kɛɛ (afulee).
N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ ba kɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ taalɛ kɛɛ, halɩɩ naa kyʋn bamʋ ɔlʋn sʋ. Nɩɩ lɩɩ bamʋ gbaa‐gbaa bamʋ kɩpɩrɛ sʋ mʋ,
ba payɩ ansi kʋlɛ anɛ fɛɛ bamʋ gbaa bamʋ ba nyɛ ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ba taalɛ taa kyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Gyudeya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ tɔ.
Nɩɩ ba waa kyʋn sʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ an waa tamaa yɛ bɛ taalɛ mʋ, amaa ba gyankpaa taa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ naa sa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu, nɩɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti tɔ sʋ mʋ, ba taa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ sa anɛ gbaa anɛ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ an kʋlɛ Titusi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla piili kɛkɛɛ kusun kɩnɩmʋ kasɛ mʋ, fɛɛ ɔ kyaga sʋ waa fanɛ aniya tɔ, kɛ fan tiisi waa fanɛ kɛkɛɛ kusun mʋ naa lʋwɛ.

N man wu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fan man waa kyʋn sʋ. Lɩɩ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ nɩn oo, katɔwɛ tɔ nɩn oo, kinyi tɔ nɩn oo, kɩ payɩ ansi kyɛ tɔ nɩn oo, kebiti mʋ nɩɩ fan sʋ sa anɛ nɩn oo, fan waa ɩmʋ kpini naa kyʋn sʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ an biti fɛɛ fan waa kyʋn sʋ lɩɩ fanɛ kɛkɛɛ kusun nɩmʋ gbaa tɔ.

Man gyɛ yɛ n yɩla kɔnɔsa kʋ n sa fanɛ nɩn, amaa n biti fɛɛ n nyɛ taa fanɛ kebiti mʋ taa kaala yɛ akʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ payɩ ansi bɛɛ waa kanɩn kɩdanbɩrasa mʋ lɛɛ, saamʋ n nyɛ wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ kebiti mʋ gyɛ kesintin.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ fen nyi anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kabwaala mʋ, fɛɛ maa gyɛ atɔ wuya gbaa mʋ, kpalɩ fanɛ sʋ mʋ o be biliŋi otiripu, kɛ lɩɩ mʋ kitiri mʋ sʋ mʋ, fan ba biliŋi atɔ wuya ana.
Mɛ nfɛɛrɛ lɩɩ asɩn nɩmʋ sʋ sa fanɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, ɩ bʋrɔn fɛɛ fan maa lʋwɛ kusun mʋ nɩɩ fan piili sun‐tɔ mʋ. Fanɛ ɩ gyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba gyankpaa ba sa nkɛɛ mʋ, nɩɩ fɛn bɩla fɛn sa lɩɩ fanɛ kɩpɩrɛ tɔ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fen yii kusun mʋ kasɛ mʋ, fan lʋwɛ kɩmʋ. Fan payɩ ansi waa kusun mʋ naa lʋwɛ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan payɩ ansi ŋmina yɩla mʋ, kɛ fan waa fanɛ abaa ɔkaa.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ɛɛ kɛɛ mʋ kɩpɩrɛ sʋ lɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ mʋ sʋ mʋ, ɩmʋ ɩɩ bɔla Ɩbwaarɛ ansi, man gyɛ lɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man sʋ mʋ sʋ.
Man gyɛ yɛ an biti an taa akʋ kitiri ba sʋla fanɛ kɛ fɛn kɛɛ kyʋn sʋ, amaa an biti fɛɛ fanɛ kpini kakyɩna tɔ kɩ waa kyɛɛkyɛɛ.

Nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ fanɛ ɩ sʋ gaa, nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ fɛn kyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ii tiri bamʋ mʋ tɔ. Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ kan ii tiri fanɛ mɔɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ba sʋ gaa mʋ, kɛ ba kyɛ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ tɔ. Saamʋ fanɛ kpini kakyɩna tɔ kɩ waa kyɛɛkyɛɛ.
Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kʋʋla kʋkyɔ mʋ, man nyɛ naa ban sʋ, nɩɩ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kʋʋla pii mʋ gbaa, ɩ kʋkwɛ mʋ kyɛɛkyɛɛ.”
N fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ gaa fɛɛ maa yɛgɛ nɩɩ Titusi payɩ ansi ɛɛ kyɛ fanɛ tɔ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ngbaa mɛ n kyɛ fanɛ tɔ mʋ.
Man gyɛ yɛ a maa tɔwɛ an kʋlɛ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ ba fanɛ asɛ, amaa lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ asɩn i tiri mʋ sʋ mʋ, ɔ taa mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ kɩpɩrɛ tɔ nɩn ɛɛ ba fanɛ asɛ.
An sun anɛ bɩrɩsa kʋ fɛɛ o buu mʋ ba fanɛ asɛ. Mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ Krisito kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ kpini bɛɛ yɩn mʋ, lɩɩ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ kɩtɔwɛ mʋ sʋ.

Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bɩla ki tii sʋ mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, Krisito kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ ɩ lɛɛ mʋ yɛ, a maa sʋ nkɛɛ nɩmʋ kusun mʋ, o tii anɛ sʋ. Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ kusun mʋ nɩɩ an waa an sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ an sa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu, kɛ ɩ kaapʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ an payɩ ansi an kyɛ tɔ.
An da anɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kɛ ɔkʋ ɔ man pwɩɩ anɛ lɩɩ nkɛɛ damantɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba taa waa anɛ abaa tɔ yɛ a kɩɩ sʋ mʋ.
Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ an biti mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, a waa ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ dɛ ɔkpa. Man gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ wʋlɛ ansi tɔ nkʋn, amaa asa gbaa ansi tɔ.
Kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ an bɩla sun anɛ bɩrɩsa kʋ tii bamʋ sʋ. Mʋ nɩɩ an wu fɛɛ ɩkpa gaalaagaa sʋ mʋ, ɔ sʋ kensi payɩ ɛɛ kyɛ tɔ. Nbɩɩnbɩɩ mʋ maa sʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii fanɛ tɔ sʋ mʋ, ɔ payɩ ansi gaa fɛɛ ɔ ba kyɛ tɔ.

Titusi bɩrɛ, ɔ gyɛ mɛ bɩrɩsa kusun osunpu ɔmʋ nɩɩ n maa mʋ an kyɛ fanɛ tɔ. Nɩɩ anɛ bɩrɩsa ana asansa mʋ nɩɩ ba maa mʋ bee kpee mʋ bɩrɛ, ba yɩlɛ Krisito kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ ayaa tɔ nɩn kɛ ɩ taa bɛɛrɛɛ bɩya Krisito.
Ɩmʋ sʋ fan lɛɛ fanɛ kebiti mʋ kaapʋ bamʋ, kɛ Krisito kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ ba wu kɩmʋ kesintin, kɛ ba wu kʋtɔ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ an kaapʋ anɛ n‐yɩɩ fanɛ sʋ mʋ.
Kesintin sʋ, ɩ man tiri fɛɛ n bɩla kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ sa fanɛ, lɩɩ afulee kɛkɛɛ kusun sa Ɩbwaarɛ asa, mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Gyudeya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ.

Lɩɩ fɛɛ n nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan kyɛ bamʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ n kaapʋ mɛ n‐yɩɩ fanɛ sʋ n sa Masedoniya abi. N tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ lɩɩ koo sun‐tɔ nɩɩ fanɛ Akiya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ abi fan kʋʋla n‐yɩɩ yɛ fan sa afulee. Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ kʋsaa asa gaalaagaa nɩɩ bamʋ gbaa bɛɛ kʋʋla bamʋ n‐yɩɩ kanɩn.

Amaa n sun anɛ bɩrɩsa ana banɩmʋ fanɛ asɛ, saamʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n kaapʋ mɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ fanɛ sʋ n sa Masedoniya abi mʋ, ɩ man ba waa kɩyan. Amaa fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ bamʋ mʋ, n nyi fan maa kʋʋla fanɛ n‐yɩɩ fɛn waa kanɩn.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ nɩɩ Masedoniya asa kʋ ba kan buu mɛ ba, nɩɩ ba be wu fɛɛ fan man kʋʋla fanɛ n‐yɩɩ mʋ, anɛ ipeeli ɩ gyɛ kawɛ bɔla, kɛ fanɔɔ fanɛ lɛɛ kɩlantan bɔla, fɛɛ a maa taa anɛ n‐yɩɩ tʋʋ fanɛ sʋ mʋ.

Ɩmʋ sʋ n wu yɛ i tiri fɛɛ n kʋlɛ mɛ bɩrɩsa ana yɛ ba gyankpaa mɛ ba fanɛ asɛ, kɛ ba ba kʋʋla afulee tʋʋtʋʋ mʋ nɩɩ fan da fanɛ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ fɛɛ fen biti fɛn sa mʋ. Amaa ɩ baa ɩ gyɛ tʋʋtʋʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ nkɔlɔ tɔ, man gyɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ nyan fanɛ.
Fan nyiŋi fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o duu atɔ duusa gbɛrɛɛ mʋ, ɛɛ nyɛ adɔɔ‐gyitɔ gbɛrɛɛ, nɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ o duu atɔ duusa gaa mʋ, ɛɛ nyɛ adɔɔ‐gyitɔ gaa.
Fanɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɔ sa kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ lɩɩ mʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ yɛ ee biti ɔ sa mʋ, kɛ ɩ man ba waa fɛɛ ɩɩ kɔ mʋ, abɛɛ ɔkʋ ɩɩ nyan mʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ sa kɔkɔlɔ fuuli tɔ.
Ɩbwaarɛ ɩɩ taalɛ yɛgɛ kɛ fan nyɛ kabwaala kyʋn sʋ, saamʋ fen biti fan nyɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kii tiri fanɛ, kɛ fan nyɛ kyʋn sʋ, kɛ fan kyɛ kusun danbɩrasa kʋmaa tɔ.
Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ,
“Ɩbwaarɛ ii bugi mʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ, ɛɛ kɛɛ atiripu atɔ,
nɩɩ mʋ kɩdanbɩrasa kɩ man sʋ ɔkaa.”
Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ sa oduupu atɔ duusa yɛ agyitɔ‐gyisa mʋ, mʋ kʋlʋn maŋa ii biti ɔ sa fanɛ atɔ duusa mʋ, kɛ ɩ kɔyɩ, kɛ ɩ sɔyɩ, kɛ fan tɩŋɛ kʋkyɔ, kɩdanbɩrasa sʋ.
Ee biti ɔ yɛgɛ fan biliŋi atɔ wuya ana ɔkpa kʋmaa nɩmʋ sʋ, kɛ fan taalɛ waa kɩdanbɩrasa saŋa kʋmaa nɩmʋ. Kɛ lɩɩ afulee mʋ nɩɩ fan bɔla anɛ sʋ kɛɛ mʋ, ɩ yɛgɛ asa kpini ba taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ.
Kɛkɛɛ kusun mʋ nɩɩ fɛn waa falɛ, man gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asa wʋlɛ nkʋn tɔ nɩɩ ɩɩ kyɛ, amaa ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ asa gaalaagaa ba sʋ afwaala bɛɛ sa Ɩbwaarɛ.

Lɩɩ fɛɛ, fanɛ kusun danbɩrasa maa kaapʋ asa kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan du mʋ, bee biti ba taa bʋnyaa sa Ɩbwaarɛ, lɩɩ Krisito asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ gyii, yɛ kɩlɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ afulee kɛkɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ fɛn kyɛ bamʋ tɔ yɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ mʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ bamʋ gbaa bamʋ nkɔlɔ ɩ gyan fanɛ sʋ, nɩɩ bee biti ba baa bɛɛ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ bɛɛ sa fanɛ, lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala kʋkyɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sa fanɛ sʋ mʋ.
Fan yɛgɛ a taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ, lɩɩ kɛkɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ kudubi mʋ sʋ.

Lɩɩ Krisito n‐yɩɩ kasɛ kɩbɩya yɛ mʋ kɩbwahn sʋ mʋ, n kʋlɛ fanɛ. Mɛ, Pɔɔlɩ mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ tɔ akʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, n kan n bʋ fanɛ asɛ mʋ, n bɩya mɛ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ katɔwɛ tɔ, amaa nɩɩ n man kan n bʋ fanɛ asɛ mʋ, n yɩlɛ kɩnyɩn tɔ n tɔwɛ mʋ,

n kʋlɛ fanɛ fɛɛ n kan ba fanɛ asɛ mʋ, fan man yɛgɛ n ba yɩlɛ kɩnyɩn tɔ tɔwɛ sa fanɛ. Amaa n kan ba mʋ, n biti n ba yɩlɛ kɩnyɩn tɔ tɔwɛ sa bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ yɛ dulinyaa atɔ danbɩrasa kebiti sʋ nɩɩ an waa Ɩbwaarɛ kusun mʋ.
Ɩ gyɛ kesintin fɛɛ an bʋ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ bɩrɛ, amaa man gyɛ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ kɩnaa nɩɩ an kɔ.
Adʋntɔ mʋ nɩɩ an sʋ an kɔ mʋ, man gyɛ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ adʋntɔ kudubi, amaa ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ adʋntɔ bʋlʋnsa mʋ nɩɩ ii nyita ɔlʋn kumu kʋmaa nɩmʋ.
An sʋ ɩmʋ an nyita nfɛɛrɛ kʋmaa, yɛ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ alala‐sɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ii tii nyɩmɩsa kɩnyɛ bɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ an kɔ gyii nfɛɛrɛ kʋmaa nɩmʋ sʋ fɛɛ ɔdʋn, kɛ ɔ ba nyɛ kʋsʋ‐nu sa Krisito.
Nɩɩ fan kan nyɛ kʋsʋ‐nu naa lʋwɛ mʋ, an biti a ba bɩɩtɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba waa kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn mʋ asʋ.

Fanɛ fanɛ bɩrɛ sʋsʋ‐sʋsʋ wʋlɛ nkʋn nɩɩ fɛn kɩɩ atɔ. Nɩɩ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ kan kɔɔlɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ gyii fɛɛ ɔ gyɛ Krisito lɛɛ mʋ, ɩ dagaa maa wu fɛɛ anɛ gbaa anɛ an gyɛ Krisito lɛɛ nɩn, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ mʋ gbaa mʋ gyɛ mʋ.

Halɩɩ nɩɩ n kan n kaapʋ mɛ n‐yɩɩ kyʋn sʋ gbaa lɩɩ ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ sa anɛ yɛ a taa kyɛ fanɛ tɔ kɛ i kpiya fanɛ ansi tɔ, nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ yɛ an bɩɩtɛ fanɛ tʋʋ kasɛ sʋ mʋ, ipeeli ɩ mɛɛ yɛ i gyii mɛ lɩɩ ɩmʋ sʋ.
Nɩɩ n mee biti ɩ naa ba fɛɛ, n kyʋrɔɔ mɛ ɩwʋlɛ n sʋ n ŋaala fanɛ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ akʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Pɔɔlɩ ɩwʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyʋrɔɔ mʋ, sʋ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋlʋn nɩɩ i budu. Amaa nɩɩ ɔ bʋ anɛ asɛ bɩrɛ, ɔ pɔɔ nɩɩ mʋ asɩn tɔwɛsa ɩ mɛɛ kaapʋ sɛhn.”
Kanɩn asa mʋ ɩ dagaa ba maa bɩɩ fɛɛ, asɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ an man bʋ fanɛ asɛ nɩɩ an kyʋrɔɔ anɛ ɩwʋlɛ tɔ sa fanɛ mʋ, ɩmʋ maŋa nɩɩ an bʋ fanɛ asɛ gbaa, an biti a tɔwɛ fanɛ.

Kesintin tɔ mʋ, ɩ sʋ anɛ kufuu gbaa fɛɛ a taa anɛ n‐yɩɩ an biri, abɛɛ an kaala yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ lɛɛ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ bɛɛ kaapʋ fɛɛ ba gyɛ asa kparɛ mʋ. Fɛɛ ba maa sʋ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ bee biri abaa abɛɛ bɛɛ kaala abaa mʋ, man gyɛ amelensi‐sɩn ndee abɛɛ?
Nɩɩ anɛɛnɛ bɩrɛ, a mɛɛ yɛ a kaapʋ anɛ n‐yɩɩ naa kyʋn anɛ ɩkaa sʋ. Amaa an biti a kaapʋ anɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ kusun mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa waa anɛ abaa tɔ, halɩɩ an waa kɩmʋ ba fʋʋ fanɛ asɛ mʋ.
Nɩɩ a mɛɛ kaapʋ anɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ fanɛ sʋ an kyʋn sʋ, naafɔɔ a man dɩn fʋʋ fanɛ asɛ mʋ, amaa anɛ ɩ gyankpaa taa Krisito asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ kɩtɔwɛ ba fʋʋ fanɛ asɛ.

Ɩmʋ sʋ a mɛɛ kaapʋ anɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ kusun mʋ nɩɩ akʋ ba waa mʋ sʋ, fɛɛ anɛ ɩ waa ɩmʋ mʋ. Amaa anɛ tamaa ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ nɩɩ fan sʋ mʋ, kɩ nyɛ akyɔ tii sʋ, kɛ anɛ kusun mʋ nɩɩ an sun fanɛ asɛ mʋ, kɩ nyɛ yɛlɩgɛ tii sʋ naa fʋʋ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ yɩla mʋ ɔkaa.
Kɛ a nyɛ tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sa ɩsʋwʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ fanɛ ansi tɔ mʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ an mee biti a maa kaapʋ anɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ kusun mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ tɛɛ wʋla waa kasɛ kʋ sʋ.

Amaa ɩ dagaa fɛɛ a maa waa fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ mʋ. Ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ kaapʋ mʋ n‐yɩɩ mʋ, ɔ kaapʋ mʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ waa mʋ sʋ.”
Lɩɩ fɛɛ man gyɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ o du mʋ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi ii gyii mʋ sʋ, amɔɔ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ kaapʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ o du mʋ.
Nɩɩ fan kan nyɛ kenyiita gbɛrɛɛ sa mɛ lɩɩ mɛ amelensi‐sɩn nɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, naafɔɔ ɩ bʋrɔn. Nɩɩ n nyi fɛɛ fen biti fɛn waa kanɩn.
Krisito ayaa tɔ nɩɩ n yɩlɛ n kɔ fanɛ sʋ kɔkʋrʋkɔ falɛ. Fen du nɩn fɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man nyi ɔnyɩn nɩɩ ɔ man sʋ ineesi ɩkʋ, nɩɩ n sʋ n sa ɔnyɩn kekili, nɩɩ ɔnyɩn maŋa ɩ gyɛ Krisito.
Amaa n sʋ kufuu fɛɛ ɔkʋ ii biti o be nyita fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ lɩɩ Krisito mʋ nɩɩ fan taa fanɛ nkɔlɔ kpini buu mʋ mʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ kɩnansɛ taa mʋ kɔnɔ ɔkɔn pɩna Hawa mʋ.

Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ ba tɔwɛ asɩn lɩɩ Yesu kʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kwɩɩ yɛ Yesu mʋ nɩɩ an tɔwɛ mʋ asɩn mʋ, abɛɛ nɩɩ fan kan nyɛ kayaayu kʋ, nɩɩ kɩ kwɩɩ yɛ kayaayu mʋ nɩɩ fan daa kɩnyɛ mʋ, abɛɛ nɩɩ fan nu asɩn danbɩrasa kʋ, nɩɩ ɩ kwɩɩ lɩɩ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ, ɩɩ kaapʋ nɩn fɛɛ fɛn mɛɛ kɛrɛ kanɩn atɔ kɩkɔɔlɛ kyula.
Amaa n mɛɛ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ yɛ n bʋ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ asunpu kparɛ mʋ kasɛ pii falɛ gbaa.
Nɩɩ n kan n gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ man nyi katɔwɛ gbaa mʋ, n sʋ kinyi lɩɩ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ an kaapʋ fanɛ ɔkpa kʋmaa sʋ yɛ saŋa kʋmaa, nɩɩ kanɩn nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ.
N maa tɔwɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn danbɩrasa sa fanɛ mʋ, n man kɔɔlɛ fanɛ sɛhn, nɩɩ bɩya mɛ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ, kɛ ɩ nyɛ waa fanɛ asa kparɛ mʋ, n waa alibi nɩn abɛɛ?
N taa kɩkpɩnɛ tʋʋ Krisito kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ ɩkʋ sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ n kɔɔlɛ nkyɛtɔ lɩɩ bamʋ asɛ, kɛ n nyɛ ba kyɛ fanɛ tɔ.

Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n kyɩna n bʋ fanɛ asɛ nɩɩ i tiri mɛ mʋ, n man yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɩ waa kasʋla fanɛ sʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ mɛ bɩrɩsa ana mʋ nɩɩ ba lɩɩ Masedoniya mʋ ba bɩya mɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ii tiri mɛ. N kɩtaa mɛ n‐yɩɩ ɔkpa kʋmaa nɩmʋ sʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n man ba waa kasʋla fanɛ sʋ, nɩɩ n biti n kyaga sʋ waa kanɩn.
Fɛɛ Krisito kesintin mʋ maa bʋ mɛ tɔ falɛ mʋ, n tɔwɛ yɛ ɔkʋ man bʋ Akiya kɩbaafʋn nɩmʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ tii mɛ n‐yɩɩ kɩkaapʋ nɩmʋ sʋ.
N maa tɔwɛ falɛ mʋ, ɩ kaapʋ nɩn fɛɛ n mee biti fanɛ asɩn abɛɛ? Ayee! Ɩbwaarɛ nyi fɛɛ n biti fanɛ asɩn.
Nɩɩ ɩmʋ nɩɩ n waa mʋ n biti n kyaga sʋ n waa, kɛ ɩ nyɛ tii bamʋ nɩɩ bee biti ɩkpa ba kʋsaa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ mʋ ɔkpa. Lɩɩ fɛɛ bɛɛ kaapʋ yɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa kusun mʋ, anaa bamʋ lɛɛ gyɛ kʋlʋn nɩn.
Kanɩn asa maŋa ba gyɛ antɩŋɛsa asunpu mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ pɩna asa lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ bee sun kusun mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ba baala bamʋ daa bɛɛ waa fɛɛ ba gyɛ Krisito asunpu.
Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ man gyɛ asɩn kyinkyinsa, lɩɩ fɛɛ Sɩtaanɛ gbaa‐gbaa ɩɩ taalɛ baala mʋ daa ɛɛ ŋalɩgɛ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ.

Kanɩn gbaa nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ asɩn kyinkyinsa fɛɛ Sɩtaanɛ ayaafɔlɛ gbaa ba baala bamʋ daa, nɩɩ ba waa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ nbɔɔ mʋ nɩɩ bamʋ ɩkpa ii kyiigi mʋ. Laalaalʋwɛ mʋ bee biti ba nyɛ bamʋ asun libi kʋkɔka.
N pɩla tɔ n tɔwɛ yɛ, ɔkʋ ɔ man fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ n gyɛ omelensipu. Amaa nɩɩ fɛn kan fɛ nfɛɛrɛ kanɩn mʋ, ɩmʋ bɩrɛ fɛn taa mɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan taa omelensipu mʋ, kɛ n nyɛ kaapʋ mɛ n‐yɩɩ gbɛrɛɛ.
Ɩmʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ falɛ, man gyɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ ii biti fɛɛ n tɔwɛ, amaa n‐yɩɩ kɩkaapʋ asɩn nɩmʋ tɔ mʋ, n tɔwɛ nɩn fɛɛ omelensipu.
Fɛɛ asa gaalaagaa ba maa kaapʋ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ dulinyaa abi bɛɛ waa mʋ, ngbaa mɛ n biti n kaapʋ mɛ n‐yɩɩ.
Fan maa yɛ fan sʋ kanyaasɩn gaa sʋ mʋ, fɛn nyɛ kenyiita fen nu amelensipu asɛ.
Kesintin tɔ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa fanɛ fɛɛ anyɛ, abɛɛ ba sʋ fanɛ bee biliŋi sʋ, abɛɛ bee gyii fanɛ, abɛɛ bɛɛ kɩɩ fanɛ kɩyan, abɛɛ bɛɛ kpaalɛ fanɛ ɩtan gbaa mʋ, fɛn taalɛ fɛn nyɛ kenyiita fen sa bamʋ.
Ɩ sʋ mɛ ipeeli nɩɩ n kɔɔlɛ kyula fɛɛ, atɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa falɛ bɩrɛ, an gyɛ apɔɔsɩpʋ ɩmʋ tɔ gaa.
Amaa nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ɔ man sʋ kufuu fɛɛ ee biti ɔ kaapʋ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋ sʋ mʋ, n maa tɔwɛ fɛɛ omelensipu falɛ mʋ, ngbaa mɛ n mɛɛ yɛ n waa kufuu fɛɛ n kaapʋ mɛ n‐yɩɩ ɩmʋ sʋ.
Asa maŋa ba gyɛ Hibriwu abi nɩn abɛɛ? Kanɩn nɩɩ ngbaa mɛ n gyɛ. Ba gyɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi nɩn abɛɛ? Kanɩn nɩɩ ngbaa mɛ n gyɛ. Ba gyɛ Abraham anaana‐bii nɩn abɛɛ? Kanɩn nɩɩ ngbaa mɛ n gyɛ.

Ba gyɛ Krisito ayaafɔlɛ nɩn abɛɛ? N nyi mɛ katɔwɛ nɩmʋ maa duli ɩbʋn bɩrɛ, amaa n gyɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ kparɛ n kyɔ bamʋ. N sun kusun ɔlʋn sʋ n kyɔ bamʋ, nɩɩ ba tii mɛ ibu saŋa kʋmaa nɩmʋ ɩ kyɔ bamʋ, ba taa awulibi tɩŋɛ mɛ libi‐libi ɩ kyɔ bamʋ, nɩɩ n gyaŋa lewu saŋa kʋkyɔ.
Gyiwu abi ba taa awulibi tɩŋɛ mɛ adɩsa yɛ akpanɔ kanɩn ɩlɩɩ inuu.
Nɩɩ Roma abi gbaa ba taa abɩlɩtɔ kpekpesen da mɛ ɩlɩɩ ɩsa, nɩɩ saŋa kʋ asa ba twɩɩ mɛ abuu, nɩɩ ɔkʋlɩ lala taa mɛ naa watɛ ɩlɩɩ ɩsa, nɩɩ kakaakʋ n dɛ ɔpʋ sʋ kalayɩ tɩyɛ kyɔwɛ.

Mɛ kɩnatɛ tɔ mʋ, n gyaŋa kinsi‐payɩ gaalaagaa. N nyɛ kinsi‐payɩ lɩɩ ɩbʋn kɩbɔla sʋ, yɛ ayu mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ nyan bɛɛ kɔɔlɛ atɔ abaa tɔ, yɛ mɛ asa Gyiwu abi, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ abaa tɔ. Nɩɩ n nyɛ kinsi‐payɩ ndɛ lala tɔ, yɛ ɩsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, yɛ ɔpʋ sʋ. Nɩɩ n nyɛ kinsi‐payɩ lɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ pɩna yɛ ba gyɛ anɛ Krisito abuupu mʋ asɛ.
N sun kusun kenken nɩɩ n kpɩnɛ, halɩɩ nkɛ damantɛ n mɛɛ nyɛ nsɩɩrɛ n dɛ. Akʋn yɛ bʋlɩfɔ nɩɩ n naa, nɩɩ saŋa gaalaagaa sɛhn man loo mɛ kɔnɔ tɔ. Nɩɩ n pan atɔ bunsa nɩɩ n dɛ awɔɔ.
Ɩnɩmʋ kpini ɩ naa dɛ, ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ nyan mɛ kakɛ kʋmaa mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ n fɛ Krisito kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ sʋ.
Anɩmʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii ɩɩ kɔɔgɛ sʋ, nɩɩ n mee su n sa mʋ? Anɩmʋ nɩɩ ba pɩna mʋ ba waa alibi tɔ, nɩɩ mɛ ɔtɔ tɔ mɛɛ fɔyɩ mɛ?
Nɩɩ n kan i tiri fɛɛ n kaapʋ mɛ n‐yɩɩ mʋ, n biti n kaapʋ mɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ mɛ kɩpɔɔsɛ sʋ nɩn.
Anɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Mʋ‐Sɛ, nɩɩ ayɩn‐bi ɩ gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ kakpaa mʋ, i nyi yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ falɛ man gyɛ antɩŋɛsa.
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n bʋ Damasiko kadɛ tɔ mʋ, Owura Aretasi mʋ ɔsʋwʋlɛ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ lɛɛ akunpu yɛ ba kun nbunɔ mʋ nɩɩ ii loo Damasiko kadɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩbandɩyɛ kɩ kyaabɔɔ kɩmʋ mʋ, kɛ ba nyɛ kɩtaa mɛ.
Amaa akʋ ba taa mɛ waa kɩlantan tɔ, bʋlɛ kɩbandɩyɛ mʋ ɔbɔ tɔ, kpɩlɩgaa mɛ yii, nɩɩ n nyɛ sɩlɛ lɩɩ mʋ abaa tɔ.
Ɩ dagaa n maa kyaga sʋ kaapʋ mɛ n‐yɩɩ. Halɩɩ ɩ maa man sʋ tɔnɔ gbaa mʋ, nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ n biti n tɔwɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛgɛ nɩɩ n wu fɛɛ idee, yɛ asɩnlɛɛ kaapʋsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa sa mɛ.

Ɔnyɩn kʋ kyɩna ɔ bʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Krisito obuupu. Nsu kudu ana ndee nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa mʋ kpee sʋsʋ sasapʋ mʋ tɔ. N man nyi yɛ ɩnɩmʋ ɩ waa kanɩn nɩn kesintin, abɛɛ ansi sʋ atɔ nɩɩ o wu fɛɛ idee, amɔɔ Ɩbwaarɛ nkʋn i nyi.
N bwii n tɔwɛ yɛ, ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ mʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kpini nɩɩ ɩ taa kpee sʋsʋ nɩn o, mʋ kala nkʋn nɩɩ ɩ taa kpee nɩn o, n man nyi, amɔɔ Ɩbwaarɛ nkʋn i nyi.
Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ maa taa mʋ kpee paradise mʋ, o nu asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba mɛɛ taalɛ tɔwɛ, yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa man sʋ ɔkpa yɛ ɔ tɔwɛ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ n biti n kaapʋ mɛ n‐yɩɩ mʋ, kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ ba ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ n biti n kaapʋ n‐yɩɩ. N mɛɛ yɛ n kaapʋ mɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ, amɔɔ mɛ kapɔɔsɛ sʋ nkʋn.

Halɩɩ nɩɩ n kan n kaapʋ mɛ n‐yɩɩ gbaa mʋ, n mɛɛ yɛ n waa omelensipu. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ kesintin. Amaa n lɛɛ mɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ n‐yɩɩ kɩkaapʋ tɔ, kɛ ɔkʋ ɔ man nyɛ kaala mɛ kyʋn kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ o wu mɛ maa waa sʋ, abɛɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ sʋ.

Kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa kɛ n man taa Ɩbwaarɛ kɩlɛɛkaapʋ damantɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa sa mɛ mʋ waa n‐yɩɩ alala‐sɩn sʋ mʋ, ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ sun kʋlɔ‐libi kʋ waa mɛ n‐yɩɩ tɔ fɛɛ owii, nɩɩ kii yii mɛ. Nɩɩ kʋlɔ kɩɩ nyanla mɛ, nɩɩ kii tii mɛ ɔkpa, kɛ n man nyɛ n waa mɛ n‐yɩɩ alala‐sɩn tɔ.
N kʋlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu ɩlɩɩ ɩsa fɛɛ ɔ lɛɛ ɩmʋ lɩɩ mɛ sʋ.

Amaa ɔ lɛɛ mɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mɛ kabwaala mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ sa fʋ mʋ, ɩ kʋkwɛ fʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ kɩpɔɔsɛ mʋ tɔ nɩɩ mɛ ɔlʋn mʋ ɩɩ lɩɩ ifuli.” Ɩmʋ sʋ n biti n kaapʋ mɛ n‐yɩɩ kensi‐gyii tɔ gaa lɩɩ mɛ kɩpɔɔsɛ tɔ, kɛ Krisito ɔlʋn mʋ kɩ ba bun mɛ sʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ lɩɩ Krisito sʋ mʋ, mi ansi i gyii lɩɩ mɛ kɩpɔɔsɛ tɔ, yɛ asebi tɔ, yɛ kayɩɩ kɩtaa tɔ, yɛ kanyanla tɔ, yɛ awʋrʋfɔ tɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n pɔɔ mʋ, saŋa maa nɩɩ n sʋ ɔlʋn.

N waa fɛɛ omelensipu, amaa fanɛ i nin mɛ nɩɩ n waa kanɩn. Naafɔɔ fanɛ ɩ dagaa fan maa lɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n du mʋ kaapʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ halɩɩ n maa man gyɛ sɛhn gbaa mʋ, bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ yɛ ba gyɛ “Krisito asunpu kparɛ” ba man kyɔ mɛ pii falɛ gbaa.
Nɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ lɛɛ ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ n gyɛ Krisito osunpu mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, n nyɛ kɔkɔlɔ yɩlɛ tɔ, nɩɩ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ n waa ɩsɩnkaala yɛ adangana yɛ asɩn kyinkyinsa fanɛ asɛ.
Mɩnɛ atɔ nɩɩ Krisito kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ asansa mʋ ba nyɛ nɩɩ fanɛ bɩrɛ fan man nyɛ? Amɔɔ afulee asɩn nɩɩ n man taa ba sʋla fanɛ. Nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ kanɩn bɩrɛ fan taa mɛ alibi kɛɛ mɛ.

Nbɩɩnbɩɩ n kʋʋla lʋwɛ n ba bɔɔ fanɛ sʋ ɩlɩɩ sasapʋ. Nɩɩ mee biti fɛɛ n maa biliŋi kasʋla sa fanɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ man gyɛ fanɛ atɔ nɩɩ n biti, fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa nɩɩ n biti. Nɩɩ man gyɛ nbii ii biti atɔ bɛɛ yɩla bamʋ akʋʋgɛpʋ, amɔɔ akʋʋgɛpʋ ii biti bɛɛ yɩla bamʋ‐bii ana.
Ɩmʋ sʋ n biti n kpɩnɛ kɛ n nyita mɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa fanɛ sʋ, kɛ n taa mɛ n‐yɩɩ gbaa tii sʋ. Fɛɛ n maa sʋ kebiti lala falɛ sa fanɛ mʋ, fen biti fan nyɛ kebiti pii sa mɛ nɩn?
N nyi fan maa kɔɔlɛ kyula fɛɛ n man biliŋi kasʋla fanɛ sʋ. Amaa akʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ n taa mɛ kanyaasɩn ɔkpa sʋ n nyɛ fanɛ.
Nɛnɛ sʋ? Asa mʋ nɩɩ n sun bamʋ fanɛ asɛ mʋ, n bɔla bamʋ sʋ gyii fanɛ nɩn abɛɛ?
Mɛ ɩ kʋlɛ Titusi yɛ o kpee fanɛ asɛ, nɩɩ n sun anɛ bɩrɩsa kʋ yɛ o buu mʋ kpee. Abɛɛ fɛn fɛ nfɛɛrɛ yɛ Titusi ba pɩna fanɛ gyii nɩn? Man gyɛ nfɛɛrɛ kʋlʋn yɛ ɔkpa kʋlʋn sʋ nɩɩ anaa mʋ an naa?

Akʋtɔ fen fɛ nfɛɛrɛ nɩn fɛɛ an tɔwɛ an lɛɛ anɛ kɔnɔ nɩn. Ayee! Man gyɛ kanɩn nɩn. Amaa an tɔwɛ nɩn fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Krisito ii biti fɛɛ a tɔwɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ mʋ. Mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ ana danbɩrasa, kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ an waa mʋ, an waa nɩn kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ kyɛ fanɛ tɔ.

Ɩ sʋ mɛ kufuu fɛɛ n kan ba fanɛ asɛ mʋ, n mɛɛ yɛ n ba wu fanɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n biti fɛɛ n ba wu fanɛ mʋ, nɩɩ fanɛ gbaa fɛn mɛɛ yɛ fen wu mɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan wu mɛ mʋ. Ɩ sʋ mɛ kufuu fɛɛ n biti n ba wu nluu yɛ kayɩɩ‐basa yɛ agbʋ lala yɛ kigyi‐lɛɛ yɛ asa kɩsaalɛ yɛ asa asɩn kɩtɔwɛ yɛ alala‐sɩn yɛ nbarɩgɛ tɔ mʋ, ɩ maa bʋ fanɛ tɔ.

Ɩ sʋ mɛ kufuu fɛɛ nɩɩ n kan bwii ba fanɛ asɛ mʋ, mɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ bɩya mɛ kasɛ fanɛ ansi tɔ, kɛ mɛ kɔkɔlɔ ki nyita mɛ lɩɩ asa gaalaagaa mʋ nɩɩ ba wʋla waa alibi, nɩɩ ba man kyɛɛgɛ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ lɩɩ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ ineesi, yɛ kakyɩɩ yɛ kanyɩn biti kɩgyagaa, yɛ agyaga‐sɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ i tii sʋ mʋ.
Kɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ mɛ ɩlɩɩ sasapʋ mʋ nɩɩ n biti n ba bɔɔ fanɛ sʋ. Ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Pɔyɩ kɛ ba kɔɔlɛ asɩn kʋ kyula mʋ, ɩ dagaa asa anyɔ abɛɛ asa asá ba maa gyii ɩmʋ kesintin.”

Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n ba bɔɔ fanɛ sʋ kɩnyɔsapʋ mʋ, n da bamʋ nɩɩ ba wʋla waa alibi yɛ asansa mʋ amu tɔ. Nɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ n maa man bʋ fanɛ asɛ falɛ mʋ, n bɩla n nyiŋi fanɛ yɛ, nɩɩ n kan ba mʋ, n mɛɛ yɛ n yɛgɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba san bɛɛ waa alibi mʋ.
Lɩɩ fan maa biti fɛɛ n kaapʋ fanɛ fɛɛ Krisito ɩɩ bɔla mɛ sʋ ɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ, fen biti fan wu. Lɩɩ fɛɛ man gyɛ yɛ o yuuli yɛ fanɛ nɩn, amaa ɔ gyɛ ɔlʋnpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ fanɛ tɔ.

Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ gyɛ kesintin fɛɛ mu keyuuli sʋ nɩɩ ba da mʋ mata oyu laasa sʋ, amaa lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔlʋn tɔ sʋ mʋ ɔ tɛ nkpa tɔ. Kanɩn nɩɩ anɛ gbaa anɛ an yuuli fɛɛ mʋ, amaa lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔlʋn tɔ sʋ mʋ, an tii Krisito sʋ kɛ a bʋga kyɩna sun fanɛ.
Fan kɩɩ fanɛ kakyɩna tɔ kɛ fan kɩɩ yɛ ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ fan sʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii abɛɛ? Fan man nyi fɛɛ Krisito Yesu tɛ fanɛ tɔ? Ɔ tɛ fanɛ tɔ, amɔɔ kanɩn bɩrɛ fan tɩyɛ fanɛ kakyɩna tɔ nɩn.
Nɩɩ n sʋ tamaa fɛɛ fen biti fan bɩɩ yɛ anɛɛnɛ bɩrɛ a man tɩyɛ.
An kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ fɛɛ fan man kan waa alibi. Ɩ man gyɛ yɛ asa ba wu anɛ yɛ an waa atɔ, amaa fan waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ dɛ ɔkpa, halɩɩ nɩɩ i du fɛɛ an waa tɩyɛ gbaa.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ a mɛɛ taalɛ waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kii tii Krisito kesintin mʋ ɔkpa, amɔɔ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ kyɛ kesintin mʋ tɔ nkʋn.
Nɩɩ fan kan fan bʋlʋn, nɩɩ anɛɛnɛ an pɔɔ mʋ, ɩɩ waa anɛ ɔkɔn. Nɩɩ anɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ fan dan fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ naa lʋwɛ kyɛɛkyɛɛ.

Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ fan wu fɛɛ n maa man bʋ fanɛ asɛ falɛ mʋ, n kyʋrɔɔ fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ. Saamʋ nɩɩ n kan ba fanɛ asɛ mʋ, n mee biti fɛɛ n taa ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu taa sa mɛ mʋ tɔwɛ ŋmanyan fanɛ. Ɔlʋn maŋa nɩɩ ɔ taa sa mɛ yɛ n kyɛ fanɛ tɔ, kɛ fan dan fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ, man gyɛ yɛ a taa ɔlʋn mʋ nin fanɛ tʋʋ.

Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, mɛ katɔwɛ mʋ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, fan kyɩna danbɩrasa, fan payɩ fanɛ anɛ ansi kɛ fanɛ kakyɩna tɔ kɩ waa ɔdan kyɛɛkyɛɛ, fan nu mɛ asɛ, fan tɔwɛ kyula abaa, kɛ fan kyɩna kayɩɩ‐yuuli tɔ. N kʋlɛ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ kebiti wuya yɛ kayɩɩ yuuli wuya mʋ, ɔ baa ɔ bʋ fanɛ asɛ.
Fan taa kibiri abaa tɔ fwaala abaa.
Ɩbwaarɛ asa mʋ kpini bɛɛ fwaala fanɛ.
Anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kabwaala, yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti, yɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ kɩkyɛmɩnɛ ɔkɔn mʋ, ɩ baa ɩ bʋ fanɛ kpini asɛ.
Galatians: Mɛ Pɔɔlɩ mʋ nɩɩ n gyɛ Krisito osunpu, nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ asa kʋbʋ kʋ, abɛɛ ɔsa kʋ ɩ lɛɛ mɛ. Amaa Yesu Krisito yɛ Ɔsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ o kyiŋi mʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ ɩ lɛɛ mɛ waa osunpu.
N kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ n kyʋŋɛ fanɛ Krisito kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ fan bʋ Galati ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, nɩɩ akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ nfɩɩ mʋ kpini ba tii mɛ sʋ nɩɩ an fwaala fanɛ.
Anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ maa anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito ba bwaala fanɛ kɛ ba sa fanɛ kayɩɩ‐yuuli.
Lɩɩ anɛ alibi sʋ mʋ, Yesu kyula taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ lɛɛ saraga wu sa anɛ, kɛ ɔ nyɛ lɛɛ anɛ lɩɩ ndaga kakyɩna libi ɔlʋn mʋ tɔ. Anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti tɔ nɩɩ o kyula nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ kpini ɩ waa kanɩn.
Bʋnyaa ɔ baa ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ kakpaa! Amen.

I kyinkyin mɛ gaa fɛɛ fan maa tee biliŋi fanɛ kamaa sa Ɩbwaarɛ bilen, yɛgɛ mʋ ɩ bɔla Krisito kabwaala mʋ sʋ tɩɩ fanɛ. Nɩɩ fan biliŋi kpee fan buu asɩn kʋkwɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ akʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ.
Kesintin yɛgɛ asɩn danbɩrasa kʋ man bɩla ɩ bʋ tɔ. Amaa n tɔwɛ fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ nɩn, lɩɩ fɛɛ asa akʋ bɛɛ wuliti fanɛ tɔ, bee biti fɛɛ ba kyɛɛgɛ Krisito asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ.
Amaa, halɩɩ anɛ abɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ, kan lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba tɔwɛ fanɛ asɩn danbɩrasa kʋ, nɩɩ ɩ kwɩɩ yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ an tɔwɛ sa fanɛ mʋ, mʋ laakʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ bɩɩtɛ mʋ kʋsʋ kakpaa.
Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ an wʋla tɔwɛ mʋ, n bɩla n pɩla tɔ yɛ, nɩɩ ɔsa kʋ kan ɛɛ tɔwɛ fanɛ asɩn danbɩrasa kʋ, nɩɩ ɩ kwɩɩ yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ waa fanɛ lɛɛ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ bɩɩtɛ mʋ kʋsʋ kakpaa.

Nɩɩ ɩmʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ falɛ mʋ, ɩ kaapʋ nɩn fɛɛ n biti nyɩmɩsa ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ kyula nɩn abɛɛ? Ayee! N biti Ɩbwaarɛ nkʋn ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ kyula. N biti nyɩmɩsa ansi i gyii mɛ sʋ nɩn abɛɛ? Nɩɩ n kan n biti fɛɛ nyɩmɩsa ansi i gyii mɛ sʋ mʋ, naafɔɔ n mɛɛ yɛ n bɩla n gyɛ Krisito kɩyaafɔlɛ.
Mɛ bɩrɩsa ana akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu, n biti fan bɩɩ fɛɛ, asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ mʋ, ɩ man gyɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ daadimaadi asɛ.
Nɩɩ man gyɛ nyɩmɩsa kʋ asɛ nɩɩ n nyɛ ɩmʋ, abɛɛ ɔsa kʋ ɩ kaapʋ mɛ ɩmʋ. Amaa Yesu Krisito ɩ lɛɛ ɩmʋ kaapʋ mɛ.

Lɩɩ fɛɛ fan daa nu mɛ kakyɩna mʋ nɩɩ n bʋ kɩmʋ tɔ dɩdaa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n daa n bʋ Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐sun mʋ tɔ mʋ. Nɩɩ fan nu kanan mʋ nɩɩ n daa taa kumu tɔ ɔlʋn nyanla Krisito abi mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mʋ, nɩɩ n kpan mɛ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ n nyita Krisito kabwaarɛ‐sun mʋ.
Nɩɩ mɛ sara sʋ Gyiwu abi adamantɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, n gyankpaa bamʋ anɛ Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐sun mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ anɛ anaana‐tɔ awaasa mʋ n yɛgɛ nɩɩ i gyii mi kumu, nɩɩ n kpan mɛ n‐yɩɩ yɛ ɩ yɩlɛ.
Amaa lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala sʋ mʋ, ɔ wʋla lɛɛ mɛ yɩla pɔyɩ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ mɛ, nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ mɛ yɛ n ba sun mʋ.
Nɩɩ ɩ bɔla Ɩbwaarɛ ansi fɛɛ ɔ lɛɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ kaapʋ mɛ, kɛ n tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ lɩɩ Mu‐Bii mʋ sʋ, sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ, nɩɩ n man taasɛ biti kɩkaapʋ lɩɩ ɔsa kʋ asɛ.

Nɩɩ n man kpee Gyerusalem naa wu bamʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ Krisito asunpu mʋ pɔyɩ nɩɩ ngbaa mɛ n ba waa osunpu mʋ. Amaa n dan kʋsʋ opula maŋa tɔ nɩn, kpee Arabiya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, nɩɩ kamaa tɔ n lɩɩ tʋtɔ bwii ba Damasiko kadɛ tɔ.
Nsu nsa kamaa tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ n kpee Gyerusalem naa wu Pita.
Nɩɩ n kyɩna mʋ asɛ nkɛ kudu anu.
N man wu Krisito asunpu mʋ ɔkʋ tii sʋ, amɔɔ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Krisito mu‐supu Gyemisi nkʋn.
Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ, kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n kyʋrɔɔ n sa fanɛ falɛ gyɛ kesintin, n mɛɛ tɩn antɩŋɛsa.
Ɩmʋ kamaa tɔ mʋ n kpee Siriya yɛ Kilisiya ɩsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.
Kanɩn saŋa maŋa tɔ mʋ, Krisito abi kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ Gyudeya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ, ba man pɩɩ wu mɛ yɛ ansi.
Amaa kʋtɔ kʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ ba nu lɩɩ asa asɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ daa ɛɛ nyanla anɛ mʋ, nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ ɛɛ tɔwɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ Yesu gyii asɩn mʋ nɩɩ naafɔɔ ɔ daa kpan mʋ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ o nyita mʋ.”
Ɩmʋ sʋ ba yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ lɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba nu lɩɩ mɛ sʋ.
Nsu kudu ana kamaa tɔ mʋ, n bwii kpee Gyerusalem. N maa Banabasi i kpee nɩɩ n taa Titusi tii sʋ kpee.

N kpee tʋtɔ nɩn, lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ lɛɛ kaapʋ mɛ fɛɛ n kpee. N maa abɩlɩsa mʋ an gyaŋɛ anɛ nkʋn, nɩɩ n lɛɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ n sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ kasɛ kaapʋ bamʋ. N waa kanɩn nɩn kɛ ɩ man naa ba fɛɛ kusun mʋ nɩɩ n waa yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ n san n waa falɛ mʋ, ɩ man ba biliŋi kɩyan.
Amaa Titusi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ mɛ asɛ, yɛgɛ be nyi maa gyɛ Giriki nyɩmɩsa gbaa mʋ, ɔkʋ man nyan mʋ yɛ ɔ tɩn mʋ oduu.

Amaa falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ ɩ ba, lɩɩ fɛɛ asa kʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ pɩna yɛ ba gyɛ akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu fɛɛ anɛ mʋ ba be loo anɛ tɔ, kɛ ba ba kɩɩ anɛ n‐yɩɩ kɩnyɛ Krisito Yesu tɔ, kɛ ba nyɛ taa anɛ biliŋi Gyiwu nbara mʋ anyɛ.
Amaa a man daa yɛgɛ anɛ n‐yɩɩ sa bamʋ. An waa kanɩn nɩn kɛ kesintin asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ ɩ nyɛ sii fanɛ tɔ kanɩn.

Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba daa ba gyɛ Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ agyankpaapʋ mʋ, ba man taa sɛhn tii mɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ n kaapʋ mʋ sʋ. Halɩɩ ba maa gyɛ agyankpaapʋ gbaa mʋ, ɩ man tiri mɛ. Lɛɛ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ bɩrɛ mɛɛ kɩɩ nyɩmɩsa ansi sʋ.

Amaa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ agyankpaapʋ banɩmʋ ba wu ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ taa asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ waa mɛ abaa tɔ yɛ n tɔwɛ ɩmʋ sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa asɩn kʋlʋn maŋa waa Pita abaa tɔ yɛ ɔ tɔwɛ sa Gyiwu abi mʋ.

Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ mʋ ɔlʋn bɔla Pita, mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Krisito osunpu sa Gyiwu abi, nɩɩ ɔlʋn mʋ ii sun kusun bamʋ tɔ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ maŋa ɔlʋn ɩ bɔla mɛ, Pɔɔlɩ gbaa, mʋ nɩɩ n gyɛ Krisito osunpu sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ, nɩɩ ɔlʋn maŋa ii sun kusun bamʋ tɔ.

Gyemisi maa Pita yɛ Gyɔn nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ nyi ba maa gyɛ kʋbʋ mʋ abɩlɩsa gbaa‐gbaa mʋ, ba bɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ bwaala ngbaa mɛ. Ɩmʋ sʋ ba gyɔɔ n maa Banabasi abaa tɔ kaapʋ fɛɛ anaa bamʋ kpini an sun kusun kʋlʋn. Nɩɩ an kyula yɛ n maa Banabasi a waa kusun bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ tɔ, kɛ bamʋ mɔɔ ba waa kusun mʋ Gyiwu abi tɔ.
Kʋtɔ kʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ anɛ tii sʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, a nyiŋi atiripu mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ bamʋ tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n wʋla payɩ mi ansi n waa.
Saŋa kʋ Pita maa kyɩna ba Antiyoki mʋ, n tɔwɛ tigi mʋ yɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa mʋ man dɛ ɔkpa.

Asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, pɔyɩ kɛ Gyemisi o sun anyɩn akʋ kpee Antiyoki mʋ, naafɔɔ Pita maa Krisito abuupu mʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ ɩ bʋga bee gyii lapɛ kʋlʋn tɔ. Amaa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ anyɩn mʋ ba naa fʋʋ tʋtɔ mʋ, Pita tɩn mʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ Krisito abuupu mʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ asɛ kigyii, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ sɩlɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi gbaa ba tɩn oduu mʋ.
Kanɩn gbaa nɩn, nɩɩ Gyiwu abi asansa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ ba gyɛ nnɔ nnyɔ‐nnyɔ wuya ana fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Pita waa mʋ, halɩɩ ɩ yɛgɛ Banabasi gbaa fɔyɩ ɔkpa o buu bamʋ.

N maa wu fɛɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa mʋ, man buu asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ kesintin ɔkpa sʋ mʋ, n tɔwɛ Pita Krisito abuupu mʋ kpini ansi tɔ yɛ, “Gyiwu obii ɩ gyɛ fʋ, yɛgɛ fʋ kakyɩna tɔ du fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi. Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ nyan Krisito abuupu mʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ yɛ ba kyɩna fɛɛ Gyiwu abi?”
Kakʋʋgɛ tɔ mʋ, maa fʋ an gyɛ Gyiwu abi gbaa‐gbaa, a man gyɛ “bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi, nɩɩ ba man buu Gyiwu nbara mʋ”.

Amaa an nyi fɛɛ ɩ man gyɛ Mosesi nbara mʋ kibuu sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ taa nyɩmɩsa fɛɛ, mʋ ɩkpa ii kyiigi, amɔɔ ɔ kɔɔlɛ Yesu Krisito gyii. Ɩmʋ sʋ, amɔɔ anɛ gbaa anɛ an kɔɔlɛ Krisito Yesu gyii, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ o wu anɛ fɛɛ anɛ ɩkpa ii kyiigi lɩɩ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ nɩɩ an sʋ Krisito tɔ, nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ nbara mʋ kibuu sʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋ man bʋ tɔ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ i wu fɛɛ maa buu nbara mʋ sʋ nɩɩ mʋ ɩkpa ii kyiigi.

Nɩɩ ɩ kan ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ anɛ kɩbɔla Krisito sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ i wu fɛɛ anɛ ɩkpa i kyiigi mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ ɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ an wu fɛɛ anɛ gbaa anɛ an gyɛ alibi awaapʋ fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ, ɩnɩmʋ ɩɩ kaapʋ nɩn fɛɛ Krisito sa alibi kɩwaa ɔlʋn tii sʋ nɩn abɛɛ? Ayee! Ɩ man gyɛ kanɩn!
Nɩɩ n kan kina nbara mʋ, nɩɩ n bwii n kyiŋi ɩmʋ mʋ, kanɩn bɩrɛ n tɩyɛ alibi tɔ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ n maa buu nbara mʋ, n wu fɛɛ ɩ mɛɛ sa nkpa. Ɩmʋ sʋ n wu sa nbara mʋ, kɛ n nyɛ kyɩna sa Ɩbwaarɛ.

Nɩɩ ɩ waa nɩn fɛɛ n maa Krisito nɩɩ ba daa mata oyu laasa sʋ. Nɩɩ n man bɩla n tɛ sa mɛ n‐yɩɩ, amaa Krisito Kayaayu mʋ kɩ bʋ mɛ tɔ. Nɩɩ kakyɩna mʋ nɩɩ n tɛ kɩmʋ tɔ nbɩɩnbɩɩ falɛ mʋ, kɩkɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐Bii gyii mʋ tɔ nɩɩ n tɛ, mʋ ii biti mɛ asɩn, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ nkpa yɩla sa mɛ.
Nɩɩ n man taa Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala mʋ yɩla ɩkaa sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ nɩɩ ɩ kan ɩ gyɛ nbara mʋ kɩbɔla sʋ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa ɩkpa ii biti i kyiigi Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ mʋ, kanɩn bɩrɛ ɩ kaapʋ nɩn fɛɛ Krisito kelewu mʋ man tiri.
Fanɛ Galati abi nfɛɛrɛ ɩ man fʋʋ fanɛ! Anɩmʋ ɩ waa fanɛ biila
kanɩn? Fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ ansi tɔ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ bugi tɔ Yesu Krisito kelewu oyu laasa mʋ sʋ asɩn sa fanɛ.
Kʋtɔ kʋlʋn nɩɩ n biti n taasɛ fanɛ. Fan maa daa nyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ, Mosesi nbara kibuu mʋ sʋ nɩɩ fan nyɛ Kayaayu mʋ, abɛɛ fan maa nu asɩn danbɩrasa nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ sʋ nɩɩ fan nyɛ kɩmʋ?
Mɩnɛ nɩɩ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ man fʋʋ fanɛ kanɩn? Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu nɩɩ fan taa piili fanɛ Krisito kusun mʋ, amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan taa fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa ɔlʋn taa lʋwɛ?
Awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ fan wu falɛ kpini mʋ ɩ waa kɩyan nɩn abɛɛ? N kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ ɩ man waa kɩyan.
Fan nyi fɛɛ fan maa buu Mosesi nbara mʋ sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sa fanɛ mʋ Kayaayu nɩɩ ɛɛ waa ɩsɩnkaala ɛɛ sa fanɛ mʋ, abɛɛ lɩɩ fan maa nu asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ, nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ gyii sʋ?
Ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Abraham kɩkɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gyii sʋ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kɔɔlɛ mʋ kyula fɛɛ mʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi.”
Ɩmʋ sʋ fan bɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gyii mʋ, ɩ gyɛ Abraham anaana‐bii gbaa‐gbaa.

Ba gyankpaa kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ fɛɛ lɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ kɔɔlɛ bamʋ kyula fɛɛ bamʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi. Kanɩn sʋ ɔ wʋla tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sa Abraham yɛ, “Fʋ sʋ nɩɩ n biti n bɔla waa dulinyaa asa kpini kusee.”
Abraham maa kɔɔlɛ gyii sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ waa mʋ kusee. Ɩmʋ sʋ bamʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ kpini, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ waa bamʋ kusee tii Abraham sʋ.

Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba taa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ kpini gyaga nbara mʋ kibuu sʋ kɛ ba bɔla Ɩbwaarɛ ansi mʋ, ba bʋ Ɩbwaarɛ nnɔ kɩtɔwɛ mʋ tɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man kyaga sʋ ee buu kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Mosesi nbara ɔwʋlɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ nnɔ kɩtɔwɛ mʋ gyan bamʋ sʋ.”

I bugi tɔ kaapʋ kesintin fɛɛ, ɔkʋ man bʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɛɛ bɔla nbara kibuu mʋ sʋ, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ o wu mʋ fɛɛ mʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi mʋ asɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ, ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ nɩɩ ɩkpa kyiigisa wuya ii biti ɔ nyɛ nkpa.”
Nbara mʋ kibuu man gyan kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ nbara mʋ ɩ kaapʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ nyɛ nkpa lɩɩ ɩmʋ kibuu sʋ.”

Amaa nnɔ kɩtɔwɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyan anɛ sʋ fɛɛ a maa man buu nbara mʋ, Krisito ka ɩmʋ kʋkɔ. Maa wu oyu laasa sʋ mʋ, ɔ kɔɔlɛ kɔnɔ tɔwɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyan anɛ sʋ mʋ sʋla. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ nnɔ waa ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ saa oyu sʋ mʋ.”

Krisito ka anɛ alibi kʋkɔ, kɛ kusee mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ waa Abraham mʋ, ɩ nyɛ bɔla Krisito Yesu sʋ taa ba sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ gbaa, taa lɩɩ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ mʋ, a nyɛ Kayaayu mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɛ ee biti ɔ sa mʋ.
Mɛ bɩrɩsa ana Krisito abuupu, n biti n taa dulinyaa kakyɩna nɩmʋ tɔ asɩn kaala asɩn nɩmʋ. Nɩɩ asa kʋ ba kan bɔ ntan yɩla bamʋ nsana mʋ, ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ nyita ɩmʋ abɛɛ ɔ taa kʋtɔ kʋ tii sʋ.

Ɩbwaarɛ maa da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ sa Abraham maa mʋ kanaana‐bii mʋ, ba man kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, “fʋ anaana‐bii,” nɩɩ ɩmʋ ii biti ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ asa mʋ ba kyɔ. Amaa asɩn mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, “fʋ kanaana‐bii,” nɩɩ ɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ mʋ kanaana‐bii kʋlʋn, nɩɩ obii maŋa ɩ gyɛ Krisito.

Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n kaapʋ mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ sa Abraham. Nɩɩ nsu ana yɛ adɩsa kamaa tɔ pɔyɩ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sa nbara mʋ, amaa nbara mʋ ɩ man taalɛ nyita abɛɛ kpayɩ katɔwɛ kyula mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ waa yɩla mʋ.

Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɩ kan ɩ gyɛ nbara mʋ kibuu sʋ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa ii biti ɔ nyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kusee mʋ, kanɩn bɩrɛ, ɩ man gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ kɩda mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɩ bɩla ɩ gyan. Amaa lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala mʋ sʋ mʋ, ɔ bɔla mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ kɩda mʋ sʋ taa kusee sa Abraham.

Nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ kanɩn bɩrɛ, mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sa nbara mʋ? Ɩbwaarɛ daa taa nbara mʋ nɩn tii sʋ kɛ ɩ kaapʋ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ alibi ɩ gyɛ. Ɩ dagaa nbara mʋ maa kyɩna naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Abraham kanaana‐bii mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɩla sa mʋ mʋ, ɔ ba. Ɩbwaarɛ taa nbara mʋ bɔla mʋ nbɔɔ sʋ taa sa Mosesi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ maa asa nsana mʋ abaa tɔ.
Amaa nɩɩ ɩ dan ɩ gyɛ nyɩmɩsa kʋlʋn mʋ, nsana ɔyɩlɛpʋ man tiri. Ɩbwaarɛ bɩrɛ gyɛ ɔkʋlʋn nɩn.

Ɩmʋ sʋ ɩɩ kaapʋ nɩn fɛɛ, nbara mʋ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ kɩda mʋ, mɛɛ kyɩna abaa sʋ nɩn abɛɛ? Ayee, man gyɛ kanɩn nɩn kpini‐kpini! Lɩɩ fɛɛ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa daa nyɛ nbara kʋ nɩɩ ɩ taalɛ sa nyɩmɩsa nkpa mʋ, naafɔɔ kanɩn nbara maŋa kibuu ɩ taalɛ yɛgɛ nyɩmɩsa ɩkpa i kyiigi Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ.

Amaa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, dulinyaa asa kpini ba bʋ alibi kɩbaa tɔ nɩn. Ɩmʋ sʋ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɛ ee biti ɔ sa mʋ, gyan Yesu Krisito kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ, nɩɩ ee biti ɔ taa sa.
Pɔyɩ kɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ kɩ ba mʋ, nbara mʋ ɩ dan nyan anɛ waa tɔ nɩn fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba tii bamʋ obu biri sʋ, naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ kɩ ba lɩɩ ifuli.
Ɩmʋ sʋ nbara mʋ ɩ kyɩna ɩ gyɛ anɛ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Krisito ba. Saamʋ, bɔla lɩɩ anɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti o wu fɛɛ anɛ ɩkpa i kyiigi mʋ asɛ.
Nbɩɩnbɩɩ kɩkɔɔlɛ Krisito gyii maa ba falɛ bɩrɛ, a man bɩla an bʋ nbara mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ anɛ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ kasɛ.
Kpalɩ fɛɛ fan maa kɔɔlɛ Krisito Yesu gyii sʋ mʋ, fanɛ kpini fan gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii ana.
Nɩɩ fanɛ kpini mʋ nɩɩ ba gyee fanɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee waa Krisito lɛɛ mʋ, ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ Krisito kudubi mʋ bʋ fanɛ tɔ.

Ɩmʋ sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ bɩrɛ, ɩ man bɩla ɩ bʋ tɔ fɛɛ akʋ ba gyɛ Gyiwu abi abɛɛ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi, abɛɛ akʋ ba gyɛ anyɛ abɛɛ akʋ ba gyɛ ndɛ abi, abɛɛ akʋ ba gyɛ anyɩn abɛɛ ba gyɛ akyɩɩ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fanɛ kpini fan gyɛ kʋkʋlʋn Krisito Yesu tɔ.
Nɩɩ fan kan fan gyɛ Krisito lɛɛ mʋ, kanɩn bɩrɛ fan gyɛ Abraham anaana‐bii, nɩɩ fen biti fan nyɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ sa Abraham mʋ.
Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, kebii‐pii mʋ nɩɩ ee biti o gyii mʋ‐sɛ kapatɩyɛ nɩɩ ɔ man pɩɩ dan, nɩɩ halɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa maa gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ gbaa mʋ, ɔ man kwɩɩ yɛ kɩnyɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ kɩkpaara mʋ sʋ mʋ.
Maa san ɔ gyɛ kebii‐pii mʋ, ɔ sʋ asa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kɩɩ mʋ sʋ, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kɩɩ mʋ atɔ mʋ sʋ bɛɛ sa mʋ, naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ mʋ‐sɛ yɩla mʋ yɛ o gyii kapatɩyɛ mʋ.
Kanɩn nɩɩ anɛ gbaa anɛ an daa an du fɛɛ nbii mʋ nɩɩ anɛ anaana‐tɔ yɛ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ atɔ kaapʋsa, ɩɩ nyan anɛ fɛɛ anyɛ.
Amaa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ yɩla kyɛɛkyɛɛ maa fʋʋ mʋ, o sun mʋ gbaa‐gbaa Mu‐Bii dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ kʋʋgɛ mʋ Gyiwu obii waa nbara mʋ tɔ,
kɛ ɔ nyɛ kɔɔlɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ nbara mʋ kasɛ mʋ yɛgɛ, kɛ anɛ kpini an nyɛ ba biliŋi Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii ana.
Lɩɩ fan maa gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii ana sʋ mʋ, o sun Mu‐Bii Kayaayu mʋ ɔ ba kyɩna fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ. Kayaayu mʋ ɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ an taalɛ tɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ, “Aba
abɛɛ Ɔsɛ.”
Ɩmʋ sʋ fan man bɩla fan gyɛ anyɛ, amaa fan gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii ana nɩn. Nɩɩ fan maa gyɛ mu‐bii ana falɛ bɩrɛ, fan gyɛ mʋ kapatɩyɛ mʋ agyipu.
Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fan man nyi Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, fan gyɛ anyɛ sa ɩdakpa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ anyɩrɩpɛ kʋ.

Amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ fan maa bɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ falɛ, abɛɛ n tɔwɛ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ bɩrɛ ɩ ba bɩɩ fanɛ falɛ mʋ, nɛnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fɛn bɩla bwii naa buu kanɩn ɩdakpa atɔ kaapʋsa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ ɔlʋn kʋ, nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ tɔnɔ? Fen biti fan bɩla biliŋi anyɛ sa ɩmʋ nɩn abɛɛ?
Fan sʋ kensi‐gyii nkɛ sa Gyiwu abi nkɛ nkʋ, yɛ ɩbwaayɩ ɩkʋ, yɛ ɩsaŋa ɩkʋ, yɛ nsu nkʋ.
Fanɛ asɩn ɩ sʋ mɛ kufuu, nɩɩ n fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ akʋtɔ mɛ kɩkpɩnɛ mʋ nɩɩ n kpɩnɛ fanɛ sʋ falɛ ii biti ɩ waa kɩyan.
Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, n kʋlɛ fanɛ nɩn fɛɛ fan baa fan du fɛɛ mɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ngbaa n maa gyɛ Gyiwu obii mʋ, n ba waa mɛ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ fanɛ. Nɩɩ fan man waa mɛ alibi akʋ.
Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan nyi mʋ, lɩɩ mɛ kʋlɔ sʋ nɩɩ n gyankpaa ba tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sa fanɛ.
Halɩɩ mɛ kʋlɔ kɩ maa gyɛ kasʋla sa fanɛ gbaa mʋ, fan man lɛɛ fanɛ ansi yɛgɛ mɛ, nɩɩ fan man kina mɛ. Amaa fan kɔɔlɛ mɛ abaa anyɔ fɛɛ n maa gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ, abɛɛ n maa gyɛ Krisito Yesu gbaa‐gbaa mʋ.
Nɩɩ kanɩn saŋa maa mʋ, kensi‐gyii lala bʋ fanɛ tɔ lɩɩ mɛ sʋ. Nɩɩ n taalɛ n tɔwɛ gbaa yɛ, nɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fɛn taalɛ nɩn, naafɔɔ fɛn kyɔlɛ fanɛ ansi gbaa fan sa mɛ. Nɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ, mɩnɛ ɩ waa?
N ba biliŋi fanɛ dʋn lɩɩ kesintin mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ n sa fanɛ mʋ sʋ nɩn abɛɛ?

Nɩɩ kanɩn asa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kaapʋ fanɛ asɩn kʋkwɩɩ mʋ bɩrɛ, bamʋ ansi ɩ payɩ fanɛ sʋ, amaa bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ man bʋrɔn. Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ bee biti mʋ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, ba barɩgɛ fanɛ lɩɩ mɛ asɛ, kɛ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fan baa fen nu bamʋ asɛ.
Ɩ bʋrɔn fɛɛ fanɛ ansi ɩ maa payɩ lɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋ sʋ, nɩɩ kʋtɔ maa gyɛ kʋtɔ danbɩrasa, kɛ ɩ man naa waa fɛɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n bʋ fanɛ asɛ mʋ nkʋn, amaa saŋa kʋmaa.
Mi‐bii ana danbɩrasa, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ keduŋidi ɩɩ kɩtaa ɔkyɩɩ mʋ, kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ ɩ bɩla ɩɩ waa mɛ sa fanɛ, naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Krisito kudubi mʋ ki loo bɔla fanɛ tɔ.
N daa biti nɩn fɛɛ n san n bʋ fanɛ asɛ nbɩɩnbɩɩ, naafɔɔ n nyɛ kyɛɛgɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ ɔlʋn sʋ n sa fanɛ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ mɛ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ tɔɔrɔɔ mɛ fanɛ sʋ.
Fan yɛgɛ n taasɛ fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan buu nbara mʋ. Fan man nu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ nbara mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ mʋ kasɛ nɩn abɛɛ?
Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, Abraham sʋ nbii‐nyɩnsa anyɔ, kɩnyɛ Haga mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ ɔkʋ, nɩɩ odibii Sara mɔɔ mu‐bii gyɛ ɔkʋ.

Obii mʋ nɩɩ kɩnyɛ‐kyɩɩ kʋʋgɛ mʋ, mʋ kakʋʋgɛ du nɩn fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ daadimaadi kʋʋgɛ obii mʋ, amaa odibii mu‐bii mʋ bɩrɛ, ba kʋʋgɛ mʋ bɔla asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ tɔwɛ yɩla mʋ sʋ nɩn.

Falɛ atɔ nɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ asɩn kaalasa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ sʋ kasɛ. Akyɩɩ anyɔ mʋ ba yɩlɛ sa ntɔwɛ‐kyula anyɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ waa maa asa nsana mʋ. Kɩnyɛ‐kyɩɩ Haga ɩ yɩlɛ sa katɔwɛ kyula mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ waa Sinayi kɩbɩɩ mʋ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ nbii mʋ nɩɩ Haga kʋʋgɛ mʋ gyɛ anyɛ nɩn.
Nɩɩ Haga ɩ yɩlɛ sa Sinayi kɩbɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Arabiya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ kɩ bɩla yɩlɛ sa ndaga Gyerusalem kadɛ lala mʋ, nɩɩ kɩmaa kɩmʋ asa kpini ba gyɛ anyɛ nɩn.
Amaa sʋsʋ Gyerusalem mʋ bɩrɛ gyɛ odibii‐kyɩɩ, nɩɩ mʋ ɩ gyɛ anɛ‐nyi.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ,
“O ogbentipu‐kyɩɩ,
fʋ mʋ nɩɩ fʋ man kʋʋgɛ kɩɩ,
yɛgɛ ɩ waa fʋ ɔkɔn,
fʋ mʋ nɩɩ fʋ man pɩɩta duŋi kɩɩ mʋ,
taa kensi‐gyii lala kuusi waa ɩlawʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ mu‐kuli sɩlɛ yɛgɛ mʋ mʋ, ii biti ɔ nyɛ nbii
ɔ kyɔ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ mu‐kuli man sɩlɛ yɛgɛ mʋ.”
Ɩmʋ sʋ mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, fan gyɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɩla pɔyɩ nɩɩ Sara ba kʋʋgɛ Isaki mʋ, kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fan gyɛ.
Kanɩn saŋa maŋa mʋ, obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ mʋ daadimaadi kakʋʋgɛ ɩkpa sʋ mʋ, nyanla obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kayaayu ɔlʋn tɔ mʋ. Nɩɩ kanɩn nɩɩ i du nbɩɩnbɩɩ gbaa.

Amaa mɩnɛ asɩn nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ mʋ? Ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, “Gya kɩnyɛ‐kyɩɩ mʋ maa mu‐bii‐nyɩnsa mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ kɩnyɛ‐kyɩɩ mu‐bii maa odibii‐kyɩɩ mʋ mu‐bii ba mɛɛ bʋga bee gyii ɔsɛ mʋ kapatɩyɛ.”
Ɩmʋ sʋ mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, an man gyɛ kɩnyɛ‐kyɩɩ mʋ mu‐bii ana nɩn, amaa an gyɛ odibii‐kyɩɩ mʋ mu‐bii ana nɩn.
Krisito kɔɔlɛ anɛ yɛgɛ nɩɩ an nyɛ anɛ n‐yɩɩ. Kanɩn sʋ fan yɩlɛ tɔ kenken, kɛ fan man bɩla yɛgɛ ba taa fanɛ waa nbara mʋ kibuu anyɛ.
Fan nu! Mɛ Pɔɔlɩ n gyii fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ nɩɩ fan kan yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba tɩŋɛ fanɛ iduu mʋ, ɩ bɔla Ɩbwaarɛ ansi mʋ, kanɩn bɩrɛ Krisito man bɩla ɔ sʋ kyaarɛ sa fanɛ kpini‐kpini.
N bɩla n da fanɛ amu tɔ yɛ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba tɩn mʋ oduu mʋ, kanɩn bɩrɛ ɩ dagaa maa buu nbara mʋ kpini.
Fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fɛɛ fan buu nbara mʋ, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ o wu fɛɛ fanɛ ɩkpa i kyiigi mʋ asɛ mʋ, fan barɩgɛ lɩɩ Krisito asɛ, nɩɩ fan lɛɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala mʋ tɔ.
Amaa anɛɛnɛ bɩrɛ, Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ yɛgɛ nɩɩ an sʋ tamaa an gyoo Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ kɔɔlɛ anɛ kyula fɛɛ, anɛ ɩkpa i kyiigi mʋ asɛ lɩɩ anɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ, a maa buu Krisito Yesu falɛ mʋ, an tɩŋɛ iduu‐o, an man tɩŋɛ iduu‐o, man gyɛ ɩmʋ i tiri. Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ki tiri ɩ gyɛ yɛ Krisito kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ an nyɛ kebiti sa abaa.
Naafɔɔ fan kyɩna fan yɩlɛ tɔ danbɩrasa. Anɩmʋ i fun waa fanɛ nɩɩ fan yɛgɛ kesintin ɔkpa mʋ kibuu?
N nyi fɛɛ man gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ fanɛ yɛ fan ba waa mʋ lɛɛ mʋ, ɩ waa kanɩn.
Fan nyiŋi fɛɛ, “Bodobodo inyifo kɩfa‐tinsa gbɛrɛɛ ɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ bodobodo inyifo mʋ kpini i tin.”
N kɔɔlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ gyii fɛɛ, fan man yɛ fan kyɛɛgɛ naa buu ɔkpa pʋpwɛ kʋ. Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee nyita fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ maŋa mʋ, ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ bɩɩtɛ mʋ kʋsʋ.

Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, nɩɩ n kan n kaapʋ yɛ iduu kɩtɩn ɩ gyɛ asɩn tirisa nɩn, naafɔɔ mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ Gyiwu abi ba san bɛɛ nyanla mɛ? Nɩɩ ɩ daa ɩ gyɛ kanɩn nɩn, naafɔɔ Krisito kiwu oyu laasa sʋ asɩn mʋ, man dɩn bɩya asɩn kʋ.
N biti fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔɔrɔɔ fanɛ lɩɩ iduu kɩtɩn sʋ mʋ, naafɔɔ ba lɛɛ bamʋ awɛɛ tii bamʋ iduu kɩtɩn sʋ!

Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, fanɛ bɩrɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ kɔɔlɛ fanɛ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fan nyɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ kanɩn Mosesi nbara kibuu mʋ tɔ. Amaa fan man kan yɛgɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ kɩnyɛ mʋ kɩ sa fanɛ ɔkpa, kɛ fanɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kayalaga mʋ ki gyii fanɛ sʋ. Amaa fan taa kebiti sun abaa.
Mosesi nbara mʋ kpini ɩ lɩɩ kɔnɔsa kʋlʋn tɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Biti fʋ bɩrɩsa fɛɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ.”
Nɩɩ fan kan fan du fɛɛ ndʋnbwɛ nɩɩ fen duŋi nɩɩ fɛn larɩgɛ abaa mʋ, fan baa fan da sʋ, man gyɛ kanɩn mʋ fen biti fan mɔɔ abaa.
Ɩmʋ sʋ n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, fan yɛgɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ ɔ kaapʋ fanɛ ɔkpa, kɛ fan man nyɛ buu fanɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kayalaga.

Lɩɩ fɛɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Kayaayu mʋ ii biti mʋ, mɛɛ kyɩna yɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ ɩɩ yalaga mʋ, nɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ ɩɩ yalaga mʋ gbaa mɛɛ kyɩna yɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Kayaayu mʋ ii biti mʋ. Bɛɛ kɔ yɛ abaa saŋa kʋmaa, ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋlʋn fɛɛ fan waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fen biti mʋ.
Amaa nɩɩ fan yɛgɛ nɩɩ Kayaayu mʋ kaapʋ fanɛ ɔkpa mʋ, kanɩn bɩrɛ fan man bʋ nbara mʋ kasɛ.
Kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ asun libi ɩ mɛɛ baala. Ɩmʋ ɩkʋ ɩ gyɛ kɩlɩɩ okuli abɛɛ ɔkaa kamaa, yɛ kɩgyagaa ineesi, yɛ kabʋrʋkɔɔnɛ,
yɛ ɩdakpa kusun, yɛ akpa‐sɩn, yɛ kekisi, yɛ keluu, yɛ kayɩɩ‐basa, yɛ kɩnyɛ agbʋ, yɛ mɛ nkʋn n nyɛ, yɛ nbarɩgɛ tɔ, yɛ nfɛɛrɛ kɩfɛ fɛɛ mɛ nkʋn asɩn ɩ bʋrɔn.

Ɩkʋ mɔɔ ɩ gyɛ yɛ kensi payɩ libi, yɛ kata‐bʋʋ, yɛ kensi‐gyii kɩbansa, yɛ alibi kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ i tii sʋ. N da fanɛ amu tɔ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n wʋla da fanɛ amu tɔ mʋ yɛ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ falɛ kakyɩna tɔ mʋ, mɛɛ yɛ ɔ nyɛ loo Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ.
Amaa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ ɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ asa bɛɛ waa mʋ ɩ gyɛ kebiti, yɛ kensi‐gyii, yɛ keyuula, yɛ kenyiita, yɛ kʋwɛɛ kuwu, yɛ kɩdanbɩrasa kɩwaa, yɛ kesintin kigyii,
yɛ kɩbwahn kɩwaa, yɛ n‐yɩɩ kɩkɩta. Nbara kʋ man bʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɩɩ kɔ ii tii ɩnɩmʋ.
Bamʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ Krisito Yesu asa mʋ bɩrɛ, ba taa bamʋ alibi kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kayalaga yɛ kɩmʋ kɔkɔlɔ biti mʋ da mata oyu laasa mʋ sʋ mɔɔ ɩmʋ kpini.
Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ maa sa anɛ kakyɩna pʋpwɛ falɛ bɩrɛ, fan yɛgɛ kɛ ɔ gyankpaa anɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ.
Fan man yɛgɛ kɛ a kaapʋ anɛ n‐yɩɩ, kɛ a man waa anɛ bɩrɩsa ana agbʋ‐sɩn, kɛ fan man kɔ abaa kɔkʋrʋkɔ.

Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, nɩɩ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ kan tɩyɛ alibi tɔ mʋ, fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan buu Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ ɔkpa kyɛɛkyɛɛ sʋ mʋ, fan taa kebiti kyɛ mʋ tɔ, kɛ o bwii ba ɔkpa danbɩrasa mʋ sʋ. Amaa fan kɩɩ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ danbɩrasa, kɛ Sɩtaanɛ ɔ man nyɛ ɔkpa tʋʋ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ tɔ kɩɩ.
Fan yɛgɛ fanɛ bɩrɩsa ana asɩn ɩ baa ɩ gyɛ fanɛ asɩn. Nɩɩ fan kan waa kanɩn mʋ, ɩmʋ ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ fen gyii Krisito nbara nɩmʋ sʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan fɛ nfɛɛrɛ yɛ ɔ gyɛ kʋtɔ kʋ, yɛgɛ ɔ man gyɛ sɛhn mʋ, ɛɛ pɩna mʋ n‐yɩɩ nɩn.
Ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɔ kɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ awaasa i du. Nɩɩ ɩ kan ɩ bʋrɔn mʋ, kanɩn bɩrɛ ɛɛ taalɛ kaapʋ mʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ mʋ awaasa mʋ sʋ, yɛgɛ ɔ man taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ kaala ɔkʋ lɛɛ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ dagaa ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ maa sʋla mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ kasʋla.
Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kaapʋ mʋ abwaarɛsɩn mʋ, ɩ dagaa maa kyɛ mʋ ɔkaapʋpʋ mʋ tɔ, lɩɩ atɔ danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ mʋ.
Fan man pɩna fanɛ n‐yɩɩ. Ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ sisii Ɩbwaarɛ. Kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa duu mʋ, kɩmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɩŋɛ.

Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee duu kɛ o gyii mu alibi kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ ansi mʋ, mʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ maŋa tɔ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ tɩŋɛ lewu, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee duu kɛ o gyii Kayaayu mu ansi mʋ, Kayaayu maŋa tɔ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ nyɛ nkpa kakpaa.
A man yɛgɛ kɩdanbɩrasa kɩwaa o fii anɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ nɩɩ an man kan yɛgɛ ɩmʋ kɩwaa mʋ, kakaakʋ an biti a ba gyii ɩmʋ tɔnɔ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ an nyɛ ɩmʋ ɔkpa falɛ, fan yɛgɛ kɛ a waa kɩdanbɩrasa sa asa kpini, fɔnfɔn bamʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ anɛ bɩrɩsa ana akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ.
Yɛ fan wu akyʋrɔɔ‐bi lala nɩmʋ? Mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ kɩbaa nɩɩ n taa kyʋrɔɔ ɩmʋ nfɩɩ bɩya fanɛ!

Bamʋ nɩɩ bee biti yɛ asa ba wu bamʋ ifuli sʋ kɩdanbɩrasa mʋ, ɩɩ nyan fanɛ yɛ fan tɩŋɛ fanɛ iduu. Kʋtɔ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa kanɩn ɩ gyɛ yɛ, be mee biti ba tɔwɛ Krisito kelewu oyu laasa mʋ sʋ asɩn, kɛ ɔkʋ nyanla bamʋ.
Halɩɩ Gyiwu abi ba maa buu iduu kɩtɩn gbaa mʋ, be mee buu Gyiwu abi nbara mʋ. Amaa bee biti yɛ fan tɩŋɛ fanɛ iduu, kɛ ba nyɛ kaapʋ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ yɛ fan nu bamʋ katɔwɛ.
Amaa mɛ bɩrɛ, n mɛɛ kaapʋ mɛ n‐yɩɩ, amɔɔ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kelewu oyu laasa mʋ sʋ nkʋn, nɩɩ kɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ dulinyaa atɔ man gyɛ sɛhn mi ansi sʋ, nɩɩ ngbaa n man bɩla n gyɛ sɛhn dulinyaa tɔ.
Nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa tɩn oduu oo, ɔ man tɩn oduu nɩn oo, man gyɛ ɩmʋ i tiri. Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ki tiri mʋ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ Krisito sa anɛ kɩbaabʋtɔ pʋpwɛ.
Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ kɩbaabʋtɔ pʋpwɛ nɩɩ bee buu ɩmʋ asɩn mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ keyuula yɛ mʋ kʋwɛɛ kuwu i bun bamʋ sʋ, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ mʋ kpini sʋ.
Lɩɩ ndaga ɩɩ sʋ ii kpee mʋ, ɔkʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔkʋ ɔ man bɩla sa mɛ tɔɔrɔɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ alɔpanɛ mʋ nɩɩ n nyɛ lɩɩ Yesu sʋ mʋ, ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ n gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ.
Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kabwaala mʋ kɩ baa kɩ bʋ fanɛ kpini asɛ. Amen.
Ephesians: Mɛ, Pɔɔlɩ mʋ nɩɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti sʋ nɩɩ n ba waa Krisito Yesu osunpu mʋ, ɩ kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ n bɩya fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asa, nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ Krisito Yesu gyii kesintin tɔ, nɩɩ fan bʋ Efeso kadɛ tɔ mʋ.
Anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito ba bwaala fanɛ kɛ ba sa fanɛ kayɩɩ‐yuuli.
Fan yɛgɛ a fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito Mʋ‐Sɛ. Kpalɩ fɛɛ a maa waa kʋkʋlʋn yɛ Krisito mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ taa kusee kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ mʋ ayɛ sʋsʋ mʋ bwaala anɛ.
Pɔyɩ kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ tʋʋ dulinyaa mʋ, ɔ bɔla anaa Krisito kɩwaa kʋkʋlʋn mʋ sʋ lɛɛ anɛ waa mʋ lɛɛ, kɛ a ba waa asa mʋ nɩɩ a man sʋ alibi abɛɛ asɩn pwɩɩsa kʋ mʋ asɛ. Lɩɩ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ sa anɛ sʋ mʋ,
o ŋmina yɩla yɛ, bɔla Yesu Krisito sʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ taa anɛ biliŋi mu‐bii ana. Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ mʋ kɔkɔlɔ biti.
Ɩmʋ sʋ fan yɛgɛ an yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ kabwaala damantɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ, ɔ bɔla mu‐Bii bitisa mʋ sʋ bwaala anɛ atɔ kpini.
Lɩɩ mu‐Bii Yesu nkalan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyɛɛgɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ, an nyɛ anɛ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ maa taa anɛ alibi kɛɛ anɛ, nɩɩ lɩɩ mʋ kabwaala lala mʋ sʋ mʋ,
ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ an nyɛ kanyaasɩn yɛ kinyi.
Asɩn baalasa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ŋmina yɩla mʋ, nbɩɩnbɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ ɩmʋ kaapʋ anɛ. Ɩmʋ nɩɩ o ŋmina kpini yɩlɛ Yesu Krisito sʋ lɩɩ koo dɩdaa kanan mʋ nɩɩ ee biti.
Asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ŋmina yɩla mʋ, nɩɩ ɩmʋ saŋa kyɛɛkyɛɛ kan fʋʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ taa kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ sʋsʋ yɛ kasɛ sʋ bʋga tɔ, kɛ Krisito ɔ waa ɩmʋ kpini kumu.

Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ ɩ waa, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla ŋmina yɩla, nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ mʋ. Nɩɩ anaa Krisito kɩwaa kʋkʋlʋn sʋ mʋ, ɔ wʋla lɛɛ anɛ lɩɩ koo npiili asɛ yɛ a ba waa mʋ asa lɩɩ mu kebiti mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla ŋmina yɩla mʋ sʋ.
Saamʋ, anɛ mʋ nɩɩ an gyankpaa an sʋ tamaa Krisito tɔ mʋ, a yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ bʋnyaa mʋ.

Kanɩn nɩɩ i du sa fanɛ. Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fan nu kesintin asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ asɩn danbɩrasa, nɩɩ ɩ bɩya fanɛ kamɔlɩgɛ mʋ, fan kɔɔlɛ Krisito gyii, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa mu keduligi gyaga fanɛ sʋ. Kɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɩla yɛ ee biti ɔ sa fanɛ mʋ.

Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa yɩla kasɛ, fɛɛ an biti a nyɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɛ ee biti ɔ sa mʋ asa mʋ. Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ anɛ tamaa fɛɛ anɛ mʋ nɩɩ an gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ mʋ, an biti an nyɛ anɛ n‐yɩɩ. Fan yɛgɛ a yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ bʋnyaa mʋ.
Falɛ sʋ, lɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n nu fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu gyii, yɛ fanɛ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ fan sʋ sa Ɩbwaarɛ asa mʋ,
n man yɛgɛ afwaala kɩtaa sa Ɩbwaarɛ mɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ tɔ lɩɩ fanɛ sʋ. Nɩɩ n nyiŋi fanɛ sʋ,
n kʋlɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ bʋnyaa wuya mʋ yɛ, ɔ sa fanɛ mʋ Kayaayu mʋ nɩɩ kii biti kɩ sa fanɛ kanyaasɩn, kɛ ɔ lɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kaapʋ fanɛ, kɛ fan nyɛ bɩɩ mʋ danbɩrasa.
N bɩla n kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ fɛɛ o bugi fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ, kɛ fan nyɛ bɩɩ tamaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ fanɛ kɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, yɛ bʋnyaa kapatɩyɛ kparɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɛ ee biti ɔ sa mʋ asa mʋ.
N kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ ɔ yɛgɛ fan bɩɩ mʋ ɔlɔn kparɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa waa anɛ mʋ nɩɩ an kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii mʋ tɔ. Ɔlʋn lala nɩmʋ man sʋ bɩrɩsa,
nɩɩ ɔlʋn maŋa nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ kaapʋ Krisito tɔ fɛɛ maa kyiŋi mʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ kyɩna mʋ kɩbaa gyisa sʋ sʋsʋ.
Nɩɩ Krisito ii gyii kuwura awura yɛ alʋnpʋ yɛ kɩnyɩn kigyii yɛ anyɩrɩpɛ kpini sʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ sʋ ɔlʋn kparɛ ɔ kyɔ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ sʋ kɩtɩɩ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ yɛ kɩmʋ nɩɩ kii biti kɩ ba ba mʋ tɔ.
Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ waa Krisito kasɛ, nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mʋ ba waa kumu sa mʋ kʋbʋ mʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa tɔ.
Kʋbʋ mʋ kpini ɩ gyɛ Krisito kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ, nɩɩ mʋ ɩ gyɛ kumu sa kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ ɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ ɩɩ lʋwɛ kyɛɛkyɛɛ ɔkpa kʋmaa nɩmʋ sʋ.
Fanɛ fanɛ naafɔɔ fan kyɩna fan du nɩn fɛɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba wu mʋ,
lɩɩ fɛɛ fan waa Ɩbwaarɛ kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn yɛ alibi.
Kanɩn saŋa maŋa fanɛ kakyɩna tɔ mʋ, fan kyɩna fan buu dulinyaa nɩmʋ awaasa, nɩɩ fan buu n‐yaayu libi kpini owura mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ asa tɔ ee sun kusun nbɩɩnbɩɩ, nɩɩ be mee nu bɛɛ sa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ.

Anɛ kpini an kyɩna an du fɛɛ bamʋ saŋa kʋ tɔ, yɛgɛ an bʋ anɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kɩpɩrɛ tɔ, nɩɩ an buu ɩmʋ kayalaga yɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ anɛ nkɔlɔ ii biti mʋ. Naafɔɔ anɛ kpini an tii bamʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ dɛ o gyoo bamʋ mʋ sʋ.
Amaa lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti lala mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ sa anɛ yɛ mʋ kʋwɛɛ kuwu kʋkyɔ mʋ sʋ mʋ,
anɛ mʋ nɩɩ an kyɩna an du fɛɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba waa Ɩbwaarɛ kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn mʋ, ɔ bɔla Krisito sʋ sa anɛ nkpa. Lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala mʋ sʋ nɩɩ fan nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ.
Anaa Krisito Yesu kɩwaa kʋkʋlʋn sʋ mʋ, ɩ waa fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ bʋga kʋsaa anaa Yesu lɩɩ lewu tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ sa anɛ ɔkyɩnakpa Yesu asɛ sʋsʋ,
kɛ ɔ taa lɛɛ kaapʋ saŋa kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ fɛɛ mʋ kabwaala yɛ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ sa anɛ mʋ, ba mɛɛ taalɛ taa kaala sɛhn, lɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu Krisito waa mʋ sʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɔlɩgɛ fanɛ kpalɩ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ, nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ awaasa sʋ, ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kakɛɛ nɩn.
Nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ ɔkʋ kusun sunsa sʋ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ, kɛ ɔkʋ ɔ man nyɛ kaapʋ mʋ n‐yɩɩ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ waa anɛ asa pʋpwɛ, nɩɩ anaa Krisito Yesu kɩwaa kʋkʋlʋn sʋ mʋ, ɔ tʋʋ anɛ yɛ a waa atɔ danbɩrasa, mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla lɔŋɔ yɩla anɛ yɛ an waa mʋ.

Ɩmʋ sʋ fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan man gyɛ Gyiwu abi kakʋʋgɛ tɔ mʋ, Gyiwu abi mʋ bɛɛ tɩɩ fanɛ yɛ, “bamʋ nɩɩ ba man tɩŋɛ iduu,” nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ yɛ, “iduu atɩŋɛpʋ.” (Amaa ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ nyɩmɩsa awaasa mʋ nɩɩ ba waa ɩmʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ sʋ nɩn).

Fan nyiŋi fɛɛ kanɩn saŋa maŋa mʋ, fan man tii Krisito sʋ, fan kyɩna fan gyɛ afɔ kyilim nɩɩ fan man tii Ɩsɩrayɩ abi mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ fan man tii katɔwɛ kyula mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɩla mʋ sʋ, fan man nyi Ɩbwaarɛ nɩɩ fan man sʋ tamaa.
Amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ naafɔɔ fan kyɩna fan bʋ kata yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, fanaa Krisito fan waa kʋkʋlʋn, nɩɩ lɩɩ mʋ nkalan kɩkyɛɛgɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ bɩɩtɛ fanɛ tiri mʋ tɔ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ Yesu gbaa‐gbaa ɩ bɩya anɛ keyuula nɩɩ mʋ ɩ taa Gyiwu abi yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ bʋga waa asa kʋlʋn. Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kekisi mʋ nɩɩ kɩ barɩgɛ bamʋ nsana fɛɛ kɩbandɩyɛ mʋ tʋʋ.
Ɔ taa mʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ waa saraga tɩn Gyiwu abi nbara mʋ kibuu yɛ ɩmʋ kɩkaapʋ, kɛ ɔ nyɛ taa asa yiri ntun nnyɔ mʋ bʋga waa asa kʋlʋn yɛ mʋ Krisito. Ɔ waa kanɩn nɩn bɩya keyuula.
Nɩɩ lɩɩ mʋ kelewu oyu laasa mʋ sʋ mʋ, o nyita kekisi mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ bamʋ nsana mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ waa bamʋ kʋkʋlʋn. Nɩɩ lɩɩ mʋ kelewu mʋ sʋ mʋ, ɔ lɔŋɔ bamʋ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nsana.
Ɩmʋ sʋ Krisito ba, nɩɩ ɔ ba tɔwɛ keyuula asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sa fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan kyɩna fan bʋ kata yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, yɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ tiri Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ.
Nbɩɩnbɩɩ lɩɩ Krisito sʋ mʋ, anɛ mʋ nɩɩ an gyɛ Gyiwu abi yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ kpini, an taalɛ bɔla Kayaayu kʋlʋn mʋ sʋ ba Ɔsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ.
Kanɩn sʋ, fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ, fan man bɩla fan gyɛ afɔ kyilim yɛ ndɛndɛmandɛ abi, amaa fanaa Ɩbwaarɛ asa fan gyɛ ndɛ‐bii yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩkpaara sʋ asa nɩn,
nɩɩ fan du nɩn fɛɛ ɔpɔrɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba pɔyɩ gyaga kisibi mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ Krisito asunpu yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ Krisito Yesu gbaa‐gbaa ɩ gyɛ kɩmʋ kɩbɔntɔnbʋlɔntɔ kubuu kparɛ mʋ.
Nɩɩ mʋ ɩɩ sʋ obu mʋ katɩn kʋmaa nɩmʋ bʋga tɔ, nɩɩ ɛɛ yɛgɛ nɩɩ kii dii sʋsʋ kɩ ba waa kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ sa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ.
Fanaa Krisito kɩwaa kʋkʋlʋn sʋ mʋ, fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan man gyɛ Gyiwu abi nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ taa fanɛ bʋga yɛ asansa mʋ, kɛ fan ba waa mʋ Kayaayu mʋ ɔkyɩnakpa.
Lɩɩ falɛ sʋ, mɛ Pɔɔlɩ, mʋ nɩɩ ba tii mɛ obu Krisito Yesu sʋ, lɩɩ Krisito asɩn mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ n sa fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ sʋ mʋ, n kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ n sa fanɛ.
Kesintin tɔ fan nu yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa kusun nɩmʋ sa mɛ lɩɩ fanɛ sʋ.
Ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ asɩn baalasa, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ kaapʋ mɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n wʋla kyʋrɔɔ ɩmʋ gbɛrɛɛ yɩla mʋ.
Nɩɩ fan kan kalɛ ɩmʋ mʋ, fen biti fan taalɛ wu fɛɛ n nu asɩn baalasa lɩɩ Krisito sʋ mʋ kasɛ.
Saamʋ dɩdaa mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ man lɛɛ asɩn maŋa kaapʋ dɩdaa asa mʋ, amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ ɔ bɔla mʋ Kayaayu mʋ sʋ lɛɛ kanɩn asɩn baalasa maŋa kaapʋ Krisito asunpu yɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mʋ.

Asɩn baalasa mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, lɩɩ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sʋ mʋ, bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ bee biti ba ba nyɛ kusee damantɛ mʋ bʋga tii Gyiwu abi mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ bamʋ kpini bee biti ba baa ba gyɛ asa kʋlʋn, kɛ ba nyɛ kusee atɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla Krisito Yesu sʋ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɩla mʋ.
Ɩbwaarɛ bwaala mɛ, lɩɩ mʋ ɔlʋn kusun mʋ sʋ waa mɛ asɩn danbɩrasa nɩmʋ osunpu.

Halɩɩ n maa man fʋʋ Ɩbwaarɛ asa mʋ tɔ kalʋwɛ asɛ gbaa mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ taa asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ kɩtɔwɛ bwaala mɛ yɛ, n tɔwɛ Krisito kusee mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ taa kala sɛhn mʋ, sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ.
Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa waa mɛ kabaa tɔ yɛ, n yɛgɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ o wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ asɩn baalasa nɩmʋ ii sun kusun. Saamʋ dɩdaa mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tʋʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ mʋ taa asɩn mʋ baala,
kɛ nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ ɔ nyɛ bɔla Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ sʋ lɛɛ mʋ kanyaasɩn damantɛ kʋkwɩɩ‐kʋkwɩɩ mʋ kaapʋ nbɔɔ yɛ awura yɛ alʋnpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ.
Ɔ waa ɩnɩmʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla ŋmina yɩla lɩɩ npiili asɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ bɔla anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Krisito Yesu sʋ waa kanɩn.
Lɩɩ a maa waa kʋkʋlʋn yɛ Krisito, nɩɩ an kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii sʋ mʋ, an taalɛ yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ kɩnyɩn tɔ yɛgɛ a man sʋ kufuu.
Ɩmʋ sʋ n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, fan man yɛgɛ fanɛ abaa ɩ yɔɔ, lɩɩ awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ n wu fanɛ sʋ falɛ. Ɩnɩmʋ ii biti ɩ bɩya fanɛ tɔnɔ.
Nɩɩ n kan fɛ nfɛɛrɛ lɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ waa sa fanɛ falɛ mʋ, n muŋa mɛ amulii sʋ n kʋlɛ anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ n sa fanɛ.
Mʋ tɔ nɩɩ yiri kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ kasɛ sʋ yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ kpini ɩ lɩɩ.
N kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ, lɩɩ mʋ bʋnyaa kparɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, ɔ bɔla mʋ Kayaayu mʋ sʋ, waa fanɛ kala ana ɔlʋn gaa.
Mɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, lɩɩ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ mʋ, Krisito ɔ ba kyɩna fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ. Nɩɩ n bɩla n kʋlɛ yɛ, fan nyɛ ilin kɛ fan yɩlɛ fanɛ kebiti tɔ kenken,
kɛ fan naa Ɩbwaarɛ asa mʋ kpini fan nyɛ ɔlʋn nu Krisito kebiti mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ ɔkaa nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ bɩrɩsa mʋ kasɛ.
Halɩɩ ɩ maa bʋ tɔ fɛɛ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ nu Krisito kebiti mʋ kasɛ lʋwɛ gbaa mʋ, n kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ fɛɛ ɔ yɛgɛ fan nu kebiti mʋ kasɛ, kɛ fanɛ kɩbaabʋtɔ kɩ baa ki du fɛɛ mʋ lɛɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa.
Fan yɛgɛ a yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ ii sun kusun anɛ tɔ mʋ sʋ mʋ, ɛɛ taalɛ waa atɔ damantɛ ɔ kyɔ ɩmʋ nɩɩ an kʋlɛ mʋ, yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ a mɛɛ fɛ ɩmʋ nfɛɛrɛ gbaa mʋ.
Nɩɩ lɩɩ Krisito Yesu sʋ mʋ, mu abuupu mʋ kpini ba taa bʋnyaa bɛɛ sa Ɩbwaarɛ lɩɩ ndaga ɩɩ sʋ ii kpee naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ ɔkaa. Amen!
Kanɩn sʋ, mɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba tii mɛ obu kpalɩ kusun mʋ nɩɩ n sun n sa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ, n kʋlɛ fanɛ yɛ, fan kyɩna kakyɩna mʋ nɩɩ kɩ dagaa yɛ kɩtɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ fanɛ ba waa mʋ lɛɛ mʋ.
Fan baa fɛn bɩya fanɛ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ, kɛ fan baa fen du bɔhn, yɛgɛ fan sʋ kenyiita, nɩɩ lɩɩ kebiti sʋ mʋ fan man taa abaa asɩn waa fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ.
Fan bɔla fanɛ kayɩɩ yuuli mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋga fanɛ mʋ sʋ kpan fanɛ n‐yɩɩ kɩtaa kɔnɔ kʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ sa fanɛ mʋ tɔ kenken.
Anɛ kpini an gyɛ fɛɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kʋlʋn nɩn, nɩɩ Kayaayu kʋlʋn kpen nɩɩ an sʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɩɩ anɛ ba tamaa kʋlʋn tɔ mʋ.
An sʋ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kʋlʋn nɩn, yɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kʋlʋn, yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee kʋlʋn.
An sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ anɛ kpini Ɔsɛ. Mʋ ɩ gyɛ anɛ kpini Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, ɛɛ bɔla anɛ kpini sʋ ee sun kusun, nɩɩ ɔ bʋ anɛ kpini nkɔlɔ tɔ.
Amaa Krisito taa mʋ kabwaala nkɛɛ mʋ sa anɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ barɩgɛ tɔ yɩla mʋ.
Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ,
“Ɔ maa dii kpee sʋsʋ legelege mʋ,
ɔ taa bamʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔ nyɛ mʋ kpee
nɩɩ ɔ kɛɛ asa atɔ damantɛ.”
Maa tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔ maa dii kpee sʋsʋ legelege” mʋ, kɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ nɛnɛ? Kɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ pɔyɩ kɛ o dii kpee sʋsʋ mʋ, ɔ wʋla lɩɩ sʋsʋ nɩn ba kasɛ sʋ, kasɛ tɔ kasɛ tɔ.
Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ kpɩlɩgɛ ba kasɛ sʋ mʋ, ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ o dii kpee sʋsʋ mʋ. O dii kpee sʋsʋ‐sʋsʋ abwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ kamaa, kɛ ɔ nyɛ ɔ bʋ kasɛ sʋ yɛ sʋsʋ katɩn kʋmaa.
Mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ sa nkɛɛ. Ɔ lɛɛ akʋ waa mu asunpu, nɩɩ ɔ waa akʋ mʋ atɔwɛpʋ, ɔ waa akʋ asɩn danbɩrasa atɔwɛpʋ, nɩɩ ɔ waa akʋ mɔɔ agyankpaapʋ yɛ akaapʋpʋ.
Krisito waa bamʋ kanɩn nɩn kɛ ba nyɛ lɔŋɔ Ɩbwaarɛ asa ba waa Krisito kusun mʋ, kɛ mʋ kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ mʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ kɩ nyɛ kɩɩ dan kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ,
naa fʋʋ fɛɛ anɛ kpini an nyɛ kɔnɔ kʋlʋn kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ tɔ, kɛ a bɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐Bii mʋ, kɛ a dan danbɩrasa naa lʋwɛ fɛɛ Krisito kudubi mʋ.
Saamʋ an man bɩla an gyɛ nbii kɛ asa ba nyɛ taa antɩŋɛsa kɩkaapʋ yɛ kigolongolon kɔnɔ tɔ kɔn pɩna anɛ kɛ anɛ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ baa i du fɛɛ afuu ɩmaa da nɩɩ apaa i kyenkpen tɔ mʋ.
Amaa a taa kebiti tɔwɛ kesintin asɩn mʋ, kɛ a dan ba waa fɛɛ Krisito ɔkpa kʋmaa nɩmʋ sʋ, nɩɩ mʋ ɩ gyɛ kumu mʋ.

Krisito sʋ nɩɩ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ abaafʋn‐abaafʋn mʋ ɩ kyaa abaa sʋ, nɩɩ ɩkyagakpa mʋ ɩɩ kɩtaa abaafʋn mʋ bʋga abaa tɔ. Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ kɩbaafʋn kʋmaa nɩmʋ waa kɩmʋ kusun yɛ ɔdan mʋ, kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ kpini ɩɩ dan nɩɩ ɩɩ nyɛ ɔlʋn kebiti tɔ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ n tɔwɛ fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ, nɩɩ n yɩlɛ ɩmʋ sʋ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ yɛ, fan man kyɩna fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ be mee sun Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ. Falɛ asa nfɛɛrɛ ɩ man sʋ kyaarɛ.
Kitentenbiri ki bun bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ sʋ, nɩɩ ba mɛɛ yɛ ba nyɛ nkpa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ ɛɛ sa mʋ, lɩɩ bamʋ kɩman nyi yɛ bamʋ nkɔlɔ ɔsɩɩ mʋ sʋ.
Lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ipeeli ɩ man bɩla ɩ bʋ bamʋ ansi sʋ mʋ, ba taa bamʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ bɛɛ waa asɩn gyaga kʋmaa nɩmʋ mʋ nɩɩ i gyii bamʋ amu.
Amaa fanɛɛ fanɛ bɩrɛ, man gyɛ ɩnɩmʋ nɩɩ fan bɩɩla lɩɩ Krisito sʋ.
N nyi fan maa nu mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ba kaapʋ fanɛ kesintin asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ Yesu tɔ mʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ fan yɛgɛ fanɛ kakyɩna dɩdaa mʋ fɔyɩ. Kakyɩna dɩdaa mʋ kayalaga daa kyɩna ɩɩ pɩna fanɛ nɩn, nɩɩ ii nyita fanɛ.
Nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fanɛ nkɔlɔ yɛ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ kpini i waa apʋpwɛ,
kɛ fan kyɩna kakyɩna pʋpwɛ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tʋʋ kɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩmʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi, nɩɩ i du kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ, nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ keduli mʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ fanɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɔ yɛgɛ atɩŋɛsa, kɛ fan baa fen gyii kesintin fɛn sa fanɛ bɩrɩsa ana. Lɩɩ fɛɛ anɛ kpini an gyɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kʋlʋn asa nɩn.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan nyɛ agbʋ mʋ, ɔ man yɛgɛ mʋ agbʋ mʋ ɩ yɛgɛ ɔ waa alibi, nɩɩ ɔ man kyaga agbʋ mʋ sʋ naa tɩyɛ kyɔwɛ.
Kɛ ɔ man sa Sɩtaanɛ ɔkpa kpini‐kpini.
Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyɩna ee yuuri mʋ, ɔ man bɩla yuuri, amaa ɔ taa mʋ abaa sun kusun mʋ nɩɩ kɩ sʋ tɔnɔ, kɛ ɔ nyɛ ɩkʋ kyɛ atiripu tɔ.
Fan man yɛgɛ ntɔwɛ libi kʋ ɩ lɩɩ fanɛ nnɔ tɔ, amɔɔ nkyɛtɔ ntɔwɛ mʋ nɩɩ ii kpiya asa ansi tɔ, nɩɩ bɛɛ nyɛ bamʋ atɔ tirisa mʋ. Saamʋ bamʋ nɩɩ bee nu mʋ, ba nyɛ‐nyɛ fanɛ katɔwɛ mʋ tɔnɔ.
Fan man waa kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ kɔkɔlɔ o nyita mʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Kayaayu maŋa nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa dulugi fanɛ kaapʋ fɛɛ, mʋ asa ɩ gyɛ fanɛ sa Kakɛ lala mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ mɔlɩgɛ fanɛ mʋ.
Fan man bɩla yɛgɛ asɩn ɩ kɔ fanɛ, abɛɛ fan taa asɩn waa fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ, abɛɛ fan nyɛ agbʋ. Fan man pʋntɛ abaa sʋ, abɛɛ fan saalɛ abaa, abɛɛ fan kisi abaa ɩkpa kʋkwɩɩ‐kʋkwɩɩ sʋ.
Amaa fan baa fɛn waa abaa kɩdanbɩrasa, kɛ fan baa fan su asa kʋwɛɛ, kɛ fan baa fan sʋ alibi fɛn kɛɛ abaa fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla Krisito sʋ taa fanɛ alibi kɛɛ fanɛ mʋ.
Kpalɩ fan maa gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii ana mʋ nɩɩ ee biti fanɛ gaa sʋ mʋ, fan kasɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔ.
Fan nyɛ kebiti sa abaa fanɛ kakyɩna tɔ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Krisito nyɛ kebiti sa anɛ, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ lɛɛ saraga nɩɩ o wu fwɩɩ anɛ alibi, nɩɩ kanɩn saraga mʋ ii lii fen femm
nɩɩ kɩɩ bɔla Ɩbwaarɛ ansi mʋ.
Lɩɩ fan maa gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asa sʋ mʋ, ɩ man dagaa ɔkʋ maa nu fɛɛ kanyɩn abɛɛ kakyɩɩ biti kɩgyagaa, abɛɛ ineesi ɩkʋ, abɛɛ onsi‐payɩ libi kʋ ɩ baa ɩ bʋ fanɛ tɔ.
Nɩɩ ɩ man dagaa fan maa tɔwɛ ineesi asɩn, abɛɛ amelensi‐sɩn, abɛɛ agyaga‐sɩn, amaa fan taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ.

Fan dan fen nyi kesintin tɔ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa kakyɩɩ abɛɛ kanyɩn biti kɩgyagaa, abɛɛ ineesi asɩn, abɛɛ onsi‐payɩ libi mʋ, ɔ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ nyɛ loo Krisito maa Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ. Onsi‐payɩ libi du nɩn fɛɛ kusun ɩdakpa mʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ falɛ atɔ nɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ agbʋ ii biti ɩ ba bamʋ nɩɩ ba waa mʋ kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn mʋ sʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ fan man yɛgɛ ɔkʋ ɔ taa ntɔwɛ kɩyan pɩna fanɛ,
kanɩn sʋ faa naa kanɩn asa maŋa fan man bʋga waa sɛhn.

Fanɛ gbaa fanɛ kitentenbiri kɩ kyɩna kɩ bʋ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ nɩn, amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ fan maa gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ asa sʋ mʋ, kaŋmaŋɛ bʋ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ nɩn. Ɩmʋ sʋ fan yɛgɛ fanɛ kakyɩna tɔ ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ fan gyɛ ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ tɔ asa.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩŋmaŋɛsa nɩmʋ ɩ bɩya kɩdanbɩrasa kɩwaa yɛ ɩkpa kikyiigi yɛ kesintin kigyii.
Kɛ fan waa aniya waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ bɔla Ɩbwaarɛ ansi.
Fan man taa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ naa tii kitentenbiri awaasa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ mɛɛ kʋʋgɛ obii danbɩrasa mʋ sʋ, amaa fan lɛɛ ɩmʋ kaapʋ yɛ ɩ gyɛ alibi.
Ɩ gyɛ apeeli‐sɩn gbaa fɛɛ fan tɔwɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ asʋtɔ ɔlʋn wuya ana bɛɛ baala bɛɛ waa mʋ asɩn.
Amaa kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ lɛɛ ifuli sʋ mʋ, ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ii wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ ki du.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ nɩɩ ɩŋmaŋɛsa ɩ ba kʋtɔ kʋmaa sʋ mʋ, kanɩn kʋtɔ maŋa mɛɛ baala. Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ yɩla yɛ,
“Fʋ, nsɩɩrɛ ɔdɛpʋ, kyiŋi,
kʋsʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ,
kɛ Krisito ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ ɩ ba fʋ sʋ.”
Fan kɩɩ danbɩrasa kɛ fan man kyɩna fɛɛ amelensipu, amaa fan kyɩna fɛɛ anyaasɩnpʋ.
Nɩɩ fan kan nyɛ ɔkpa kʋmaa nɩmʋ yɛ fan waa kɩdanbɩrasa mʋ, fan man yɛgɛ ɩ kyʋn fanɛ sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa nɩmʋ tɔ mʋ libi ɩ nyɛ akyɔ.
Fan man waa fɛɛ amelensipu, amaa fan kpan fanɛ n‐yɩɩ bɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu ii biti fɛɛ fan waa.
Fan man kan nuu nta bʋʋ, kɛ ɩ nyɛ nyita fanɛ amu. Amaa fan yɛgɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ o loo bɔla fanɛ tɔ gaa.
Fan taa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩlʋn yɛ abwaarɛsɩn ɩlʋn yɛ Kayaayu kɩlɛɛkaapʋ ɩlʋn fɛn tɔwɛ fɛn waa abaa. Fan taa fanɛ nkɔlɔ kpini bɩɩ ɩlʋn sa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ.
Saŋa kʋmaa nɩmʋ fan taa afwaala sa Ɔsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ, lɩɩ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ.
Fan bɩya fanɛ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ sa fanɛ bɩrɩsa ana kɛ ɩ sa Krisito bɛɛrɛɛ.
Akyɩɩ‐kilipu, fan bɩya fanɛ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ sa fanɛ‐kuli ana fɛɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ nɩɩ fɛn waa fɛn sa mʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ okuli mʋ ɩ gyɛ kumu sa mʋ‐ka, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Krisito gyɛ kumu sa mu abuupu kʋbʋ, mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ mʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ, nɩɩ mʋ ɩ gyɛ kɩmʋ ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ mʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Krisito abuupu mʋ bɛɛ bɩya bamʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ bɛɛ sa Krisito mʋ, kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ akyɩɩ‐kilipu gbaa ba bɩya bamʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ sa bamʋ‐kuli ana kʋtɔ kʋmaa tɔ.
Anyɩn‐kilipu, fan nyɛ kebiti sa fanɛ‐ka ana fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Krisito nyɛ kebiti sa mʋ kʋbʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ waa saraga wu sa bamʋ mʋ.
Kɛ ɔ nyɛ bɔla nkyu yɛ mʋ asɩn mʋ sʋ gyee bamʋ waa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ sa mʋ n‐yɩɩ.
Ɔ waa kanɩn nɩn kɛ mʋ kʋbʋ mʋ ba baa ba gyɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ, yɛgɛ ba man sʋ ineesi, abɛɛ alibi akʋ, abɛɛ awaasa libi, yɛgɛ ba du kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ, nɩɩ ba man sʋ asɩn pwɩɩsa akʋ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ.

Ɔkpa kʋlʋn maŋa sʋ, ɩ dagaa fɛɛ anyɩn‐kilipu ba maa nyɛ kebiti sa bamʋ‐ka ana, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ kebiti sa bamʋ gbaa‐gbaa n‐yɩɩ mʋ. Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti mʋ‐ka mʋ, ii biti mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ n‐yɩɩ nɩn.
Ɔsa kʋ man bʋ tɔ nɩɩ ee kisi mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ n‐yɩɩ, amaa ɛɛ bɩla kɩmʋ, yɛgɛ ɛɛ kɩɩ kɩmʋ sʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Krisito ɩɩ kɩɩ mʋ kʋbʋ mʋ sʋ mʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ anɛ ɩ gyɛ Krisito kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ yɛ ɩmʋ abaafʋn kʋkwɩɩ‐kʋkwɩɩ mʋ.
Ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Lɩɩ falɛ sʋ ɔnyɩn ii biti ɔ lɩɩ mu‐nyi yɛ mʋ‐sɛ asɛ, kɛ ɔ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ naa bʋga mʋ‐ka tɔ, kɛ bamʋ asa anyɔ mʋ ba ba waa kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kʋlʋn.”
Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ asɩn baalasa mʋ nɩɩ i budu, amaa mɛɛ mɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ falɛ mʋ ɩ yɩlɛ sa Krisito maa mʋ kʋbʋ mʋ nɩn.
Amaa n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, ɔnyɩn kʋmaa nɩmʋ ɔ nyɛ kebiti sa mʋ‐ka, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kebiti sa mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ n‐yɩɩ mʋ, nɩɩ ɩ dagaa ɔkyɩɩ‐kilipu kʋmaa nɩmʋ mɔɔ maa bɩya mʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ sa mu‐kuli.
Nbii, lɩɩ fan maa gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ lɛɛ sʋ mʋ, fan nu fanɛ akʋʋgɛpʋ asɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩmʋ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ fan waa.
Ɩbwaarɛ nbara mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nu sa fʋ‐sɛ yɛ fu‐nyi,” mʋ, ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ nbara gyankpaasa mʋ nɩɩ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ kɩda tii sʋ.
Kɔkɔlɔ sʋ kɩda mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, nɩɩ fʋ kan nu sa fʋ‐sɛ yɛ fu‐nyi mʋ, “ii biti ɩ waa ɔdan sa fʋ, kɛ fʋ kyɩna kasɛ sʋ kyɛɛrɛɛ.”
Akʋgɛpʋ, fan man waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kii biti kɩ yɛgɛ fanɛ nbii ba nyɛ agbʋ, amaa fan kɩɩ bamʋ sʋ, kɛ fan taa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kɩkaapʋ mʋ bɩla bamʋ.
Anyɛ, fan nu sa fanɛ kasɛ sʋ anyɩrɩpɛ ana, kɛ fan sɩlɛ bamʋ lɩɩ fanɛ nkɔlɔ kpini tɔ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan waa sa Krisito mʋ.
Fan man nu sa bamʋ ansi sʋ wʋlɛ kɛ fan nyɛ gyii bamʋ amu, amaa fan maa gyɛ Krisito anyɛ sʋ mʋ, fan waa kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ lɩɩ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩpɩrɛ sʋ.
Fan sun bamʋ lɩɩ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ fɛɛ fan maa sun Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ, nɩɩ man gyɛ asa nɩɩ fen sun mʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ fan nyi fɛɛ, Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ ii biti ɔ ka ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kʋkɔ lɩɩ kusun danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa mʋ sʋ. Ɩ man tiri fɛɛ ɔ gyɛ kɩnyɛ abɛɛ ee gyii mʋ kɩbaa sʋ.
Anyɩrɩpɛ mɔɔ, kanɩn maŋa sʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ fan waa fanɛ anyɛ. Fan man ŋaala bamʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fu nyi fɛɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ fanaa bamʋ kpini Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ bʋ sʋsʋ nɩn, nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ mɛɛgɛ tɔ.
Mɛ asɩn laalaalʋwɛ mʋ gyɛ yɛ, fan nyɛ ɔlʋn lɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ yɛ mʋ ɔlʋn lala mʋ tɔ.
Fan taa adʋn tɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sa fanɛ mʋ kpini bun, kɛ fan nyɛ taalɛ kɔ yɛ Sɩtaanɛ kanyaasɩn ɩkpa libi mʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ man gyɛ anaa anyɩmɩsa ɩɩ kɔ. Amaa an kɔ yɛ awuragyipu yɛ alʋlʋnpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ afuu tɔ. An kɔ yɛ n‐yaayu libi mʋ nɩɩ ii gyii kuwura dulinyaa kitentenbiri nɩmʋ tɔ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ fan taa adʋntɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sa fanɛ mʋ kpini bun. Saamʋ nɩɩ nkɛ libi kan ba mʋ, fɛn taalɛ nyɛ ɔlʋn kɔ tii Sɩtaanɛ ɩkpa libi mʋ. Nɩɩ fan kan kɔ lʋwɛ gbaa mʋ, fan yɩlɛ fanɛ ayaa sʋ.
Fan yɩlɛ tɔ kenken, kɛ fan taa kesintin waa kɩrɩsʋ ŋmina fanɛ nsɛ tɔ. Kɛ fan taa ɩkpa kigyiigi waa fɛɛ kɩbɩlɛ tɔ panpasan kun fanɛ nkɔlɔ sʋ.
Fan kʋʋla fanɛ n‐yɩɩ biti asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ bɩya keyuula mʋ kɩtɔwɛ fɛɛ fanɛ ayaa sʋ asɩbɩta.
Saŋa kʋmaa fan taa kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩtaa fɛɛ kɩbaa tɔ kʋtɔ kunsa. Kɩmʋ nɩɩ fɛn taalɛ taa dunla Olibilibi
fʋlɔn anyenbi mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tʋʋ fanɛ mʋ kɔnɔ.
Fan taa kamɔlɩgɛ fɛɛ abɩlɩtɔ kʋwʋrʋ bun, kɛ fan taa abwaarɛsɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ kɩnaa tɔ sakunde, mʋ nɩɩ Kayaayu mʋ ɩɩ sa mʋ kɩtaa.
Kɛ fan taa Kayaayu mʋ ɔlʋn kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa tɔ, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ kyɛ fanɛ tɔ. Lɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, fan baa fan da sʋ, kɛ fan waa aniya kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ saŋa kʋmaa fɛn sa Ɩbwaarɛ asa mʋ kpini.
Fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ sa ngbaa mɛ fɛɛ saŋa kʋmaa nɩɩ n kan bugi mɛ kɔnɔ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ sa mɛ asɩn tɔwɛsa, kɛ n nyɛ yɩlɛ kɩnyɩn tɔ lɛɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ naafɔɔ ɩ baala mʋ kaapʋ.
Asɩn danbɩrasa nɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ Krisito sun mɛ, nɩɩ ba tii mɛ obu falɛ. Fan kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ fɛɛ n taalɛ tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ kɩnyɩn tɔ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa.
Anɛ bɩrɩsa bitisa Tikiku, ɔ gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa kɔkɔlɔ kʋlʋn ee sun mʋ, mʋ ii biti ɔ ba tɔwɛ fanɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa, kɛ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fan nyɛ bɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n du yɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n waa.
Falɛ sʋ nɩɩ n sun mʋ fanɛ asɛ, kɛ fan nyɛ bɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ an du kɛ ɔ tɔwɛ waa fanɛ aniya tɔ.
Ɔsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito ba sa fanɛ, anɛ‐daa ana yɛ anɛ‐supu ana keyuula yɛ kebiti yɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii.
Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ bwaala bamʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ ɔkaa sa anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito mʋ.
Philippians: Ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ lɩɩ mɛ Pɔɔlɩ yɛ Timoti, mʋ nɩɩ an gyɛ Krisito Yesu ayaafɔlɛ mʋ asɛ. Nɩɩ an kyʋrɔɔ an sa fanɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asa kpini mʋ nɩɩ fanaa Krisito Yesu fan waa kʋkʋlʋn, yɛ fanɛ abɩlɩsa yɛ akyɛtɔpʋ mʋ nɩɩ fan bʋ Filipi kadɛ tɔ mʋ.
Anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito ba bwaala fanɛ kɛ ba sa fanɛ kayɩɩ yuuli.
N fwaala mɛ Ɩbwaarɛ saŋa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ n nyiŋi fanɛ sʋ mʋ.
Nɩɩ saŋa kʋmaa n maa kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ n sa fanɛ kpini mʋ, n kʋlɛ yɛ kɔkɔlɔ fuuli tɔ,
lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan ba tii mɛ sʋ nɩɩ an waa asɩn danbɩrasa kɩtɔwɛ kusun saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ gyii ba fʋʋ halɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ n dan n nyi fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ o piili kusun danbɩrasa fanɛ tɔ mʋ, ee biti ɔ kɩɩ sʋ kɛ ii kpee sʋ naa lʋwɛ kyɛɛkyɛɛ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ Krisito Yesu ii biti o bwii ba mʋ.

Kpalɩ fɛɛ saŋa kʋmaa fan maa bʋ mɛ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ sʋ mʋ, ɩmʋ ɔkpa nɩn fɛɛ n fɛ falɛ nfɛɛrɛ nɩmʋ lɩɩ fanɛ sʋ. Halɩɩ n maa bʋ obu tiisa tɔ gbaa mʋ, abɛɛ n maa kɔ n kun asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ yɛ ɩ yɩlɛ mʋ, fanɛ kpini fan taa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ tii Ɩbwaarɛ kusun mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa bwaala mɛ mʋ sʋ.
N sʋ Krisito Yesu kebiti mʋ n sa fanɛ kpini, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ yɩlɛ mɛ sʋ fɛɛ n wu fanɛ.
Mɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ sa fanɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, fanɛ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ fan sʋ mʋ kɩ nyɛ akyɔ tii sʋ, kɛ fan dan fanɛ kinyi yɛ kasɛ kunu kʋtɔ kʋmaa tɔ,
saamʋ fɛn nyɛ taalɛ bɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋrɔn kyʋn sʋ yɛgɛ ineesi yɛ asɩn pwɩɩsa kʋ man bʋ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ naa fʋʋ Krisito kɩba mʋ.
Kɛ fanɛ kakyɩna tɔ awaasa kpini i kyiigi lɩɩ Yesu Krisito sʋ waa ɔdan, kɛ ɩ taa bʋnyaa yɛ ayɩn‐bi sa Ɩbwaarɛ.
Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, n biti fan bɩɩ fɛɛ, kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ki tu mɛ mʋ, ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ yɛlɩgɛ kpee ansi tɔ.
Lɩɩ kanɩn sʋ mʋ, owura‐kpa akunpu mʋ kpini yɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ nfɩɩ mʋ, ba bɩɩ fɛɛ ba maa tii mɛ obu lɩɩ n maa gyɛ Krisito kɩnyɛ mʋ sʋ.
Kpalɩ ba maa tii mɛ obu sʋ mʋ, ɩ yɛgɛ Krisito akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu gaalaagaa ba yɩlɛ kɩnyɩn tɔ bɛɛ tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ, yɛgɛ ba man sʋ kufuu.
Nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ kesintin nɩn fɛɛ akʋ lɩɩ kayɩɩ basa yɛ kolu biti mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ mɛ sʋ, nɩɩ ba sʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ asɩn lɩɩ Krisito sʋ, amaa akʋ bɩrɛ ba taa nfɛɛrɛ danbɩrasa nɩn bɛɛ tɔwɛ Krisito asɩn mʋ.
Ba mɛɛ bamʋ bɩrɛ, kebiti sʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa kanɩn, lɩɩ fɛɛ be nyi Ɩbwaarɛ maa taa asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ kukun waa mɛ abaa tɔ.
Amaa akʋ bɩrɛ, bɛɛ kɩɩ bee biti bamʋ nkʋn lɛɛ sʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ, man gyɛ nfɛɛrɛ danbɩrasa sʋ, be nyi fɛɛ bɛɛ waa kanɩn nɩn kɛ mɛ awʋrʋfɔ ɩ lɔŋɔ tii sʋ yɛgɛ n tii obu.
Ɩmʋ sʋ mɩnɛ i tiri? Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ki tiri ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, nɩɩ nfɛɛrɛ libi nɩɩ ba sʋ oo, abɛɛ kesintin tɔ nɩn oo, ɔkpa kʋmaa anɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, ba tɔwɛ Krisito asɩn mʋ. Nɩɩ lɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ mi ansi i gyii.
Nɩɩ n biti n kyaga sʋ gyii mi ansi,
lɩɩ fɛɛ n nyi lɩɩ fanɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ tɔ yɛ Yesu Krisito Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ nkyɛtɔ sʋ mʋ, asɩn mʋ nɩɩ i tu mɛ mʋ, ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ n nyɛ mɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ ɩmʋ tɔ.

Mɛ kɩpɩrɛ yɛ tamaa mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, n mɛɛ yɛ n waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kii gyila mɛ ipeeli, amaa n yɩlɛ kɩnyɩn tɔ, saamʋ, lewu tɔ nɩn oo, nkpa tɔ nɩn oo, lɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ yɛ saŋa kʋmaa, asa ba bʋnyaa Krisito lɩɩ mɛ sʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ mɛɛ mɛ bɩrɛ, n maa tɛ nkpa tɔ falɛ mʋ, n tɛ sa Krisito, nɩɩ n kan wu mɔɔ nɩn, ɩɩ gyɛ tɔnɔ sa mɛ.
Amaa nɩɩ n kan n san n tɛ nkpa tɔ mʋ, n taalɛ waa kusun danbɩrasa. Ɩmʋ sʋ nkpa nɩn oo, lewu nɩn oo, n man n nyi kɩmʋ nɩɩ n lɛɛ.
N sii n kyɔlɛ ɩmʋ anyɔ nsana. Mɛ kɩpɩrɛ tɔ n gyɛ fɛɛ n lɩɩ kasɛ sʋ nfɩɩ, kɛ n naa kyɩna Krisito asɛ, ɩmʋ ɩ bɔ.
Amaa n maa san n tɛ kasɛ sʋ falɛ mʋ, ɩmʋ bʋrɔn sa fanɛ.
N maa kɔɔlɛ ɩnɩmʋ gyii mʋ, n nyi fɛɛ n biti n baa n bʋ tɔ, kɛ n kyaga sʋ kyɩna yɛ fanɛ kpini, kɛ i kpiya fanɛ ansi tɔ, kɛ fanɛ nkɔlɔ i fuuli fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ.
Saamʋ, mɛ kɩbɩla ba kyɩna fanɛ asɛ mʋ, bɔla mɛ sʋ mʋ, fanɛ ansi ii biti i gyii Krisito Yesu tɔ tii sʋ.
