Nɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ki tiri ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, fan yɛgɛ fanɛ kakyɩna tɔ awaasa ɩmaa asɩn danbɩrasa lɩɩ Yesu Krisito sʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ kaapʋ mʋ, ɩ waa kʋkʋlʋn. Saamʋ n kan bʋ fanɛ asɛ oo, n man bʋ fanɛ asɛ oo, n biti n nu fɛɛ fan yɩlɛ tɔ kenken kɔnɔ kʋlʋn tɔ, nɩɩ fan sʋ nfɛɛrɛ kʋlʋn fɛn payɩ ansi lɩɩ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ.
Nɩɩ n biti n bɩla nu yɛ fan man sɩlɛ fanɛ dʋn ana ɔkpa kʋmaa sʋ. Nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ ii biti ɩɩ kaapʋ bamʋ fɛɛ bee biti ba wu muuri, kɛ fanɛ bɩrɛ fan nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ ɩ ba kanɩn.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ man gyɛ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ sa fanɛ ɔkpa yɛ fan ba kɔɔlɛ Krisito gyii nkʋn, amaa awʋrʋfɔ kigyii lɩɩ mʋ sʋ gbaa tii sʋ.
Nbɩɩnbɩɩ fan ba tii mɛ sʋ kolu mʋ tɔ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan daa kyɩna wu n maa kɔ mʋ, kanɩn kolu kʋlʋn maŋa nɩɩ n san n kɔ falɛ.

Fɛɛ nɩɩ fanɛ abaa ɩ man yɔɔ lɩɩ fan maa bʋ Krisito tɔ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ sa fanɛ sʋ nɩɩ fanɛ nkɔlɔ ii fuuli fanɛ mʋ, nɩɩ fan naa Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ fan sʋ kɔnɔ kʋlʋn mʋ, nɩɩ fan sʋ kebiti yɛ kʋwɛɛ kuwu sa abaa mʋ,
kanɩn bɩrɛ fan yɛgɛ nɩɩ mi ansi i gyii naa lʋwɛ kyɛɛkyɛɛ, fɛɛ fan maa sʋ nfɛɛrɛ kʋlʋn yɛ kebiti kʋlʋn yɛ nɩɩ fan yɩlɛ kʋtɔ kʋlʋn sʋ.
Fan man waa kʋtɔ kʋ biti fanɛ nkʋn lɛɛ abɛɛ fan waa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ alala‐sɩn tɔ, amaa fan bɩya fanɛ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ, kɛ fan fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ fanɛ bɩrɩsa ana ba kyɔ fanɛ.
Fanɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɔ man kɩɩ biti kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ kyɛ mʋ nkʋn tɔ, amaa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ kyɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ.
Ɩ dagaa fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ ɩɩ baa i du fɛɛ Krisito Yesu lɛɛ mʋ.
Krisito maa gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kedubi falɛ gbaa mʋ,
ɔ man yɩlɛ kɩmʋ sʋ kɩtaa tɔ fɛɛ maa Ɩbwaarɛ ba gyɛ kyɛɛkyɛɛ.
Amaa ɔ waa mʋ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ man gyɛ sɛhn,
nɩɩ ɔ waa mʋ n‐yɩɩ kɩnyɛ,
nɩɩ o be biliŋi nyɩmɩsa, nɩɩ ba wu mʋ maa gyɛ nyɩmɩsa,
ɔ bɩya mʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ nyɛ kʋsʋ‐nu sa Ɩbwaarɛ naa fʋʋ lewu tɔ,
halɩɩ oyu laasa sʋ lewu.
Lɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ sʋ mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kʋsaa mʋ naa kyɩna sʋsʋ opula kparɛ,
nɩɩ ɔ sa mʋ kɩtɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ kyɔ atɩɩ kpini,
kɛ nyɩmɩsa yɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ sʋsʋ yɛ kasɛ sʋ yɛ kamandɛ tɔ kpini,
ba muŋa sun Yesu kɩtɩɩ,
kɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ o bugi kɔnɔ lɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, Yesu Krisito ɩ gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ,
kɛ bʋnyaa ɔ baa ɔ gyɛ Ɔsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ.

Ɩmʋ sʋ mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ ana danbɩrasa, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n bʋ fanɛ asɛ nɩɩ fan nu sa mɛ saŋa kʋmaa mʋ, halɩɩ nɩɩ n man bʋ fanɛ asɛ gbaa mʋ, fan waa kanɩn tii sʋ gaa. Fan taa bɛɛrɛɛ sa Ɩbwaarɛ kɛ fan sɩlɛ mʋ kɛ fan sun kamɔlɩgɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan nyɛ mʋ kusun naa lʋwɛ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa kusun fanɛ tɔ saŋa kʋmaa, nɩɩ ɛɛ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fɛn waa mʋ kɔkɔlɔ biti yɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ yɩlɛ sʋ.
Kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fɛn waa mʋ, fan man kɔlɩtɛ abɛɛ fan gyii abaa ɩmɔɔrɛ.

Saamʋ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ ɩ mɛɛ nyɛ asɩn pwɩɩsa yɛ ineesi ɩkʋ, yɛgɛ fan gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii ana mʋ nɩɩ fan man sʋ alibi kʋ, nɩɩ fan sʋ fan tɛ yɛ nfɛɛrɛ libi wuya ana yɛ asun libi awaapʋ. Nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fan maa ŋalɩgɛ sʋ bamʋ tɔ fɛɛ akyikpebi mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ sʋsʋ ɩɩ ŋalɩgɛ mʋ,

fɛɛ fan maa sʋ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ sa nkpa fɛn sa bamʋ falɛ. Nɩɩ fan kan waa kanɩn mʋ, ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ kɛ n nyɛ kaapʋ mɛ n‐yɩɩ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ Krisito ii biti o bwii ba mʋ, kɛ ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ mɛ kɩkpan n‐yɩɩ yɛ kɩpayɩ ansi waa kusun fanɛ tɔ mʋ, ɩ man waa kɩyan.
Fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ gyii yɛ kusun sa mʋ mʋ, du nɩn fɛɛ saraga sa mʋ, halɩɩ nɩɩ bee biti ba kyɛɛgɛ mɛ nkalan wʋrɩgɛ tii waa saraga mʋ sʋ, ii biti ɩ waa mɛ ɔkɔn gaa kɛ n maa fanɛ ansi i gyii.
Ɩmʋ sʋ ɩ dagaa fanɛ gbaa fanɛ ɩ waa fanɛ ɔkɔn, kɛ maa fanɛ ansi i gyii.
Nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu kebiti tɔ mʋ, n sʋ tamaa fɛɛ ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ kyɛɛrɛɛ n biti n sun Timoti fanɛ asɛ, kɛ n nyɛ nu fanɛ sʋ kɛ mɛ kɔkɔlɔ ɔ nyɛ dɛ mɛ.
N man bɩla n sʋ ɔkʋ fɛɛ mʋ, nɩɩ fanɛ kɩbaabʋtɔ asɩn i tiri mʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ asansa mʋ kpini bamʋ lɛɛ nkʋn nɩɩ bee biti, man gyɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ Yesu Krisito lɛɛ.
Amaa fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fan nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ Timoti lɛɛ mʋ daa kaapʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ o tii mɛ sʋ nɩɩ an sun asɩn danbɩrasa kusun mʋ, fɛɛ ɔsɛ yɛ obii.
Ɩmʋ sʋ, n sʋ tamaa fɛɛ nɩɩ n dan nyɛ wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ ii kpee sʋ ɩɩ sa mɛ mʋ, n biti n sun mʋ fanɛ asɛ.
Nɩɩ n sʋ tamaa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ tɔ fɛɛ, ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ kyɛɛrɛɛ n gbaa‐gbaa mɛ n biti n ba fanɛ asɛ.

Amaa n fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ ii tiri fɛɛ, n bwii sun anɛ bɩrɩsa Epafuroditu fanɛ asɛ. N maa mʋ an bʋga an waa kusun, nɩɩ an kɔ an kun asɩn danbɩrasa fanɛ asɛ. Nɩɩ mʋ ɩ bɩla ɔ gyɛ fanɛ kabɔɔ mʋ nɩɩ fan sun, nɩɩ ɔ ba kyɛ mɛ tɔ ɩmʋ nɩɩ i tiri mɛ mʋ.
Ɩ gyʋgyʋʋ mʋ yɛ o wu fanɛ kpini, nɩɩ mʋ kɔkɔlɔ ki nyita mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan maa nu yɛ ɛɛ lɔ sʋ mʋ.
Ɩ gyɛ kesintin fɛɛ ɔ lɔ, halɩɩ ɩ san gbɛrɛɛ o wu. Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ wu mʋ kʋwɛɛ nɩɩ man gyɛ mʋ nkʋn, amaa yɛ ngbaa mɛ, nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ n man bɔɔta tɔ tii sʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ ɩ gyʋgyʋʋ mɛ gaa fɛɛ n sun mʋ fanɛ asɛ. Saamʋ, nɩɩ fan kan bɩla wu mʋ mʋ, kɛ ɩ waa fanɛ ɔkɔn tii sʋ, kɛ mɛ kɩbɔɔta tɔ mʋ ɩ lʋwɛ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ fan taa kensi‐gyii kɔɔlɛ mʋ abaa anyɔ fɛɛ maa gyɛ fanɛ bɩrɩsa ɔkɔɔlɛ‐gyipu Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu tɔ mʋ. Fan taa bɛɛrɛɛ sa asa fɛɛ mu kudubi,
lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ san gbɛrɛɛ o wu kpalɩ Krisito kusun mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ nkpa taga apʋ, kyɛ mɛ tɔ lɩɩ nkyɛtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fan man taalɛ kyɛ mɛ tɔ mʋ.

Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ san mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, fanɛ ansi i gyii lɩɩ fan maa waa kʋkʋlʋn yɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu sʋ mʋ! Nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ asɩn tɔɔrɔɔsa sa mɛ fɛɛ n maa bɩla n kyʋrɔɔ atɔ kʋlʋn maŋa n sa fanɛ, amaa ɩ gyɛ nkyɛtɔ sa fanɛ nɩn.
Fan kɩɩ yɛ ɔdan lɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ be du fɛɛ igyoonɔ nɩɩ ba gyɛ alibi awaapʋ, nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ
kɩtɩn sʋ.

Lɩɩ fɛɛ anɛ mʋ nɩɩ an bɔla Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ sʋ an sun mʋ, nɩɩ an kaapʋ anɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ anɛ kɩwaa kʋkʋlʋn yɛ Krisito Yesu sʋ mʋ, anɛ nɩɩ ba tɩŋɛ iduu kesintin tɔ mʋ. Nɩɩ a man taa anɛ n‐yɩɩ tʋʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kɩtɩn sʋ.
Naafɔɔ ngbaa mɛ n sʋ ɔkpa n taa mɛ n‐yɩɩ tʋʋ kanɩn awaasa sʋ.
Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ɛɛ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ ɔ sʋ ɔkpa ɔ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ tʋʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kɩtɩn sʋ mʋ, naafɔɔ mɛ ɩ sʋ ɔkpa n kyɔ mʋ.
Ba tɩn mɛ oduu kakɛ buruwasapu, nɩɩ n gyɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ obii nɩn, nɩɩ n lɩɩ Bengyamin kebunɔ, nɩɩ n gyɛ Hibriwu obii gbaa‐gbaa, nɩɩ taa lɩɩ nbara mʋ kibuu sʋ mʋ, n kyɩna n gyɛ Farasii nɩn,
nɩɩ lɩɩ mɛ n‐yɩɩ kɩkpan Gyiwu kabwaarɛ‐sun tɔ mʋ, n nyanla Krisito kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ, nɩɩ lɩɩ ɔkʋ kɩnyɛ ɩkpa kigyiigi lɩɩ Gyiwu nbara mʋ kibuu sʋ mʋ, n man sʋ kilibi ɩmʋ tɔ.
Amaa kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ n daa kɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ gyɛ tɔnɔ sa mɛ mʋ, nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ lɩɩ Yesu Krisito sʋ mʋ, ɩ man bɩla ɩ gyɛ sɛhn mɛ asɛ.

Man gyɛ ɩmʋ nkʋn, kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ gyɛ mɛ asɛ fɛɛ atɔ fɔyɩsa, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ atɔ kparɛ sa mɛ mʋ, ɩ gyɛ n ba bɩɩ Mɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito. Lɩɩ Krisito sʋ mʋ n pan kʋtɔ kʋmaa, nɩɩ n kɩɩ ɩmʋ fɛɛ kɩgyaakpa sʋ atɔ, kɛ n nyɛ‐nyɛ Krisito.

Saamʋ, n waa kʋkʋlʋn yɛ mʋ kakpaa, yɛgɛ n man bɩla n sʋ n gbaa‐gbaa mɛ ɩkpa kikyiigi lɩɩ nbara mʋ kibuu sʋ, amaa ɩkpa kikyiigi mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bɔla kɩkɔɔlɛ Krisito gyii sʋ. Nɩɩ ɩkpa kikyiigi nɩmʋ, mʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ mʋ, gyan kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ nɩn.
Nɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n biti ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, n baa n nyi Krisito yɛ mʋ kelewu kyiŋi ɔlʋn mʋ, kɛ n gyii mʋ awʋrʋfɔ mʋ ɩkʋ, kɛ n ba waa fɛɛ n wu bʋga yɛ mʋ,
saamʋ ɩ waa nɛnɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ nyɛ kyiŋi ngbaa mɛ lɩɩ alewupu tɔ, ba nkpa tɔ.
N mɛɛ kaapʋ nɩn fɛɛ n tɛɛ nyɛ ɩmʋ abɛɛ n tɛɛ wʋla waa kyɛɛkyɛɛ naa lʋwɛ. Amaa n kpan mɛ n‐yɩɩ kɛ n kɩtaa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Krisito Yesu tɩɩ mɛ waa mʋ lɛɛ mʋ tɔ.

Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, n mɛɛ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ mɛ kɩbaa tɛɛ kɩtaa ɩmʋ. Amaa kʋtɔ kʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ n waa mʋ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ wʋla kyʋn mɛ kamaa mʋ, n tan kɩmʋ sʋ, kɛ n waa aniya fʋʋ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ dɛ mi ansi tɔ mʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ n kpan mɛ n‐yɩɩ nɩn n sɩlɛ ntintin naa lʋwɛ, kɛ n nyɛ‐nyɛ nkpa kakɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla Krisito Yesu sʋ tɩɩ asa mʋ.
Nɩɩ anɛ mʋ nɩɩ an dan kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ tɔ mʋ kpini, ɩ dagaa a maa sʋ nfɛɛrɛ kʋlʋn nɩmʋ. Amaa nɩɩ fanɛ akʋ bɛɛ kan bɛɛ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ kwɩɩ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ lɛɛ ɩmʋ gbaa kasɛ sa fanɛ.
Nɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ki tiri ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, fan yɛgɛ a kɩtaa kɩkaapʋ mʋ nɩɩ an wʋla nyɛ mʋ nkʋn.
Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, fan kasɛ mɛ awaasa tɔ, kɛ fan pɛɛsɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba tɛ kakyɩna mʋ nɩɩ an kaapʋ tɔ yɩla sa fanɛ mʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n wʋla tɔwɛ fanɛ, nɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ n bɩla n tɔwɛ ɩmʋ yɛ ansikyu gbaa, yɛ asa gaalaagaa bamʋ kakyɩna tɔ du nɩn fɛɛ ba maa kisi Krisito kelewu oyu laasa mʋ sʋ asɩn.
Asa anɩmʋ bɩrɛ, bamʋ kala ana bee biti ba muuri, nɩɩ bamʋ ɩtɔ nɩɩ bee sun, nɩɩ bamʋ ipeeli‐sɩn tɔ nɩɩ bɛɛ kʋsaa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ. Nɩɩ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ gyan dulinyaa atɔ wʋlɛ nkʋn sʋ nɩn.
Amaa anɛɛnɛ bɩrɛ, anɛ ayɛ bʋ sʋsʋ nɩn. Nɩɩ ɩ gyʋgyʋʋ anɛ an gyoo anɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ, Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ lɩɩ tʋtɔ ba mʋ.

Nɩɩ ɔ kan ba mʋ, ee biti ɔ kyɛɛgɛ anɛ n‐yɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ii wu falɛ, kɛ ɔ waa ɩmʋ fɛɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ sʋ bʋnyaa mʋ. Ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ ɛɛ yɛgɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa kɩ baa kɩ bʋ mʋ kasɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ee biti ɔ taa waa kanɩn.
Ɩmʋ sʋ mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana mʋ nɩɩ n biti fanɛ asɩn gaa mʋ, n biti kuwu fanɛ. Fanɛ sʋ nɩɩ mi ansi i gyii nɩɩ n nyɛ kɩtɩɩ. Mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ ana danbɩrasa, fan yɩlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ tɔ kenken kanɩn.
N kʋlɛ Yuwodiya maa Sintike fɛɛ ba maa gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ asa falɛ sʋ mʋ, ba tɔwɛ kyula abaa.
Nɩɩ n kʋlɛ ngbaa fʋ mɛ bɩrɩsa kusun ɔwaapʋ kesintin tɔ,

fɛɛ fʋ kyɛ kanɩn akyɩɩ anyɔ mʋ tɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ba kyɛ mɛ tɔ asɩn danbɩrasa kusun mʋ kɩ yɛlɩgɛ tɔ. Akyɩɩ nɩmʋ maa Kelementi yɛ mɛ tɔmaa ana asunpu kpini mʋ nɩɩ bamʋ atɩɩ ɩ bʋ Ɩbwaarɛ nkpa ɔwʋlɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, ba kyɔ mɛ tɔ gaa.
Fan yɛgɛ fanɛ ansi i gyii saŋa kʋmaa, fɛɛ fan maa gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ lɛɛ mʋ, n bɩla n pɩla tɔ yɛ, fan yɛgɛ fanɛ ansi i gyii!
Fan yɛgɛ ɔkʋmaa o wu fanɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fen du bwahn. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kɩba mʋ ki tiri tɔ.
Fan man yɩyɛɛ lɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋ sʋ, amaa kʋtɔ kʋmaa tɔ mʋ, fɛn kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ kɛ fɛn taa fanɛ asɩn tirisa kpini tʋʋ mu ansi tɔ.
Saamʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ sa fanɛ mʋ kayɩɩ yuuli gaa mʋ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa mɛɛ taalɛ nu kasɛ, kɛ ki kun fanɛ nkɔlɔ yɛ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ fan maa kɔɔlɛ Krisito Yesu gyii mʋ.

Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, mɛ asɩn laalaalʋwɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, fan yɛgɛ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ baa ɩ gyan kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ kesintin sʋ, yɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ, yɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ dɛ ɔkpa, yɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ ineesi, yɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ sʋ kebiti, yɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ansi ii gyii sʋ. Nɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋ kɩ kan kɩ bʋrɔn gaa abɛɛ kɩ sʋ kɩyɩn mʋ, falɛ atɔ ɩnɩmʋ nɩɩ fɛn fɛ ɩmʋ nfɛɛrɛ.
Fan waa kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fan bɩɩla abɛɛ fan nyɛ lɩɩ mɛ asɛ, abɛɛ fan nu abɛɛ fan wu n maa waa, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kayɩɩ yuuli wuya mʋ ɔ baa ɔ bʋ fanɛ asɛ.

Lɩɩ n maa gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ lɛɛ sʋ mʋ, mi ansi i gyii gaa, fɛɛ nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ bɩrɛ fan bɩla kaapʋ fɛɛ mɛ asɩn i tiri fanɛ. Nɩɩ kesintin tɔ n nyi mɛ asɩn ɩ maa tiri fanɛ, amaa ɔkpa nɩɩ fan man nyɛ kɛ fan kaapʋ fɛɛ mɛ asɩn i tiri fanɛ.
Man gyɛ yɛ mɛ n‐yɩɩ ɩ kɩtaa mɛ sʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ kanɩn, lɩɩ fɛɛ n bɩɩla ɔkpa kʋmaa sʋ fɛɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ n sʋ mʋ ɩ kʋkwɛ mɛ.

Nɩɩ n nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ki tiri kakyɩna tɔ, nɩɩ n bɩla n nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kanyɛ kʋkyɔ tɔ gbaa du. N bɩɩla ɩmʋ ɔkpa kʋmaa sʋ, ɩmʋ sʋ saŋa kʋmaa yɛ katɩn kʋmaa ɩmʋ nɩɩ n sʋ mʋ ɩ kʋkwɛ mɛ. Halɩɩ n nyɛ gyii ŋmɛ abɛɛ n naa akʋn, halɩɩ n sʋ naa bansʋ abɛɛ n man sʋ gbaa mʋ ɩ kʋkwɛ mɛ.
N taalɛ waa kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ lɩɩ ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ Krisito ɩɩ sa mɛ mʋ sʋ.
Amaa fan waa kusun gaa fɛɛ fan maa kyɛ mɛ tɔ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n bʋ awʋrʋfɔ tɔ mʋ.

Fanɛ Filipi abi gbaa fan nyi danbɩrasa fɛɛ, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n piili asɩn danbɩrasa katɔwɛ Masedoniya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, nɩɩ n lɩɩ fanɛ asɛ tʋtɔ mʋ, Krisito kʋbʋ kʋ man kɛɛ mɛ afulee lɩɩ kusee mʋ nɩɩ ba nyɛ mʋ sʋ, amɔɔ fanɛ nkʋn.
Halɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n bʋ Tesalonika kadɛ tɔ nɩɩ i tiri mɛ mʋ, fan kyɛ mɛ tɔ afulee ɩlɩɩ kanankʋ.
Man gyɛ fɛɛ nkɛɛ nɩɩ n dan n kɩɩ n biti lɩɩ fanɛ asɛ sʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ kanɩn, amaa n biti fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ taa agyaga tii fanɛ awaasa danbɩrasa kʋkɔka mʋ sʋ.

Nɩɩ n tɛɛ nyɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ii tiri mɛ mʋ, halɩɩ naa ban kanan mʋ nɩɩ n biti mʋ gbaa sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ fan taa sa Epafuroditu yɛ ɔ bɩya mɛ mʋ i loo mɛ abaa tɔ. Atɔ mʋ i du fɛɛ saraga atɔ liifensa mʋ nɩɩ ba taa lɛɛ saraga sa Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ, nɩɩ ɩ bɔla mu ansi.
Mɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, lɩɩ mʋ atɔ kparɛ damantɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, ee biti ɔ sa fanɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kii tiri fanɛ lɩɩ fan maa gyɛ Krisito Yesu lɛɛ sʋ.
Bʋnyaa ɔ baa ɔ gyɛ anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ kakpaa‐kakpaa. Amen.
N fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Krisito Yesu lɛɛ mʋ. Krisito abi mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ mɛ asɛ nfɩɩ gbaa bɛɛ fwaala fanɛ.
Ɩbwaarɛ asa kpini mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ nfɩɩ mʋ bɛɛ fwaala fanɛ, fɔnfɔn bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Roma abi Owura lala kɩkpaara sʋ mʋ.
Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kabwaala kɩ baa kɩ bʋ fanɛ kpini asɛ. Amen!
Colossians: Mɛ, Pɔɔlɩ mʋ nɩɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti sʋ nɩɩ n ba waa Krisito Yesu osunpu, yɛ anɛ bɩrɩsa Timoti ɩ kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ.
An kyʋrɔɔ an sa fanɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asa, mʋ nɩɩ fan gyɛ anɛ bɩrɩsa ana nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ Krisito gyii, nɩɩ fan bʋ Kolose kadɛ tɔ mʋ.
An kʋlɛ anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ fɛɛ mʋ kabwaala yɛ keyuula ɩ baa ɩ bʋ fanɛ asɛ.
Saŋa kʋmaa nɩɩ an kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ an sa fanɛ mʋ, an fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ, anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito Mʋ‐Sɛ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ an nu kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ Krisito Yesu gyii, yɛ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ fan sʋ sa Ɩbwaarɛ asa kpini mʋ.

Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ kesintin asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ gyankpaa ba fanɛ asɛ mʋ, fan nu tamaa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ sʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii yɛ kebiti mʋ gyan kanɩn tamaa, mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa yɩla sa fanɛ sʋsʋ.
Dulinya nɩmʋ kpini tɔ mʋ, asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ ɩɩ sɔyɩ abi, yɛgɛ ɩɩ yɛlɩgɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa fanɛ tɔ, lɩɩ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan nu asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ, nɩɩ fan nu Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala mʋ kasɛ kesintin tɔ.
Epafarasi, anɛ bɩrɩsa Krisito kɩyaafɔlɛ kesintin tɔ mʋ, ɩ ba yɩlɛ anɛ ayaa tɔ tɔwɛ fanɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala mʋ asɩn,
nɩɩ mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ anɛ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ sa fanɛ.
Lɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ sʋ, lɩɩ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ an nu fanɛ sʋ mʋ, a man yɛgɛ kɩkʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ sa fanɛ. An kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ ɔ sa fanɛ kanyaasɩn yɛ kasɛ kunu bɔla Kayaayu mʋ sʋ, kɛ ɩ yɛgɛ fan taalɛ bɩɩ mu kebiti mʋ.
Nɩɩ an kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kanɩn nɩn kɛ ɩ yɛgɛ fan kyɩna kakyɩna mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ ii biti, nɩɩ ii gyii mu ansi ɔkpa kʋmaa nɩmʋ sʋ, kɛ fanɛ kɩbaabʋtɔ ɩ bɩya adanbɩrasa kɛ fan dan Ɩbwaarɛ kinyi tɔ.
An kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ ɔ sa fanɛ ɔlʋn kparɛ lɩɩ mʋ bʋnyaa ɔlʋn mʋ tɔ, saamʋ fɛn nyɛ‐nyɛ kenyiita yɛ nkɔlɔ yɩlɛ tɔ. Fan yɛgɛ fanɛ ansi i gyii,
kɛ fan taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fan dagaa mu kuwura‐gyii kɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ tɔ npatɩyɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ ɛɛ sa mʋ asa mʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ ɩ mɔlɩgɛ anɛ lɩɩ kitentenbiri ɔlʋn mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ taa anɛ ba mu‐Bii bitisa mu kuwura‐gyii tɔ.
Mʋ ɩ mɔlɩgɛ anɛ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa anɛ alibi kɛɛ anɛ.
Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ man pɩɩta wu mʋ mʋ, mʋ kudubi ɩ gyɛ Krisito Yesu, Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ bʋ tɔ pɔyɩ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tʋʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa.

Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla mʋ sʋ nɩn tʋʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa, sʋsʋ atɔ yɛ kasɛ sʋ atɔ, ɩmʋ nɩɩ an wu yɛ ansi yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ a mɛɛ wu yɛ ansi, awuragya, yɛ n‐yaayu libi, yɛ awuragyipu yɛ alʋlʋnpʋ. Mʋ sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla tʋʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa, nɩɩ ɔ taa ɩmʋ kpini waa mʋ abaa tɔ.
Ɔ bʋ tɔ pɔyɩ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tʋʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ, nɩɩ mʋ kɩpɩrɛ sʋ nɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa kɩ bʋ tɔ kyɛɛkyɛɛ.

Nɩɩ mʋ ɩ gyɛ kumu sa mʋ kʋbʋ mʋ kpini, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ kumu gyɛ sa kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ. Nɩɩ mʋ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ sʋ nkpa, yɛ ɔgyankpaapʋ mʋ nɩɩ o kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ, kɛ ɔ baa ɔ gyɛ ɔgyankpaapʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩpɩrɛ nɩn fɛɛ mu kedubi mʋ kpini ɩ baa ɩ bʋ mu‐bii mʋ tɔ.
Mu‐Bii Yesu kelewu oyu laasa mʋ sʋ, yɛ nkalan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyɛɛgɛ mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla sʋ taa lɔŋɔ sʋsʋ yɛ kasɛ sʋ atɔ mʋ kpini yɛ mʋ nsana.
Saŋa kʋ tɔ mʋ, naafɔɔ fanɛ kamaa nɩɩ fan taa kaapʋ Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ lɩɩ fanɛ alibi sʋ mʋ fan kisi mʋ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ.

Amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla Krisito mʋ nɩɩ o be biliŋi nyɩmɩsa nɩɩ o wu mʋ sʋ, lɔŋɔ fanaa mʋ nsana. Ɔ waa ɩnɩmʋ kɛ fan ba waa asa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ, yɛgɛ fan man sʋ ineesi yɛ asɩn pwɩɩsa kʋ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ,

nɩɩ fan kan kyaga sʋ kɔɔlɛ Krisito gyii, nɩɩ fan yɩlɛ tɔ kenken nɩɩ fan man kyɛɛgɛ lɩɩ tamaa mʋ nɩɩ fan sʋ lɩɩ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ tɔ mʋ. Asɩn danbɩrasa maŋa nɩɩ fan nu, nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ sa ɔsa kʋmaa nɩmʋ kasɛ sʋ, nɩɩ mɛ, Pɔɔlɩ n baa n gyɛ kusun mʋ osunpu falɛ.
Nbɩɩnbɩɩ mi ansi i gyii fɛɛ n man gyii awʋrʋfɔ sa fanɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ mɛ awʋrʋfɔ tɔ mʋ, ngbaa mɛ n wu Krisito awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ san mʋ sa mʋ asa, mʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ mʋ kʋbʋ kpini mʋ.
Ɩbwaarɛ waa mɛ Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ, nɩɩ o sun mɛ yɛ n ba waa mu kusun. Kusun mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ n lɛɛ mʋ asɩn mʋ kpini kasɛ sa fanɛ.
Asɩn baalasa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ man lɛɛ ɩmʋ ifuli sa dɩdaa abi, amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ ɔ lɛɛ ɩmʋ kaapʋ mʋ asa.
Ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩpɩrɛ tɔ fɛɛ ɔ lɛɛ asɩn baalasa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ bʋnyaa asɩn mʋ kaapʋ ndɛndɛmandɛ asa kpini. Asɩn baalasa mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ Krisito maa bʋ fanɛ tɔ mʋ, fan sʋ tamaa yɛ bʋnyaa lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ.

An taa kanyaasɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sa anɛ mʋ an tɔwɛ abwaarɛsɩn, nɩɩ an da ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kumu tɔ, yɛgɛ an kaapʋ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kɛ a taa mʋ waa Ɩbwaarɛ abaa tɔ fɛɛ ɔ nyɛ dan kɩkɔɔlɛ Krisito gyii mʋ tɔ kyɛɛkyɛɛ.
Ɩnɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ n taa ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ Krisito sa mɛ nɩɩ ii sun kusun mɛ tɔ mʋ, n kpan mɛ n‐yɩɩ n sun mʋ.
N biti fan wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ n mɔɔ mɛ n‐yɩɩ gaa n sa fanɛ, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Lawodisiya kadɛ tɔ yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man pɩɩta wu mɛ yɛ ansi mʋ.

N waa ɩnɩmʋ kɛ ɩ waa fanɛ kpini ɔlʋn tɔ, kɛ fan taa kebiti waa kɔnɔ kʋlʋn. Falɛ sʋ mʋ, fen biti fan nu asɩn kʋmaa nɩmʋ kyɛɛkyɛɛ naa lʋwɛ, kɛ ɩ yɛgɛ fan bɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn baalasa mʋ, ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Krisito gbaa‐gbaa mʋ.
Mʋ nkʋn tɔ nɩɩ kanyaasɩn yɛ kinyi lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ kpini baala.
N tɔwɛ fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ nɩn kɛ ɔkʋ ɔ man nyɛ taa kɔnɔ tɔ kɔn asɩn pʋpwɛ kʋ ba pɩna fanɛ.
Halɩɩ n maa man bʋ fanɛ asɛ falɛ gbaa mʋ, mɛ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ gyan fanɛ sʋ, nɩɩ ɩ waa mɛ ɔkɔn n maa nu fɛɛ fɛn waa ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa, nɩɩ fɛn sʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ Krisito gyii mʋ tɔ kenken.
Ɩmʋ sʋ, fɛɛ fan maa tɛɛ kɔɔlɛ Krisito Yesu fɛɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ fanɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ mʋ, fan kyɩna yɛ mʋ kanɩn.
Kɛ fan nyɛ ilin yɩlɛ mʋ tɔ kɛ fan dan, kɛ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii Krisito tɔ mʋ ɩ waa ɔlʋn tii sʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba kaapʋ fanɛ mʋ. Kɛ fan taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ gaa.

Fan baa fan da sʋ kɛ fan man yɛgɛ akʋ ba taa nyɩmɩsa kanyaasɩn yɛ antɩŋɛsa pɩna fanɛ biliŋi bamʋ anyɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ gyɛ anaana‐tɔ yɛ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ n‐yaayu libi lɛɛ nɩn, nɩɩ ɩ man lɩɩ Krisito asɛ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ Krisito Yesu tɔ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ laalaamuu mʋ kpini bʋ,
nɩɩ fan naa Krisito kɩwaa kʋkʋlʋn sʋ mʋ, fan nyɛ mʋ nkpa nɩmʋ lʋwɛ kyɛɛkyɛɛ. Mʋ ɩ gyɛ kumu sa awura yɛ alʋnpʋ kpini.

Fan naa Krisito kɩwaa kʋkʋlʋn sʋ mʋ, ɩ waa nɩn fɛɛ Krisito maa tɩŋɛ fanɛ iduu mʋ, nɩɩ man gyɛ nyɩmɩsa ɩ taa abaa tɩŋɛ fanɛ. Krisito kɩtɩŋɛ fanɛ iduu mʋ, ɩ kaapʋ nɩn fɛɛ ɔ lɛɛ fanɛ lɩɩ alibi ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ mʋ.

Ba maa gyee fanɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee mʋ, i du nɩn fɛɛ ba maa pula fanɛ tii Krisito sʋ, nɩɩ ba bɩla kyiŋi fanɛ tii mʋ sʋ ba nkpa tɔ mʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ fan kɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa kyiŋi mʋ ba nkpa tɔ mʋ gyii.
Fan kyɩna fan du nɩn fɛɛ alewupu mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ lɩɩ fanɛ alibi, yɛ fanɛ kɩman buu Ɩbwaarɛ nbara sʋ. Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ kyiŋi fanɛ tii Krisito sʋ ba nkpa tɔ. Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa anɛ alibi kpini kɛɛ anɛ,
nɩɩ ɔ kpayɩ kʋpwɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ yɩla lɩɩ anɛ kɩman buu nbara mʋ sʋ mʋ. Ɔ lɛɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ i du nɩn fɛɛ ba da ɩmʋ tii Krisito sʋ mata oyu laasa mʋ sʋ.
Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla Krisito kelewu oyu laasa mʋ kɔɔlɛ n‐yaayu libi yɛ alʋnpʋ mʋ ɔlʋn kpini, nɩɩ ɔ ŋaabaa bamʋ sakyɔ tɔ kaapʋ fɛɛ o gyii bamʋ sʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ fan man yɛgɛ ɔkʋ o bun fanɛ kʋpwɛ lɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ fen gyii abɛɛ fen nuu mʋ sʋ, abɛɛ fan maa mee gyii kesu kɔnɔ kʋ yɛ ɔbwaayɩ pʋpwɛ kakɛ gyankpaasa abɛɛ Gyiwu abi kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ kensi‐gyii.
Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ sɩnkaala sa atɔ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ ba mʋ. Nɩɩ atɔ gbaa‐gbaa maŋa ɩ gyɛ Krisito nɩn.

Ɩmʋ sʋ fan man kan yɛgɛ ɔkʋ o bun fanɛ kʋpwɛ tɔwɛ yɛ fan man dagaa kʋkɔka mʋ, lɩɩ fan maa man bɩya fanɛ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ nɩɩ fan mee sun Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ fɛɛ mʋ mʋ. Kanɩn ɔsa maŋa ɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ ɔ nyɛ ansi sʋ kɩlɛɛkaapʋ mʋ, amaa nyɩmɩsa nfɛɛrɛ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ ɛɛ waa alala‐sɩn kanɩn.

Nɩɩ ɔ man bɩla taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ tii Krisito mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ kumu mʋ sa kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ kpini. Nɩɩ Krisito ɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ kpini kɩɩ nyɛ ɔlʋn, ikyini yɛ ɩkyagakpa mʋ kpini bʋga kɩtaa abaa, nɩɩ ɩɩ dan kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti.
Lɩɩ fan maa wu tii Krisito sʋ nɩɩ fan barɩgɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ dulinyaa nɩmʋ atɔ kaapʋsa tɔ falɛ mʋ, mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ fan san fan bʋ kakyɩna dɩdaa mʋ tɔ nɩɩ fan buu ɩmʋ ɩkpa?
Kanɩn akaapʋsa mʋ akʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, “Fan man kɩtaa kɩnɩmʋ tɔ! Fan man gyii ɩnɩmʋ! Fan man mata ɩnɩmʋ!”
Atɔ kisisa mʋ kpini ii biti ɩ ba kyʋn. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ gyɛ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ asa kɩkaapʋ nɩn.

Kanɩn nbara mʋ du nɩn fɛɛ kanyaasɩn maa bʋ ɩmʋ tɔ mʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kpan bamʋ n‐yɩɩ bɛɛ waa fɛɛ ba maa sun Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ gaa mʋ, nɩɩ bɛɛ pɩna yɛ bɛɛ bɩya bamʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ, nɩɩ bɛɛ waa bamʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ awʋrʋfɔ. Amaa ɩnɩmʋ kpini mɛɛ kyɛ bamʋ tɔ kɛ ba yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa.
Lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ maa kyiŋi fanɛ tii Krisito sʋ ba nkpa tɔ sʋ mʋ, fan taa fanɛ nkɔlɔ gyaga sʋsʋ atɔ sʋ, katɩn mʋ nɩɩ Krisito tɛ kuwura‐gya sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ gyisa
sʋ mʋ.
Fan taa fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ gyaga sʋsʋ atɔ sʋ, man gyɛ kasɛ sʋ atɔ sʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ fan wu sa fanɛ kakyɩna dɩdaa mʋ, nɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ fanɛ nkpa ɩ baala tii Krisito sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ.
Nɩɩ Krisito mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ fanɛ nkpa kan lɩɩ ifuli mʋ, fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fen biti fan lɩɩ ifuli yɛ mʋ bʋnyaa mʋ.

Ɩmʋ sʋ fan lɛɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ kasɛ sʋ kɩbaabʋtɔ libi kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ, fɛɛ abawʋlɛ kebiti, yɛ agyaga‐sɩn, yɛ kanyɩn yɛ kakyɩɩ biti kayɛlɩgɛ, yɛ onsi‐payɩ libi, yɛ mɛ nkʋn n nyɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ kusun ɩdakpa mʋ.
Lɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ sʋ mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ agbʋ lala mʋ ɩ bʋ ɔkpa ɩɩ ba.
Naafɔɔ kanɩn nɩɩ fan kyɩna fɛn waa, nɩɩ alibi mʋ ii gyii fanɛ sʋ.
Amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ, n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ fan lɛɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ falɛ atɔ nɩmʋ kpini tɔ, fɛɛ agbʋ yɛ agbʋ libi, yɛ kekisi yɛ nyɩmɩsa kɩtɩɩ‐nyita yɛ ntɔwɛ gyaga mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ lɩɩ fanɛ nnɔ tɔ.
Fan man tɩn antɩŋɛsa sa abaa, lɩɩ fan maa lɛɛ fanɛ kɩbaabʋtɔ dɩdaa yɛ ɩmʋ awaasa libi tʋʋ mʋ.
Nbɩɩnbɩɩ anɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ biliŋi nyɩmɩsa pʋpwɛ nɩn, nɩɩ fan baa fan du fɛɛ fanɛ ɔtʋʋpʋ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, kɛ fan ba bɩɩ mʋ danbɩrasa.
Lɩɩ kɩbaabʋtɔ pʋpwɛ nɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, ɩ man bɩla i tiri fɛɛ ɔkʋ gyɛ Giriki obii

abɛɛ Gyiwu obii, abɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba tɩn iduu abɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man tɩn iduu. Ɩ man tiri fɛɛ ɔkʋ gyɛ ɔfɔ kyilim abɛɛ ɔkʋ ansi ɩ man bugi, abɛɛ ɔkʋ gyɛ kɩnyɛ abɛɛ ɔkʋ man gyɛ kɩnyɛ, amaa ɩmʋ nɩɩ i tiri mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ Krisito ɩ gyɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa, nɩɩ mʋ ɩ bʋ akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu kpini tɔ.
Kanɩn sʋ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ maa tɩɩ fanɛ ba waa mʋ asa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ, nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kebiti sa fanɛ mʋ, fan taa kʋwɛɛ kuwu, yɛ kɩdanbɩrasa kɩwaa, yɛ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ kɩbɩya, yɛ bwahn kɩwaa yɛ kenyiita bun fɛɛ kaalɛ.
Nɩɩ fanɛ bɩrɩsa kan waa fanɛ alibi mʋ, fan kpala ɩmʋ sʋ, kɛ fan taa alibi kɛɛ abaa. Fan taa kɛɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ taa kɛɛ fanɛ mʋ.
Nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ kpini kumu ɩ gyɛ kɩnyɛ kebiti sa abaa, kɩmʋ ɩɩ bɩɩtɛ ɩmʋ kpini bʋga waa kɔnɔ kʋlʋn kyɛɛkyɛɛ.
Lɩɩ fan maa gyɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kʋlʋn abi sʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ tɩɩ fanɛ ba waa Krisito keyuula mʋ tɔ. Ɩmʋ sʋ fan yɛgɛ keyuula mʋ ki gyii kuwura fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ. Fan taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ.

Fan yɛgɛ Krisito asɩn mʋ ɩ kyɩna fanɛ tɔ gaa. Fan taa kanyaasɩn kaapʋ abaa kɛ fan da abaa amu tɔ. Fan taa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩlʋn yɛ abwaarɛsɩn ɩlʋn yɛ Kayaayu kɩlɛɛkaapʋ ɩlʋn fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ lɩɩ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ.
Nɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fɛn waa abɛɛ fɛn tɔwɛ mʋ, fan waa ɩmʋ kpini Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ, kɛ fan bɔla mʋ sʋ taa afwaala sa Ɔsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ.
Akyɩɩ‐kilipu, fan bɩya fanɛ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ sa fanɛ‐kuli ana, kanɩn ɩ dagaa Krisito ɔkyɩɩ maa waa.
Anyɩn‐kilipu, fan nyɛ kebiti sa fanɛ‐ka ana kɛ fan man ŋmanyan bamʋ.
Nbii, fan nu sa fanɛ akʋʋgɛpʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩnɩmʋ ii gyii Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu mu ansi.
Akʋgɛpʋ fan man waa fanɛ‐bii ana agbʋ, man gyɛ kanɩn bamʋ abaa ii biti ɩ yɔɔ.

Anyɛ, fan nu sa fanɛ‐nyɩrɩpɛ ana mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ kasɛ sʋ nfɩɩ mʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ. Man gyɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ bamʋ ansi ɩ gyan fanɛ sʋ mʋ nkʋn nɩɩ fan waa, kɛ fan nyɛ kʋwɛɛ kuwu lɩɩ bamʋ asɛ. Amaa fan nu sa bamʋ kesintin tɔ lɩɩ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ, lɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ bɛɛrɛɛ sʋ.
Kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fɛn waa mʋ, fan taa fanɛ nkɔlɔ kpini waa ɩmʋ fɛɛ fan maa waa ɩmʋ fɛn sa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ, nɩɩ man gyɛ asa,
fɛɛ fan nyi fan maa biti fan nyɛ kʋkɔka mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ taa yɩla mʋ asa mʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Krisito ɩ gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ nɩɩ fen sun mʋ.
Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa alibi mu alibi kʋkɔka nɩɩ ee biti ɔ nyɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ man sʋ nmɛɛgɛ tɔ.
Kasɛ sʋ anyɩrɩpɛ, fan kɩɩ fanɛ anyɛ sʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa nɩɩ ɩ bʋrɔn, lɩɩ fɛɛ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fan nyi fan maa sʋ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ sʋsʋ.
Fan nyɛ saŋa sa kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ saŋa kʋmaa, kɛ fan baa fan da sʋ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ tɔ, kɛ fan taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ.
Kɛ fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ sa anɛ gbaa‐gbaa anɛ fɛɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ o bugi ɔkpa sa mʋ asɩn mʋ kɩtɔwɛ, kɛ a nyɛ ɔkpa tɔwɛ asɩn baalasa lɩɩ Krisito sʋ, ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ n tii obu falɛ.
Fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ fɛɛ n taalɛ n bugi tɔ n tɔwɛ asɩn mʋ kyɛɛkyɛɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ n tɔwɛ mʋ.
Fan bɩɩ kanyaasɩn lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan kyɩna yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Krisito abuupu mʋ, nɩɩ ɔkpa kʋ kan bugi sa fanɛ yɛ fan tɔwɛ bamʋ Krisito asɩn mʋ, fan tɔwɛ ɩmʋ sa bamʋ.
Fan yɛgɛ fanɛ ntɔwɛ ɩ baa ɩ bʋkɔn fɛɛ nfɔlɛ, kɛ fan bɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan lɛɛ kɔnɔ sa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ fanɛ asɩn mʋ.
Anɛ bɩrɩsa Tikiku danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ kesintin obuupu yɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kusun tɔ mʋ, ii biti ɔ ba tɔwɛ fanɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n du nfɩɩ.
Ɩnɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ n sun mʋ fanɛ asɛ, kɛ fan nyɛ bɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ an du nfɩɩ, kɛ ɔ bɛ tɔwɛ saŋɛ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ.
Maa anɛ bɩrɩsa danbɩrasa Krisito ɔkɔɔlɛ‐gyipu Onesimu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ fanɛ ayɛ obii mʋ, nɩɩ n sun mʋ fanɛ asɛ. Bamʋ ii biti ba tɔwɛ fanɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ii kpee sʋ nfɩɩ kpini.
Mɛ bɩrɩsa Arisitako mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ mɛ asɛ obu tiisa tɔ mʋ ɩɩ fwaala fanɛ. Kanɩn nɩɩ Banabasi mu‐supu Maki gbaa ɩɩ fwaala fanɛ. N wʋla tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ nɩɩ ɔ kan ba fanɛ asɛ mʋ, fan kɩɩ mʋ sʋ danbɩrasa.

Gyosuwa mʋ nɩɩ ba bɩla bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Gyusitusi mʋ gbaa ɩ fwaala fanɛ. Bamʋ nkʋn ɩ gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ nɩɩ ba tii mɛ bɩrɩsa ana sʋ, nɩɩ ba gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ asunsunpu, nɩɩ ba kyɛ mɛ tɔ yɛ ɔdan.

Epafarasi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ fanɛ ayɛ abi nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Yesu Krisito kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ ɩɩ fwaala fanɛ. Saŋa kʋmaa nɩmʋ ɛɛ kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gaa ɛɛ sa fanɛ fɛɛ, ɔ waa fanɛ kɛ fan yɩlɛ tɔ kenken, kɛ fan dan kɛ fanɛ Krisito kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii ɩ nyɛ ilin gaa, kɛ fan waa Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti sʋ.
Ngbaagbaa mɛ n nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ Epafarasi taa fanɛ asɩn yɛ Lawodisiya abi yɛ Hirapoli abi asɩn waa mʋ asɩn tirisa, nɩɩ ee wu fanɛ lewu.
Anɛ kyɛmɩnɛ danbɩrasa Luka mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ ɔkyɛpʋ
mʋ, yɛ Demasi bɛɛ fwaala fanɛ.
Ngbaa mɛ n fwaala anɛ bɩrɩsa ana mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Lawodisiya mʋ, yɛ ɔkyɩɩ Nimfa yɛ Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ gyaŋɛ mʋ ayɛ mʋ.

Nɩɩ ba kan kalɛ ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ sa fanɛ lʋwɛ mʋ, fan kɩɩ sʋ kɛ ba kalɛ ɔwʋlɛ maŋa sa Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Lawodisiya kadɛ tɔ mʋ gbaa, kɛ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fan kalɛ ɔwʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ n kyʋrɔɔ naa sa Lawodisiya abi mʋ.
Fan tɔwɛ Akipusi yɛ, “Kɩɩ sʋ kɛ fʋ lʋwɛ kusun mʋ nɩɩ fʋ nyɛ lɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ asɛ mʋ.”
Mɛ Pɔɔlɩ ɩ taa mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ kɩbaa kyʋrɔɔ afwaala nɩmʋ n sa fanɛ. Fan man tan sʋ fɛɛ n san n bʋ obu kitii tɔ. Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ bwaala fanɛ.
I Thessalonians: Mɛ Pɔɔlɩ maa Silasi yɛ Timoti ɩ kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ an sa fanɛ Krisito abi kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ fan bʋ Tesalonika mʋ, nɩɩ fan gyɛ Ɔsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito asa mʋ. Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala yɛ kayɩɩ‐yuuli kɩ baa kɩ bʋ fanɛ asɛ.
Saŋa kʋmaa an fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ lɩɩ fanɛ sʋ, nɩɩ an nyiŋi fanɛ kpini sʋ anɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ tɔ.

Anɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ sa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ anɛ‐Sɛ mʋ, an nyiŋi fanɛ sʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan sun kusun lɩɩ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ, yɛ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ fan taa waa kusun bʋlʋnsa, yɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan nyɛ kɔkɔlɔ yɩlɛ tɔ lɩɩ tamaa mʋ nɩɩ fan sʋ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito tɔ mʋ.
Anɛ‐daa ana yɛ anɛ‐supu ana, an nyi fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti sʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ fanɛ waa mʋ lɛɛ.

Lɩɩ fɛɛ an man taa asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ ba tɔwɛ sa fanɛ kɔnɔ tɔ nkʋn nɩn. Amaa an ba tɔwɛ fanɛ asɩn mʋ yɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ ɔlʋn tɔ, nɩɩ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ asɩn mʋ gyii yɛ ɩ gyɛ kesintin. Nɩɩ fan wu kakyɩna danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ an kyɩna yɛ fanɛ, kɛ ɩ kyɛ fanɛ tɔ.
Fan kasɛ anɛ yɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ awaasa tɔ, ɩmʋ sʋ halɩɩ awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ fan bʋ ɩmʋ tɔ gbaa mʋ, fan kɔɔlɛ asɩn mʋ yɛ kensi‐gyii mʋ nɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ sa fanɛ mʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Masedoniya yɛ Akiya mʋ kpini bɛɛ kɩɩ fanɛ awaasa nɩɩ bɛɛ bɩɩla ɩmʋ.

Nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ asɩn mʋ ɩ man yalagɛ lɩɩ fanɛ asɛ kpee Masedoniya yɛ Akiya nkʋn, amaa fanɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii asɩn mʋ, ɩ yalagɛ kpee katɩn kʋmaa nɩmʋ. Kanɩn sʋ ɩ man daaga fɛɛ a bɩla tɔwɛ kʋtɔ kʋ lɩɩ ɩmʋ sʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ gbaa‐gbaa bamʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ kɩfɔ kɩtaa mʋ nɩɩ fan kɩtaa anɛ. Bɛɛ tɔwɛ asa kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan kyɛɛgɛ lɩɩ ɩdakpa kusun tɔ, ba sun Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ nkpa yɛ kesintin mʋ.
Nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan gyoo Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii Yesu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kusaa mʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ, mʋ kibwii lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba mʋ asɩn. Nɩɩ mʋ ɩɩ kɔɔlɛ anɛ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ agbʋ lala mʋ nɩɩ kii biti kɩ ba asa sʋ mʋ.
Anɛ‐daa ana yɛ anɛ‐supu ana Krisito abuupu, fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ fen nyi fɛɛ anɛ kɩba mʋ nɩɩ an ba fanɛ asɛ mʋ man waa kɩyan.

Pɔyɩ kɛ a ba fanɛ asɛ mʋ, fen nyi kanan mʋ Filipi abi ba saalɛ anɛ nɩɩ ba yɛgɛ nɩɩ an gyii awʋrʋfɔ. Amaa halɩɩ ba maa kʋsʋ yɩlɛ anɛ sʋ gbaa mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ kyɛ anɛ tɔ nɩɩ an nyɛ kɔkɔlɔ yɩlɛ tɔ, nɩɩ an taalɛ tɔwɛ fanɛ mʋ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ.
Asɩn mʋ nɩɩ an tɔwɛ an kʋlɛ fanɛ falɛ mʋ, an man fɔyɩ ɔkpa, nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ nfɛɛrɛ libi kʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ npɩna asɩn.

Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ ɩɩ kɩɩ wu anɛ nɩɩ ɔ taa Asɩn danbɩrasa katɔwɛ waa anɛ abaa tɔ. Ɩmʋ sʋ man gyɛ nyɩmɩsa kebiti sʋ nɩɩ an waa, amaa kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bɔla Ɩbwaarɛ ansi mʋ. Mʋ ii nyi anɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ yɛ anɛ nfɛɛrɛ.
Fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fen nyi fɛɛ an man taa kɔnɔ tɔ kɔn asɩn tɔwɛ fanɛ. Nɩɩ an man taa sɛhn baala fanɛ sʋ kɛ a nyɛ kʋtɔ kʋ lɩɩ fanɛ asɛ. Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ gyɛ anɛ kesintin ogyipu.
An man kyɩna an biti ayɩn‐bi lɩɩ asa asɛ abɛɛ fanɛ asɛ abɛɛ ɔkʋ asɛ.
Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ an gyɛ Krisito Asunpu falɛ mʋ, naafɔɔ an sʋ ɔkpa fɛɛ a biliŋi kasʋla fanɛ sʋ,
amaa an yɔɔ anɛ n‐yɩɩ kyɩna fanɛ asɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ talapʋ ɩɩ yɔɔ mʋ n‐yɩɩ ɛɛ kɩɩ mu‐bii ana sʋ mʋ.
A maa biti fanɛ asɩn gaa sʋ mʋ, man gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ nkʋn nɩɩ an taa bɩya fanɛ. Amaa an taa anɛ n‐yɩɩ gbaa sa fanɛ tii sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan biliŋi anɛ abitipu.

Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, n kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ fen nyiŋi kanan mʋ nɩɩ an waa kusun gaa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ an bʋ fanɛ asɛ mʋ. An waa kusun kakyʋwapɛ yɛ kagyanbwɛ an kɩɩ anɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ an tɔwɛ fanɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ, kanan mʋ nɩɩ a man biliŋi kasʋla fanɛ ɔkʋ sʋ.
Fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ Yesu gyii mʋ, fan naa Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ gyɛ anɛ kesintin agyipu lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ an kyɩna fanɛ tɔ, nɩɩ an man sʋ ineesi ɩkʋ, nɩɩ anɛ ɩkpa i kyiigi, nɩɩ alibi kʋ man bʋ anɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ fan nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ an bɩla fanɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔsɛ ɩɩ bɩla mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mu‐bii ana mʋ.
An waa fanɛ aniya tɔ, nɩɩ an tɔwɛ yuula fanɛ nkɔlɔ, nɩɩ an tɔwɛ waa fanɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan kyɩna kakyɩna danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bɔla Ɩbwaarɛ ansi. Mʋ ɩ tɩɩ fanɛ ba mu kuwura‐gyii yɛ mʋ bʋnyaa mʋ tɔ.

Nɩɩ anɛ gbaa anɛ an bɩla an kyaga sʋ an fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan maa kɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fan nu lɩɩ anɛ asɛ mʋ, fan man kɔɔlɛ asɩn mʋ fɛɛ asa asɩn, amaa fan kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ gyii fɛɛ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ gbaa‐gbaa, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ kesintin mʋ. Kanɩn Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn maŋa ii sun kusun fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ tɔ.

Fanɛ, mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, an wu fɛɛ asɩn libi mʋ nɩɩ ɩ ba tu Ɩbwaarɛ kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ Krisito lɛɛ, nɩɩ ɩ bʋ Gyudeya mʋ, kanɩn asɩn libi kʋlʋn maŋa ɩ ba tu fanɛ gbaa. Lɩɩ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fan wu awʋrʋfɔ fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa asa abaa tɔ mʋ, kanɩn nɩɩ ba wu awʋrʋfɔ Gyiwu abi abaa tɔ.
Bamʋ ɩ gyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba mɔɔ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu, nɩɩ dɩdaa mʋ bamʋ ɩ mɔɔ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ, nɩɩ bamʋ akʋlʋn maŋa ɩ gya anɛ kyʋŋɛ mʋ. Bamʋ asɩn i mee gyii Ɩbwaarɛ ansi, nɩɩ ba kʋsʋ yɩlɛ asa kpini sʋ.

Nɩɩ ba kpan bamʋ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ naafɔɔ bee tii anɛ ɔkpa, kɛ a man nyɛ tɔwɛ Asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ mɔlɩgɛ bamʋ. Lɩɩ falɛ ɔkpa sʋ mʋ, ba kʋʋla bamʋ alibi gyaga abaa sʋ naa fʋʋ ɩmʋ laalaalʋwɛ. Nbɩɩnbɩɩ mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ nyɛ agbʋ waa bamʋ, nɩɩ ee biti ɔ bɩɩtɛ bamʋ asʋ.

Amaa mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, saŋa dɛɛ kʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba barɩgɛ anaa fanɛ nsana mʋ, an lɩɩ fanɛ ansi sʋ bɩrɛ, amaa fanɛ asɩn ɩ san ɩ bʋ anɛ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ. Ɩmʋ sʋ ɩ yɩlɛ anɛ ansi sʋ gaa fɛɛ ɔkpa kʋmaa nɩmʋ sʋ mʋ a bwii ba wu fanɛ.
An biti gaa fɛɛ a ba fanɛ asɛ. Mɛ Pɔɔlɩ, n kpan mɛ n‐yɩɩ saŋa gaalaagaa sʋ fɛɛ a ba fanɛ asɛ, amaa Sɩtaanɛ tii anɛ ɔkpa.
Anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kibwii ba mʋ, mɩnɛ ɩ gyɛ anɛ tamaa yɛ anɛ kensi‐gyii yɛ anɛ bʋnyaa kɩnyɛ mu ansi tɔ? Man gyɛ fanɛ?
Kesintin mʋ, fanɛ ɩ gyɛ anɛ bʋnyaa yɛ kensi‐gyii.
Ɩmʋ sʋ a maa wu yɛ a man bɩla yɛ a taalɛ waa kʋtɔ kʋ lɩɩ ɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, an waa anɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ anɛ nkʋn an sii Antensi kadɛ tɔ nfɩɩ.
Nɩɩ an sun anɛ‐supu Timoti mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ anɛ bɩrɩsa Ɩbwaarɛ kusun obuupu mʋ nɩɩ anaa mʋ an tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa lɩɩ Krisito sʋ. An sun mʋ yɛ ɔ ba waa fanɛ ɔlʋn tɔ yɛ aniya tɔ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ.
Kɛ kanyanla mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ ba fanɛ sʋ falɛ, ɩ man yɛgɛ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ o bwii kamaa. Fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ fen nyi fɛɛ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti nɩɩ kanyanla nɩmʋ ɩ ba anɛ sʋ.
Kesintin tɔ, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ an bʋ fanɛ asɛ mʋ, an taalɛ an tɔwɛ fanɛ fɛɛ an biti an nyɛ kanyanla. Nɩɩ ɩ ba kanɩn kesintin fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan nyi mʋ.

Lɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ sʋ n maa man bɩla yɛ n taalɛ kyɩna yɛgɛ n man wu fanɛ mʋ, n sun Timoti yɛ ɔ ba kɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan yɩlɛ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ sʋ mɛ kufuu fɛɛ falɛ ɔtʋʋtɔkɩɩpʋ mʋ ba tʋʋ fanɛ tɔ kɩɩ, kɛ ɩ yɛgɛ anɛ kɩkpɩnɛ mʋ ɩ waa kɩyan.

Amaa Timoti dan lɩɩ fanɛ asɛ ba nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɩya asɩn bʋkɔnsa lɩɩ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii yɛ fanɛ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ fan sʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ anɛ yɛ anɛ asɩn a bʋ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ nɩɩ fen nyiŋi anɛ sʋ gaa saŋa kʋmaa nɩmʋ, nɩɩ fen biti fɛɛ anaa fanɛ an wu abaa, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ anɛ gbaa anɛ an biti mʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ, mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, anaa anɛ awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ an gyii yɛ kanyanla mʋ nɩɩ a wu mʋ kpini mʋ, lɩɩ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ mʋ ɩ waa anɛ ɔlʋn tɔ.
Nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ, anɛ nkɔlɔ ɩ tɩyɛ anɛ lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan yɩlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ tɔ kenken mʋ.
Afwaala mɔɔ nɩɩ an biti a taa sa Ɩbwaarɛ lɩɩ fanɛ sʋ, lɩɩ kensi‐gyii mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛgɛ nɩɩ an nyɛ lɩɩ fanɛ sʋ falɛ?
Kakyʋwapɛ yɛ kagyanbwɛ kpini an kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ gaa lɩɩ anɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ fɛɛ a bɩla nyɛ wu fanɛ, kɛ a sa fanɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ki tiri fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ tɔ.
Nɩɩ anɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa‐gbaa yɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu ba bugi ɔkpa sa anɛ kɛ a ba fanɛ asɛ.
An kʋlɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu yɛ, ɔ yɛgɛ fanɛ kebiti kɩ nyɛ akyɔ tii sʋ, kɛ fan biti abaa yɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ gaa, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ anɛ gbaa an sʋ kebiti sa fanɛ mʋ.
An kʋlɛ fɛɛ ɔ sa fanɛ kɔkɔlɔ ɔsɩɩ, kɛ alibi yɛ ineesi ɩkʋ ɩ man bʋ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu ii biti ɔ ba maa Ɩbwaarɛ asa mʋ.

Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, an sa fanɛ kɔnɔ yɛ fan kyɩna kakyɩna mʋ nɩɩ i gyii Ɩbwaarɛ ansi, nɩɩ fan nu sa anɛ. Anɛ laalaalʋwɛ asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ an sʋ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu an kʋlɛ fanɛ yɛ, fan kɩtaa tɔ kɛ fan waa ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ kyɔ falɛ tii sʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ fen nyi kɩkaapʋ mʋ nɩɩ an kaapʋ fanɛ lɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu ɔlʋn tɔ.
Ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti nɩn fɛɛ fan man waa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ ineesi, kɛ fan lɛɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ abawʋlɛ‐sɩn tɔ.
Kɛ fanɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ o kun mʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ kakyɩɩ abɛɛ kanyɩn biti sʋ, kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ baa o du kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ kɛ ɔ nyɛ bɛɛrɛɛ.
Kɛ mʋ awaasa ɩ man ba ɩ gyɛ kayalaga ɔkpa sʋ fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man nyi Ɩbwaarɛ maa mʋ ɩkpa mʋ.

Nɩɩ ɔkʋ ɔ man taa falɛ awaasa libi nɩmʋ waa mʋ bɩrɩsa, abɛɛ o sisii mʋ kayalaga asɩn kʋ tɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ ii biti ɔ bɩɩtɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa falɛ alibi asʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ an wʋla tɔwɛ fanɛ nɩɩ an da fanɛ amu tɔ mʋ.
Ɩbwaarɛ man tɩɩ anɛ yɛ an ba waa agyaga‐sɩn nɩn, amaa a ba kyɩna kakyɩna kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ tɔ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee kina kɩkaapʋ nɩmʋ mʋ, man gyɛ nyɩmɩsa nɩɩ ee kina, amaa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ sa anɛ mʋ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ee kina.
Nɩɩ lɩɩ kinyi‐bii kebiti bɩrɛ sʋ mʋ, ɩ man bɩla i tiri fɛɛ a kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ sa fanɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kaapʋ fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan biti abaa.
Nɩɩ kesintin tɔ mʋ, fen biti fanɛ bɩrɩsa ana mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Masedoniya kasɛ sʋ kpini. Amaa anɛ bɩrɩsa ana, an tɔwɛ an waa fanɛ aniya tɔ fɛɛ fan kyaga sʋ waa kanɩn tii sʋ.
Fan kpan fanɛ n‐yɩɩ kɛ fan kyɩna kayɩɩ yuuli tɔ, kɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɔ man taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ waa asa asɩn tɔ, kɛ fan taa fanɛ abaa sun kusun. An wʋla tɔwɛ fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ kpini.
Lɩɩ kanɩn sʋ mʋ, fen biti fan nyɛ bɛɛrɛɛ lɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba man tii fanɛ sʋ mʋ asɛ, kɛ ɩ yɛgɛ kɛ fan man taa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ tʋʋ ɔkʋ sʋ.
Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, a mee biti fɛɛ fan baa fan bʋ kitentenbiri tɔ lɩɩ alewupu sʋ, abɛɛ fanɛ nkɔlɔ i nyita fanɛ fɛɛ asansa mʋ nɩɩ ba man sʋ tamaa mʋ.

An kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ Yesu wu nɩɩ o bwii kyiŋi ba nkpa tɔ, kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ an bɩla kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ Yesu gyii nɩɩ ba wu mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ bwii kyiŋi bamʋ ba nkpa tɔ, kɛ ba maa Yesu ba bwii ba.
Lɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa kɔnɔ tɔ asɩn mʋ, nɩɩ an tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ anɛ mʋ nɩɩ an san an tɛ nkpa tɔ naa fʋʋ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ ii biti ɔ ba mʋ, a mɛɛ yɛ a gyankpaa alewupu mʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa ii biti ɔ kpɩlɩgɛ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ɛɛ ba kasɛ, yɛ ɩlawʋ lala kɔnɔsa yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ bɩlɩsa ɔbʋlɛ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɩlɛ, kɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba wu Krisito tɔ mʋ ba gyankpaa kyiŋi.
Ɩmʋ kamaa mʋ, anɛ mʋ nɩɩ an sii nɩɩ an san an bʋ nkpa tɔ mʋ, ee biti ɔ kɩtaa anɛ bʋga bamʋ tɔ abwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ tɔ, kɛ a naa gyaŋa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ sʋsʋ. Kɛ a naa kyɩna yɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ kakpaa.
Ɩmʋ sʋ fan taa falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ tɔwɛ waa abaa ɔlʋn tɔ.
Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, ɩ man bɩla i tiri fɛɛ a kyʋrɔɔ asɩn kʋ lɩɩ saŋa yɛ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ ii biti i ba mʋ sa fanɛ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fen nyi kesintin tɔ fɛɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Kakɛ Lala mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ ba mʋ, ii biti ɩ baa i du nɩn fɛɛ oyu maa ba kagyanbwɛ mʋ.

Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ asa bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “An sʋ kayɩɩ yuuli nɩɩ sɛhn man bɩla yɛ ɔ waa anɛ” mʋ, tʋtɔ nɩɩ kenyiita kii biti kɩ ba bamʋ sʋ opula tɔ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ keduŋidi kɩɩ kɩtaa ɔtɔ wuya mʋ. Nɩɩ bamʋ ɔkʋ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ taalɛ lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ kanɩn awʋrʋfɔ mʋ tɔ.
Amaa fanɛ akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu bɩrɛ, fan man bʋ kitentenbiri tɔ, kɛ kanɩn kakɛ maŋa kɩ ba purigi fanɛ fɛɛ oyu mʋ.
Fanɛ kpini fɛn gyɛ fɩtɩla tɔ asa nɩɩ fɛn naa kayɩkɛ tɔ. Amaa a man gyɛ kagyanbwɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ an naa kitentenbiri tɔ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ fan man yɛgɛ an baa an du fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba dɛ tan sʋ mʋ, amaa fan yɛgɛ an kʋʋla anɛ n‐yɩɩ kɛ an baa an da sʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ dɛ mʋ, bɛɛ dɛ kagyanbwɛ nɩn, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ bʋʋ nta mʋ, bɛɛ bʋʋ kagyanbwɛ nɩn.

Amaa fɛɛ a maa gyɛ kayɩkɛ tɔ asa mʋ, fan yɛgɛ an kʋʋla anɛ n‐yɩɩ, kɛ a taa anɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii yɛ kebiti waa kʋtɔ kunsa kun anɛ nkɔlɔ sʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ anaakɔpʋ bɛɛ waa mʋ. Kɛ a taa kamɔlɩgɛ mʋ nɩɩ an sʋ tamaa mʋ waa kʋwʋrʋ bun anɛ amu sʋ fɛɛ anaakɔpʋ awʋrʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ man tɩɩ anɛ yɛ a ba gyii awʋrʋfɔ lɩɩ mʋ agbʋ lala mʋ sʋ. Amaa ɔ tɩɩ anɛ yɛ lɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito sʋ kɛ a ba nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ.
Yesu Krisito wu sa anɛ nɩn, ɩmʋ sʋ an kan an tɛ nkpa tɔ nɩn oo, abɛɛ an wu nɩn oo, anaa mʋ a bʋga kyɩna.
Ɩmʋ sʋ fan tɔwɛ waa abaa ɔlʋn tɔ, kɛ fan kyɛ abaa tɔ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fɛn wʋla fɛn waa falɛ.

Anɛ‐daa ana yɛ anɛ‐supu ana, an kʋlɛ fanɛ fɛɛ fan taa bɛɛrɛɛ sa fanɛ agyankpaapʋ mʋ nɩɩ fanaa bamʋ fen sun Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito mʋ. Bɛɛ kpan bamʋ n‐yɩɩ bɛɛ waa kusun nɩɩ bɛɛ kaapʋ fanɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan kyɩna kakyɩna danbɩrasa tɔ.
Lɩɩ kusun mʋ nɩɩ bee sun sʋ mʋ, fan taa bɛɛrɛɛ lala sa bamʋ kɛ fan biti bamʋ asɩn gaa. Kɛ fan taa kayɩɩ‐yuuli kyɩna yɛ abaa.

Anɛ‐daa ana yɛ anɛ‐supu ana, an tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, fan da awʋlɛgyɔpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ fanɛ tɔ mʋ amu tɔ, kɛ fan tɔwɛ waa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man sʋ nkɔlɔ mʋ, kɛ fan kyɛ apɔɔsɩpʋ mʋ tɔ, kɛ fan nyɛ kenyiita sa ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ.
Fan kɩɩ sʋ yɛ ɔdan kɛ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ ɔ man taa alibi ka alibi kʋkɔ. Amaa saŋa kʋmaa fan kpan fanɛ n‐yɩɩ fan waa kɩdanbɩrasa fɛn sa abaa yɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ.
Fan yɛgɛ fanɛ ansi i gyii saŋa kʋmaa.
Fan kyaga sʋ fɛn kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ saŋa kʋmaa.
Fan taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa tɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩnɩmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti fɛɛ fan waa lɩɩ Yesu Krisito ɔlʋn tɔ sʋ.
Fan man dun Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ fʋlɔn mʋ kusun.
Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu kan lɛɛ asɩn sa mʋ atɔwɛpʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ fanɛ mʋ, fan man mirigi asɩn mʋ nnɔ.
Amaa fan tʋʋ bamʋ asɩn tɔwɛsa yɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa tɔ kɩɩ, kɛ fan kɩtaa ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋrɔn.
Kɛ fan lɛɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ alibi kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ.

Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ keyuula wuya mʋ, ɔ lɔŋɔ fanɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ yɩla sa mʋ n‐yɩɩ. Kɛ ɔ kɩɩ fanɛ kayaayu yɛ fanɛ kala yɛ fanɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kpini sʋ, kɛ alibi akʋ ɩ man ba ɩ bʋ fanɛ sʋ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito ii biti o bwii ba mʋ.
Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ fanɛ waa mʋ lɛɛ mʋ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ kesintin wuya nɩɩ ee biti ɔ waa kanɩn.
Anɛ‐daa ana yɛ anɛ‐supu ana, fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ sa anɛ.
Fan fwaala Krisito abi mʋ kpini kɛ fan taa kebiti baari abaa.
Lɩɩ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ, n tɔwɛ fan yɛ fan kalɛ ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ sa akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ kpini.
Anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kabwaala kɩ baa kɩ bʋ fanɛ asɛ.
II Thessalonians: Mɛ Pɔɔlɩ maa Silasi yɛ Timoti ɩ kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ an sa fanɛ Krisito abi kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ fan bʋ Tesalonika, nɩɩ fan gyɛ anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito asa mʋ.
Anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito ba bwaala fanɛ kɛ ba sa fanɛ kayɩɩ yuuli.

Anɛ‐daa yɛ anɛ‐supu ana, i tiri fɛɛ an fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ saŋa kʋmaa nɩmʋ lɩɩ fanɛ sʋ. Nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ a maa waa kanɩn. Lɩɩ fɛɛ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩɩ dan kii tii sʋ, nɩɩ fanɛ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ fan sʋ sa abaa mʋ kii tii sʋ.

Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ anɛ gbaa‐gbaa anɛ an taalɛ da anɛ nkɔlɔ sʋ, an tɔwɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn an sa Ɩbwaarɛ kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ tɔ kpini, lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fɛn nyɛ nkɔlɔ yɩlɛ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ, lɩɩ fanɛ kanyanla yɛ awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ fen gyii mʋ tɔ.
Ɩnɩmʋ kpini ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ katalɛ mʋ ki du kyɛɛkyɛɛ. Ɩmʋ ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ kɛ fan baa fan dagaa sa Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ nɩɩ fen gyii kɩmʋ sʋ awʋrʋfɔ mʋ.
Ɩbwaarɛ gyɛ kesintin ogyipu nɩn. Mʋ ii biti ɔ taa awʋrʋfɔ tɛɛla bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ nyanla fanɛ mʋ.
Ee biti ɔ sa fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fen gyii awʋrʋfɔ mʋ yɛ anɛ kpini ɔfʋʋtɛ, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu ee biti ɔ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba maa mʋ nbɔɔ lʋlʋnpʋ yɛ fʋlɔn mʋ.
Nɩɩ fʋlɔn nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ taa bɩɩtɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bee kina mʋ mʋ, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba waa kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn sa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito Asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ.
Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ bɩɩtɛ bamʋ kʋsʋ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ kenyiita kakpaa, kɛ ɔ gya bamʋ lɩɩ mu ansi yɛ mʋ bʋnyaa mʋ ɔlʋn tɔ.

Kanɩn kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu ii biti ɔ ba mʋ, mʋ asa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɔŋɔ yɩla mʋ, bee biti ba kʋsaa mʋ kɩtɩɩ sʋsʋ, kɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ ba yɩn mʋ. Fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fan tii sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan kɔɔlɛ mʋ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ an tɔwɛ fanɛ mʋ gyii.

Ɩnɩmʋ kpini ɩ maa bʋ anɛ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ sʋ mʋ, an kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ an sa fanɛ saŋa kʋmaa nɩmʋ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ lɔŋɔ fanɛ, kɛ fan dagaa kɩtɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ fanɛ mʋ. Kɛ lɩɩ mʋ ɔlʋn tɔ sʋ mʋ ɔ yɛgɛ kʋtɔ danbɩrasa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fan fɛ nfɛɛrɛ yɛ fen biti fan waa mʋ, ɩ waa ɔdan sa fanɛ, kɛ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kusun mʋ nɩɩ fɛn waa mʋ fan taalɛ waa kɩmʋ naa lʋwɛ.

An kʋlɛ ɩnɩmʋ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ fɛɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kɩtɩɩ ki dii sʋsʋ, kɛ asa ba wu mʋ bʋnyaa fanɛ tɔ, kɛ lɩɩ Yesu Krisito sʋ mʋ, fanɛ kɩtɩɩ ki dii sʋsʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ maa anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito ba bwaala fanɛ mʋ.
Anɛ‐daa ana yɛ anɛ‐supu ana, lɩɩ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kɩba mʋ sʋ yɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ a bʋga naa gyaŋa mʋ sʋ mʋ, an kʋlɛ fanɛ yɛ,

nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ba fanɛ asɛ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mʋ asɩn sa mʋ yɛ ɔ tɔwɛ fanɛ mʋ, abɛɛ ɔ nyɛ ɔkala kʋ abɛɛ ɔ nyɛ ɔwʋlɛ lɩɩ anɛ asɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu kakɛ lala mʋ kɩ tɛɛ ba mʋ, fan man yɛgɛ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ i wuliti fanɛ tɔ abɛɛ ɩ ŋmaa fanɛ nkɔlɔ.

Ɔkpa kʋmaa nɩmʋ sʋ mʋ fan man yɛgɛ ɔkʋ ɔ pɩna fanɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ kanɩn kakɛ mʋ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ ba, amɔɔ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ ba kʋsʋ yɩlɛ kina Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, ɔ ba pɔyɩ. Nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa mʋ nɩɩ o mee buu sɛhn, nɩɩ ee biti o wu fɔyɩ kakpaa mʋ, ii biti ɩ lɛɛ mʋ ifuli pɔyɩ kɛ kakɛ mʋ kɩ fʋ.

Ee biti ɔ kʋsʋ yɩlɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa ii sun fɛɛ ɩdakpa yɛ ɩmʋ tɔ atɔ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa. Ɩmʋ sʋ ee biti ɔ kʋsaa mʋ n‐yɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ kpini sʋ, kɛ ɔ naa kyɩna kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ, ɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ.
Fen mee nyiŋi fɛɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n kyɩna n bʋ fanɛ asɛ mʋ n tɔwɛ fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ kpini?
Nɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ fan nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kii tii ɔmʋ nɩɩ o mee buu sɛhn mʋ ɔkpa, lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ ba lɛɛ mʋ ifuli mʋ ɩ man pɩɩ fʋʋ.

Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ o mee buu sɛhn mʋ ɔlʋn mʋ ɩ wʋla ii sun kusun asiri tɔ, nɩɩ ɩ yɛgɛ asa bɛɛ waa kʋsʋ tɔ alʋn. Amaa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee kun kɩmʋ nbɩɩnbɩɩ mʋ, ii biti ɔ kyaga sʋ ee kun kanɩn naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ lɛɛ mʋ lɩɩ ɔkpa mʋ sʋ.
Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ lɛɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ o mee buu sɛhn mʋ ifuli, nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu kan bwii ba mʋ, kɛ ɔ taa mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ afuu mʋ mɔɔ mʋ, kɛ ɔ taa mʋ bʋnyaa nyita mʋ kakpaa.
Ɔmʋ nɩɩ o mee buu sɛhn mʋ kɩba mʋ, ee biti o sun Sɩtaanɛ kusun. Ee biti ɔ taa Sɩtaanɛ ɔlʋn waa adangana yɛ sɩnkaala yɛ asɩn kyinkyinsa pɩna asa.
Nɩɩ ee biti ɔ bɔla ɔkpa kʋmaa sʋ taa asɩn libi pɩna bamʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba nyita mʋ. Bee nyita, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba kina kesintin mʋ nɩɩ kii biti kɩ mɔlɩgɛ bamʋ mʋ.
Lɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ antɩŋɛsa lala ba bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ, kɛ ba lan bɛɛ kɔɔlɛ antɩŋɛsa mʋ bee gyii,
kɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba kina kesintin kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ, nɩɩ bamʋ ansi i gyii alibi kɩwaa sʋ mʋ kpini bee biti ba gyii kʋpwɛ.

Anɛ‐daa ana yɛ anɛ‐supu ana mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ ii biti fanɛ asɩn, ɩ dagaa saŋa kʋmaa nɩmʋ a maa fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ sa fanɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ fanɛ lɩɩ npiili asɛ mʋ yɛ ee biti ɔ mɔlɩgɛ fanɛ. Ɔ waa ɩnɩmʋ nɩn lɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ ɔlʋn tɔ yɛ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ kesintin mʋ gyii, kɛ fan baa fan gyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɔŋɔ yɩlɛ sa mʋ n‐yɩɩ.
Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla mʋ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ an tɔwɛ mʋ sʋ tɩɩ fanɛ yɛ fan ba nyɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito bʋnyaa mʋ.
Kanɩn sʋ, anɛ‐daa ana yɛ anɛ‐supu ana, anɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ an kaapʋ fanɛ yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ an kyʋrɔɔ sa fanɛ mʋ, fan yɩlɛ tɔ kɛ fan kɩtaa ɩmʋ tɔ kenken.
Anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito gbaa‐gbaa yɛ anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ bee biti anɛ asɩn gaa mʋ, ba bɔla kabwaala mʋ sʋ tɔwɛ waa anɛ ɔlʋn tɔ kakpaa, nɩɩ ba sa anɛ tamaa danbɩrasa.
An kʋlɛ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ tɔwɛ kɩtaa fanɛ nkɔlɔ, kɛ ɔ waa fanɛ ɔlʋn tɔ lɩɩ fanɛ kʋtɔ danbɩrasa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fɛn waa yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ fɛn tɔwɛ.
Anɛ‐daa ana yɛ anɛ‐supu ana, anɛ laalaalʋwɛ asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ sa anɛ kɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ asɩn mʋ ɩ nyɛ yalagɛ bilen‐bilen, kɛ ɩ nyɛ bɛɛrɛɛ lala fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ nyɛ fanɛ asɛ mʋ.
Kɛ fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ lɛɛ anɛ lɩɩ amu tɔ ɔlʋn wuya ana yɛ asɩn libi wuya ana abaa tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ man gyɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɩɩ kɔɔlɛ Yesu gyii.
Amaa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ gyɛ kesintin wuya nɩn, nɩɩ mʋ ii biti ɔ sa fanɛ ɔlʋn kɛ o kun fanɛ lɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ kɩbaa tɔ.
An sʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ tɔ fɛɛ ɛɛ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fɛn waa, nɩɩ fen biti fan kyaga sʋ waa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ an sa fanɛ kɔnɔ yɛ fan waa mʋ.
An kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ yɛ, Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ o biliŋaa fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ kpee Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti mʋ tɔ yɛ Yesu Krisito kɔkɔlɔ kɩnyɛ yɩlɛ tɔ mʋ tɔ.

Anɛ‐daa ana yɛ anɛ‐supu ana, lɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ mʋ, an sa fanɛ kɔnɔ yɛ fanɛ bɩrɩsa mʋ nɩɩ o mee biti kusun kɩwaa, nɩɩ mʋ kɩbaabʋtɔ kɩ man naa yɛ kɩkaapʋ mʋ nɩɩ fan nyɛ lɩɩ anɛ asɛ mʋ, fan kɩtaa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ mʋ sʋ.
Fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ fen nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ fan buu anɛ ayaa natɛsa. Lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ an bʋ fanɛ asɛ mʋ a man kyɩna waa wʋlʋgyɔ,
nɩɩ an man gyii ɔkʋ agyitɔ yɛgɛ a man ka ɩmʋ kʋkɔ. Amaa an payɩ ansi waa kusun yɛ kɩkpɩnɛ kakyʋwapɛ yɛ kagyanbwɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ anɛ kɩkyɩna fanɛ asɛ mʋ ɩ man waa kasʋla sa fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ.
A maa waa ɩnɩmʋ mʋ, ɩ man gyɛ nɩn yɛ a man sʋ ɔkpa kɛ a taa anɛ n‐yɩɩ tʋʋ fanɛ nkyɛtɔ sʋ, amaa an waa yɩla nɩn kɛ fan nyɛ buu anɛ ayaa natɛsa sʋ.
Halɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ an bʋ fanɛ asɛ mʋ an sa fanɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o mee biti kusun kɩwaa mʋ, ɔ man gyii.”
An nu yɛ akʋ ba bʋ fanɛ tɔ ba sʋ wʋlʋgyɔ. Be mee sun kusun kʋ, amɔɔ asa asɩn tɔ kɩnatɛ loo.
Bamʋ nɩɩ be du kanɩn mʋ, an sa bamʋ kɔnɔ nɩɩ an tɔwɛ an sa bamʋ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ yɛ ba biti kusun waa biti bamʋ agyitɔ gyisa.
Amaa fanɛ, anɛ‐daa ana yɛ anɛ‐supu ana bɩrɛ, fan man yɛgɛ kɩdanbɩrasa kɩwaa i fii fanɛ.
Nɩɩ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ kan kina anɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ an kyʋrɔɔ waa ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ tɔ falɛ mʋ, fan baa fan da mʋ sʋ. Fanaa mʋ fan man bɩla bʋga waa sɛhn, kɛ ipeeli ɩ kɩtaa mʋ.
Fan man taa mʋ waa fɛɛ fanɛ dʋn, amaa fan tɔwɛ waa mʋ fɛɛ fanɛ‐nyi mu‐bii ana tɔ ɔkʋ.
Anɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito gbaa‐gbaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ kayɩɩ‐yuuli wuya mʋ, ɔ sa fanɛ kayɩɩ‐yuuli saŋa kʋmaa yɛ ɔkpa kʋmaa sʋ. Anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu ɔ baa ɔ bʋ fanɛ kpini asɛ.
Mɛ Pɔɔlɩ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ ɩ taa mɛ kɩbaa kyʋrɔɔ afwaala nɩmʋ. Kanɩn nɩɩ n duligi mɛ ɩwʋlɛ kpini. Falɛ nɩɩ n kyʋrɔɔ.
Anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kabwaala kɩ baa kɩ bʋ fanɛ kpini asɛ.
I Timothy: Mɛ, Pɔɔlɩ ɩ kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ. Lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ anɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ yɛ Krisito Yesu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ anɛ tamaa kɩpɩrɛ sʋ nɩɩ n ba waa Krisito Yesu Osunpu.
N kyʋrɔɔ n sa fʋ Timoti mʋ nɩɩ lɩɩ Yesu kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ nɩɩ fʋ gyɛ mɛ kesintin tɔ kebii. Kabwaala yɛ kʋwɛɛ kuwu yɛ kayɩɩ yuuli mʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ Ɔsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Krisito Yesu asɛ mʋ kɩ ba fʋ sʋ.
Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ waa fʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n kpee Masedoniya mʋ, sii kyɩna Efeso tʋtɔ kɛ fʋ nyɛ tii antɩŋɛsa akaapʋpʋ mʋ kɩkaapʋ ɔkpa.
Tɔwɛ sa bamʋ yɛ ba yɛgɛ asɩrɩkpan ikisii‐sɩn yɛ kakʋʋgɛ tɔ nkyaga sʋ asɩn. Lɩɩ fɛɛ falɛ atɔ nɩmʋ ɩɩ bɩya ɩmɔɔrɛ‐libi nɩn, nɩɩ ɩ mɛɛ kyɛ asa kabwaarɛ‐sun mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ bɔla kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ mʋ tɔ.
Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ mɛ kɔnɔsa nɩmʋ yɩlɛ sʋ mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, asa ba nyɛ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ kɩ lɩɩ kɔkɔlɔ fuuli tɔ, yɛ nfɛɛrɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋrɔn, yɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kesintin tɔ.
Akʋ ba man bɩla ba buu ɩnɩmʋ, amaa ba buu ntɔwɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ kasɛ.
Bee biti ba baa ba gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ, amaa ba man nyi nɩɩ be mee nu asɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ yɩlɛ ɩmʋ sʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ kasɛ.
An nyi fɛɛ nbara mʋ ɩ bʋrɔn, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kan buu ɩmʋ ɔkpa sʋ mʋ, ɩ bʋrɔn sa mʋ.

Nɩɩ an bɩla an nyi yɛ nbara mʋ ɩ man dɛ sa ɩkpa kyiigisa wuya ana, amaa ɩ dɛ sa nbara anyitapu yɛ kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn wuya ana, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba mɛɛ bʋnyaa Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ alibi awaapʋ, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man du kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ be mee sun Ɩbwaarɛ, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ mɔɔ bamʋ‐sɛ ana abɛɛ bamʋ‐nyi ana, yɛ asa amɔɔpʋ.

Nbara mʋ ɩ bʋ tɔ sa bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ lɩɩ bamʋ‐kuli ana abɛɛ bamʋ‐ka ana kamaa, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa agyaga‐sɩn, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba kɩtaa asa bɛɛ fɛ kɛ ba nyɛ afulee, yɛ antɩŋɛsa wuya ana, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩn antɩŋɛsa bɛɛ bɔ ntan, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa asɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ i mee buu kesintin kɩkaapʋ mʋ.
Kɩkaapʋ nɩmʋ kɩ lɩɩ bʋnyaa asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ayenbi ɩ gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ mʋ taa waa mɛ abaa tɔ yɛ n tɔwɛ n sa asa.
N sʋ afwaala n sa anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Krisito Yesu, mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sa mɛ ɔlʋn yɛ n waa kusun, nɩɩ o wu mɛ fɛɛ kesintin‐gyipu, nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mɛ yɛ n ba waa mu kusun mʋ.
Naafɔɔ saŋa kʋ tɔ mʋ, n kyɩna n tɔwɛ n nyita Krisito mʋ, yɛgɛ n nyanla mu abuupu, nɩɩ n biti bamʋ keluu. Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ wu mɛ kʋwɛɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ n man kyɩna n nyi nɩn, nɩɩ n man kyɩna kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii.
Anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Krisito bwaala mɛ gaa, nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ n kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii, nɩɩ n nyɛ mu kebiti mʋ.
Katɔwɛ nɩmʋ gyɛ kesintin nɩn, nɩɩ i tiri fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa ɔ kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ gyii. Asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, Krisito Yesu ba dulinyaa tɔ nɩn yɛ ɔ ba mɔlɩgɛ alibi awaapʋ, nɩɩ bamʋ tɔ kpini mʋ, mɛ ɩ gyɛ olibilibi mʋ.
Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ wu mɛ kʋwɛɛ, saamʋ Krisito Yesu ɩ nyɛ lɛɛ mu kenyiita lala mʋ kaapʋ, kɛ ɩ ba waa sɩnkaala sa asa mʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii mʋ kpini, kɛ ba nyɛ nkpa kakpaa.
Ɩmʋ sʋ fan yɛgɛ a taa bɛɛrɛɛ yɛ bʋnyaa sa Owura mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ kakpaa naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ ɔkaa. Nɩɩ mʋ nkʋn ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ o mee wu, nɩɩ a mee wu mʋ yɛ ansi. Amen!
Mi‐bii Timoti, n sa fʋ falɛ kɔnɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ii buu asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ wʋla tɔwɛ yɩla lɩɩ fʋ sʋ mʋ. Nɩɩ fʋ kan taa ɩmʋ waa kusun mʋ, fii biti fʋ kɔ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ asɩn mʋ ɩkɔ,
yɛgɛ fʋ sʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ tɔ nɩɩ fʋ bɩɩ fʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ yɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ waa mʋ ɩ bʋrɔn. Akʋ ba kina ɩnɩmʋ nɩɩ bamʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii i muuri fɛɛ afuu maa muuri ɔkʋlɩ mʋ.
Bamʋ tɔ akʋ ɩ gyɛ Himenasu yɛ Alekisanda. N yɛgɛ bamʋ waa Sɩtaanɛ abaa tɔ, kɛ ɩ kaapʋ bamʋ yɛ ba man bɩla tɔwɛ yii Ɩbwaarɛ.

Kanɩn sʋ, kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ki tiri nɩɩ n kʋlɛ yɛ fan waa mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, fan taa asa asɩn tirisa tʋʋ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ, kɛ fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ, kɛ fan yɩlɛ bamʋ ayaa tɔ kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ sa bamʋ, kɛ fan taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ.
Fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ sa awura yɛ alʋlʋnpʋ kpini, kɛ a kyɩna keyuula yɛ kayɩɩ‐yuuli tɔ, kɛ a sun Ɩbwaarɛ danbɩrasa, kɛ a kyɩna kakyɩna mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa.
Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ bʋrɔn, nɩɩ ɩmʋ ii gyii Ɩbwaarɛ anɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ mu ansi,
nɩɩ mʋ ii biti fɛɛ asa kpini ba nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ kɛ ba ba bɩɩ kesintin mʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kʋlʋn ɩ bʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔsa kʋlʋn ɩ yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ maa asa nsana, nɩɩ Krisito Yesu ɩ gyɛ kanɩn nyɩmɩsa maŋa,
nɩɩ mʋ ɩ taa mʋ nkpa lɛɛ saraga wu kɔɔlɛ asa kpini, ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ adansɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ kaapʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa.
Kanɩn maŋa sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mɛ waa asɩn mʋ kabɔɔ yɛ Krisito osunpu. Nɩɩ n gyɛ kesintin yɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ ɔkaapʋpʋ sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ. N tɔwɛ kesintin nɩn, n mɛɛ tɩn antɩŋɛsa.
N biti fɛɛ Krisito kʋbʋ kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ mʋ, anyɩn ba kʋsaa bamʋ abaa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ
kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ yɛgɛ agbʋ yɛ kamɔɔrɛ‐gyii man bʋ bamʋ tɔ.

N bɩla n biti fɛɛ akyɩɩ mʋ ba bun atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ kʋkwɛ bamʋ, nɩɩ ɩ dagaa, nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ agyaga‐sɩn. Ba man waa bamʋ inyini adawʋ‐adawʋ, nɩɩ ba man taa suwa atɔ abɛɛ agyibi yɛ ataa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ sʋ ɔgyalɩn mʋ bun.
Amaa ba taa kɩbaabʋtɔ danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ dagaa fɛɛ akyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ bee sun Ɩbwaarɛ.
Akyɩɩ ba bun bamʋ nnɔ sʋ bɩya bamʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ bɩɩla atɔ.
N man sa ɔkpa yɛ ɔkyɩɩ ɔ kaapʋ abɛɛ ɔ baa ɔ sʋ ɔlʋn ɔnyɩn sʋ, i tiri fɛɛ ɔ waa surum.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ Adam nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ gyankpaa tʋʋ pɔyɩ nɩɩ ɔ tʋʋ Hawa.
Nɩɩ man gyɛ Adam nɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ pɩna, amaa ɔkyɩɩ mʋ, nɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ pɩna nɩɩ o biliŋi alibi ɔwaapʋ.
Amaa nɩɩ akyɩɩ ba kan kyaga sʋ yɩlɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ tɔ yɛ kebiti yɛ kɩkyɩrɛkyɩrɛ tɔ, nɩɩ ba waa ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ mɔlɩgɛ bamʋ lɩɩ nbii kɩkʋʋgɛ sʋ.
Katɔwɛ nɩmʋ gyɛ kesintin nɩn, yɛ ɔkʋ kan ee biti Krisito kʋbʋ ɔbɩlɩsa kusun mʋ, ee biti kusun kparɛ nɩn.

Ɩmʋ sʋ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ Krisito kʋbʋ ɔbɩlɩsa maa gyɛ nyɩmɩsa mʋ nɩɩ mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ man sʋ asɩn, nɩɩ o kili ɔkyɩɩ kʋlʋn kpen, nɩɩ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ dɛ, nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩtaa mʋ n‐yɩɩ, nɩɩ ɔ sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ, nɩɩ ɛɛ kɔɔlɛ afɔ, nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ kaapʋ,
nɩɩ ɔ man gyɛ ɔtabʋʋpʋ, abɛɛ o du kirikiri, amaa o du bwahn, yɛgɛ ɔ man gyɛ oluu bitipu abɛɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ mu ansi ɩ payɩ afulee sʋ.
Ɩ dagaa maa taalɛ kɩɩ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa kɩkpaara sʋ danbɩrasa, kɛ ɔ kɩɩ fɛɛ mu‐bii ana bee nu mʋ asɛ nɩɩ bee buu mʋ danbɩrasa.
(Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ɔ man nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɩɩ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ mʋ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ kɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kʋbʋ mʋ sʋ?)
Ɩ man dagaa maa gyɛ nyɩmɩsa pʋpwɛ Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ tɔ, kɛ ɔ ba kaapʋ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kɛ ɔ lɩɩ tɩyɛ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ lɩɩ tɩyɛ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ mʋ.
Ɩ dagaa maa gyɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Krisito akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu gbaa ba tɩɩ mʋ kɩtɩɩ danbɩrasa, kɛ ɔ man nyɛ tɩyɛ Sɩtaanɛ ɔdʋʋ tɔ kɛ o gyii ipeeli.
Kanɩn maŋa gbaa nɩɩ ɩ dagaa Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ akyɛtɔpʋ mʋ ba maa gyɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ, nɩɩ ba man gyɛ nnɔ nyɔ‐nyɔ wuya ana, yɛgɛ be mee nuu nta gaa, nɩɩ ba man sʋ onsi‐payɩ libi lɩɩ afulee sʋ.
Ɩ dagaa ba maa bɩɩ bamʋ nkɔlɔ tɔ fɛɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa mʋ ɩ bʋrɔn Krisito tɔ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii, mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ kesintin asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ kaapʋ mʋ.
I tiri fɛɛ Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ ɔ gyankpaa waa bamʋ kɩɩ, amaa nɩɩ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kan man sʋ asɩn kʋ mʋ, ba nyɛ waa akyɛtɔpʋ kusun mʋ.
Kanɩn ɔkpa maŋa sʋ, i tiri fɛɛ bamʋ akyɩɩ
ana gbaa ba baa ba sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ, nɩɩ ba man gyɛ akyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ bee nyita asa atɩɩ, amaa bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ dɛ, nɩɩ asa ba kɔɔlɛ bamʋ gyii kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ.
Krisito kʋbʋ ɔkyɛtɔpʋ ɔ baa ɔ gyɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ o kili ɔkyɩɩ kʋlʋn kpen, nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ kɩɩ mu‐bii ana yɛ mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ danbɩrasa.
Bamʋ nɩɩ ba waa akyɛtɔpʋ kusun danbɩrasa mʋ, bɛɛ nyɛ bɛɛrɛɛ, nɩɩ bɛɛ taalɛ yɩlɛ kɩnyɩn tɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ Krisito Yesu gyii mʋ.
Halɩɩ n maa sʋ tamaa yɛ n biti n ba fʋ asɛ nkɛ nnyɔ nɩmʋ tɔ gbaa mʋ, n kyʋrɔɔ asɩn nɩmʋ n bɩya fʋ,

saamʋ, nɩɩ n kan n man ba bilen mʋ, fii biti fʋ bɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ asa ba kyɩna Ɩbwaarɛ kɩkpaara sʋ, nɩɩ kɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ kakpaa mʋ kʋbʋ mʋ. Kʋbʋ mʋ ɩ sʋ kesintin kenken fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ sabarɛ sʋ lenbu tɔ mʋ.
Nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ kamɔɔrɛ‐gyii fɛɛ anɛ Krisito kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ, ɩ gyɛ asɩn baalasa kparɛ. Ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ,
Ɔ lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ nyɩmɩsa,
nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ kɔɔlɛ mʋ kyula kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ,
nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ ba wu mʋ,
nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ mʋ asɩn sa dulinyaa asa kpini,
nɩɩ asa ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ,
nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa mʋ kyʋn sʋsʋ.
Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ bugi tɔ tɔwɛ yɛ nkɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, akʋ bee biti ba ba yɛgɛ bamʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ, kɛ ba buu n‐yaayu libi antɩŋɛsa mʋ yɛ nbwɩɩ libi kɩkaapʋ mʋ.
Falɛ kɩkaapʋ mʋ lɩɩ antɩŋɛsa nnɔ nnyɔ‐nnyɔ wuya ana mʋ asɛ nɩn. Bɛɛ kɩɩ ansi bɛɛ tɩŋɛ antɩŋɛsa yɛgɛ bamʋ nkɔlɔ mɛɛ ŋmaa bamʋ.

Ba bɩla bee tii asa ɔkpa fɛɛ ba man kili, kɛ ba man gyii agyitɔ kʋ. Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ tʋʋ falɛ agyitɔ nɩmʋ sa fɛɛ, mʋ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii, nɩɩ be nyi kesintin mʋ, ba kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ abaa anyɔ kɛ ba taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tʋʋ mʋ bʋrɔn, nɩɩ ɩ man dagaa fɛɛ a kina ɩmʋ tɔ ɩkʋ, ɩ dagaa fɛɛ a kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ kɛ a taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ.
Kpalɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn yɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ mʋ lɔŋɔ ɩmʋ sa kigyii.

Nɩɩ fɩɩ kan fɩɩ kaapʋ fʋ‐daa ana yɛ fu‐supu ana falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ mʋ, fii biti fʋ baa fʋ gyɛ Krisito Yesu kɩyaafɔlɛ danbɩrasa, fɛɛ fʋ maa dan kesintin asɩn danbɩrasa kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii yɛ kɩkaapʋ danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ fii buu mʋ.
Lɛɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ asɩrɩkpan ikisii‐sɩn yɛ adɩdaasɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ tɔnɔ, kɛ fʋ yɛgɛ kabwaarɛ‐sun danbɩrasa ɩ dɩn fʋ.

Nyɩmɩsa n‐yɩɩ kɩtɛɛŋɛ tɔ mʋ, ɩɩ sa mʋ tɔnɔ gbɛrɛɛ kʋ, amaa kabwaarɛ‐sun danbɩrasa ɩɩ bɩya mʋ tɔnɔ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩɩ sa mʋ nkpa nbɩɩnbɩɩ kakyɩna nɩmʋ tɔ yɛ nkpa kakpaa kakyɩna mʋ nɩɩ kii biti kɩ ba mʋ.
Katɔwɛ nɩmʋ gyɛ kesintin nɩn, nɩɩ i tiri fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɔ kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ gyii.
Ɩnɩmʋ sʋ an payɩ ansi an sun kusun gaa, lɩɩ fɛɛ an taa anɛ tamaa gyaga Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ kakpaa, nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ sa asa kpini mʋ, fɔnfɔn bamʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii mʋ.
Kaapʋ bamʋ atɔ nɩmʋ, kɛ fʋ yɩlɛ bamʋ sʋ fɛɛ ba buu ɩmʋ.
Man yɛgɛ ɔkʋ ɔ kɩɩ fʋ fɛɛrɛ fɛɛ fʋ maa gyɛ kebii sʋ. Amaa yɛgɛ fʋ katɔwɛ, yɛ fʋ kɩbaabʋtɔ, yɛ fu kebiti, yɛ fʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii, yɛ fʋ kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ kakyɩna mʋ ɩ waa asɩn kaalasa sa akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ.
Pɔyɩ kɛ n ba mʋ, taa fʋ n‐yɩɩ sa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ kɩkaragɛ sakyɔ tɔ, kɛ fʋ tɔwɛ abwaarɛsɩn, kɛ fʋ kaapʋ ɩmʋ.
Man kan kina fʋ kakɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla kɩlɛɛkaapʋ asɩn mʋ sʋ sa fʋ, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Krisito kʋbʋ abɩlɩsa ba taa abaa gyaga fʋ sʋ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ sa fʋ mʋ.
Kɩta ɩmʋ tɔ kɛ fʋ taa fʋ n‐yɩɩ kpini sa ɩmʋ kɩwaa tɔ, kɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ o wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ fii kpee ansi tɔ fʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ.
Baa fʋ da fʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ yɛ fʋ Abwaarɛsɩn kɩkaapʋ mʋ sʋ. Baa fʋ maa sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ nɩɩ fʋ kan waa kanɩn mʋ, fii biti fʋ mɔlɩgɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bee nu fʋ asɛ mʋ.
Man kan tɔwɛ yii kɩnyɩn‐bɩlɩsa, amaa tɔwɛ waa mʋ fɛɛ maa gyɛ fʋ‐sɛ. Tɔwɛ waa ayaafɔlɛ mʋ fɛɛ ba maa gyɛ fʋ‐daa ana yɛ fu‐supu ana.
Kɛ fʋ tɔwɛ waa akyɩɩ‐nyi mʋ fɛɛ fu‐nyi ana, kɛ fʋ tɔwɛ waa nbitebii mʋ fɛɛ fʋ‐pɩɩkyɩɩ ana yɛgɛ agyaga‐sɩn nfɛɛrɛ kʋ man tii sʋ.
Taa bɛɛrɛɛ sa akulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ba tɛ bamʋ abaa sʋ, kɛ fʋ kɩɩ bamʋ sʋ.

Amaa nɩɩ okulapu‐kyɩɩ kan ɔ sʋ nbii abɛɛ anaana‐bii mʋ, i tiri fɛɛ nbii mʋ ba kaapʋ bamʋ kabwaarɛ‐sun mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ ba kɩɩ bamʋ gbaa‐gbaa akpaara sʋ asa sʋ mʋ. Saamʋ, bamʋ awaasa mʋ, ɩɩ tɛɛla bamʋ akʋʋgɛpʋ yɛ bamʋ naana ana mʋ. Ɩnɩmʋ ɩɩ bɔla Ɩbwaarɛ ansi.
Okulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ mʋ kɩbaa sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ man sʋ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ, ɛɛ taa mʋ tamaa gyaga Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ nɩn, nɩɩ ɛɛ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ kakyʋwapɛ yɛ kagyanbwɛ, ɛɛ kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ ɔ kyɛ mʋ tɔ.
Amaa Okulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ sa kensi kigyii mʋ, ɔ tɛ nkpa tɔ bɩrɛ, yɛgɛ o du fɛɛ maa wu nɩn.
Tɔwɛ falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ sa Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ, kɛ asa ba man nyɛ tɔwɛ asɩn akʋ yii bamʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man kan kɩɩ mʋ kʋʋpʋ ana sʋ, fɔnfɔn mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ asa sʋ mʋ, o kina kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ, nɩɩ mu alibi ɩ kyɔ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba man kɔɔlɛ Yesu Krisito gyii mʋ gbaa.
Okulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man pɩɩ fʋʋ nsu adisiye mʋ, ɩ man dagaa fɛɛ ba taa mʋ kɩtɩɩ tii akulapu‐kyɩɩ atɩɩ mʋ sʋ. Ɩ dagaa okulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ maa gyɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man lɩɩ mu‐kuli kamaa,

nɩɩ asa be nyi mʋ adanbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa, fɛɛ ɛɛ bɩla mu‐bii ana danbɩrasa, nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩtaa afɔ, nɩɩ ɛɛ bɩya mʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ ɛɛ kyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asa tɔ, nɩɩ ɛɛ kyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bee wu awʋrʋfɔ mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɛɛ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ sa adanbɩrasa kʋmaa nɩmʋ kɩwaa.
Man kan taa akulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ba man pɩɩ bɩlɛ mʋ atɩɩ tii akulapu atɩɩ mʋ sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ nɩɩ ɩ kan ba fɛɛ bamʋ kayalaga gyan kekili sʋ ɩ kyɔ kɩyɛgɛ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ sa Krisito mʋ,
bee biti ba gyii kʋpwɛ lɩɩ bamʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ kɩda gyankpaasa sa Krisito mʋ tɔ.
Ɩmʋ kamaa mʋ bee biti ba biliŋi awʋlɛgyɔpʋ, yɛgɛ ba naa ba naa asa akpaara sʋ. Nɩɩ man gyɛ ɩmʋ nkʋn, ba naa bee kuli asa, yɛgɛ bee loo asa asɩn tɔ, nɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man dagaa nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ n biti fɛɛ akulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ba man pɩɩ bɩlɛ mʋ ba kili, kɛ ba kʋʋgɛ nbii kɛ ba kɩɩ bamʋ akpaara sʋ, saamʋ, ɔdʋn mʋ mɛɛ nyɛ‐nyɛ ɔkpa tɔwɛ asɩn libi kʋ lɩɩ anɛ sʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ akulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ba man pɩɩ bɩlɛ mʋ, akʋ be tee bee buu Sɩtaanɛ ɩkpa.

Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ‐kɔɔlɛ‐gyipu kʋ kan ɔ sʋ akulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ mʋ kʋʋpʋ ana mʋ, ɩ dagaa maa kyɛ bamʋ tɔ kɛ ɩ man waa kasʋla sa Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ, saamʋ Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ ɩ nyɛ kyɛ akulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ i tiri bamʋ mʋ tɔ.
Krisito kʋbʋ abɩlɩsa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kɩɩ kʋbʋ mʋ asɩn kyɛɛkyɛɛ sʋ mʋ, bɛɛrɛɛ yɛ kʋkɔka dagaa sa bamʋ ɩlɩɩ ɩnyɔ, fɔnfɔn bamʋ nɩɩ bee sun abwaarɛsɩn katɔwɛ yɛ ɩmʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɩ man dagaa ba ŋmina naatɛ kɔnɔ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa kusun agyitɔ opula mʋ.” Nɩɩ ba bɩla kyʋrɔɔ katɩn kʋ yɛ, “Kusun ɔwaapʋ mʋ dagaa mʋ kʋkɔka.”
Man kan kɔɔlɛ alibi mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ ba tɔwɛ fʋ lɩɩ Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ ɔbɩlɩsa kʋ sʋ gyii, amɔɔ ba waa asa anyɔ abɛɛ asa.
Bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa alibi mʋ, tɔwɛ yii bamʋ Krisito kʋbʋ mu ansi tɔ kɛ ɩ waa asansa mʋ kufuu.
N yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ Krisito Yesu, yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mu ansi tɔ, n tɔwɛ fʋ yɛ, fu buu nnɔsa ɩnɩmʋ, yɛgɛ fʋ man yɩlɛ ɔkʋ kamaa abɛɛ fʋ sʋ nmɛɛgɛ tɔ lɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋ tɔ.
Man kan kpaala taa fʋ abaa gyaga asa sʋ waa bamʋ abɩlɩsa kabwaarɛ‐sun mʋ tɔ, kɛ fʋ man kan taa fʋ n‐yɩɩ loo akʋ alibi tɔ. Kɩta fʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ ineesi sʋ.
Man bɩla nuu nkyu nkʋn, baa fii nuu nta gbɛrɛɛ, kpalɩ fɛɛ fʋ ɔtɔ tɔ maa taalɛ ɩɩ kɔ fʋ yɛ fʋ alɔ wuribi mʋ sʋ.
Asa akʋ alibi ɩ dan lɩɩ ifuli nɩn, nɩɩ ɩɩ gyankpaa bamʋ ii kpee Ɩbwaarɛ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ mʋ tɔ. Akʋ lɛɛ mɔɔ kamaa tɔ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ ba lɩɩ ifuli.
Ɔkpa kʋlʋn maŋa sʋ, nɩɩ akʋ kɩdanbɩrasa kɩwaa ii biti ɩ lɩɩ ifuli. Nɩɩ halɩɩ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ mɛɛ lɩɩ ifuli gbaa mʋ ɩ mɛɛ taalɛ baala.
Anyɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ bamʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ ana kasɛ mʋ kpini, i tiri fɛɛ ba maa taa bɛɛrɛɛ sa bamʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ ana, kɛ asa ba man nyɛ ɔkpa tɔwɛ asɩn libi kʋ yii Ɩbwaarɛ kɩtɩɩ abɛɛ anɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ an kaapʋ mʋ.

Anyɛ mʋ nɩɩ bamʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ ana ba gyɛ akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ, ba man kɔɔgɛ bɛɛrɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ sa bamʋ mʋ sʋ, fɛɛ ba maa bamʋ ba maa gyɛ kʋkʋlʋn Krisito tɔ mʋ sʋ. Amaa ɩ dagaa fɛɛ ba sun bamʋ kɔkɔlɔ fuuli tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ anyɩrɩpɛ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ nyɛ tɔnɔ bɛɛ lɩɩ anyɛ mʋ kusun tɔ mʋ, ba gyɛ akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu nɩɩ anyɛ mʋ ba sʋ kebiti sa bamʋ. Falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ i tiri fɛɛ fʋ kaapʋ bamʋ, kɛ fʋ waa bamʋ aniya tɔ kɛ ba buu ɩmʋ.
Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kaapʋ asɩn pʋpwɛ, nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ kɔɔlɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kesintin asɩn mʋ, yɛ anɛ kabwaarɛ‐sun kɩkaapʋ ee gyii mʋ,
ɔ gyɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kʋsaa mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋsʋ yɛgɛ ɔ man nyi sɛhn. Kanɩn ɔsa maŋa sʋ ɩmɔɔrɛ‐libi yɛ nluu kʋkɔ lɩɩ asɩn sʋ, nɩɩ ɩmʋ ɩɩ bɩya kayɩɩ basa yɛ nbarɩgɛ tɔ yɛ asebi yɛ nfɛɛrɛ libi kɩfɛ.
Ɔsa maŋa ii gyii ɩmɔɔrɛ nɩn fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ i nyita, nɩɩ ba man bɩla ba sʋ kesintin asɩn mʋ, bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ kabwaarɛ‐sun ɩ gyɛ ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ bɔla sʋ nyɛ afulee.
Amaa kabwaarɛ‐sun danbɩrasa sʋ tɔnɔ gaa, nɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ an sʋ mʋ ɩ kan kʋkwɛ anɛ mʋ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ a man bɩya sɛhn dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ, nɩɩ a mɛɛ taalɛ taa sɛhn lɩɩ kɩmʋ tɔ.
Amaa nɩɩ an kan an sʋ agyitɔ yɛ atɔ bunsa mʋ, a yɛgɛ ɩ kʋkwɛ anɛ.
Asa mʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba waa atɔ wuya ana mʋ, bɛɛ tɩyɛ kʋtʋʋ tɔ kɩɩ tɔ yɛ ɔdʋʋ tɔ, kɛ be loo kimelensi yɛ kayalaga libi‐libi gaalaagaa tɔ, kɛ ɩ bɩɩtɛ bamʋ muuri kɛ ba wu nyita.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ kefulee biti gaa gyɛ alibi kʋmaa nɩmʋ ɔlɩɩkpa nɩn. Akʋ ba maa biti afulee kɩbansa sʋ mʋ, ba fɔyɩ lɩɩ bamʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ, nɩɩ i yii bamʋ nkɔlɔ tɔ fɛɛ deebi.
Amaa fʋ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nyɩmɩsa nɩn, ɩmʋ sʋ lɛɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ falɛ atɔ nɩmʋ kpini tɔ, kɛ fʋ kɔ biti ɩkpa kikyiigi yɛ kabwaarɛ‐sun danbɩrasa yɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii yɛ kebiti yɛ kenyiita yɛ bwahn kɩwaa.
Kɔ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii keluu danbɩrasa mʋ, kɛ fʋ nyɛ nkpa kakpaa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɩɩ fʋ ba waa kɩmʋ tɔ, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fu bugi fʋ kɔnɔ tɔwɛ fʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sakyɔ tɔ, nɩɩ ba nu mʋ.
N yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ sa kʋtɔ kʋmaa nkpa mʋ, maa Yesu Krisito mʋ nɩɩ o bugi mʋ kɔnɔ tɔwɛ kesintin asɩn mʋ sa Pontu Paleti mu ansi tɔ mʋ, n tɔwɛ fʋ yɛ,
fu buu nnɔsa nɩmʋ, kɛ fʋ kɩtaa ɩmʋ kyɛɛkyɛɛ, naa fʋʋ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito ii biti ɔ ba mʋ.
Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ayenbi ɩ gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ, nɩɩ mʋ nkʋn ɩ gyɛ Ɔlʋlʋnpʋ, yɛ awura tɔ Owura, yɛ anyɩrɩpɛ mʋ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, mʋ ii biti ɔ yɛgɛ Krisito Yesu kibwii ba mʋ kɩ ba tɔ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ saŋa mʋ.

Mʋ nkʋn ɩ gyɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ tɔ kakpaa, nɩɩ ɔ man bʋ tɔ o wu kakaakʋ, nɩɩ mʋ ɔ tɛ ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ ŋalɩgɛ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa kʋ mɛɛ taalɛ tiri mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ man pɩɩta wu mʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ wu mʋ. Bʋnyaa yɛ ɔlʋn ɩ gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ kakpaa Amen.

Tɔwɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ atɔ mʋ fɛɛ, ba man ba bɛɛ kɩɩ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ abɛɛ ba taa bamʋ tamaa gyaga bamʋ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ taalɛ fɔyɩ mʋ sʋ. Amaa ba taa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ tʋʋ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ sa anɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ an nyɛ falɛ, nɩɩ ɩɩ waa anɛ ɔkɔn mʋ sʋ.
Tɔwɛ bamʋ fɛɛ ba waa kɩdanbɩrasa kɛ bamʋ awaasa ɩ baa ɩ bʋrɔn gaa, kɛ ba lɛɛ bamʋ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ mʋ tɔ kyɛ abaa tɔ.
Nɩɩ ba kan waa kanɩn mʋ, ii biti ɩ waa fɛɛ bɛɛ kʋʋla atɔ bɛɛ yɩla bɛɛ sa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋsʋ nɩn. Saamʋ, bee biti ba nyɛ nkpa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ kesintin nkpa mʋ.
Timoti kɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa waa fʋ kɩbaa tɔ mʋ sʋ danbɩrasa. Lɛɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ ntɔwɛ kɩyan yɛ ɩmɔɔrɛ‐gyaga mʋ nɩɩ akʋ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ kinyi mʋ tɔ.
Ɩmʋ nɩɩ akʋ bɛɛ kaapʋ fɛɛ ba sʋ, nɩɩ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba fɔyɩ bamʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ.
Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala kɩ baa kɩ bʋ fanɛ asɛ.
II Timothy: Mɛ, Pɔɔlɩ mʋ nɩɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti sʋ nɩɩ n ba waa Krisito Yesu osunpu, nɩɩ o sun mɛ yɛ n tɔwɛ Nkpa asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɩla, nɩɩ an nyɛ lɩɩ kʋkʋlʋn kɩwaa yɛ Krisito Yesu mʋ.
N kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ n sa fʋ, mi‐bii bitisa Timoti. Anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Krisito Yesu kabwaala yɛ kʋwɛɛ kuwu yɛ keyuula ɩ baa ɩ bʋ fʋ asɛ.
N fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ n sun mʋ yɛgɛ n man sʋ alibi akʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ mɛ naana ana ba daa sun mʋ mʋ. Saŋa kʋmaa n nyiŋi fʋ sʋ mɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ tɔ kagyanbwɛ yɛ kakyʋwapɛ.
N nyiŋi fʋ ansikyu mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɩ bʋ mɛ tɔ gaa fɛɛ n wu fʋ, saamʋ mɛ kɔkɔlɔ ɩ nyɛ fuuli mɛ.
N nyiŋi fʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kesintin mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sʋ, nɩɩ fʋ naana‐kyɩɩsa Lowisi yɛ fu‐nyi Yunisi gbaa ba nyɛ mʋ. Nɩɩ n nyi kesintin fɛɛ kanɩn nɩɩ ngbaa fʋ sʋ.
Lɩɩ falɛ sʋ mʋ, n nyiŋi fʋ fɛɛ, nin fʋlɔn waa Ɩbwaarɛ kakɛɛ, mʋ nɩɩ n kyɩna taa mɛ abaa gyaga fʋ sʋ, nɩɩ fʋ nyɛ mʋ tɔ.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ man sa anɛ Kayaayu mʋ nɩɩ kɩ waa anɛ afuupu, amaa ɔ sa anɛ Kayaayu mʋ nɩɩ kɩ sa anɛ ɔlʋn, yɛ kebiti kɛ a bɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ an kɩtaa anɛ n‐yɩɩ.

Ɩmʋ sʋ ɩ́ man waa fʋ ipeeli fɛɛ, fʋ maa tɔwɛ kesintin asɩn lɩɩ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ mʋ sʋ, abɛɛ ɩ́ waa fʋ ipeeli lɩɩ mɛ sʋ fɛɛ ba maa tii mɛ obu. Amaa fʋ gbaa fu gyii awʋrʋfɔ sa asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ, lɩɩ ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa sa fʋ mʋ sʋ.

Mʋ ɩ mɔlɩgɛ anɛ, nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ anɛ ba waa mʋ gbaa‐gbaa asa, nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ yɛ an waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋrɔn sʋ, amaa lɩɩ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mu kiŋmina yɩla yɛ mʋ kabwaala sʋ. Nɩɩ Krisito Yesu sʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɔla taa kabwaala nɩmʋ bwaala anɛ pɔyɩ nɩɩ ɔ tʋʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ.
Amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ ɔ bɔla anɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ Krisito Yesu kɩba mʋ sʋ ba lɛɛ kabwaala nɩmʋ kaapʋ anɛ, nɩɩ ɔ bɔla asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sʋ nyita lewu ɔlʋn mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ nkpa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ ɔkaa mʋ ifuli.
Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mɛ waa Krisito osunpu yɛ ɔkaapʋpʋ yɛ asɩn danbɩrasa nɩmʋ ɔtɔwɛpʋ.

Kanɩn sʋ nɩɩ n gyii ɩnɩmʋ awʋrʋfɔ falɛ. Amaa ɩ man sʋ mɛ ipeeli, lɩɩ fɛɛ n nyi ɔmʋ nɩɩ n kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii, nɩɩ n nyi kesintin tɔ fɛɛ ɛɛ taalɛ kun kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n taa waa mʋ abaa tɔ naa fʋʋ mʋ kakɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ.
Timoti, kɩtaa kesintin asɩn kaapʋsa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ nyɛ lɩɩ mɛ asɛ mʋ kenken, kɛ fu buu ɩmʋ, yɛgɛ fʋ sʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii yɛ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ lɩɩ Krisito Yesu sʋ an nyɛ mʋ.
Bɔla Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ anɛ tɔ mʋ sʋ, kun asɩn kparɛ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa waa fʋ abaa tɔ mʋ.
Fu nyi fɛɛ anɛ bɩrɩsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ Asiya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ kpini, ba sɩlɛ yɛgɛ mɛ, nɩɩ Figelusi maa Hemogene gbaa ba tii sʋ.
N kʋlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ fɛɛ o wu Onesiforu kɩkpaara sʋ abi kpini kʋwɛɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa kʋmaa ɛɛ yɛgɛ mɛ kɔkɔlɔ kii fuuli mɛ. Nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ mʋ ipeeli fɛɛ ba tii mɛ obu gbaa.
Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ki tii sʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ ba Roma mʋ, ɔ natɛ biti mɛ halɩɩ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ o wu mɛ.
Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ o wu mʋ kʋwɛɛ mʋ kakɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ. Fu nyi danbɩrasa kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyɛ mɛ tɔ ɩkpa gaalaagaa sʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n bʋ Efeso kadɛ tɔ mʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ mi‐bii, bɔla kabwaala mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Krisito Yesu tɔ mʋ nyɛ ɔlʋn.
Nɩɩ asɩn kaapʋsa mʋ nɩɩ fu nu lɩɩ mɛ asɛ sakyɔ ansi tɔ mʋ, taa ɩmʋ waa asa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ kɔɔlɛ bamʋ gyii mʋ abaa tɔ, kɛ ngbaa bamʋ bɛ taalɛ taa kaapʋ akʋ gbaa.
Yɩlɛ tɔ gyii awʋrʋfɔ yɛ anɛ, fɛɛ Krisito Yesu ɔnaakɔpʋ danbɩrasa.
Ɔnaakɔpʋ ɩ payɩ ansi lɩɩ mu kusun sunsa sʋ, kɛ ɩ nyɛ bɔla mʋ ɔbɩlɩsa ansi, ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ mɛɛ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ ɛɛ waa asa mʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ anaakɔpʋ mʋ awaasa tɔ.
Kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ asɩlɛpʋ ba kan bɛɛ sɩlɛ, nɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ o gyii sʋ kan ɔ man buu kɩsɩlɛ nbara mʋ, ɔ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ nyɛ kigyii sʋ kakɛɛ mʋ.
Nɩɩ onsi‐payɩ ɔdɔɔpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa kusun mʋ, ɩ dagaa maa gyankpaa gyii lɩɩ kʋdɔɔ mʋ tɔ.
Fɛ nfɛɛrɛ lɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ falɛ sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ ii biti ɔ yɛgɛ fʋ taalɛ nu atɔ nɩmʋ kpini kasɛ.
Nyiŋi Yesu Krisito mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ owura Dawidi kanan tɔ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kyiŋi mʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ. Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ mʋ,
nɩɩ n gyii ɩmʋ awʋrʋfɔ falɛ, halɩɩ ba taa agbeeleebi ŋmina mɛ fɛɛ maa gyɛ alibi ɔwaapʋ. Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ bɩrɛ, ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ taa agbeeleebi ŋmina ɩmʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ n yɩlɛ tɔ gyii awʋrʋfɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ, lɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ yɩla mʋ sʋ, kɛ ngbaa bamʋ ba bɔla Krisito Yesu sʋ nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ yɛ bʋnyaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ ɔkaa mʋ.
Katɔwɛ nɩmʋ gyɛ kesintin nɩn,
nɩɩ an kan wu yɛ mʋ bɩrɛ,
an biti a kyɩna nkpa tɔ yɛ mʋ.
Nɩɩ an kan yɩlɛ tɔ gyii awʋrʋfɔ bɩrɛ,
an biti i gyii kuwura yɛ mʋ.
Nɩɩ an kan kina mʋ bɩrɛ,
ngbaa mʋ ii biti o kina anɛ.
Nɩɩ an man kan kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ,
mɛɛ mʋ bɩrɛ ɔ san ee gyii mʋ asɩn sʋ,
lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ mɛɛ tɔwɛ asɩn, nɩɩ ɛɛ lɩɩ ɩmʋ kamaa.
Kyaga sʋ nyiŋi bamʋ falɛ atɔ nɩmʋ sʋ. Yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ da bamʋ amu tɔ lɩɩ ntɔwɛ sʋ kamɔɔrɛ‐gyii, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ man sʋ kyaarɛ, amɔɔ ii nyita bamʋ nɩɩ bee nu ɩmʋ mʋ nɩn.
Kpan fʋ n‐yɩɩ kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ o wu fʋ fɛɛ fʋ dagaa, nɩɩ fʋ gyɛ kusun osunpu mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man dagaa maa sʋ ipeeli mu kusun mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ o nyi Ɩbwaarɛ kesintin asɩn mʋ kɩkaapʋ kyɛɛkyɛɛ.
Lɛɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ aligyima mʋ nɩɩ ɩ mɛɛ bʋnyaa Ɩbwaarɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa ɩmʋ mʋ, ɩɩ bɩɩtɛ bamʋ ɩɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ gaa.
Nɩɩ kanɩn asa mʋ kɩkaapʋ ɩɩ yɛlɩgɛ fɛɛ kɩtamɛɛ. Anyɩn anyɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba tii bamʋ sʋ ɩ gyɛ Himenasu maa Filetusi.
Ba fɔyɩ kesintin asɩn mʋ ɔkpa, nɩɩ bɛɛ kaapʋ yɛ, asa kikyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ tɛɛ wʋla ba kyʋn, nɩɩ kɩkaapʋ nɩmʋ ii nyita akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ akʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii.

Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn du nɩn fɛɛ ɔpɔrɛ gyankpaasa mʋ nɩɩ o yii mʋ, nɩɩ ɩ yɩlɛ gin, nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ asɩn nɩmʋ ba gyaga kɩmʋ sʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nyi bamʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ,” nɩɩ ba bɩla kyʋrɔɔ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ ɔ gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ lɛɛ mʋ, dagaa maa yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa.”

Kɩkpaara lala sʋ mʋ, atɔ mʋ nɩɩ bee gyii bee nu ɩmʋ tɔ kʋkwɩɩ‐kʋkwɩɩ ɩ bʋ tɔ. Ba taa suwa abɛɛ gbiti waa ɩkʋ, nɩɩ ba taa iyu abɛɛ kabɔlɛ waa ɩmʋ ɩkʋ mɔɔ. Ɩmʋ ɩkʋ ɩ dɛ sa nkɛ kparɛ kigyii, nɩɩ ɩkʋ mɔɔ ɩ man dɛ sa nkɛ kparɛ kʋ.

Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ alibi kɩwaa tɔ mʋ, ee biti ɔ baa ɔ dɛ sa nkɛ kparɛ kigyii mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ ba waa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ, nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kyaarɛ sa mʋ ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kʋʋla mʋ n‐yɩɩ yɩla sa kusun danbɩrasa kʋmaa nɩmʋ.
Amaa lɛɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ ayaafɔlɛ‐sɩn kayalaga libi tɔ, kɛ fʋ taa fu ansi gyaga ɩkpa kikyiigi yɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii yɛ kebiti yɛ kayɩɩ yuuli sʋ, bʋga yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba taa kɔkɔlɔ fuuli sʋ bee sun Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ sʋ.
Ɩmʋ sʋ lɛɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ kimelensi ɩmɔɔrɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ kasɛ mʋ tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fu nyi ɩ maa bɩya nluu.
Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ man dagaa maa kɔ keluu, amaa ɔ dagaa maa waa kɩdanbɩrasa ɛɛ sa ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ, kɛ ɔ taalɛ kaapʋ, kɛ ɔ nyɛ kenyiita kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ.
Bamʋ nɩɩ bee gyii mʋ ɩmɔɔrɛ mʋ, ɩ dagaa maa lɛɛ asɩn mʋ kaapʋ bamʋ laakalɛ sʋ, akʋtɔ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti o bugi ɔkpa sa bamʋ, kɛ ba yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa, kɛ ba ba bɩɩ kesintin asɩn mʋ.
Kɛ ba nyɛ nfɛɛrɛ danbɩrasa, kɛ ba sɩlɛ lɩɩ ɔdʋʋ mʋ nɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ sʋʋ kɩtaa bamʋ, nɩɩ bee nu mʋ asɛ bɛɛ waa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ee biti mʋ tɔ.
Amaa baa fʋ nyi ɩnɩmʋ fɛɛ, nkɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, awʋrʋfɔ damantɛ ii biti ɩ ba asa sʋ.

Lɩɩ fɛɛ, asa bee biti ba kɩɩ biti bamʋ nkʋn lɛɛ, yɛ kefulee biti bansa, yɛ n‐yɩɩ kɩkaapʋ, yɛ alala‐sɩn, yɛ asa kɩsaalɛ, yɛ kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn sa bamʋ akʋʋgɛpʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ waa kɩdanbɩrasa sa bamʋ gbaa ba mɛɛ lɛɛ mʋ kɩtɩɩ, nɩɩ ba mɛɛ taa Ɩbwaarɛ bɛɛ tɩɩ sɛhn,
nɩɩ ba mɛɛ yɛ bɛ nyɛ kebiti sa ɔkʋ, nɩɩ be mee wu ɔkʋ kʋwɛɛ, nɩɩ bee biti ba nyita asa kɩtɩɩ, nɩɩ ba mɛɛ taalɛ kɩtaa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ, nɩɩ asa bee biti ba sɩlɛ bamʋ, nɩɩ bee biti ba kisi kɩdanbɩrasa,
nɩɩ bee biti ba waa adiboyipu, nɩɩ ba mɛɛ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ pɔyɩ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa kʋtɔ kʋ, nɩɩ bɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ, nɩɩ bee biti dulinyaa tɔ ɔkɔn ba kyɔ Ɩbwaarɛ.
Bee biti ba sun Ɩbwaarɛ ansi sʋ, amaa ba kina mʋ ɔlʋn mʋ. Man bʋga yɛ kanɩn asa.

Bamʋ tɔ akʋ bɛɛ taa kanyaasɩn libi bee loo akpaara sʋ, nɩɩ bɛɛ taa kɔnɔ tɔ kɔn bɛɛ pɩna akyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ba mɛɛ taalɛ kɩtaa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ, nɩɩ bamʋ alibi i du fɛɛ kasʋla ɩ gyan bamʋ sʋ, nɩɩ kayalaga libi kʋkwɩɩ‐kʋkwɩɩ bʋ bamʋ tɔ.
Kanɩn akyɩɩ mʋ bɛɛ kpan n‐yɩɩ saŋa kʋmaa bɛɛ bɩɩla, amaa ba mɛɛ taalɛ ba bɩɩ kesintin mʋ.

Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Gyanise maa Gyanberesi ba daa kyɩna kʋsʋ yɩlɛ Mosesi sʋ mʋ, kanɩn nɩɩ falɛ anyɩn anɩmʋ gbaa bɛɛ kɔ bee tii kesintin mʋ ɔkpa. Bamʋ amu i nyita, nɩɩ ba man sʋ ɔyɩlɛkpa kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ tɔ.
Bamʋ awaasa nɩmʋ mee kpiya bamʋ ansi tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ii biti o wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba melensi, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Gyanise maa Gyanberesi kimelensi ɩ daa lɩɩ ifuli mʋ.
Amaa fɛɛ fʋ bɩrɛ, fu nyi asɩn mʋ nɩɩ n kaapʋ mʋ kpini, yɛ mɛ kakyɩna tɔ, yɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ mi ansi ɩ gyan sʋ, yɛ mɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii, yɛ mɛ kenyiita, yɛ mi kebiti, yɛ mɛ kɩyɩlɛ tɔ gyii awʋrʋfɔ.

Fu nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ asa ba nyanla mɛ, yɛ awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ n gyii Antiyoki yɛ Ikoniyum yɛ Lisitira ndɛ tɔ, nɩɩ n nyɛ kenyiita yɩlɛ kanyanla mʋ kpini tɔ, nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito lɛɛ mɛ lɩɩ ɩmʋ kpini tɔ.
Ɩ gyɛ kesintin fɛɛ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti o buu Krisito Yesu, kɛ ɔ waa Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti mʋ, ee biti ɔ nyɛ kanyanla.
Alibi awaapʋ yɛ apɩnapʋ bɩrɛ bamʋ alibi ii biti ɩ lɔŋɔ tii sʋ nɩn, kanan mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ pɩna asa mʋ, kanɩn gbaa nɩɩ ii biti ɩ pɩna bamʋ.
Amaa fɛɛ fʋ bɩrɛ, kyaga sʋ kɩtaa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fʋ bɩɩla nɩɩ fʋ kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fu nyi bamʋ nɩɩ fʋ bɩɩla lɩɩ bamʋ asɛ,
nɩɩ lɩɩ fʋ kibii tɔ mʋ, fu nyi Asɩnkyan yɩlasa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɩmʋ ɩ taalɛ sa fʋ kanyaasɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bɩya kamɔlɩgɛ bɔla kɩkɔɔlɛ Krisito Yesu gyii sʋ.
Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ kpini ɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ nɩn, nɩɩ ɩ bʋrɔn sa kɩkaapʋ, yɛ katɔwɛ yii, yɛ kɩtɔwɛ kyiigi, yɛ kɩbɩla ɩkpa kikyiigi tɔ,
saamʋ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔsa ɩ nyɛ dan tɔ sa kusun danbɩrasa kʋmaa kɩwaa.
Krisito Yesu ii biti ɔ ba yɛ mu kuwura‐gyii ba talɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba tɛ nkpa tɔ, yɛ alewupu. N yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ maa Yesu Krisito ansi tɔ n sa fʋ kɔnɔ yɛ,
tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ. Kʋʋla fʋ n‐yɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa yɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man dagaa, taa kenyiita kpini tɔwɛ kyiigi asa ɩkpa, kɛ fʋ tɔwɛ yii asa, kɛ fʋ tɔwɛ waa asa ɔlʋn tɔ.

Lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa kʋ ii biti ɔ ba nɩɩ asa ba mɛɛ yɛ be buu kesintin kɩkaapʋ mʋ. Amɔɔ be buu bamʋ kayalaga tɔ asɩn. Bee biti ba kɩɩ biti akaapʋpʋ damantɛ kyaabɔɔ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ, kɛ bɛ kaapʋ bamʋ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋkɔn bamʋ asʋ tɔ kɛ be nu.
Ba man bɩla yɛ be nu kesintin mʋ, bee biti ba biliŋi ba buu asɩrɩkpan ikisii‐sɩn.
Amaa fɛɛ fʋ bɩrɛ, baa fʋ da fu kumu sʋ asɩn kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ, nyɛ kɔkɔlɔ yɩlɛ awʋrʋfɔ tɔ, waa asɩn danbɩrasa kusun mʋ ɔtɔwɛpʋ, sun fʋ kusun kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa naa lʋwɛ.
Mɛɛ mɛ bɩrɛ mɛ saŋa fʋ fɛɛ n wu, nɩɩ i du nɩn fɛɛ mɛ nkpa ɩɩ kyɛɛgɛ ɩɩ wʋrɩgɛ fɛɛ saraga sa Ɩbwaarɛ.
N kɔ keluu danbɩrasa mʋ, nɩɩ n sɩlɛ kɩsɩlɛ mʋ naa fʋʋ ɔkaa, nɩɩ n kɩtaa kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ tɔ.

Nbɩɩnbɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kii gyoo mɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ kigyii sʋ kakɛɛ, mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, ɩkpa kyiigisa ɔtalɛpʋ mʋ ii biti ɔ taa sa mɛ kanɩn kakɛ maŋa, nɩɩ man gyɛ mɛ nkʋn, amaa yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ gyʋgyʋʋ bamʋ yɛ be wu Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu kɩba mʋ.
Kpan fʋ n‐yɩɩ kɛ fʋ ba mɛ asɛ bilen,
lɩɩ fɛɛ Demasi sʋ kebiti sa dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ atɔ, nɩɩ ɔ sɩlɛ yɛgɛ mɛ kpee Tesalonika kadɛ tɔ. Kresensi kyʋn Galati kadɛ tɔ, nɩɩ Titusi mɔɔ kyʋn Dalimatiya kadɛ tɔ.
Luka nkʋn ɩ bʋ mɛ asɛ. Biti Maki kɛ fʋ taa mʋ bɩya mɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ ɩ taalɛ kyɛ mɛ tɔ, mi kusun mʋ tɔ.
N sun Takikusi yɛ o kpee Efeso kadɛ tɔ.
Nɩɩ fʋ kan fɩɩ ba mʋ, fʋ taa mɛ balɩmaasʋ mʋ nɩɩ n yɛgɛ yɩla Kapusi asɛ Trowa kadɛ tɔ, yɛ mɛ ɩwʋlɛ, fɔnfɔn ɩmʋ nɩɩ ba taa atɔbwaaya ɩwʋlɛ waa mʋ bɩya mɛ.
Alekisanda mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ bayɩpʋ mʋ waa mɛ alibi gaa. Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa mɛ mʋ, Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ ii biti ɔ ka mʋ kʋkɔ.
Fʋ gbaa fʋ, baa fʋ da mʋ sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ yɩlɛ sʋ kenken ee tii anɛ asɩn tɔwɛsa mʋ ɔkpa.
Kakɛ gyankpaasa mʋ nɩɩ n yɩlɛ n lɛɛ kɔnɔ mɛ asɩn kigyii tɔ mʋ, ɔkʋ man ba yɩlɛ mɛ kamaa, ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ palɛ mʋ kamaa sa mɛ. N kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ fɛɛ ɔ man ka bamʋ kʋkɔ lɩɩ ɩmʋ sʋ.
Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ yɩlɛ mɛ kamaa nɩɩ ɔ sa mɛ ɔlʋn, nɩɩ n nyɛ tɔwɛ asɩn mʋ lʋwɛ, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ gbaa ba nu ɩmʋ. Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mɛ lɩɩ bɩranɛ kɔnɔ tɔ.
Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu mʋ ii biti ɔ lɛɛ mɛ lɩɩ alibi kʋmaa mʋ tɔ, kɛ ɔ bɩya mɛ sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ yɛ alanfɩya. Mʋ nɩɩ bʋnyaa gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ kakpaa. Amen.
Fwaala Prisila maa Akwila yɛ Onesiforu kɩkpaara sʋ asa kpini.
Erasitu sii ɔ tɛ Korinto kadɛ tɔ, nɩɩ n yɛgɛ Trofimu mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ lɔɔ mʋ, Miletu kadɛ tɔ.
Kpan fʋ n‐yɩɩ kɛ fʋ fʋʋ nfɩɩ pɔyɩ kɛ gbangban ɔ fʋʋ. Ebulusi yɛ Pudensi yɛ Linusi yɛ Kilodiya yɛ bamʋ bɩrɩsa ana kpini bɛɛ fwaala fʋ.
Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ yɛ fʋ kayaayu fan kyɩna. Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ bwaala fanɛ.
Titus: Ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ lɩɩ mɛ Pɔɔlɩ, Ɩbwaarɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ yɛ Yesu Krisito osunpu mʋ asɛ. O sun mɛ yɛ n ba kyɛ mʋ asa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ, kɛ n kaapʋ bamʋ kɛ ba bɩɩ kesintin mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ asa bee buu kabwaarɛ‐sun danbɩrasa,
mʋ nɩɩ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii yɛ kinyi ɩ gyan nkpa kakpaa tamaa mʋ sʋ. Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ tɩn antɩŋɛsa mʋ, da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ sa anɛ nkpa nɩmʋ lɩɩ koo npiili asɛ,
nɩɩ saŋa kyɛɛkyɛɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ anɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ mʋ lɛɛ mʋ asɩn kaapʋ, fɛɛ maa taa waa mɛ abaa tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ sa mɛ kɔnɔ yɛ n tɔwɛ asɩn mʋ sa asa.
N kyʋrɔɔ n sa fʋ Titusi, mʋ nɩɩ n taa fʋ fɛɛ mi‐bii gbaa‐gbaa anɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kʋlʋn mʋ tɔ mʋ.
Kabwaala yɛ kayɩɩ yuuli mʋ nɩɩ kɩ lɩɩ anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ anɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ, Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito asɛ mʋ yɛ fʋ fan kyɩna.
Kʋtɔ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ n yɛgɛ fʋ Kereti ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, fʋ nyɛ lɔŋɔ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ san mʋ lʋwɛ, kɛ fʋ yii abɩlɩsa kadɛ kʋmaa nɩmʋ Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ tɔ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n kaapʋ fʋ mʋ.
Ɩ dagaa ɔbɩlɩsa maa gyɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ man sʋ asɩn pwɩɩsa, nɩɩ o kili ɔkyɩɩ kʋlʋn kpen, nɩɩ mu‐bii ana bɛ gyɛ akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu, mʋ nɩɩ ba man sʋ kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn abɛɛ kibii libi.

Fɛɛ ɔbɩlɩsa maa gyɛ Krisito kʋbʋ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ, ɩ dagaa maa gyɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ man sʋ asɩn pwɩɩsa, nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ kʋsaa mʋ n‐yɩɩ, nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ nyɛ agbʋ benbilen, nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ bʋʋ nta, nɩɩ ɔ man gyɛ oluu bitipu, nɩɩ ɔ man sʋ onsi‐payɩ libi afulee sʋ.
Amaa ɔ dagaa maa gyɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɔɔlɛ afɔ, nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kebiti sa ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋrɔn, nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩtaa mʋ n‐yɩɩ, nɩɩ mʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi, nɩɩ ɔ sɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nɩɩ mʋ awaasa du kyɛɛkyɛɛ.

Ɔ dagaa maa taalɛ kɩtaa kesintin asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ kenken, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba kaapʋ ɩmʋ mʋ, kɛ ngbaa mʋ ɔ taalɛ taa kesintin kɩkaapʋ mʋ tɔwɛ waa asa, kɛ ɔ taa ɩmʋ tii bamʋ nɩɩ bee gyii ɩmʋ ɩmɔɔrɛ mʋ ɔkpa.
Lɩɩ fɛɛ asa gaalaagaa bɛɛ kʋsʋ bɛɛ yɩlɛ asɩn mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ bɛ sʋ bamʋ ntɔwɛ kɩyan bɛɛ pɩna asa, fɔnfɔn Gyiwu abi akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu.
Ɩ dagaa fʋ tii bamʋ ntɔwɛ mʋ ɔkpa, lɩɩ fɛɛ bɛ sʋ bamʋ npɩna kɩkaapʋ mʋ bee nyita akpaara sʋ abi lɩɩ kɩkaapʋ danbɩrasa mʋ sʋ. Bɛɛ waa ipeeli‐sɩn nɩmʋ bee biti afulee.
Halɩɩ Kereti abi atɔwɛpʋ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Kereti abi bɛ gyɛ antɩŋɛsa wuya ana nɩn saŋa kʋmaa, nɩɩ be du fɛɛ ndʋnbwɛ libi, nɩɩ bɛ gyɛ awʋlɛgyɔpʋ agyipu lala.”
Asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ kesintin. Ɩmʋ sʋ taa kensi payɩ tɔwɛ yii bamʋ, kɛ bamʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii ɩ nyɛ yɩlɛ kinkin,
kɛ ba man nu Gyiwu abi asɩrɩkpan ikisii‐sɩn mʋ, abɛɛ be nu sa bamʋ nɩɩ bee kina kesintin asɩn mʋ.

Bamʋ nɩɩ ba man sʋ ineesi mʋ, kʋtɔ kʋ man gyɛ ineesi bamʋ asɛ, amaa bamʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ ineesi nɩɩ ba mɛɛ kɔɔlɛ bee gyii mʋ, sɛhn man gyɛ kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ bamʋ asɛ, amaa alibi ɩ bɔla bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ yɛ bamʋ nkɔlɔ tɔ kpini.
Bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ be nyi Ɩbwaarɛ, amaa bamʋ awaasa tɔ mʋ bee kina mʋ. Ɩbwaarɛ ii kisi bamʋ awaasa kpini, nɩɩ bɛ gyɛ kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn wuya ana, nɩɩ ba mɛɛ taalɛ waa kɩdanbɩrasa kakaakʋ.
Amaa fɛɛ fʋ bɩrɛ, ɩ dagaa fʋ kaapʋ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ii buu kesintin kɩkaapʋ mʋ.
Tɔwɛ anyɩn abɩlɩsa fɛɛ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ baa ɩ dɛ, kɛ ba baa bɛ sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ, kɛ ba kɩtaa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ, kɛ ba kɩtaa kesintin kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ tɔ, kɛ ba nyɛ kebiti sa abaa, kɛ ba nyɛ nkɔlɔ yɩlɛ tɔ.
Kanɩn maa nɩɩ fʋ tɔwɛ akyɩɩ‐nyi mʋ fɛɛ ba kyɩna kakyɩna mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ Krisito abuupu ba kyɩna mʋ. Ba man natɛ nyita asa atɩɩ abɛɛ ba baa bɛ gyɛ atabʋʋpʋ, amaa ba kaapʋ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋrɔn.
Kanɩn gbaa nɩɩ ba kaapʋ abite mʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ bee biti bamʋ‐kuli ana yɛ bamʋ‐bii ana,

kɛ ba kɩtaa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ kɛ ba man waa kɩgyagaa, kɛ ba waa bamʋ akpaara sʋ asun, kɛ ba waa adanbɩrasa, kɛ ba bɩya bamʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ sa bamʋ‐kuli ana, kɛ ɔkʋ ɔ man nyɛ tɔwɛ asɩn libi nyita Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ.
Kanɩn maa nɩɩ fʋ tɔwɛ waa ayaafɔlɛ gbaa fɛɛ ba kɩtaa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ.
Lɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa tɔ mʋ, ɩ dagaa fʋ maa waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋrɔn kɛ asa bɛ kasɛ fʋ tɔ. Lɩɩ fʋ kɩkaapʋ tɔ mʋ taa kensi payɩ yɛ kɔkɔlɔ fuuli kaapʋ.
